column1: Bunny Rabbit. Sarah was at the park. She wanted to play in the sand. Her mom told her not to go in the water. Sarah went into the water. Sarah got scared and ran in the sand.

Good Terms. John and Joe are both lawyers. Joe has worked for them for years. They are happy they have found a good client. It turns out Joe was hired by a rival firm. John is very upset with himself.

What And Itch. Sarah woke up with a terrible scratch. She was going to a school event. Her mother bought a brand new, pink nail polish. She sprayed it all over the girl's back. Sarah's mom decided she had enough of the back scratching.

Empty Club. We were sitting in our apartment watching the news when a loud bang was heard. We looked outside and saw that the club had been blown to pieces. We went outside and saw that our balcony was smashed. The landlord came and said that we would be evicted. I am hoping to stay with my girlfriend in the apartment.

Wrestling. My wife is watching a wrestling show. We have just been told to leave the building. We went to a wrestling meet last night. We were disappointed to not get to see many matches. We are going to take a bus home this afternoon.

Magical Fruit. My wife bought some fruit to bake. We cooked it in the oven, with milk and honey. She asked me how much milk was in the jar. I said 1 ounce, and she said I had 1 cup. I said I had a quart, and she said it would be fine.

Schedule. I had a meeting on Saturday afternoon. I was not able to schedule my meeting. I was able to schedule the meeting on Monday. The meeting was delayed because of work. I will be in an appointment on Tuesday.

Candy in the dirt. Dara decided to get her niece into a candy shop. As she walked in, she noticed a small patch of dirt. She decided to scoop out all the candy. When she pulled out all the candy, she was disappointed. Her niece loved it and she ended up leaving disappointed.

Robins cruel exit. Robins' friend Bob has been drinking lately. Robins noticed that Bob drinks so much that he doesn't work. Robins decided that it was time for him to go to work. Robins left his house to go to work. Robins is now back home with his friend Bob.
Good Fences. Gina was at a bar with friends. She got a bottle of Bud. She drank it as soon as she got it. It was gross. Gina then had to go home.
Carnival Games. Allie wanted to go to the carnival. So she went with her friends. They drove to the carnival. They took their favorite rides. They had a good time.

New Neighbors. Sara lived with her grandmother. Everyday, they were getting things from the dumpster. When the garbage truck came, they had to walk to the dumpster. Sara's grandma hated the noise. Soon, Sara and her grandma began to dislike each other.

The Face Wash. Maggie really liked her new hair color. She went shopping at the mall. She got a few nice, vibrant colors. She thought she would only wear the most sparkly ones. The next day she was horrified to see that it had completely ruined her hair!

Bill started a company. Bill had been working for years. Bill began selling some products online. Bill made enough money from selling his products online. Bill sold all his money online. Bill's company started to grow.
Pool. Jim had a pool. He wanted to buy a new one. He visited the local store. He decided on the pool at the store. He was glad he went there.

Megan sees a ghost. Megan is on her way to work when she notices a strange figure. She asks her co-workers what she is seeing and they tell her. Suddenly, Megan sees a ghost in the building. Her co-workers tell her to get out. Megan doesn't listen and stays to work.

Francine Has her Ears Pierced. Francine has had her ears pierced at a young age. She did not want to tell her parents. She was afraid she would not like the piercing. One day, her parents surprised her with a brand new pair. Now, Francine no longer has to tell her parents the piercing.
Penn. My friend Penn took me out to lunch last Thursday. He brought his kids with him. His kids had a great time. However, his car broke down. It took them an hour to get it fixed.

Flower Shop. Nancy got a job at a flower shop. She worked very hard and loved it. But one day she decided to leave to go to college. But she got a bad attitude and refused to work. Now Nancy is homeless.
Shoes. Tim was running out of socks. He was going to go home and get more. He was running and got tired. He decided to just wear his boots to work. He finished off at work and was satisfied.

Spare Change. Tom wanted to go buy a new shirt. He tried to shop around and see what was available. He saw a t-shirt that he really liked. Unfortunately it was so cheap that he couldn't afford it. Tom decided to just order a second shirt.

Balloon Fight. I went to the store to buy a new ball. I tried on several items to get the one that I wanted. As I went to the register the owner came over to pick one up. She asked me what I wanted it for. I gave her my new ball and we went to the game together.

Stripley. Jill had a horrible habit of stretching her feet out. It was a habit that her doctor told her was unhealthy. Jill began exercising everyday. As she was starting to get healthy, Jill started taking up walking. Jill is now more comfortable walking around with no stretch marks.

Milkshake. Kelly and her friends went to the beach. They ordered milkshakes and drank some water. They were too thirsty to go back to their hotel. Kelly and her friends ate the watermelon shake. They didn't have anything else to eat.
Vintage toy. Mary found an old toy. It was antique. It had so many parts. She decided to put it into a gallery. She sold the pieces for a good price.

New Underwear. Gina and Tim are trying on new underwear. They both find their underwear too small. They both decide to buy new ones. They go to the store and buy the new underwear. They are both very happy with their new underwear.

The Psychology of Grades. James was doing poorly in his psychology class. He was not very interested in the course and thought the teacher was unfair. The next week, the teacher announced that he would make changes. James was relieved that the changes were made and was able to focus on the class. James was very happy and took the new course very seriously.
New Dog. My dog got a new puppy. I picked her up. We spent the next few weeks together. When she was old enough I took her to the pound. She is now a full grown dog!

Music Band. I loved playing the cello. One day my cello teacher took me to a concert. I was very nervous because I didn't know what I would play. I played the cello in front of all of my classmates. I got very good at cello because of my teacher's guidance.

The Concert. My girlfriend wanted to go to a concert with me. We drove to the local area. She did not know which club I wanted to go to. She called me for some suggestions. I had a great time on the way to the concert.

Dinosaurs. It was an exciting time in the history of dinosaur exploration. There were so many fossils to find. The kids went on adventure trips to discover them. There were many exciting times at the museum. It was a thrilling time to be a dinosaur fan!

Pickles. Tom's favorite thing to eat is pickles. He doesn't think it tastes much different. He goes to a restaurant and gets some pickles. His girlfriend wants a slice of his pickles. She eats it and is glad she got to taste it.

Raking Leaves. Karen was cleaning her kitchen. She found all of her leaves in the floor. She asked her husband to help her rake them. When he got there, they started. They raked all the leaves in one day.
Dangerous Campfire. Kia was going camping with her family. There was a dangerous fire in her tent. The kids were scared to go outside. Kia's dad called her. She made it through the fire safe.

Bianca Dyes Her Hair. Bianca wants to look like a princess. She decides to dye her hair purple. This brightens her face and makes her feel a little fancy. She walks outside and has a lovely day. She loves the unique way she looks.
Dancing. I was in a ballet class. Everyone was doing their routine. I was having a tough time dancing. I decided to try and learn something new. Thankfully I found a good balance and got better.

Buying a New TV. I always wanted a new TV. I decided to go to the store and look at different models. I ended up purchasing the cheapest model. Now I have a great new TV. It is so much better than buying a used tv.

Deaf Kid. My friend has been living with a hearing loss for over a decade. This year she was hearing her grandpa speak. He made the rounds at an amusement park. People wanted to give her a hand. The woman at the concession stands didn't even have to take her.

Race. Gina was running on a race track. She had a great time and her favorite person had a great race. They went on for miles and ran around the track. When it was over, Gina was able to pick her favorite person up. Then she took them home for dinner and they got along great!

The Puppet Show. Barry loved to create new things. He wanted to play with puppets. Barry bought a huge cardboard puppet and started to play with it. Barry's dad, amazed, let him put the cardboard puppet on his lap. Barry played with the cardboard puppet that night until it began to crumble.

New Hobby. Diana was a great dancer. She was performing at an open mike competition. Her mother took a picture of her dancing in front of a fan. She shared the picture on facebook. The next day the fan wrote Diana a personal message.
No Jumping. I was jumping over a tree in the park. I was trying to jump over a rope. There were kids below me. I got up and tried to make my way to the top. My foot was caught in the rope and I fell.
Comparison. Mary is going to the movies. Her friend is there with her. They both watch the same movie. Mary says it's better than her friend's. They both agree that they both enjoy it.

seafood. Lisa decided she wanted to try some seafood. She went out and found some different types of fish. She sampled the fish and tried them out. She liked them so much she wanted more. Lisa decided to try more seafood the next time she went.
Burritos. Jed's favorite meal was burritos. So he was excited to try one today. He ordered one and it arrived. It was big and tasty!Jed had a wonderful time at the store.
Spinach. My son likes spinach. One day he ate a salad. He went to the store to buy spinach. He found a lot of spinach. My son was pleased with his new spinach!

Exercising. I was exercising my legs. I had worked out so hard that I could barely lift my legs. I started lifting my legs while they were still very weak. My muscles were weak, and the rest of my body started to burn. I realized that I was very weak, and had to stop exercising.

New Year's Resolution. Last year, I wanted to start a personal blog. I made a short list of things I wanted to write about. I went through it quickly, writing about some of the most important things in my life. After I finished all the stuff I wrote, I posted it on my blog. I was able to complete this goal after writing about all the important things.

John Buys An Umbrella. John was hiking in the woods. Suddenly, he saw an umbrella hanging from the branches. He carried it across the trail and back home. However, he couldn't decide if he should keep it or throw it away. John eventually decided to just give it to his kids instead.

Embarrassing Mistake. Alex was watching a movie. He was distracted from his work by some text messages. While watching the movie Alex lost his focus and ran off. His car crashed into a tree. Alex's car would have to be towed to the mechanic's.
Greenery. My girlfriend wanted to do some landscaping. She went to the nearest office. They put a bunch of plants in the backyard. They watered the plants every day. The plants are thriving.
The Weight Loss Expert. Susie was overweight. So she decided to lose weight. So she started using healthy foods. Then she started going to the doctor. She lost 20 pounds in 6 months!

Library Book. Lucy was a little girl. One day while she was at the library, a kid came in the bathroom. The kid was selling his favorite book. Lucy asked if the book could be read. The kid read the book.
Low Blood Sugar. I had high blood sugar. I decided to take some medicine to control it. I took the medicine. I could barely eat any food. I was sick and broke down for two days.
Broken Nose. Sam was driving his car home. He started to feel bad. It was snowing very hard. Sam turned on his headlight. It was broken and Sam had a huge headache.

Eternal love. A new girlfriend has arrived and is a wonderful person. She is very friendly and warm. All the sudden she starts saying mean things about my dad. I know this sounds silly but I don't know how to stop it. Finally I tell her off and she breaks it off.

Lost Phone. A woman in her early 40's was in a car accident. The car was totaled and no phone was in the trunk. The woman called and spoke to someone. The lady said she had lost the phone. She went back home and took it.

Eviction. Randy's house was on the verge of being foreclosed on. He had not been paying rent. He was told he had to vacate his house by the landlord. Randy was upset but did not really know what to do. He eventually agreed and moved out, leaving his family without a home.

Thunder. Tom was outside when he heard thunder. He went inside, he looked out, and saw lightning. He was amazed to see it on the news. Tom looked around, he saw he was surrounded. He ran inside to see if his house was in trouble.

Lost poncho. Kate was walking to school one morning. Kate was not wearing a poncho to cover her skin. Kate saw a homeless man in the street. The man gave Kate a poncho. Kate picked up the poncho and put it in her backpack.
Swim. The water was too cold. I couldn't swim. My sister came to me and told me to go in. I was very happy she did. I stayed in the hot tub for hours.

Sticky. Janet decided to make a new dress for Christmas. The one she bought was very expensive. The dress did not fit her very well and she would be unhappy. Janet was not going to lose anything because she made the dress. The next day she opened up to the store and found that the dress was perfectly sized.

Mother. Trevor was a good looking kid. He was also very homesick. When he got married he brought home a daughter he barely knew. The kids became close friends and they grew up together. Trevor was now the mother of his little daughter.
ID. I needed to get an ID. I searched everywhere for my ID. I couldn't find it. I called the DMV. I was able to get my ID.

The Inheritance. Tim was the eldest son. He inherited the family business. He had inherited it from his father. Tim did not like the way the business had gone. Tim decided to sell it and his father bought the business.

Mike Drinks White Wine. Mike was at a party. All of a sudden a white wine began to flow down his throat. Mike had not expected the wine to be that good. But it did and he had a lot to drink. Eventually Mike felt better and went home.
Broken Bike. A woman was riding her bike on the sidewalk. She noticed a car on the side of the street. The car was very fast. The woman hit the car's tire. The woman had to call for help.

The Blind Date. Rena was about to graduate college. She went to a big party that evening. Rena met a girl who was very attractive. Rena became very romantic with the girl. They eventually got together and had a long date.

The Stormy Day. Mary was walking to her car. The weather was turning hot and rainy. She decided to take a drive to see the weather forecast. She arrived at the forecast office the next day. The weather forecast for Mary's city was a lot better.

White Cast Christmas. Tom was in the hospital due to aneurysm. The swelling was too much to take care of. Tom went to visit the doctor for his recovery. He was in shock to learn that the surgery was white cast. Tom's whole family came over to help cheer him up.

The volleyball accident. John was playing tennis with his friends. They were both excited for the upcoming match. John lost control of his ball. He hit the other guy in the head. John's friends and his parents both came to his aid.

Turtle Fears. The Smith family had a pond in their backyard. The pond was full of frogs and turtles. One day, their mother dove off the bridge onto the pond. She hit one of the turtles in the head with a stick. She didn't make it out of the pond alive.
Shoelaces. I got new shoes yesterday. The first thing I did was trim my nails. I didn't want my shoes to be wrinkled up!I also put on some shoes I've been saving for weeks. They look very nice!

Easy mac disappointment. Brianna was cooking macaroni and cheese. She thought it would be a great easy meal. Unfortunately she was wrong. It was not as easy as she thought. She didn't even have enough meat on her plate.

Puppy Litter. Samantha was at the pet store. She was looking for a new puppy to keep. She found a great one but it was very old. She chose the one she liked best and got it. She was so happy that her new puppy was clean and healthy.

Old Friend. One day, a friend of mine invited me over to his house. We talked about our interests and life goals. After dinner, we went to a video store to see a movie. Afterwards, he told me I was old enough to drive. He drove us to the mall and showed me where we could buy a car.

The Easter Parade. Today is the Easter Parade for the family. They go to the church every Sunday to see the kids. This is their biggest tradition. They ride the horses, cars and floats. Everyone is happy when it is time for the Parade.
No Littering. Gina and Sam got married in July. It was a good year for Sam and Gina. They had two kids. The kids were great. Now Gina's going back to a good home to raise them.
Ham Sandwich. Tom was hungry for lunch. He was in the cafeteria. Someone else left a ham sandwich. Tom was hungry for lunch. He ate it and had a sandwich.

Confession. My friend Jim had been doing drugs for the last 5 years. He was very embarrassed to be caught because he was so ashamed. He told me that he would confess to anything. The next day I asked him what he had been doing. He admitted that he was drug addicted.

Janet. Janet wanted to be a waitress. She applied for a job at an Italian restaurant. Janet was hired on a temp day. Janet worked hard every day at the restaurant. Janet was proud to be a waitress at her favorite Italian restaurant.
The fishing trip. I had never taken fishing before. I went to the lake with my dad. We set up the boat and put on our gear. We all had a good time fishing. We ended up having a great day.

Rex Drinks Tea. Rex was drinking tea in the bathroom. All of a sudden he heard the tea whistle. Rex was shocked and jumped out of his seat. His hand accidentally caught in the water. Rex was very mad at himself.

Scared Teddy. Teddy was a little boy who was very scared of thunder. One day while playing he went outside to go for a walk. Teddy was afraid of the thunder that day. Teddy was so scared that he threw his tennis ball. Teddy didn't go outside for hours.

Power Outage. Today we got electricity to the house. There was an electrical outage due to a power line break. We drove all over town to get a better idea of the damage. We called all the stores we could find. I ended up with gas and food to last us until the next day.

A new hobby. Susie was always bored of being a single person. One day she realized she enjoyed making things for other people. She made some clothes for them. She began making their own things. She eventually had enough and decided to start a business.

Photo. It was a sunny day outside. I was taking pictures at my office. Suddenly my phone started to buzz. I immediately jumped out of my car to call security. My security was on the other end of the phone.

The Deadline. John was at work when he heard a weird noise. He couldn't figure out what it was. Finally, he went to check and realized there was an announcement on the tv. He looked up the weather report to see that it was coming up. He took the news and read it to his kids so they would be ready.

Wine tasting. Julia was having a big wine tasting. She had a bottle of wine to pair with her meal. As Julia sat down she tried to make her food. The wine did not taste as good as she thought it would. Julia was very disappointed with the wine tasting.

The bed. Rene slept on the back of her new bed. She had only slept on it for a few hours. She got up, put the blanket over her head, and walked to the dresser. She was still exhausted. The rest of the night was spent sleeping in bed.

The saxophone. One day, Dan went to the store to buy a saxophone. Dan picked up a beautiful bass saxophone. Dan played it for his girlfriend. She loved the sound of the saxophone. Dan got a call from his girlfriend the next day asking what he played.

The Farm. Tom and Jim wanted to take a trip on their farm. They didn't know how far away their farm was so they asked neighbors. There were several neighbors they wanted to have dinner with. After a few months, Jim and Tom took a trip together. Tom and Jim loved every minute of their trip on their farm.

Outside the Window. Kia was driving home from school. As she pulled up to the curb she noticed her car blocking the road. She turned around and waited until it was a bit of a loo. As she got out she realized it was a squirrel outside her window!After realizing it she realized it wasn't really a problem, just a squirrel!

Making it gluten free. Samantha loved to make gluten free doughnuts. She found a recipe for gluten free chocolate chip cookies. She followed it exactly and it turned out great. The only problem was she had to buy gluten free oats for the doughnuts. Then they weren't so delicious after all!
The plane trip. Gina was flying home from school. She was having a great time. She was excited to finally see her family. She also saw all her friends. Gina enjoyed every second of her flight home.

Jen's Game. Jen has a big competition to win first prize at the game. She has a really good strategy, and her parents all agreed. Jen's parents decided to give her a prize money prize instead. Jen played the game perfectly, and won the first prize. Her parents thanked her and said she deserved the prize money.

More Alone. Amy was alone one night at night. She was so bored, that she didn't notice her neighbors. But the next day, her neighbor brought in a strange cat!Amy panicked and started freaking out. But luckily the neighbor let her know that the cat was just a friend.

Theme park excitement. Gina went to the theme park to check out the roller coaster. She thought the ride was so scary and exciting. She was excited when she got on the ride. But it was too scary to ride. Gina had to wait in line for several hours.
Futsal. I was looking for a new futsal league. I saw one that had a $10-15 fee to join. So I decided to get one. I joined it and was very happy with it. I was able to play futsal everyday after that.

Bluebirds. One morning when I woke up I saw a bluebird in my living room. I could not wait to see him again. I took him into my backyard where he was happily flying. It was one of the most beautiful experiences of my life. I decided I will never go near bluebirds again.

The Trip. Alex and Ben were headed to a haunted attraction. Alex noticed a familiar face and got scared. When they reached the top, he and Ben saw what was scary. There was a man with a creepy smile on his face. Ben had to rush out of the attraction.

Carnival Ride. One day my family went to the carnival. There was a carnival ride called the Giant Wheel. My sister had the best time. I tried to be her but she beat me. The ride was worth it because of my sister.

Lost Throughout the Process. My friend is running for a state senate seat. He's been very focused on social media. He's lost track of the time and effort he put in. When he was first asked to volunteer for a campaign, he was reluctant. However, he now thinks that volunteering is a better career move than running.

The Murderer. Gina was watching the news when she saw the news about the murder of a man. She knew that the man was the murderer and the police had arrested him. She sat down in class and read the newspaper. In the newspaper, there was a story of the new drug treatment program. She found out that the drug treatment program was to help victims of violence.

Home Run. Alex was at the park. A kid challenged him to a game of baseball. Alex tried to throw the ball to the other kid. But it was a home run!Alex gave the ball to the kid, and now he's famous for his homerun!

Greg Visits the Zoo. Greg was walking to his car in the morning. He noticed something on the ground. He picked it up and noticed a dead squirrel. Greg looked into the eyes of the dead squirrel. Greg walked back to his car and realized he was out of time.
New Shoes. Dina was wearing her favorite shoes. They were her favorite shoes. She wore them all the time. She thought they looked great. She wore them until they broke.

Cole. Cole was so excited to be on an important date. He was at the bar talking to his date on the phone. The girl called him over to ask him a lot of questions. Cole thought she was really cute. The two exchanged numbers and began to date.

Shirley Temple Doll. Shirley was feeling lonely and wanted a new doll. She asked her mom to get her a doll she liked. Her mom suggested a giraffe named Daisy. Shirley was very excited and wanted Daisy. Her mom was surprised that Shirley really liked Daisy.
Patty's Sleepover. Patty was having a sleepover with her friends. While sitting in the living room, the light went out. She turned the TV off. She watched a movie. Patty slept like a baby.

New Shears. Lisa needed a new shears. Her shears broke a few times during her knitting. She needed to find a new shears company. She looked in her attic for a long time. When she found one she liked she was excited about using it.

As I Sit Here. I was talking to some friends on the subway. I noticed a bunch of old books on the seat next to me. When I sat down, I got up to read the book. I quickly became distracted and lost my train of thought. I sat there with my mouth open for an hour.
Going to School. The kids were all ready for school. They had to rush. They decided to go to school early. Their mom got them all ready. It was a long day.
Hit. Bill was an athletic big man. He played football at a high school and was an All American. He had an amazing career. One day he got caught with a gun. Bill was hit and paralyzed.
The dog. Lance was walking home from school. He heard a strange noise. A dog had run over and taken his toy. Lance ran away as fast as he could. He called the police and took them away.

Fears. Susie was afraid of heights. She would climb them at a fairly normal speed. When she was in a new city she was afraid of heights. She decided to take a different route. She walked with a lower attitude.

Driver. Joey got a new car and was looking for a new driver. He was frustrated that he didn't have any good drivers around him. He visited a driving school and saw some young people driving. He wanted to see how they were doing, and he tried to join. Unfortunately, the school was closed and he did not get a seat.
Man's best friend. My friend is very ill. He recently had a heart attack. We recently went for a walk on the beach. He gave me his wallet. I got it back the next day.

The First Birthday. Lilly was getting married on the first day of school. She got dressed and left for school. Her mom noticed she was wearing her wedding dress. She got in the car and went to the dance. Lilly's mom gave her a bouquet of flowers and they went their separate ways.
The fair. One day we were looking to go to the fair. There was a huge line. We were very hungry. I decided to eat at a restaurant. I got my food and went home.
The Bison. The boy and his friend went camping. The boys got hungry and had no food. They set up camp on a patch of land. The campfire grew very loud and loud. The boy had to close the campfire down.

A Good Samaritan. Alicia was walking in the park. A large man came up to her and asked for directions. She didn't realize he was a cop. The man drove her to her destination. He showed her a map to the closest restaurant and she gave him directions.

Pictures. My brother and I were on a road trip in a foreign country. We saw pictures in a book and snapped a few pictures. When we got home, we took out the camera and took many pictures. We posted them online and got some likes. After posting the pictures, we decided to keep a copy.
Appendicitis. Mary had appendicitis. Her doctor said she was fine. She went to the doctor. She got an operation. Now she has appendicitis.

Money. Randy was in the store and decided to get a snack. He found some gum and a bag of candy. He walked away and felt like he was in trouble. He found a cashier who offered him candy. After getting candy he was very happy with his purchase.

Genre Disagreement. Sara was talking about music on social media. She found the same topic of conversation being exchanged. Sara's friend was upset at Sara. Sara argued with her on Facebook. Both women agreed to stop discussing music.

For a Five. I got an old friend to come over for a week to help me write a short story. It was a great project and he did a great job. I spent a week editing it and putting together a short story. Then I wrote the final draft and sent it to my editor. I was ecstatic when he said yes.

Sardines. I had a craving for a sandwich. I decided to cook my own. I got all the ingredients ready and put them together. I got to work cooking and making the sandwich. It was the best sandwich I have ever eaten!

Too Curious. A friend asked if I wanted to go see a movie. I had seen the first one, but then asked her if she would like to see something else. We went to the movie theater across the street from her house. We were bored as soon as she got off the bus. The movie was terrible and we couldn't even watch it all the way.

The School Fight. Kelly was having a bad day at school. One of her friends had gotten into an argument with a girl. She decided to have a school fight. The girl was a bully and Kelly had to play catch with her. The teacher called the cops and Kelly got in trouble.
Video Game. My wife has a video game on her iPad. She can play for hours. She played some last night. It was the best game she's played in a while. She was sad when she couldn't play it.

Milkshakes. Cora had a craving for some milk. She decided to take a bath and get some. The next morning she was full of milk. She was sad. But then she realized that it was her first time ever doing this.
Bad Haircut. Amy had gotten a good haircut. She looked beautiful. She was excited to go out to dinner with friends. Unfortunately she had to change into a tie. Amy was disappointed but not ashamed.

The New Airplane. Tom was waiting at the airport to take his flight. He noticed the air conditioning was broken. Tom tried to adjust the AC manually. It worked fine but he still wished he was on a plane. Tom was a little embarrassed but he was happy he could see the outside of the plane.

Bruised Knees. Jude had been sitting in a chair with his knees bent. He was sitting in front of the TV when he felt a sharp pain. He ran to his dad's house. His dad ran to the hospital. His dad had to go and get the boy some stitches.

Heavy Belly. Liz was trying to gain a little weight. She decided to start eating more fruits and veggies. She started taking a vitamin pill. Then she started adding in protein to her diet. Soon her belly started to look good.

The STained Glass. Kate had just ordered a glass. As she opened it she saw she had scratched her finger on the top. She decided not to return it. The glass looked bad, so she looked for a different brand. Finally she found a cheaper brand she liked.

The pregnancy prank. I was walking down the sidewalk one day. Suddenly I noticed a small baby with a cute little pink face. I began to laugh as I told my friend how cute she was. She didn't believe me and began to tease me about the pregnancy. I realized I was not really joking, as it was real.

Special Treat. Tom had never had a birthday in his life. The day came and he was sad to hear it was no longer a holiday. He decided to make a special treat for his birthday. He went to the grocery store. Tom had a whole box of treats for his birthday.

A Ship Without Direction. Tina was traveling on a cruise ship. Tina's cruise ship was in a rough area. There were pirates on the ship. Tina felt very lost. She decided to call for directions to safety.
Bad decision. I was driving on the highway. All of a sudden, I hit a deer. There was blood everywhere. The driver of the car had to call the police. They had to give me a ticket for hitting the deer.

Unicorn. Theodore loved unicorns. He saw the movie in which one was created. He bought the ticket to see it. On opening night, he walked up the aisle with the unicorn. He was elated and his friends all clapped.
Egypt. In 1973 I went to Egypt. I loved it. It was the most beautiful country in the world. My family lived there. I fell in love with it.

Office job. Randy was feeling nervous about a promotion. He was feeling the pressure of being the top manager at his company. He was very anxious about what it meant to go to work. When he got to the office it was packed full of people. He got up, set the papers on the desk, and was excited to go to work.
Wrong Number. Jill's friends had a date. They decided to go to a movie. Unfortunately the date had gotten cancelled. Jill asked where her date was. She never heard back.

Night Ruined. I was watching tv late at night. The light bulb on my tv started to die. The whole house was on fire. It turned out that the bulb was bad and not hot enough. The TV didn't shut off completely after that.

Painful Frisbee. Tim had a crush on Mary Ann. They were both in high school. Tim was out with his friends and they had frisbee. Tim accidentally knocked over Mary Ann. She broke her ankle in two places and she was out for a month.

Seller. John had a new house to buy. He decided to sell it and buy a better house. John made a great offer and got the best offer. His current house was worth far more than his new house. John bought his new house, and now he is in a much better situation.

Coffee Place. I was on my way to work and noticed a coffee shop open up. They were serving the best coffee on the block. I decided to stop in and get some, so I grabbed some as well. After a few drinks, the coffee tasted way better. The place had good reviews for a good reason!
Blues. Kelly wanted to meet her friends at a blues club. She found the best seats. Kelly took a seat. When she got there, her friend began to sing. Kelly liked it.

Hypocrite?. Mary was walking through the city. She noticed something on the sidewalk that caught her attention. This was an attractive young lady. Mary took a look and saw that she loved her. Mary decided to walk with her and become engaged.

Date Ditch. Tim was a student of Japanese cuisine. He was always looking forward to eating at a new restaurant. His date tried a dish that he had never tried. His date said she couldn't eat that dish. Tim was mortified and decided to make her a reservation.

Soldier. Nathan was stationed in Afghanistan. He had been deployed twice. One of his deployments involved a suicide bomber. Nathan didn't have enough bullets to shoot the bomb in the middle of the camp. Nathan didn't make it past the explosion.

Applying for a Job. I was a really nervous person. I wanted to get a job in my field. I decided to look for a job on the internet. The job website was great for finding jobs. I finally found a job with the company that I applied for.

The New Fish. One summer the Danes decided to catch a new fish. They went to the local pond to take a big bite. They waited until the fish was very hard. They were thrilled to see the fish's scales and gills. When the fish was fully grown, the Danes fed it.

Service Dog. Kelly was walking home from a movie with her mom. Kelly saw an old man and his dog running down the street. The man started barking and yelling. Kelly saw he was a service dog for an elderly man. Kelly decided to help the man with his walk.

Pie. One day, my mother wanted me to have a pie. So I did what anyone else would do and made a pie. My mother put some ice in it. I then put it in the oven to bake. Afterwards, my mother thanked me for making the pie.

Bow and Arrow. There once was a famous archer named Frank. He was famous because he had a bow and arrow. A boy named Charlie liked him. Charlie's mother caught Charlie shooting his bow. Charlie was sent to a circus and Frank never shot again.

Delicious ice cream. Cindy's parents made her some ice cream for her birthday. Cindy was really hungry but could not eat it all. Finally her parents decided to share some for her. Cindy loved her new treat and tried it. Cindy had so much ice cream that she didn't feel hungry.
Noise. The school was having a party. They had a big dance party. A bunch of people were dancing all night. The music was loud. School administrators told them to turn the music down.

Worthless. Susie loved to paint. One day while taking a nap, she took a shower. She washed her hands with warm water and did her makeup. When she washed her face, she looked all shiny. She decided she was nothing special when she was finished with her painting.

The melted balloon. Tina was trying to set up her new house. The balloon had fallen on the ground and caught on fire. She pulled it out but the glue was melted. After cleaning it up she put it in a container to cool. Tina was glad she had never let the balloon catch on fire.

The Renovation. Julie was renovating a home. She wanted to make sure it was done right. She started by getting the roof to hang. Then, she got all the cabinets and appliances done. After all, it was a renovation!

Special Assessment. Mary was an elementary school teacher. She was doing her annual report when she had an important meeting. She thought she heard a knock at the door but nothing happened. A strange person asked her to meet her teacher for an inspection. It turned out to be a small boy with glasses.

Matt's Keys. Matt had a very bad feeling about his keys. He looked everywhere in his house for his keys. Matt had to call a mechanic to get his keys. When Matt called the mechanic, he found his keys. The mechanic took Matt to the local mechanic shop to get them fixed.
Cell Phones. Kelly loved cell phones. She had a lot of them. One day, her phone broke. She had to go into the store to get one repaired. It was an expensive repair, and she was sad.
ET. My wife's friend asked me to come see her for an ET meetup. I'm not very familiar with ET. I didn't think they were very interesting to her. She ended up loving it. I was amazed.

Bullies get served. Lucy was on the school bus. The bus driver didn't have any seats. Lucy didn't want to wait. When the bus was about to leave, another boy tried to stop her. The girl made Lucy turn around and left without speaking to the bus driver.

Grandmother's Cookies. Kia bought a new batch of cookies. She was cooking them when she remembered the recipe. She took a small bite and regretted making the mistake. The cookies tasted terrible and Kia burned the rest. She realized it was her grandmother's cookies.
Regret. Sam was a great swimmer. He was going out to do a race. He was in the pool and saw the other swimmers. He wanted to be first, but didn't want to risk it. Sam came in third instead.
One dollar. Sara got a dollar. She bought some candy. But when she got home she realized it was gone. She realized she spent it all on candy. She had a lot of candy for her birthday.

Tim's Band. Tim is a very talented drummer. One day, Tim decided to audition for a band. He practiced very hard for months. Eventually, he was selected for the band. Tim had a great audition for the band and is happy he signed up.
New Minivan. Kenny needed a new car. He went to the store and bought a new car. He got a new van to put in his driveway. He was thrilled. Kenny's new van was a joy to drive!

Shark. Marge was babysitting a couple of dogs. The dogs were so cute she couldn't get used to it. She began to fear that they might bite her!When they were young she was very careful about keeping them separated. Then they started biting her!

Germany. Cindy and her friends wanted to see Germany. Cindy and her friends took two buses to Germany. Cindy met some of her friends at the train station. Cindy and her friends decided to meet at the station. Cindy and her friends took the two buses to Germany.
Armando burns the tacos. Armando is a Mexican food addict. One day he decides to eat a taco. He begins to eat. He finds a piece of burnt cheese. Armando begins to feel sick.

The Bank Teller. When Jane got the bank teller's card she was excited. She had never heard of the bank before and couldn't figure out the process. After she signed in she was directed to a small area. She found several old signs in the old bank building. Jane had a blast taking the time to visit.

Scary Customer. My coworker was talking to me in the company cafeteria. He kept staring at me and my coworkers. As I began to think, he stopped to look at the food. I asked my boss if there is something I can do. My boss told me to get out of the cafeteria immediately.

The Termination. The police had arrested Dan for a warrant. His trial was in five days. The judge told Dan he needed to stay with his aunt. He reluctantly agreed and went to jail. Dan felt much better about himself after his detention.

sweet tooth. Kira had a sweet tooth. She would eat all the candy and sodas she could find. One day, she had a toothache and had to go to the dentist. The dentist gave her some medication that made her feel better. Kira is now addicted to candy and soda and is very satisfied.

Short Cut to BC. Bill and Sue had been on the road all week. After going through California they decided to go back home. They took a short drive to the coast. They found a beach they liked. Bill and Sue went home and forgot about it.

Window Seat. It was Halloween and I had to go trick or treating. It was my first Halloween so I was really nervous. I put my little cousin and her dad into the car. My cousin's parents were in the back seat. They took her and their dad home without me and then they told us to go home.

Bunny's Toes. Bunny loves to play fetch with her brother. Bunny always gets to the bottom of a rabbit's toes. Bunny plays fetch for his big brother. His big brother is jealous of Bunny's play. His brother scolds Bunny for being so sneaky.

Showing Online. Jane had an online relationship. She had a lot of photos and videos. She had several of them featured on a popular website. She decided to go into a business to make money online. She was able to make good money and kept her relationship.

Hurricane. Sam wanted to get home for a party. He made plans to take a hurricane boat ride. He was very excited when the boat left his home. It took it over an hour to get there. Once there, Sam had a lot of fun partying.

Driving. My friend gave me a phone charger that he bought recently. When I walked into my apartment, I saw that my battery was dead. I tried to plug the charger in, but it didn't turn on. I tried charging the charger into the wall outlet on the couch. When I tried to plug it in, it didn't turn on either.
Way too hot. Kelsey was walking through the parking lot. Suddenly, she heard a thud. The ground started to shake and crack. Then the air started to heat up. She felt so hot!

Switch Plates. Tina had decided she wanted a new phone. She couldn't decide on the colors to choose. Finally she went to the store and tried to pick the right one. The one she picked looked great. Now she is excited to take it on her first flight.
Paint Bar. Kate was shopping for paint. She found a store with a great selection. It was expensive but it was worth it. Kate had a great time shopping. It was a great experience!

Big Waves. Mary and Jim were out in the ocean, enjoying a warm night. Suddenly, the waves crashed against them. Their surfboard buckled under the water and they were swept away. They had been in the ocean for five hours and were exhausted. They watched in horror as the waves washed their belongings ashore.
Baseball cards. I saw a box at the grocery store. Inside there were baseball cards. I bought three of them. I opened one card. It said that he had three home runs in his career.

Cat Rescue. Tom was walking home from work. Suddenly he spotted a cat running across the road. He was worried it might be sick. He decided to let the cat out of his sight. The cat happily walked away.

Cleaner. Jill always put her cleaning supplies out for her neighbors. One day, she forgot to put out the food and a kitten was stolen. The neighbor brought food to Jill's house and she ran out of the house. She decided to clean the cat's place and clean the bathroom. Jill cleaned the cat's place and got a new cat for her friends.

abusive. Rufus was an abusive father. He was going to divorce his wife. She had a bad temper. The problem was she was also addicted to heroin. Rufus and his wife were going to have to end their relationship.
Cooking. Allie wanted to cook at home. She found recipes online. She followed them exactly. Eventually she could make her own meal. She loved eating her food at home.

Roger the Dog. Roger is a very protective dog. Roger has a small litter and can stay calm. Roger is very sweet but also very energetic. Roger doesn't like to be fed and can bark at other dogs. Roger is a wonderful family pet with many good friends.

Sally Likes Pie. Sally was at a picnic with her friend Beth. Beth decided to buy Sally a dessert. Sally did not like the dessert. Beth told Sally she would make her a slice of pie for her. Sally liked Sally's pie and enjoyed it.

Second Date. I was invited to the second date. I was so nervous about it that I didn't think I could do it. My friend made a big mess and tried to get into it. I was the one that got in so I took her to dinner. We had such a great time, and she was so nice.

umbrella. Tara was out doing laundry. All of a sudden, she saw a big umbrella in her room. Tara decided to take it outside and use it. Tara took off and went outside to use the umbrella. As Tara was running, she saw the umbrella come flying through the window.
Accident. Tina was driving down the highway. Suddenly, her car skidded to a stop. Tina heard a loud thump in her car. Her tire was completely flat. She couldn't figure out why.
Track. It was track day at the local track. Sam was running with his friends. They decided to try a speed run. They did a half-marathon. It was a great way to cheer everyone up.

garden. I've always loved gardening. One day while driving to work, I stopped to pick up a plant. When I got there, it was full of worms. I tried to kill them but they didn't want to die. Eventually they all became my friends!
Weekends. Marlene got a babysitter. She was supposed to babysit on weekends. Marlene couldn't do it. She got so nervous. Marlene had to do it on Monday.
The forgotten cereal. Cora went shopping for cereal. She needed to buy the biggest box. Cora looked around her house. She couldn't find her cereal box. Finally she found it under her pillow.

The Bar. A few days ago we went to a bar to go dancing. There was a man who had never danced before. I asked him how it was, he said, I did not know. He laughed and said he was a professional dancer. I laughed as well and went and started dancing.

Triumphant Return. James had been practicing piano for years. Today was the day his big day. The keys had been pounded and honed all weekend. James was proud when he played the last note of the piece. He could not wait to hear the band's reaction when he played the final note.
Delivery. Tom's friend called him to go to the store. They had to get groceries. When he got there, they were getting groceries. He didn't want to miss them. He went back to get his friend's food.

Repaired Laptop. Samantha was using her laptop with a new laptop charger. She used the charger for almost an hour. However, there was a large plug in the back. The laptop couldn't charge the charger anymore. Samantha called for a repairman to come and repair it.
Flat Tires. I have been working on my car for months. I decided to take it for a road trip. It was in need of new tires. I found a tire I liked at the tire store. I replaced it with a new set.

Free Pizza. Susie wanted to get a pizza for lunch. So she went to the grocery store and looked around. But she couldn't find one she liked. So she bought some cheese. But she never found the pizza she wanted for lunch.
Easter Bunny. I am at the grocery store with my family. We buy eggs and bacon. We buy two bags of flour. We start cooking in the oven. The next morning, we go downstairs to eat.
Henry. Henry was looking through his cupboards. He saw a wallet sitting by his couch. He pulled it out. He put a large amount of change in it. The wallet made him very happy.

Going to the Mall. Tina is going to the mall. She has not seen a lot of friends in the last few weeks. She wants to hang out with some of her old friends. On her way home she decided to get coffee. She met with some of her old friends at the coffee shop.
Roll Over. Kris went for a walk in the park. He didn't hear a sound. He walked back to his car to get it. His car had a flat tire on the way there. Kris went back to the park.

Ben's First Time at the Beach. Ben went to the beach on a rainy Sunday. He wanted to make a sandcastle. He grabbed the sand and sandblaster. The sand was really hot. He poured a lot of sand into the sandcastle.
Cane Tips. My niece has a small garden. This summer, she wants to grow a little cactus. So she bought a large cactus. She watered it daily. By the next time she wants to grow a cactus, it is ready.

Hot Air Balloon. Kelly decided to try a hot air balloon ride. When she got on the ride, the temperature jumped up. The balloon got too hot and the wings got loose. Kelly wound up catching herself in the wings. Kelly was so mad she broke her own wings on the ride.

The first guitar. Kelly really liked the sound of her new guitar. She knew it would be her new favorite thing. It was a new guitar with many features. She was really excited when she got it home. She played it every day for weeks.
Bonus Round. Tom was excited to meet his new girlfriend. He got on his plane and boarded. He walked through the airport. He met her there and got to her room. Tom was very happy.

Dead Battery. Kate was playing with her cellphone. Suddenly, her phone started to drain battery. She knew it was dead, but she didn't know how to fix it. She tried to charge the phone in her pocket. Then, she checked her charger and it was working properly.

Goofing around. I went to the mall with a friend. We started to go for a walk and noticed people were walking around. We stopped to stare at them. Some started talking to us. We went back home and didn't take off our shoes.
Jarvis Takes a Nap. Jarvis is at the movies. He is watching a movie. Suddenly, Jarvis realizes he is getting too tired. He decides to take a nap. After his nap, Jarvis heads to work.

Playing in the Bathroom. The girl was really nervous. She didn't know if she could play in the bathroom. She was hoping for the best but was not expecting such an outcome. When she stepped in the tub it was too wet to play. The girl didn't want to play in the bathroom and went back to her room.

Harassment. Kelsi had to go to a work conference in a very bad building. She had to be escorted by a bunch of her co-workers. Her boss had her escorted because her boss is a man. Kelsi had a really bad day. She never found out how she felt about the event.

In the store. Sarah had bought a pair of shoes that had a lot of pockets. She went to the shoe store and checked them out. They were perfect for her. When Sarah arrived at the store she asked the cashier for a refund. The cashier took her to the cashier's office to have the shoes fixed.

Pool Party. Evan was very excited for his first pool party. The friends invited him over and they started drinking. They got their towels and masks and went to the pool. They all jumped and swam and made a lot of noise. Evan had a great time and his friends left him a tip.

Birthday Girl. Sara was a new birth girl and wanted to get an autograph. She looked everywhere to get a picture with the boy. Finally she found the boy looking at her on the phone. She asked him to give her a hug and then he gave her a picture. It was her birth daddy!

Old Pipes. My wife used to smoke cigarettes in the house. She had a small one. I was always getting sick. I finally took her to the doctor. He said my pipe was infected with HIV and needed to be replaced.
Sound off. Timothy was listening to the radio. It was going crazy in his room. He tried to calm himself. He tried to get out of the room. He was stuck there for hours.

Steve's Tattoo. Steve had a lot of tattoos. He was nervous about the tattoos. Steve's friends took pictures of his new ones. Steve got a tattoo in his right arm. Steve didn't know his friends were taking pictures of him.

Ant Bites. Lucy decided to try eating the ants that were outside her window. She tried to pull at one with her finger and it came out. She started to cry. Her mom called her dad to come pick her up. Her dad came right away and told her it was a bee sting.

Blank mind. All of my friends have a Blank Mind Problem. They think they are smarter than me because they don't study. I had a student study for months to get better at math. The teacher made a point of letting him know he could fail if he did not study. Now I have a blank mind because I've failed all of my classes.

Make Up. Allison was trying to get her hair done. She did not want to go to the salon. But when she got to the salon, the girls said she looked great. So Allison decided to try out the new make up. She got a new dress made just for the occasion.

Bubbles. It was the middle of the night and I was in the bathtub. My wife was asleep in the bed. Suddenly, she began yelling at me for a bubble. I tried to ignore her but I felt like crying. Suddenly, I got my hair pulled and I made my way out of the bathtub.

New Doll. It was time for my friends to start their summer school. I was the doll for their class, and was the last one standing. When the bell rang I immediately picked up the doll. When she walked in I began to make out with her. I had her for almost the entire summer and I didn't think anyone would miss her.

The broken ice machine. The man's ice machine had broken. He had set it up to freeze the morning before. When he came back to the kitchen it was gone. The ice was in a pot and he had no way of getting it out. He called for help, and the police showed up.

The New Car. Mary was going through the garage looking for her car. She heard her friend's car nearby. Mary called her friend's car and they drove to the car. They took turns to talk and the car fell asleep. Mary bought a used car and they drove it around town.
Fire Drill. Kathy was in her kitchen. She wanted to make some hot dogs. She went to her oven. She began to microwave some hot dog mix. Kathy had her oven ready to cook.

Learning to Surf. Bobby was excited to go to the beach with his friends. The kids went out to a surfboard and started to wave. Bobby got out his surfboard and started surfing. He ended up missing the wave and falling down. Luckily, his friends rescued him and took him home.

Museum. We went to the museum today. I was in front and noticed the exhibits. The lady in charge greeted me very nicely. She had a lot of nice stories about her family history. I can't wait to go back and see more.

Spilled wine on table. One day I was making dinner. I accidentally spilled wine on my table. I was so upset, I immediately called a plumber. The plumber fixed the table for me. Thankfully, I no longer have to worry about that mistake.

Selena. Selena is a very intelligent person and has a dream to be a singer. Selena has always been told she's never good enough for a singing career. Selena decided to find a way to get a singing gig. She began practicing for years and got great at singing. Now Selena is a very good singer and a very good voice.

The Birds. My two dogs got lost in the woods one morning. I ran after them, but they were too far away. I then saw the same birds flying around. They had been flying in a huge flock. I was sure to catch one and bring it home with me.

A Broken Mug. Gina was working on her makeup in the mirror. All of a sudden, her makeup was ruined!She was going to have to throw it away because it was too messy!So she went to the store and bought a new one. She was happy when she opened it and realized she was saving money.

Gym Rats. I decided to go to the gym with my friend today. I really wanted to take my friend there. I took him to the very top of the stairs. The stairs were very high. We got there and got in the gym.
Food fight. One time I went to my friend's place for lunch. My friend ordered the best steak. The steak was $150. My friend ordered the worst steak. We both got mad.

Flour. Tom had never made his own bread. He decided to take a job as a cashier at a grocery store. He learned that he didn't have much money. He went online to find some free ingredients. Tom made some wonderful bread for his coworkers.

Daddy. It had been a week since my daughter's birth. We took a day off from school in order to have a talk. My daughter told me about her new brother. I was so sad, I cried and cried. When I came back, she was smiling, saying goodbye and loving me.
Pamper trouble. Gina was getting ready for bed. Suddenly her son walked into the room. He put his arm around her. He smiled at her with open arms. They hugged each other tightly.

Cat with no Meow. One day, my cat began looking sad. We were all sad, because she had no owner. I asked her where she could go, but she didn't answer. I asked her where she lived, but she didn't answer. I eventually brought her a cat that looked just like her.
The New Couch. Jane was sitting in a long couch when she began to fall. She hit the bottom hard. Her mother took a new couch. They had it installed. Jane loved it.
New Car. Tom's car needed a new owner. It had been stolen recently. Tom had no money for a new car. He called a friend to help him. Tom was able to find a great place for the car.

Online Rant. Randy has an online rant. He constantly posts his anger. A few days ago he posted a lot of bad words. The other day he posted a lot of good words. He started a thread and people liked it.
Dirty Carpet. Jenny's carpet was getting very dirty. She noticed the stains on it. She got it fixed. When she was done, she was horrified. The stains were everywhere.

Morning Jog. Allie really wanted to do something special for her son's birthday. She decided she would jog every day. She loved the idea so much that she bought a jogging kit. The day of the event she was ready. Her son loved it so much that he stopped walking.

The Animal Report. I was sitting down to watch television. I heard an animal screaming. I ran over and saw a huge cat, probably a dog. It's claws were very large, and I could see it was trying to get away. It was only a cat!

Loose Tooth. Tom noticed that his teeth were hurting. He went to the dentist. The dentist said that he had plaque on his tooth. Tom had to have two cavities filled. He is now healthier because of the procedure.
Scholarship. I am applying for a scholarship. I have not got a response from my university. I started my own business. I was able to start my own business. I got a job and a scholarship.

Sofa Cover. I was really tired after school. I decided to go for a walk outside. When I returned home, I noticed my couch was covered in snot. I decided to go back inside and lay in bed. I quickly became a good sleeper.

No more rules!. Seth was playing videogames on his laptop. He accidentally deleted all his important files. He couldn't access the internet for days. His parents finally got into trouble for breaking his computer rules. Seth was so upset, he lost interest in playing videogames.
Buying a new computer. My daughter wanted a new laptop. She had been using her old one all day. She wanted a new one. She went to the store. She found the perfect one and bought it.

Balding Head. Gina was going to see her friends. She wore a fancy wig, a hat, and some makeup. When she walked up to them, she was immediately hit on. She was having a good time. She asked her friends to give her the attention of her dreams.

First Job. I took my son for a walk with his dad. He was trying to do his first job. I handed him a bunch of paper. Then he started to read. When he finished, I went home, and told my son to start a business.
Flowers. Kara went to get flowers. She looked all around. But they were all too hard to find. Then she got a great idea. It was time to plant the flowers in the flower pot and have them bloom!

Drunk. Drunk!. Nell was getting too drunk at her birthday party. She had her friends over to throw her a surprise party. But she wasn't sure what to bring, since she didn't want to spoil it. Luckily she found a big bottle of wine!She ended up bringing a bottle of red wine to her party and everyone was happy.

James needs glasses. James has been fighting with his girlfriend for weeks. They are arguing on and off. They finally decide to break up. They go to a new hotel. They are happy that James got glasses.

Government. Charles' favorite part about being in college was the government. The only problem is that he doesn't like the government at all. The only people he trusts with his finances are his parents. Charles decided to ask a friend for advice on how to start his own business. His friend gave Charles advice on starting his own business, and Charles was happy.
Speed dating. Trent went out on a date with a girl. He asked her on a date. She said she doesn't like speed dating. Trent was mad that she doesn't like speed dating. Trent dumped her after one date.

Going Pro. Mark went pro in college. Mark studied every day and worked out every day. Mark finally made it to the pro stage. Mark got his pro card. Mark made a lot of money in his first year playing professional wrestling.

Being Bold. Sandy always wanted to be strong. She decided to try strength training. She decided to work out six days per week. She did four sets of six exercises per day. Sandy feels like she's making a difference!

No More Leaves!. I was on my porch one summer day. My mom's car had broken down and my parents were stranded in the mountains. My mom suggested they take shelter there and wait for help. I agreed to listen, and we found a small cabin. When the snow started to melt, I stayed with my mom and dad until help came.

Children's books. When I was a kid, I was always afraid of children. I had read about them a lot and I never liked them. My mom told me that my fear wasn't so bad, I should like them. My mom bought me two books to read to children, and she was proud of me. When I was 16, I realized that the fear was totally misplaced.

Lori's Date. Lori was at a local bar with some friends. The bartender introduced Lori to a beautiful girl. They hit it off and went on a date. Lori couldn't wait for the date. They hit it off even better and made a great new couple.

Sleeping Over. Tim was on vacation in Spain. He decided he was going to sleep over. He didn't pack a sleeping bag or anything. He just got on his plane and took off. When he got home he was too tired to go to bed.
Cooked Too Much. Kelly had a date with her boyfriend. They decided to order Chinese food. It was too much food. Kelly ate it all. She decided not to eat at the next date.

Shattered Dreams. I heard my dad in the bathroom. He was holding a large rock in his hand. He was crying. I was afraid he was going to break the glass. I grabbed him, and tried to talk him into opening the door.
The Glasses. Mia was going to a party. She was going to wear her glasses. But she was afraid of falling. Luckily the glasses stopped her falling. She was so happy she could see well.
Used Item. Bill wanted to take a shortcut. He decided to steal a car. He took off on foot. He made it to the dealership and picked up a used car. Bill was able to afford it at the very best price.

Quarterback Keeper. Matt felt like he was the quarterback of the school. He was very proud of his ability to throw the ball. He made plays to win games. When he was not in the game, he was happy to do his job. He felt as though he was the quarterback of the school.

The Sleepover. I was very nervous for my friend's birthday. I had not seen him for a few years. I was invited by an acquaintance. I sat by his bed and listened to his music. I fell asleep during the music because I was tired.

Plane Tickets. Amy wanted to go to the movies. She thought she had tickets for every one. Amy had a lot of reservations for the first two movies. Finally, her tickets became available. Amy couldn't wait to go to the movies and had a great time.
The Flood. Yesterday it rained for a week. We were sleeping in my room. It had rained three days straight. We stayed up all night making fun of the rainy. The next day I woke up and it had stopped.

Boat day!. Jill's boat was on its way back from a lake trip. Her husband drove her to the dock. They both got into their boat. Jill had the engine started. They sailed to the lake where she towed her boat to the dock.

New Puppy. Tom was really excited about getting a new puppy. He picked her up at the end of the day and walked to the barn. He was excited to take her out and show her how it was done. She was so happy she would soon learn to bark. She soon followed his instructions and was happily barking!

Wedding. Tommy was at a wedding and his friend was there. He didn't know about any of the special things happening. Tommy's friend was a little embarrassed about being there. His friend apologized. Tommy didn't mind since he was at a happy family wedding.

Avoiding the In Laws. Sarah went to the grocery store with her father. They were buying vegetables. When they were buying some meat, they realized something. They were in the wrong state of mind. They decided not to buy anything.
The New Kitten. Anna had a new kitten. It was very cute. One day, Anna forgot to take the kitty to the vet. She accidentally brought the kitty to the vet. Now, Anna has to get a new pet.

Saturday Night Live. The Sunday morning came and I woke up at 6 AM. When I got out I saw the show was taking place. My son watched the show on the big screen tv. The tv was so loud I could not hear myself talk. The show ended at 6 PM and I went to bed early.

Spoiling niece. Tina was playing with her niece. It was a very important day. But Tina forgot her water bottle and had a surprise. She spilled it in her niece's mouth. She immediately called the doctor.

Broken Eggs. We bought eggs at the grocery store. I forgot the timer, so I did not get a chance to take them out. It was a very hot day and we were stuck outside. When it got to night time, I realized the timer was off. Luckily, a neighbor helped me get them out.
Basketball Practice. We were invited to a basketball practice. It was very cold out in the morning. We went into the gym and had some practices. We had a great time. We were so glad to get together.

Huge Debt. Ethan decided that he had enough debt to get a better job. He decided to borrow money from family and friends. Ethan paid off all the bills and started saving. Ethan saved up enough money to pay his student loans. Ethan's loan debt was paid off and now Ethan owns his own business.

Diplomat. Mimi was a diplomat. She worked in Washington for a lot of years. One day she became a senior adviser to President Obama. She helped them find the most qualified people for their positions. Mimi now works for the president, not the embassy.
Phone call. I was at the mall. I got a phone call. It was from a man I met at the mall. He was asking for help. I decided to call my friend and she called me back.
Hit. James was walking home from work. He was trying to reach the car. As he ran, he bumped into a car in the street. He almost fainted because of it. Thankfully, he was unhurt.
Go. The other day my mom had a baby. She didn't want to wake me up. I told her to just go to the store. My mom didn't want to go anywhere. We decided to stay in bed.

Companion Physical. Amy wanted to be a better person. She went to the local community college to study physical therapy. Amy had to be very careful about her physical appearance. Amy's physical therapist noticed this and was very friendly. Amy was very proud of her progress.

Lost Sandwich. Bella had lost a sandwich. She was in the mall trying to buy more. Bella lost the sandwich and had to go to the cashier. After trying her best to find it, she lost the wallet. Bella felt horrible but she got it back within a few hours.

A Lion King Christmas. On Christmas morning the kids were at the tree and ready for something scary. Suddenly a huge lion jumped into the tree. It leaped into the house and ran away. The whole family screamed and ran to safety. They were able to get their toys back and everyone was very happy.

Cable TV. Tara wanted to watch cable TV but she couldn't afford a set. She looked online for a cheap cable package to watch online. She went to the store and found the cable package she needed. When she found the package she paid for it and watched. Tara was happy to have cable TV.

Broken collectible. My husband and I went to the local flea market. We looked at hundreds of different collectibles. After awhile, I realized that the items I was looking for were in my car. I pulled over to use the restroom. I realized I left the collectible inside the car.

Uncle Freddy. Freddy had a new dog named Uncle Freddy. He was a bit rough and mean. Freddy liked to chase and bully his puppy. One day Freddy hit Uncle Freddy with a shovel. His puppy had a broken leg and Freddy was kicked out.

Hooray for vacations. My friend and I were having a great time. We decided to go to a local beach. I asked my friend why she didn't do the vacation in a hotel. She said because they are booked. I really miss going to beach so I didn't ask her why she didn't go.
Wallet. Tom was driving down the highway. It had snowed overnight. He was starting to feel anxious and distracted. So he put on his shiny new wallet. He made his way home in a hurry.

Incognito Mode. I was at the mall. I was looking for some snacks. I noticed that I was wearing an incognito mode. That was weird because everyone was staring at me. I had to go to my car and change my clothes.

Road Trip. One summer a group of kids drove all over town. They wanted to see the Statue of Liberty, and it was their favorite place to do it. They took the interstate all the way to Pennsylvania. They had fun and visited many landmarks. The group drove back home.

Acting lessons. I used to be terrible at acting. I didn't know how to make an accent. I tried out for school a couple times. I got an audition for a tv show and ended up getting the part. I got the part and made a huge impression!

Roommate to the Rescue. Betsy and her roommates got into an argument about their roommate. Betsy felt that her roommate deserved some space. One night, Betsy's roommate stole her phone and took her clothes. Betsy was able to track down the roommate and she got her back. Betsy never lost her friendship with her roommates.

Robert formed a band. Robert was playing in a band. His band was losing money. Robert asked his friends to help him find more money. His friends helped him find more money. Robert was able to keep his band going.

Kim the Waitress. Kim was very busy at the restaurant. When she took a break she realized it was the wrong time. She went to her manager and asked for a break in order to wait. Her manager let her use a bench and she was able to get another break. Kim was happy that she wasn't stressed when she was busy.

Tree. My mom had a huge tree on her front porch. It was big, but not big enough to keep my sister out. One day the tree fell and split apart. Our sister saw it fall and ran into the house. She broke the tree and we all cried.

Family History Banquet. Janet had always wanted to have an anniversary celebration at her house. She asked her son, Brad, to invite all his friends. Brad had always wanted to go, but didn't know what to bring. He decided to invite Janet's parents and her brothers. Everyone attended, except Janet, who was devastated.

Washing Hair. Mandy was a mom to three kids. She wanted her kids to stay healthy. She always wanted to wash their hair. Mandy realized that they could not afford a washing machine. She still wanted her kids healthy, but would use the washing machine instead.

The Hearing. Sarah was in class and heard a loud bang. Sarah ran to the hall and saw a large dog fighting in the hall. Sarah ran back to the classroom to see if anyone was hurt. Sarah went to the bathroom to wash her hair. Sarah waited for the police to arrive before calling for help.

Gap Tooth. I decided to use a dental dam to fill in my tooth. I wasn't paying attention and fell out of my seat. I fell in the toilet, and broke my arm. Since I have no mobility, I had to wear a cast. I'll be careful now.

Homework Hater. Jim was an atheist. He tried to learn more about religion. One day, he saw a sermon in which the church talked about God. Jim didn't know much about religion but decided to watch the sermon. He learned more about religion than ever before.

Colorado Cold. It was July 1st in Colorado and Bob was cold. He was so cold that it hurt. Bob was getting more and more cold as the day wore on. Bob's family decided it was time to go to the ski hill. They went skiing and Bob was very happy!

Comedy. Lars was invited to be part of a comedy troupe. He loved going to comedy shows. He was surprised by how little fun it was for him. Lars realized that comedians weren't always as funny as he thought. His friends told him to try new things.

Exam Grade. Sue had an exam coming up. She practiced on the computer all week. She got ready to take the test on Friday morning. Her test had a terrible grade. She was disappointed in herself for not getting a pass.
Cd. Nina was taking a test. She got all her paper in and did her best. But her teacher asked to see her hand. So she gave in. She handed in her paper with no problem.

The Space Station. Jim was watching the Space Station from his window one morning. It was his first time seeing it. He went inside and started to watch the rockets. He loved watching the launches. He would love to see all the space stations again soon.

Chase. Jared is the fastest track runner in his school. He has been trying to become the fastest runner in his school for two years. Every night when he gets ready for race day, he runs out for one mile. He runs the entire race without a problem. It turns out that his trainer made him run three miles before he could run the last.

Molly and Devin. Molly had a very strict boyfriend who only slept with her friends. He took very long walks with her to see her friends. She asked him out on a date but he said no. Molly had to break up with him to have the chance to date someone. Now, Molly and her boyfriend live together without him.
The New Girl. Nina decided to start a new career. She studied very hard. She applied at many different jobs. She got an interview and was hired!Nina decided to go work as a waitress!

Missed Alarm. Jane's alarm woke her up early. It was the school bell that woke her up. The teacher had heard a noise in the hall and came to check on Jane. Jane didn't know who was there. Jane's teacher never caught the noise.

The melted colander. Sally was making french fries. They weren't quite done yet. All of the sudden, the french fries started to melt. Sally tried to keep them hot. They kept falling down on the fries and melted on her.

Interrupted. I got a phone call that I had to go into the back room. It was my wife that got on the line. She said I couldn't go in her room without permission. I started to cry. I was so nervous I didn't want to take her out.

Dirty Cat. My cat, Kya, was very messy. She never cleaned her litter box after we moved in. Yesterday I was watching television when I noticed a mouse in the box. I grabbed Kya and started cleaning her litter box. The mouse was gone and I was pleased to see Kya clean her litter box.
Too Long Ago To Remember. Lena was reading a book. She was having trouble recalling events. She had to repeat the events. She then remembered something else. She got distracted and forgot everything.
Skating too fast. Maggie was skiing at the park. She was skating very fast. She lost control of the rollercoaster. She got stuck and got into a big fall. She couldn't ride it again.

Spicy Chicken. Lucy wanted spicy chicken for dinner. She went to the store and found a small box. When she opened it she gasped with joy. She bought three different types of chicken. They were amazing and she was thrilled with her purchase!

Whisper. One day in middle school, two girls decided to go for a walk. One girl started to whisper in their ear, something scary. The other girl stopped talking and started to walk away. The whispering continued and one girl ended up walking to a new area. It was the end of that school year.

Bunny Surprise. Ruth was shopping. She was at the store when she saw a cute, brown bunny. She bought it with a heart for Christmas. Her little bunny kept her company during the busy shopping day. Ruth had a wonderful, new pet for Christmas.

Dirty Room. Lily was cleaning up the kitchen. She was cleaning it because her room was so messy. She got some bleach and started pouring it into the sink. There was an awful smell as she cleaned it. Luckily her husband took care of the mess before she left.
The Song Cover. I went to a song contest in 2008. I was given a song contest. My song won first prize. I was told my song was not the best. My song was chosen to be the cover of a DVD.

A new PC Mouse. Tina's computer was getting slower and she was very dissatisfied with her mouse. It was very expensive and it wasn't long before she couldn't find a replacement. One day Tina decided to buy a brand new mouse. She could afford it but knew she wanted a mouse for it to work. When she got home she realized she would never find a new mouse after all.
Squash. The kids went to get a new pair of boots. The store was out of them. They all went and bought them. They all went home and sat on the porch. They played with the boots for hours.

Skiing. A couple were trying to ski in the winter. They could barely keep on the ground. The snow was deep and they couldn't see well. Finally they decided to go skis instead. They managed to get on the slopes quickly and enjoy the cold.

Lost Sight. Kia went to the store to buy supplies for the party. While there, she tripped on a large rock. Kia went to the back of the store to search for help. When she found the missing key, she realized she had lost it. Kia called to say the store was closed.
Spider Jump. Maurice was walking through the woods. He saw a spider crawl through a rock. He ran towards the spider. The spider jumped on Maurice. Maurice was not hurt.
End of speech. Tom's speech ended. The teacher stopped it. Tom asked if he could talk again. The teacher stopped it. Tom wanted to finish his speech.
