Burger To Go. Dana went to a local burger joint. He ordered a burger. While he was waiting, he went to his car. When he came back out, he realized he had forgotten his wallet. The burger he ordered came back the next day.
Sharing Bread. Tara wanted to try something new. She decided to bake some bread. She spent an hour making the bread. She was disappointed with the outcome. She was not excited to try another recipe.
Ryan Loses Weight. Ryan wanted to lose a few pounds. He began working out every day. One day he gained a couple of pounds. He kept working hard at it. After awhile he lost a few more pounds.

wing sauce. I was craving something sweet. I went to the kitchen to try some wing sauce. While I was there I found some jellybeans. I decided to buy some, then made a delicious peanut butter sandwich. I decided I wanted to make wing sauce again next time.

The Tiger. It was a very cold morning and Bob was cold. His parents drove him to a petting zoo. At the zoo they took in a lot of the big animals. One of the big tigers, a young adult, climbed out of a cage. Bob was scared and looked around nervously.

Teacher At A Party. My teacher had a party one day. It was to impress the students. She told everyone to bring their pencils. When they showed up, I got pencils too. They all had a good time at the party.

Lost in the air. Dan was flying over New England. He was trying to fly to Boston. He got lost and couldn't find the direction. Eventually, he got his GPS and was able to find his way. Dan was able to go home safely.

Vanilla Cake. The couple was trying to decide which flavor of cake to make. They had heard a delicious vanilla flavor was good, but they knew it wasn't as good. A friend had suggested they make a chocolate cake with vanilla. They looked through the store to find one they both liked. They settled on a simple vanilla cake with marshmallows and blueberries.

Lisa. Lisa had a stroke. Her parents bought her an electronic brace. Lisa didn't like it, so she refused to wear it. Then she went to see a doctor. The doctor said she would never wear the brace again.
bank trip. When I moved to Canada last summer I bought a bank card. I tried to open an account for it. It was very hard to get a loan. I got a loan on the spot. Now I can't use the bank card.

Treat. Lily got a surprise visit from her mother. Her mother came to visit Lily's aunt. Lily's mother explained to Lily that she had a surprise for her. The aunt told Lily that her grandmother died unexpectedly. Lily's mother had to give Lily a bouquet of flowers.

Bridal shower. Gina and her mother were having a romantic day. The girls went out and had a long romantic stroll in the park. Gina and her mother were going to go home after that. They went to the same hotel and it was finally time for the shower. Gina and her mother both had a blast and had a great time.

Poor Lighting. Tom and his friend came into the store. The store did not have any windows. The shoplifter was lighting their room. The store manager had to order a new tv. The store had to close early for maintenance.

CCD. I started to get a rash on my arm. My doctor told me to get a CCD. I asked my dad for a CCD and he told me no. I decided to get an allergy test. My doctor found out I have an allergic reaction to CCD's.
The Mountain Lion. Bill was in the woods. Suddenly, Bill spotted a huge mountain lion. Bill went to investigate. He couldn't find the mountain lion anywhere. Bill went home.

Drunk Story. I was on a date with my boyfriend at a bar. The bartender introduced himself and began chatting. He started talking about how drunk he was. The bartender laughed. He said that's just how he is.

Two Years. I was playing in the dirt with my friend this afternoon. I slipped and fell while running and got hurt. I started getting dizzy and my foot was hurting badly. I stopped playing in the dirt. I was able to go home later that evening.

Bad Visitor. Jane was driving around town. She wanted to see a new restaurant. She saw a cute lady walking down the street. The lady gave Jane directions to the restaurant. Jane followed the directions and walked out.

Doctor Visit. My dad was being sick. I had been sick the entire time he's been sick. We decided to go to the doctor. When I got to the doctor, he told me he had cancer. I went home to visit the doctor and the doctor said my dad had been given medicine.

New kitten. Ric was excited when his wife bought him a new kitten. He loved everything about the tiny kitten. However, there was one problem. Ric had to put him up for adoption. The new kitten was unhappy.

Too small for playing piano. Kate was trying to learn how to play the piano. She was very frustrated by how small it was. She had not found a piano that was much smaller than the one she was playing. She decided to get a piano box and practice for months. After a while, she had become very good at playing the piano.

Fender Bender. Sam was trying to fix the fender of his car. His mechanic was making progress. When Sam pulled away, he saw that the work was going too slow. He stopped the job and went to his garage. Sam's mechanic had fender Bender problems on the way back home.

Bad CLothes wash. Ava needed to be ready for the big party at her house. But when she got to her house, she realized she hadn't washed her clothes. She looked everywhere for her dirty clothes. She couldn't find them anywhere!Finally, she realized she had to wear her new clothes to school instead.

Terry the Police Officer. Terry is the police officer who was pulled over by a drunk driver. Terry tries to communicate with the driver to no avail. Terry decides to call 911 on the drunk driver. The police arrive and Terry calls 911 on the drunk driver. The drunk driver is arrested and Terry is made a police officer.

The New Toy. The little boy had always wanted a toy truck. He decided he would get one for his birthday. He made several arrangements. The day of his birthday came and the toy was delivered. The little boy had a new toy truck.
Not Good News. Sue had a terrible cold. It would usually come and go in 2 weeks. She woke up a week ago with a sore throat. She had to go to the ER. Luckily they said it was nothing serious.

Bad Exertion. Tim was a very slow swimmer. One day while swimming, he slipped and almost fainted. He tried to push himself back up with his arms, but was not able. He spent the next few minutes trying to stretch. He realized he was a terrible swimmer and decided to stop.

The Sad Birthday. Amy was very sad on her birthday. Her parents had taken her shopping for gifts for her. She loved the gifts she was getting!She loved to read her favorite books while waiting on them. Amy was so happy that her parents had picked out some perfect gifts.

The bad audition. Kia auditioned for a role in a play. The play needed a lot of lines in a scene. She didn't have any lines. The actors didn't like her because she didn't do anything. She ended up getting the part of a terrible actress.

The Tyrant. Gina went to a conference and heard a great speaker. The speakers said that a new tyranny was taking over the world. The speaker said there would be great changes to come. He suggested that one woman would take the reigns. Gina was so excited that she decided to join the new regime.

Sam The Video Game Addict. Sam was addicted to playing video games. He would get lost and end up doing things he shouldn't. One day his girlfriend found him playing on the phone. She noticed he was distracted by the game and started texting him. Sam got arrested and sent to jail.

Pizzeria. Mary was an aspiring pizza cook. She was really excited about opening her own pizzeria. She went to school and did very well on her first day. After a few months, she felt like her dream was finally coming true. Now Mary has a full time job and her dream has come true!

The tattoo removal. Tim was tired of getting new tattoos. He hated how long it was taking. He decided to get a tattoo removal. His skin started to feel better. Tim was glad that he had been able to get rid of it.

Work. Gina's boss asked her to take a vacation. Gina was excited because she wanted to travel. Gina was very excited but then she realized her boss had no vacation. The boss told Gina to take a few days off. Gina was devastated when she left to go.

Dog. Tina was driving her car to school one day. Suddenly a dog ran up to her. He was very close to her and was chasing her. She yelled at him and tried to run away. It was a bad call and he hit her instead.
Soccer. Jenny wanted to play football. Her older sister said she would play. Jenny practiced for weeks to improve. She finally played a game against a pretty girl. She won, and she was so happy!
Rice Milk. I took my son to go get some milk for breakfast. He ate a bowl of rice milk. Then he put a piece of toast on the plate. Then he asked for more milk. He drank it all in one gulp.

Party. Kelly was invited to a party by a man she knew from school. Kelly decided she didn't want to go. Instead Kelly rented a car to travel across the country. Kelly arrived at the party and spent time having fun. Kelly was glad she went to the party.

The Chicken. There was a beautiful chicken in my backyard. It had a red and white pattern on it. I couldn't wait to try to eat it. I finally went into the backyard and got my chicken. I was very happy when I tasted it.

Karma. Amy was at a party. Someone was trying to push Amy into a wall. Amy got angry and decided to throw her phone at the person. Amy ended up knocking the person out. Amy apologized and felt better.

Unwanted apps. My friend has an Android phone. It does not have the usual apps he likes. Recently he noticed some apps installed from the internet. He asked his parents for permission. They told him not to download apps.

Too heavy. I had always been nervous when we went to the movies. We always were at the tail end of the line at the theater. It always seemed like we were going to be late. Then my brother got his hands on my dad's car keys. He pulled the car into the driveway in front of us so that we would have the chance.

A Dog on a Boat?. Sue went on a boat to the beach. When she was there she saw a dog playing in the water. When the dog started to dive into the water she let go. Sue jumped and swam back in her boat. The dog ran into the water in the water and ran away.

Smoke. It was dark and cold inside the house. And then they heard a thud. A man was pushing a ladder up the stairs. He climbed up on to the roof, and set off smoke alarms. They were able to put the smoke out in two minutes.

The Bodybuilder. Tommy was a bodybuilder. He did not have a lot of money. One day, Tommy decided to sell his bodybuilding membership. He made over $100, 000. After this, he decided to become a motivational speaker.

Malaysia. My sister in law and I took a plane to Malaysia. We stayed in the very luxurious Suites. Our flights were very luxurious and we got to see everything. After a long flight, we arrived in Singapore. After a long vacation, we decided to go back home again.
Cracked. Anna got her son to do a pushup. His body was sore from the previous day. She asked him to do more in a day. He refused to try. She had to tell the doctor.

Alpaca. Amy was taking an Alpaca trip with her mom. She was in the middle of a field with Alpaca. The grass got pretty bare and Amy saw her mom running. Amy tripped over the Alpaca and she bit her lip. Amy was very upset about the bite and her mom didn't like her.

A night at the city. John decided to go on a night out with his friends. He decided to go to the city. John was surprised at all the different bars and clubs that were open. He went to clubs and parties that he had never been to. John learned that night that there were so many different types of people to meet.
Work. Dan was a fast worker. Dan often drove in from across town to work. Dan was on an overnight shift last week. Dan missed a bus. Dan got a late night call that he had been fired.

Bad Cook. Susie really wanted to cook dinner for her family. She bought the ingredients and asked her mom to help. Her mom went to the kitchen and made sure everything was ready. But she found something she hadn't seen!It was a bag of dirty, raw chicken.
change. Anna was a vegetarian. She was worried that her family would be upset. When she came home, she discovered she had cooked. She immediately went and bought a meal. Anna was so happy.

The Ticket. Amy was on her way to work when she ran out of gas. Her car was running slow and Amy had no spare. Her friends and family pulled up behind her and began to complain. Amy was furious and asked to use a tow truck. Her friends and family let her off with a warning.
Toy shopping. Tom was looking for a toy to put in the car. He decided on a video game. He picked out a blue car. Tom went to a toy store and bought a lot of toys. Tom now has all his own toys.

Wedding Day. Kate and her husband were having a wedding day. They couldn't wait to get into the car and get ready for the reception. They were going to get a nice hotel near their house. The couple got into their car and went to get ready. They were going to a beautiful wedding!

The Christmas Miracle. Kelly was sitting at her desk waiting for Christmas. As she was waiting for Christmas, the snow fell. One morning the snow fell all day. By the time Kelly got to work it was raining!Luckily, Kelly got a car to take her home to go home.

My drone. My brother got a drone for his birthday. It was bigger than he thought. He took it everywhere and made a video of it. He made a music video with the drone. The video is now viral and people love it.

Anger management. I was feeling very angry this morning. I was frustrated at the weather. I decided to read a book. I was happy when I read something I liked. I felt like the world changed for the better when I read.

New friends. Diane and her mom were having a birthday party. They both wanted to celebrate. They wanted to go to all of the great museums together. When it was Diane's turn to pick her mom picked her. Her mom and Diane had a great birthday.

Susie's favorite Doll. Susie was a big fan of dolls. She was always looking for something to play with. One day while out shopping she found something she wanted. It was a stuffed doll that she loved. Susie loved her new doll even more!
Public Speaking. I was walking to my local gym. A man asked me to speak. I decided to speak about an issue. I spoke and he applauded. He was impressed that I had spoken.

Truss. Mary had a pile of old toys in the garage. She wanted to replace them with new ones. She had a large truss and she wanted to keep them. She decided to find someone to work with. They decided to have her look at several different designs.

Brian made the baseball team. Brian had always dreamed of being a professional baseball player. He would play every game. He would try his hardest every day. He eventually made the team as a starting pitcher. Now he is one of the most famous professional baseball players ever.
Lost. Tina was walking on the sidewalk. She saw a dog nearby. The dog ran to her and grabbed her. Tina was really upset. She asked the dog where the dog was.

Date Night. The couple had never been in love before. They decided to get together for a date night. They all went out to a fancy restaurant for dinner. The two girls fell in love immediately. They both knew that would always be the case.
Labor. My daughter was in labor. I came in and found her cot, with a white dress. I was afraid she might hurt her baby. We told her we wouldn't be going. When we arrived, she was crying.

My iphone. A few years ago I bought a new iphone. I used the internet everyday. I needed a new charger but didn't have the money. I needed to have a charger that I could use on the plane. I decided to buy a usb-c cable and use it while on the plane.
Holding a Parking Spot. Kim was driving to work. Suddenly a car pulled out next to her. She did not notice until a man walked by. Kim had forgotten about the spot for hours. It had been stolen.

Contest. Sammy was very nervous to enter a contest. She practiced in the morning and went out every evening. She did not practice hard enough and lost the first round. The second round, she practiced and won again. She was pleased with her performance and was ecstatic when she won!
Sandy Shoes. Sandy was at a fancy party. She had a very fancy dress. She was about to put on her shoes. When she put on her shoes they ripped. Sandy threw the dress off her feet.

Dragon. Natalie was watching a science TV show on dragons. She was intrigued by them and was especially captivated by one. They were huge and scary and filled Natalie with dread. She watched as she saw and felt every single detail of them. She was amazed at their strength and size and how fierce they were.

Fist Fight. It was the middle of the day. Gina was on her way home from school. She decided to grab some lunch when she saw a stranger. He shoved her down on the ground and kicked her in the head. Gina was badly bruised but her mom didn't care and picked her up.

Fig Tree. Sally went on a long walk with her family. They walked in the park. Suddenly, they heard some banging on the fence. They all looked around. They saw a giant fig tree had fallen on the ground.

The Beach Ball. Bella was on the beach and wanted to catch a ball. She found one that looked too big and small. She decided to try it herself. When she started, she found that it was very difficult. Then, she remembered that the ball had balls in it.
The Bed. Martha had bought a brand new bed. She was going to use it for a party. She took it to the store and set it up. She sat in it for about an hour. Afterward, Martha felt much more at ease.

Song. I decided to write a song for my daughter. I did not have enough money to purchase her a new computer. I ended up just buying her an iPad. The iPad is expensive, but her parents pay for it. I'm proud of my daughter for choosing an iPad instead of a computer.

James Drinks Iced Coffee. James was getting tired of his morning coffee. He felt sick and thirsty. Then he decided to drink a glass of iced coffee. It made him feel better. James felt much more relaxed about his life.

Fishing. Tasha's husband was always fishing with his brother. His brother thought that Tasha was crazy for doing so. Tasha and her brother had a very heated argument about it. Tasha decided that it was time for a change. She left the fishing ring.

Dent. I had my toothbrush out the morning of yesterday. I was looking for a good toothbrush to buy. I came home and grabbed a few. The toothbrush had been out of stock for three days. I decided to just buy a cheap toothpaste instead.

Translating. My teacher recommended I look up how to translate a book. I've never done it before and I wasn't sure how to begin. I watched a lot of videos online and learned some grammar basics. I sat down and practiced everyday with my teacher. Soon, I was able to translate a book!

Making a New Friend. Kelly and her brother decided to go on a walk. Kelly wanted to find a way to make new friends. She decided to call up her old neighbor. He was also new and was kind to them. They decided to meet up for a walk.

Exterminator. Dana was a very sick child. He needed a doctor to find out what was wrong with him. He spent the next month going through a lot of pain. When he found out he started to cry. His doctor told him he had been terminally ill.

Procrastinator. I was a procrastinator. I would write so much, I would forget to do my work. One day, I wrote so much, I forgot to do my work. I could not sleep and I ended up with a lot of homework to do. I ended up losing the game.

Bloody Nose. I was at the airport with my kids. As they were getting off, a man in a mask approached us. We got out of the airplane, and he said hello to us. As he started to walk away, I was screaming in pain. I was in such pain, I fell backwards onto the floor.
Jewish. Boris was a Jewish child. He had a pet parrot, Rosie. Boris would always pet Rosie. One day, Rosie came out of her cage. Boris became a big fan of Rosie.

Volunteer. Gina wanted to go to volunteer at a new school. She knew she didn't have enough experience. Her mom suggested volunteering in another neighborhood. Gina accepted the offer. The other school was glad to have someone like her.

Sugar. Tom was trying to lose weight. Tom decided to start consuming more sugar in his diet. Tom went to the doctor to see what his problem was. The doctor told Tom that his diet made him very weak and unhealthy. Tom now eats a low sugar diet.

My dad is crazy. When my dad was about fifty he had a stroke. He had to have it amputated. So we moved to the countryside and my dad never knew where he was. The doctor said he'd never walk again. So I moved to Australia and my dad never saw me again.

The Heart Attack. Tina's friend was in the middle of a heart attack. Tina was very nervous, but she was also in her comfort zone. She walked over and started to comfort her. When Tina's friend started to feel better, Tina was glad. She began to cry for comfort.

Turn On Music. Kelsi needed to turn off her music. She could not find her music player. Kelsi checked all of her electronics. She found that her headphones did not work. Kelsi was able to return her headphones to the store.

Hide n Seek Game. Kelly loved to play hide and seek with her friends. One day while playing, she caught a bear. She was so scared that she cried for help. Her friends helped her hide and waited for her. Luckily, she got safe when her mom came home.

Larry Loses His Sunglasses. Larry bought new sunglasses and put them on. He went outside to go fishing. When he got home his glasses fell off of his head. Larry put them on right away. The sunglasses gave him terrible headaches.

Relationships. Jane's boyfriend broke up with her one night. She went online and found lots of information about what to do. Jane found a dating site that matched up with her boyfriend. She was amazed how much he cared about her. Jane now has a better relationship with her boyfriend.
Becky's New Dad. Becky was a little girl. She was afraid of a big man. Her father was very old and fat. He would always ask for her to be quiet. Becky got to know him and fell in love with him.

Bad coffee. I went to an open mic this morning. I was at a bar with other artists. Some people were talking about how great their coffee was. I was having a hard time getting through to them. I ended up passing out and passed out in the front.

Racing Competition. One day, my mom had a birthday party. She invited all her friends over for the party. We all drove to the track for practice. After a few laps, we were all ready to race. After the race, we all cheered on our favorite driver.

Birthday. I got my birthday card at work. I received a card with my name on it. I went on a trip to Paris. It was in France and I really enjoyed it. It gave me more motivation for the rest of my life.

Old House. Cindy found an old house in a neighborhood she liked. She rented the house. The house was old and rusted and cracked. The next day, Cindy came home and it was no longer hers. She sold the house, but the house is worth millions now.

Suspended!. When i was in grade school, i had a friend. We played video games on our desks. We were suspended from school one day. I had to ask him to quit on me. I learned that I needed to be more careful and be better friends.

Smoker. I used to smoke almost every day. It made me feel good about my life. Then one day, my lung function worsened. It caused me to smoke less and live a life of less than I should. I was sad, but eventually the nicotine stopped hurting.

Smelly Cat. Jill was watching TV. Her cat would be chewing on her shirt when she walked by. Suddenly the cat pounced on Jill's shirt. Jill had to rush her to the veterinarian. Luckily the vet was able to clean up the cat's fur.

Chicken Soup. Liz wanted to make a soup for her family. She bought a bag of chicken. Then she brought the bag to her house. Her kids all started making chicken soup. When they finished, Liz couldn't wait to eat it.

Return to sender. Katherine wanted to see her cat, Mia, for the first time in days. She went to the store to buy her a new collar. At home, she carefully put Mia's collar on. She looked into the cat's eyes and gave her a hug. They had a wonderful visit!
Future Engineer. Miles worked for a big engineering firm. They gave him a new title. His boss made him take a course on technology. Miles had a very good time. He was proud of his accomplishment.

Growing Plants is Hard. John was a big tree climber. He spent many hours every day pruning his trees. One day, he came across a beautiful blueberry bush. The bush began to grow wild and big. John became frustrated and decided to cut down the bush.

No Patience at All. The baby got out of the tub and started to crawl. There was an uncomfortable feeling in his stomach. He didn't like the feeling at all. He didn't want to let the baby out of his sight. He sat and watched the baby for a while until it went to sleep.

New Attitude. Tim was walking home from school one day. He saw an elderly woman holding a child to her chest. The woman said to Tim, "I'm getting tired of your dad". She told Tim that his dad's job would soon be over. Tim looked confused and began to walk back to school.
Careless Accident. Allie was playing outside. She tripped and fell. She broke her neck. She was rushed to the hospital. Luckily she was not seriously injured.

School Play. Kate and her friends were on a school play. They were in costume for the performance. They dressed in costume for their school's costume contest. They performed for all their classmates. All the students loved the way Kate and her friends performed.

Champ. Gina wanted to win a $50, 000 jackpot. So she asked her friends if they wanted to be her champions. She had a meeting with all the winners that night. Then she announced the winner. And she was elated to be awarded the cash.
new boyfriend. Kelsi had just met a nice guy. He was nice and respectful. They began dating. He kept teasing her. One day she found out about this.

Sydnee's Song. Sydnee was trying to write her song. But she kept running out of ideas. She decided to go to the store to buy a song. When she got there, she found the perfect song. She decided to play it at her concert.

Novel. Ally was really into her first novel. She was working hard and did not have time to read anything else. She felt so guilty about being lazy. One day she gave up and picked a new project. Now she is more motivated and excited for her next book.
Water bottle. Kim had just gotten a new water bottle. She decided to try it. When she got it it was really good. She went to buy more. But they were all out and Kim had to return them.

Bad Joke. One day my friends and I went to a music store. We picked a song and a video. The first song was about an old man who always had bad jokes. The second was about a new family. Both were very funny.

The Speaker. The teacher went on a walk to the library. He heard a sound, and saw a small baby. He asked the baby if it was his, but the baby kept walking. The teacher realized that he was in the wrong room. The teacher stopped and called the next room over.

Visit. Today I went to the zoo with my niece and nephew. We walked around the zoo and took pictures. My niece and nephew were so excited. They said they would remember this day forever. We are going to go again.
Sleeping Early. Cathy was tired. She felt very sleepy. She thought it was her best night. Cathy decided to go to sleep earlier. After she got to bed, Cathy was still sleepy.

The Noisemaker. Sara's roommate, Ray, loved to listen to the radio. He would often start a new song and listen to it again and again. Sara always thought that this was annoying and annoying. She would always be the one having to be quiet. She eventually found out that Ray was making noises to annoy her.

Banana Peel. Jane was having trouble getting her salad to go. She was trying to get it all to go in a large bowl. She got one last big bite to eat. Her mouth started to hurt. Jane decided to have a banana peel instead.

Soggy. My girlfriend's daughter had a big birthday party. My wife bought all of the food for the party. All of the dishes were soggy. We ended up bringing her ice cream afterwards. We never made it to her party.

Fencing. Tina went to a fencing lesson. She had to defend a large box in the yard. As soon as it was her turn, she felt nervous. She took a deep breath, took one step, and landed gracefully. Tina was proud of her skills.

Raul's Cat Costume. Raul was at the zoo with his family. He saw a young kitten. The kitten was crying because his mother was sick. Raul's mother started to faint and told him to take it. Raul grabbed the kitten and fed it to the kitten.

Pool trip. One morning Jim woke up and went to get dressed. He realized he was late for work, so he quickly grabbed a drink. He then decided to join his coworkers to go pool. They swam for hours, getting very tired but swimming. They swam back to their hotel a day later after having fun.

New Kittens!. The first thing Kim wanted was a new kitten. Kim was too shy to ask her mom. She decided to go to the pet store. She bought a kitten and it was so cute!Kim ended up loving her new kitten.

Black Friday. It was Black Friday in 2016 and I was bored. My mom bought me candy from the supermarket. She got me a few bottles of sparkling wine. I drove home and took out the bottles. I drove back home and poured out the wine.

Puppy. The family was enjoying their visit to the petting zoo. A black puppy was being wheeled onto the mat. The mom was getting very excited to bring the puppy home. The puppy was getting very big and excited to be home. The mom loved having her puppy back and loved the kids.

A dog. Rita loved animals and wanted a dog. Rita visited a pet store and selected a dog. Rita wanted the dog for life and she adopted the dog. The dog got along with other pets Rita did not like. Rita and the dog live happily together and Rita is happy.
Ready Supper. Kelly was hungry. So she decided to eat a nice big meal. She ordered a huge burger. Unfortunately, she got a large amount of fries. Kelly decided she would only eat burgers from now on.

The Dress. Allie was at her high school prom. She had a dress that she had to put on. Allie took it off of her dresser. The hem of the dress ripped as she tried to wear it. Allie was embarrassed about being so unprofessional.

Teased. Tia was very nervous for her first date with a boy she liked. She didn't feel like doing anything so she got dressed and went to the dance. The two went for a walk and Tia thought her date would find out. When they finally walked into the park she began to feel embarrassed. The two got home and began to talk about their day.
Paws. John had recently gotten a new pet. He wanted to name his pet, and had a lot of difficulty. Eventually he settled on Pawpaw. He named his dog Pawpaw. John was happy that his dog had a name!

No makeup allowed. Cora had decided to wear makeup to school. But she needed to wear it well. She did not know her best friend's favorite brand of makeup. Cora couldn't afford it so she gave in. Her best friend then offered to give her a free gift for doing her makeup right.
Super Mario. It was Super Mario World. I loved the game. I was very bad at the game. But when I played it, I was very good. I won the game!

False Alarm. Joey awoke to his mother screaming. Her husband was driving, drunk. He was trying to steal her purse!Joey ran after her as fast as he could. He caught his wife and they ran to the library for help.

The Card Collection. Tina had been collecting card-based games for several years. She had a special collection of the original Game Boy and Gameboy Color cartridges. She was starting to collect all of them. But then her son showed her a very nice card game with a collectible coin. Tina wanted to collect all of the Game Boy Color cards as well, and she went to her collection.

Migraine again!. My friend and I had a migraine last week. It was so bad we both went home early. My friend is taking medication for his migraine. I was just so sick that I had to drive over and get treatment. I felt so much better.

Snake in the grass. Cindy was out hiking in the forest. Suddenly she felt a snake slither into her hair!She screamed and screamed and ran home, afraid to leave the trail. She put on a long t-shirt, closed the lid and stuffed it under her pillow. The next morning, when she got home, the snake had been gone.

Too Much of a Wait. Gina was driving in her driveway when she noticed a man in front of her. He looked annoyed, he kept his eyes on the road and staring at her. Gina tried to drive as fast as she could to avoid him, but the man kept chasing. Gina noticed the road was closed and sped away. When she reached the intersection she had to stop to turn around and go home.

Erin and the dog. Erin was playing with her new puppy at her house. She had one leash and one leash-holder. Erin was playing with her dog and the dog got loose. The dog ran down the street. Erin and her dog got into a fight.

Statistics. Tom was working with statistics. He asked a friend to go over the numbers. He was unable to get statistics to give accurate results. Tom gave the friend an Excel spreadsheet. He used Excel to produce the results.

Comeback. Ricky was playing basketball with his friends at recess. He was being picked on so much that he dropped his basketball. His friends told him he could go home if he practiced. However, Ricky had no motivation to practice. He was out of shape so he practiced anyways.

Tadpoles. One day I was sitting in a cabin with my family. I saw a bunch of small frogs and wanted to play with them. I kept on walking to get closer to the tadpoles. Eventually I had enough and picked up a bunch of frogs. It was fun to take them home and bring them to my little frog sanctuary.

Big Test. Eli and his little brother were playing a game. Eli started to throw the ball down the line. His brother did not listen. He jumped up and hit Eli in the face with a basketball. Eli suffered a bloody nose and broken nose.

Space Heater. My brother bought a new space heater. He said he would make the heater warm. He never did. We put it on and it didn't warm it up much at all. My brother told me he would buy another one and I would pay for it.
Perfect polish. Kim's mom went shopping with her. Kim wanted to buy a perfect white dress. She saw the dress she wanted at a thrift store. It was perfect. Kim decided to buy it.

Free Food. My friend Tom and I went to eat some chicken wings. We ordered the cheapest one we could find. It was only a half dollar so I paid for it. When I asked for the other side to eat it turned out to be a pound. I ended up with a full dollar.

Family Strife. Sam's family was having a party for their anniversary. Sam decided to invite his cousin, Joe. Joe said he was going to be a DJ. Joe's cousin was upset about it. The party ended up being a big mess.

Reader. Mary and her son James were in class reading when a classmate asked Mary what she did for work. Mary had a big job and James asked her why she didn't want to work. Mary told the teacher that James was only there to steal and Mary lost the teacher's attention. Mary decided to give James some extra money and he accepted. Mary felt so much better about her job.

The Bank Robber. One day John was sitting in his home and saw a bank robber outside. John ran down to the bank and told the bank robber to let him in. John called the police and told them what happened. The police arrested the bank robber. John never left without his keys to his bank again.

Roadtrip. The couple was going on a road trip. They arrived at their destination. After driving for half an hour, they decided to stop. They went to a gas station. They left that night in their car with no regrets.

Stinky Feet. Susie's feet were really really stinky. So she decided to clean them every day. But she didn't always do it right. She did a lot of things wrong. Eventually her feet got really gross and her feet got all stinky.
Awkward Shave. I went to the store yesterday. I went to buy some shaving cream. I decided to go for a shave. When I got home I was very uncomfortable. I had a big beard and I hated it.

The Free Burgers. Linda loved eating free burgers. She was always so hungry one day. She walked into a fast food restaurant with her family. She ordered a burger and fries. Her kids begged for the free food because it was so good!
Cookies. Tina needed to bake cookies. She didn't have the dough. Tina asked her mom for some to use. But they didn't have dough either. Tina had to ask her mom to help her.

Runaway Dog. Kendall was walking through her neighborhood when she saw a dog with a big problem. It was so large it looked like it could run away. So she ran after it for a long time, but the dog kept chasing her. Eventually, the dog ran away from the intersection and Kendall took the blame. She was arrested for running away without a permit and sent to the shelter.

Small Box. Mary was driving through her backyard. She saw a box and decided to check it out. She opened it up and was shocked by the contents. There was a new puppy and a toy for her cat. Mary was so happy to find a nice home for her new pet.

Gas Station Blues. Tom had an old gas station. It was closed down the night of a big storm. He started hearing the old people outside calling him. He heard them talking about the storm. They were in dire need of a gas station.
Gus the Zombie. Gus is the zombie from the movie. Gus got scared in his house. Gus went out into the alley to fight the zombies. Gus started to get scared. Gus ran away but never returned.

Clean Numbers. Mara went to the grocery store with some of her friends. They were picking up eggs for a family party. Afterwards, they went to a new grocery store. Mara decided she wanted to buy a dozen eggs. Mara's friend said they didn't have to buy eggs, but they needed to get some.
Cold Shower. I put on my skates to go for a run. I am running through the park in the rain. I take the first steps. As I am about to hit a crack, I fall down. I was so sad and threw up on the ground.
Runner. A runner in the park. He got chased by an animal. The animal ran him over. The runner had to call for help. The animal was captured and brought to a shelter.

Slippery Situation. Tom was at the mall and the slides were slick. The slides would slide over the sidewalk and slide right off the ground. Tom wanted to get back inside but he was too scared. The slides were so slick he couldn't reach a door. Tom had to call security.
Making Dinner. One day I was making dinner. I had just ordered some salmon. I had to put it in the oven to cook. I cooked the salmon until it was done. I got a great salmon dinner.

Trial. Kelly went to a new court hearing to hear the trial. She was nervous as the judge got on the witness stand. He gave her an overview of the case. Then he made her look over the exhibits. Kelly was impressed with his presentation and felt confident about her decision.

New Crush. Tim had an affair with his girlfriend. They got married a week after he got out of prison. At first she thought he had fallen in love with another woman. Then they found out she was in prison herself!Now he is scared that she will never leave him.

Poetic Success. I made a song to express myself. I wrote it using old school pop songs. I put a lot of different lyrics and rhymes in. When people heard it I went on stage and sang. They all fell for my pop rhymes, so I got lots of compliments.
The big storm. A hurricane was moving across Texas. It was moving across Texas. My car was stalled because of the storm. I was stuck in traffic. I was stuck for a whole day.

Searched. I went online looking for the name of a local book store. I found out that they were closing. I called and asked if they could have the books for me. They did and I went to pick up the books. I brought them home and had a great time.
The quick move. Tim was at a mall. Suddenly, a homeless man approached him. Tim thought he'd made a mistake. When he turned around he found out he'd been robbed. He decided he would leave anyway.

Pool closing. Kenny decided to have a pool party. He set up a few tables and placed a large bouncer. The bouncer watched the pool as Kenny played. At the end of the night the bouncer asked Kenny if he wanted a glass of wine. Kenny declined and went to the club alone.

A Neighbor's Passing. One day in 2013 I found my dog wandering around the neighborhood. He seemed sad and lonely, until I decided to offer a friendly greeting. He seemed thrilled, and then turned to me. He said, I love you, I love you too!I smiled and smiled, and he returned to me in a very sweet manner.
Game-Winner. The basketball team lost the game. They were down by three points. They played in overtime. Timmy dunked the game winning basket. The basketball team won the game by a touchdown.

The movie. Lena was watching a movie with her friends. All of a sudden, she felt like vomiting. Her friends were laughing at her. Lena then realized she had vomited all over her movie. Lena decided to never watch movies that way again.

Eyesight. Jenny wanted to get better at eye reading. She practiced eye tracking with her friends every morning. The more she practice, the better she got at it. Eventually, she even started her own eye tracking company. Today, Jenny is the proud owner of the most unique eye tracking software!

Lifting Weights. I had been lifting weights for years. One day, I saw someone at the gym who seemed overweight. I asked him what his problem was, and he said he was too heavy. So, I gave him advice on how to fix it. And he was able to get back to doing things that make him happy.
Plaque. I decided to buy a marker to draw on. I looked on Amazon but it was expensive. I decided to look at Walmart. I found some decent markers. I bought some to use to draw on my plaque.

Free Haircut. Sandy was in the shower. Her hair was beginning to come out. Sandy went to the counter to get her hair cut. She bought a beautiful new shampoo and conditioner. She enjoyed her new haircut.
Cookies. Margo bought a bunch of cookies. She started baking them at home. She made cookies. Her mom sent her a few to give to her friends. Margo didn't care to share her cookies with her friends.

The Grand Slam. Tom was the top player in a local high school team. He was excited when his team won the tournament. Tom was so happy!He played for a couple hours afterwards and was proud. He was happy that his team had won the championship!
Sam. Sam was out of work. He asked his wife to pick him up from work. He dropped her off. They met at a restaurant. They bought lunch together.

Rain OUt. Jane's grandmother used to tell her she had no money. Her grandmother would always tell her she did not have a lot of money. One day she was in the basement when rain started coming down. Jane hid under a shelf and waited until it stopped. When it stopped her grandmother was gone with a wet sock.

Dessert. Tia was going out to dinner with her family. She was ready to eat her best meal yet. Unfortunately there was not a dessert table at her place. Her family decided to bring their dessert. Tia made them some and was proud of herself.
Box of Candy. I opened the box of candy. I saw an elephant in a panda bear costume. I asked my dad what was that thing. He said it was a box of candy. I smiled because I was in love.
Spy. Mary was going to see a movie. She went to the theater. The movie was about spy movies. Mary got to the movie quickly. Mary didn't leave the theater.

Jasmine's Ring. Jasmine was playing with her little sister at the park. Her sister said that her ring was missing. Jasmine looked all over for her ring. Eventually, her mother came and found it under her seat. She gave Jasmine a big hug and told her she was going to miss her.

Mistake. Jasmine had been watching the news. She had been watching the news about the upcoming election. When she turned on her computer she saw that Hillary was going to win. Jasmine was heartbroken, but also felt her anger. Jasmine went to her friend's house to watch the election results.

Late night Snack. My sister in law was running late to work. I decided to grab a snack while I was at work. We grabbed a snack at a gas station. The snack was too expensive. So, I decided to buy a box of Twinkies instead.
5 Years. Sue was in high school. She had a boyfriend. They broke up a few weeks ago. Sue started feeling sad. Her boyfriend decided to take her out.
hostage. Lacey has been kidnapped by a stranger. She cannot escape as he is holding her hostage. Lacey runs to the police. She calls 911 for help. They finally arrive and rescue her.

Caldwells. I used to be at the Waldorf Astoria. I had a job in downtown Manhattan. One day my boss said that we would be closing Waldorf. It would be the first time we would be moving downtown. It was the most difficult decision of my life.

Bad aloe gel. Kara is looking forward to her first day of college. Her parents let her go to the beauty salon. However, before entering, they ordered a pack of aloe gel. Kara didn't use it, so it was gross. The gel looked gross and ruined her face.

Zoe for President. Zoe was running for president. One day a group of people told her they'd like to meet. They told her she'd be a great president. Zoe decided to run for president. She beat a few other people by a landslide.
New guitar. Dan wanted a new guitar. His friends made him a list of things he needed to buy. They went to the hardware store. They picked out a great guitar. Dan bought the guitar.
Cheesy. I was eating a sandwich one morning. Suddenly my tooth came out. I could feel myself biting my lip. I had to stop. I realized it was a bug and I vomited.

Jay at the concert. Jay is watching his favorite band in concert. He is watching them perform in front of his house. Jay gets an email from the manager informing him that they will play a late show. Jay was excited when he found out they did this. Jay was excited and went back inside to enjoy his favorite band.

Gun range. Kate decided that she wanted to learn to shoot a gun. She asked her friend Liz for a gun range lesson. Liz gave her a. 45 and Kate got to learn how to shoot it. At first she was nervous. Then, Kate got better and was a lot more comfortable with the gun.

Stylist. Susie and her friend were shopping at the mall. They wanted to buy a new dress. Susie tried on a few dress designs. She found one she liked and bought it. Susie bought the dress and went home and dressed it herself.

The Garden. Milton was driving down the street when he saw an exotic plant. He was too busy to stop and take photos so he drove past it. The plant grew on a pole in the road. Milton saw a bunch of fruit in its tiny branches. He had to get it planted by the next day.

piano lessons. Anna needed a better piano for her music class. She did not have enough money to buy one. Then she heard about a piano recital. Anna decided to try out the recital. The recital was a huge success and Anna was happy.

Special Ingredient. My mother-in-law's son loves chocolate. I bought him some chocolate bars. I made them with chocolate flavored ingredients. He was upset by his new flavors. He said it was all gross and uninteresting.
Too Busy. My son was going to the movie. His brother was in the movie. His brother was really tired. The family had to sit and watch. I made him pick up his brother when he went home.

The bus ride. Cara and her brother were sitting on the bus. It was about to hit a hard stop and they were very nervous. Then a man stopped and asked if they could sit on the bus. They sat down and hissed in agreement. They boarded the bus and it was the most beautiful ride ever.

Best Formula. Gina was a high school freshman. She was excited for a science fair project to try out her new formula. She worked hard to get the most out of it. But it was hard work when no one had seen the finished product. When it was time to try it out, she was very impressed.

Card Games. When I was in middle school, my friend's girlfriend was playing cards. She played black and white, but red and green. One day, I noticed she left her card game cards at the park. My parents took a picture of my parents handing them out. Now my friend doesn't play cards at her house.

Questioned. Sara was walking home after class one day. She was going to a park to play volleyball. She was approached by a very nice young man who asked her out. Sara refused and was a bit upset. The young man said he had a cousin who could help her.

The Race. Derek was excited to compete in the first ever race. He ran his whole life with the same goal. One day Derek decided to go all out. His whole family and friends joined him on his race. Derek won the race easily and was a great addition to his race team.

Dunkirk. Dunkirk was a film I saw when I was seven. I always thought it would be too good to fail. It went on to win the Best Picture Academy Award. I was so impressed that I bought tickets for next week's award ceremony. I will never forget it.

Pimple Face. One day I accidentally scratched my face. I went to the bathroom to brush my teeth. All of a sudden my toothpaste and toothbrush came out of the bag. I found my gum, the toothpaste, and a new toothbrush. Now I have a shiny, pock mark all over my face!

A Lap of Coffee. The sun was rising, the sky was blue and the air was crisp. I was going to be late to work, but I was ready. I poured myself a cup of coffee and began the long walk. I waited until the day started and then began to drive. Once in my driveway, I drove away in my car to drive to work.
Rated R. Gina and Rob were a perfect couple. They lived on a boat together. One day, Rob was playing basketball. A wave came and knocked his chair over. Now Gina lives alone.

Pizza. Jill wanted to make something special for her dad. Jill went to the grocery store. She picked up all the ingredients and ingredients for pizza. Jill placed her ingredients in the oven and put it in. Jill cooked her pizza for dinner.

Gossip. Kya's mom was not too proud to let her go to the movies. She had warned her mom a month ago that she wouldn't be able to go. Kya hated that her mom knew she hated going. Her mom got up and walked away from the movie theater. Kya was really sad because she hated going.

Ikea Store. Ikea stores are everywhere. Ikea always seems to have a lot of things to stock up. Last week I was driving by a store and saw what I thought was Ikea. I saw it had just gone out of business. Ikea was closed that day and I went home empty handed.

Breakup. My best friend and I had been best friends since middle school. One day she asked me out. We had never gotten a date so she said yes. On the first date, she was drunk. We ended up breaking up after she got drunk.

The Blood Drive. Kaya and her husband took her to the local hospital. Kaya was given blood to be put in a machine to check for HIV. She was told that her blood was HIV positive. Kaya was worried because she never had blood transfusions. The doctors told her it was okay and that they would keep it a secret.
Spree. Barry has been drinking. It has made him really angry. He decided to start a new tradition. He has become a binge drinker. Barry is no longer angry and happy.

The Missing Pie. Kelsi was cleaning her house. As she was washing dishes she noticed a pie was missing. She looked everywhere for the missing pie. Finally, she spotted it in her dad's kitchen drawer. Kelsi rushed home to eat the pie as her dad told her to wait.

Deep-fried. All of the family loved deep-fried things. They would come over for burgers and fries. One day, their dad decided to have them try a deep-fried chicken sandwich. When they got home, they found that they had been deep-fried incorrectly. The family had to buy another order of deep-fried chicken sandwiches.
Burger. I went to Burger King one day. I decided to get a cheeseburger. I was so hungry I almost fainted. When I got home I tried to make myself a burger. I ended up eating my cheeseburger.

Gratitude. A man had to sell something to save a woman. He didn't know how she would feel. He asked her to go to the store and help him. She looked at him with a sad look. She thanked him profusely, as though she really needed his help.

Annie's Test. Annie was worried about her grade in her science test. Her teacher said the professor would ask about the grade tomorrow. Annie had not studied enough to study for the test. She was nervous and had to go to class early to be sure. The professor still hadn't asked the grade and her score went up by three points.

Little League, Big Dreams. Brett was trying out for Little League. He was very nervous about what he would have to do to make the team. He got his uniform and signed his autograph. He practiced and played on the bench all day. He was finally good enough to play for the Little League team!
Soccer. Riley was playing soccer. His friend wanted to join him. Riley decided to join him. His friend was really good. Riley's friend won the game.
Breakfast. My wife ordered french toast. It was not warm enough to cook with. She ended up burning herself. My wife had to call me later that night. I cooked her breakfast for her and got a headache.

Messy Studio. Ava went to her first meeting as a new studio manager. She arrived at the studio and set up her table. The people at her table seemed to be distracted by things that were important. She thought they were trying to make her feel better. Ava's boss told her that's just the way they work.

Trying To Stop A Thief. Tom was walking home from work. He saw a group of people with guns. He thought this was just a random crime. But then the police showed up and the whole neighborhood stopped. Tom was glad the police were there to help.

Icy Roads. We were driving in Boston on a hot July day. It was already a sunny day, and I was driving on icy roads. After an hour of driving I realized I was running low on gas. I was stuck with only 1 gallon of gas left. The gas guzzler stopped and turned on the radio and called for help.

Pool and ice cream. Allie really wanted to go ice skating. She went to the pool. She bought a pair of ice skating skates. At the pool she was able to skate for twenty minutes. Then, she realized she was too cold to go any further.

Too Old To Trick Or Treat. I was so old that I couldn't trick or treat. I was so tired that I sat in the corner of my room, eating ice cream and taking pictures. After a few minutes, I noticed a man coming my way. I was the shortest person on the block, so I stopped at ease and introduced myself. He took the picture and said he was from Kansas and wanted to buy me ice cream!

Tough Test. Amy was nervous about taking her math test today. She had a lot of questions she wanted answered. Amy practiced for several hours. On the day of the test, Amy was surprised to find that she had perfect scores. Amy ended the test with an A on her test.

Messy theater. I was going to the theater to watch a show. I was told the show was too crowded. I ended up being seated in the back row. I was so disappointed. I was disappointed that I couldn't go back.

Between the pages. Kerry needed to finish a book she was working on. She wanted to finish the book by midnight. To keep track of what she was doing, she'd pull out the pages. Unfortunately, this made her nervous. She started to sleep through her alarm.

Nick Goes to England. Nick was excited for his flight to England. He was sure he would find a great vacation. All of a sudden, a horrible cold struck. Nick had to change the flights to another city. He spent the rest of the week in England.

Breakfast Noodle. Kate went to the city to get her groceries. She wanted a snack but didn't have enough money. The store was only open for breakfast and dinner. Kate ordered a breakfaster noodle from the vending machine. She took it home and ate it very quickly.

No Self-Service. When I was at my last day at the company I needed a few items. They said the cashier wasn't available for another hour. After an hour the cashier finally came. She gave me a check for thirty dollars. It was self service and no money was charged me.

Car Keys. Diane had never owned a car. She knew she needed to buy a new one. Diane was on a long drive to the store to buy a car. She went through all of the paperwork to buy the car. Her mother and father let her drive the new car home.

Jake Takes A Test. Jake had trouble concentrating on his test. He decided to take a long break from studying. He asked his teacher if he could come in and read for him. His teacher allowed him to read for a few minutes. Jake read well on his test.

Wide Feet. Kate was wearing a size six dress and shoes. Her feet were in the wrong place. She decided to go get a new pair of wide feet. Kate went shopping and ordered the right size shoes. Kate was happy to be able to wear her new shoes.

College. Mary had just turned eighteen years old. She was getting ready to go to college. She was a huge fan of the college band. She knew everyone at the school was super cool. She decided to apply to all the colleges and got accepted.

Summer Reading. Last week, I went out to read. It was a fun weekend reading. The book I enjoyed the most was the classic, by Jane Austen. The book read so fast I had to stop the reading. It was a good way to start the summer!

The Lottery Win. Susie had decided to play at the local Lottery. She wanted to get the lucky number one. When she started counting, her eye caught something unusual. It turned out to be a very lucky scratch off!The numbers on her scratch off were ten and twenty.

Ben starts a food fight. Ben has a job. He works in an animal shelter. Ben has to make sure the animals are fed and water is always available. One day Ben feels hungry and decides to have some food. Ben eats what he wants, and the animals are grateful to him.

Too Much Rain. When they arrived, they were in no mood to go home. They decided to stay until the storm went away. They went to the store to get some supplies. At the store they bought snacks, a blanket, and a sleeping bag. By midnight the sun had already set and it was time to return.

The Drums. Dina bought the drums for the local concert. She bought them at a small price. After the concert she put them on her lap. The drums played a great part in the performance. Dina was proud of her purchase.

The Basketball Team. Joey was an All-State Basketball Player at the University of Illinois. One day, a coach named Tim hired him as a player scout for a basketball school. Joey spent weeks interviewing the players, recruiting and making sure they had a great time. After a lot of hard work, the team won the state tournament. They went on to make the championship team.

Salvation Army. Allison was at church when she got a call from the Salvation Army. They needed volunteers to come to their meeting. She went to the meeting and saw the homeless and sick. She was shocked. It turns out the Salvation Army is a big part of her life now.

Rainy steph. Steph was playing in the park with her mom. She was playing with her mom. It was a beautiful sunny day. Steph saw the sun coming over the mountains. Steph ran as fast as she could as the rain began.
Quitting. I was not feeling well. I had a stomach ache. My wife and I decided to see a doctor. We found out we had strep throat. We stopped smoking and have not been sick for years.
Missing Cake. Tom and his mom were watching TV. Tom was trying to get a snack. Tom had forgotten his chocolate cake. Tom threw it in the oven. Unfortunately, he left the cake in the oven.
Disco Dance. Dan loved Disco music. He was on the phone with his wife. She told him she had been going to the mall with friends. Dan thought she was joking. He said that would never happen to her.

The Bunny. My mom was trying to have me get dressed for a big date. I kept sneaking out the back of the house. One day, my mom was looking for my rabbit. She came up and saw my rabbit, but couldn't find it. I was so happy and realized I had just gone for a walk.

Mango. Randy was an avid mango lover. He loved eating the ripe fruits on their own. One day, Randy's mother took him to a store. There, Randy's mother bought him a large mango. It was his favorite mango.

Stuck in the mud. Amy was stuck in the mud. Her dog wanted to take her to the dog park. She tried to move it around a bit but couldn't. She ended up getting stuck in the mud. She had to use a ladder to get out.

Gerald. Gerald was an astronaut. He was going to be the first to reach space. He had done everything by NASA's own guidelines. He was going to make an amazing flight. When he arrived, he was so glad he had gotten to space.

The Puppy. I got a puppy that was born in my backyard. It was my first puppy, but I loved him very much. One day the puppy was acting strange. I got him to stay with me. We learned a lot about each other that day.

Entertainment. Jim loves to entertain his friends at his house. One day Jim heard that his house had a rock concert that evening. Jim went to the concert and listened to his favorite band. He had a great time watching the band perform. Jim is sure he will go back often.

Bitter exes. Jen and Brad were in love and had a wonderful time. Their relationship ended and they couldn't get back together. Jen was sad but Brad was angry. He threw a big party and left them in tears. Jen and Brad never talked to each other again.

Pictures. I have several pictures I took in a class one time. One picture was from the end of a play. The teacher said that we need to go back to a different location to take them. I told her that was silly because it was a school picture. She said that the school was behind us so I went to find something else.
Eye Infection. Jenny got a small bite on her finger. It started to itch. Jenny had no idea what the bug was. She put a band aid on it. Soon after, the itch subsided.
Broken heel. The baby was walking around in the house. He looked down. His heel was snapped in half. The baby could not find it anywhere. The baby was upset with his mom for not keeping him warm.

Driver. Mandy was taking a driving test. It was a test about driving. She was scared that she would make a bad choice. Luckily she made the choice right and passed. She learned that it's important to practice.
The Spider. The neighbor's cats made a lot of noise. It made Jeff very uneasy. He took the cats outside. He fed the cats some catnip. Jeff's cat ran out of the house and he calmed down.

Too expensive muffins. Samantha was baking muffins for breakfast. Her family asked her to make some for them. Samantha made some for herself and her kids. She gave them to the kids. They all ate the muffins.
Jeff and his house. Jeff was moving into a new house. It had lots of work. Jeff was very excited. He was working on the roof. It took a long time but Jeff made a great new house.

The Sushi Chef. Jim was a professional chef. He was known around town for his amazing sushi. One day, he got some bad news. They were trying to hire him to run a sushi restaurant. He was horrified but decided to do it anyway.

Long Hair. Kim was getting into her new hair style. She didn't want her long hair to fall out. So she went to the salon and got a new comb. And she combed it out with a sharp razor. And she was amazed that her long hair looked better.

The Amusement Park. Gina was riding a roller coaster when she felt a bump. As she was jumping off the ride she heard loud pops. She was shocked by what she saw as a large, green creature had popped out of the ride. The creature was holding a large bat in its mouth, with a claw outstretched. The bat screamed in terror and flew away, laughing as Gina laughed.
Baked apples. I had some good apples for the holiday dinner. I looked at the recipe. The apples came out to be very soft and crunchy. I decided to bake them. I loved them the rest of the night.

Sand. Jill loved to play in the sand. One day her father gave her a toy sand volleyball. She was so excited. She was happy to see the toys. Soon her father told her she could throw the sand volleyball.
The teacher at the store. John went to the store. He ordered an item. The teacher at the store gave him the item. John bought the item. John never went back.

Leaky Roof. Tim lived on the second floor of his condo. One day his apartment door was getting very messy. His neighbor took a leak on his roof. Tim was sad since he couldn't get to sleep. He never heard from him again.
New transportation. Tina went to the grocery store. She wanted a bag of chips. She had to buy it on the way. She was late and it took her 5 minutes to get there. Finally she got them to her house.
Exam. I wanted to study for my next exam. I could not wait for the day. I spent my whole afternoon studying. On the day of the exam, I fell asleep. After I got my test, I felt a headache.

Dan the candy man. Dan was a very poor man in a small town. He needed to find ways to make money. Dan spent all his money to buy a candy bar. Dan ate the candy bar as he went to work. Dan had enough money to buy himself a new house.
Goldfish. Sandy was at the beach with her family. Suddenly she saw a goldfish swim by. She ran towards it. Luckily she caught it. She returned it to the beach.

Can't Come In Today. One day I came home from work, and a knock at the door. There was my boss, asking me to come in. I tried to stay quiet but realized I couldn't speak. He explained that he had to bring in some of his employees. When I showed up, the man who'd called me in was waiting for me.

Disastrous Diana. Diana was dating a guy named Charles. One day Diana tried to get some ice cream at his place. She ordered a cone with chocolate on it. When she tasted it, she realized it was disgusting. It tasted so disgusting, Diana never went back.

Fussy Cat. My cat had a lot of problems. One day she began chewing on her food. She wanted it but couldn't eat. My brother called my mom to come over and pick her up. She got her food and we both got to go for a walk.

Boating. Anna loved to cruise on the ocean. Anna loved to explore every part of the ocean. Anna's father taught her how to sail. Anna decided she would learn how to sail with her father. Anna spent four months sailing around the world.

Fashion. Jenna had never worn any clothing before, but wanted to start dressing for prom. She browsed the catalogs for dresses, but was very confused about what they were. Finally, she went to the clothes shop and found an amazing gown. Jenna got it and wore it to the prom. The dress was a little long, but it looked great, and Jenna was happy.

Marie. Marie was the best cook in town. She made her customers love her!One day, Marie had her favorite dinner delivered to her house. She opened the door and a dozen dogs ran in. Marie's friends all went home happy.

Popsicle drip. Mary and her mom went to a skating rink. Mary wanted her mom a popsicle. Mary accidentally spilled her popsicle on the ice. She then started choking on it. She decided to just avoid it until she was sober.

Whistling Tea Kettle. My friend Amy had just bought a new tea kettle. It came with a large teapot. She wanted to boil a pot of tea in it. But Amy's pot wasn't very long. She ended up with a wadded kettle instead.

Peapod. The Peapod was at the mall. A boy named Alex came by to get his popcorn. Alex wanted a piece of popcorn but was told he needed to get a ticket. Alex went to the counter and was told the cashier was rude. Alex got the rest of his popcorn and left the mall.

Garrett's Baseball Game. Garrett was about to get his baseball game. He was going to start early in the second inning. But his opponent, Aaron, hit a triple!Garrett had a double the next inning, and he won. He won the game!

Star Quarterback. Barry wanted to try to catch a football. He worked on his football skill for a year. After his first try he was so good. Barry took a shot at the ball and made a catch. He was very excited.

School Dance. Bree and her class were planning on having a dance. But the teacher had cancelled the dance, because the students were too distracted. Bree decided to give her best girl a try at the dance. But the little girl came out nervous and shy. Then she gave up and let the little girl come in to be her date.

Body Transformation. John was a guy who was very skinny. He could never figure out how to lose weight. One day he noticed some girls getting muscular. So he decided to join the gym to lose some muscle. John was glad to lose some weight and get his body shape back.

Charging my phone. I went to the phone store for a new phone. They asked me about my phone battery. I said my phone was dead. I told them I was going to charge my phone. They charged my phone and it worked the next day.

Bike Ride. It was a beautiful sunny day. My dog began to lick his tail. He took out a big bowl and started eating his treats. The puppy came running and began to attack the bowl. We yelled at him and he bit us all.

The Nail. Kia was at the doctor's office when she noticed a nail on her hand. She couldn't figure out what it was and looked everywhere. Suddenly, the doctor gave her a diagnosis and an idea. Kia's nail had been fractured by a sharp object. Kia had to have it fixed by an artist so she could keep going in the day.

The Whale Problem. Charles was fishing with friends. He was about to catch a whale. Suddenly he heard a noise and the boat came to a stop. Charles grabbed the whale's tail and swam away. But the whale had already eaten Charles' lunch!

The Model. My daughter and her friends wanted a Barbie doll. She was nervous at first because she had never been modeling before. They decided to start the project by taking pictures of it. They tried to get it to look like them but it fell apart. They had to have the dolls made from cardboard.

That Star. Jill had seen an ad for a new game on the television. It was called Star Wars. It was a fighting game with a cast of characters. Jill loved the character designs, the music, and the story. When she finally bought the game, she was so proud of it.
Fairy-tale. I went to the fair one year. I didn't know what to expect. There was a large fair. I didn't understand why people were so excited. They loved it.

Sick from fajitas. Mallory was at a Mexican restaurant with friends. After eating her burrito, she felt a lot of stomach pain. Mallory ordered a taco and they both wanted the same thing. One girl said she would have the fajita burrito instead of a taco. Mallory was upset and she made them cancel their plans.

Excitement. A couple was sitting by a park bench enjoying the spring day. They both wanted a picnic. They were discussing which one to take. Suddenly, the mother said,  the kids were going to the water park. The kids ran off with the water park keys.
Hot weather. It was getting so hot in Florida today. So i decided to head to a strip club. So i went to get a drink and dance. It was very hot outside. So i stayed home instead.

Walden. I was sitting on a bench at the store in the back of my class. Some kids started yelling at each other. I saw an older boy walking towards me. He began talking to me and I felt awkward. I got up and left the bench to go home.

Visual Genome. Sara was an aspiring scientist. She tried to model her own vision as a computer programmer. She created a large computer program. It made her very happy, and helped her achieve her dream. She was able to publish a few books after her first computer program.
Diet Soda. It was Halloween. I went to the store to get some soda. I asked a clerk for the sugar alcohol flavor. He gave me a choice between diet and soda. I chose soda because I was thirsty.

Cactus in the Window. The sun was shining outside when I got a text. My phone was covered in an odd, white, sticky mess. It had fallen out of my pocket. My mother came outside and she had it. My friend called and told me it had all been a joke.

All work all play. All work and no play was a good thing. Everyone was supposed to play at recess. In high school we got the all work and no play rule. Everyone was expected to come over to play during recess. Everyone played a lot better after this rule.

Gymnastics Flips. Jill loves gymnastics and went to the gym every weekend for several weeks. She began to feel less confident in gymnastics after a while. Her coach encouraged her to try to work on her flexibility. Jill began doing agility drills while the team was out. Jill now has a much better ability to lift weights.

Prank calls. Tina was playing pranks on her neighbor. She was trying to lure him to the beach. She had a fake gun and an electric scooter. The neighbor drove over to Tina's house to get out of the car. She jumped in the scooter and drove him back to the house.

Prank. Kelly really wanted to prank someone. So, she decided to send an e-mail to a friend. The person in the email responded right away. But, the e-mail was from someone else. Kelly felt ashamed to have fooled someone.

Slow down. Sally was very frustrated. She wanted to do something to relieve her frustration. She decided to slow down for ten minutes. She got through a few of her homework tasks faster than normal. Sally was happy to be able to do her work.

The Bus Driver. I took my bus to the hospital one day. I wasn't sure what I needed to get to. They had a little cart with food and a few snacks. I asked the attendant what I should get. He decided to let me drive his bus to get there.
Duran Duran. It was a nightmarish night. The people were dancing in the street. The police were standing around them. They were yelling. It was going to be a night of horror for us all.

Fresh lemonade. Kim and Sue decided to make a fresh lemonade. They bought a small bottle of lemonade. When they filled it up they realized it was a bit runny. They added more lemonade to it. It tasted fine though.

Marcus Makes a Sandwich. Marcus is hungry and wants a sandwich. He notices the store is closed and decides to make his own. He takes a bag of doughnuts from the oven and kneads them. The doughnuts turn out great!Marcus gets to enjoy his sandwich while his mind is elsewhere.

Lost love. I met a beautiful young man in a coffee shop one day. He was very nice to me and said hi to anyone I mentioned. For some reason he went missing one day. Since we didn't have a date, I didn't ask him where he was at. After a few months I started to realize why he hadn't called.

Smelly Cat. The cat in the alley always smelled bad. I decided I needed to do something about it. I decided to put an old tarp down on her bed. Then I let the cat outside. The cat jumped right into the tarp.
Start your fight!. Susie and Tom started a fight. It went from bad to worse. She was angry that Tom would ignore her. He just kept going and ignored her. The only thing stopping Tom was his wife.

Toothpaste. I went to the dentist for a checkup. The dentist gave me some toothpaste. I put it on, but it made my teeth look horrible. I told the dentist about my toothache. The dentist gave me some ibuprofen to help.

Talent. Randy is an avid golfer. He wants to be the best and be able to do it. He started going to a local golf club. His clubs have improved his swing and made him a better golfer. He is hoping to one day be the best golfer in the country.

Ingredients. Amy decided she wanted to make a smoothie. She bought the ingredients, and made it. She took a bite out of her smoothie. A strange taste came out. She realized the batter was not ready yet.

Wild Rosebush. I grew up and attended a very small community college in California. I had a lot of friends and was very interested in politics. I joined the local Green Party and had a lot of fun. I decided that I wanted to run for office. I had never been political before, and my success is reflected in the party I became a member of.
Swimming. Lucy wanted to join a swimming class. She wanted to join the gym. She wanted to go swimming with her friends. She signed up for the swim class. She loved swimming in the pool.

The first kiss. Janie was having a sleepover and needed to get some sleep. She went to bed around midnight. When she woke up she had a strange dream. She woke up early the next morning and went to school. She realized she didn't have the courage to go on her first date.
Melvin's Dog. Melvin bought a dog. He went to get the dog. The dog bit him. Melvin had to get the dog taken away. Melvin felt bad for the dog.

Jason's decision. Jason was feeling a little bit bored on his vacation. He decided he would just go home and relax. Jason decided he would take a walk around town. He found a local park and decided to spend a little time there. Jason felt refreshed and felt much happier afterwards.
Stunt. Joe was a stunt man. Joe needed a job for a new project. Joe went into the local talent show. Joe performed a variety of stunts. Joe got the job for the stunt job he needed.

Huge. I was taking a hike in the park one day. The trail is so huge, I almost fell over. I went straight to the park and started taking pictures. I eventually came back and realized how big the trail was. My back was hurting all day.

Lost Car. Lucy was driving to school. Suddenly, she saw a car missing. She checked the license plate number and the description. Luckily, she realized that the car belonged to her mom. She made it home safely with her car keys.

Frozen Ice. The temperature on the night sky was getting really cold. My wife and I decided to go to a restaurant in the city. It was only 1 pm when we arrived to the restaurant. At the restaurant they were serving  frozen  ice. We all had ice with us that night.

Close call. Susie and her son were out with their dog one afternoon. The dog kept barking and barking. Then, Susie's son ran over to the dog and got it. He immediately picked it up and gave it food. Luckily, it didn't attack anyone in the neighborhood.

The Alamo. Cody was driving through the desert. He was pulled over for speeding. The officer had Cody get a written warning. The warning included having Cody wear a helmet. Cody was happy to not have to wear a helmet anymore.

How Shelly Broke Her Toe. When she was little, my mom always gave us toys. I was a big fan of toys and my dad would take them away from me. One day, I was walking down the hall when my toe hit a toy. I had my toe broken in two places!I could not play until I healed my toe.

Jelly Shoes. Mina was in high school and had a crush on an all-girls' volleyball team. She started wearing a purple pair of gym shoes to school. One day a girl tried them on and complimented them on their cute pink sole. Mina thought the girls looked really cute in the shoes. But when the girls saw the shoes she said they looked like jellyfish!

Astronaut. I was the first child in my family to go to space. I dreamed of becoming an astronaut. I dreamed of being in space as a child. I had no career after school. My parents took me to space in space.

The Move. Samantha was having trouble making any friends. She decided to start dating a boy she really liked. She began to make plans with the boy. She also got a job and got a good apartment. Soon Samantha was a full time girlfriend with a boyfriend!

A Kingdom Betrayal. When the king's family arrived at the castle, he was very proud. He made an announcement to his king and his entire kingdom. He invited them all to his palace for the wedding and coronation. The king took an hour to read the invitation. He was so mad he threw the invitation in the trash!
