Breakfast. My wife woke me up to bring me an  hour long breakfast. I was excited to have the opportunity to take a break from work. We ate a small breakfast. We had a good amount of  pancakes. I was glad that we had some time to talk.

Biggest Fan. Nina wanted to become a big fan of a popular show. She read the comic and watched it online. She asked her friends if they wanted to watch it. She watched it in her living room. Then she joined the local theatre in hopes of seeing it.
Stretching. Lily couldn't get a new dress. She looked all over for a dress. She found one at a store near her work. Her old one was too big. So she got a larger dress.

How I sprained my ankle. Alicia and her friends were playing in the park. She ran towards them and tripped. The boys ran after her and tackled her. Alicia sprained her ankle. They got it looked after for a few days.
Gym. Gwen wanted to play at the gym. She signed up for a class. She was nervous because she didn't know any of the teachers. She was happy she made it in. Gwen ended up being a great student.

Stolen Jewelry. When I was shopping at the mall my jewelry was stolen. When I looked in the jewelry cabinet there was a note. My money was taken. I filed a police report and called the police. The police said they found my jewelry and took it away.

Michael's Collection. Michael went out to his neighborhood to collect items. He found an old guitar and played with it. When it was time to take it home, he put it in the front seat. It was a new guitar with a different tone and a different finish. He proudly drove it home.

Two Fans and Their Favorite Show. Two fans of a new network show decided to watch it together. The show started out slow and funny. Then the drama began to escalate. After a while the drama was out of control. The show ended up losing several hundred viewers.
Racing Cars. Joe wanted to learn to drive a car. He signed up for lessons. At first it was challenging. But after a few days he got to learn. Joe decided that driving cars was his true passion.
Fishing. Mike loved fishing. One day, he went on a trip. It was a really long trip. It took him over a week to catch all of his fish. Now, Mike only goes fishing when there's lots of bait available.
Paint Cover Up. We bought a new carpeting. It had a lot of holes. I decided to install some paint. I had to remove the whole carpeting. I got sued and bought a new carpeting.

Kitten Friends. There was a kitten named Molly. Molly was a very sweet and kind kitten. Molly had a lot of fun when she was young. When she reached a certain age she could no longer play. Molly was now retired from the animal shelter and had to be left alone.

Cross country. Tim wanted to run across the country. He didn't know what to do for an ultramarathon. He found the Cross Country running course online. Tim took the courses on foot. He finished with a 3:30:00 time.

Great birthday. Today was the day that I got my birthdays. My mom told me the day I would be on my birthday. I walked into the room. Then, I sat down at my table and started talking. I told her how thankful I was for her support.
Josh. Josh needed a new laptop for work. He went shopping. The best deals he found were on the cheapest ones. When he had them he decided to buy one. Josh was glad to finally buy a great laptop.

Drive-thru. Bethany ordered a hamburger from the drive-thru. She didn't realize she would have to wait a long time. Bethany was so excited when she sat in the drive-thru to wait. She ate the burger and was so happy to have waited. When she came back home, she found out the drive-thru was full.

Best Trip Ever. I went on a trip last August to visit my aunt and uncle. They are very wealthy. On this trip we went to Italy, Spain, Morocco and Germany. There were so many great sights to see!I cannot wait for another trip like this!

Lovers and Flowers. Jenna and Michael were dating in love. They started to make plans to go on a date. She told him she wanted flowers for their anniversary. He agreed to it, and gave her flowers. She told him to give her the flowers when she leaves him.
Steve's Award. Steve is an actor. He does a lot of acting. One day he got an award for acting. He was very happy. He decided he would do much more acting.

No Biting Please. Dana and Jim were in a relationship. One day Dana had an argument with her boyfriend. Jim left his phone behind in Dana's room. Dana then noticed that Jim had lost his phone. She ran to the phone in frustration.

Calling In Sick. One day I called in sick to work. When I got to work, I realized I had forgotten my wallet. I didn't want to lose my job so I didn't show up. However, I couldn't stay home because I'm in pain. My boss was very upset with me.

The Surprise in the Creek. My mom and dad went hiking in the woods. They were just coming back from a trip up the creek. Suddenly, my dad's compass started to sputter. He looked for his wife to be safe. Then, his phone ringed and he saw his daughter laughing with another man.

Fell in the lake. Kelly was on a vacation with her family. Kelly got lost on the way back home. Kelly called for help from her father. He said there was a river nearby and someone would help her. Kelly never made it home to her family.

For Victory. Barry was playing basketball with his friends. He was down by one point when his teammate came to the line. Barry thought he saw a flag so he called out. His friend quickly came over to Barry and started a fight. The next time Barry challenged another player, he was denied.

New Horizons. Nina's family went on a long hike in the mountains. They were very far from their home in the city. One of them had never seen the whole valley before. It was very exciting. They ended up camping right in the valley for months.
Instant Exit. Tim went to the ATM. He wanted to make a few purchases. Tim got out of the ATM. He found his wallet in the bag. He ran outside.
Bad haircut. My mom was getting my hair cut. My head was getting hot. My mom told me to take a shower. I did but was soaked. The next morning I was so hot that my hair came off.

Old Prison. Cindy was sentenced to serve six months in a prison. She was being kept in a cage with an iron. One night, her cellmate took her to the top floor of the building. Cindy was startled by his voice. He told her there was another cellmate in the cage.

Vegetable Garden. Susie was excited to have a vegetable garden to start with. She started by growing carrots and celery. Next, Susie was growing kale and spinach. Finally, Susie was growing potatoes. She was thrilled with the start of her vegetable garden!

The Cracked Cup. Jana had been drinking her morning coffee. When it was over, she got a cup to herself. She felt a crunch on her cup but didn't want to believe it. She took the cup to the store. There, she replaced it with a new one with cracked cups.

Big Money. One day I saw a great deal for a used car. I bought the car and got it appraised. It was worth a lot of money. I drove it all the way home. I got the appraiser to give me a better recommendation.

Pet a Fish. Sandra wanted to make a few friends to play with. She asked her parents if she could make a fish for dinner. She gathered all her supplies and went inside. When she returned, the fish had been cooked. She had a wonderful dinner with her friends!
Cookies. I was trying to eat some ice cream. I didn't have much left over. I opened up a jar of cookies. I ate all of the cookies. I thought I was eating healthier.
The Freezer. Jim bought a new house. He was going to renovate it. His wife had a freezer. He didn't know about it. When the new owners moved in she didn't mind.

Ooh That Smell. Sally loved to play volleyball on her lunch break. On one break, she lost a lot of her balls. Her friends kept calling her the foul ball and telling her how much she hated it. But Sally couldn't resist. She decided to stop playing for lunch, and got a lot of practice.

Hair. Sam and his girlfriend wanted a baby. Sam's girlfriend had just recently started college. He had asked her if she could help conceive her. Sam was nervous for her since he didn't think she'd do it. Sam took her to the clinic and they were both happily surprised.

Louvre. Tom was on a trip to Paris with his wife. They were excited when they saw a beautiful new Louvre exhibit. It was an original 18th century painting. Tom could not wait to see the painting. He enjoyed the painting very much.
Wedding Video. My girlfriend had a great wedding. My son's friends came by to check it out. They started making fun of our wedding. The wedding was great. They left.

The Pet Trial. Gina's mother always did not allow her to play with her dog, Timmy. She thought it was a good idea. But Gina couldn't believe it when Timmy threw a ball at her dog. She hit the dog with the ball, breaking it in two pieces. Gina was not amused at all and took the dog home for safety.
Marco Jumps Rope. Marco was at the park with his family. They were playing with a rope swing. Marco decided he would try it. When he tried it, he fell. He fell hard on his butt.

Early Dismissal. Sally didn't like the teacher at school. One day when she was in the lunchroom she saw a fat person. She got up and took out her lunch bag. The teacher caught Sally and she was put into detention. Sally was grounded for the rest of the school year.

New friends. Janet was nervous for her first day of elementary school. She had never had a lot of friends growing up. All the new kids she met made her feel very special. But after a while, her friends had all started coming to school. Janet knew that she needed a new group of friends.

Linda starts a garden. Linda's parents bought her a large garden. Linda's parents let her use the garden from the start. She planted several plants and watered them. When the time came for the kids to go home, they went to the garden. Linda was pleased when they returned.

Lost Tools. Tom needed some new tools for a project. He went to his local hardware store. He browsed their shelves to see what he needed. He bought all of the items Tom needed. Tom was glad that he did.

The steak. I had been eating steak for years. I was trying to make some for dinner. I decided to put it on some hamburger and bread. Unfortunately my steak fell off the grill and burned my finger. I didn't realize it until hours later.

Erik's First Kiss. Erik was excited about his first date with his girlfriend. He was having a great time with his new crush. All of a sudden, Erik was surprised when his phone rang. His girlfriend was calling to tell him that they had an argument. Erik was devastated, so he ran out of the club.
Round Food. Dwight was getting too hungry. He decided to buy some food. He got everything he needed. After a bit of searching, he found a great place. He ended up eating half of the food.
Envious. I've been in a relationship for 10 years. I love my wife and I have two kids. We got married last year. It's been really tough. I don't think we will ever be happy.

The Scientists. Bill had always been fascinated by the physics of matter. Bill went to the local elementary school to visit a special research lab. Bill's teacher told him to observe the experimenters in the lab. Bill watched with interest as the people in the lab were working. He was amazed to learn that the scientists studied what they called the "physics of matter"

Going Blind. Marianne has been dating a man for 10 Years. He asked her to go out for coffee one morning. She didn't want to go with him and went to the cafe. She decided to drink her coffee and look at the menu. She was able to see the coffee was too hot for her and walked out.
dinner in the woods. I had a hard time making friends. I was always getting the same answers. I finally had to go out to the woods to eat. I saw a nice dog outside. He was very kind and friendly.

Cancer. Molly has two kids and they have a large family. Her son's cancer has progressed so bad that she can't keep him. She has tried for six months to get a transplant and to save him. The last week she went to her cancer doctor and got a news report. A new cancer treatment has been successful and has cured her son.

Good Job, Little Buddy. We had a baby baby girl. She was so happy, and so tiny, and cute. We wanted her to grow up to be a good little person. Our friends thought she looked terrible, but she was so adorable. We tried very hard to be nice to her and make her happy.

Water Damage. We went swimming in the ocean last weekend. We went to the beach to catch a bite to eat. While swimming, we saw a large wave. My friend tried to swim down it. He fell into the water and became soaking wet.

Fish Tank Maintenance. Jim needed to clean the fish tank after the rainy. He was sad about it, but decided to take it to the dealer. He took the fish out of the tank and cleaned it. After that Jim's fish tank looked great. He was happy that his fish tank looked clean.
Joey. Joey got a new puppy. The puppy looked cute!It had brown fur, and white fur. Joey decided to name him Joey. Joey was named Joey because of his white coat.

Keys. Jenny was on a camping trip with her family. They decided to take a cabin. There was a big cabin with no water and they had to go by boat. The cabin they went to had no water. They had to sleep in a tent and not see any of the cabin.
Cat kisses. Tina was sitting by the window. Suddenly she saw a small kitten staring at her. She was startled but quickly stood up. She put the cat in the cat carrier. She never took the kitten home.

Baby Bird. Tom and his girlfriend were having a baby. Tom had never been in a real birthing situation before. He thought he'd be fine, but then he heard the screech of the baby bird. The baby bird was flying through the air, yelling to warn it's parents!Tom had to put a gun to its head and teach it not to do it again.
starfish. I was fishing at a river near my house. I caught a starfish. I took it home. I put it in the freezer. It died within a week.

Long Distance. I moved to Florida a few Years ago. My friends and I met at a hotel there. We stayed there for a few weeks and met some friends. We got into a car accident and had to get a ride to another city. I have now moved back to Texas.
Friends. Last week my niece's boyfriend decided to go to a bar. It was the first time they went. All of his friends were there. He drank until his friends got tired. Then he went home.

The Baby. Sarah was walking her baby home from daycare. Sarah saw a cute little white baby on the corner. Sarah decided to introduce herself and introduce herself to the baby. They made small talk and made it clear that they were family. Sarah then put the baby into a stroller and got home.

Let It Go. One day, a group of guys decided to rob a bank. They broke in through the back door with knives and guns. They tied up a customer and took all his money. The customer was so scared he called 911. A cop arrived and arrested the guys.

John's Idea. John decided that his job was to write software for big companies. He had a bunch of ideas that sounded good. He wrote them and put them up on his website. Nobody liked the ideas, however. He had to start over again.

Saving For The Future. The man saved a lot of money. He was in the same neighborhood as many famous people. He had saved from the early 80's to the 80's. He decided to become the next great rapper. He finally achieved his dream and became a millionaire.

The game payment. Jill and her mother were playing a game. Jill had won the last game. Her mother agreed to pay for the next one. Jill was excited about the payment. The payment went into her mom's account and she enjoyed the game.

Peanuts. Lucy was allergic to peanuts. So she had to eat peanut butter sandwiches every day. One day, she decided to try a peanut butter sandwich. She took one big bite and it was terrible. Lucy had to quit her peanut butter sandwich business.

Treatment. Nia was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis. She was given a lot of treatment. She had her blood tested and found out she had it. She then had a biopsy done. After that, Nia got her shots and started living with the disease.

A Break. Mary was having a bad day at work. She decided to just hang out with her friend. She had gotten some drinks to help her cope. Mary took a drink as she left the restaurant. She felt better as soon as she drank the drink.

Monster Truck Show. Linda was a fan of monster truck music. One day at a local club, she heard a very popular song. She saw a huge red truck on stage in front of her. She saw the owner and the song's producer, and began to cry. They were on a road show for Monster Trucks, and she was shocked.

lost boy. Gina had a baby boy. He was really small and thin and very sweet. One day she gave him a bath. The water broke and he got all over the sink. Her husband found the whole mess and took his son away.
The awful truth. Allie really liked a guy. He was extremely attractive. They tried to date for a few months. Allie was always rejected. Now she's never dating again.

The meal. Janice had an appointment to see the doctor. Janice had always wanted to go to a doctor's appointment. One night Janice went to a restaurant for lunch. Janice ordered the same meal she always enjoyed. She went home feeling very satisfied with her meals.

Babysitter. Mary's babysitter, Molly, got pregnant. Mary and Molly's parents decided to have the baby together. Mary's parents had a great time taking care of their new baby. As they were leaving the hospital they saw Molly giving birth. Mary and Molly's parents are going to have a wonderful baby.

Amber's Weekend. Amber had been dating Jason all week. She had been thinking about their anniversary. It was going to be a big day for them. But when they finally got together, Amber's eyes lit up. She had a beautiful, romantic, romantic weekend together!

Return Policy. Nate was shopping for a new pair of jeans. He got a pair that were really cheap. But Nate noticed the return policy on them. It stated that the jeans could only be returned if there was an issue. Nate got rid of the new jeans immediately.

Dancing. Tina and her friend had always wanted to learn how to dance. They decided to join a local gym and study together. After a few weeks they practiced a few moves and went to dance classes. Tina's friend wasn't sure about how the dance moves worked and didn't want to try. She ended up dancing the whole time and Tina loved it.
Refusal. Anna was at a bar. They were having a drink. Suddenly, a man behind her got really loud. Anna started to walk away. Instead of walking away, she gave him a hug.

The Bank Job. My son-in-law is working at a bank. He does a lot of odd jobs. This one is particularly interesting for him. One day he told me he needed to get an interview. I am surprised but glad to hear he got it.

Christmas Tree. Sarah decided to get a tree for Christmas. She went to the store to find the perfect tree. She saw lots of beautiful ones. Sarah decided to make her own. Sarah bought the tree and put it in her house.

Ceramics Class. Mary was very shy and didn't know how to take art classes. Her friend Amy decided to take her to a ceramics class. Amy's mom and sister came along to help. The class was very fun and Mary really learned to like ceramics. Mary's friends always tell her how much she made a difference at that class.

Missed Bus. Ralph was on his way to the library when he got a stop on the way. He went into the library and sat down to read a book. Ralph noticed the library closed early. Ralph walked back to the bus stop with no books to get. Ralph missed the bus and had to ride the bus home.
Baseball game. My friend and I went to a baseball game. We had a baseball helmet on. We sat at home. A lady came and gave us hats. We had a good time and I gave a good hat.

Senator. John was a Democrat in the senate. He was running for president. He ran against the guy he thought was the next president. John won by a landslide. John was finally able to take over the senate.
Always late. Tommy was driving. He never made it to work on time. Tommy had to call in sick. He spent the next two days working extra hard. His boss liked his efforts.
Death. Joey was at a local restaurant. He ordered his food. The waitress came in. She noticed that his food was ruined. Joey had to pay for the food.

Trouble Cats. Sue had two cats. One of the cats was always barking and scratching at the other. One day, she put up a new fence at the end of her yard. The dogs were curious but couldn't go in the yard. Then Sue heard the barking of the other cat again.
Crying. Karen was having a hard time concentrating. She was trying to do her homework. Then she realized she was crying. Karen apologized. Then she was able to concentrate.

Cautious Taxi. A taxi was headed to my house. I didn't want it to hit anything or break a window. I jumped into the taxi and kept calm as the driver tried to drive by. When he got close, I told him I would not hit anything and was sure. We made it to my house on time, despite the taxi being stopped.

The Van. Allie was very interested in getting a new van. She went to the local dealership to check out the options. There were only 2 vans in the lot and she wanted one. Allie was excited to see what the prices were. To her delight, she saw the cheapest one was $100.

Gold digger. I was digging through my garage when I found a gold digger. I had to go to the police to tell them what I found. I called the gold digger's owner. They told me it had been stolen. I gave them the number and they never had him.

Parasailing. My family had a paragliding trip this summer. We rented a paragliding boat for the trip. At the dock we were able to rent a mini-paraglider. It was a very safe and pleasant experience. I can't wait to go back again next year!

Hockey Fight. I have been playing hockey for 5 years. I am on a team where I am the goalie. The team was playing an exhibition game. The goalie got into a fight with some of the other players. I ended up getting suspended for three games.

Snow Storm. My family and I were going for a walk in the woods one night. It was pouring snow and snowing. We had to hide in the house as we walked to the store. We decided to just walk to a neighbor's house and chill out. We had a great time, and had a lot of fun.

Expert Boxer. The man walked to his seat. He was going to be a boxer for his school. The teacher told him he would make great. He started working on his boxing skills. He ended up beating the teacher on his first round.
Book. My parents wanted me to read a book. I decided to do so anyway. I read a book about dinosaurs. I got an A+ on the test. I learned to read books.

Hound Control. Mary had an adopted dog who got into a lot of trouble. She was nervous that the dog would be a problem. Mary got a new dog. She was confident that the new dog would help with the situation. But when she got the new dog she was very worried.

Loud Party. Last night my son invited me over to his house. He invited the entire family to come over for a party. My wife's friends had all agreed to come. My son was a bit nervous about what to bring. I ended up making a pizza with all the other family members.

The First Pay. A group of friends were going to a concert. Their goal was to make extra money at the show. They bought tickets. They purchased a bunch of popcorn. They got there early to get some food before the concert.

Free Samples. Amy and Kim were very excited to go to the movies. Amy was taking free samples and she really wanted to get a soda. When they got there, Amy was really excited and wanted to drink her soda. Her friend got in the way of her and they ended up fighting. Now they're stuck waiting for the soda.

Fun day at the Carnival. A lot of kids were having fun at the carnival. They were playing on the rides and playing in the water. A little girl named Annie was having a terrible day. She was having a terrible time and her dad told her to be calm. The little girl calmed down and continued having a good time.
Drinking. Gina went to the store. She bought some juice. She went home. She was thirsty. She decided to drink some water.

STAR TESTING. It was the year 2000 and my daughter was a junior in high school. I was trying to figure out what to do to prepare her for school. I started to think about the Star Wars series. I researched what I could do to help prepare her. Then I went to the toy store and purchased a small Star Wars action figure.

Friend. The friend told her that he didn't want to go to prom. She told him that he could go as she was a single woman. He agreed to go and she was sad. The friend was so sad that she cried. They never saw each other again after that.

Dead end job. Tom was hired as a secretary at a local fast food restaurant. The next day, Tom got a call from the manager. He asked why Tom didn't show up for work that day. Tom explained that he was very busy, so he could not come. The manager told him that he was fired for being late to work.

Movies. Barry needed to get movies on the DVD. He went to the store and picked out a few. He went into the front room and ordered them. They arrived and Barry went home. He turned on his DVD player and began to watch the movie.

Pool Party. Jenny decided to bring a few friends to the pool party. The friends all agreed to come with Jenny to the pool. The friends went to the pool. They were very happy. The friends left the pool to go home.

Try It Now. Spencer went to the doctor for a routine check up. He was told the test results were negative. They were going to have to send him home to be monitored for the rest of the week. Spencer called his dad to tell him the news. He had passed the test and is now out of the hospital!

Misery. It was Halloween night and Julie needed a costume. She did not have the money to buy one. She decided to make one herself. Her cousin helped her and helped her put it together. Then she got to wear it.

Valentine's Surprise. Valentine's Day is almost here. We went to Target for a good deal on a bunch of gifts. The man behind the counter was so good that I bought lots of gifts. The woman next to me made a huge mess. I ended up taking the woman home because it was such a mess.

Lost Girl. Lisa's daughter, Lucy, was playing outside when her dad walked in. Lucy was so happy, she jumped for joy. She took off running and ran home with her dad. She found her dad by the side of the road. The two hugged and smiled together as they went home.

Vivian Cuts her Hair. Vivian is in her 80s. She wants to be able to cut her hair long. She decides she should cut her hair short. She decides she does not want to be a grown woman anymore. Vivian does not cut her hair for the rest of her life.

Bar. Kelly wanted to have a barber for Christmas. She went to the local barber shop and had the barber shave her hair. Kelly was shocked to see that it was incredibly painful. She decided to not shave her hair anymore for Christmas. When she got home she was sad that she did not get a barber.

Facebook Drama. Karen was upset about something on Facebook. Her friends and family did not like what she had posted. She sent them pictures of themselves crying. Her friends told her she was being mean. But Karen knew better and deleted the pictures anyway.

Steak Sandwich. Bob was at the local steak restaurant. He had a burger with mustard and onions. He tried to put it on to make it extra juicy. A steak stuck in the patty and it started to burn. Bob had to throw it out.

Goog. Kate needed to find a job. She looked for a job with no one hiring. She searched online for jobs that are not going to be. Kate went to a website where a list of companies was available. Kate found a job with Goog.

calming nerves. My mom was having a big day for her birthday. She was celebrating her grandmas first birthday. When she got to the table my mom looked at me and smiled. She said there was nothing more to celebrate. She took a break and went home.

Lucretia Packs A Lunch. Lucretia was at lunch with a group of friends. Her friend decided she needed to bring some lunch and she asked her for one. Lucretia got up, picked up her bag and walked around the table. Lucretia ate the lunch and was pleased. She found her friend had left an empty bowl.

Turning Point. The year was 2015. My favorite artist had just released his album. I thought he was the most amazing artist ever. I tried to watch his tour but no one even bothered me. Then one day I heard his new album and I cried.

UUA. I was in the Army for 3 years. I was assigned to a unit stationed in Korea. In Korea, I met a young man named Tae. We became fast friends and got married. Today I live in Korea, and Tae is now my husband.

Ants. The family was sitting around a campfire. Suddenly a loud noise rang out. They looked down and saw something flying through their tent. It was a giant caterpillar. The family ran outside to hide.

Reverse Psychology. Gina always wanted to find out why her dog liked to play with toys. She read all the books and articles about toys for dogs. She wanted to go to the local pet store to see what her dog was looking for. There, Gina was very happy to see a pink pink toy for her dog. Gina had finally found out why her dog liked toys.

You'd Think They'd Require a Commercial License. Tommy decided he wanted to be a lawyer. He wrote a letter to his mother in order to get a license. His mother got angry. She demanded that he get a commercial license. Tommy did not listen to her and continued to be a lawyer.
Tyler gets hacked. Tyler is on his way home. He gets caught in a robbery. His wallet is stolen. Tyler gets locked up. He never gets back home.

Financial Issues. Lily had a huge debt load. She had to take care of it all. She was also on food stamps. So when her husband died she wasn't able to get the help she needed. She decided she should get an annuity instead.

Hide and Seek. My daughter's boyfriend told her to hide in his car. The man opened the back door to a neighbor's house. He was looking for a burglar. He started making loud noises and trying to take the keys from me. My daughter got scared and ran away.

Fault. Jenna was going to pick up her kids from school. She was supposed to do it in ten minutes. She had a huge car problem and did not know what to do. She finally called a tow truck. Luckily they arrived within ten minutes.

Torn Jeans. Jane always had trouble walking down the street. One day her mom had to go to the store and get some jeans. Jane went to the store and bought a pair of jeans. Jane sat on the couch in the house all day to watch TV. After that Jane decided to go back to wearing old jeans.
Horror Movies. I went to a horror movie in my neighborhood. I tried to get a scare. All of my friends were terrified. So we had to settle for watching a comedy. I don't watch horror movies anymore.
Stray Cat. Tom's cat ran away. Tom searched all over the house. Tom couldn't find it. Tom had to throw it in the backyard. Tom never found it again.

No Vacation. Mandy was feeling bored with her school day. She decided she would skip her lunch break to go outside and play. She had fun playing for hours. At the end of the day, she felt very happy. Mandy was happy to be going home to spend time with her family.
Cherry Pie. Tom had just eaten his first pie. It was a cherry pie. Tom loved the taste of the pie. Tom tried a few more pies later that day. It was hard work but Tom was satisfied.

Follower. I was watching my favorite football team. I got really close to them on the bench. Then I noticed their quarterback pass the ball to a teammate. The quarterback threw it to the wide receiver. His touchdown gave the team their first lead of the game.

Zoe Speaks. Zoe loved talking to people. She decided that she wanted to speak to her grandmother. She talked to her grandma, and she had a lot of fun. Zoe was very happy when her grandmother spoke to her. Zoe was happy that her grandma made her smile.
Baby. Sally was pregnant. She didn't want to give it a chance. She made sure everything was ready. When it was time to give birth, it was a surprise. She screamed and cried.

The Lake. Jenna wanted to go swimming. She decided to go out on the lake. She sat by the shore and waited for the waves. She saw a large wave come over the shore. She decided she would swim back home if the waves didn't.

Porch Swing. Sally was on a picnic with her family. They were eating a bunch of food. Suddenly, they heard a crack and thought they heard someone run. Everyone realized what had happened. They all ran outside to see a porthole in the bushes.
first beer. Ricky went to buy a beer. The man behind him tried to give him one. The man gave him a sip. Ricky was annoyed. So he told him to be a better customer.

The Box. I was sitting in a park on a day with the sun. I heard a noise from behind me. I looked up and saw my dad playing some sort of game. Suddenly he ran over to me, holding my arm. I fell and my dad laughed hysterically, waving me home.

Losing Streak. Randy was a really good quarterback. He could throw the ball all over the place. The last three games Randy threw the ball just once. Randy was able to hit the game winning drive. He was able to lead the team to victory.

Sad On Easter. There was a huge family Easter Parade that was going to take place. Every family had their favorite Easter basket. I was so excited to go along with my sister's. We ended up being the only one in the parade with no basket. It was embarrassing and I didn't like to go to that parade.
Football Fever. Timmy had a football game coming up. He got out of bed early and put his gear on. Timmy ran down to the field. He ran out and jumped for the ball. Timmy scored a touchdown!

Flowers. Lucy wanted to have a garden. She went to her mom to get a list of flowers she wanted. Her mom said it would take a lot of work to get everything done. Finally the garden was done. Lucy loved her new garden.

Fast and too Furious. I was really excited to watch Fast and Furious this summer. I really wanted to like the movie. But it was so fast and it ended up being really bad. It reminded me of when the original movie was released. I was not thrilled with the movie.
Not Tired. Jim was a heavy smoker. He tried to quit. After a few months, he still wasn't feeling better. He started to go to sleep every night. Jim started to wake up more tired than before.
red dress. Lana really wanted to wear a red dress. She knew what she wanted. But then she got the red dress on sale. Lana went to the store. And ended up buying a pink dress.

Stale Cereal. Susie was at the grocery store. She looked at her cereal for the first time. It had a sticker on it saying it was frozen. She decided to take the jar and throw it away. Instead, she put it in a bag to get more of it.

Cookie Sale. There was a cookie sale at a local store. Every time someone would buy some they got a freebie. This time they gave away five of the cookies for free. Everyone had a lot of fun. I got to go eat a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
New Show. Kelley was a very popular teen idol. She really wanted to get her own show. She started to go on auditions. Her first auditions made her nervous. Kelley couldn't wait for her next one.

Workout. Betsy is always looking for ways to lose weight. She decides to go to the gym to start working out. Betsy walks into the gym and everyone starts moving. Her first workout feels great. Betsy is much healthier and happier from her new workout routine.

Valentine's Brownies. Kelly and her girlfriend decided to eat chocolate brownies for Valentine's Day. Kelly was excited and excited to make them. Unfortunately Kelly left the brownies at home. Luckily her girlfriend caught her eating them in the living room. Kelly decided to never leave anything at home again.

A Dozen Roses. I was on my way home from work when I noticed a large bouquet of roses on the street. The bouquet was quite large and I walked over to collect them. When I brought them home, I put them in a box and put the lid back on. I carefully opened the box and I realized there was only ten of them. I had bought a dozen roses and was very happy.

Expected Delivery. I drove to a yard sale for my friend. A few days earlier my house had fallen apart. I couldn't find the house anywhere. I drove to the yard sale hoping to find it. I went home and waited for two weeks for my house to be delivered.
Driving Lessons. I had to take driving lessons for my license. It was a long process. At first it was hard. I tried to get it all down. Eventually it was easy and fun.

Pokemon. Sally was a gamer who loved video games. She decided she would buy a game and play Pokemon on the Nintendo. Sally decided to start the game and loved the game so much. Sally was really enjoying the game. Sally was glad that she had bought a new video game.

Peanuts. Sandy and her brother had a peanut butter sandwich. They loved eating peanuts. Sandy's brother had a treat for Sandy. Sandy had to wait for her brother. He took all of her peanuts from her sandwich.

Lunch. It was lunch time at the restaurant. Lisa was seated. It was an hour past her favorite time. Lisa decided to try to do something else to make it last. She ordered an Italian meal and it wasn't good.

Moving Day. I was moving to a new job tomorrow. I'm having to be out late for work today. I decided to move to the basement to the apartment below. The house is far away so I had to take a long road trip to get to my new place. It took 2 hours for me to get there so I'm really glad I moved.

Cheer. Sally was in high school. One day, her cheer squad got together and practiced. The next year, Sally was the captain of the cheer team. She got to meet a lot of new friends. Sally's new friends loved her for her leadership.

Bay. Dana wanted to take her boyfriend on a trip. They decided to take a small boat across the bay. She took him on the boat and they were going to see the city. As they were about to go on a small boat, they noticed an angry woman. She was holding a big metal bar and had been hitting Dana.

The Brother. I met a young black man when I graduated college. We became fast friends after he told me a few jokes. He never laughed at me back and I made fun of him often. One day while hanging out, he told me something really mean. He was referring to my son and said my son is racist.
Too short. Tim wanted to impress his girlfriend with a dress. He dressed up with some friends. But his girlfriend wasn't impressed. She thought the dress was too short. And she told him to cut it!
Sam Catches a Fish. Sam got a new pet. His new pet was a tiny fish. Sam was trying to catch it. Sam caught the fish. He had a wonderful time catching it.

street ball. My friends and I were sitting around in the park one day. We were playing street ball and I accidentally hit my brother. He got very angry and yelled at me for being mean. I decided to tell him to stop yelling at me. It ended up making him stop talking to me.

Music Software. The man loved to listen to music all day. The man's music was too noisy in his room. He found a way to add some sound. He placed his music in a big box. Now the man can no longer be noisy!

The list. Jared's grandmother had a very short list of things she wanted for Christmas. Jared was very anxious that she would not be able to get the toys he wanted. Jared decided that he would start collecting toys from the list. He began picking through the toys for toys. Jared had a beautiful list of gifts for Christmas!

Desktop Christmas Trees. Yesterday I went to the library for Christmas trees. I was surprised to see so many trees in there. I went home and got all of them in. I realized that they all looked very similar. I had a wonderful Christmas!

Garrett's Basketball Journey. Garrett went to a school where his dad plays basketball. At first, Garrett was nervous about playing. But he played well in the first game. When he went to play in the second game, he was very nervous. Now, Garrett is very happy that he joined the basketball team.

Family dinner. My wife went to the store to buy dinner. While shopping she bought a bottle of wine. When she brought the wine home, she put the bottle in the fridge. The night passed and my wife was sad. The next day, my wife saw her wine had been ruined.

River Bank. When I was very young, my family lived in a small city in rural Georgia. My aunt, my cousins, and I went to a small creek on the riverbank. We sat under the water and drank some water while enjoying the creek. We also made several small friends. We returned home, ready for more adventures.

Knife Safety. Jenny was at her kitchen table when a little girl pushed her over. She picked up a metal object and threw it at her. The girl dropped her knife and broke it. Jenny ran outside and called for her parents. She tried to pick up the knife and hit her.

The Rally. Tanya was planning a birthday party for her grandkids. She had always wanted to hold a big rally at their house. Tanya was excited to have a huge party for them. The first day of the rally was filled with chaos and swearing. Tanya was so excited to have a fun day.
Too Big. It was too big for him. The teacher told him to sit down. He had to get up and go outside. He could not. He had to sit in his chair.

The Olives. Caleb's mother, Joan, would never buy him a fresh olives. The day she did buy him a bag of olives, they were covered in holes. He asked Joan why and she told him they'd never be fresh. Caleb was heartbroken when Joan said she wanted to go on vacation. On the way back to the store, the olives were ripe and delicious.

Santa. The holidays were always exciting for me. I would always go out of my way to get gifts. But one Christmas, Santa was nowhere to be found. I couldn't believe it, I wasn't expecting this. So when I finally got home, I was sad and upset.

The camping trip. Amber went camping with her family. She was a little nervous because they were new to the area. When she got there, she was scared but excited to see the animals. She really enjoyed the experience. Her parents said they would have a lot of fun this time.
Bad food. Amy loved sushi. She decided to go to a sushi restaurant. She sat down with a sushi rolls. Amy realized that they were gross. Amy was disgusted.

Too Old To Go. Nancy was watching her baby sister play. They both had just gotten up from the nursery. Their baby had crawled into her sister's crib. They were too old to go. Nancy couldn't wait to tell her sister she was not allowed in.
Fried Chicken. Kelly was walking her dog. She saw a dog eating a chicken. She ran over and gave the dog some chicken. The dog didn't mind. The dog kept eating.

Steve and His Cats. Steve's wife wanted him to have a pet for their annual trip. They went to the pet store to look for a pet. They found a cat with lots of room and a name Steve. Steve named the cat Steve and they went home. Steve and the cat spent the whole trip together.

Retirement fund. I am on an online retirement account. I get about $200 every month from it. Today I did not make any money. I decided to put it towards a retirement account. The money went straight to my account.

Trash in the Closet. Kelly has a trash can under her bed. The trash can is dirty. Yesterday Kelly took her dog inside the house. The dog started licking at the trash can. Kelly had to throw the trash can away and clean it.

The Lollipop. Allie was at a party and she needed a new lollipop. She had forgotten she had left it out. Allie went into the kitchen to look around. There was nothing else to see. Allie was sad that she would have to go back.

afloat. Ethan was flying a plane in Alaska. The plane went into a storm. Suddenly the plane flew to the right and started to hit a mountain. He screamed but no one could hear him. Ethan was so nervous he couldn't move.

Home Run. Jim was at home with his girlfriend. His girlfriend wanted to watch some baseball. Jim told his girlfriend he wanted to go to the park. His girlfriend agreed. He hit a home run as he walked out of the clubhouse.

Bend To My Metal Will. I was waiting for the bus and the conductor gave me a stop sign. I was driving at an unsafe speed. As I reached the stop, I lost control. I crashed into a pole and it was severely injured. I never wanted to go into the country again.
Taco Tuesday. Today I went to Taco Tuesday. I got my fix. It was all fast food and hot dogs. I was happy with the food. It was worth it.
Dishes. John took the family to dinner. He had a salad bar and a pasta. After dinner, the kids were getting ready for bed. They made a mess with all of their plates. They finally took a nap.
Delivering the baby. I went to see my baby girl. Her name was Abigail. We went to the doctor's office. After the check up, I gave birth. The doctor delivered my baby girl.

Band. A group of musicians decided to form a band. They played their first gig last Tuesday. Everyone was excited to see the band. They were very nervous because they were new. They got a lot of good feedback from the band.

The Bar. Mary was sitting at a bar in New York. She liked drinking and she wanted a drink. She went to a local joint and ordered a beer. She drank the beer and decided she wanted another. Mary was so happy she ordered a second one.

Hail Mary. Bill went to his high school football game. Bill did not know the score. A Hail Mary pass was thrown for touchdown. Bill ran down the field to celebrate. Bill ran for a touchdown and was the winning touchdown.

Beauty and The Beast. Molly had a lot of children and had them grown up. One day, she had a very long discussion about her children. She said that she and her kids never talked to each other. Then she said that it was always about the same old stories and gossip. The children were upset and did not like her anymore.

Child support. Lacy was getting tired of being on child support payments. She had to file for a divorce and was tired of being broke. She applied for a parenting support plan. The judge approved the plan. Lacy was glad she had the option.

The Baseball Game. Barry was going to go to the baseball game. His friend John was excited. Barry's friends were ready to go. They went to the field and prepared for the game. Barry's friends won the game.

It Was Supposed To Be Their Apartment, Not Just His. John and Jake lived in the same apartment. John was angry that his apartment was supposed to be John's. One day John went in the hallway and saw Jake standing alone. He called Jake to apologize. Jake promised to live by John's rules and never speak to john again.

Winter Storm. In October there was a snow storm in North Carolina. A lot of cars were stranded in the snow. We got a job to clear the road and make it safe. We were glad to have been able to help. It was the best thing to happen to our community in that time.

Into the abyss. Allie's teacher was walking to class. She spotted her little sister holding her hand in the corner. Suddenly her teacher dropped into the abyss. Allie was scared and started to cry. Her teacher looked up at her, smiled and gave her a hug.

Christmas Problems. Every Christmas my son and I have trouble talking to anyone. His mother has been having trouble keeping him calm and quiet. We try everything to calm him down but nothing works. One day my son finally admitted he was unhappy with himself. He began to get better and happy from then on.

Putting the Cat Down. The dog had been barking for hours. He was running in circles, barking every time he saw a cat. He was so hungry that he didn't want to eat at the table. The cat was standing in his way. He stood back and waited for the dog to eat his food.
The Brown Bag. Sarah was at a party. She heard someone talking about a brown bag. She decided to go find it. She was surprised to find a box in the corner. She opened it up and took it home.

Pig Eye. I woke up to the sound of a pig on the side of my bedroom window. I peeked down the window and saw a pig eating my neighbor's cat. It was about a month old, but was very hungry. When I got outside I was horrified that I had injured the cat. The pig went away without incident, but I will be careful not to feed it again.

Baking. Kia was excited to bake for the first time. She put the box on the counter and began to put ingredients. She was so excited and wanted to surprise her child!Her child ate the first cake she baked!Kia then poured in the rest of the batter and began baking.
Tacos. I took my husband to taco truck one day. We ordered a few tacos. We left the taco stand and went inside. We ordered our food and went back inside. We had a great time.
Lorraine Makes her Bed. Lorraine is tired. She decides to make a bed. She puts pillows over it. She then makes the bed. Lorraine is happy with her bed.

Timmy Loves to Dance. Timmy loved dancing. He decided to go to the dance school to learn how to dance. The first day of class, Timmy danced with his mom. They danced for hours and danced to music all day. When he was finished, Timmy felt very accomplished.
Over Sleepy. Ava was taking care of her little boy. She had gone to bed early. Ava was exhausted by the time her son woke up. She fell asleep and went to sleep again. When she woke up she got an A.

The Cheeseburger addict. Kathy was a cheeseburger addict. She had just tried a burger for the first time. She was extremely excited to try more. Her friend encouraged her to try the rest. But Kathy was disappointed when the burgers she was given were terrible.
Grapes. Tom wanted to drink wine with dinner. Tom wanted some fresh grape juice. He tried some grape juice. The juice tasted funny. Tom decided to buy some fresh grape juice.
The Work Event. Ricky was at work. He was meeting his boss. He decided to have a work event to show off his skills. The boss called Ricky's name. Ricky walked over and gave him a hug.

Food network star. Boris had recently signed up for the Food Network. He decided to cook up some amazing meals for them. He cooked up some amazing dishes for them. It was a huge hit for them. Boris became a great host.

Sleazy. Sally got home from school one day and there was a paper on the TV. She was going to watch the news. She sat there for a few minutes and then walked out the door. As she got to her car she saw an empty parking spot. She ended up dropping her kids off at school so she had nothing to watch.
The new show. Jenna wanted to make her own new show. She got a crew together. They set out in their car. Jenna filmed the show. The show was broadcast to all of their friends.

Sue's Trip. Sue was on a trip to her parents home. They took her to see a lot of things. Sue loved everything about her parents. She took her parents home and enjoyed a lot. She loved her parents and they were the best.
The Broken Toy Box. Tim had a toy box. The box had some really fun things. Tim decided to take it outside to play in. He opened it up to find a lot of toys. He could barely hold all of them all!

Pizza Place. Ava wanted to give the kids something special. She picked up the kids a pizza place. She drove down to their local pizza place. She took the kids to the pizza place and let them play with the animals. Afterwards, the kids returned home with a pizza.

Missing. Liza was trying to make the first day of school. Her mother would not let her start early. One day she was missing her favorite sweater. Her mom called the police. She found Liza and brought her home to school.

Signing up for a library card. Tom wanted to save money on his utility bills. He decided to sign up for a library card. Tom went to the library to get a card. He used his card to use his library card. He saved over 20 dollars over the summer.

Stripped down. Seth had a lot of chores to do. He was wearing a shirt that was very loose. It wasn't the right color. It didn't fit in the washing machine. Seth had to clean it up and was disappointed.

The Big Win. In 2013, the Boston Celtics beat the Atlanta Hawks in a playoff game. Their players were feeling good about themselves and went into the locker room. They had made the playoffs in each of the last four years. The players then went to a dinner with their coach. He made them feel very special because of their championship win.
A visit to Grandma. Jenny was feeling lonely. She decided to visit her grandma. When she got there she was sad because she didn't know her grandad. He showed up in her room. They talked for hours.

Always do Your Homework. Lacey was doing research for an assignment in her science class. The teacher didn't like Lacey's grade. Lacey was embarrassed, and she had to study. After two hours of studying, Lacey got an A. Lacey felt much better.

Picking a Movie. I was browsing at the movie theater. I wanted to see a new movie. I couldn't decide what to pick. I asked around to see what other people thought was good. It ended up being a good pick.

Video Games. Kia had a lot of fun playing video games last night. Her family all spent a lot of time playing. She got into an argument with her parents about some video games. She eventually had enough and kicked them out. Kia's parents had to take her home because she was so mad.

Lost remote. One day I went on a trip to a different town. My girlfriend was lost in the woods. I heard her call her dad but the phone was dead. My girlfriend's dad said he had just called her. We had to turn on our radio and talk on speakerphone.

Itching. There was something burning in my mouth. I decided to try and clean the burn with soap and water. It took a while, but I eventually managed to get the fire out. I then tried to brush it off and put a band-aid on it. Luckily, it went away and I started to feel better.

Bracketology. Samantha was practicing her bracketology skills. She tried to get a winning team for the upcoming game. She asked her sister for her suggestion. Then she practiced for hours. She finally came up with a good team!

The Man Across the Street. Jeff walked across the street and noticed a man sitting down. He asked if he is okay, and the man just smiled. Jeff was happy to see a homeless man walking around. He asked if the man was going to ask for money or not. The homeless man asked what Jeff was doing for money, and Jeff laughed.

Catfishing. Linda went to the mall to buy clothes. She went to a lot of stores looking for the right clothes. But she couldn't find anything that she liked. Finally she decided to buy clothes from the thrift store. She picked the same clothes for several days.

Unlucky Good-Luck Charm. Tim was on his way to the store. He was driving with his car when a driver came up to him. They started to talk. Tim's luck started to change. Tim had a good time on his way to the store.

Lion. My son was 12 years old when he started getting into trouble. He would steal from his neighbors. One day he was caught and taken to jail. He was paroled a few months later and lived a very happy life. Now, his wife is pregnant with their first child.

Homeless Heart. One day, i was on the bus. I saw a homeless man next to me. He told me that he was in need of money and food. He told me that if i would give him my food, he would take care of me. I smiled, but i decided to leave.

Moving Up. Kate was nervous to move up her school. She was so nervous that she wanted to be there as soon as possible. She went to classes and felt that she had the material ready. She studied for a month and practiced every day. After a few weeks she was on her way up to her new school!

Comedian Carrie. Carrie was always funny. She was a huge talent. In 2004 she won a contest for a role in a sitcom. When she got the role, she had a lot of trouble. Carrie wasn't able to perform at the show.

Big Day. When I was 14, my mother's birthday was today. We were excited to celebrate. My sister was in the bathroom and I sat by her. I took off my shoes and socks and laid down on the bed. She took out a bottle of champagne and I drank it.

Carlos Meets a Girl. Carlos was a pretty kid with a great imagination. He decided he wanted to see a movie and check it out. Carlos found an all ages movie on DVD and got to the theater. Olson Opposes Octopus. Olson was very excited for the upcoming shrimp dinner. On the way to the restaurant, he noticed a huge octopus on the road. Olson decided to eat the octopus anyway. As he ate the octopus, he almost passed out!Olson then regretted eating the octopus.
Used Music Store. I went to the music store. I was looking for some tunes. I couldn't find anything I wanted. I was very frustrated. The guy at the counter gave me some tunes.

Fred. Fred was working at his job as a clerk. He did not feel like it and had to be around a lot of customers. One day he got some sudden inspiration. He asked his boss what kind of customers he should try to attract. Fred became one of the busiest customers at his employer.

Sad story. When I was a child I loved listening to music. Every day I would go to the store to listen to different kinds of music. When I was 12 I got really sick. Repaying the Pastor. Tim was a pastor. He had a large congregation. Tim didn't pay attention to his flock. One day Tim's congregation stopped meeting. The congregation began crying and Tim was left broke.

Writer. Amy started her own small business. She started a small online magazine, and got the idea for a TV show. Amy wrote a short script and hired a writer to read it for her. Amy was so nervous and worried she couldn't finish the script. After a few weeks Amy had completed the script and was proud of herself.
The Lost Dog. Tom was walking home. He saw a dog outside. Tom told the dog to wait in his yard. The dog ran away. Tom chased after the dog.
Birds. Anna and her family were in Florida. They went for a week exploring. Anna got bored. She decided to see what animals were in the woods. There were birds all around!
The Bridge. A man was driving home in his car. He suddenly saw a sign for a bridge in his neighborhood. He decided to cross it. The traffic was light. The driver was able to get home.

Sam Walks the Dog. Sam was out in the middle of the night. He heard a noise coming from a dark alley. He ran toward the alley and saw a dog. He grabbed his dog and took him home. Sam has a new dog and is much happier with it.

Bad sale. My husband and I bought a couple of books last week. We looked online for cheap prices online. Unfortunately, the books were sold out. We had to pick up a few books at a store. We felt bad about that.

theater. Amber wanted to go to the theater for the first time. She was excited and excited. She checked in at the theater and saw all her favorite shows. Amber loved her first movie of the night. She will always remember the theater with the popcorn and candy.

Sandy's Allergies. Sandy had a peanut allergy. When she was walking around her town, she had very bad allergies. She was allergic to peanuts. She kept getting sick from peanuts. Luckily she was able to get a shot to alleviate her symptoms.

Hospital Visit. Janice went to the hospital to see a doctor. When she arrived, she looked through the doctor's notes. It wasn't long before she was in a room with a lot of other people. Janice was able to find a doctor who was visiting the kids. Janice was glad to get to see them all.

Fear Returns. Mary was driving her family to a movie. As she approached the theater, she saw a group of boys. They asked Mary if they could use her car to take them to the movie. Mary refused and they drove off the road. When they got to the theater, they took their seats and waited.

Drawing Class. I wanted to draw with my cousin who was new to the hobby. I went to my friend's house to take a drawing class. I was so nervous I couldn't sleep. I spent all night drawing. I was so proud that I had a good class.

Carmen Plays Softball. Carmen was a basketball player. She wanted to be a softball player. Carmen signed up for the women's softball team. She played all year, even though she was a big softball player. Carmen eventually joined the team and is now the team captain.

Jersey. The day of his first day of school, Jake was excited. He was going to meet his favorite school girl and fall in love!He grabbed his bag and drove home. He sat and talked to his crush in the living room. He went back to his house and prepared for the day.

The Blog. Alicia and her husband were both bloggers. They posted lots of pictures of themselves at the beach. One day Alicia started getting very lazy. She became very bored with her posts. Alicia decided to quit her blog and go home.

Retiring from Teaching. The teacher started teaching high school last week. She was asked to retire by a student who was not a student. The teacher thought about it and felt it was worth the cost of her salary. She was able to retire for the better part of two years. She is proud of what she accomplished during that time.

Getting Dressed. I bought a new dress and needed to do a lot of shopping. I searched the mall for all the appropriate dresses. When I finally found the one I wanted, I bought it. Then, I headed to my favorite dressing boutique. I could hardly wait to get dressed when I got back to the hotel.
Tom's Drink. Tom was in a bar. He wanted to go get some drink. Tom went to the store. He found a bottle of rum. Tom bought the rum at the store.
Gertrude Slips. Gertrude was at her first dance. She was going to the dance with her boyfriend, but he had to be there. She slipped and fell. She sprained her ankle. Gertrude is now in a cast.

Lost Job. Timmy worked at the local paper. He was working a lot of hours. He was so tired he couldn't even sleep. He decided to take a day off and go for a walk. The day turned into a week of really bad work.
No Spare. Tim always wanted to play a video game. He had several thousand dollars. He took it to a friends house. He bought a few games. He went back home and enjoyed playing.

John Runs Errands. John decided he was going to run errands. He wanted to buy a nice new pair of jeans. However, he saw a nice pair of pants for only $20 at the store. John decided he would try to find the $20 pants elsewhere. John got in an accident and ended up buying jeans from the store.

Catching Burglars. All the sudden a thief entered the store. He got in the front door and was not stopped. The shopkeeper called the police. He found a man and arrested him. The shopkeeper was so happy because they caught the thief.
Arra. Arra lived in the basement. She was the only one who made the noise. One day, a friend went upstairs. Arra decided to play a game with the friend. The friend was grounded for a week.

job interview. I applied for a job interview at my local news station. My application was put on hold for weeks. I went back to look at my application but they said no. I searched online and found another job offer. I finally found the position and got the job.

The chicken baby. Jan was feeding her young chicken. The baby wouldn't stop crying. Jan decided to give it some water. The baby immediately got better. Jan put the chicken in the bowl and started to feed.

Lary's Lasagna. Lary was hungry after eating a big lunch. He ordered his lasagna to be prepared for him at the restaurant. When he got home the lasagna was on the table. Lary checked the ingredients and they said it was his. Lary decided to make lasagna the next day.
First day of classes. Gabe was so excited for his first day of school. The class was getting very crowded. Gabe was very nervous. He was trying so hard. He ended up having a great time.
Bankrupt. Kate was out of money. She couldn't pay her bills. She started to cry. Her mother called the bank. Kate got the money back.

Home Away. Mary was a young woman who couldn't wait to buy a house. She had to have a home of her own and was looking for a good one. She went to the post office to look around. After a while she found the perfect home and paid the $5000 deposit. Mary was happy she could finally buy a home.

Fixing the Sink. It was my sister in law's first birthday. My wife came out from behind the sofa. I looked at her, horrified. She was soaking wet and covered in grime. I hurried to help her get up and away.

Too Close. Jared was trying to watch a movie. He kept falling asleep on the couch. His friend kept hitting him on the head while they were trying to watch the movie. Eventually his friend realized that Jared was going to sleep. They all ended up going to bed early.
The Fire. Tom was working with the fire department. He put out a fire. The fire was really bad. He had to bring it under control. Tom was proud to be an Emergency Services officer.

Biographies. Miles had always wanted to be an athlete. One day he decided to try out for high school basketball. He was very nervous because he did not know a thing about it. After a day of practice, he was very proud of himself. He became more confident with each game and he won first place.

The busy day. It was a very busy day at the family home. Mara had packed up all of her things for her upcoming wedding. She was very nervous as she was about her wedding day. When she got to the front of the room, everyone cheered her on. Mara was so happy to finally be able to have her wedding.
Knife. Sam was walking down the street. Suddenly, Sam bumped into a kid with a knife. The kid stabbed Sam in the hand. The boy ran away. Sam was so scared, he ran home and locked the door.
Last to the party. Last week was the last time I went to the party. It was an amazing experience. I had so much fun. I got to meet all of my friends. It was so fun.
Bill's Bar. Bill had just gotten his license. He was so excited. He took his friends out to his bar. They ordered lots of drinks. Bill had a lot of fun.

Dead Mouse. The family of three lived in a house with two cats. Each cat was fed a lot of kitten treats. When one cat got very sick, they gave him a little kitten food. As it got too sick to go anywhere, they put a cat food in his bowl. The cat didn't want to eat the food, but ate the cat food anyways.

The Fishing Pole. I had a big fishing pole at the yard. I tried to keep the pole in the water all day. As I was throwing it back and forth, it tipped over. All of the plastic on the pole spilled everywhere. I had to bring a pole back and it was fixed.

sick day. I woke up very early in the morning. I went outside to enjoy the cool breeze. I quickly realized my dog was not in the house. When I went back inside I saw he had eaten a big bite of chicken. I felt sick but did not care and went back outside.

The Race. Kelly was a very good gymnast. She was competing in the Olympics for the first time. She trained everyday for weeks on end. When she was ready to go the race she felt very prepared. Kelly ended up winning the competition!

In The Mitt. Kelsey was walking home from work. She noticed that her car was moving so fast. She got out of the car and noticed something was wrong. She noticed something was missing from her car. Kelsey called the police and they said they found the missing item.
Coffee. I woke up late. I was out drinking late. I had a cup of coffee. My body felt like it had been jogged. I felt full and I sat down.
The bird flies. Jane heard a loud noise. She quickly ran outside. She found a bird in the bush. She shot it dead. Jane now feels guilty about killing the bird.
Knee. I had a knee injury. It was very painful. I decided to get braces. I needed to get some pain medicine for the injury. My knees never let me go far.
Sandwich. I wanted a sandwich. I looked all over the store. I didn't find any. Finally, I bought one. It was delicious.

Rapper. Sylvia was trying to decide between rap and dance music. She could only choose one of them. Sylvia decided on rap. But she couldn't get her friends to like rap. Sylvia was heartbroken at the end of the day.

On set. Greta was filming an episode of her show. She was on set with the cast and crew. She started talking to one of her cast members. She saw that they were acting in a scene. Greta started to cry and leave.

Gusty Winds. Gusty winds came through the area on Sunday. They were blowing in the opposite direction from where we live. The wind caused flooding in our driveway. I went inside to get some water but couldn't get it out. We now have to evacuate because we won't be safe.

Ted buys a car. Ted is starting to get older. He can no longer afford a car. Ted decides to try and make some money online. He makes an effort and buys a car. Ted is much happier than he would have been if he was not older.

Kids Chair. When I was very little I had a toy chair. I was always in the middle of the room. One day I was playing in my chair in class. The teacher saw and told me to sit down. I did so and found my chair in the back of the room.

The Bowling Match. Jim was bowling in his friend's class. Jim hit a perfect backhand and lost. Jim was frustrated by his performance. Jim told his friend that the bowling match was tied. Jim's friend took him to the store and bought a new one.
The Park at Night. Mary was having a party. It was getting dark. She thought her house would be completely dark. She went to the park and the night was still dark. Mary had the best party ever.

Fireworks. My parents took me to the firework display. My brother had taken his friend with him. My brother was at first afraid and didn't want to see fireworks. Then his friend took the firework and lit them. Then my brother got scared and had fun.

Magic Kingdom. Mary was in the Magic Kingdom when she was at a small event. She had been to the first two buildings there. She was excited when the new building opened. It was a new ride with a twist. It was called the Flying Circus.

Gym Rats. Tim was trying out for the football team. He got on the bench. He was a little nervous about getting picked. Then the other players called his name. Tim was excited because he was ready to do well.
McDonalds. Remy was shopping for food in the grocery store. While searching, he saw McDonalds. The store was full of people in suits. They all wanted a meal. Remy took his order, and felt satisfied.

The Twins. John and Jane went to the movies and had a great time. They met up and went into the theater to see a movie. Jane found out that she was the only one with twins. The woman was surprised and embarrassed. They all laughed and decided to move on to the next movie.

A lost day. Devin was working out. He was working out with some friends. Suddenly, he felt his body start to hurt. He thought he was injured and rushed to the emergency room. It turned out he sprained his ankle.
My phone plan. I was on a bad contract. It kept me from getting the service I wanted. I went to the phone store. They tried to fix it. They had me pay extra for the service.

Southie. A girl named Tina was playing Southie. She was a very good player but it was time to learn. One day her teacher showed up for a class. She was playing Southie with her friend Amy. All of the sudden Tina went on a shooting streak and Tina won.
Fleas. We bought a new puppy. I put him on my new bed. He got fleas. It made me very sick. We put him down.

Good Signs. One day I got a call from my son. He had recently gotten a new dog. He wanted me to take it to a good place to play. I was really happy for him. I decided to let him bring the dog to my house.
Nick. Nick's dad had a new girlfriend. They were dating for a few months. Nick was worried that they'd break up. But Nick's dad wasn't jealous. Eventually they married.

The Puppy. There was a big crowd in the park. I was looking around for something to play with. Suddenly I saw a puppy running towards me. He started to run very fast. I quickly ran away and ran after the puppy.
Baseball. Gloria is trying to play baseball. She gets scared to try. The instructor tries to calm her down. She gets more calm after. Gloria feels better.

Sandals. My sister and I were walking along our neighborhood. Suddenly I saw a small girl running away. She was running barefoot through the grass. I decided to join her and ask her to stop. She was very frightened and told me to just ignore her.

Waffles. Gina's husband was in charge of cooking waffles. She didn't know how to cook them, so she asked his friend to help. The friend was very experienced and helped Gina out. After a few batches, Gina felt she had perfected the waffles. Gina ended up making a lot of waffles for her family and friends.
Rockstar. I had my own rock star gig in 1997. I had never played the guitar in my life. I sang all of the songs and had fun. I really enjoyed it. I had a great time.

Frozen in Place. I was on vacation in Italy. I decided to get into a frozen yogurt ice cream shop. After opening my purchase, I got very thirsty. I immediately turned the machine on and started drinking it. It was much too cold to drink.

Lost Bird. Kya saw an amazing parakeet in a nest outside of her house. It looked at her and saw her sister coming. Kya got out of the house and took it to the pet store. When she got home, she put the parakeet in her baby. The parakeet had become her little sister.

Facebook isn't for everyone. I decided to make some friends on Facebook. I posted a photo of me with a bottle of scotch. The person commented that it was disgusting. They made fun of me. It made me feel ashamed for sharing it.

Let's Party!. Lisa and her friends decided to have a fun party. They packed their drinks and food. Lisa brought the party to the party. Everyone got drunk and had a good time. Lisa's friends thought it was a great idea!

A Robbery. Tom was at his friend's house. There was a man on the street asking for money. Tom didn't have much and he didn't have much money. He put his friend's stuff in the trunk of his car. When he got back, Tom was arrested and spent time in jail.

Sandals. Lily had always wanted to try running in sandals. But she was scared she would hurt herself. She practiced running in sandals often. Finally she could run in sandals!Lily was glad she had tried sandals.

Chain. It was a lazy Saturday night. All of the sudden a chain broke out of my garage. I went inside and found a brand new bicycle. I took it home and decided to try it. It did a great job, I decided to buy it.

Great lunch. Sammy wanted to be a better chef. He wanted to make a special meal for his customers. Sammy found the ingredients to cook his special lunch. He made a special dish and took it to a lunch special. All the customers liked his special lunch.
Green Hair. I had green hair for my high school prom. All of the friends were shocked when they saw my hair. They said I looked like a child. I was confused. I never knew my hair was such a mess.

Parting Ways. Tim's mom gave him a surprise for his birthday. She told him that he would be taking a break from work. Tim wanted to take the day off but he was too scared. He tried calling but no one answered. Finally, he decided to leave his job at work and go out alone.

Slip and Slide. I had just gotten a new job. My boss made us work out in the hall. He said I would have to slide and ride my own roller coaster. I said it was silly and refused to go on it. He was mad and told me not to tell anyone I wanted one.

The Tumor. Kelly got a new teddy bear. She was a little worried about it because she didn't want to have to explain it. Kelly's doctor gave her a few pills. After the pills she took a huge pill with chocolate in it. When Kelly took it, she gasped because the pills had cancer in them.
Tom Gets A Dog. Tom was a single dad with two kids. One day he had an idea. He bought a dog. Tom's dog was a great pet. Tom now has two great dogs!
The Home. The Smiths are looking for a new home. Their only choice is a condo. They're also looking at townhouses. So far they've chosen to stay in their condo. The Smiths are very happy.

Kicked Out. Cathy was the secretary at an office that has no women. This was because Cathy is a trans woman and her boss is not. Cathy asked her boss for an exception. The boss refused to grant one. The manager said the office is hiring women.

Philly Cheese Steak Sub. Mimi was trying to decide what to do for dinner tonight. She went to her local restaurant and ordered a chicken sub. She ordered the chicken sub and the dressing. She put it in a big bowl of ice cream and filled it with cheese. She was going to make a big sandwich on it.
Havoc. I decided to play volleyball at the mall. My team was very good at the game. Everyone on the team ran with the ball. I was the only one left on the court. When I fell, my ball cracked.

The Interview. Nate was invited to a meeting with his boss. He was excited because he had been doing great. He had even made a few sales!But the meeting was being held at 2:00 am. He decided to skip the meeting and focus on his new job.

Firework. Allie wanted to play with fireworks in the sky. Her dad asked her if she wanted to. Allie said she didn't want to. So her dad said she could go on a boat and watch them. Allie was happy she decided to go on the boat.

The Perfect Haircut. Alexie was a beautiful girl with pretty blond hair. She went to the salon to get her hair cut. She felt confident and stylishly. Alexie waited patiently for the stylist to come out. Alexie was the best cut she ever had!

Doug cleans house. Doug works very hard in his home to clean. Doug spends hours scrubbing the house. He puts all the dirty items in a trash bag. He drives to the garage to put the items away. When he returns home Doug is happy with the clean house.

Corey Deals with his Stress. Corey has always felt too stressed out. He decides to go to a local doctor for some help. When the doctor tells him he is in for an appointment, Corey is excited. Corey finds out he has an ear infection. He feels much better now that he is able to handle his stress better.

Car Buying. My wife wanted a new car. So we picked the best car we could find. We then went to the dealership and saw the car we wanted. The salesman made a good deal on the car. Now we have a new car.

Fishing trip. My girlfriend and I went to the lake yesterday. We did not fish and we did not go in the water. I went to grab my fishing pole and went to pick up some bait. After a few minutes, I felt some water near my pole. I immediately put on my gloves and my girlfriend picked up the line.
Pharmacy. Mila was a teenager. She hated going to the pharmacy. There were so many options. The only problem was she did not know what she wanted. Eventually she discovered an online pharmacy.

Pickpocket. Logan went out of his way to stay safe. He had a special identification card he wore throughout the day. One day while at the grocery store he tried to steal something. He got into a car with his card, which got swiped. It was then he realized how dangerous it could be.

The Move Out. Jenna moved out of her parents house. She was unhappy and unhappy with her home. She started to make new friends in new areas. They helped her deal with her problems. Jenna made it home with a new place to call home.
Angela. Angela wanted to go out in the town. The town was full of old buildings. Her mother asked her to go to the library. Angela walked to the library. At the library, Angela found a few books.

Bull Ride. Sarah had to ride her bull on a roller coaster. She was nervous, but excited. Sarah didn't want to get hurt but needed to go. She didn't want to be pushed so she got off. Sarah was glad she rode on the ride.
Declined. Tom was a very poor boy. He did not want to go to school. He asked his dad to give him money. His dad told him no. Tom just decided to keep living at home.

Ride Along. The family was riding along a lake shore in Minnesota. They had a great time, relaxing on the dock until it was time to leave. The father asked if the kids were ready.
