He was right to know they had only gotten in their water-foam swimsuits. They all ran across the water to the car and were off.

Stainless. One day the mailman dropped an envelope in the mailbox. It contained some of his bills. The paper was stained a dark blue. The man who dropped it called the police. The police came and picked it up, but the man never found his bill.

The Nickname. Nick was a great ballerina. He was always getting great attention from girls. One day he got a call from his girlfriend. She was going out with a boy and he was very nice. Nick was so proud of himself that night.

John's Social Life. John decided to start following his new favorite blog. He set his profile to facebook, but still hadn't seen the likes. He saw several posts from his old friend that talked about him. He logged on to facebook and saw the likes were already there. He began following his old friends instead.

Jailbird. I was walking home from a club when I saw a bird. I stopped and waited for it to fly away. But as soon as I went back home, I spotted a second bird. I screamed and ran home. But when I got home, I found that the third bird was a real thief!

Swap Shop. Kate and her brother love to go to swap meets. The two of them went to the Swap Shop last Friday. They bought a variety of electronics for different items. Kate was really enjoying her time with her brother. She had a great time at her swap meet.

Stuck in traffic. Sandra was driving to work. Suddenly a car made a hard right turn. Sandra had to change lanes. Thankfully there was no one in the wrong lane. She was able to get back on the road safely.

Chicken and Waffles. Kim had chicken dinner last night. Her friend asked her what was on her plate. Kim explained she was using all of her money. Then she added a big bowl of waffles with chicken. It was a hit with everyone at the table.
Pizza. Allie was out with her friends. They decided to have pizza. Allie's friend couldn't make it. So Allie asked her if she could borrow her pizza. Allie made a sandwich for her friend.

The lake storm. Mary woke up to the sound of a big waterfall. Mary rushed downstairs and got dressed. Mary went to the lake and watched the waterfall. Mary decided that she would take a little water from the lake. Mary had a great day when she was outside.

99. Nancy has decided to run a marathon. She does not have enough money for a marathon. Nancy's friend wants to donate money. Nancy realizes she has to buy food. Nancy decides to sell all of her food at the store.
Caught stealing. Kate was cleaning up a table at her house. She was trying to clean up all the food she left in it. She was making food for a party. One of her plates was gone. Kate called the cops.

The Phone Call. Anna was trying to call her boyfriend. All of a sudden, he turned the phone off. She panicked, thinking he was trying to call someone else. He insisted he was just trying to talk to her. It turned out she was calling the wrong person.

Interview. Alicia was nervous about her interview for a role in a new movie. She had rehearsed in her house all day. When the day of the interview came she felt extremely nervous. All she could think was, what if I don't make the cut?However, the moment the director asked her out, she couldn't contain her excitement.

Retirement. I've been feeling very sad and depressed lately. Last week I decided to go to the doctor. She found out that I have a heart condition. She told me that I need to find a retirement home. I feel so guilty, so I'm going to go now.

Across the Alley. Mitch was playing in his backyard. His parents told him he should go home. He was so scared of the kids that he ran all the way across the street. They told him to run back to his room. Mitch ran back into his house to hide from his parents.
Dishonest. I was at a friend's house yesterday. She bought me a plate of food. I brought the plate to her. She didn't notice that it was empty. I was embarrassed.
The Shoes. Jenny was shopping in the mall. She saw a new pair of shoes. She tried them on. It fit perfectly. Jenny wore the shoes for a few hours.

Dehydrated. I was in the hospital for several days. It was hard to leave my room. I wanted to see my family but my doctor said I would be fine. He recommended I drink water to hydrate myself. I did so and luckily I felt fine.
Building the shed. My dad worked in a shed. He would build the shed. I wanted to build something special. I tried to do it. I ended up just building the treehouse.
Handing out candy. Jenna was at the arcade with her friends. They were playing a card game. They decided to hand out candy. The kids ate all the candy they got. They went home happy.

The Pasta Dinner. Lilly was cooking spaghetti for her family. She had been making the dish over the past couple weeks. She finally threw in the ingredients and the pot. Everything turned out great. Lilly had a delicious pasta dinner.
Music. My brother and I were listening to music in our living room. Suddenly my brother began to cry. I heard him yelling. I grabbed him and yelled at him. He got up and walked away.

Tutoring Help. Kim and her mom are both doing well in school. Kim's dad doesn't see any reason to tutor her. She is really frustrated. She decided to take his advice and apply for tutoring. Her dad gives her a call to schedule the next time they meet.

Dave needs a new car. Dave is stuck with an old car. He has no money to buy a new one. He decides to ask around for an old car. He ends up buying an old car with a high price. Dave is happy with his decision.
Local Ad. Mike was at a club. He asked someone if they wanted a new t-shirt. They said no. Mike was very upset. He got up and walked away.

Too Much Soda. Derek had a big date for a couple of weeks. He decided he would not drink soda during the date. At the date, Derek began to drink water. While driving home, his breath tasted terrible. After the date, Derek drank a cup of water.

Dog. Derek was playing with his puppy. His puppy started to bark at Derek. Derek thought he could get away with it. The puppy got closer and eventually got a bite on his neck. Derek had to be rushed to the hospital.

Doves cry. The dog was in the middle of a big flock of daffodils. It was time for a nap. Suddenly, the dog noticed something flying past her. It was a pretty yellow dove!It dove for the daffodil with excitement!

The Earthquake. Trevor was on a road trip in South Africa. He was driving through the bush. Suddenly a big earthquake happened. It started shaking the whole country. Trevor decided to just stay home for the day.
The musical student. Lance wanted to be a musician. He practiced every day at home. He got very good at playing the drums. One day he was asked to play in a musical. Lance was very happy to do so.

Rita chokes. Rita was trying to make some chocolate milk. Her mom was on a plane for Europe. She wanted to bring Rita some milk. However, when Rita went to shake the milk, she chugged it. Rita lost control of the milk, which caused her to choke.

Large Ego. The other day my friend was talking about my ego. I thought he was being mean. I told him I needed a larger ego. He laughed and said he was only being playful. I then explained that I didn't care because I was playing with my friends.
Beer run. The girls were going to a party. It was going to be a beer run. They made sure to drink plenty of water. They ran out of water and ran back in. They went home thirsty.
Tom the Drunk. Tom was a nice guy. He drank beer everyday. One day he got into a fight with someone. His friends got drunk. Tom was fired and never showed up to work again.
Tim gets in Shape. Tim was at the gym. He wanted to look leaner. He did some weights and went to the mirror. He put on the new clothes. Tim looked much better than ever.
Criticized. I walked into a science lab. I had a paper due. But I got yelled at. Then I got a phone call. And I learned that I was the target of a hate crime.

Stale Dale. My father had a car accident one day. He broke his leg in that accident. His leg was in a cast, and had not been properly stitched. His leg was completely healed by then. He is now an alcoholic and is unable to work.

Bathrobe. John was a photographer for a large company. One morning he was taking photos. John noticed the light reflected off of the curtain. John realized that the camera lens was broken. John called a repairman and they fixed his lens for free.

Teaching Lesson. Logan and Beth were always having trouble. They would fight all the time over things. One day they decided to start doing things together. Together they would play hide and seek and snuggle. Logan and Beth now have a lot more fun together!

seeing eye dog. Dan's dog always gets frustrated with Dan's antics. One day Dan decided to try seeing eye dog. Dan got his dog to put his dog on his back to be watched. He then watched as the dog went and hit another dog. Dan knew his dog was a very hard working dog.
Fire. I went home to my daughter to sleep. It started to smoke the house. I opened the windows and curtains. Then I got out of bed. I looked out and my house was on fire!

Veteran's Day. Jenny was a veteran and loved seeing her city. Her boyfriend had been a Navy Marine for two Year's. Jenny went downtown to see her city. When she walked in the streets, there were a lot of vets in their homes. Jenny couldn't wait to see more of them this year.
Hitting the curb. John is driving home from work. He notices a car in the road. John speeds through the intersection. The car in the road swerves and hits John. John loses control and hits the curb.

Travel to Hawaii. I wanted to go to Hawaii for a week. I went to Hawaii and found the closest airport. I went and got my passport and began my flight. I went back to the airport and sat in the terminal waiting. My plane finally came to Hawaii.

Married. Jenny has always been single and never wanted to marry. Finally one day Jenny has had enough and decides to get married. On the day of the wedding Jenny falls in love and has a baby. The baby is happy and Jenny is very proud. Jenny vows to never let her boyfriend marry again and lives happily ever after.

Turtle Violation. I went to my mother's house to play in the pool. I had a small turtle by my mother's side. I wanted to take a bite out of it when I stepped on the edge. My mother saw what I was doing and screamed. I was grounded for a month.

My Best friend Andy and Larry. Andy and Larry are my best friends. They live in a small town in MA. They like to go to restaurants downtown. They eat together and go to a bowling alley one day. Now I feel lucky to know them.

Bad purchase. My sister in law works at a department store. She was in the store purchasing a new dress. She was walking down the aisle with the dress. As she was putting it in the cart, a bag fell off. The dress was ripped.

Sisters Fighting. It was Amy's first day of elementary school. She was terrified to go to the nurse's office. She began to cry. She felt as though she was in a nightmare. Amy was relieved to find out that she was going to be okay.
Stomach. Gina's family went on a trip to New York. They were very tired. Gina began to have stomach cramps. She was forced to cancel the trip. Gina didn't know why she had to cancel.

Spot the Dog. Marianna was on a walk with her dog. Suddenly, she saw a small hole in the sidewalk. Her dog had walked into the hole. She went home and cleaned it up. Marianna was glad she had cleaned up the hole.

Nasty Attitude. Dianne is a very ugly girl. She does not like to take her clothes off. She decides to shave her legs. The shaving does not look so good after a while. Dianne is not going to have a nice haircut.

Lake. Kelly was in the country with her family. They were driving to the lake to visit the family. It was very hot outside, so they were driving in the rain. When the temperature dropped, they drove out into the rain. Finally, the sun came out, and the family relaxed at the lake.

Bagpipe. Ben wanted to become a musician. His dad took him to a band concert. At the concert, Ben played his bagpipe. He was very proud of himself. Ben and his dad decided to buy a new guitar instead.
NYC. Jane had just moved to NYC. She was very nervous to move. One night at a bar, she decided to have a date. She got a great deal on a cab. She was so excited to see her friends!

Italian Food. We decided to take a break from our busy schedule and eat Italian food. After ordering from several options, we had the first dish we ordered. It was an omelette, the perfect combination of cheesy and delicious. We all ordered pizza, and it was a great meal. We decided to stop back each night for Italian food.

Skydiver. Tom loved flying in airplanes. He decided to try to become a sky diver. He tried many times before he got his license. Unfortunately, his instructor thought Tom had no idea what he was talking about. Tom learned to appreciate the flying and became a great diver.

Trapped Dog. One day there was a big storm and we saw a big cat in the trees. I noticed that the cat's front paws were all ripped off. I tried to calm the cat down but it wouldn't stop. I called 911 and the cops arrived. It turned out that the cat was trapped in the tree and we had to pull it out.

Broken Television. Susie was going out to dinner. All the sudden she noticed something weird. It was completely out of order. She called her mother to see what was wrong. Her mother told her that her television was broken.

Hamsters for All. Allie and her husband were taking their five year old granddaughter to visit. They brought a couple hamsters into their living room for her. She went in and immediately jumped up on her favorite beanbag chair. She was happy to have some friends around with her. They had a great time that night and she felt a lot better.

Not what expected. A little girl started crying for me. She said she would cry if my boyfriend was there. We sat outside the school and talked for half an hour. When we got home we went to dinner and talked to my mom. Her husband and I didn't tell anyone that we broke up.

Friend. I met a boy in high school. He liked my friend and wanted to be my friend. One day, he told me that I should marry my friend. When I talked to him, he said that he didn't like me and I wanted him. I think that I should be happy if I don't marry my friend.
Shane goes to a play. Shane was bored and he saw a play for free. He decided to check it out. Shane enjoyed the play. Shane went back and was much happier.

Chalky. My mother told me that I was very pale. She had read in a recipe for the book that there was chalky. I wanted to know how to make my own chalky. I followed the recipe and made a few batches. After I finished the recipe I found out that it had a problem that I couldn't fix.

Jorge Cooks Beans. Jorge was tired of his long commute. He decided to give beans to his son. They ate them without even turning on the stove. The beans were delicious!Jorge went home with beans he never knew he'd had.

Jack buys car accessories. Jack was looking to buy a new car. He looked up the options online. He decided to go to the dealership. He went in and got everything done. Jack bought a car with all the accessories he needed.

Not Mad. Kate wanted to get the dog for her family. They were in the garage and saw a cat. She saw it was a boy who needed a treat. The cat got down on all fours and sat down. Kate could not contain her smile when she saw it was her dog.

Pool. My friend Lisa has a pool and has hired some people. She wants to hire her family for their pool. My family told her she cannot use the pool. Lisa is unhappy because she doesn't have money to pay them. My family decided to hire a janitor and I went to a local pool.

Cheap Move. The kids were playing in the garage. They were throwing paint everywhere. All the paint got all over the ground. They decided to use the trash can as a wall. They got rid of the paint and made a nice place to hide.

Safe and Sound. Amy was getting ready for her first dance recital. The music was really loud, but her dancing was great. Amy thought she might lose her balance on stage. Her instructor stood between Amy and the music. The instructor had her get her balance back, and Amy smiled at herself.

News. John was feeling very depressed at work. He called a few people to see if they wanted to help him. After meeting with several people, John felt better. He told a friend about his depressed feelings. His friend helped John feel better by offering to take his depression medicine.

Broken Arm. I played soccer with a boy who was my teammate. He hit me hard in the head with a basketball. The concussion was very bad for a month. I had a concussion and a broken arm. Since I did not play football again, I was sad that I lost my chance.

Mary's Kitten. Mary's cat, Sally, is a small cat. One day while Sally was playing in the garage, the cat's paw got stuck. Sally's cat would not come out of the garage to retrieve her paw. Mary was sad that Sally had to leave her. One day Sally's cat was found in the back yard and her paw was free!

The Mattress. Kia's dog woke her up one night and barked. She was worried because it wasn't very loud. But her dog snored loudly. So Kia decided to buy a new mattress. She gave it to the dog and it slept soundly.

Tooth. Amy got a tooth. Amy hated to go to the dentist. The dentist told her it would take at least three weeks. Amy went in the dentist office after waiting. Amy waited to see if it would take for at least a week.

Migraine. When I went to the doctor the first thing he asked me was migraines. I told him that I had had two migraines in the past week. He looked at me and said I was crazy and I didn't want to take medicine. He prescribed me a few medicine and told me to take it. After taking a few pills and feeling better, I started sleeping better.

RMV. Last week we went to the RMV. I was very impressed with the security system. I saw a car that looked a lot like my old car. The owner of the car told us they lost their license for some reason. We were told they may get another one soon.

Basketball Rim. Sam had just bought a basketball rim. But he was disappointed because it would not go in the cabinet. So he bought some cardboard and tape to hold it in place. But when it was time to put it away, the tape was broken. Sam had to return it to the store for repair.

To much of a good thing. It was the summer of 2013. We were all at the beach. The surf was so rough that we had to wear lifejackets. We had been going to a bunch of parties that were near the beach. We were just soaking wet from the heat.

Rotten Luck. Ricky had a terrible day at work. He made a lot of bad choices. After the day, his boss came into his office. He told Ricky that he is fired. Ricky's boss asked him why he made so many mistakes.

Lilly has a stroke. Lilly is driving home from work. She is about to turn into an intersection. She hits a deer and goes flying off the road. Her friend tells her that she has a stroke. Lilly feels bad for her and takes her to the hospital.
The Gym. Nate was starting a new school. He was going to have a new school. He couldn't wait to start!He tried out for all of the teams. He was the first player picked!

Reading. Dan was in an advanced state of depression. He didn't know what to do about it. He had been feeling anxious all day. Dan read a lot, and became much more alert. Dan had gained some good self esteem and was relieved.
An unexpected accident. Jill was at a grocery store. She bought a few groceries. Suddenly she got a shock. A man jumped out of a window. Jill immediately ran out and screamed.
Selfish People. Tom was working at the grocery store. He was helping the cashier place a new bag. He felt guilty about doing it. Afterward, he felt guilty even more. He realized he was just lazy.

Ruined Mailbox. Sandy was opening her mailbox. She noticed an old label on one of the packages. The label said to put the package back if it was lost. Sandy went to the box and put it in her dresser. Sandy was happy she hadn't opened the package.

Bleach Cap Search. Yesterday, my friend took me to the store to purchase a new bleach cap. I had not used bleach in a few days so I decided to try them. I went back to my locker, picked up the bleach cap, and brought it in. I left the bleach on the counter and realized that there was water. I called the store to get the bleach out of the water.

grocery. Spencer and Jane were both looking for groceries. They found the best one for each of them. Jane couldn't find the most expensive one and ended up leaving. She called her husband and he helped her find the other. Then they made an agreement on the prices and they went home.

Padding. Kelly was installing a new wall on the floor. The installation was going well. When she took a look at the wall she realized it was too high. She tried it with two different sizes and none of them fit. Kelly had to call her plumber.

mike walker. Mike started walking with his dad on the school playground. His dad was not feeling well so they decided to walk together. Mike noticed his dad was tired but still smiling. He decided to try and get in his dad's mood. His dad told him he was just trying to get Mike's attention.
Movie rip off. Tom was at a movie. They had a lot of action. The movie was going to be awful. Tom got in line. They told him the movie had to be rips off.

Tyler saves the baby. Tyler's wife was very depressed. She had been having trouble with her marriage. All the sudden a baby started crying in her arms. She ran to her husband and he took care of it. Her husband gave her a hug and they both felt better.

My Mom Lost Her Job Today. Last night my mom got a call about her job. When she called she was told she was out for the weekend. She decided to rush to work in a hurry. When she got to work she realized they had changed her shifts. She had to be gone for the weekend.

Wedding Party. Dana and her fiance wanted to have a big wedding. They both really wanted to make a big splash!At the reception, everyone was invited to the cake shop. Dana tried a cake and was disappointed in her results. After several failed attempts, she decided to just pick a chocolate cake instead.

Lost Deal. A new company was selling watches. They were very expensive and required special training. The company told me they were going to keep me in the loop. It was an incredibly good deal so I went ahead and signed up. I'm glad to have my money back.

Lansing Trip. My wife and I decided to take a trip to Lansing. We went downtown to the Museum of Science. When we left, we got to see the Michigan Zoo. We drove to a nearby restaurant to order take out. We then took a flight home and had a great day.
Easter Bunny. Tom's Easter Bunny was sick. He had been ill for days. Tom wanted a special Easter Bunny. Tom bought one. Tom was happy to receive his special Easter Bunny.
Bad Dessert. The restaurant was closed. Joe went home. He decided to eat something else. He realized the dessert he had just eaten was bad. He couldn't eat anymore of it.
Mike Fixes His Overheating PC. Mike is doing an exam. He realizes his computer is overheating. Mike fixes his computer to fix his overheating. Now the laptop is cooler. Mike does better on his exams.

Loud music. Allie was driving home one night. She was listening to music when the car started to rumble. The car slammed on her brakes and the noise woke her up. She pulled over and turned down the music. It made the whole house ring louder and everyone had to wake up.

Tax Evasion. I got the tax slip from the post office. When I went to see it I realized that I had not signed it. The clerk said that my address was correct. I asked him to prove this but he said that it wasn't. The clerk didn't even bother to look at the tax slip.

New York Vacation. Tom was vacationing with his girlfriend. They got lost on a trip to New York. Tom was extremely sad that they didn't see their friends. Tom decided to just have fun and look for them. Tom enjoyed spending time with his girlfriend.

College Applications. I have been applying to college for the past 3 years. My friends and family are always trying to figure out what I do. I'm really afraid my grades will not improve because of all my applications. I have always said I do not have a good GPA because of that. I decided this year to take on the responsibility of finding a new college.

Generations. Every year, my family goes to Mexico to visit my grandma. On our trip, they told us about the stories of their lives. We got to see the ruins of a lost civilization in Mexico. My family was amazed at how different their lives were back then. I always look forward to the future stories we'll tell each other.
Vegas. Sam was on a road trip. He was going to Las Vegas. Sam got to his hotel. Sam checked into his hotel. Sam forgot to pack his food in the hotel and ate his food.
No Hesitation. Toby and Mary were on the basketball court. Toby dribbled the ball to Mary. Mary's sister ran towards the hoop. Mary dropped her ball. Mary dribbled back at Toby.

Car in Parking Garage. Carlin was driving around downtown. She saw a garage full of cars on a street corner. Carlin decided to stop her car. The cars were all very old and broken down. Carlin stopped at the garage and bought a new car.

the song. Sara was listening to her favorite pop music. Her favorite song was Taylor Swift's    song. She tried to remember what song it was. She tried to skip it. Then she remembered to skip it again.

The move. The family moved from California to the Northeast. They took a boat ride out of San Diego to Boston. When they got to Boston, they looked around. They found a great spot. They went there with their new dog and got to sleep.
Coupon Clipping. Tanya went out of town. She forgot to get her receipt. She saw a coupon for a free trip for a month. Tanya saved up her coupons. She spent her savings on an expensive hotel room.

Online Shopping. Jodie is starting college soon and wants to save money. She decided to shop online to save money. Jodie ordered pizza from the pizza place she had never been to. She drove to the pizza place and paid. Jodie got free pizza for her college fees.
New Router. My son had a new router. He was going to try to use his internet. He used the router to browse the internet. All of a sudden he saw an error. He couldn't access the internet.
Firebug. Tim was working on a computer. He was working on a task. The computer was destroyed. He had to clean it up. Tim was glad to get his work done.
New handbag. Marlene needed a new handbag. Her current bag was no good. Marlene went to the local department store. She saw a cute, colorful bag. She bought the bag and it fits great.

Space Mountain. Tom was driving to the space mountain in space. It was a very crowded lot with lots of space stations. Tom got into an accident. He was seriously injured. Tom eventually was able to drive himself home.

Movies. Ralph loved watching movie after movie. He even found a new one to watch every night. He couldn't stand the clunky editing and was getting tired of it. Ralph tried going to the library to watch more movies. Now he enjoys watching movies more and loves to find new ones.

amnesia. Tom was playing with his cousins one day. Tom was playing with his cousins in the yard. Suddenly, his hands slipped off the table and onto his cousins. Tom realized that his cousins are deaf. Tom decided to let them play in the house.

Getting Ears Pierced. I am a musician who gets piercings at my ear. One day my wife told me to get my ears pierced. She got the scissors and had me put them in my ears. When I went out for coffee my wife noticed I had pierced ears. She called me the next day and told me how much I deserved it.

Total heat stroke. Nina had been in a heat stroke the night before. She was at her grandma's for a visit. While the grandmoms room was in the living room. Her grandmother put a blanket over Nina. The blankets cooled her down.

To the Beach. My kids are about to turn 3 years old. Their favorite thing to do is play in the sand. They like to splash and swim. Their favorite place to play is the beach. They love the beach and would love to have a play date there.

The Hair Band. Sally was playing with her hair band today. Sally decided she liked how it looked in the tub. She decided to try using it in her bathtub. Sally was worried she'd break her hair. But Sally was so relieved when it was over.

Army Recruit. Tom was really nervous about the upcoming Army Recruit School. He did a lot of recruiting on his own as he hadn't done one in years. He had worked very hard, and was ready to meet the recruiter. After getting his paperwork signed, Tom met the recruiter and told him everything. The recruiter was impressed with Tom's commitment and gave him his letter of acceptance!

Graphing Calculator. We needed a way to determine the gravity on an object. We had to figure out how much gravity a point on a planet would have. We looked at various equations, all of which worked. However, none of them worked with our gravity. It took us hours to figure out how to solve this problem.
Tail. Sarah always wanted a tail. She was afraid she'd look silly. Finally she found one. Sarah put it on for a day. It was amazing.

Road Trip. Tom and his family were at the airport. They were waiting for their flight to be picked up. Tom noticed his mom was very upset. His mom was driving Tom to pick up his family. When the family got off they didn't have to worry about Tom driving.

The Paper. Sam was a terrible reporter. He tried to get the local paper to run an article on her life. Sam wrote several stories on her life. The local paper ran the stories and ran them in front of all her friends. Sam was very proud of himself.

The old town visit. John had a visit with friends in the old town. When he got there he saw a lot of old people. They all talked about their past. John really enjoyed talking with them. He wanted to return for another visit.
In Trouble. John was in class. He heard a strange sound. John decided to turn the volume up. It made the noise worse. John was grounded for the rest of the day.

The Goat. Mary went to the garden to collect vegetables. She spotted a big goat by the roadside. The goat was still standing by the road. Mary pulled up beside the goat. Mary and the goat went on a ride through the neighborhood.
Ferns. John was in the woods. He saw a sign for a nice Fern forest. He decided to explore it. He climbed a branch to see what it was. He found a huge berry bush and ate a large piece.
Siblings. My sister and her friends took me to lunch. I was very hungry. After we ate, I saw my brother had a movie. I felt very sad about the movie. I decided to not see my brother again.

Rex Can't Sleep. Rex couldn't sleep after his friend threw a fit. He was running late to the party. Rex decided to go for a run. He did a few laps and then fell asleep. Rex woke up and realized he had a huge party to attend.

Camping. Sandy loved to camp on the beach. She even owned a campsite that she used for it. Sandy and her friends planned a camping trip for the summer. Sandy packed all her supplies into her car. When the kids were ready to go, Sandy was waiting for them.
The Game. Gina played a popular board game. She didn't like it. Gina went to the store and bought the game. Her daughter played the game with Gina. Gina was very happy.

The Pistol. The kids had a new toy. They played with it and fired off a few shots. Everyone cheered, and the teacher announced the game. She announced that the pistol was the new pistol. The kids were excited!

Leaf Collector. Jared was a gardener at his local park. He collected many beautiful flowers. When he was a man, he collected large amounts of them. One day, he realized the whole lot was useless. He began to plant fewer and fewer flowers as he passed.

Frank Finds a Friend. Frank always wanted to find a new friend. He decided to go to the library to browse the books. While there he discovered that there were many books on the floor. Frank got a book and picked out some friends he liked. They all made good friends and Frank decided to stay over at the library again.

Driving School. Alex was taking driving classes at his local high school. Alex learned a lot during his driving lessons. After his driving lessons Alex took the test to pass. Alex passed the driving test and got the assignment. Alex got to take driving classes for the first time.
Summer 1987. Tina went swimming in the ocean. It was the warmest summer she ever had. While she was swimming, something changed. There was a storm. She had to swim back to shore.

The Expensive Bill. Tim spent his days playing video games on his computer. His girlfriend was working as a secretary. Tim's laptop would often run out of memory. He'd spend the majority of his time on his computer playing games. The bills kept piling up and Tim started to worry.
Sanitary. Nora was moving to a new apartment. The whole house was filthy. She looked through the trash. She put in a fresh carpet and painted. Now the whole apartment is clean!

Wednesday Dinner. Lisa was visiting her uncle for the first time. Her uncle's family was eating at a fancy restaurant. Lisa had never eaten so much food. She told her uncle she wanted some of it. Her uncle was delighted when he tasted her meal.
The Letter. Diana was writing a letter. She got a letter in the mail. She wrote her mom a letter back. Her mom read the letter. She was very thankful for her thoughtful letter.
Fast Cars. Randy wanted to go fast. His mom gave him a toy car. He drove it all around. He loved it. He finally went fast.

Wedding Disaster. It was my wedding day. It was in the rain. I tried to cover it up as much as possible. It made the wedding feel even more awkward. My sister decided to come anyways and dress better.
The Rug. Mary was moving into her new home. She needed a new rug. Mary checked the internet for different prices. Mary finally found the perfect rug. Mary was thrilled with her new rug.

Hair Spray. Lisa was going to a salon with her family. When they got to the salon she looked in the mirror. She could not find the hair spray she had bought. Lisa was mad at herself because she didn't have her hair spray. She grabbed her hair spray and rushed out the door.

Jake Finds a Friend. Jake was out in the woods and didn't have a lot of friends. He decided to hike alone on the trails that he had seen. He didn't see any other hikers on the trail and made it home safely. When he woke up the next morning, Jake was in bed. Jake and a new friend had joined their ranks.

Writing a Song. My friend and I are writing a song together. I thought I'd write an upbeat, hopeful song. He thought it'd be too romantic and silly for me. It turned out to be a lot more upbeat than I thought!Now we're both happy that we wrote a song.

Sandwich Thief. I needed to make some extra money. I went to the grocery store to get some sandwich bread. I asked for some bread in a bag and was met with no bread. I took some bread out of the bag and went back to the store. The sandwich thief had already stolen bread from my store.

A bear spotted. Boris is walking in the forest. Suddenly, a bear starts coming towards him. He runs towards the bear. Boris is scared but he hides behind the bushes. The bear eats Boris and leaves him to starve.

Fun at the Park. Kate was at her favorite park with her friends. They had lunch in a restaurant. They talked for hours about the day. Finally, they all agreed to play a game of tag. It was fun and enjoyable.

David goes fishing. David went fishing with his dad. He caught a beautiful salmon. His dad brought the salmon home for David. David was amazed at how much the salmon had changed. He took home a small bag and enjoyed every moment of his trip.

The New Drone. Dana and her friends were having a great time flying their drone around town. They would land and take off and fly back down. One night they all were taking off when suddenly it crashed. Dana and her friends could barely make it out of the rubble. They all had to call 911 to get out safely.

Answered Prayer. One evening, I was praying with my sister. It was about our child's health. I said that my child had asthma and he needed medical attention. However, my sister refused to believe me. She insisted that I was lying.

One Store School Supplies. Tom was in college and needed a lot of supplies. Tom went to the school supplies store and browsed. He found all of the things he needed. Tom bought all of the supplies for his future projects. Tom was able to finish all of his projects after all of the supplies.

Clean Towels. Anna had a new dog and couldn't wait to take it for a walk. Anna had to buy new towels and had trouble deciding on one. Then her sister suggested they wash their own towels. Anna's dog liked the new towels a lot and they spent the night washing the rest. Anna's new dog slept better that night.

piercing. I have always wanted to be pierced. I am 27 years old. Recently, a friend told me that I would find a husband if I could get a job. I had no clue how to work out the situation. I ended up getting a job after months of searching.

No experience. I went to the dentist yesterday and saw my dentist. He put two screws into my teeth. After that, I had to wait for an appointment to get the dental work done. I was so mad I cried when he put the screw into my mouth. I really need to go to the dentist and ask him for help.

The costume party. Cindy and her friends were all invited to a costume party. They all agreed to go and do something fun. After checking into their hotel room, the girls were ready. They dressed up and headed to the party. It was a great time and they had a great time.

The Test. Jim wanted to pass his chemistry class. He went to the chemistry lab to prepare. When he took the test, he got a D. He got a D on the rest of the test. Jim learned that he had a chemistry problem.
Daughter to Work. My daughter was a little late for work today. She has a small exam to study for today. So she decided to go to the store. She got her supplies in her car. She drove to work.

Greedy Child. John was the worst child in his school. One day he was stealing the candy from the cupboards. His father saw him and confronted him. He took away the candy from John and kicked him out. John got so mad that he threw the cupboard window and it broke.

After Hours Capers. Gina had a very hard time at the end of the work day. Her boss asked her to work extra overtime. She was reluctant. She found it difficult to get up from her desk. Eventually she fell asleep.

Ruined Pants. Bethany was getting ready to go out for her first date. She noticed her white pants were a little small and they needed to be folded. She had to grab the pants to fold them. Bethany couldn't figure out how to do this without looking like a freak. Luckily, she managed to fold her pants anyways.

New Underwear. Ava was working out in her gym clothes. Her workout had gone on long and hard. Her new gym-friendly undergarments came on quickly. She was so excited that she started wearing them. Ava got compliments and lots of compliments as well!
Mildred Tries Out For Soccer. Mildred wanted to try out for soccer. She wanted to learn how to play. She signed up for lessons. She began practicing every day. Mildred made the team.

Flossing Pain. I started flossing very hard. I tried to be smooth and flossing didn't seem to help. After a week, the pain went away. I had been flossing too hard. I decided to use my flossing belt instead.

Dominick's Birthday. Dominick wanted to go to his birthday party. So he asked his friends what they would like. They all wanted pizza and cake. So he bought pizza and cake. Dominick's friends were happy to see him on his birthday.
Ice Cream. I needed to buy ice cream. I tried going to the grocery store. I ended up going to an ice cream parlor. I purchased some ice cream. I put it in the freezer for a couple hours.

A Wall of Burning Books. Kara took out a stack of books from her back room. She was moving them around and needed to stack them all. She realized that there were a few books that were still on the bookshelf. She decided that she was going to put the books on the floor. When she went out to her car she threw the books out of the car.

Biking Through a Puddle. Ruth's father was at work one day. He walked over to her and began to tell her stories. She became overwhelmed and had trouble staying focused. He began to tell her about his biking experience and she started to cry. Ruth decided to let go of her father and go home.

US Invades Iraq. America entered the Vietnam War in 1973. Soon America's military was stationed overseas. The American military was given the power to kidnap people, torture people, and do whatever they want. Now the government is threatening the lives of its own people to get it done. The US will be sending more troops into Iraq.

Story. Molly had her friends over for a movie night. She bought a bunch of popcorn for them to eat. They were watching a big horror movie that night. Suddenly Molly had a fear attack. She ended up cancelling the movie and never going out again.

Blankets. Amber wanted a little extra extra security. She wanted a new blanket to make it a little more secure. She went to the craft store and bought one. She bought a long pink blanket and bought a long purple one. The new blanket was a little more comfortable than the old one.
Envy. I was watching TV while my husband drove. I realized that I hated driving my car. I asked him if I could change it. He agreed. Then, he took me to the shop and changed it.

Old Bear. The family had always taken a bear for a walk. One day, a black bear was found running through their backyard. The bear was very angry and wanted to attack the family. But his mother came to save the bear and rescued it. The bear's owner took good care of it and they could always count on her again.

The Pool. Mary and Sally went to the beach. They had fun at the pool. When they left the beach, they both went to bed. Mary awoke and saw that she forgot her umbrella. She called her friend and asked where she left it.

Swinging. Shelby loved to learn to fly her two year old son. She bought him a swing and taught him how to swing it. She had to buy a second swing as her son had trouble walking. Her son had no trouble getting up from the swing. Shelby was very happy she had purchased a new swing.

A skiing accident. Jane was skiing in the mountains. She got hit by a speeding car. Jane's back was completely destroyed. Jane was rushed to the hospital for surgery. Thankfully she never had to go back there.

The Swan. It was spring time for our class, and I was nervous. All the children were wearing long pink dresses. I wore a little white shirt with a white bow. When I walked into the hall, I saw a little black kitten. My heart sank when I saw the little cat, because I didn't want to know it.

A Difficult Reading. Molly was sitting at her desk when her friend came over to talk to her. He asked what she was reading. She thought that he was being mean. She asked him to stop and he did, but then she realized that he was being kind. He was saying that she was a great reader.
Recital. I was in a symphony. The conductor was talking with the audience. He was making some announcements. Everyone started to raise their hands to make a noise. He got rid of the instruments.
The Grand Escape. The family had a big party. The kids had a lot of fun. They went inside the big house. It was amazing. It was the most fun they had all year.
Lost purse. I was walking home. My wife told me I had lost her purse. She had left it in the garage. She was gone. I called her the next day.

Lying. Nina had an old friend. She told him the truth about what happened with his car. He had to pay her a very handsome sum of money. But he insisted she lied and asked for more. She agreed and told everyone, including her friend.

Overgrowth. Aubrey was a naturalist and lived near a forest. She often saw large trees in the forest. One day she saw a large tree that was overgrown. Aubrey decided to get rid of the tree. She went out to get cut down the tree and put it in a storage shed.

The Driver's Test. Linda is in her junior year of high school. She wants to pass her driver's test. She has been studying for the last two months. On the day of the test, she does very well. Linda takes home the driver's test certificate.

Green Thumb. Kelly has always liked the green thumb thing. The one thing that kept her from loving it is that she couldn't stop chewing. The last time she chewed it on it got stuck in her gum. It had to be put in a bag so that it wouldn't fall out. She loved it that way.

Snake Escape. Tori was walking through the woods one day. She heard a noise coming from a dark spot. She looked closer and saw a snake. She tried to get away but it wouldn't move. Eventually she had to shoot it and its snake escaped into the woods.

Mandarin Chinese. I wanted to learn Chinese. I went to my grandma's house to learn. My grandma took me to Mandarin Chinese class. I learned everything I needed to know. I now can understand any language I can speak.

Devil's Paradise. There was a boy named Jim who loved to climb trees. He grew tall enough to stand on the top. One day, the boy fell from a tree and died. The coroner said the boy's body had been buried in a pile of leaves. Jim knew something had to be done about his death.

Broken Axle. Tom was driving down the road. He noticed his right foot had a bad bite. Tom decided to get an axle repair. The new axle was not the best in the shop. Tom had to call them and see if they could replace it.

Near Drowning. Bertram was swimming in his backyard pool. He had just swam for a little bit when he felt something slick on the bottom. Bertram looked under his towel. He saw some dark liquid being deposited in the pool. Bertram called the police to report a suspicious situation.

Too fast. Gina was walking in the mall one afternoon. She was on the second floor when she felt something hard. It was a rock and it was very hard!But she pushed it out and the rock slipped off her hand. She felt like she could never get used to walking on the floor.
Boo!. Jane wanted to go for a walk. She saw a sign saying "no dogs". Jane walked over to the sign. She saw the dogs were waiting. The dogs went inside Jane's house.

time capsule. Liz always wanted to collect old newspapers and magazines. One day she decided to read one. She was so excited to find all her favorite magazines. When she looked at her box she was amazed. Inside was all her favorite things!

Berry's Trick. Berry was at the grocery store with a bag full of berries. Berry noticed a small boy behind him. Berry asked the boy if he wanted to buy any berries. The boy refused Berry because he wanted to save money. Berry was so mad and got in a fight with the boy.
Car accident. John was driving down the road. Suddenly his car began to roll off of the road. He was scared. When he pulled into the hospital he was in a lot of pain. John ended up recovering.

Falling tree. Milly and her brother were going to the fair. Milly went first. She was in awe of the cherry trees that stood out in the park. At one point, she fell over the cherry tree. She came down on her hand and scraped her knee.

Special Delivery. The delivery boy was trying to get my package. It had broken when I put it in my car. I took the package to the post office. I waited a while for my package to arrive. I finally got my package at my house.

The Pie. One day a man named Mike loved pie. He wanted to have his own pie shop. He asked his mom to buy some pie pie and started a pie shop. It was a success and they made a lot of money. Mike had a new pie shop in his house.

Clean Room. One day, I found a big mess on the floor. I needed to clean all of it so I ran into the bathroom. It took a while but I finally got all of it clean. As a reward, I went to the laundry room to pick up all of the dirty clothes. Finally, I had a clean house.

The Race. The group of girls were on a long run. They were running very fast. They were going a little faster than they should have been. There was a great race coming up soon. They were determined to win the race!

Lifetime Puppy. My dog had always wanted to go on a long walk to the animal shelter. As an adult, we were able to purchase a puppy. My dog loves to walk and I love to play. She has a whole family now. We had a lot of fun during her entire life.

Bicycle Racing. Tommy was a little kid and always loved riding his bike. He would take it on his favorite trails to ride. He found an old bike and decided to get one for him. He was so excited to ride it, but it was so slow!Soon Tommy's legs hurt so he had to slow down a bit!

Free Samples. Mary wanted to try the sampler. She went to the store and bought a bag of samples. She was surprised to find a lot of interesting flavors in it. She enjoyed all of the samples. Mary was glad she had tried it.

Bike. One day I took my son to a bike store. There was a guy who sold bicycles. He would pay $1, 000 for a bicycle. We went and bought a bike with his money. We rode around the neighborhood with our new bike.

Don't make false promises. Jenna had to be on time for her flight. She decided to give up and change her mind. She was afraid of being late, she knew it wouldn't be the best choice. She went to the counter and told the flight attendant what she was going to do. The attendant didn't believe her and gave Jenna a ticket.

Wheeled. Amy loved the old Ford pickup truck. She would take it to the grocery store on the weekends. One day she realized she was going to get stuck in the street. She couldn't afford to call for help. Amy was stuck in the road for a whole day.
Secure System. Molly had a very big cat. She was afraid of it. Molly had to get a security system. The cat could attack her. Molly didn't want it to attack her.

Distracted. One day I was watching tv. And I suddenly got into a tizzy. I realized that I was distracted by some other show. So I got out of the TV. I had to return to the office to deal with this distraction.

Morbid reality. My mom was always sad when I was sick. It was usually because she was sick, but also because she was stressed. She hated to work because of it. Then she got sick and suddenly it all made sense. Now when she goes to the doctor she gets to feel less lonely.

Chemistry. My friend's daughter wanted to take her chemistry class. Her teacher recommended she get her chemistry test done. She studied for an hour. The day came and she got her chemistry test done. She was pleased to see she did very well.

The Football Star. Ethan worked in an office that was a football stadium. He was excited to go to the game that afternoon. When Ethan got there, the team had only one practice. Ethan and the team played a very close game. Ethan got a free ticket to the next game.

Flat. Randy was trying to learn how to knit with a needle. He needed to pick up a few stitches. But instead of picking up the stitches he kept picking up the yarn. Randy wound up with no stitches. He felt stupid because his entire arm was covered in yarn.

Lost Money. Karen loved her car, and the owner of the car kept putting it down. One day, he was on his way to his friend's house. At the gas station, he bought all the gas he needed. Karen got home, but there was nowhere to put the gas. Now her car was missing and she was mad.

Bad Start. Cathy was walking home from work one afternoon. As Cathy walked the dog ran into a crack. The dog got stuck in the crack and was stuck. Cathy tried to push the dog off of the crack. However, the dog bit her finger on the crack and cut her finger.

Mountain Trip. Kate and Kelly went on a hike. On the way to the base of the mountain, Kelly got lost. Her map suggested she was headed up a canyon. The two of them decided to head down a small trail. They were relieved to see that they were in the right place at the right time!

Bad Grades. Tom was taking math class. He was really struggling. His teacher told him it was too bad for him. He made sure to write all of his assignments on his laptop. Tom managed to do really well in the class.

Cute Awakening. Tom's wife asked him to get in her bed. She had a baby girl and it had been sleeping in her room. Tom told her not to go anywhere and just be there. When she woke up he was angry and told her to get out. She was horrified and told Tom that sleeping in her room was no good.

Paul's Change of Address and Change of Heart. Paul needed money badly. He decided to run for office in order to change his life. He ran for office in a very unusual place. He received 5, 000 votes. Paul became the new governor of Georgia.

Angry Feelings. I decided to go to the beach one day. I didn't notice any waves. As soon as I got there, I began to feel angry. I then decided to hit on a woman and flirt with her. It worked great and we became good friends.

College Troubles. It had been weeks since I enrolled at college. All of my friends are also on a track team. I had trouble with the schedule. I was upset that I would have to stay home. But it turns out, I was the best track player in school.

Alan's Big Break. Alan is a new worker in a factory. He notices that a woman gets to wear the same clothes to work every day. The other women all look for an advantage over Alan. He decides he would be great if he had the same rights as the women. Soon Alan and his company are a happy couple with the same job.

Reaching the peak. Avery was a strong gymnast. She was confident that she could reach the peak in the morning. At the peak of the gym she was ready. She performed a single-leg back-flip. She ended up reaching the top of the gym!

Lip Gloss. Susie went to the drugstore for some lip gloss. The store's were all too short. Susie didn't like the look of lipstick. So she went home and got lipstick from her mother. Now Susie has a beautiful lip gloss.
Stray Cat. Susie noticed her cat had gotten a new collar. She took the cat outside. A few days later, her cat ran around the house. Susie was shocked by the behavior. The cat was looking for food.

New pasta sauce. Lily was trying to make a meal for her husband. She had no pasta sauce to use, so she tried making a sauce. Her husband loved the sauce so much, he made it himself. He made the sauce himself to show her the wonderful taste. She ended up making him a great pasta dish.

The broken wick. It was time to clean my wick. I grabbed a wick brush and started brushing on the wax. It didn't work very well. I tried using an electric wick but the wick did not come out. So I ended up using a lot of water to get it out.

Bookworm. Tom was a good reader and was reading a lot of books. He often bought a lot of books while he was reading them. Tom's friends and family complained about how much they spent. One day, they convinced him to buy one book at once. Tom read the entire book before they could complain and buy it.

Spongebob. Maddie decided to build a sponge house for her son. She put all the ingredients in the pot. She added the pot to the sink. After a few minutes it started to boil. Maddie cleaned the sponge house and made it for him.

Going Back to School. I went back to school last year. I had fun with my friends, but I didn't have the right stuff. My mom called me to let me know I should come over. We went and got lots of new stuff. I'll be going back to school next week.
Sarah gets lucky. Sarah is walking home. Her brother comes running out of the house. Sarah rushes over to him. She lets go of his hand. Sarah's brother gives her a hug and goes on his way.

All Nighter. When John awoke in the morning, his alarm clock was running on its way to 3 PM. When he went to work, he got up and went to check the alarm clock. While trying to get to work, he tripped and fell. John felt incredibly exhausted. He didn't know how he would wake up so late.

Hiding the Gift. Kenny had a special gift for his brother. It was a small telescope. One day, the brother stole the telescope from Kenny. He pretended to be upset when Kenny asked him not to. Kenny returned the telescope to the store.

Shocked. One day I was driving to work. I had to pass through a very busy intersection. It took me a long time to get there. As I was finally there I got out. The light turned green and I turned on my phone.
Gig. Bill is driving to a friend's party. He is going faster than normal. He starts to lose control of the car. Bill hits another car. Bill gets a speeding ticket.

Typing. I was typing on my phone while walking down the stairs. I didn't notice until my phone slipped on the sidewalk. I tripped and lost my phone. I took it to the store and got a new one. That saved me from going home alone.

Beach day. Susie was at the beach one day. She noticed a guy waving at her from behind. He seemed nervous, so he asked for help. He pulled her in and kissed her. He started dancing with her, and she was delighted!

Freshman Orientation. A few months ago I took my freshman orientation. The first day of orientation was really boring, but I made lots of friends. After class I went on a field trip to visit the local zoo. I met many animals that I had never seen before. I learned that college is fun and I should always have fun.

Pleased. Jane decided to buy a new dress at the mall. She took a picture of it on her phone so she could return it later. She received a phone call at work telling her that it had been sent. She was not so happy when her boss saw the picture. She was disappointed but it was worth it since it was a nice dress.
Bread. Susie wanted a slice of pizza. However, she didn't have money to buy it. She called her boyfriend to make an order. She was shocked when he said no. She felt terrible.

Electronic music. Jim wanted to learn how to play his favorite music. His mom suggested that he get an expensive CD player. Jim spent several hours at the store and bought a box set. He plugged it in and started listening to it. Within minutes Jim had a great favorite track on it!

Saving a Life. Joey was at home one day, when he heard someone screaming. He quickly realized it was a stray dog. He ran over to the dog and called 911. The police arrived and shot the stray dog dead. Joey felt relieved that he did not get into a lot of trouble.

Mushroom Pizza. One of my boyfriends was making me a pot of mushrooms pizza. The pizza was very cheesy, and I was very proud. However, I realized that the pizza wasn't cooked right. I didn't know the recipe, and decided to do research. After researching pizza making, I learned that mushrooms are poisonous.

The Job Offer. Jill heard a knock on the door. She knew someone was trying to hire her. Jill went inside to find out the person. The person asked her to come with them to the office. Jill accepted and was glad to be going.

The Bike. Kate had just picked up her bike. She wanted to go for a ride with her friends. She went to a nice little local place. Kate's friends decided to go for a ride. Kate went home happy to have gotten some exercise.

The Murder. Evelyn's brother was murdered. Her mom had to move out of her house. Evelyn found him dead at the foot of her bed. Her dad called 911 and a detective came. Evelyn went to school to learn about her brother.

Judy Know Football. Judy grew up with a football team. She dreamed of joining them on the field. While training, she learned about the sport. The team asked her to play in the high school championship game. Judy was very nervous about playing in that game.
The Touchdown. Tom was playing football. He was on his second drive. He started to run toward the endzone. He made a beautiful throw. The team scored a touchdown.

Stamp Collection. Barry went to the local library to pick up some stamps. He didn't know what stamp he should get. He tried several options, but ended up picking up one. He went home and took it to his house. When he opened it up, he was very happy with his purchase.

A common scenario. Jane was walking to her car. Her friends stopped her at a red light. They were looking at her. The girl in front of Jane was driving very fast. Jane had to slow down to pass the girl.

Tim buys a puppy. Tim is having a great day at the office. He decides to take a puppy home. He goes into the office and checks his mail. He finds a puppy waiting for him outside. Tim is happy that he bought a puppy.

Court of Some Peels. One day, I was cleaning out my cabinet. My mom had found some rare pearls from an old woman. I went over to the cabinet and took the pearls out. Afterwards, I used a jar to peel them. The pearls were beautiful!

The Carnival. Briana and her friends were planning a big party. They decided to go to a carnival. They went to the top of the roller coaster. The girls had a great time. They made lots of new friends.

Lottery. Tim was looking for something to do with his parents. He went to the internet for ideas. He found a gambling website. He decided to win a $300 dollar ticket. Tim won his first million dollars.
Luke. Luke was playing with his friends at the park. He found a stick. He got his friend to swing it into the air. His friend ended up getting hurt. Luke was grounded for the rest of the day.

No Perfect Dress. Ava had a date with a cute boy. The boy did not wear any nice clothes. Ava went to the mall to find a nice dress. She tried on a lot of clothes. When she finally found one she liked, she bought it.

Sand Castles. I love playing with the sand castles. I think that it is a very relaxing and exciting activity. One day I decided to build a sand castle in my backyard. I was very excited and I went out to do it. It was very fun and a relaxing day.
Rainy Day. Last night was very rainy. I was playing at the pool. I got a small bump in the pool. I was very sad. When I got out of the pool, it was still wet.

Kim's Son's Glasses. Kim noticed her son was taking his glasses off all the time. She noticed the glasses were breaking. Kim contacted the manufacturer of his glasses. The manufacturer repaired his glasses. Kim was able to have her son's glasses fixed.
Fixing the roof. Sandra had a roof that needed fixing. It was in her back yard. Sandra thought that she would fix it. But then she realized it was in bad shape. She had to buy a new roof.
Shoes. Tom was at the mall. Tom saw some new shoes. He went home. He tried them on. He loved them.

The Boy's Dog. Mary was walking her dog one day. She noticed her dog had a huge tummyache. Mary called the dog's owners to come pick it up. The owners picked up the dog from the house. Mary was able to take the dog for the night to heal.

Burning Down. Gina was driving her car with her mom. Suddenly, a big truck cut in front of the car. The car was almost destroyed. Gina got out and called a tow truck. The tow truck took the car to a new tire shop.

Ticket Hogger. Kenny had been trying to get his first ticket. He had been waiting for almost two hours. Finally, he was sitting in the car with his ticket. He was waiting on the line for an hour. Finally, he got his ticket.

Pokemon Hunting. The Pokemon Center was in a mall near my home. I decided to hunt for Pokemon. I went into the Pokemon Center and bought my Pokemon. After finding a Pokemon I went back to the Pokemon Center. I took my Pokemon home and played with it all day.

Poor Clark. Clark had a stroke in 2012 and is in nursing home. He was not doing well and was feeling very weak. Clark decided to work on his strength to improve his health. Clark took a strength class at his local gym. Clark improved his strength and he was able to get back into the gym.

Wet Phone. I was at a coffee shop. A couple of customers were walking in. As they were talking I took my phone out and took a selfie. All of a sudden I dropped it on the floor. It was on the floor for three hours!

Picky Much?. Sarah got a box of candy that was really picky. She wanted to eat some and didn't want to wait. Sarah opened it and it was gone in seconds. The box was covered in flies and it was disgusting. Sarah ate it anyway and didn't care.

Street Racing. The street racing track was in the middle of the city. One morning, a race was taking place. It was the best of the best. The cars were so fast, they were almost racing. The drivers raced their cars around the track until the end.
Tooth Fairy. Jenna wanted a tooth fairy. She searched her entire room. She found it on her bed. She put it on and went to sleep. When she woke up it was gone!

beans. Molly loved to make delicious coffee beans. She would buy them from the farmer's market. She would also buy their ingredients from the kitchen. She would mix them and serve them warm. Molly loved to eat beans every day.
Odd habit. I had a new roommate. She's very odd. She doesn't like to clean and is very messy. So she's a huge mess and doesn't clean. I'm not surprised because she's such a mess!
Grades. Samantha went to school today. Her math test was coming up. She had to work through her homework. The test was very difficult. Samantha failed miserably.

Walker Gets Organized. Walker had been trying to be organized all year. He began to do a lot of reading and organizing things. He decided to buy books for his kids. He made plans to buy a large amount of food for the kids. His kids loved it and enjoyed their summer.

Science Project. My daughter and I took our daughter to a science fair. We decided to bring her to learn about biology. We visited a museum where we took a tour and watched the exhibits. Afterwards, we went to the science fair. We had a fun time and had a great time learning about biology.

The Surprise Party. Bobby's best friend decided to throw him a surprise party. It was a giant baseball game!Everyone dressed up as their favorite team. The night went very well. Bobby was happy to have been invited to the party.
Too much work. Lily was working on her homework. She was making sure it was perfect. But then her teacher came in and told her to stop. She ended up doing an important task. Her teacher was furious.

Hula Hoops. There was a hula hoop competition this weekend at the school. I thought it would be cool to be the first one on stage. But I was embarrassed to be the last one!I was afraid I would have to give up. But I decided to go on anyways, because I didn't like to give up.

the Freeloader. Joe is a recent graduate with a great education. He decided that he wanted to get a job, but that was far away. After applying, he was told he got in and interviewed. The company did not even allow him to speak about the experience. Joe was devastated and decided to find another job.
The world. Kate was playing outside. She saw something interesting. It was the world. It had a lot of people living there. Kate decided to stay inside.

Bad Reception. Jed was getting ready for his big party. He was sitting on the bar when he got a terrible reception. Everyone was really rude. He went to his friend to ask for an excuse. But he got no answer.

Eli. Eli was a very small boy. His family was a small one. They needed someone to take care of their two older brothers. They were very sad and had very few friends. Eli eventually found a new family to go to school with.

Running on Fumes. I woke up late in the morning and was really tired. I tried to stay awake and didn't notice when the clock struck midnight. When it was midnight I knew I needed to get up. I grabbed the nearest bathroom and threw on my running gear. I got to my car and started running as fast as I could.
kittens. We bought a kitten. It was really cute. It was a black cat. It was very sweet. We bought more!

the graveyard. Mary was going to be gone for days. She wasn't feeling well. So she went into the graveyard. And she began to walk there. When she came home she called her boyfriend to get her a present.

The Bagel. Ruth was at a fast food restaurant. She ordered a bagel. When she took the bagel to the table, the bagel was brown. Ruth complained about her brown bagel. The waitress suggested a brown bagel if she did not like brown bagel.

Pancakes with Grandma. I wanted a nice pancake for breakfast this morning. I made some waffles to go with it. Grandma came to help me make them. She made a nice pancakes. I thought she was so nice that I decided to try pancakes with grandma.

Overtime. Jake was really tired. Jake decided he needed to take time off from his job. Jake got a new job. Jake was now more relaxed and more productive. Jake was now able to do much more with his spare time.

The Scary Car. I went to the dealership. My wife got out my car to look at it. The driver was not paying attention and swerved into the oncoming car. I stopped the car in my lane and called 911. Thankfully my wife was not hurt but I had to drive home.

Rainy Vacation. Nate was having a very rainy day. His apartment was full of water and Nate was afraid of the rain. Nate was in the basement of his apartment when the rain stopped. He climbed to his balcony and felt the rain finally stop. He saw his friends and they all smiled at him.

The Cookie Exchange. One day, Ella was out shopping. She came across a cookie shop. Ella asked for a cookie but the manager wouldn't sell one to her. Ella thought she was being ridiculous. So Ella decided to start a cookie exchange.

Cereal. Gina was at a restaurant and saw a delicious cereal. It was very sweet and full of sugar. When the customer came in, he complimented her on her perfect cereal. She said that it was the best she'd ever had. She was so happy and she vowed to never go back.

Scuba diving. Gina and I went scuba diving on a boat. It was very crowded so we were very careful. After a while, Gina began to feel the weight of the boat pulling on her. She tried to pull free, but the boat was pulling too hard on her. Gina ended up getting pulled under and drowned!

The Dry Milk. Sam noticed that he had no milk for dinner. He had gone to the store to buy milk but he didn't have any. He realized that he had used too much milk. So he went back home and made himself some dry milk. The dry milk was perfect for his family!

Vladimir Plays Pool. Vladimir has always wanted to play pool. He visits a local pool hall one day and starts practicing. Vladimir spends two days at the pool hall before making a team. He gets on the team and becomes very good at pool. Now Vladimir is the best pool player in town!

Playing graveyard. Sam had never seen the graveyard before. He thought it was a ghost town. It was really dark and he could hardly see it. Then one day his friend invited him over. Sam and his friend ran into the graveyard and played there.

Accident at Home. Allie was at her house one night. Suddenly, she noticed a loud crash and tripped on the carpet. She fell and got a concussion. Allie couldn't remember what happened. She went to the doctor and he blamed it on a loose foot.
Justin breaks down. Justin was out with friends. They were all drinking. Suddenly Justin got drunk. The group started fighting. Justin was able to walk out but was very drunk.

Cathy's Garden. Cathy wanted to have a garden. She went to the store to find some flowers. She found lots of beautiful flowers. Cathy picked a bunch to use in her garden. Cathy's garden is now beautiful.

Favorite Letter. Kathy got a new job as a secretary. She went to the kitchen to make lunch. Kathy looked at the menu and found out there was no lunch for lunch. She looked in the fridge to see she didn't have any meatloaf. Kathy got home and ate her lunch.

Head Stuck. Tim decided he wanted to go ice fishing. Tim got his fishing pole and fishing pole reel. Tim hooked his fishing pole to the pole and started fishing. He didn't notice that he was hooked at his neck. Tim fell from the pole and ended up in the snow.

Lost CD. Robby wanted to buy a CD. He knew that he could not find it on his computer. He went to the store to check the shelves. He found an old CD with the title Lost. Robby picked up the CD and bought it.

cringey LDR. Barry decided he didn't want to be a member of the family anymore. One day he got really drunk at a party and decided to join the ldr group. At first he was really scared because he didn't know what it would be like. When he got to the group, he really liked everyone. Barry decided to stick with the group and they made him a member.

Losing Faith. I had lost a close friend in the past few months. I could not find any evidence of his death. He had not been seen in months. I searched for him and found a mugshot. I told him that was very sad and sad that he had died.

Woods. Dan's grandparents lived far from him. His grandparents lived in a nice condo in New Jersey. Dan decided to look for a new place to live. Dan found a beautiful cabin on the lake with a nice view. Dan loved the cabin so much he moved there the next day.

Alex's Sickness. Alex had a fever for the past few days. His mother called the hospital because he was not feeling well. Alex got a shot to try and cure his sickness. Alex was not feeling well the next day. Alex had to go home from the hospital and rest.
Don't Do It. I was a young man with an eating disorder. One day, I met a beautiful woman. We went on a date. Afterwards, I told her I was single. She smiled, knowing I'd be back for her soon.

Ken's First Day. Ken's father had been working all week to get Ken ready for work. Ken was finally ready for his first day of school on Tuesday. He started at lunch and was relieved to see he was in good company. Ken enjoyed his first day and made many new friends. Ken's dad would have fun with Ken's new friends after work.

Not crazy. The police found a child with a shotgun at a house. The kid had been outside with it. They shot him and he died at the scene. A family member tried to take the child away. They were arrested and charged with murder.

Protest. Tom was feeling a bit tired. So he decided to participate in a protest. But as soon as they began to march, he began to feel sick. So he quickly left his home and went home. Luckily he felt a bit better the next day.

Fate. My friend and I were walking near a pond. Suddenly, she saw a man in his 20's. The man didn't know us and tried to grab my friend. The man jumped out of the water and the water ran out. I chased after the man and luckily I managed to get him away.

Tom and the Turtles. Tom was bored with his job and decided to do something fun. He decided to go see some action movies. After seeing some they decided to go to the aquarium. At the aquarium Tom watched the turtles and got a great idea. He watched the turtles for a day, then decided to go home.

The Lasagna. My wife is from Ireland and we moved to Boston. She makes the best lasagna in the world. I make the best turkey and cheese lasagna. We cook our meals out of the same oven. I make a point of visiting her whenever I can.

Nurse Talitha. Nurse Talitha was a very smart, good nurse. She cared for all the kids and children at the local hospital. One day, one of her patients was very sick. Talitha rushed to the patient's aid and worked hard to save the life. Then, Talitha was the first nurse in the country to successfully resuscitate a person.

Lost and resentful. I always thought I was smarter than everyone around me. But then I started to study at school and got smarter and smarter. I realized I was only a child. I started feeling like an outcast at school. I ended up being bullied as a result.

Swimming team. Mitch was a competitive swimmer. He liked to swim in the lake at the lake. Mitch was swimming and a wave hit him hard. Mitch fell over in the water. He broke his hip and could not swim for six months.
Campaign. Mike ran for the office of mayor. He decided to run as an independent. He ran for several months. After months of campaigning he won. He became mayor.

Final Match. The game was finally over. The boys were ready for a battle. The other boys were ready to fight too. They fought until the last game. The boys finally won the battle and were able to go to a final battle.

Painting. Lena wanted to get some good paintings done. She went to the store to buy supplies. Lena was excited when she found something she liked. When she got home, she sat down to begin painting. When she finished, Lena sat back and loved her new work.

Lindsey's first drive. Lindsey was driving to her first day of high school. She was feeling the rush of going to school. She suddenly felt nervous, but she kept driving. She drove to her first day and was relieved. Lindsey enjoyed her first day of high school!
Karen makes a sandwich. Karen is at her favorite sandwich shop. She is making her sandwich. Karen gets her sandwich. Karen's sandwich is delicious. Karen is glad to have a sandwich.

Ron Buys A Phone. Ron was trying to make his phone work. He had it set up with lots of apps. He tried to take photos but it wouldn't work. He finally purchased a new phone. He was very happy with the purchase.

Moving. I wanted to move from our apartment in the city to a house. We had just moved into our apartment and couldn't wait to move in. I tried all sorts of transportation to get to the house. Eventually we had to hire a cab driver. Afterwards, I went to the store to buy groceries.

Key. Kia's parents always left the key in the refrigerator. Kia had a bad habit of forgetting about it. One day, Kia decided she had no other place to store it. She began stealing random things from strangers. Kia has since been caught and banned from the neighborhood.

Ten Year Reunion. Yesterday I met a man who is twenty one. He was with a woman and she was eighteen. We are going to a ten year reunion. We were dating for eight years. We are planning a trip this summer.

Cleaned Out. My son's college was about to open. He had just gotten started at this year. He was cleaning out his room. There was a few old clothes and books that he didn't want to use. He was able to give them away.

Summer dreams destroyed. Jane wanted to see the ocean again. She had a beach in her backyard. Summer was finally here, and the beach was huge. Jane's beach was surrounded by the beach. She decided that the beach was too large for her needs.

Inconsiderate Neighbor. Tim and Bob were neighbors on a street. One day they noticed someone else was there. Tim decided to walk his neighbor by himself. That angered the neighbor and he began to yell. Tim ran off to his car, and no one heard from him.

Hide and Go. Mandy's brother was running from a cop. She was scared, but then she saw the cop. He told her he had shot at the cops. Mandy ran down the street and hid. She hid in a closet until the cops arrived.

Overwhelmed by technology. I wanted to use a new smartphone. Unfortunately, my data plan had been cut. I had to buy something else. When I did, I was amazed at how fast my internet was. It was faster than I'd ever gotten before.

Crazy Neighbors. Tom was driving through town and was looking for a snack. He was driving down the road when he noticed an old woman in the road. She was yelling and swearing and was making a mess. Tom drove on for a while and kept seeing her. Eventually, he pulled over and got out to take a look at her.
Back Pain. Sam had back pain. He called his insurance company. His insurance company said they couldn't find a provider near where he lived. Sam called a homeopath. He ended up going home.
True Challenge. I was out on a business trip to the beach. I came upon a new beach house. There was a challenge on their house. I decided to challenge them. I threw them a surprise party.
