Linda loses. Linda is a teacher at her community college. She works in the cafeteria. She has an important presentation to give. Linda is working on her presentation and starts to get distracted. Linda gives the presentation and her class is able to complete the presentation.

Stranded Island. Tina was on a vacation with her family. They were driving down the beach when they got stuck. She could barely hear anything and was lost. Thankfully her mom came to the rescue. Tina ended up being rescued.

Social Media. Tiffany was looking for a way to socialize. She decided to build her own blog. She used a few of her favorite techniques. She posted all sorts of personal stories. The blog got a lot of likes and the new friend was more than happy.

Nick and the Doll. Nick loved to make dolls. He was very good at making dolls. He began making dolls for sale. Nick quickly sold all of his dolls to a very wealthy man. Nick was very pleased with his success.

Drinking. My girlfriend got me a drink for Christmas. I've never been to the bar before, so I was very nervous. I ordered some gin and tonic. I drank a pint of gin, a shot of tonic and a drink of juice. It was a relaxing night and I was very happy.
Old Bed. Bill bought an old and worn out old bed. He slept in the bed every night. The bed would crack under his weight. One night he heard a noise. He woke up to find the bed was old and rusted!

Slump. Amy was working on her math class project. Suddenly the lights in the classroom went out. Amy tried to call her teacher to get a lift. Her teacher didn't have any way of contacting her. Amy decided to give up and not report the situation.

Fun pizza party. Kate got a pizza party for her family. The guests brought lots of treats and snacks. Then they decorated the pizza box and ate all the food. After the party was over, Kate had a huge plate of pizza. It was a fun party.

Celebrity Look-alike. Tommy was a comedian and actor. He made a career out of his talents. He made a good career out of being a celebrity look-alike. He went to every show, dressed very well. He got to do the act for free, just like everyone else.
Gun. Kara was getting married. She wanted to have a nice wedding. She had a lot of great ideas. She brought her dress to her bridal shower. The bridal shower was a disaster.
Snake in the Yard. One day Jim was taking out the garbage. He saw some snakes in the yard. Jim took them out of the trash. They were all covered in mud. He put them in a bag and let them go.

Math Tutor. The teacher assigned the next test. The students waited in line to take the test. The teacher handed out pencils. The students studied for their test. The teacher handed the test to the students.
Prom Night. Nate had been invited to prom. He decided to go. Nate got to go with some friends. He decided to dress up as a girl. He felt great about himself.

Iron. I was a big fan of the Ironman triathlon. It had amazing scenery and prizes. One day I got to go to the Ironman competition. It was an awesome event with great prizes. I couldn't wait for the next Ironman.

Goodbye Love. My girlfriend is coming from Spain to my house in Minnesota. She is moving into her new apartment in the next few weeks. We went over the weekend to go shopping. My girlfriend was in tears as she walked out of the store. It made her happy to see the family again.

No Money No Honey. Amy had just moved into her new apartment. She was not sure what to do with her $40 in her pocket. But then she heard the familiar sound of a doorbell ring. The doorbell rang a second time and she turned around to see her boyfriend on the other side. Amy told him to buy her some honey from the refrigerator.

Erin and the TV. Erin wanted to watch television on her computer. She wanted to find a nice, affordable set for it. Erin checked out a set at the electronics store. She got a pretty old model at a great price. Erin decided she would buy that model again.
Old Stove. One day, I had to clean up my kitchen. I bought a new stove. However, it was very old. The water heater was broken. I had to replace it.
Book of Mormon. I read a book of the BookThe book was very important to me. I read the book many times. I loved it.

The College. Kathy had never been to college. She had never gone to the same school as her sister. She decided to go to her junior year of college. The girls went to different colleges but all in the same school. It took them a couple of years but they decided to go back to their school.
baby. My wife got a new baby. It was so cute. It was so happy to be getting a new baby. I love getting my wife and we take care of it. I'm going to have to look after it for the rest of my life.

Glare. Amy loved to make people angry. She would tell people she was going to make a difference with her life. She felt like everyone hated her for it. She decided to make it less of a problem and more of a goal. Now she knows if she keeps focusing on that she won't make any enemies.

Where is my refund?. I had a lot of money in my account at a small bank. However, I was running low on money. I went online and tried to deposit money into my bank account. I tried to deposit my money into my account but I was having trouble. I called the bank and requested a refund of my money.
dead dog. Tim was taking his dog to the vet. He noticed something odd. There was a dead dog next to him. It was in the vet's office. Tim walked away and went home to wash the dog.

Seriously, They're Everywhere. I've been taking the subway to work. My boss called me at 4am to give me an update on the subway. I was almost there when I noticed someone walking next to me. I turned around to find that she had stolen my ticket. I had to call my boss and explain it.
Samuel's sandwich. Samuel had a sandwich for lunch. He forgot about it. The food was gone. Samuel looked everywhere for the sandwich. Then, he decided to have a nap.

A miscommunication. Sally was going out with her friends. They decided to play a game of basketball. Sally's dad suggested they play a volleyball game. They did not play a game because they were afraid of getting beat. As a result, Sally decided to get a good night's rest.

Infection. Sam was going to take a test at school today. He did not know what it would be. He took out a piece of paper and scratched it with his fingernails. It was a pretty ugly thing. Sam's mom was upset at him.

Picking just one. Jane loved to eat all kinds of things. She had never really had a problem with picking just one. The problem was one of the veggies. Jane thought she found it and picked it. But the next day, she found the wrong kind of carrot.
maracas. Nancy and her husband got a new home. They had to renovate their home. They needed to buy new carpet. The carpet cost too much. They had to call a contractor to fix it.
Jam or jelly. Rosa went to the beach. She was having a good time. But then something weird happened. Rosa couldn't swim. She ended up in the hospital with a nasty infection.

The Manual. Tanya had just gotten her manual out of the factory. Her first job was to teach the mechanic how to do the job correctly. The mechanic took great pride in the manual. He would repeat his instructions to Tanya in every instance. Tanya enjoyed teaching her new mechanic every single day.

Forgetful Sam. Sam was a bad student who did not listen to his teachers. He was always late in school and his parents were constantly angry. One day, Sam tried to join a dance, but he was rejected. They told him he was too smart and too talented for his grades. Sam now learns he needs to pay more attention to his grades so he can get into college.

Cold Soup. Nelly woke up cold. She went to the fridge to find something to cool her. She couldn't decide between a few soup flavors. She decided to put the broth in the microwave. The soup quickly cooled down and Nelly was warm.

Wednesdays. The family decided to go out every Wednesday. The first one was when I was seven years old. One time, my brother and I were playing inside in the front yard. My brother pulled out a gun and started shooting at other kids. The other kids ran home with the gun and did not return it.
Hiking Trip. My friend and I went on a hiking trip. We went to the top of a tall mountain. We took our time. We ended up enjoying the view. Our whole day was good.

Every time. One of my friends called me to hang out. He told me that we would have a good time tonight. He ended up staying for only two hours. I had to go back home and get food to eat. I was not able to hang out with anyone.

Salty. My girlfriend and I decided to eat a chocolate chip cookie. We were craving chocolate chip cookies since we had dinner with our kids. When we took them out of the oven they turned out really dry. My girlfriend put them back in the oven and forgot she put them in. My girlfriend realized she forgot to put the cookies in and they turned out dry.
Over-reacting. The man came to the store. He was talking to a woman. He made some rude comments. A female clerk yelled at him. She gave him a warning for the next time.

Ironing Clothes. Diane was in the house ironing her clothes. As she was about to finish she felt her hand on the iron. Her hand was very dry and it hurt. Diane got some ice in her hand to stop the bleeding. Diane felt much better immediately and finished her ironing.

Lizzie's Locks. Lizzie had a problem. She couldn't figure out how to lock her doors. One day she noticed someone was having a bad day. She went to see him and asked what was wrong. He explained that his keys had fallen out.

Jacob's Lawn. Jacob loved playing with his lawn mower. One day he tried to blow the hose off and it went flat. Jacob decided to buy a new one. Jacob went to the store to get it. Jacob went home to enjoy his new lawn mower.
Banana Split. I got a banana split. It was really spicy. My boyfriend asked if he could taste it. I said no, since the heat was not good. He took the bite and realized he was very hungry.

Speech. Tom had an important speaking engagement in a few days. He didn't want to miss it. He worked out with his teacher every morning. He even signed his name on the invitations. He made sure to have a good time.

Snacker. I went for a walk at noon one morning. While walking around a supermarket I started to get hungry. I looked at a stack of cereal and some doughnuts. I decided to eat the snacks for breakfast. After I ate my cereal I quickly walked back to my car.

Sushi. My friends and I were hungry for sushi for dinner. We decided to order sashimi. When we came home, we realized we had left our rolls. We realized we left the sushi roll out. Thankfully, we got it delivered that night.

Last Work Sandwich. I was taking my first break from my job today. It was very hot outside so I took a break from my work. As I got ready to get back in my office, I found a sandwich I really liked. I walked outside and saw a woman on the street. I immediately asked her for a sandwich because I liked her.

Clark Watches Birds. Clark has a dream to go on an airplane. When he sees his dream come true he has a big heart. He flies to a cabin in the country and sits in the seat. He begins to enjoy the scenery and see birds. Clark is glad that he dreamed of flying.
Egg. My mom made a beautiful egg. She put it in the freezer. It was too hard. She gave it to me. I made a big mess!

Not Realizing. When I was 12, I was watching a show. I was doing a lot of research for the show. Suddenly, a woman's boyfriend asked her to a bar. He said I was his favorite woman. He ended up asking her on a date.

Best in Class. Sam always thought that he was a top student in school. He always took his class seriously. One day, he was selected to participate in a team in the local sports league. Sam got so much attention from his teammates, he didn't know what to do. He decided to play in basketball instead of tryouts.

Trip to Australia. Jenny and her family wanted to visit Australia. The only problem was that the plane had broken down on the way. Luckily, Jenny was able to grab a hotel and get a ride. She arrived to Australia on the next day. The trip was well worth the wait.
Our New Kayaks. We were traveling through California. The weather was beautiful!We decided to explore and kayak. We enjoyed the view while we paddled. We both wished we had stayed out longer.

The actor. I recently heard my friend Dan tell a story about his father's role in World War 2. His father served in France in the French army. After World War 2, his father went back to the United States and lived in New York. Dan had never really talked about his father's service in France. One day I asked him if he would like to tell the story in person, and he said sure.

Kiera. Kiera was driving her new  car to school. Her  windshield was cracked. Kiera pulled over to help her driver. She called her mom to help her repair the windshield. Kiera learned how to always keep her car on the side of the road.
parking ticket. I was parking in my neighborhood. I had my license and ID. My car was being towed. I had to park next to an illegal place. It was very awkward and frustrating.

Ruts. Timmy got into a big fight. He was on his way to school one day. The other kids saw him and took off in his direction. He was so mad that he ran back to his house. Timmy was stuck there until he calmed down.

The Pizza. Kate went to the pizza parlor to order a new one. She was excited to try some new things. She placed her order in the register. When she got to the door, her brother came out of the building. He had brought her a new pizza.

New calculator. Gina went to the grocery store to buy a new calculator. She didn't have any money at the register, so she decided to buy one from the store. The clerk said they were out of pencils. Gina called the store several times and waited for them to pick up a calculator. Eventually, she was able to pick up a new calculator.

Giant Squid. We walked up to the house with a giant squid on a leash. It was a cute little creature and we played with it a lot. When it got too big to handle, we had to take it down. We were trying to take it on the leash for a walk when it took a swing. We had to hold it as we dropped the leash and it bit us.

Gorilla. I wanted to go see a gorillas exhibit. I wanted to see a gorilla with the greatest trunk ever. I got to the zoo and the gorillas were not at all what I had expected. I was disappointed when I saw a gorilla I had always wanted. Luckily it was a cute little black monkey I found to pose.

Sid is the life of the party. Sid is a nice, quiet man. Everyone always takes good care of him. One day, Sid runs out of gas. He calls for help and everyone calls in to help. When Sid arrives home, he is so happy that everyone is there.
Skateboarding. Cindy wanted to learn to skateboard. She signed up for a lesson. The instructor taught her how to use the board. Cindy learned how to ride it. She decided to do well on her test!

President. Sandra didn't have much confidence in her political ability. She decided to become a political candidate for office. Sandra ran for the board of a local company. Sandra successfully won the election for board member. Sandra is now a board member of the local company.
Wild Jump. The kid took his first wild jump. He tried a lot of different jump heights. It was not easy. It took a lot of practice. The kid ended up making it to the top!

Mike is stuck. Mike is driving on a highway. He sees a deer crossing a road. He decides to pull over. A deer suddenly walks into the road. Mike starts to drive again and he is able to get back on the road.

Sneaking In. The Smith family went to the park to play. They found a small creek. They decided to go out and have a little picnic. They waited and waited until the sun came up. By the time they got home they were all exhausted.

Virginia Beach. Virginia Beach was an amazing place to vacation. You could go anywhere in the world there. But in 2013 it was hit and run, and many people died. People were upset the police didn't do anything. But they were right to be upset.

Learning how to cook. One evening I was cooking a dinner. My daughter came home and told me that she did not have any leftovers. I was so frustrated. I realized that I forgot to set my oven to preheat. Thankfully I found out later that my oven was properly preheated.

Promotion. Gretchen went into the office to make an appointment to meet with her boss. She had made some really bad decisions in the past and didn't want to ruin it. Her boss asked her what she did to get into the school and her answer was simple. She lied and said she had applied to graduate the very day she enrolled. Gretchen was fired from her job that day.

Stephen gets bullied. Stephen has been bullied at school. His friends say they can't bully him anymore. Stephen tries to talk to his parents. His parents accept his request to talk to his teachers. He is happy to know his bully isn't coming.

Sports. John had been going to a local basketball team for years. He loved the way they played and would often argue with them. One day, he went out for lunch with one of the players. He got to know them and began to get along with them. He began to see basketball as more than just a hobby.

Keeping Score. One day, my friend Joe had an idea. He decided to play poker with me. My brother and I would play six cards each with each other. On the sixth card, I got the lead. So, I became the new King of the House.

Cat. One day, I had to take a taxi to my house. I was nervous and didn't want to ride the taxi. The taxi driver told me that he was a cat. I was really excited and jumped off the taxi. I fell down into the street and broke my arm.

Shuttle. Kate had a job working as a shuttle driver for a major city. She was working one day and came across a young man. The young man wanted to meet Kate, but he was nervous. Kate decided to tell the man she liked him. The two became fast friends.

Mutual Attraction. The two were on a field trip to the park. Suddenly there was an attraction ahead of them. Sally walked towards it. She saw a big spider in the grass. She was not excited, though, because it was in the park!

Jimmy Drops History Class. Jimmy is a history teacher at his school. One day his class was in the history section. Jimmy realized that he would need to get a history class down the road. He decided to give it a try after he had finished the history book. He had a great class with everyone.
Chipped tooth. Kate had a toothache and she got a chip in her tooth. She went to a dentist. The dentist put some ice in the mouth. Kate got a new tooth. Kate loved her new tooth.

Games. One day, I decided to play some video games. I looked online for a few hours for a game. After a while, I decided to go out. The games were expensive but enjoyable. I ended up buying some more games that day.

Digging. Lucy woke up to a loud thud outside. She opened the door to check on it, and saw a box. Inside was a broken bottle. Lucy ran over to see what was inside, but found nothing. She was so frustrated that she couldn't sleep all night.
The Cheating. Jill had the best job. She was the only one in her family. She loved her job. One day her boss cheated on her with another woman. Jill hated that.
Sandbox. Kelly was bored. She looked around at her house. There was nothing there that she liked. Her friend's room was much more interesting. She decided to open that.

The ice cream truck. Cameron bought a brand new truck. He thought it would be fun to play in the parking lot. The truck was so huge that it was hard to move. Then the truck broke down on him. He ended up driving it home and getting ice cream for dessert.

Jane Opens a Candy Shop. Jane really needed money, and she opened up a candy store. She filled up a small carton with candy. Jane noticed that the carts were not packed with the things she wanted. Jane realized she needed to hire more help. Jane opened her shop up in a big, crowded parking lot.
The Bar. Tiffany was at a bar. The bartender offered her a drink. It was a gin and tonic. Tiffany took a sip. The gin made her sick.

Lonely elders. Nina's grandma died last week. Her grandmother was 90 years old. Nina was very lonely. One day Nina noticed a strange man outside her house. She called his name and he came to meet her.

Taxi Fight. Lucy was waiting on a taxi to the school. It had finally arrived. When she got on the taxi she began to argue with the driver. He had a huge temper. She was not able to get him off of her.

New Job. Amy was starting her second semester at her local community college. Her first semester at community college was stressful for her. Amy really struggled with the new work environment. She began taking classes online and studying for the test. Amy found a new job after her first semester at community college.

Alone away from home. I went to my friend's house. She had her car in park when I arrived. There was a party going on outside. She didn't see me coming out of the car door. I was going to meet her on the way to the party.
Figure Skating. I decided to learn figure skating. I went to a park with friends. I took lessons to improve my skills. When I got to the rink, I was confident. Now I'm able to skate well.
Haircut. Kate needed to cut her hair. She didn't want to do it. So she decided to shave her head. It looked great. Kate was happy with her haircut.

Obvious but Truthful. A teacher told his class that he did not know the difference between truth and lies. I told him I was really interested and challenged him. He was not convinced so I continued. I also brought a cup of water. The teacher noticed and let me go, knowing that he was right.

Limitless Embarrassment. I've been trying to have a conversation with my son today. I tried explaining our marriage to him. Unfortunately he ignores my attempts and ignores me. When he finds out, he throws me a punch. I was so embarrassed and now feel bad for him.

Food Challenge. Lisa's boyfriend asked her to go out with him for dinner. Lisa had never gone out before. She decided she would start a food challenge. She cooked all of the food she wanted. Lisa ended up eating more than her boyfriend.

Mountains. One afternoon my nephew took me to a mountainside. He climbed the steepest mountain I have ever seen. It was so steep, he fell off at the peak. I took him down to the bottom and fixed him up. I told my husband I'd take him up to the top someday.

Unknown Fees. The manager of the local diner was not very nice to customers. He was always rude. One day, he gave an order that was too expensive. The waitress could not get the money back. The diner fired him for his rude behavior.

Bird. My friend recently moved to the US. She bought a bird for her new apartment. She has a baby bird, who is now named Bird. Bird was a great baby bird until it hatched in the refrigerator. Bird's mother died when it was a month old.

Candles. Kelsi loved to decorate her home with beautiful lights. She found out there was a big candle shortage in the area. Her family asked her to light up a tree. Kelsi bought a few bulbs and put them on. To her delight, her home was now lighted up.

Figure Skating. My friend told me I was going figure skating this weekend. I decided to buy a ticket for the event. I took my skateboard out to my friends. When I got to the park, I found the event on TV. I won first place.
Restaurant. Sara is having a birthday party. She invited all of her friends. They all decided to come. It was a big dinner. Everyone was happy.

Last Minute Decision. I was driving home from work one night. Suddenly, I noticed a huge truck drive by. A truck that is way too big to fit on the street. I could barely pass the truck. I decided to turn around.

The Quota. The teacher said that the class would be given a quota. Her students came up to her. They all wanted to show her how much work they had done. She told them that this was the way she wanted to teach. The students left the class feeling proud.

Arrested. Sam was watching a football game at his house. Sam decided he wanted to show off his football skills. He tried running to the quarterback's side of the field. Sam ran out of bounds and was arrested for being too loud. Sam was suspended for a week.

Pixy. Eli's mom bought him a toy pixy for Christmas. He was excited to learn how to play with the pixy. Eli sat in front of the pixy, staring at the pixy. Eli asked his mother to bring him the pixy from the toy shop. Eli was excited to play with the pixy, which was so cute!

Presentation. Cindy decided to present a movie on her new class project. She brought her project to the class and talked to the class members. Cindy was very nervous about her presentation. She tried to be funny, but it made her nervous. The class was really impressed with Cindy's presentation.

Adoption. Shelley was at her nephews wedding. Her nephews had a surprise and he had gotten a pet dog. Shelley decided to adopt a pet dog. Shelley went to the pet store and found a nice puppy. The dog was very nice to her and they became good friends.

Sign Language. My daughter has been deaf for 6 months. One day she asked me to sign for her. I went into the shop and was told she couldn't. So she bought a sign language interpreter. She speaks better now, and signs her friends better.

Going Fishing. Dan was going fishing. He loaded the tackle box up with all the fish. When he came to the lake, he saw a boat. He got in and they let him off the hook. Dan grabbed some fish and went fishing.
Parking Spot. Dennis needed a parking spot. He couldn't find any. He looked in the back of the store. He saw a spare spot there. He had no problem finding the parking spot.
Burned cookies. My friend got a new job. He had to change the cookies in the kitchen. They burned on the stove. He was sad because it hurt. He decided to buy a bigger pan to keep them.

Risk. I once heard a woman speaking about how to take a risk. She suggested that she should take risks with her finances. I suggested that I should take risks with my life. She replied with a question. I was shocked.

Front step trout. There was a beautiful trout swimming in the water. The girl was trying to catch it, but she got her foot stuck in. The fly caught her leg and she cried. The girl got her fish from a local pet store. The fish was very happy to be home.

Hillary is determined. Hillary is running for president of the United States. Hillary is running for president because she wants to change the world. Hillary believes in change. Hillary is running for the highest office in the country. Hillary is determined to change the world.

Purse envy. Tom got his first paycheck at age 18 and wanted to be a famous rapper. He went on to buy all sorts of things for his fans. He bought all kinds of expensive fashion for them. He sold it all on ebay. It was the most successful and successful time of his life.

The Catch. Tanya and her friends wanted to go swimming. Tanya decided she wanted to get in a large pool. Her friends said no, they wanted to go to the nearby beach. Tanya's friends decided to make a separate pool. Tanya was very disappointed, they didn't like the beach at all.

teacher affair. Lara was an elementary school teacher. One day, her classroom became very crowded. She was trying to make it fun for the students. She called a couple of girls into her office. She asked them to leave for fun.
Cowboy Doll. Susie loved princesses. She wanted one in her house. She went to the store and got one. She went home and made a princess doll. She put the doll in her house.

Fish. I've been wanting to try fishing for over a year. After a lot of research I decided to try out a line. I got my fishing pole and line and put them on. I fish with it for about an hour. The fish are really tasty and I have not felt bored fishing in a long time.
Wet Ending. Molly was a new employee at the school. She worked a lot of the day shift. She also did extra work on nights. One night she was very sick. She had to go home and finish her shift.
Gravy. My friend said I should get some more granola. I've never made granola before. I bought some fruit and water. I was so hungry. I made a giant plate of granola.

Baby. Barry and Jane were trying to adopt a baby. They went to the adoption center. Jane's parents wanted her to get a better home for her. They talked to a couple who were happy with the baby. Jane and Barry got the adoption done.

The Eyesore. Tara was trying to open the door for her family. The door was stuck open. It kept rumbling and rumbling. When it finally did it started to slam shut. Tara could hear it all the way to the ground.

The Thief. Derek had just turned eighteen and was a great student. He had been accepted to his local college to study chemistry. On his first day, he saw someone steal his backpack. The thief had left the backpack under his desk and was gone for weeks. Derek was furious and filed a report with his teacher about the theft.

Walking to school. My class was in a town close to a gas station. We went for our lunch break. When we got there, we saw a sign that said walking. I went over to the gas station and bought my lunch and my wallet. I went back home and sat in my chair.
Jumping. A little boy was jumping up and down. He always wanted to jump off a cliff. He thought it would be fun. But he wanted to learn to do it. He finally learned the proper ways to do it.

The Shopping Cart. Anna was shopping on her computer. She wanted to change her cart to a different item. She went to the kitchen and bought all the items in the cart. Then she put them on the cart. Then she took the cart back to the living room.

New iPad winning. Gina's friend bought her a new iPad. She loved the design. She was excited to see who the next winner was. She thought it was funny. But when she checked her own scores, she realized it was wrong.

The Pizza. The kids loved to go to pizza parlors. They loved the way the pizzas looked. The owner of one parlor offered a prize for the best pizza. The kids won by a landslide. The owner even gave the family a free slice!

Sparklers. Gina loved the new craze called sparklers. She was very interested in seeing them. She went to a flea market and got a bunch. She then went home to show her mom. After the show she loved the sparklers.

Classic car. I bought a Ferrari at the age of 9. I never wanted to own a car but did. I always wanted a Ferrari. I thought of a great deal of money and bought one. My first car was the best Ferrari ever.

The Game. Kelly's daughter was playing a game of Pokemon Go with her friend. They were both playing against each other. They went around a corner looking for Pokemon. They found a small cave where the Pokemon lived. They brought the Pokemon home and played with them together.

Clara's Algebra. Clara has a math exam today. She knew she needed to do her homework. Clara studied hard for the exam. She went through her homework and came back to her exam. Clara was happy with her test.
Getting Mugged. Tina got mugged at a mall. She tried to leave the mall as quickly as possible. She got a ride home. When she got home, she realized what happened. She was mugged.

Cleaning Windows. My daughter-in-law's house has been messy this summer. She asked me to do the dishes so she can clean them. I washed all the dishes. Then I put the dish soap on the windows. My wife was shocked.

Milk. I really hated milkshakes. So I decided to try my hand at one. I took my milk and stirred it in a bowl with sugar. Then I stirred it until it came up to a consistency of ice cream. And it tasted like ice cream!

What the Earthquake Made. When my friend's family was taking a trip, they wanted to see Mt. Fuji. They went to Hawaii and asked about Mt. Fuji. My friend decided to take them on a guided tour. They enjoyed it tremendously. However, when they saw Mt. Fuji, they did not know what it looked like.

Torn Socks. Mila's parents had a party. They had a huge spaghetti dinner. Mila's socks were torn and had been soaking in the sauce. She had to clean them right away. She decided to wear them instead of sitting them on her head.
The new friend. Lester wanted to meet a new friend. He decided to visit a new bar. The new friend arrived. They chatted all night. He was glad to finally meet him.

Hangover. Last night I had a really bad hangover. I had to go to the doctor. His doctor said I have a chronic liver disease. He told me I have to do a liver transplant. He said it will cost thousands of dollars and will take months.

Beat the game. John wanted to beat the game. He played it many times and lost many times. Finally he got so frustrated he quit. He then got a new idea and beat the game. John was able to beat the game.

Home. Gina's parents had put her on a plane to live with them. When she got to the airport her luggage was already packed. As soon as she checked into the hotel she started crying. She had no idea how she'd gotten on the plane. Gina had to check into the hotel, but not until later in the week.

Frozen Pizza. I recently had a craving for pizza. My favorite type is frozen pizza. My mother took me to a restaurant that did frozen pizzas. The pizzas were frozen so my father didn't know about it. I ate all of them and my son was thrilled.

High Blood Pressure. A little over a year ago my friend was diagnosed with high blood pressure. At the time I was worried about him. After 3 surgeries I found out he had a blood clot. The clot in his brain was removed and he went home. He still has high blood pressure but not the symptoms he used to have.
Yoga. Liza was a big fan of yoga. She saw a yoga class in her class. She wanted to join. She did her yoga class. Liza liked yoga!

The Dog Race. I went for a walk in the woods one morning. When I came back to my house, I noticed my dog was nowhere to be seen. I ran back outside and searched my house. The dog was gone. My friends were sad and left me a dog bone.
New Television. Barry had a new TV. He bought it on sale. He was so excited. But it broke very soon. He had to buy a new television.

Apple Tree. Kelly was walking outside her house one day. Suddenly she was startled by a loud noise coming from the yard. She saw that it was a large apple tree. She looked and could see some wild looking bears roaming around it. Kelly decided to give it a chance and tried to climb it.

Slurpee. Ava and her friends were having a snack. Ava couldn't find her favorite sodas. Her friends suggested she just order a slurpee. Ava happily accepted their offer and poured herself a slurpee. She had a lot of fun that night.
Fun Times. Today was fun times at our house. We decided to play together. We were all really nervous. It turned out to be a really good day. It was good that we had fun.

Video Games. Tom was playing with his friends. They all wanted to go to the video game store. Tom decided to wait until they got there. He walked in the store and saw a huge line. He was really unhappy and decided to just leave.

Cartwheel. Macy needed to buy some new clothes. She went shopping for some cartwheels at the mall. When she got home, she began to change clothes. After she got dressed, she took them out of the cartwheel. She was thrilled to be able to afford a new pair of clothes.
Food. I went to the market. I tried to find some cheap food. I looked through the produce section. I could not find any good food. I decided to eat the rest of my food.

Race to victory. A girl came to the race and didn't know who to vote for. The woman sat in the car and looked at everyone. She didn't know who to vote for. The driver gave her a hint that she could win. The girl won the race.
Chinese Food. The kids were hungry. They all decided to go out to eat. They found a Chinese restaurant. They ordered three meals. They came home full of memories.

Orchard. Sarah and her daughter were enjoying their backyard. They were enjoying a beautiful orange apple tree. Sarah tried to play with the branches. They fell off her arm and got tangled. Sarah had to call an ambulance.

Turtle Encounter. Gina was walking to the lake when she saw a large turtle. She didn't have time to run as it was coming toward her. She saw the turtle begin to climb out the water. She was amazed at the turtle's size and strength. She knew it would be a great experience for her.

Fire. When my father left for work one day, he brought a firecracker with him. I had not set one on, so I left it on a nearby desk. A few minutes later, I heard a loud noise and saw smoke everywhere. My father said he had set the fire, but I felt guilty because I didn't do anything. I eventually cleaned up the mess and put out the fire.

New Phone. Tom wanted to buy a new phone. He was tired of the same phone he already had. He knew that the price of the phone would be too high. He decided to sell the old phone he had. He bought a new phone.

Animal Instinct. My dog was always scared of other dogs. One day he ran into a box. There was a monkey inside. I grabbed the dog and I kicked it in the head. I was scared the dog wouldn't be able to walk away.

The Celery. Beth was making celery on the stove. The vegetables started to sprout and change colors. She noticed some tiny grains of celery. Beth decided to let the celery go for a few minutes to let the color come back. The celery is now bright green.
Bishop. Sam was driving around town. He noticed a homeless man. He saw a church. Sam asked the man if he was Catholic. The man said yes.

Jimmy Races. Jimmy is very fast and has the fastest heart in his family. Jimmy is invited to his neighborhood race by his friend. Jimmy is nervous because he is scared of running into people. Jimmy gets nervous because he wants to win the race. Jimmy gets the championship and is so happy.

Playing in a Band. My friend and I were very into music growing up. He was really into jazz, so I was into rock and roll. My friend was into country, so I was into country. We played the same tunes, usually from school. We got on very well and became good friends.
Spaghetti. Kia was making spaghetti. She was afraid to taste it. But then the noodles came out of the oven. It was delicious. Kia decided that she would never go out of town without spaghetti again.

Coming Out. Gina had always been very embarrassed. She was dating a very nice man named Tim. He thought she should go out with him. But he was married and didn't have much money. And he wasn't really interested in her anyway.
Dylan's new car. Dylan had a new car. He was very proud of it. Dylan couldn't wait to drive it. He drove it everyday. He was happy with his new car.

New App Department. My favorite app department is the one where the apps are named. I decided to have a different name for the department. I named it the App Development department. The name worked, so I created a new one. The new name is the App Development department.

Bob and the Donkey. Bob had wanted a donkey for a long time. He took one out to the park and played with it. Soon it became bored of him and went away. He went back home and bought a new one. Now his dog is never bored again.
Tail rider. It was the morning of the race. The car started to make noise. Trevor was really tired. He jumped out of his seat. Trevor was able to win the race.
Lost charge. My phone battery was dead. I had forgotten to charge it. I looked all over the house for it. I found it in the car park near a pond. It was there, but I had forgotten to charge it.

Becca's Christmas Kitten. Becca was on her way home from school one Christmas morning. She was about to go in the house, but her kitten stopped her. She tried to find her kitten but couldn't find him anywhere. She couldn't find her cat either, and she had no room in the house. Suddenly, Becca realized she had a stray kitten waiting for her.

Science Dissection. Kelly was doing science class. But then she noticed that she had a science project to do. She decided to study the ingredients to make some amazing food. But the teacher told her that the students can only study the ingredients for one project. She ended up failing the class.

A Hot Day. The weather had gotten much cooler. Anna was so excited to be going on her first day of summer vacation. She put on a lot of clothes and went outside. She was excited to go swimming. Anna had a hot day and had to stay in bed.

Robot Fighting. My daughter works at a school. We had to hold a robotics competition on campus. The competition had lots of robots. Everyone ran against each other. I thought it was the best event ever.
Knitting. I was a knitter. I wanted to make a scarf. I found a picture online. I worked with a needle to sew the design. The scarf was beautiful.

Large water slide. Lisa loved to ride large slides. She took a few of them with her to work one day. As she approached the end of the slide, a large tree fell onto it. A small tree was also cut in half by a large slide. Lisa had to run from the slide and get help.

Cat eats the Dog Treats. It was a busy night at the cat's cage. The cage door was open and it was raining outside. All the cats and dogs in the cage were playing outside. The cat felt hungry and snacked on a bowl of food. The dog started chewing on the bowl and began to eat the treats.

Jane and Cat. Jane and her sister Cat were at the park. Jane got Cat to go under the tree. Jane saw a huge spider crawl out of the tree. She screamed for Cat to get under. Cat ran to hide under the tree but Jane saw her.

Surfing Scare. Timothy was at the beach with friends. He decided he wanted to surf. Timothy went out into the water. He tried to swam off the edge and made it back. Timothy didn't surf again until after school.

Girl Friend. Allie's mom was really jealous. Allie decided to ask out her friend. They went to the park together. Allie was nervous but she ended up getting over it. Allie was happy to be the girl friend her mom wanted.

Chatty Kathy. Kathy noticed that her friends were always texting each other. She knew she had to stop but could not stop. One day Kathy decided she had to answer a text. She did not get a reply. Kathy had to go to the police about what had happened.

Scuffed. My dad worked on a construction site. The contractor was trying to finish up one of the tunnels. The work was still going on. On the very last day, the contractor hit a nail and ripped a hole in his foot. His foot was swollen shut for months and he was very sore for months.

Slow Internet. Jane went to the local Starbucks. The waitress was a very slow person. Jane tried to ask her what they were working on but she didn't have any response. She was very upset about her lack of information. Jane decided to not go back and order coffee.

Baseball Slide. Jim and his baseball team were practicing for the game. They were trying to do a baseball slide on a dirt mound. Jim didn't understand how the slide worked. His team did a good job practicing. When the game came Jim couldn't believe how good they were.

Lester Jumps Rope. Lester is trying to climb a ladder to the top of the building. However, he slips and falls. Lester is unable to climb back up the ladder. Lester is upset he can't climb the ladder. He buys himself a new ladder and hangs it on the wall.
Peanut. I decided to make some peanut butter cookies. I had never made peanut butter before. My husband told me the recipe. It looked pretty. My husband made the best peanut butter cookies.
Water Skiing. Tom wanted to try water skiing. His friends told him not to. He decided to just go for it. He made the right decision. He made it to the top of the mountain and then flew away.

Angkor Wat. I was visiting Angkor Wat, Cambodia, in 2001. I decided to visit the famous statue. It was amazing to see its intricate construction. I thought it was the best place ever to visit Angkor Wat. After visiting Angkor Wat, I went back.

Worse Than Before. In the days of yore there was a terrible drought in Oklahoma. It was like a cold, frozen, tornado. Water was scarce, so people could not flush their toilets. The ground was wet and covered with black mud. The entire town of Oklahoma had to be evacuated because of the drought.

Horatio Finds a Job. Horatio was a college graduate who was looking for a job. He looked in the internet for job opportunities online. Horatio couldn't find a job for the summer. He went home and tried to think of something. Horatio found a job at a clothing company and was excited.

The Cookie Burn. Susie and her husband went to the grocery store. They decided to get a few cookies. The lady gave them a taste and told them it was delicious. Susie had a bad reaction and burned the cookies. She was upset about it.

Construction Workers. The construction workers were working on a big project. The building's roof was going to be torn down. The workers would come back and fix the roof. It took them two weeks to finish it. They decided to put a plaque in front of the roof.

Borrowed Money. I asked my friend if I could borrow $100 to buy a new car. I got the money, but I was not sure how to pay the bill. My friend told me to deposit the money at a bank. I went to the bank and deposited the money at the bank. The bank verified that the money was deposited at the bank.

Scuba Diving. Marianne and Tom went scuba diving in the ocean. Marianne wanted to be the first one to dive underwater. Tom was nervous, and wanted to show it off. After diving for an hour, they started to get dizzy. They had to put on goggles and go back to their beach.

Preacher. When I was little I loved to play with my toys. I thought that the only thing I wanted to play with was Preacher. I would always look up to Preacher as a kid. One day I got so excited that I played a game with my brother. We played a little game, and I was thrilled that I got to play with Preacher.

The evil dad. I was walking with a friend today. Suddenly my dad stopped by and gave me a hug. I asked him what was going on and he told me that I should have stopped by earlier. He gave me some advice on what to do to improve my grades. Now I'm not so sure about having a kid because I'm more grounded.
sad news. Cheryl had just lost her husband. She was distraught. Her daughter wanted to tell her all about it. She asked her on a date. Cheryl ended up falling in love with her daughter.

College. Jenna's college was closed for the semester. Her mom asked her what she wanted to be when she grew up. Jenna gave her all she had to get into college. She had a very good time, studying and partying. Her mother was so proud of her, she decided to marry Jenna.

Punishment. Jenny had been cheating with a guy in high school. He was getting her to come over to his house so he could have a drink. One night he was drunk at his house. She got back to his house and he gave her a big slap. He felt terrible for doing that.
Skip almost drowns. Skip is walking down the street. He sees a group of people. They stop at a gas station. Skip buys a water bottle. He is able to walk home.
Dog. A little girl named Sue went to the park. She saw her dog running and running around. She decided to run after it. Her dog ran for a long time. She finally caught up with him.
A big hike. I decided to go hiking in the mountains. I was really hungry and needed some food. My family decided to go with me. We spent hours hiking in the mountains. We ended up in Arizona.

Ice Cream Day. Ida decided that we were going to have ice cream day. Ida and my friends went outside and sat on the grass. The girls put ice cream cones on the ground. Then they went around the cones to get a bite to eat. We all had ice cream all day long!

I love her too. Sally got her first tattoo after she graduated from high school. She had wanted one for as long as she could remember. Her friends all thought her tattoo was pretty bad. When she got her new one it was pretty good. When she was finally allowed to take it she didn't mind at all.

Jeff goes to the lake. Jeff has been wanting to go to the lake for awhile. One day Jeff goes to the lake and gets sick. Jeff never goes to the lake again. He does not go to the lake to take his medicine. Jeff got sick and missed out on a great day out.

The Saturation Point of Swiss Cheese. Karen was making a batch of Swiss Cheese. It was very hard to make as she had to grind a whole loaf. She was afraid it would be too dry. But she slowly increased the heat of the pan. The Swiss Cheese got much more liquidy and delicious!

Easier Sanctimonious Than Done. My sister-in-law was walking home from work today. She was passing through a church parking lot. She got lost and asked her children to walk her back home. She forgot to lock the door at the end of the street. She was able to get home when they came to pick her up.

Tara's Hat. Tara needed a hat to wear to her office. She could not find anything she liked. She was sad. Then she decided to purchase some at an office supply store. Tara found a beautiful hat at the store she needed.
Recycled Cans. Tom went to the grocery store to buy food. He grabbed a can of soda. It had expired. Tom tried to pour it in his car. The soda was ruined.

Cake. Katherine was baking a cake for a party. She decided to use only the best ingredients she had. She was so excited when she took the cake out of the oven. She placed it on the cake stand and cut into the cake. She then took the cake home to eat.
Jake Falls Off Ladder. Jake loved going to the pool. He climbed up his ladder. He found an easy way out. Jake jumped off the ladder. He fell off the ladder.

Slide. Rita went to her room one morning to get a bite. She was in the middle of her homework when she fell. She hit her head and fell down the stairs. Rita screamed and her parents came to her room. They made her bed and cleaned up the mess.

Grocery Games. Mary wanted to play some games for her brother. They started out with a few games and decided to go shopping. Mary was so excited about the games she decided to purchase two. Mary's brother went to buy two games. Mary had so much fun playing games with her brother.

Track and Field Star. When I was very little, I started competing in track and field. As an adult, I competed for many years. Today I'm very proud of my age. My coach told me today I am the best athlete in our state. Now I'm the state's fastest runner!

Officer Helps. The police officer went outside. He saw an elderly woman in trouble. The woman told the officer her grandson was in trouble. The officer helped the woman. The police officer became very famous.

Sharing. Gina was a great student. But one day, she found that she shared a book with another student. The other student was a total stranger and made fun of Gina. Gina was upset that her classmate had mocked her. She decided that she would keep her books secret so no one else could be hurt.

wallet. Molly was trying to make a good first impression. She went out to the diner with some friends. She ordered a burger and fries. They were out of her town's favorite drink. Molly ended up paying five dollars for her meal.

Roller Coaster. The kids were playing in the backyard. They wanted to go on a roller coaster. They made the sign saying we want to go on a roller coaster. They went to the park and saw the ride. They went to the ride and had fun.

The water on the books. I read a book on the beach one day. I sat on the edge of the water reading the book. Suddenly, the water went down the drain. I turned on the water and the book fell. The water was too full to read the rest of the book.

Christmas Shopping. My parents were busy doing Christmas shopping for the family. We went to Macy's. They had all kinds of things to buy. My favorite item was a beautiful chocolate trinket. My parents were very appreciative.

Dave goes fishing. Dave had been missing from the pool for weeks. He had spent all of last week working out on his boat. When he got home from his work, he was very cold. Dave decided he would go back to the pool to catch fish. Dave headed back into the water and caught a big fish.

Rick's Poor Time Management. Rick is a college freshman. He is going to go to a party with his friends. All of a sudden, a knock on his door. He opened the door and saw his girlfriend. Rick found out he is now dating a girl at the party.

Faker. Brent really wanted to take the test, but his mom had an exam to take. Brent had never studied for that test before, and got very nervous. As the test began, he quickly studied and began studying for his math test. Brent got very nervous, but his teacher encouraged him to study. Brent did a good job at the test, and was able to pass.

Cookies. Sara wanted to make cookies. She went to the store to purchase cookies. She started at the store to buy the ingredients. At the end of the day she gave the finished cookies to her friends. Sara had a great time baking cookies.

Stage. I was on stage at the school play. I got up and ran across the stage to get my clothes. A little boy came up to me and asked if he could have my shoes. I got up and said that was fine. He let me walk out without having to pay for them.

Great American Story. Bob was about to leave for a trip to Las Vegas. He wanted to enjoy the great outdoors. Bob drove all the way to Las Vegas and took the train. He stayed at a local hotel and ate his dinner. He rode the train back home to Florida.

Soapmaking Disaster. My grandmother used to make her own soap. Her soap was very strong. One day my grandpa told me he would be leaving for his summer. It took forever to get to him. Now my grandmother can't make her own soap at all.
Bacteria. Lily is on a plane. She is in the first class. Her seat has a toilet. When she reaches the bathroom she sees an unpleasant smell. She looks out the window and realizes there is a dirty bed.

Eyebrow pulling. Eve had a small black spot on her eyebrow. She tried to get the black stuff out but couldn't get it out. She called her mother about it. Her mother suggested that she use a brow lift to get it out. Eve was so relieved to have the brow lift done!

New Bag. It had been a while since I last went to the beach. I decided I needed a new bag to carry my groceries. I researched what I wanted to buy and tried to shop around. At the grocery store I found a perfect one and bought it. The bag is very functional and packs so many items I need.
The Dog. Amy was cleaning her house. She decided to check on her dog. She went over to her dog. Her dog was laying down. Amy decided to get some more food.

Choose. Diane loved to paint and enjoyed playing with her paintbrush. But, Diane decided she wanted to choose a color. Diane looked all over the store to choose a color. Eventually, Diane decided on a dark pink and black. Diane began to paint her house for her boyfriend.

Ridiculing. One day, one of my friends decided to do a trick. She got her friend over to the corner and had her put her clothes on. She then went back to her room. Her friend laughed when she saw that she had a full suit of clothes. To make up for it, she made her clothes even more hideous.

Low Carbs. I needed to lose weight. I decided to start a healthy eating plan. I was able to lose 20 pounds in just a few months. My wife noticed that I had stopped drinking soda. My wife found out and was very angry.
Ice Cream Truck. A boy was playing outside. He found a really nice ice cream truck. He rode in it all the time. It was the coolest thing he'd ever seen. He drove to his house to get it.

Snow Cone Surprise. When Sue's parents invited her over to the house, she was excited. The house was filled with lots of snow cones. Her parents had set the snow cones outside to surprise her. It was a very snowy night and Sue had no idea where she would sleep!She woke up to the sound of her parents knocking on the door.

First day of Seventh grade. Gina was walking to her classroom. She heard a noise coming from the corner of her eye. She looked up and saw a girl behind her crying. She pulled up in front of the girl and she apologized. Gina realized it was her friend from sixth grade who had been crying.

Expired plan. Katherine is going to go shopping with her parents. They are going to shop at the grocery store. When she gets there she realizes she has a deadline. She does not know what to do with the extra money. She decides to buy her parents another package.
A Milk-Tooth. I was in a grocery store. My mother was trying to get me to buy milk toothpaste. I asked her to buy some ice cream. She said yes. I went to my car and got my toothpaste.

Mantis. Samantha was swimming in the pool when she got a horrible feeling. It was a mantis!Her foot was on the bottom of the pool. She was scared but not afraid enough to run. Afterward she went home and tried swimming again.

Mother knows best. I recently got a new car. It has an electric motor and drive belt. The mother knows best what to do to keep the car running. I decided to buy a smart charger. It has the electric motor in my car.

The Eyebrow Burn. Tom saw someone having a fight on the bus. They were fighting over a girl in the next seat. When Tom tried to intervene, he saw that the girl had a big tear on her cheek. Tom decided to try and help out. He got a piece of paper and started to write a note for the girl.

Scared. Jill was driving on the interstate when a big truck came rolling down the road. She was scared. The truck was a semi and it stopped in the middle of the interstate. Jill ran to the truck and jumped in. The truck drove off and Jill went home.
The Kitten. Nate was walking his kitten. It ran right by him. The kitten sniffed at him. The kitten scolded Nate. Nate realized it was an angry cat.
Gloves. I had to get gloves to go to the store. I was wearing gloves. I was wearing them and a fly landed in my ear. I had to get some medicine and put the gloves on. I then left with a good feeling.
The Bonus. Benny was at the casino. He was going to win some chips. He decided to bet them on the slots. He didn't win the bonus. But he could have won the jackpot.
Tired. I had a really boring day at work. My boss asked me to take a break. I was exhausted and I felt sick. Then, my co-workers and I all went home. So, my boss gave me some time to rest.

Group Activity. Last night my group gathered at a local park. When we arrived, I was able to get to the park. I had to leave at 6:30pm because I was late. When I went to the park, the group sat in the park and talked. The next day, my group went back home with some snacks.
Need a Job. Amber needed a new job. She got a call from a recruiter. He told her she didn't have to apply. She got the letter and the phone rang. It was the company asking her for her number.
Study Up. Tim went to his first science class. He wanted to do well. He spent a lot of time studying. At the end of the day, he made a really good grade. Tim is happy to have studied well.

The camp pen pal. Amber loved to camp out. It was fun to get together at campsites. One day she noticed an open spot at the campground. She put her phone in it. Her boyfriend, who had not visited for a while, came over and signed her up.

Jane's nail party. Jane was having a party at her house. She invited all her friends. All her friends wanted to go, but Jane wanted to have a nail party. She put a lot of nail polish in her nail polish remover. She was glad her friends would have a party.

New Music. Kelsey was in the car with her friend and they were listening to music. Suddenly, Kelsey started getting sick. She felt very faint and began to pass out. Her friend then helped her to the ambulance. After an hour in the hospital, Kelsey's friend found her voice and apologized.
Sam's Sail. Sam's dad got sick. He had to go to the hospital. Sam was really bummed. He was too tired to go to the beach. Sam went home to his mom.
The Casino. The family was headed to the casino. They picked a hotel near their house. They paid a $200 deposit. They got into the casino. They loved their stay!

Construction. Diana had a job interview. When she got there, she realized she didn't have a coat. She walked down to the parking lot. A man gave her a coat and took her coat. Diana was a big help to the construction crew.

The Little Pig. One day, Sarah went to the grocery store to buy some apples. After she got home, she went to the pet store to look for a pet pig. Sarah found a large black pig and named it Piggy. Sarah brought Piggy to her grandma and told her how happy she was. Sarah's grandma took Piggy to a shelter and they adopted Piggy.

Thief. We had to go to the bank after work one day. I noticed I was late getting my check on time. I asked a teller if I could use her money for a snack. She told me she couldn't pay for snacks because she's an ATM. I decided to walk home without the money.

The Garage. I was driving down the street one day. I had a lot of dirt in my car. I decided to dig a hole in the dirt and put some gravel in there. I then started to do a lot of driving. I realized the dirt was too heavy to carry all of the gravel.

Total scare. Tina and her friends went to Disney World on vacation. While they were there they had a few scares. They saw all kinds of scary things. Tina started shaking. She ended up crying because of the scares.

Oogum Boogum. I was walking through the park with my friends. I had a big cup of oatmeal with a bag of cookies in it. We were playing around when I decided to run in the middle of the street. When I tried to walk back, I tripped over the bag of cookies on the ground. I fell and ruined the oatmeal so I had to throw it away.

Boredom. Gina's parents were always very bored. Gina could never understand why. Gina found out that she was always alone. Gina knew that she was never lonely but did not want to leave. Gina decided to spend the night with her grandparents.

Too Much. Diana bought herself some makeup to look great at the mall. She put it on with a few pieces. Then, she took some shopping for her hair. Soon, she was wearing her new makeup. It looked great on her face and her hands.

Lilly's Song. Lilly wanted to sing a song. She had a friend come over with a copy of the song. She decided to write the song. She took out the music and put it in a folder. Lilly's friend played the song and they loved it.

Money for Groceries. Tom needed money to pay his rent. He saved up all of his money to get groceries. Tom brought the groceries to the store to buy them. Tom got the groceries and they were worth money. Tom was able to pay his rent on time.

The Cave. I went hiking with my friends. A cave had formed. I had to climb up a mountain to get to the top. I could not go without my climbing gear. I was in the cave for 3 hours and did not have any food.
Messed up baking. Tina had baked a cake. Unfortunately her cake came out great. She had not gotten it all done properly. Tina made a huge mess. It made her very angry.

The Rental Car. Bob really wanted to rent a car. He thought he had enough to buy a new car. Bob visited his friend's house. Bob asked him if he had any spare parts for a car. Bob finally got the necessary parts.

Mystery. I was at the library looking through books. There was a book on history on my desk. I kept looking, but couldn't find the book. My friend called me over to his place. He had it there when I was there looking for it.

Albert's Girl Problems. Albert had a big fight with his girlfriend. They were very unhappy in the bedroom. They both went to the hospital for tests. They were diagnosed with post-coital depression. Albert had to take a month off to recover.

Coup d'etat. Last week a new president took office. He was very unpopular with the people. He promised to change things for the better. He promised to bring jobs to America. People voted for him because he promised that.

Wine. Jane wanted to be healthier, so she went to a restaurant. They had a wine menu that she had never tried before. She ordered a bottle of Chardonnay. It was delicious and Jane was thrilled. She was able to get it all on the same day.

Trade Argument. One day, the man got an idea. He wanted to trade his car for a car on eBay. He did his research and found a lot of good options. He thought he'd get more out of the car than he'd pay. He ended up leaving the seller a nice car.
Danny moves out. Danny moved into an apartment with his girlfriend. He needed some space. Danny's girlfriend broke up with him. Danny was sad. He moved out to an apartment with roommates.

The stolen bike. Tim was riding his bike down a busy street. He saw a stranger on a bike with his bike. The stranger demanded Tim's bike back. Tim was reluctant, but he reluctantly handed over the bike. Luckily the stranger offered to give him $10 and buy the bike back.

Relaxing Weekend. Jane loved to play in her backyard on weekend afternoons. She had one set of swings that were large and easy to use. Jane loved her swings so much that she even bought a new set. All weekend long Jane loved the extra time she could spend with her new swing set. Jane is glad that her yard is now an indoor garden.

The American Dream. Tina loved school. She did all of her schoolwork in front of a big classroom. One day, the teacher asked her to write an essay. Tina wrote her essay and it made the paper!Tina and her friend moved back to California and never left school!

Mile Club. Rita and her friends decided to go to the local mile club. They all wore their favorite tracksuits. Rita was the fastest runner. They all made it to the finish line first. The boys were all so happy they could join Rita!

The Swimming Test. Timmy was swimming in the pool at the park. He was just about to get ready. Suddenly a big wave hit his board. Timmy jumped and was knocked over. He fell into the pool and was soaked for several hours.

Elizabeth's Bedroom. Elizabeth was a freshman in college. She wanted to impress her boyfriend by building a big bed. She decided to buy one from a garage sale. She built the bed in three days. She and her boyfriend went to their dorms that night.

Migraines Or A Career. Cathy had a severe migraine. Cathy knew she was going to have to get help. After a couple of weeks, Cathy felt much better. One day Cathy decided to quit her job. Cathy's headache no longer bothered her.
Deadly consequences. Kendall was a bad child. She got bullied everyday. Her mother finally had enough. She locked her up. Kendall was forced to go to therapy.
Acting strangely. Kelly was in a theater acting troupe. She was supposed to be in a play. She was there for a rehearsal. But all she did was stand in the front row. Kelly looked very strange.

Digs. Kate's grandmother had a large collection of antiques. She loved all the antiques she owned. One day Kate's grandmother brought her to the museum. Kate thought the antiques were cool. Kate and her grandmother bought an antiques shop.

Highway. Tom was driving to the grocery store. A tractor trailer hit his car and ripped the front right tire. Tom was very worried about losing control. He was scared of going on the highway. Tom was so relieved to be safe.

Expensive Accident. Mary was at the grocery store. All of a sudden, she heard a loud bang!She saw a bottle of liquid splashed down into her hand. Mary's hand was swollen shut. It was a pretty costly accident that Mary had to pay for.

Rick and the Ball. Rick and the boys went to the park to play catch. While they were having fun the ball went too fast and hit the other boy. The other boy got mad and kicked the ball. Rick was able to catch it and kick it back towards the other boy. Rick didn't get the ball back so he had to go home and change.

Prom. I asked her to prom today. She said yes. It was a hot day outside so we had to go to the mall. She showed me how to navigate through the crowd. We decided to meet at a gas station in the evening for drinks.

First Night. Barry woke up early in the morning to go to his first concert. He was scared since the other night he was assaulted by a fight. He was so excited about going and getting to see his favorite band. When he got to the front of the stage, he was surprised to see someone was holding his arm. Luckily he had his cell phone with him.
An Amazing Woman. Samantha was in an accident. Her legs were badly injured. She was in a wheelchair. People told her she had a beautiful body. Samantha saw the beauty in her appearance.

School play jitters. I was in a play for school. My teacher had been telling me it was very hard to play. I got very nervous the whole time. When it was over, I was very happy. I went to class feeling much better.
Cheap candy. Jim wanted to buy some candy. His friends suggested he eat some cheap candy. Jim thought it was a good idea. Jim ended up eating some cheap candy. Jim ended up eating a ton of candy.

Drained Battery. I used to use my iPhone a lot in class. One day the charger in my pocket broke. The battery in my phone got drained. My friends told me not to touch my phone. Now I have to bring my phone in class to charge it.

College Graduate. Ben was a sophomore in college. He was very nervous about his first semester. He tried to do his best at all the classes he took. During the final exam, Ben failed all three tests. Ben decided that he would never become a college graduate.

Elephants. It was an ordinary Saturday afternoon in New York City. The subway was running late. A few seconds later, the trains would start to move again. The circus was coming. I was going to be a clown.
Bedroom. I got an apartment. I needed a bedroom. I went to the hardware store. I picked out some nice fabric. I got it done.

Cooper and the tadpole. Cooper was playing in the yard. Suddenly a tiny tadpole appeared in his field. Cooper played with the tadpole for several minutes. When he went back into the yard he found the tadpole dead. He quickly returned the tadpole back to its mother.

Bad Bridge. Tom was riding his bike down a steep hill. Suddenly he heard a loud crack. Tom was caught in a giant chain-link fence. Tom had to climb back up the hill. Tom was scared of heights and was never ridden again.

Work. Brock wanted to be a good manager. He decided to ask a friend of his what he should do. The friend suggested he work on the school's computer. The next day Brock went to the computer lab to do work. His friend was very impressed and gave him the job.

All You Can Eat. Anna wanted to go to All You Can Eat for lunch. She asked her husband for a reservation. Her husband said they wouldn't be coming. The restaurant closed down. Anna had to buy a new lunch.

The Last Bus. Tina had just got off work and her car was running low. She decided to make a quick stop to get something to eat. She pulled over to get a burger for lunch and her lunch lady gave her a free ride. Tina got back on the bus and was able to see the next stop. On the bus, she watched the last bus leaving to the next stop.
Note. It was getting cold outside. Kim wanted to go outside. Her brother told her no. Kim was sad. She was going to go outside.

Trapped Cat. We were driving around. We were trying to pass a large tree. Suddenly, we heard a crunching sound. It was a cat trapped underneath the tree. We called animal control and then rushed to the house.

Caught in the rain. My neighbor, Lisa was making a picnic with friends. Lisa decided she wanted to put a tent in the back yard. One of her friends took off with her umbrella. Lisa's umbrella fell and broke. She was trapped in the rain all night.

The Sunscreen. It had been raining hard all week. Liz had trouble getting the sun off her face. She wore a lot of sunscreen all day. Her skin turned green and she got a rash. Luckily, the rash didn't look as bad.
Bicycle Accident. Nia was riding her bike across town. Suddenly, her handlebars came off of the handlebars. She fell on the ground. She hit the ground with a great crash. She sustained a broken neck.

Going to the Park. I was going to go to the park for a fun afternoon. I went to the local park. I took a nice walk around the grass. Finally, I came back and found it was closed. I had to cancel the fun and head home.

Lost. Sally lost her phone while in the restroom. She was on the way to a meeting. She realized she had forgotten to call her father. The next day her father called her. Sally realized she had lost the phone.

The Climb. Ethan needed to climb to the top of a mountain. He knew the path to the top was short, but he knew the risk. He grabbed his gear and went to the trail head. He was going to face the world's greatest mountain lions. The hike was very hard and exciting.

Water for Cats. Mandy was playing with a cat at her home. She played with the cat on the playground. The cat ran into the water to get out. The cat began to swim toward the house. Mandy and the cat went back inside.

Paycheck. Lucy was working a fast food job. One day the line to pay for the check was long. The worker kept on working and then stopped. Lucy got out to pay for the check. A security guard told her that she had no money.

Gymnastics. One day my class was going to get together. We decided on gymnastics. We were going to have a team show on Friday night. When the show was over, everyone was very excited. They were really good and the next day, I was proud.
The Wedding. Martha was getting married. She was nervous. Her friends and family took her to the movies. The day came and she got to see her husband. It was an awesome day.

Internet Addiction. Jim was addicted to the internet. One night he decided he had to go to a party. He decided to drink some vodka. Jim drank more vodka and more. He then got blackout drunk and ended up dying in the party.
Fallen Tree. It was dark outside. Sue had left her Christmas tree outside. Then she heard a loud noise. The tree fell down!Sue couldn't believe her luck!
Lazy. Lucy got very lazy after she stopped eating. She was never satisfied. She was tired of eating every day. Lucy decided to switch to a diet. Lucy loved her new lifestyle.
Break. I got a call from my friend. He wanted to make a phone call to me. I answered it. I told him I needed to go to the store. He told me I would have a ride back home.

Bryan and the song. Bryan was watching his favorite song on youtube. Suddenly, he noticed an advertisement for a new album. Bryan looked up the artist on his album. Bryan was ecstatic to see he had the song recorded. After listening to the album, Bryan was thrilled to find the song was not on the album.

Roberto's Job Search. Roberto got a new job as a computer support technician. He started working with computers immediately. The computer support technicians were very helpful to him. Roberto learned many things from them. Roberto is now a successful computer support technician.
Fast car. I was speeding down the street. I ran over a parked car. I hit my brakes too hard. The car I hit went off the road into a ditch. I was only arrested for speeding.
Sabrina is crushed. Sabrina is upset. She decides to go and talk to the counselor. She visits the counselor and they discuss her problem. The counselor gives Sabrina some support to move forward.
Vacation. It was a hot day in the summer. Kia needed a vacation. She could not find a job that paid the bills. She looked in her garage. She found what she was looking for and packed her bags.

Scary Snake. I decided to go to the lake for a relaxing swim. I was afraid of snakes so I bought some snake repellent. I lay in the sand to watch them and was not afraid. Afterwards I went to the bathroom and was afraid of all snakes. So I learned to stay in the bathroom and not fear snakes.

The candle choice. I was trying to decide which candle to buy. I looked at all the options. I narrowed it down to one that I liked. When I finally got it home, it burned the candles wonderfully. I loved this candle choice so much, I bought it.

Lacrosse. John had been playing lacrosse for two weeks. John decided to try out for the lacrosse team. John was nervous about how he would do. John practiced every day and practiced hard. When the day came John made the team!

The tractor. I was on my way to work one day. Suddenly my tractor went off the road. My family had to call my friend, who brought a new tractor. We drove it to the store, where my sister helped me fix it. I am very thankful for my new friend.

Showing Is Believing. Sandy and her friends were hanging out on the deck one day. Suddenly, Sandy heard a noise. She heard some kind of screaming and ran out the door. Sandy went to the beach but saw no one there. When she asked her friends what happened, they didn't know either.
Crushes. Ivan and I were going to a dance party. As we sat at the bar, Ivan said a few words. Ivan wanted to talk to me. Ivan's wife came over. Ivan left me a sweet note, and I kissed her.

Onions and Garlic. Gina was feeling sick and wanted to stop eating onions. She looked up an onion cure. The recipe required garlic but Gina was allergic to garlic. The ginger ale was just as good without garlic. Gina decided to continue to eat onions and garlic despite her sickness.
Just Beachy. Kim needed a haircut. She wasn't sure what to get. Her friend suggested an exotic. Kim ordered an exotic. The exotic ended up being too beachy.

Student Loans. Jody was getting ready for college in three weeks. She decided to save some money to take out loans. She put her student loan amount on a budget. Jody was able to pay off all her loans within 3 months. She went back to school and became a better student.

Forgetful Daisy. My girlfriend and I decided to go out. We both went to the same bar. We talked for a while about our interests. She told me that she doesn't remember what we were talking about. We decided to have a drink and had a good time.
Aaron. Aaron had been feeling sick all day. Aaron's mom had said he had an allergy to eggs. Aaron got up early to put on a suit. He went to school and looked in the mirror. Aaron felt so much better.

Cold, wet lesson. When Kim got home from school she saw that she had wet the floor. It was so cold that she could barely walk. So, Kim decided to play outside in the snow. So, she put a blanket over herself. But she realized it was actually just another lesson!
Tails. Jane had always been very timid. One day, she was walking down the road. She got a scare. Her tail ended up hitting a tree. Jane was so terrified she was no longer scared.

William loses the game. William was playing football with friends. They were on a field goal drive. The ball ended up in William's hands. He made the first play of the drive. William was elated when he scored the winning touchdown!

Blood Plasma. Tom was an experienced actor who was preparing for his big day. The day was finally here. He was going to get to do some intense scenes. He didn't like the first scene. It was too dark so he had to switch it up for the second.

Hummingbird Day. In a small village, one of the villagers had an eagle. The villagers decided to have a bird-catching day. They gathered up all their supplies and came to the woods. The villagers loaded all the food, water, and bird-food into the truck. They set out in the afternoon to catch birds.

Out. One day after school, Kim was out playing with her friends. She heard a knock on the door. She opened the door and saw two boys behind her. They were talking to her about a prank. They told her she was a liar.
Question. Tim was having a party. He asked the waiter for drinks. He got all kinds of different drinks. Tim left early with the biggest drinks. Tim ended up taking one of the cheapest.

Loss of Energy. Jane was working in the kitchen. Her hair was a bit frizzy. Suddenly, she noticed that she was losing her energy. Jane tried to be more aware of what was going on. However, she still wasn't able to get the job done.
