A Car Purchase. My friend bought a used car from us recently. The car was used and he didn't have much money. He got it for us because he knew we would be able to pay for it. He also told me that if we didn't like it, he would let me take it. The car was very expensive and we could never pay it back.

Trying. Kurt was trying to finish his project. He found a bug in his paper. He was worried that it would take him days to finish it. Then, his friend suggested he try not to finish it. He did it in half the time and finished his project in a few days.

IHOP. IHOP was the oldest fast food restaurant in America. When it opened, it was so great!Everyone came and ordered fast food. People tried everything, and the food was always great. IHOP was successful, and people wanted it again!

Runaway Bride. Susie wanted to be a bride. She had been married for years. So she did her best to plan it. She decided she was going to have a surprise party for her. She asked her husband if he would be her date for the surprise.

Colorado. The city of Colorado was being overrun with aliens. Their leader ordered them to kill the locals. The locals were afraid, but they resisted. Finally the aliens were killed and the locals were saved. The locals loved it because they knew that the aliens were finally gone.

Insecurities; or How I Learned That Even Your Friends Will Hold You Back Because of Theirs. Tim was at the mall with friends. He felt like he wanted to meet someone. But as he walked into the girls restroom he felt uncomfortable. The two girls he met on the bus seemed like they were more than friends. Tim wished he hadn't been there when they found him.
Driving. My wife's sister lives in Georgia. She is an elderly woman. Recently I visited Georgia. I saw her in front of the church. I was in awe of the beauty of her home.

Mexican Food. Milly is a college graduate living in Texas. She decided to get a job as a waitress. Her friends urged her to go back to her native Mexico. Milly's stomach was grumbling all day. Luckily, she was able to get a job working at Taco Bell.
New album. Lily was so excited for a new album. She waited a long time for the album. She finally got to hear it. Her favorite album is the album she wanted. Lily was happy.

New Car. I bought a new car. I got all the paperwork done. When I drove the car home, my car was totaled. I spent a week looking at my car and it looked like it was a totaled car. My car was worth much more than I paid for it.
Stampede. I was going to the zoo. I was going to get a stamp. I noticed the kids were on a leash. I got up to get the stamp. I got it stuck to my leg.

The Tie. A woman was working on a project. She accidentally dropped a pair of expensive ties. She quickly found a replacement pair. The replacement ones were even better. She was able to complete her project faster.

Puppy. The family was having trouble finding a dog to take to the pet store. They went to a show and found a nice black lab. They named the puppy Kia. The next day she was going to the pet store. The family gave her away and went home with a pet.

The Scam. Dan was taking an online course. He wanted to learn how to code online. He signed up for the course and entered a code. Unfortunately, Dan was not able to complete the course. Dan decided to go back and start his own course next semester.

The Swimming Lesson. My son and I decided to swim in the water in our front yard. When we got to the water, we were very nervous. It seemed as though the water would be very rough. Eventually, we got to our favorite spot and were fine. When we got back home, we watched the video of our fun day.

Power Plant. One day, my wife's uncle came to visit. He had just recently built a large power plant. He showed us the construction site and said how important it was. When it was all finished, he told us that there was a good price on it. We agreed with him and bought it.

Snake Eating. Tori went out for a hike in her back yard. Suddenly her dog came and sat by the tree. Tori was terrified as the dog chewed her leg. Tori looked at her dog and saw a huge snake sitting there. Tori was frightened but quickly ran back inside the house.

New Friends. Kate was excited to go to the dance. She knew that the girls were going to be there. Kate had never been before. They were going to meet each other at the dance. They were really into each other and bonded over dancing.

The Orange. Jenny was trying to decide what to get for Easter. She went to the grocery store. She bought a carton of orange slices. Then she bought a carton of vanilla. Jenny was in a hurry to eat everything.

Jake Goes Fishing. Jake was driving on the highway in his car. He was bored and wanted to have a few laughs. He had not had much fun with his current car. He decides to go fishing. Jake caught two fish and was happy.

New Dog. John really wanted a new dog. He visited a rescue center and got a puppy. John spent the next 3 weeks getting comfortable with the new dog. Soon John had a brand new dog that was loving him!He is now a great dog companion!
Jimmy's Weight. Jimmy was very thin. Jimmy wanted to gain weight. He tried some exercise. He tried eating a lot less. Jimmy gained a lot of weight.

Boiling Corn. Lucy and her family lived near a well. One day Lucy heard a very loud noise. She thought it was water from her water heater. She turned the water on to see what was going on. When she turned the water back off, the water was boiling.

Todd Helps Out. Todd was an elderly lady who had dementia. The doctor told Todd that he would need medication for it. Todd decided to buy himself a prescription from his doctor. Todd bought himself some meds as well. Todd was relieved that he was not a danger to others.

Reading Challenge. Lana wanted to challenge her mom to a reading challenge. She went to the library to get books and started reading. She was really frustrated to not have any books. Her mom bought her a book to read for her. They both finished reading.
Bad reaction. Kaya was having a baby. She was carrying it everywhere. She was so scared it would hurt. Her baby came out. It had a terrible reaction.

Dead Plants. The leaves on the window were turning brown. A strong wind had blown the leaves from the tree. They were starting to rot. We took the leaves off the window to clean them. They were all pretty gross looking.

Skydiving. Kate and her mom went skydiving. They went down the ladder. Then Kate was the only person on the team. She was the only person with blue skis. Kate loved her freedom and her time on skydiving.

Dancing shoes. Rita was shopping at the mall for a new pair of shoes. She was looking for a nice pair of shoes that would not be too big. The mall was packed and she couldn't find a pair that fit her. Rita looked all over the place until she found a pair in a brand she liked. She bought the pair and wore them to work every day.

New Shoes. Susie was looking for a new pair of shoes. She asked her friends for suggestions. They all told her she should get a pair from a local brand. She went to the shoe store and picked out a pair. She was glad she got a pair of shoes.

Scary Sleepover. Maggie was at a sleepover with her friends. She was very nervous. She was going to go to sleep on the floor. When she woke up, she could not figure it out. She screamed and ran from the room.
Phone. I recently bought a new phone. It has a large screen and large battery. It has good battery life. I use it daily. I plan on buying another phone.
Ladoo. My dog Landon was in the park today. It seemed he liked to bark. Landon wanted to get in the dog box. He banged on a nearby tree. My dog Landon became so tired and ran home.
Spider. I once was walking along the beach. I saw a man sitting on the sand. He started to say something to me. I turned around and went back to my house. I told him I didn't want to talk about it.

Classroom. Sandra was excited because her class was starting soon. The bell had rung and they were going to the school library. Sandra asked her friend Beth to take her in. Her friend agreed. Sandra sat in her chair all day, reading books.

Katie Courier. Katie was excited to get home after two weeks of vacation. She was hoping to find her favorite chocolate bar at her door. When she opened her front door, the door was locked!Katie was so sad, but was relieved to find a cupboard for her favorite food. Katie's favorite cupcake was in the cupboard, though, and she was excited to bake it.
Stamp collector. I started collecting stamps in college. I had a couple hundred from that period. I went to a show and took away the stamps. I ended up getting rid of them. They are in my closet.
Loud Snoring. Susie was snoring loudly. It made everyone in her room uncomfortable. She had been snoring for several minutes. It was getting loud in the house. Her parents took her to the doctor.
Tavon. Tavon was my friend. He was a nice guy. We got into an argument over football. Tavon wanted to play, but I said he wasn't my friend. I took him home, and told him I love him.

Karate Class. Briana was excited to learn how to throw a punch. She got up at 3 am to practice. When the teacher got there, she noticed the students were very quiet. She asked if they were all here to learn how to punch. The students refused to answer and she gave up.

The concert. Sandy loved to go to music shows. One night, she decided to go see her favorite band. Sandy was nervous as she got dressed for the show. But she did her best and had the time of her life. She had the best time at the concert and will look forward to going back.

Piano. Jill wanted to learn to play the piano. She asked her parents for a piano and some lessons. Her parents were very supportive. Jill got her lessons and began to learn. She eventually became very good at the piano and was accepted into her class.

Fundraising. I had just moved to a new town and I needed to raise funds. I bought a big bag of food to go with my meal and a bottle of milk. I then drove to the market to find people willing to donate. After a few hours, the food and milk were gone!I left the market without any food or milk and was heartbroken.

Money gambling. One of the kids went to a poker game. He won ten thousand dollars. He put it in his pocket and left. When he got home, his mother called him to tell him he lost all. She asked him to deposit the money in a different account.

Happy ending. One day it was Christmas Eve and I had a very hard time with my gift. As I was preparing to open it, my sister came to get me. While she was picking out my gifts, I started to cry. The whole family helped me to put everything away. My sister apologized profusely for not having gotten me the right gifts.

Soda. Ricky went to the local convenience store to buy a soda. He asked to use the bathroom. When he got there he realized he didn't have soda. He took his order. He went to the bathroom and had the soda.

Delivery. Tina was going out of town for the weekend. She was excited to take her kids to a local park. Unfortunately, it was closed due to construction. Tina was frustrated and went back home. She took her kids to the park and returned to work.

Ants. Marge went on a trip to the zoo. She saw a few ants. Marge decided to feed them to the ants. She forgot to close the door so the ants ran away. Marge found out that the ant food was poison so she was scared to eat it.

Forgetful Bob. Bob wanted to be more responsible with his money. He always spent his money more than he should have. One day he decided he didn't need any more money and decided to give it away. He did this to all his friends and loved ones. Now his friends think he's poor and forgetful.

New Hair. Julie decided that she wanted to get a new hair style. She decided that she wanted an edgy style. Julie got the scissors out of her bag and began to cut. She cut through a big knot of hair that was very long. Julie was happy with her new hair.

Eggs. Nancy was at a restaurant with her family. Suddenly, she noticed a bag of eggs. She got so excited, she went right to the kitchen. She picked out all the ingredients. She made a big batch of eggs for her family to eat.

Surprise at school. I was a freshman in college. When I got to school, I looked around to find my classmates. I didn't see them at all!Everyone was laughing. I guess my friends all got picked on because of it!

Fruit. Lisa was out shopping and buying fruit. She found a nice banana. She bought some fruit to eat and had it for dinner. When it was done, she gave it to her friend. The friend was very happy with the fruit!
Bank. I went to the bank for some money yesterday. I sat in a lot of cash registers. I was able to borrow a lot of money. I was able to pay back my loan. My money was in the bank right away.

Desk Builder. Tina loved to design desks. She had her own design studio in her house. She was really into the business and was starting to get clients. She had a very successful business. One day she had to close the business because of poor sales.
Doctor. My doctor told me the cause of my headaches was my allergies. I started taking a medicine. My headaches stopped. My doctor prescribed me more medicine. I started drinking water again.
Arcade night. We went to the arcade and bought a couple games. We also had the chance to play some games on a big TV. I played a video game for 2 hours straight. I'm going to go again.
Vegan. Kelly was really hungry, so she went out to eat. When she got there, she saw a nice vegan menu. She decided to try it. Kelly loved it. She is now vegan and will never miss a meal.

Big Deal. Logan loved to read, and his favorite books were fantasy. He would read through an entire trilogy by a given author before finishing. His favorite book of all was the one he read most often. It was Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix. He kept a close watch of his favorite author's books as the new series came out.

Night Terrors. Kara had gone to a party in her condo. On the way home from the party, she noticed a large storm. The storm started late at night. It knocked over all her electronics. Kara was scared to go back home and see the damage.

Yummy almonds. Samantha was cooking some almond milk. She wanted to make a delicious treat for her friends. Samantha found some almond milk in the fridge. She used it to make an almond butter. Samantha's friends loved her delicious treat.

Deep Cut. We were at a bar. We were drinking and laughing. I decided to take a shot of whiskey. I dropped the drink and it deep cut my finger. The only thing I had to do was wait it out and call an ambulance.

Tow Truck. My truck has been broken in twice. The first time it broke at the end of the road. This time it has broken in on top of a pole. I called a tow truck. The tow truck was able to get it fixed.

Hidden Keys. Gina was at work and couldn't figure out why there were so many keys. She called the manager and the manager gave her two more. She asked the manager why the keys were so shiny. The manager told Gina it was because they were buried inside. Gina had to go and dig a hole in the yard to dig the keys.

Bills big idea. Bills had a huge idea to start a new bank. Bills had a very complicated idea. Bills really wanted to learn it. Bills decided to read books and look for good sources. Bills is a great banker now!

Online Dating. I went on a date yesterday to a nice coffee shop. I met my date in the lobby. She had a large black coffee mug in her hands. It was her favorite mug she had. I bought the mug to give to her.

The kitty finds a home. Kitty was a stray and didn't know anyone. She started to have kittens in her apartment. Kitty noticed a cat and began to call her. After a few days of caring for the cats she named him Catman. Catman is now the nicest kitty in the apartment.

Lamb. Lamb was a girl from a poor family. Lamb wanted to grow up to be a great man. Lamb tried so hard to make herself a good woman. Lamb's mother was so proud of her for all her hard work. Lamb has made so many great women out of her.

Amazing sunglasses. Ava was walking through the mall with some friends. They were looking for some glasses. They stopped at a store and picked out some new glasses. Ava asked them if she could take them home. They gladly agreed and Ava was glad she was getting them.
Sick Day. Tom decided to throw up. So he went to work early. But he got sick. Tom had to go to sick leave. Tom never threw up again.

Jenny's Accident. Jenny had just arrived home from school. She was in the kitchen, preparing dinner. Suddenly, a loud noise rang out in the house. Jenny was horrified to find a huge hole in her front door. Jenny's entire front door had been broken.

Sparky's Fish and Chips. Sparky's favorite restaurant was closed. He decided to make some fish and chips. He boiled and grated fresh fish. He poured the batter into the batter bowl. After the fish and chips were done, he served it to his guests.

Snitch. Sally had been snitching for the Police for two years now. They decided to catch her. They tracked her down to a house near a park. They forced her into a car with the boys. They took her to jail.

Radio. When he was in grade school, Tom was fascinated by radio. It was something he did every day of his life. His teacher always made him listen to the radio and write in it. It was a huge source of fun and satisfaction. Tom decided to be a radio DJ.

Teacher, Teacher. My friend invited me to lunch at her house. I asked her how she was feeling. She said she was fine, and I didn't see her. I walked over to her desk and asked her where she was. She said she was too busy to talk.

A piece of italy. Sue had been on vacation in Italy. As she was relaxing on a beach she felt something strange. She thought it must be a piece of a piece of italy. She realized it was a tiny tooth!She couldn't believe it when she saw it.

Personal space. I've always had trouble living in my own apartment. So my roommate had to take a new job. But when I complained, my roommate would yell at me. She said I was making it too hard on him!Now I'm scared to leave my apartment.

Wild Concert. Lana loved to go see concert. The only problem was she was a very poor concertgoer. Her friends and family encouraged her to go anyway. When Lana got there she was surprised. The concert was great and she was happy to go.

New Business. Samantha had just recently opened up a small business. Her business had been in operation for two weeks. She had to make some changes to her website to make it work. She had to go to the store to purchase a website upgrade. Samantha now has a great website for her business.
Spaghetti. My wife cooked spaghetti for me last night. We went to the store. She bought the ingredients for my wife. The noodles were a bit tough. We were very thankful for the help.

Boredom. Tom had worked all day at his job. He had to go to the store. He forgot the car keys on the ground. He wandered around aimlessly. Eventually he just got out of bed and left.

The Shot. Kelly had an upcoming fight with her boyfriend. She decided to go for a walk to see if anyone was paying attention. When she was walking her phone rang. Kelly quickly pulled it out and answered it. The call was from a guy who wanted her to go to the beach.
Speak. I was having trouble with my friend. He was trying to be friendly. He kept telling jokes to me and I did not like it. I became angry and asked him to stop. I ended up breaking up with him.
Art To Food. A few years ago I went to an art show. There was a famous artist on stage. I got to see her work. Her art was wonderful. I decided to buy her a drink.

The Planets. Caleb was bored on the playground. He decided to play on a planetarium. Caleb took a tour of the planets. The planets were too big for him to fit on the map. He was relieved when his friends told him they didn't have any planets at all.

Lost Cause. Mary needed to take a break from the movie set. She got up early in the morning and went to the kitchen. After leaving the house, she went to her desk. She was tired but went to finish her homework. When she got to her desk, she was too late!

Wrong Guilt. I was on a date with a man. He was making sexual advances. I resisted and told him I'd never do something like that. However, I felt guilty and decided to give in. He wound up breaking up with me.

Jim Opens A Taco Truck. Jim was a Taco Truck driver. He decided to open a taco truck. He found a location on the street. He was very excited to open a taco truck. It was a hit, and Jim was very proud.

One Flew Over The Woman's Head. John was playing soccer. John was up on a breakaway. John scored a goal for his team. The next time he came down the other way he got the assist. He then scored a goal himself!

Sparky's Homework. Sparky had a science project coming up. He was doing a lot of math equations. He didn't want to waste time studying and working. He decided to just practice doing it later. He worked on his project over the weekend.
Soaked. We went out for a walk one day. We walked a long way. We were so tired we fell down. We woke up in the middle of the walk. We went back inside and soaked the socks.
Finding God. Jim wanted to find God. He wanted to find his personal god. Jim's friends convinced him to try searching the internet. Jim did that. He finally found his personal god.

The nerd. Amy decided to go on an adventure. She was going to see a movie and ride a roller coaster. The ride was really fun. Amy rode the roller coaster the whole way. She had a great time at the adventure.

voting. John and John and John were best friends. They were really good friends. They decided to go out together to vote. They went to a local polling station. They were shocked to see that they did not have the votes counted!

Dad saves Son. Derek was driving his dad down the road. He was in a bad crash and had to walk his dad to the hospital. His dad was a great father. He kept Derek safe when he was in need. So when Derek lost his dad to cancer, he was very sad.

The Pens. I went to the pen store to get some pens. I needed a new pen so I looked for a good one. When I found a pen I loved I bought it. I filled my pen tube with ink and I wrote my story. It was my very first pen and I love it.

A Helper. A very young girl was helping a friend out with his house. She didn't realize she had broken a chair. The girl thought it was fine and was able to fix it. When her friend was finished the chair had a whole new set of springs. She then proceeded to start the house on it.
Gary. Gary had a dog. It was his favorite. When his dog died, Gary lost his dog. He found a new dog on Craigslist. Gary brought the new dog home.

Pizza. The restaurant was having a special dinner. They made all their own pizza. They had an hour to eat all their pizzas. All the wait staff had to work very long hours. The restaurant made about a hundred dollars.

Being Greedy. A woman in a supermarket was very angry. She asked the cashier if she could use a coupon code. The cashier was not sure and gave her a code. He gave her five dollars for the code. The woman left the store in the anger and never returned.

Asked to be a bridesmaid. The bride asked her bridesmaids if they would like to be in the reception. They were very excited and took off their dresses. They arrived at the party wearing their gowns. Birthday Cake. Lucy had a birthday one month. She invited all her family and friends. Everyone got together at Lucy's house to celebrate. All the kids decided they wanted to bake her a cake. Lucy was so excited.

Staples. I love to shop at Staples. I have been there for six years now. I've saved hundreds of dollars over that time. One day I got a coupon from Staples. It was a free carton of laundry detergent.

Lost Wallet. Tom got a wallet from the store. He put it in his wallet and started the car. When he got to his house he realized his wallet wasn't there. He checked the car and there was no wallet. Tom decided to just keep the wallet he brought home.

Audio recording. I am working at the computer. My boss is talking to someone. He is trying to record his conversation. I do not have any audio equipment. I used a cell phone and recorded the conversation.

Princess. A woman was making a dress for a party. She was working on it all day, but she kept having doubts. Finally, she found a fabric that felt right. It was a nice, bright pink fabric. She had such a good day at the party, she decided to buy more.

Kilt wearing dad. James had a dad that he really wanted to wear. He always wore him as a baby. But he grew up and stopped wearing him. Then a friend told him about a story. James finally decided to go out with his dad.

Diet. Kara was trying to lose weight. She took her usual diet, but she loved to have protein!One day, she had a meal planned. It wasn't enough protein for her. Instead of cutting it out entirely, she ate half the food!

Lost Shoe. Amber's shoes broke one day. She could not find them. Amber decided to leave them on the couch. Her father found the shoes and fixed them. Amber is glad she took the time to find her shoes.

First date. Kate and Tom went on a first date. They were both nervous and unsure about what to do. It turned out they loved each other. It was a great night and they are going to continue it. Together they are going to have another great time.

Heart. Sam was very unhappy in his life. He felt he wasn't good enough to have his own family. His only goal was to find a spouse. He found a man of faith and decided to marry him. Sam has found the best partner in his life and is happy.

Going Overboard. Dan was walking on the sidewalk in a park. Dan was walking back home when a car cut him off. Dan got out to see what was happening. A man was yelling profanities at him. Dan turned around and walked back home.

Long time to dry. The kids wanted a hot summer night. They put up a big tent on their front porch. They all slept in. The girls watched a movie. They wanted more time to dry before they were ready for the summer.
New Wallpaper. My wife wanted to change the wallpaper. She went to Home Depot. She wanted to get a nice wallpaper. She went to Home Depot. She got a new wallpaper.
Jan goes to the dentist. Jan is in the dentist's office. She is very anxious to have a check up. Jan is very nervous about the check up. Jan begins to cry. Jan decides to stop the waiting.
Tennis Coming of Age. Jenny loved to play tennis. She had many friends play tennis with her. She began to practice with a friend. She won an important match. She was very happy.

Trumpet. Mike had wanted a trumpet for as long as he could remember. He had bought one on the corner and was saving up money. It sat in his living room as he was working on his computer. He decided to try and buy it himself. Mike ended up selling it for thousands and got a great trumpet!

Squirrel. A squirrel was trying to climb a fence. He tried to climb over the wire. The wire snapped on the squirrel. The squirrel was unable to get over the wire. The squirrel was rescued by a neighbor.

Richard Grows a Beard. Richard is a huge fan of anime. He watches and plays an average of two anime a day. Richard is trying to grow a beard. He bought a beard trimmer online. Richard is happy he bought the trimmer.

Silver Coins. Sandy bought some silver coins at a pawn shop. She was so happy when she got them home. They were beautiful and shiny!She had never seen anything like them!She decided to go back and have another look!

Tea Time. Tanya was going to school and couldn't stop drinking tea. She was so bored that she started to drink all of the time. Tanya got really drunk and went out. Her boyfriend found out and was very upset. Tanya got a suspended sentence and was kicked out of school.
The Phone. One day I decided to buy a new phone. I went to the store to look at the phones. I chose a new phone with a new screen. I then put it up for sale. It went for over $1000!

The Dog Park. When we went to the park, it had the smell of fresh paint. Everyone said it looked like an animal pen. There was so much color, I was afraid to play. I decided to sneak up to the side of the slide to play. I ended up falling down and having to go back inside.

Tom's Diner. Tom's favorite restaurant in the city was closed down last night. Tom was so disappointed that it had to close. He tried to get a phone call. The phone wasn't there so he had to go out. It was the same place he had eaten at many times.

Felix Makes a Friend. Felix's friends have always been mean to him. But today, they've made a new friend. He was having trouble sleeping. He decided to give his friend a hug. The new friend became Felix's best friend.

Mylar Balloons. Liz was making balloons for her nephews. Her niece was always making them for herself. Liz had no idea how to make them and felt discouraged. She began by pouring a small amount of the batter into the balloons. Then, she added a larger amount of flour and mixed the whole thing.
Normal. We are all so scared of storms. They are so loud and scary. But we have to wear our protective gear. And I was afraid I would be crushed by the wind. But the storms never hurt me.

Fred Eats Salad. Fred wants to try out a new fast food place. He walks in the front door. He sees it is closed for lunch. Fred orders his sandwich. Fred feels satisfied with his new fast food experience.
Riding Lessons. Kelly was going to take a new road trip with her dad. They were going on a trip to the mountains. It was going to be a long trip. Kelly was nervous. But it was worth it!

The storm. The storm was coming and everyone was terrified. The kids were having a big party. A couple of them were going on about the storm. The kids didn't care and continued to play. The storm ended up blowing all their equipment away.

The Powder Room. There was a powder room on the beach where you could wear a face mask. I liked this so much I bought one. It was perfect because I could not wear a face mask while at the beach. But one day I had to go into the powder room. I was not allowed to use it after all!

Lost Keys. When Sam's mom returned home he looked all over for his keys. Sam searched every room and the basement. Finally Sam got his keys. Sam brought them back home. He immediately took them out to check them for a lock.

Condo Values. I bought a house in 1996. I was living in a condo with three roommates. One roommate was my brother who was my roommate when I moved in. One night my roommate decided to drink wine and was drunk. My brother and I broke up, and now my roommate owns the condo.

Sled. Barry was on a ski trip. He decided to ride his sled. He was not able to ride it as well as he wanted. Barry tried to go on but his sled was destroyed. He had to get another sled and go back home.

Engagement. Tina wanted to be engaged. She really wanted to go out and have a great time. Her friends and family were always there to cheer her up. Tina knew she was in for a treat. She got all of her friends together at the last minute and had an amazing time.

Shots. Gina was on a school field trip to the beach. All of the kids were running around the playground. She was excited when she saw the shooting range. She was the only one to hit her target. She was the first person to hit the target.

Poisonous Gift. One night, my wife and I were playing outside. We found a small bottle of wine in the trashcan. We drank it and felt sick. I became nauseous and threw up. We found the bottle of wine in the garbage.
Carrots. I was at a local diner. I was looking for carrots. I noticed a flyer for a local farm. I started digging around and found a pretty farm. I grabbed the carrots and they were delicious.

The Excuse. Tim was on a date with a girl. He was walking up to her when she bumped into a rock. Her friend told him she had just taken a trip to the river. He felt bad and apologized. The girl felt terrible for hurting Tim's feelings.

The Monkey Emoji. Nita wrote a lot of emoji for her job. One day, she wrote a really weird one. All of her coworkers hated it and called her names. So Nita decided to change the emoji to monkeys. The coworkers liked the new emoji and were happy to see it.

The Meat. The family was eating dinner. They had cooked a lot of meat. But they noticed that there were no vegetables. They thought they were over-feeding the family. They decided to go for lunch and ate a bunch of vegetables instead.

Bald. Jill was walking down the street. She noticed a woman walking with an ugly balding head. She wondered if it would be cool to take a picture with her. After Jill took a picture with the woman, she posted it online. The woman got thousands of likes and comments.

Hair Gel. Gina was tired of the hair gel on her back. She decided to buy a new one. She spent an hour putting on her hair. When she was done, it had a natural finish. Gina was very happy with the purchase.
The Stolen Shirt. Karen was in the mall. She tried to shop there. She noticed someone was stealing her shirt. She confronted the person. The person was escorted out of the mall.

Coney Stew. The two were friends and always had a casserole dish to cook. On Halloween night, they decided to try a coney stew. They made the stew and put it in the oven. When they went to take a bite, they realized it was a lie!It was just a weird concoction with a crescent roll.
Food order. Cathy was out at a restaurant with friends. She ordered some french fries. Suddenly, a waitress came in. She ordered chicken and fries. Cathy asked her friend what was wrong.
A Ride Home. When my husband and I went to see our son we went on a car trip. We drove around the city. We had an awesome time. We were able to see our son at our house. We had a good time.
Math Test. Alexia was very nervous about her math test. She had been preparing all summer. She was so anxious for it. However, it wasn't that bad. Alexia ended up doing great on her test.
Drowsy. Mary has been drowsy all morning. She thought it was the flu. However her doctor told her she had Drowsy. Mary didn't feel well that day. She went home and slept for hours.
Holey skirt. Mary thought her skirt looked good. Mary decided to go shopping. Mary saw a huge line at the shoe store. Mary decided to wait in line. Mary was shocked when she got her order of clothes.

Lick My Walls. I love to decorate walls with my house paint. Last weekend I decided to paint my living room. While painting the walls, I accidentally scratched a wall. My wife came home and said that my walls look really messy. She decided that she will paint the entire wall over.

The Fishing Trip. John got a new friend when he moved to Texas. He had never been outside before. He told his friend that he needed to learn fishing. The new friend took him out on a fishing trip. They all caught a bunch of fish.

Snacks. There was no way of knowing how much she would eat. A few minutes into the drive, she started getting sick. Her dad was a big heavy eater so she ate more. When she got home she was full and ready to go. After she was done with her snack, she put it in her pocket.

The Lost Cellphone. Ava was at work. And she heard someone yelling at her. When she asked who it was, the person turned out to be her cell phone. Ava immediately went to get it, but she wasn't able to. Ava's cell phone ended up missing the entire month.
Incommunicado. Lucy always hated to go to church. She decided to quit going. But she had an affair with a guy. She learned she had to go. She was in the hospital for weeks.

Paintball Challenge. The students gathered their paintball weapons. They started their game. The timer was set for three minutes. The students began shooting each other with the paintball guns. They were very close to the finish line.

Beach Day. Devin took his three year old granddaughter to the beach. They got in the water and had a great day. He then took her to the movies. When the movies were over, she took her dad to the beach. She loved going to the beach on Beaches day.

Pick Me Up. One day the Smith family was at a dinner party. The Smith's decided to make some chicken. While they were cooking they noticed the food was out. They had forgotten their chicken!The Smiths were so frustrated, they did not want to eat anymore.

Video. Tim's girlfriend broke up with him. His girlfriend told him she couldn't see him anymore. Tim tried to find another girlfriend for her. Eventually Tim realized he had no choice. He had to break up with his girlfriend.
Related After All. Kelsi went to the grocery store. She saw a dress for her sister's birthday. The dress was beautiful. Kelsi purchased the dress. She brought it home.

Bad date. Tom went out with a girl he really liked. They had a good night, and they talked for hours. Tom wanted her to come out and talk to him. She agreed, and he walked out with her. Tom left the next day to go back to his hotel.

Bird Attack. I was playing in the yard with my dog. Suddenly, a small bird flew into our yard. We screamed and ran away from it. We chased it until it was gone. We then went back inside to look at the damage.
The Slide. It was Sunday afternoon. Tina was watching the television. She saw a scary movie. She went to her room and saw it was scary. She decided not to go to the movie that day.
The dog. Kate had a new puppy. She named her Chia. One day Chia decided to play in the grass. She tripped over a plant and fell in the mud. The dog chased her into the bushes.

The Estimate. Nia was working at the local bank. The banker gave her a $200 estimate. Nia thought that was a great amount of money. She went and asked about it in the bank. They told her that the money was not theirs.

Mitch's Accident. Mitch is driving home from work. Suddenly, his engine fails. Mitch is forced to pull over and wait. The insurance company called and will be looking at his claim. Mitch is going to have to buy a new car.

Strict Coach. I was trying out for the basketball team last year. I had never played before. The day of practice was very tough. It was really cold in the gym. My coach told me that I was too strict with the equipment.
Pet Snake. Last year I went petting a stray. He was looking for his pet snake. He found a beautiful snake and took it home. It lived a long life. He was very grateful for my kindness.

Picking up Trash. My mom told me that I needed to pick up trash from the street. I took the garbage to the curb. I started picking up the trash from the curb. I put the trash in the garbage can and put it on the garbage truck. I then ran to the curb and got in the truck.

Bad Tip. Lucy was in line to get a free sandwich from her favorite sandwich shop. Her friend asked for some extra money. Lucy was shocked to get a tip of $5!She was so embarrassed and told her friend not to do it again. Her friend was very thankful and gave her a new sandwich.

Taking a Chance. Jenna was on the phone with her boyfriend. He was talking to his cousin. The cousin said he had a terrible accident. His cousin told Jenna that he was okay. Jenna decided to take the risk and bring him his pizza.

Camp. Alex had planned a camping trip to his friends. He decided to take his car to the campsite. As he walked towards the campground, he lost track of where he was. When he came across the trail, he realized he forgot the map!Alex was very sad that he did not find a campsite near where he left off.

Puppy. Jane went to the vet. The vet had to fix the broken leg of a puppy. The puppy was very sweet, loving and cuddly. The vet got the puppy out and brought him home. The owner was very happy with the new puppy.

Bathing Suit Failure. Sue was trying to go to the bath when she got stuck. She was trying to pull on the door when it popped. Sue jumped up and then jumped down. When she got back up, the door was stuck shut. She then put on her bathing suit.
Fire. We had been camping all summer. The summer heat was really bad. It was getting really hot. We put out a bunch of firewood in the fire pit. When the fire was out, we started the campsite.

The lockdown scare. It was a quiet and peaceful evening. The whole school was very quiet. One of the kids was making some loud noises. Everyone thought it was a prank, until a boy came out of the bathroom and tried to scare them. Everyone ended up leaving the school.

Sister, Sister!. The Smith's were separated from the Smith's. The Smith's wanted to stay together. The Smith's wanted to go back home. They wanted to be with the Smith's. They had a huge argument and moved.

Missed Trash. Ricky decided to play a prank on his dad. He made a big mess on his dad's desk. He also used a paintbrush and a trashcan to dump the mess on his dad's desk. Ricky was very disappointed when he realized his dad was sitting there. When Ricky finished his prank, he ran down to check on his dad.

Broken Toe. I bought a new pair of tennis shoes. I got on the court and hit something hard. The shoe broke immediately. I called a repairman who said he could fix it. I went to the store and bought a new pair of shoes.

On the roof. Cindy was having a nice evening. Suddenly she noticed a beautiful vase under her foot. It was a beautiful gold plated crystal. Cindy was so happy to be having so much fun!She couldn't wait to display it for all to see!
Grand Canyon. I love the Grand Canyon. When I was little I took my little brother to see it. When he was older I took him to see it again. It was a beautiful view. We had fun doing it.
Jan's Jilted Jawing. Jan is at a party with friends. They decide to sing a song. They start to sing in the car. When they get to the house they stop singing. Jan says she doesn't like the song.

Disappointment. My roommate moved into the apartment she had just moved into. I had planned on moving in the day after she moved in. Yesterday, I called her to tell her I was out of town for work. She had come to pick me up the next morning. Since her car broke down, she had to take me to a job at a McDonald's.

Diary. Kaya was writing a diary. She needed to write about her life. She went to the library and browsed for inspiration. Finally she found a journal. She got the rest of her diary together and put it on her desk.

The Jury. Anna was on trial. She had been charged with killing her boyfriend. The defense asked for a jury to decide the case. The prosecutor presented evidence, arguing she didn't kill him. Anna was found guilty and sentenced to death.

Severe Storm. Jim and his wife were having problems at their house. The water was extremely high in the backyard. They decided to put out an old tree to make a floodproof roof. They were worried for the tree, but they put it in and it stayed stable. The storm came and the trees collapsed under its weight.
Bad Treatment. I went to the park. The kids were playing. I was playing catch with one of them. He threw the ball at my head. I hit the ball hard and got a concussion.
Friends. Jim was a very shy man. He felt lonely at the store. Jim was looking for a friend. Jim decided to invite a group of friends over. They were very kind to Jim and made him feel welcome.
Jump Rope Accident. Tom was a jump rope expert. He was jumping rope with friends at a local bar. He was about to go the other way. Tom didn't get a jump rope over his head. He was disqualified.

Fight Sleep. Sara got up very early. She was ready to fight her next fight. She started up her bed and fell asleep in it. It was late and she could not make it back to bed. She finally awoke in the middle of the night to her husband.

perfect attendance. Sue has an upcoming wedding. She wants to be ready. She works hard to look the perfect. When the wedding is over, she can't wait to attend. She never misses a moment of her time at the wedding.

The hide and seek winner. Ruth went to play hide and seek in her neighborhood. She was looking for the lost baby of a neighbor. She saw a baby crying. The baby was in the backyard. Ruth was happy to see her new child.

Mitch's Money. Mitch was a poor man who liked to watch cable. He often needed money for food and clothing. He went to the mall to browse for clothes. He couldn't find any clothes that he liked. He realized that his clothes were only very good for watching TV.

Monkey See Monkey Doo. Susie went for a walk one day with her family. She came across a monkey. The monkey made a huge mess on the ground. Susie decided to leave it alone. She decided not to tell her kids about what happened that day.

The Kite. I was playing around with my kite. I was trying to fly it around the tree. I took one of my kite blades out. The blade slipped out and it flew away. I got out and my dog chased it with his toy.

Lost Keys. Tina went to the grocery store. She noticed her keys missing from her car. She searched all over the store for them. Eventually she came across them on the sidewalk. She realized it must have been an accident.
The New Phone. Beth was a student in college. She was taking calculus. While studying, her phone died. She had to buy a new one. Beth was very grateful for the phone.

Solar Power. Jane wanted to help the environment. She signed up for solar power. She was charged a yearly fee for solar power. Jane realized the cost was too high. Jane decided to install solar panels on her roof.

The Leak. The water main started leaking last night. I had to use the hose to drain the leak out. Once it was drained the water kept coming in. I got very angry because the water was now boiling. I called the emergency company to fix the leak.

Rex. Rex got into a fight with his brother. Rex's brother kicked him in the stomach. Rex tried to walk away but his brother was on him. Rex's brother pushed him against a wall. Rex broke his arm but still fought back.
Emergency. Sue was running late for work. The power was out. The fire department was on the way. Sue called to get help. Her friend arrived soon after and rescued her.

Quarters. Sarah was working on the bathroom. She was taking out a pot and scooping. She was putting it on the floor when suddenly something big hit it. A large dog jumped onto the pot. Sarah had to run away from the pot and back into the kitchen.

My Favorite Binky. Every time I go to the barber, I'm always looking for a new binky. Usually, I'll find one in a cute green print. My friends have been talking about finding the perfect binky for months now. When they finally decided to have their barber cut my hair, I was in. When I came home, I found the perfect binky and loved it.

Lost Puppy. Sam was walking home from school. Suddenly, Sam was startled to see a stray dog. It ran out of the woods towards Sam. Sam ran after it to get it back, hoping to find the lost puppy. Luckily, he found the puppy and gave it back to the owner.

Successful Mediation for Shared Child Custody. Karen was in a fight with her boyfriend over custody of her son. She told him to settle it, but he didn't budge. Karen took him to mediation after the mediation. Karen negotiated with the man, and it turned out to be a fair outcome. He now has the same custody of his son.

The Marathon. There was a marathon in Boston one day. They were having a big fundraiser to raise money for the victims. They had to give out lots of prizes!They gave out free pizza!It was a great night to raise money for victims.

Wordsmith. Benjamin always talked to his mother and sisters very loud. He was told he needed to learn how to talk more quietly. He started a series of classes to help him learn how to speak quietly. Benjamin was the best at learning how to talk to people. He is now a famous writer and a successful writer.

Floor. Teddy and John are playing on the floor. John sees Teddy lying on his back. John takes Teddy to the hospital. The doctors tell Teddy he is brain dead. Teddy is glad the hospital finally decided to keep him.

Pink Underwear. Kerry loved pink underwear. She bought several pairs online. She purchased them from a store. She was very happy when she found the perfect pair. She wore the pink underwear in her prom dress.

The Almost Revolt. When I was four, my parents decided that they would leave me. They said it was because I wasn't very responsible. I was so upset. My mom tried to explain to me that I had always loved them, but we were getting old. So, my mother decided to leave me, and I stayed.

Stepping on a Nail. Karen was working on her car door handle. She tried to lift the door handle, and it gave way. Then, Karen tripped and stepped on a nail. Her foot was broken in two places. Karen vowed not to try this again.
Cake Disaster. I decided to make a cake for Easter. I thought it would be easy. The only problem was that it would leak. My mother took a candle to the cake. She burnt the cake in the fireplace.

Gym class. Sasha loved gymnastics. She wanted to take a gymnastics class. She saw a class on youtube and was excited to learn. The class was very intense. Sasha got very good and went to take the class next year.

Cutting my own hair. I just got engaged and am not looking to cut it. When I went to the salon I noticed my hair was too long. I took the shampoo out of the bottle, and took a bath. I put the hair ribbon on, and cut my own hair. I was able to cut my own hair.

Movies with girlfriend. Julie's girlfriend just moved out. She had just moved into a new apartment. She was looking forward to going out. Then Julie started having a few drinks. She ended up having a lot of friends over for dinner that night.

Orange Seed. Ella has always wanted an orange. She has asked her mother for one ever since. One morning the milk was out and she was crying. Her mother took her to the store to buy the orange seed. Now Ella's orange is beautiful.

Not Creepy At All. We heard loud noises outside our bedroom. When we came in, we saw a group of three teenagers sitting on a bench. They were talking loudly and arguing over something. One of them tried to pull out a gun and shoot. I tried to break up the argument and ran to the window.

Nap Time. Jill woke up late every night for her classes. She had a lot of work to do and she didn't know how to nap. Her friend suggested that she take a nap while she was at work. Jill's friend took her to her friend's house to sleep. It was a wonderful night when Jill got to sleep.

Cora. Cora was an orphan. She had always been the youngest of four siblings. One day she met a boy who grew up to be the man she wanted. Together, they had a son and a daughter. They gave up childhood and went back to being just four kids.

New Job. Dan worked at a local college bookstore. His job was to keep an eye on people coming in. Dan did a lot of customer service on Fridays. He was getting good ratings from clients. Dan decided to move on to a different job to get better ratings.

Modern Dating. Bert went on dating site for the first time. Bert found some girls very attractive. Bert saw that some of his dates would not do anything for him. Bert decided to break up with his best friend. Bert decided to not date anyone for the rest of his life.

The Paper. Kelley was going through her paper collection. She found a very old piece of paper on the floor. She quickly scanned it and began to open it. She took the piece of paper out to look at it. When she looked at it it was almost entirely torn to pieces.

Santeria. When I was young I went to a Santeria retreat in Florida. There, we spoke with different Santeria members. It was very enlightening and the philosophy was refreshing. I now have a better appreciation for different cultures. It has given me a sense of perspective on many issues in our world.
Clip. Ricky and Timmy were on a rollercoaster. Ricky wanted to go to the top. Timmy wanted to go to the bottom. Ricky kept going, but couldn't get to the top. They both broke their necks.

Lost Dog. Allie was walking her dog when she spotted a black puppy. She approached the puppy and asked what it was. The puppy began to wag its tail. Allie looked and saw the black puppy had been kicked over. Allie rushed back home to pick up the puppy and keep it safe.

Lost Phone. Tom was at a party with his friends. He was watching a movie while his phone was on his ear. As soon as he turned it on it dropped into the toilet. Tom called the police who came to his house. They found the phone in his hand and he was able to retrieve it.
Neighborhood thief. Susie was at work. Suddenly she heard a sound. She looked out the window. Someone was stealing her neighbor's jewelry!She hurried inside and locked the door.

Making Lisa mad. Lisa was at the park when she saw an adorable brown puppy. The puppy appeared to be very friendly. Lisa approached the puppy and petted it. But the puppy started scratching Lisa. Lisa ran away crying because she was mad at the dog.

Frisbee. Sally was playing Frisbee with her brother. Suddenly, her brother got very upset and kicked her Frisbee!She was so upset she threw it out of the window. Her brother apologized and they both laughed. They vowed to do better next time.

New World. Lila was excited to take her children to a new world. She had just started their school years. Their teacher told them there would be a lot to learn. They spent an hour exploring. Lila and her children had a great time.

An Extra Treat. I was going to the store to buy some fresh fruit. I got to the checkout and bought three different fruit items. I picked the first two and brought them home to my wife. We used the third fruit item to make an extra treat. She was so happy and we had some fruit!

c-section. The doctor asked me to go in for my c-section. I had to pass a very strenuous ultrasound. At the ultrasound, I found out that my baby has Down's. After the baby was born, he was brought to me. I gave him his name and thanked him for his mother.

Aluminum Foil Swords. It was a rainy day and a man was running down a street. He came upon a street fight, and was able to shoot down a rival thug. The two thugs were both heavily injured, but did not go away. The police chased the thug on foot, and eventually they caught him. He got an arrest for possession of a stolen gun, and was sentenced to three years in prison.

Shelby goes to new york. Shelby is in her first year of college. She arrives in New York and finds that the place is wonderful. She is thrilled that she has gotten a good college education. When she arrives at her first job, she is hired right away. Shelby is now proud of her new home in New York.

Kim's big test. Kim was preparing for her big test today. Her teacher gave her a list of test questions. Kim asked her sister to check the answers and correct them. Her sister didn't do this, and Kim got the dreaded "I did not do well" mark. Kim knew her test score was going to be terrible!
Meatloaf. I went to the grocery store one day. I noticed a meatloaf box for sale. I grabbed a bag and went to the store. I bought the meatloaf. I ate it and I was very satisfied.
NYC. Sara went to the NYCHA. She wanted to learn to dance. It was on a weekend. She fell in love with the way she danced. It helped her to make friends and it made her happy.

The Farmer's Market. Beth wanted to put on a farmer's market. Beth got everything together. Beth began selling produce. Beth worked her way through the market. Beth was very satisfied with her new farm.

Camping Disaster. Tim had a lot of fun camping with his friends. Tim's camping party had a lot of water. One of the men accidentally spilled a bottle of water on the ground. The bottle of water turned into a big mess. Tim's camping party had to clean up the mess.
The Boat. Mary was taking a long trip to Hawaii. She was looking for her boat to take. The boat was in a cove. Mary decided to try and climb it. When she got to the top, she realized it was too high.

Kind Acts. I saw an advertisement for a soup kitchen in a food magazine. I decided to apply for one. I interviewed at the job and was told I was a good fit. I took an English class at a local college. I learned a lot of life skills and became a great chef.

Soup Kitchen. Molly needed some lunch. She didn't have a lot of money for lunch. She decided to order a sandwich from the soup kitchen. She felt great at the meal. She was glad that she could pay for her lunch.

book. Sasha wanted to find a new book to read. She went to the bookstore and tried to find something. There were a lot of new books but none were for her taste. She asked the cashier for a copy. The cashier gave her a good copy of an old one instead.

New pair of louboutins. Bella loved wearing her louboutin shoes in public. She even thought wearing them was so adorable. One day she went on a date with a pretty guy. He was wearing his louboutin. She laughed because he was wearing them on a date with his pants around his ankles.

Conduit. My friend's daughter works in a chemical plant. One day she decided to make a big batch of air freshener. She sprayed it over her desk. Then she put it in her cubicle. It worked like a charm.
The Snake. A snake ran across the street. It bit into a car. One of the owners jumped out and was injured. He was so lucky he was never bitten again. The owner gave him a small teddy bear.

The Prescription. Kylie was addicted to nicotine. She had become so addicted she had no choice but to try a drug. After months of taking her drug, Kylie was addicted again. She decided to finally quit. Kylie made several attempts at quitting, but was unsuccessful.

The Stand. I had a good job, but needed some money. I took my old laptop to the store and bought some cheap stuff. Afterwards, I started browsing the internet on it. I also purchased a set of headphones. When I was done, I returned home, satisfied with what I had.

Sleepaway Camp. Sam was at a sleepaway camp with his friends. He decided to take one more nap. All of the sudden Sam heard loud bangs. The campers ran outside and saw a bear in the woods. They decided to leave and never return.

Presley. She has been feeling like an outsider lately. She doesn't like it when her friends think she has no purpose. She has an interview scheduled. She decides to stay home for the interview. She feels better about herself after she gets it over with.

Dog Ate My Homework. Allie had an entire day to herself. She got up really early and worked late. She got dressed and went to the library to do her homework. Her first project was to write down her ideas. By the time she finished she felt sick and had to leave.

Wet Pants. My pants were really wrinkly after a month of wearing them. I couldn't figure out why. I finally went to the store and bought some new pants. I decided to wash them first. After that they were clean again!

Presidential Campaign. In 1992 Joe worked on a presidential campaign. He did his best to find common ground with voters and make them aware of a great election. Joe made it into the lead in the polls and began making noise. His voice was heard throughout the state. Joe won a majority of the votes and was the president of the United States.
Taffy. I got the most delicious taffy!I tasted it all the way through. I tried to eat it but it just tasted sour. Then I decided to just eat it all. Finally it was delicious!

Fishing Alone. I love the outdoors and fishing with friends. It is fun and relaxing and I enjoy my day. My friend, Rob, suggested that we go out with friends. Rob said we could do it alone because he didn't have friends. We went out and had a great time fishing and catching our food.

magic mug. Allie had been having trouble making new friends. She was trying to think of her best way of introducing someone. Then she decided on a mug with the words, "The magic mug. "She found someone who she really liked and the magic mug was the perfect match. Allie was happy her friend had introduced her to someone new.

Bluebirds. The neighborhood kids were bored one morning. They decided to go bird watching. They arrived at their favorite spot to begin the process. As they started to get bored they began to make noise. All of the neighborhood kids got off their couches and went inside.

Street Fight. John was riding his bike along the street. He felt a small gust of wind and thought it was wind. He didn't have any time to go around a block. He decided to throw his bike into a pile of trash. John was grounded for a week and his bike is now missing.

No Mail. Tim's house was filled with junk mail. He tried to get rid of it, but it wouldn't go away. Tim decided to get rid of all his stuff. When he got rid of his things, he put them in a box. The box got stuck and no mail came.
GO HOME. Sue wanted to go home from work. She worked all afternoon. She made it home on time. Sue loved her work. It was a great vacation.

The Grapes. Lucy saw a cute kid with a bunch of grapes. The kid ran towards her, but Lucy did not want to be bothered. She kept an eye on the kid all the time. Finally, she decided to watch the kid and take care of the grapes. She made the kid eat the grapes before he ran off.

Turtle Rescue. I was looking for a turtle one day. I found a small baby turtle on the sidewalk. I brought the turtle back to the house. They brought him to the turtle farm where they kept him. I took him home and he was very happy!
Coin Return. Bill received a large bill. Bill thought he would pay it quickly. However, Bill forgot his wallet. Bill returned the bill to the bank. Bill was charged for the entire amount.

storm. Mavis was going to attend her mother's funeral. She was excited about being at her mother's grave. After her mother died, she got lost on the way to the funeral. She eventually found her way home on foot. She returned to the funeral and began to cry.
Ray Rides a Bike. Ray is scared of his bike. He decides to take a bike riding class. He begins to learn how to ride his bike. The class is a success for Ray. Ray is happy he took the class.

Careful Driver. Barry was driving through the city on his way home. He was trying to make it home when he got a flat tire. He hit another car, but no one was hurt. He got out of his car and walked into the middle of the street. The next car crashed into the curb and broke into three pieces.

Backup Receiver. My son works in a high rise apartment complex. He has a large back yard. He recently got a job at a fast food restaurant. He is a backup to the receiver. He usually plays catch behind the receiver when it is open.
The Dog. There was a dog with a litter of puppies. He was so cute. One day, his parents took him to a shelter. They placed the puppies up for adoption. A couple weeks later, the dog got a new home!
Bike. Kia was riding her bike. It hit a tree. She fell off. She scratched her head. She decided to put a brace on it.

Chiggers. My mother told me to take off my socks because chiggers are flying. She said to keep my socks inside. But after I did so, I got an itch. I put them back on, but they were itching all over my face. I realized they weren't socks.

Loose Shirt. Lucy wore a loose shirt to school. Lucy noticed that the shirt was very flimsy. Lucy decided to wear a more durable shirt. Lucy bought a new shirt from the store. Lucy was able to wear a more durable shirt at school.

Sounds Like The Plot To A. . . Sue is at the movies. She sits and enjoys a movie until her movie breaks. Sue thinks her family is watching a movie. The movie is a comedy comedy about a woman. Sue doesn't watch the movie anymore.

Taken for granted. Devin is on a road trip with his friends. He pulls over at a red light. A cop pulls up. The cop tells him he needs to use his turn signal. Devin just goes past the cop and drives on.

Providence. It was a very cold winter day. The wind picked up and they were very tired. They had a great view of the town and the mountains. They made it home very early in the morning. They had a wonderful time on their ski trip.

Funeral. Bobby was celebrating his 18th wedding anniversary. His wife, Debra, was very nervous about what would happen. The day of the wedding, Debra was very emotional. She cried when her husband said he would never forget his mother. It was an amazing moment that made her cry.
The Furry Blanket. Sally was getting ready to go out for a jog. She found a cute blanket in her room. She thought it was adorable and put it on. Then she saw the man in it. He was a furry furball!
Best Present. Last year I got a package for my birthday. The present was a gift from my best friend. I had never met her. She had always been very nice to me. The surprise was awesome.

Violence isn't the answer. The violence in school was so severe, that the teacher was forced to intervene. The student was yelling and making physical contact. The teacher had to intervene, and took him to the principal's office. After the teacher got the child under control, he called the police to come help.

Pentatonix!. A friend of my cousin's had the biggest collection of music videos. She bought it all and then sold it. Some months later, I heard from her that it was in the auction house. I found it and was so excited. Luckily, we were able to buy it back for a small bit of profit.
breakfast. The girls were at school. All the sudden, the cafeteria was very crowded. They decided to make breakfast. It was not the best breakfast. They just ate their breakfast.

Fostering A Dog. Jim was at a party. Someone asked him what animal he wanted to adopt. Jim thought of a dog he'd seen on the news. He went to a local animal shelter and brought the dog to his home. It was adopted and Jim loved the dog.

The Christmas Tree. Sam's mother wanted to give him a Christmas tree for Christmas. She had seen that it was too expensive. Sam decided to build his own instead. His parents helped him get the right materials. He ended up having a beautiful tree for Christmas!

Sunglasses. Lisa went shopping and saw a beautiful pair of sunglasses. She tried them on and they were too big for her. She needed glasses that covered her entire face. She went to the store and was given a new pair. She fell in love with the sunglasses and decided to order them online.

Landon's Lakehouse. Landon wanted to build a house with the purpose of living alone. He decided to start an organization and sell things he made. He hired people to help him sell some of his things. The group eventually grew to thousands and they were the richest in town. Landon became very wealthy and lived his dream.

Painting. Lily decided she would try to paint. She decided to try the color red. It was a very bright color and she ended up painting a house. The next day Lily went to the salon to paint the house. She loved how her new room looked.

Cheer tryouts. I was invited to try out for cheer team. I did not have many friends and did not know anyone from cheer. I thought I would go and do a nice deed. When I got there, my mom asked who my friend was. I realized that I forgot that my friend is a cheerleader.
Dead Battery. I was driving to work. I was about to leave. Suddenly I heard a loud noise. I realized my battery was dead. I immediately called to get a new one.

Laura's Flowers. Laura wanted to bring her plants home from the garden store. She took the plants to her local nursery to have them tended. After several days of tending and watering, Laura's plants bloomed. Laura was happy to finally get to hang them. Her house looked brand new and beautiful.

Snack Bars. Tom had a really good memory. One day he was at the grocery store. He noticed he didn't have any bars there. Tom got a bunch of junk food and ate them. He came back to his senses and decided to buy more junk food.

The Sand Dollars. I saw a bunch of dollar coins lying on the floor. I put them in the coin slot. I took them out for inspection. A few days later, they had developed small holes. I put them back in and spent $30 on them.

gunfire. Gina was walking with her mother through the parking lot. Suddenly a bunch of black-clad gang members walked up and started shooting. She rushed towards them but the shots were so loud she couldn't hear them. When she got up, a group of guys began beating up a young girl. Gina was scared of them.

Branching Out. It was the first day of a new semester. My roommates started to ask me about the semester. We were very nervous about talking about our pasts. Finally, our roommate told us that we should just end things. We told her that the semester is almost over.

Bank Trip. One morning, I woke up early to get ready for work. I went to the bank and looked around. There were no banks open, so I had to pay in cash. Afterwards, I went to work and waited for my call. As soon as it came, I put my wallet in my pocket.

Tickle. Lucy's mother wanted her to get a new toy. Lucy loved the toy but wanted something that was more fun. Her mother said that she didn't have enough money. So Lucy picked up some candy. Lucy enjoyed her new toy all night long.
Worst musical. The Smiths were performing their new album. The band was having a great time. They were playing an old classic. The music sounded horrible. They had to stop and change it.
Rupture. I was at the doctor's office. The nurse said we had a very serious case of rupids. She ran a sample through an ultrasound machine. The results were positive. It turns out they're cancerous.

Rat Problem. Sammy hated rats and was never good at hiding them. Her parents noticed she wasn't getting any toys for her birthday. They decided to do something about it. They went to the zoo and Sammy was fed lots of treats. Now Sammy doesn't feel bad about her fear of rats.

Taking the Dog for a Walk. Dana was at home when his dog walked up to him. It wasn't long before he felt a tingle in his neck. It was the start of a long, hard walk. Dana began to get worried. The dog finally left him before he started to cry.

Serving Time. Fred was at a friend's house. He and his friend were hanging out. Fred had to wait for the friend to come over. He was then told to go to his room. He was then sent home and went back to his room.

Plan Ahead. Tina had a birthday party in just hours. She decided to take her kids with her. Her daughter wanted to stay home from school. Tina's daughter wanted to play in the park. Tina had to decide on the best way to plan out the day.

Closing down the A&P. We were closing down our A&P in September. We thought it would be a fun time to have all of our friends there. On Saturday, we realized we'd forgotten our key. We had to close the A&P. Now we're sad we had to close it all at once.
The Parrot. I went to the animal shelter to find a parrot. When I got to the parrot house I sat down. The parrot was very quiet. I tried to talk to it. I ended up having a very hard time.

Spray Paint. Katherine's son was playing in the house. He accidentally dropped a paintbrush. He was so angry he threw it all over the house. Katherine and her husband bought spray paint. She was glad it did not cost her her house.

Football. Garrett is an avid football fan. He's been watching the game for hours. He's not sure if he's been watching too much or not. He has to decide between watching the game and going to bed. Garrett has to decide and he goes to bed early.

Hair. Miguel was a great stylist. One day Miguel decided to make a hairdo. He began to pull strands out of people's hair. The clients came to see what was going on. All of the sudden, Miguel stopped and walked away.

Putting away groceries. My wife is really poor. She does not like to pay for groceries. She decided to put things away and get a job instead. However, she is still very poor. She now has enough money to buy groceries from the stores instead.

The Piano Lesson. Sophia loved to play the piano. Sophia learned to play very well. Her piano teacher taught her how to play a different type of music. Sophia played this new music more well than she had before. Sophia became a better pianist after this lesson.
Foggy problems. The weather was bad. All day long there were bad foggy clouds. I needed a foggy jacket. I went to the store to get one. I was able to stay in my nice house.

Space Heater. Dan loved to bake. He decided to make a cake that he wanted to share with his friends. Dan built a massive space heater. Dan's friends came over and they ate his cake. Dan had his cake for his birthday.

Lost. One of my favorite movies was Lost. I was in the theater one night. I was watching the movie and my eyes started to wander. I ran out of the theater and was late for my flight. It turned out I did not get home that night.

The Field. Mary decided to plant seeds on the field. She gathered them and placed them in a basket. She waited, expecting to find many seeds. She saw nothing. She decided to plant the seedlings on her own.
Slump. Jill was working late at night. She was driving her car through a snow bank. She felt a sudden tingle in her legs. She got out of her car to look. She was having a horrible headache.

Allergic to Cats. We lived in Chicago and had three cats. My brother and sister were both allergic to cats. I asked them what they thought of my choice. They said that the cats were too much work for us. I found it sad, as I didn't want to have to take them any more.

A spill in the bag. Julian was cleaning his house. While he was doing it he spilled a bottle of water on the rug. The water splashed all over the rug and clothes. He had to wash it and put it away. Julian was so embarrassed that he didn't clean the rug anymore.

Cooking is Important. Kelly and her family lived in a small town. Kelly was very busy and stressed out. Kelly decided she needed to get a job so she could pay her bills. Kelly's husband encouraged her to take a second job so he could help. Kelly was glad she could help her family in such a tough time.
Book. Lola wanted to buy a new book. She went to a bookstore. Lola found a new book. She picked it up. Lola enjoyed her book.

Mountain. John had a really hard time keeping his mind off of work. One day he decided to drive down to the local mountain range. He enjoyed the view of the mountains he saw and the views. The mountain he saw at was really high. John got lost and finally arrived at the mountain he wanted to go.

Todd's First Bike Ride. Todd had always wanted to take his first bike ride. He decided to rent a bike and make it himself. Todd started riding his bike with pride and excitement. He rode his bike for the entire ride. Todd loved his first bike ride!

Dress caught. When my husband and I went shopping for dinner we noticed a brand new dress caught our eye. As we approached the counter we noticed the dress was a little too short. We decided to go home and get a bigger dress. We ended up returning and buying a very different dress. Our son is now very happy with his new dress.

Dollar Store. Gabby was at her mom's house looking at dollar stores. As she walked around the store, she saw something very interesting. It was a small family holding together with a baby in the back. Gabby was so excited, she decided to buy the baby some. To her joy, the baby cried with joy when she brought it home.

Losing balance. Bethany was riding her bike home from work. She was just coming down the hill when her weight went out. She was falling over and her bike was spinning uncontrollably. She got the bike back onto her shoulder and started to go. She was so relieved and felt great.

Kujata. Kujata was a cat lover. He found out he got a puppy and had a litter of kittens. Kujata loved the kittens so much that he named them, Kyujata. They were all cute and cuddly. Kujata now has a pet kitty and a loving family.
Biking. It was snowing and Dan needed to get home. He couldn't find a spot to stop at the car park. Dan ran to the bus stop. It was too cold and he had to stop. Dan got home and slept in the car.

Checker Floor. I went on a very fun project in a small office building. We had a board game. I played it all day long. One day a student decided he wanted to play a checker game. That student was punished for this behavior.

fridge. Jane was planning on going to the store for gas. She went into the refrigerator. She checked out of the freezer. She put the milk down and took the bag of chips out. Her dad said she was ready to go and that they should just get gas.

Pool. It was spring break and he and his friends were relaxing in the water. Then they realized they were all soaking wet and swamped. They all decided to have a little pool party. The pool was so fun they decided to do more. They rented a huge one and all the friends spent every weekend there.
Wires. Lucy had to fix the phone. It was grounded. So she went to the store. She bought new wires. She was able to fix it.

Dream Team. Sally was excited for her new football team. Her dream team was to make it to the Superbowl. But to her joy, her team failed to make the Super Bowl!She was disappointed in the team but the best player was gone. Now, Sally and her friends only play football after dark.

Sara's Big Move. Sara was so tired of waiting in line for her favorite food. She decided she needed to move. She finally packed her stuff and packed her moving van. Sara drove to her new house. She was so excited about moving.

Not Solid. When I was twelve my parents and I went on a trip to Vegas. We went there to see the latest Hollywood blockbuster. I went to the main casino. The tables were filled with money but no slots. My parents and I left the casino without any money.

Metal in a Microwave. Beverly woke up to the sound of a metal detector. She took a deep breath as it dawned on her. She knew what it was and was shocked. It was the very thing she feared - a microwave. She got out her bag and put it on the ground.

Operation Table. The soldiers were all lined up. They were all supposed to be doing the same thing. They were assigned different tasks for each one. They made plans on how to complete each task. After an hour of work, they were all finished.
Crayons. I went on a trip. I needed some crayons. I looked through my library. I could not find them anywhere. I asked my sister to come over and get some.

Philip Got Punched. Philip was playing in his yard. He was walking when he accidentally stepped in something. A dog came over and knocked him down. Philip was too embarrassed to continue playing. The dog then ran off in a panic.

The earthquake. Cindy heard a loud noise outside her window. She looked out the window and there was a loud, shaking earthquake. She heard all kinds of screaming and crying. Cindy went out to check on the people in her house. As she looked outside the shaking stopped.
The Train Delay. Sam was a teacher. He decided to be extra careful when teaching. The class arrived late. The teacher cancelled classes. Sam felt bad for being late.

Cells. Lucy was pregnant. Her doctor had told her to take a pregnancy test. Lucy's doctor told her that the cells were healthy. The baby looked just like a normal cell. Lucy didn't know why she was worried.

Glass down. Kelsey was walking along the sidewalk. All of a sudden, she felt something break on her shoe. It was her entire shoe. She looked everywhere for it. Finally, she finally found it and took it to the store.

Family Vacation. One day my wife and I were planning a vacation. We decided to go on a camping trip. We drove to the campsite and rented a car. We camped for two nights. Our two night stay in the campsite was the best one we ever had.

Megan Makes A Fire. Megan loves to make fire. One day she decided she wanted to make a fire. She started with some wood. Once she had the wood all she put it all together. She had a fire and was very happy with it.

Lost Game. Alexa had just bought a new gaming console. The day before she had to use it to play a big game. She had to hurry up and find the game disc before it was time to leave. She searched all over the house but couldn't find it. The next day, Alexa went to a different store to get the game disc.
