Thanks for the Pictures. Last week my sister in law posted a picture on Facebook. It was a group of her neighbors on a stroll. I found the picture and clicked on the link to take a look. I was shocked to see that they'd done it all before. The neighbors had been in the town for over 100 years!

David loses his wife. David had been married for fifteen years. One morning while he was at work he heard a knock on his door. When he opened it he was greeted by his wife. They had been married for twenty year's. David lost his wife.

Cheap Frames. Jody decided to take up buying frames online. She found one that was cheap but needed some extra adjustments. She found a few that matched her frame perfectly. After some trial and error, she found an ideal frame. Jody bought the frames she wanted.

New Job. Tina had just gotten a new job. She was excited to find a job she really enjoyed. But when she got to her first day, she realized she didn't look much. She didn't get to see the person she really wanted to be with. But when she found out she finally was happy to be the best.
Chris. Chris was running from a cop. He was in a ditch. Chris saw a car pull up. It was the cop. The cop gave him $100 cash.

I'm Not A Cry Baby. We went shopping on Valentine's Day. We walked to the store and found a pretty dress. We went home with the dress and took pictures of it. My wife wanted to tell me that I had done something wrong. We ended up having a long conversation about it.

The Sunburn. One afternoon I went for a jog through my backyard. As I walked past a huge sunburned patch of grass, I stopped. I quickly ran into my sister. When we walked away, she hugged me. I realized that when a sunburn happens, it really hurts.

Partner. Kelly and her boyfriend are going on a date. She asks him to meet her at a cafe. After ordering food, Kelly walks to her boyfriend. Kelly makes an appointment for them to meet up. They head to the coffee shop and have a fun date.
Drive Away!. My wife took her car to the mechanic. The mechanic took the car to us. He fixed the car up. My wife was very pleased. She got her car back today.

They all ditched him. Clyde was a small, weak man. One day, the kids at school were playing in the park. One of the kids threw a tennis ball at Clyde. Clyde kicked the ball back at the boy, leaving him with a red mark on his leg. The boy was very angry, and decided to make Clyde wear an orange t-shirt every time.

Do the Right Thing. Liza's friend Jane was in a relationship with a man. Liza told Jane not to talk to her boyfriend for weeks. After several weeks Jane came to understand that he was being mean to her. Liza told Jane she felt bad and told her boyfriend. Jane felt bad and broke up with the man.

Buying a cell phone. Kelly bought her first cellphone from her mom. Her mom asked her to buy her a new one for Christmas. She went shopping and was happy with the choices she saw. Kelly's mom gave her three different phones. After shopping all night, Kelly had her new cellphone.

Garden. Ike was gardening in his yard. He was cutting a small piece of grass. He saw a large flower in the grass. He decided to climb on top of the flower and feed it to his cat. His cat ate the flower and was happy to have found new friends.

Jan pays rent. Jan was tired of her husband's being a drudge. He kept missing work. Jan had been avoiding his company at work. She went into her bank account and took out a bunch of money. She was shocked and surprised when she saw that the money was a deposit from her husband!

Skip has dreams. Skip is a very artistic person. One day Skip decides to paint his own dream. Skip paints the dream of a girl that he loves. He paints his dream in a new color and sells the painting. Skip is happy that his new painting made him happy.

Dad's Secret Profession. Jim had been working in the construction industry for Years. He was hired to do a project for a new hotel. They needed to find out if the hotel was up to code. Jim didn't want to tell his boss, but he needed to be on time. The hotel finally did get inspected and he was given a bonus.

The Pillow. Mary was sitting in her bedroom one day, taking a nap. She started to feel a slight tingling. Then she realized she had fallen asleep in her old bed. She checked to see what had happened. Mary was holding her pillow in her hands, a terrible memory of that night.

First Football Game. Kara and her friends went to the school's first football game. When they arrived, they were surprised at the turnout. They saw that there was a huge line for tickets. Kara and her friends were overwhelmed with the number of people. After they got in the line, they went home and watched the game on TV.

Falling in the Handstand. I was at the gym. The instructor told us to be on the lookout for falling. I felt a sudden snap and was terrified. The instructor made me get up. I realized that I needed to start walking in place.

The Flu Shot. Tom's dad had a big flu shot. Tom was concerned about how much time he would miss. Tom was very concerned and got the shot. He fell asleep when he woke up. It was the same shot that had been effective.

Grass In The Bed. Mandy was cooking a dinner for her parents. She was mixing her parents' favorite meal. Suddenly, she noticed a big pile of grass in the middle of the kitchen. She called her mom to come get it. Mandy put a few new leaves in the grass and she was done.

Nervous Mom. Nancy was at her son's soccer game with her daughter. Suddenly she felt nervous and she started crying. The game ended and they returned home. Nancy was relieved and decided she had just been at a bad game. She apologized to her daughter.

Saint Patrick's Day. Today was Saint Patrick's Day at Mary and Charles's. They were both happy because they had been looking forward to Saint Patrick's Day. They decided to go for a drive down the street. It was a quiet street. They saw a lot of people there.

Dust. Bryan was dusting the floor with the iron. He accidentally hit his eye with the iron. Bryan had to rush to the emergency room. His eye was bruised and bleeding profusely. Bryan went home and began to work on his eye.
Popcorn. Tom was trying to watch a movie. He wanted to stop but couldn't. He realized he couldn't go to a movie theater. So he bought some popcorn instead. He was glad to be able to catch the movie.

Ninety Years Old. Ida was forty years old. Ida was a very pretty lady. Ida's neighbors decided to raise money for an outdoor art installation. The art installation was supposed to last ninety-two years. After ninety years the outdoor art installation was torn down.

Hot Water. Sara is at the pool and she wants some hot water. She sees her neighbor and asks if she wants to borrow some. Her neighbor says yes and gives her a bottle. Sara picks up the bottle and takes it home. Sara is happy she had a hot water bottle.
Bad Donuts. I went to a new coffee shop. I ordered some Donuts. After they were delivered I opened them. It was the worst smell I ever smelled. I was so upset about it.

Right Racquet. The kids were playing a race on the court. Jules was on her right side and was feeling rather sick. She was having the time of her life. Jules's dad took her out to the kitchen to have ice cream. It wasn't until she had had ice cream that she saw what was wrong.

Taxes. Kelly's mom took her to get a tax return. She filled it out and mailed it in. She went to the IRS office to file her return. She waited in line for three hours. Her mom told her it was not needed and that she should start over.

Bad consequence. Kelly and her best friend were in the middle of an argument. Kelly was being mean to her friend and telling lies about her. It was getting really out of hand and Kelly felt she couldn't stand it. She punched her friend in the face. The fight was a big distraction and it turned ugly.
Friend of a Friend. My favorite TV show is called Friends. My friend is an actor. I asked my friend what he thought of the show. He told me that he liked it a lot. I decided to buy the series.

Domestic Violence. Julie was at a dinner party with her boyfriend. She and her friend went for a walk together. Julie was walking past a building when a man came at her. The man shoved Julie in the chest and punched her. Julie ran to another building where she called the police.
The Cops. Sam was working a robbery. Someone in his family had a gun. He shot one at the police. The police were really scared. They were forced to call for backup.

Prayer. Lola was getting ready to go to church. She had her eyes closed and was praying. Suddenly, she could not focus and dropped her eyes. She had a seizure and was taken to the hospital. The doctor made her go to sleep and pray for a better night.

Puppy Race. Linda loves dogs. One of her best friends asked her to join a dog race. She agreed and went to the race. Her friend had a dog named Bully. Linda lost by a few inches and Bully won the race.

Movie Night. It was a very hot day outside. Tim had never gone to a movie night before. He went to the theater with his friends. Afterwards, he sat back down and watched a movie. Tim enjoyed himself and the movies that evening.

Turning The Drone Against Him. Tina had a new drone she wanted to try out. She put it inside of her friend's car. When her friend got home, her car was gone. She went to turn it on but then realized it was not working. She tried to turn it off but it did not work anymore.

Holy Frame. Sam's grandfather came to visit him at the hospital. The grandfather brought sam and his brother's dog with him. They sat at a table outside of the room. Sam got ready with his camera. He put his camera into his camera bag and left.

Golf. Nate wanted to take his golfing skills to the next level. He signed up for a local golf course. The course was very well established and he really enjoyed it. He challenged some of his friends to a golf match. Nate was excited to try out his new golf skills!

The Miscalculation. Kara was on a trip to Las Vegas. She and her friends were invited to a casino. They made a large bet on the slot machines. Kara had a rough night and lost her money. She realized that she didn't know enough to take the bet.

The Book. My mom bought a book from a used book store. I picked it up and read it in a few minutes. Later that night, I realized I had forgotten the book in my bag. I immediately called and asked to return it. I was shocked when my mom said no and it would cost me a hundred dollars.

Arranging the place cards. The students were ready. They were going to be organizing the place cards for the class. They knew they needed some ideas. They went through them and got the final ones. The class was very organized.
Dog. A man was driving down the road when a dog ran over his car. The man yelled for the dog to stop. The dog ran after the man. The dog bit his neck. The dog was taken to a vet.

Trading Lunches. Tom took his friends to a Chinese restaurant. Tom ordered a lunch with the same food that they had. When the meal was over, Tom was hungry. He picked up some chicken from the fridge. He had a sandwich with the same chicken.

An Unexpected Rodent. A squirrel climbed up the fence on her front porch. She threw it down the fence several times. It finally jumped up to attack the squirrel. The squirrel died. A passerby came by to pick it up.

Game Night. The school is hosting a game night on Monday. My team and I are going to play some soccer. My wife and I got together and picked out a game. I will be using my laptop. We will be watching a movie on the couch.
Unsweetened. Ethan was at the store. He wanted to buy some ice cream. He wanted some chocolate. So he went to the store. He bought both.
Graduation. Kelly was supposed to get her diploma. It was a huge undertaking. The school was getting too tall for her class. Luckily there was a lift. Kelly was able to climb in and finish in time.

Kobe's Last Game. When Kobe Bryant was an elite basketball player he played for a very small team. They played a great game against a very bad team. Their last goal came in the second half. Kobe scored all the way in and the game was tied. They lost the game anyway so the team decided to quit.

The Passports. Lucy was at her summer job as a customs inspector. She had an inspection of a large box of passport photos. She was in line for the inspection when she noticed that she had missed one. It was on her last day in the job and she hadn't seen it. Lucy felt relieved to have been cleared for the trip.

Boston Trip. My friend was from Boston and I had just moved to Atlanta. He wanted to go to Boston one day for a weekend. I agreed and we planned it out. We got everything ready and went on a road trip. It was great and we had so much fun!

Army. Jasmine and her family joined the army. They received their basic training. The family moved to the mountains of North Dakota. They were a part of the army for two years. They had a great time in their new life.

ADHD. John was an extremely intelligent man. He was always studying for exams, taking notes. When he was finally done, he sent them back to his school. His teacher noticed something was wrong and looked at his papers. When he told her about his academic struggles, she threw him a huge surprise party!
Bad Friends. Sophia was out at a local bar. She met a guy she liked. They started dating for a few months. Eventually she got jealous of the guy. Sophia left him.

The Fabric. Amy loved to make things out of fabric. She would buy small scraps. She would use them as blankets or bedding. One day Amy bought a fabric blanket to sleep in. Amy was very proud of her new blanket.
New lab gig. Jenny worked for a very famous research lab. She wanted to get paid. So she decided to work there full time. The job was not easy but she did it. She made many friends that day.

Fitness Competition. Sarah is really into weightlifting. She decides to go to a competition. Sarah trains really hard for the competition. Sarah gets in great shape. Sarah is happy that she has entered into the competition.

Gas and Money. I needed to get gasoline. I could not find any gas stations near my house. I had to drive for hours to get to them. I finally found one with the right price. After driving to the gas station I had enough money to buy gas.

My new Sister. Yesterday I had to tell my sister to get the kids ready for school. She was excited, but it was hard. When we got there, she told me how sad she is. We hugged and cried, and then she ran inside. It's going to be really hard for her, but she knows this is the right thing to do.

Street of 3G. Raj's family was traveling. They had to make a detour so they would get to the next one. They decided to take the subway. The subway took them through the city. They had been there 5 times.

Peanut butter and jelly. It was Christmas eve and Beth had a jar of peanut butter and jelly. It was the last gift she would be able to buy for her parents. She was going to be so excited that she had no idea. Her parents picked her up. They gave her peanut butter and jelly for Christmas.
Tickets in Texas. Tina had just moved to Texas. She didn't know how to get in or out. She called to arrange for her transportation. She got in with her friends. They spent the night at the movies.

Moses Went to Church. Moses wanted to get his Sunday morning Christian lessons. He decided he wanted to start with the Bible. Moses went to the local church and took a bible class. After the class, Moses went home and began reading the Bible. After finishing his bible study, Moses went to church on Sunday morning.

Bathing suit. Kia was going to take a bath. She was afraid it would be boring. But when she opened the bag, there was a bathing suit. She bought it and didn't know what to expect. When she got home, she was in a bathing suit.

The Wholesale Club. Jan had never been to a Wholesale Club. She wanted to see a new shop open up. She decided to browse the new store. There were a few items that she liked and didn't want to miss. She went to the Wholesale Club and enjoyed herself.

The New Kid. Bobby was a very nice boy. His mom gave him a new baby when he turned four. His mom took him shopping for a new baby. The new baby was very nice. Bobby never complained about the new baby.

Football Pals. It was the week before the Super Bowl and Bob was playing football with his friends. Bob was playing with his friends against a team that had lost. Suddenly, Bob's brother and friends made a big run for the endzone. They caught up to the two teams and scored the winning touchdown. Bob and his friends decided to play again the next week.
Babysitting nightmare. Kate got a new babysitter. She was very happy. Kate took the kids to a new park. Kate was having a great time. Kate would not have any problems having the kids.
A Used Car. One day I found a new used car. It was a few months old. It had just been painted. It was painted really well. I brought it home and showed it to my wife.

Tyler's huge mistake. Tyler wanted to go to the movies but didn't have a ticket. The movie ticket he needed was $40. When he got to the theatre he noticed he had no change in his pockets. He tried to pay with his credit card and was shocked to realize he left it at home. The theater staff told him they didn't have his name on file so he had to return his ticket.

Marco Makes His Bed. Marco woke up this morning and wanted to make himself a nice bed. Marco grabbed his favorite pillow, stuffing it with pillows from his nightstand. Marco pulled his sheets over his head to rest his head on. When he laid on the pillow, he couldn't believe how soft and soft it was. He felt so peaceful, and so content.

New Shoes. Jane needed new shoes. She was afraid her dad would kick her out if she didn't get them. The day of her big date came around. Her dad had bought all of her fancy shoes. She had to wait until the last minute.
Off to the Races. Ava and her dad went to see a race. They both loved the sport. They both went along with the race. They both loved watching the race!They were both glad they went.

Rent. Gina had been looking for a new place to live. She had been waiting to rent for a few days now. She couldn't find the right place to move in. Then, on the last day of her search she found a nice place. She went there and couldn't wait to move in.

Celebrity sighting. Sally decided to go to the beach. She bought sunscreen and sunscreen lotion. Sally walked to the beach. She took off her sunscreen. After, she realized she was looking at celebrities.

The Long Bike Ride. Nancy decided to ride her bike everyday. She was going to work one morning. On her bike, she ran into a guy. She decided to ride over to talk to him. Luckily, her boyfriend was on her bike.

Ticket. Barry has never gotten to see his favorite team play. He decided he would do something special to show them that he appreciated them. Barry wrote a heartfelt letter to the team owner. Barry signed the letter with his name on it. Barry and his teammates won a rare championship!
Rent Money. Tom was going to get a new job. Tom didn't have enough money for rent. Tom searched for a place to live. He finally found a cheap apartment. Tom took the new job and saved money.
The Rain. One day while going to the lake. When I was going in the lake. There was an especially heavy rain. It started to rain. I went to bed early that night.

Fake. Sammy was playing with his friends. The one was lying, he had to hide behind his phone. But Sammy couldn't help but look at his friends. Suddenly the phone rang and Sammy was caught. He was grounded for two weeks.

Final Moments. The end of the day was approaching. Samantha had been working very hard to get to class on time. She was nervous that there would be extra work. But when her teacher came into class, she was excited. Samantha was so excited to finally meet all of her classmates!

Kitty Keeper. My favorite book in the world is about a girl who can change her life. My friends tell me that I can change my life too. We have started a litter of kittens as a pet. Every day, I feed them to my kitty. Now, one kitten stays with my friends every day.

Sleep. John has been feeling ill. He gets a call from his girlfriend. She tells him she is pregnant and he needs to take a break. He gets out of bed and is exhausted. John starts the day feeling better.

Mechanic. My dad used to work at an auto parts store. He worked on a variety of machines, including a crane. One day, the crane snapped in two. One worker was injured, so the worker was removed from the shop. One of the mechanics, the son of the owner, was promoted.
Too Many Dogs. Gina was at the zoo when her brother brought her dogs. They were all so small. She was going to pet one of them. Unfortunately, it bit her on the foot. Gina had to give up the dogs.

George visits the comic book store. George is looking for a new comic book. He doesn't have one he likes at home. George decides to visit a comic book store. He tries a lot of comics. George finds the one he really likes.

Rick Nick and the Bee. Rick Nick grew up with bees in his house. He was very lonely and lonely at the same time. One day his parents bought him a big hive to keep them company. They brought it home and the bees became very active and friendly. Rick Nick was happy and made many new friends that day.

Painting. Molly had always wanted to paint a mural in her backyard. Her mom wanted her to take a summer break and focus on her painting. Molly had never been painting before, so she tried to paint a simple image. She drew a beautiful black-and-white circle on the ground. She was proud that her painting would become a national symbol!
Food. Tom was on a date. Tom ordered a sandwich. Tom realized he forgot his wallet at home. He got a hold of his wallet and realized he left it on the table. Tom threw the sandwich away.
Climate Change. Bill was an aspiring scientist. He wanted to work on climate change. He wanted to go to the best university. But his family was poor. Bill had to pay to study at the university.
Cancelled. Barry had a great day at school. He was in second place in the class. He was nervous about his test. Barry failed his test. Barry got a D on his report card.

Parade. Rachael was so excited for her birthday. She was finally getting a parade. She got dressed and drove to the park. She saw her favorite parade floats and jumped for joy. The parade was so much fun and she had a great birthday.
Mexican Restaurant. My husband and I took a trip to Mexico. We went to a Mexican restaurant for dinner. The food was great and they paid very well. We loved our meals. We are going back soon.
Lost. Lester was playing outside with his friends. Suddenly he saw something on the ground. It was a baby. He didn't recognize it as a parent. Lester was scared to talk to his parents about it.

New Printers. Jane bought her very own brand new printer. She thought it would be the easiest way to create her own papers. She had to sign up for a membership. But once she did she loved it. She would be happy to get a new one soon.
Dress Code. Ruth was at her grandmother's house. She was very nervous and anxious. Ruth told her grandmother about her dress code. She then got a new dress. Ruth was proud of her new outfit.

A baby's fall. Sam was watching TV with his dad. Suddenly, they heard a noise in the room. They looked and saw a baby falling down the stairs. Their mom started crying and trying to get her son back. Sam's dad held him for a few minutes before letting go.
Frozen Food. My friend and I were driving home. I realized something. I had frozen dinner. I looked for a way to return it. We just realized how dangerous it was to drink frozen food.

Friends of Mine. I have a roommate named Mike. He was the friend of my girlfriend when she was younger. Mike went to rehab and was released. Mike met a girl at the bar and was having a good time. It turned out she had been using drugs, and Mike is now in rehab.

Affair in Storage Room. John's girlfriend has been out of town recently. He knows that she has been away for three days. His roommate recently came home from work. He found out that the roommate is a lesbian. John has been trying to find someone to talk to about it.

Ultrasound. Mary was having trouble hearing. She had a hearing aid in her ear and needed help. She asked her mother to take her to the doctor. The doctor saw that she had a tumor in her ear. Mary could no longer hear properly.

Running out of time. Kate is out at the grocery store. The checkout line is getting really long. Kate starts to get very tired. Finally she reaches the front of the line. After a few more minutes she is out of time.

Jogging at the park. Sam was walking around at the park with her brother. Suddenly, she felt a sharp pain in her leg. She immediately called for her brother to stop, but they didn't listen. Sam had to be helped into the car. She ended up making it home safely.

Abandoned Home. Kim's mother had been away from home for awhile. When Kim went to pick her up, there was nothing left. Kim and her father went back home to check on the house. After a couple of hours, they saw that their house had been taken by an arsonist. Kim's father had no idea what they would do, since his house had been burned.

secret. I had a long talk with my friend about her. She didn't want to speak to me in public so I was embarrassed. After I left she said she didn't want to talk to me for a while. I had to tell her I wasn't sure I wanted to talk to her in the first place. She was very confused and I realized it was just a secret.
The Horse. Sandra wanted to go horseback riding. She went to a local barn. She bought a horse to ride. She took it home and took it on the ride. It was much less stressful than it looked.

Imaginary Boat. Lenny is really excited for the upcoming summer. His family and friends went to Disney World. They were amazed at how much fun was had. Then the real boat came in the room and they all sat on it. It was really exciting and they all had fun.

Waitress. The waitress was a nice, quiet girl. One day a man asked her for help on a tip. The waitress looked at him and smiled. She then added a few quarters to the bill. He laughed as she did so, but only for a moment.

Broken arm. Kya had just left the gym. She was in the hallway when she felt something break. She tried to look around for the source of the pain. She saw that the arm had come from her bag. Her friend was holding onto her arm and was helping her.
Lost Tooth. My tooth was knocked out by a glass jar. I was very angry. I went to the dentist. I was told to get a new tooth. I had to wait for a week for the new one.

Bad Dog. Troy was a retired police officer. He was out on patrol. Troy saw a dog run into a parked car. Troy chased the dog and chased the dog. Troy was unable to catch up with the dog after the chase.

Flee. Tom was driving home from work. He noticed that he had gone through a traffic jam. He was about to take a shortcut. He decided he would try to stay on the road as he drove. It took him a long time to get there.
Bad Skyler. We went on a road trip to visit a friend. The bus arrived about an hour later. We drove very fast. Our road trip was delayed. My friend was very angry.
Dog's Behavior. Kathy was out with her family in the woods. She found a stray dog. They brought him inside. They put him down. They decided he'd be better off if they weren't around anymore.

Too many kids. I've been playing pool with my friends for two hours. We have a big pool with lots of kids. A pooler walks past us and picks up a child in a pool. He picks up the kid and throws him into the pool. The child splashes into the pool and gets into trouble.

Saving a cookie. Nate went to the supermarket. He wanted to purchase some chocolate. He went back home to get some chocolate. He made a huge batch. When he was done, he took it back to the store to buy more.

The Old Man. A very old man was playing in the yard one day. He was looking at the flowers when he realized something. He had discovered a new species of flower. He went inside and carefully placed a single flower on the ground. The old man was delighted to see that he had been able to help this special flower.

Computer. I love computers. I can type 100 words a minute on my computer. Last week my laptop broke, and it is out of warranty. I was thinking of a plan of attack for this week. I ordered a new laptop, and I am planning on using it often.

new kid. Jen's first day of Kindergarten went well. Her little brother told her that she looked cute. When she was done crying, her mother picked her up. Jen was very sad to see her mom. She wanted to cry the entire time.

bored. Cathy had been bored all day. So when her grandma brought her a snack, she took a bite. Then she realized she had eaten all of it. So she had to go to the kitchen to make more. When she got back home, Cathy had had enough.

Fire. Jana was running late to her house. She was waiting for her husband at the bus stop. His car was stalled and he couldn't start it. Jana was mad that she had to wait for him at all. She drove to the house and burned the front porch.
Dive Bar. Dan and Kelly went to the dive bar. They had a lot of fun. The bar had a few different styles. They each had a different game to play. The two liked how each of them played.
Terrible Name. Jane was playing with her dog. It began to bark. It tried to attack the neighbor's dog. Jane's dog came running over to her. She decided to name it Spot.
A Towel. Diana had a lot of laundry to do. Her laundry line was very long. She needed a towel for her clothes. She went to the store to look for one. She was able to find the perfect one for her.

Dang Cat. When I was growing up my cat was always outside. We were going through a lot of stuff when I needed him. He would get inside the house and play games. When the garbage was emptied, I thought it was funny. I kept him there all the time because it wasn't a big deal.

Target. A man wanted to put his name on the cover of a new music magazine. He contacted the magazine's director and asked him to design the cover. After an extensive conversation, the magazine hired him for a cover design job. The man was pleased with his response and asked for a discount. The magazine refused and said the man didn't have any skills.

The Eater. Alicia was a very picky eater. She decided to try something new at her new restaurant. She put a chicken sandwich on the table. When she sat down the customer was shocked. He was eating a chicken sandwich with a carrot in it.
Walk. I was on my lunch break at the school. I walked to the cafeteria. I sat down at a table and looked up. I was going to take a walk. After walking for a few minutes I felt ready to walk again.

Performing a concert. When I was young, I loved performing. I would go and play my guitar and sing in front of people. However, a few years ago I broke my foot and couldn't perform. Luckily, I learned my lesson and now plays the violin. My girlfriend really likes how I've been performing lately.

Janitor Job. John was a very good janitor. One day, a lady came to his door to ask for help. John helped the woman clean the bathroom. Then he left the next day to go home to clean his house. When he came back, the lady had taken all her money.
Jack's Dog. Jack is playing with his dog. His dog runs off to play. His dog gets lost. His dog returns home with his collar. Jack's dog is now his best friend.

Cleaning the yard. Diane loved to clean her yard. She had an old dog who was in need of a good mop. She loved to clean her yard. One day she decided to clean her lawn. She cleaned her yard and gave her dog lots of treats.

He will pay. I was walking along the beach one day. I ran into my friend, Sam, who told me he was going on a date. I decided to try to convince him to ask me out. I walked to his house and asked him to go to a movie. He was so happy, and agreed to go with me!

Swing Time. A friend of Bob's moved to the state of Texas. Bob was excited to go to the swing every summer. However, he was afraid that his swing would be too hard to learn. Bob practiced every day for a year, and finally improved. Now Bob has many fun days every summer.

Jeff's A Lost Cause. Jeff went to the baseball field in his town to see his friend play. Jeff was nervous because his friend didn't play in a long time. Jeff sat down at the baseball bench in the field. When he came back down the bench, he realized he lost the ball. Jeff had to wait for someone to catch the ball and take it.

Old diary. One day, my dad decided he wanted to buy a diary. I asked my dad if I could borrow one as a gift for Christmas. He took the diary to my house and it sat outside my door. I opened the door and I saw the diary was gone. I told him I wanted to keep the diary as a souvenir.

Christmas lights. There were lights everywhere in the house. I tried to take my lights to the porch and then upstairs. The lights would not turn on because of the light fixture. I was very sad when I was done. But then I decided to turn the lights back on and see how they looked.

The Appointment. Gina was trying to plan her family's trip to Vegas. She had been trying to make it all week. However, Gina made a terrible mistake. When she left for the airport she forgot to check her emails. The next day she realized she'd forgotten to email anything.

Pajamas. I got out of the shower and noticed that my underwear was wet. I put on my underwear to change. I felt an ache, but it was nothing to be worried about. Then I noticed that my pants were too tight. After that, I did a quick trip to the laundry.

The warning. Kia had just bought a new cellphone. She thought the new one was great. But then she realized that she could use a virus on it. Kia was warned about this at work. She cancelled her contract with the company.

The Old Roller Coaster. Jim was visiting Las Vegas with his family. He wanted to try out a new roller coaster. When they got to the ride, they were terrified. The coaster was very unsafe and scary. Jim got sick and missed the whole trip.

Big Test. I was at the beach and wanted to relax. I got a new pair of sandals from the store. I wore them to class and forgot they were there. I came back after class to discover that they had been misplaced. I lost the socks forever.

Bonding Time. I had gotten a lot of mail the other day. I decided I would take a break. When I went to bed, I put my phone away. A dog came running out from under the bed. It sat right by me and I hugged it, and we bonded.
Adler. Bobby was looking at the internet. His computer was getting too slow. He went to the store. He bought a new laptop. He was happy with it.

The Castle. There was a large castle in town. One night, someone stole one of the towers. People were scared and called the police. The police investigated, and finally they arrested the thief. He was sentenced to life in prison.
New dog. Sally was walking her dog. The dog came into her yard. Sally looked around. The dog began to run away from her. Sally called the police and they caught the dog.

No Donuts. My parents were out of donuts. They didn't want to make me eat them. So I made them some peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. When I tasted the sandwiches, I couldn't help but get sick. I threw up on the couch.
Buying another car. Susie was on a budget. She decided she wanted a new car. So she decided to save money. She took a trip to the mall. She was able to find a nice car on sale for $800!
Wood Wins. Nina went to the lottery and lost. It was really close. She had to sit through the next seven pages. She knew she'd bet her life on it. She won the lottery.

Snorkeling. One summer Tim wanted to get into nature. He decided to go out on his own and snorkel. Tim started at sea but was unsuccessful. Tim decided to try to go snorkeling instead. Tim was able to go snorkeling and it was a great experience.

Randy gets the girl. Randy had been very lonely for years. He had an idea he wanted to try. Randy's girlfriend told him to ask her out on a date. Randy agreed to the idea and had a good time. Randy went on a date with his girlfriend that night.

Steve Becomes Just Like The Others. Steve is a young man. He wants to become a professional gamer. He goes to school to learn how to play. He decides to join a team that has a strong leader. After school Steve becomes just like the other young men.
Frombo. I have to leave the country for a week. I've been working all week at a farm. I finally get to visit the city. Frombo is my new favorite city. It was so warm and peaceful.
Responsibility. I went to a funeral. I was a little nervous. I was afraid that I would miss everything. I took a long time to answer questions. Finally, I was able to give my thoughts.

Major Regret. James had planned to be a captain in his army. James was nervous and was having a hard time preparing for the big fight. James was nervous about the fight but his nerves were unwarranted. He decided to try out for a position and was very surprised. James made the team and went on to be a great officer.

Deer Huntress. Alicia wanted to be a deer hunter. She started getting some clients. One day she had her first deer hunt. She caught seven buck and two elk. Her deer hunt became the highest rated deer hunt in all of Africa.
Self Esteem. I found a nice shirt on the street. I wore it outside. A group of guys got the shirt. One of the guys asked me out on a date. I decided that self esteem is important.

Ross The Gamer. Ross wants to be a professional gamer. His friends think he is too good to play. One day he met a girl in a pub who wanted to play. Ross and the girl played video games together. They became great friends.
Cherries Jubilee. I love cherries. Today I went for a walk through the park. My friend went for a walk in the park. He brought along a sack of cherries. He ate the cherries and then returned home.

Pothole. I was in a rush and my car was stuck in a pothole. I was able to call my friend to come help me out. I was able to drive my car out of the pothole. We drove back to the car dealership to get the car fixed. I got it fixed and was able to return home.

New Handle. Sarah was cleaning a car when she remembered a problem. She had a lot of paint on her door handle. Sarah decided to buy a new handle. Sarah didn't really like the handle but the price was right. She now uses the old handle.

After School Getaway. Sally always wanted to go to the school after school getaway. She would go to the school with her mother as her best friend. She had plans to do a trip with her older sister. One day, she went to the school to meet her sister. She ended up having a great time in the school after all!

Candy. Maggie was making cookies for her children. She was baking a chocolate chip cookie. She began making sure the dough was mixed well. When she was done, the dough started to come out of the oven. The dough was very sticky and had come out brown.

Chemistry Lab. Jill worked as a chemist at a chemical company. Jill worked on making new chemicals. One day, Jill got her hands on a batch of chemicals. The chemicals were bad. Jill decided to quit her job.

Condo. I took a car from the garage to the fair. I put in the spare, my daughter's car, and some of my son's. I went to the car lot and got an auto mechanic to help. We took the car to the car wash and got a new front seat. We are now able to go to the fair every year.

The Date. Susie and Chris were walking home one night. They were enjoying a night out on the town. They were on a deserted street when they noticed an attractive man. Susie and Chris quickly recognized each other. They decided to make up, they talked about their day and they went home.

The Early Baby. Jenna was pregnant with her second baby. She was trying to avoid giving birth. Jenna wanted to give her baby early. Jenna's baby was delivered early. Jenna was happy she could have a baby in the morning.

Volcano. In a volcano you can't see much because it's erupting. I walked up to a crater and looked to the right. Then I walked back down to the left. I was scared when I saw a huge mountain looming in the distance. The volcano must be coming back, and I don't want to go in!
Crushing Like a Frog. Tara was out on a date. She decided to go to a bar. She ordered some shots. Then she went home. She was so upset and didn't want to go to the bar again.
Crush. Liz always loved to crush her friends. She would crush them all. Her friends did not understand why. Liz was too old to get upset. They would say she was mad.

Bumping into old friends. Sam and Sam saw a homeless man sleeping on the street. They decided to give the man a hug and go home. The homeless man walked up to Sam and Sam offered him a hand. Sam and Sam were friendly for a couple of minutes. The homeless man gave Sam his wallet and a dollar.

The paint compromise. Jenny decided to paint her house red. She had painted the house orange, and blue. All the other colors worked, but she wanted to get it pink. She did not want to get a sparkly house. Jenny decided to just let it sit in the sun and the paint would dry.

Test. My friend works at an insurance company. She asked me if I wanted to take a test. I told her no because I wanted to play video games. She said if I passed she would pass me. Now that I have that I am happy because she is cool.

Diet. Lacy had a diet plan for her kids to follow. But one day, she became sick. The kids were confused and were crying. Lacy was worried that her children might break the diet. She was surprised to see they all loved her plan!

Annoying toy. Sally was taking her son to the toy store. She had been waiting on an hour for it to open. While there she realized the toy wasn't working properly. She had to walk out to the store. The toy finally worked once her son got it working again.
Harper Gets Lost. Harper is in the middle of his writing. He has been lost in the woods. Suddenly, he hears a sound. He looks all around him and sees a deer. He realizes that he has lost his trail.
Cake. I was craving cake. I had one piece that was too big. My brother told me I could have it any time I wanted. I couldn't wait to taste it. When I did taste it I fell in love.

Back Breaker. Mary was on vacation. One of her best friends, Jane, was on a break from her job. Jane was going into work wearing a shirt that read "back breaker"She walked into the office and everyone immediately took notice. Mary apologized profusely and they all left her alone.
Dog Bath. It was raining hard. One of the dogs smelled something in the house. He looked outside. He was horrified to see a dog bath. The dog had drenched his dog bath in urine and feces!

The Soup. Tina was making a soup. She took a large bowl and set it in the pot. After cooking for several minutes, the broth became soft. Tina took the bowl out of the pot to drain. When she got home, she noticed the broth was gone.
A Movie. Mary had just finished watching a movie. Suddenly she started to get anxious. She felt like she needed to get some rest. She decided to take a nap. Finally she felt better and relaxed.

The Lunchtime Pizza. Amy had a large plate of pizzas for lunch. She put the dough in the bowl but forgot to put the cheese on it. When the pizza came out the cheese didn't stick. Amy went to see what was wrong. She had placed the cheese on the wrong piece and it was ruined.

Hooray for Lisa. Lisa is a very talented pianist. One day Lisa plays an incredible concert. The crowd goes wild when Lisa plays her most beautiful work. Lisa feels very accomplished. Lisa has now become a famous pianist.
Hoop. Barry and Tom were arguing. Barry thought Tom was rude. Tom thought Barry was being mean. Barry ended up punching Tom. Tom apologized for the fight.
Acid rainy. The weather was awful today. It was very rainy. The kids were in trouble. They decided to play outside. They ended up being okay.

Go to the Store. Tom was trying to find the cheapest shoe he could find. He went to the department store to look for shoes. He came back and realized they had so many that he couldn't find anything. He went to the department store and started looking for something similar. He finally found a nice pair of boots and purchased them.

Crafting a Business. Ella was very excited to be a businesswoman. She had recently started a successful internet website. She wanted to make her business as successful as possible. The first task she had to do was craft a website. She bought a website builder from the internet.

Costume Contest. Lana won the costume contest at the costume store. She took home a gold medal and a few thousand dollars. She started to think that she could win a million dollars. She took an online costume contest and entered it. Lana lost her gold medal but won several hundred dollars.

Silverfish. Lucy was trying to save up enough money for her first car. Her mom was very worried, but Lucy reassured her. Finally Lucy was able to save enough to buy her first car. She drove it out of the garage, but it broke down. Lucy bought a new silverfish for her birthday.

Renee goes Camping. Renee's girlfriend decided she was going camping for the weekend. She drove her and Renee to the woods. Renee got lost in the woods. She looked all over for her girlfriend. When she got home she was happy.
The Chairs. Jenny needed new furniture. She went to the local furniture store. She found three beautiful chandeliers. She bought all three. Jenny was thrilled with her new furniture.
Bus still waiting. I drove on the bus to work today. The bus was slow and noisy. I finally got to my place to eat. The next day I woke up to work late again. I decided to just drive home instead.

Picking Flowers. One day Tim loved to collect flowers. He picked some pretty roses and wanted to keep them. He asked his mom to bring him some to hand out to people. He went out and bought all the flowers. Now Tim has an amazing collection of pretty flowers.

Big Fishing Trip. Bob went on a fishing trip with his son. They bought a boat and bait and set sail. Once on the beach, they were so close to the river, they were afraid. The boat started to sink and bob saw all the fish. Bob and his son were glad they had gone on the trip.

peanut scare. Kara had been feeling very sick lately. One day she went to the store to get a peanut butter and jelly sandwich. When she got it to the counter it was gone!She realized it was been sitting on the counter all day. She was so relieved when she found out it was her friend!

Winter coat. Tommy got a winter coat for his birthday. He didn't like it at all. He tried putting it on but didn't get warm at all. His skin got very warm. His parents had to make him get another coat.
Inheritance. Dana was an heir in a very big family. She was almost 20. She decided to put a trust fund into. Her parents were very upset. Dana didn't do it though and it left her feeling sad.

Driving at Night. It was very cold outside and Sam decided to drive to a local gas station. His cousin was driving with them and he didn't want to be late. The gas station wasn't far, so they took the short detour. Sam was scared he'd get stuck, but then he realized he wasn't late. As soon as the light turned red Sam got out and headed home.
Judy's pastry. Judy decided to make a pie for a birthday party. She decided to use brownies. Judy followed her favorite recipe. Then she added her favorite toppings. Judy couldn't wait for her party!

Annual Trip. Gina had always wanted to go on an annual trip with her friends. She took a hard sell and decided to travel alone. But then she discovered how many fun things to do. Her friends all agreed that this was one trip they would all miss. But Gina and her friends are not alone any more!

Kimmy's Cookies. Kimmy loved to bake cookies. She had a huge cupcake collection. One day she wanted to make some cookies for her friends. She mixed up some cocoa powder and almond milk. Her friends liked the delicious cookies.

Xerxes's Xenophobic Xeroxes. Xerxes liked copying things. He also copied people's handwriting. One day, Xerxes copied people's names. He wrote them all over Xerox machines. When Xerox found out, they were mad.
Bhishma. Sam was a Hindu. He decided to convert. His family was skeptical. But eventually he converted. He was happy about it.
History Test. My cousin had a history test next week. She was very excited. She was nervous about the test. When it came, she did not know what to expect. Her test was a failure!

My Cat Fluffy. I had a cat that was fluffed up and was very messy. I put her outside and allowed her to do her thing. Unfortunately, the cat ran into a box and started to scratch it. As a result, she began scratching her fur. Luckily, I put the cat outside and took her to the veterinarian.

The Joke. I went to the store to buy a set of glasses. My friend told me he needed glasses. I found some I liked that were not available. I decided to buy the glasses. I looked at them and they didn't fit.

Doing a good favor. My friend wanted to help out her mother with chores. She volunteered in the kitchen. When she came back, she started cooking. My friend got the dishes ready quickly. Her mother thanked her for doing a good job.
Gerald. Gerald was at a party. He noticed someone was missing. He asked his friends if they saw him. They said they saw him and went to help. They found him a long time later in the park.

The First Grade. When I was ten years old, my parents took me to the first grade. My parents made a big announcement. They announced that the first grade would be cancelled. My father and I got very upset. We decided to never go to that first grade again.
Too many shampoos. I had to get a new shampoo. I went to the store to get some. There were too many. I went home. I got two shampoo packets instead.
The flat tire. Beth was driving home from work. She had left her gas pedal up. As she came to a stop light she got a flat tire. She had to call an onramp. Her tire was just as bad.

Free. Lizzy was an artist at a gallery. She had been doing freelance art for two years. One day, she decided to start a Facebook account. The following week, a friend of hers recommended Lizzy's work. Lizzy was able to sell the art online and make money!
Precious. Spencer had been with his wife for 10 years. He had been going through a rough time. It made him very sad. He was so sad because he couldn't afford it. He saved up all day.
silence. Sally was sitting on the bench. She didn't hear any people. Then, there was a knock on the door. The knocker started to yell at Sally. Sally did not like the yelling.
Locked out. Maddie was late for work and she couldn't get in. So she sat outside, waiting. A few people came inside. They got her a soda. She was fine.

home ec. I went to the local animal shelter to adopt a kitten. I took the kitten home and picked her up. The kitten was small and friendly. The kittens mom was very friendly. After a few weeks, the kitten had grown into a beautiful girl.
A mix up. Jim and his friend Jim were in a football game. Jim went up to the quarterback and asked for a play. The quarterback said no. Jim asked again. The quarterback said yes.
One day of Starvation. Tim was on a plane. He had to take a break. He didn't have enough food for his entire plane. He had to sit on the floor until he ate some. Then he started starving himself.

Getting Fired. Mitch was at the bank when he got a phone call. He wasn't there long enough to see who made it. He realized that he was being fired. He asked why he had to go to the bank. Someone answered and he was fired the next day.

Bye Dad. Eli's dad passed away. His wife decided to visit her son in hospital. Eli had a lot of family photos and asked to go to the hospital. Eli was really moved and decided to stay. The visit was the best thing to ever happen to Eli.

Sign Me Up. Gina was getting ready to make a great first impression. She had been doing her hair and makeup for days. She decided to get some makeup and a haircut. She put on some makeup and walked out the door. The girls at work saw her and started to snap selfies.

The Cow. Jill and her family took a trip to Kansas. The trip was a fun one, and Jill was very happy. Jill drove across the state to visit her family. The road to Kansas had many odd landmarks along the way. Jill enjoyed the wonderful trip she had had.
Sick. Last Friday I had a little sickness. I stayed home that night. I got a really bad headache. The next day I was feeling worse. I had to go to work and lay on the couch all day.
The Trapeze. Lily was trying a tumbling trick. She was very nervous to do so. She was also very nervous to see how far she could pull. The trick started to go very far. Lily didn't pull very far.

From Girlfriend To Landlord. Sandy is dating her high school sweetheart. She is hoping he will marry her soon. Sandy and her girlfriend are excited for the day. Sandy's parents tell her she needs to move out. Sandy is heartbroken, as she never expected this day.

Santa Claus. Christmas was here and my family was all dressed up. We went down to the mall and bought gifts. We went home and cooked up an extra dinner to celebrate. We had lots of fun and spent a lot of money. We all felt really festive.
New Car. Jenny's car broke down one day. She didn't have any money to fix it. She got a new car for a few thousand dollars. She kept it for a long time. She was able to keep it for a long time.

New Boss. Gina was a new employee at her store. She was new to the office and she didn't know anyone. Gina was nervous when she started working with her new coworkers. She didn't want to make any enemies. Eventually, Gina started working with them and her confidence started to rise.

Computer Programming. Cindy was a computer programmer. She decided to teach people how to program computers. She started the first Computer programming class. Cindy did a great job at her first class. Cindy's school was proud of her.

Bubble Bubble. Ava's neighbor used to give her bubbles. One day he decided to start a business around them. One day he put a lot of bubbles up. Ava was very upset with the new business. Now she does not use any bubbles at all.

Soft Serve. I was walking through the mall yesterday. Suddenly I noticed I had lost my soft serve and had to go to another store. I had to drive a long way home to find a store I knew. I had to drive three and a half hours to get back to my favorite store. It took me fifteen minutes, but I had enough money to make the drive home.
grades. Tim decided to buy new clothes. He looked online for a new pair of pants. He found some he liked. Tim went home and ordered the pants. The jeans arrived very soon after buying.

Smart Move. Beth was in a relationship with her husband. She thought he was going to be a problem at times. One time, she got very angry with him. She left their house and went to another house. She stayed there all day.

Son. Ida wanted to marry a boy and become a mother. She was scared of the process, but the boy was handsome. One night while at the bar, she had sex with him. She told everyone about it, so she could get over it. That was the last time Ida was interested in a boy.

Grass. There was grass everywhere in our apartment. When I walked to the door, I saw I forgot my keys. I tried to knock, but the door wouldn't open. I ended up taking a bus instead. Since my apartment is far away from the school, I can't go in the grass.

Lace Looks Good On Everyone, Darling. Anna noticed her mother buying lace for her dress for the party. She decided to show her mother her new outfit. She put on her lace skirt and went to the party. Anna was delighted to see her mom looking very pretty. Anna ended up in the center of a big circle of people.

Carlos Weeds His Garden. Carlos was trying to garden his backyard. He was growing tomatoes, peppers, lettuce, cucumbers and onions. As he was working, a large black bear came in the yard. Carlos saw that he had a huge field of seed. Now, Carlos has a huge field of tomatoes.

New fast food. Janet went to her friend's house to order a burger. Her friend didn't want to have her eat something fancy. Janet ended up being the only one in her party. Her friend then proceeded to order an orange and a burger. Janet and her friend had fun eating the fast food.

Accident. Kate was trying to go to the park. She was walking when she slipped and fell. She landed in a ravine. Kate was bleeding profusely. Luckily, she was able to get back in time to catch the bus.
Dream. I am a dreamer. I love to dream. I dream of having a very long life. My dream is to be like a prince of a kingdom. Today is my birthday.

Building a dock. I love the idea of building a dock with my friends. I got to the store and picked out what I wanted. After I got the materials together, we went to the store. I went to the store to get the materials and then it was time to go. We got to the dock and everyone was happy that they built it together.

Painted Lines. Jenna went to the store to buy new curtains. She found an old pair that were perfect for the job. Jenna decided she would paint them. She took her curtains and waited at the counter for the line to open. Jenna found the perfect curtains for her project.
Clothes. Janet was in a rush. She needed clothes for her big party. She walked to the clothing store. She had a lot of new clothes. Janet decided to go back home and clean up her things.
Too Tired For Work. I was out with my friends. The weather was very hot. It was raining really hard. I decided to run out early because I wasn't in shape. Luckily I managed to stay in my clothes.

Signs of Spring. We lived on a farm in the northern part of the country. We had been here for 30 years and loved it. Our neighbor moved this year. She had a new baby and we lost the old one. She said it's time to start moving and had never been before.

Losing Weight. Mary hated her new boyfriend. He was fat and annoying. Mary began losing weight and became happier. Mary stopped worrying about what people thought of her. She was so happy she could not wait to leave him.
Comics. Tim was reading comics. He fell asleep. His comics weren't in his pocket. He got very scared. He ran to his bedroom.
Plums. I love plums. I try to pick them every summer. Every summer, I go to a restaurant to get plums. I eat them with a glass of wine. I love plums.

Funny Face. My friend went to a comedy show last night. We were all in the corner of the theater. After about a minute, we started laughing because we had such a funny face. We also began to hear a noise in the corner of the theater. We thought it was a movie.

Tooth pain. Julie had a toothache. She took a shower. She noticed the water tasted terrible. Then she went in the bathroom and saw that her tooth was in aching. Luckily she was able to get it fixed without surgery.

Too Tall. I was working at a restaurant one day. As a waiter, I was supposed to be in charge of serving large portions. While serving, one waiter over stepped on my shoes. He was about the same height as me. My shoes were ruined and I decided I needed to be more careful.

Not on your Side Today. One day Amy was on her way to school. Suddenly a car in the street was in her path. Amy got out and ran into the car. It ran over her with such speed. She was shaken up for the rest of the day.
Zoo trip. Tom was visiting his grandparents. He wanted to see the zoo. He went in the front row. There were lots of animals. He went back and got his picture taken.

quick trip to the store. Travis was running late to the grocery store. He decided to go to the store earlier than usual. When he arrived at the store he ran through the check out line. He was amazed at how many items there were. Travis had enough to buy all of his favorite food.

The Baby Shower. I had a bad baby shower. My son was crying from his mother's side. My mom yelled and pushed him in the chair. I stood up and ran to my son's side. I helped him up and went to my son's room.

Crust. Molly was eating dinner. Her plate was on the table and she had it all to herself. Suddenly, her fork broke. She grabbed a piece and ran out of the house. She went to the store to get some food and then returned home.

Rich Family. I was recently reading an article on the internet about a family in Florida. I was very disappointed with their wealth and their lifestyle. They lived in a mansion with a swimming pool. The house was over budget and poorly maintained. I hope that these people become wealthy as their kids grow up.
Cheating. I was in class. I was having a lot of trouble getting my homework done. I started to get nervous. I decided to cheat. I got caught cheating and went to a counselor.

Birthday. Erika was getting ready to give birth to her third child. She had been thinking about her future and what would happen when she was born. Finally she took her baby to the hospital and had her epidural. The birth went smoothly and she was a little nervous about the procedure. The nurse told her that her baby would be fine and she was happy.
Store. I went to the store last week. I needed to buy a new game system. The clerk told me a sale was going on on the system. I ordered the game. It arrived a few days later.

Cavities. Kate's dentist had just finished filling her cavities. She was excited because she had just been to her dentist's appointment. The dentist filled Kate's cavities with various fluoride solutions. When it was time to get her mouthpieces back, Kate wanted them immediately. Kate's dentist told her that she was a good candidate for the cavities and she went through with it.

Walking in the rain. Mary had just turned in her essay for finals. The teacher was sitting next to her and she was taking her time. Mary took a deep breath and put her backpack away. She was ready for a long walk in the rain. When she got home, her backpack was wet and dirty.

Best Christmas. Molly's husband had a big party for his brother in the week of Christmas. When he went to pick Molly up, he had a hard time finding her. At first Molly said her brother was the coolest guy, but then she became upset. She was not happy when she realized her brother never showed up for the party. Molly made up her mind to never ask a brother for anything again.

Karen. Karen was working as a waitress. One night she was serving a customer. As Karen started to eat the customer started to leave. She could not figure out why. She had to explain it later but she was upset.
Fued. Kelsey was at a local cafe. She had forgotten her coffee. She wanted to order some more for her date. She looked around her for a drink. She couldn't find it.

The Tie Choice. Tom loved his wedding dress. It was the best wedding dress he ever wore. Tom decided to go and buy a tie for his wedding. Tom went to many stores but none of the ties he tried looked good. Tom decided to go to a store and get a different tie for his wedding.

Cracked Screen. John bought a new gaming system. It was a PC, but it didn't have a display. The display cracked badly. John bought a replacement screen. He's now able to play his video games and his new system is even better.

The Chalk. Kelsi was writing a piece on her upcoming wedding. She had a lot of chalk to work with. She put it all over her words. Then she went to her bridesmaids to have their chipped. She ended up making them a chintzy piece of art.

The School Year. Kim was enrolled in a school in a large city. She didn't know what to do during school. She couldn't focus. She spent the whole year studying. She was determined not to get caught up in it.

The Missing Keys. A young couple was having a difficult time in their home. They found a key inside their home. They went to check on it. It didn't work. They returned to the store to look for another one.
The Last Towel. I went to a park yesterday. It was hot outside. I realized I forgot my towel. I immediately went to the restroom. It took me two hours to get the towel.

Circus. My friend and I were watching a circus. They showed us various animal tricks and moves. We had never been to the circus before. We fell in love with the circus very quickly. We decided to go again next year.

The Music Lover. I've always loved music, but I can't afford to buy new music. I decided to learn to play the piano. I learned all about the different styles. I have now practiced all my life, and I can play every instrument. Now I love my new skill, and I want to find a job that offers it.

Old Dog. The cat was barking and panting. Her owner called her name. She came home to find that it had been in the backyard. She quickly got the cat out. The cat was very ill and was not allowed back in.

Ice Cream Truck. It was snowing outside. I decided to get ice cream. My mother told me to put it in the refrigerator. But my dad did not put it in the refrigerator. So I poured it on the ice cream truck.

Skating Lessons. Kelly had been playing with her little sister all day. Kelly knew she wanted to play a new sport. When she got home she took her new skates off. Her sister looked at them and said she didn't need them. Kelly felt sad, and wanted to get her sister ice skates.
Gambler. Charles and his wife are a gambler. They live in Vegas. Charles has a winning streak. He has won four straight games. His wife is surprised.

The Jail. Bella was locked up in a prison for a crime she did not commit. She had been sentenced for it and she had no hope. One day, she escaped and hid out in the woods. The prison sent her a message that there was an escape on the other side. Bella ran right to the prison and there to be safe.

Talk. A few years ago, we decided to get into talking about it. We began by talking about the new puppy. We went through a lot of thoughts, but the answer didn't come. After many more conversations, he was still not answering any questions. I've never been so frustrated in my life.
bag. The man's wife was going out of town. He brought a new bag with him. It contained everything his wife needed. They went shopping. They left and went home.

Starbucks Wi-Fi. I decided to make a Starbucks Wi-Fi. I used a few old phones I had to use for calls. I made a new phone from scratch and had no problems. My sister in law was able to use her new phone. We were able to use it the whole night!

Doll Show. Molly was excited for her first day of kindergarten. She had a crush on her friend's little sister. She started talking to her mom, who agreed to go with her. She walked up to the stage and was met by her parents. Molly was the star of the big show.

Personal Dignity. Samantha had been practicing yoga for years. She really wanted to go to the gym this weekend. She started yoga for the first time this morning. At first she was nervous and didn't want to do it. Eventually she relaxed and started practicing.

Boredom Sets In. Natalie got home from school and found herself waiting for her father. She was bored. So, she decided to go to the movies instead. After watching them, she was bored and she went to bed. Her father returned from his car in an hour and he gave her candy.

Push on the Swings. Lucy had been practicing her push ups for hours. All the sudden her teacher said she would be pushed on the swings. She was so shocked that she went over her expectations. She stood up and went out into the yard, but was pushed back. It turned out that it was just a bad ankle.

Fixing my car. I needed a new car for a job I wanted. My car was always in great shape and I loved it. It was also very cheap. I finally found a car I liked that cost half the cost. The cost of the car was much less than the car I wanted and I still loved it.

Yancy. Yancy is the daughter of an immigrant family. She is now a full-time student, and wants to make it in this life. At first, she doesn't want to work because it's too hard. But after several months of hard work, she does!Soon, she is able to live with her family on her own.

Broken mug. I had just gotten home from work. I was trying to drink a cup of coffee. I put in my mug. The mug broke and spilled coffee all over my clothes. I cleaned out my kitchen and had to buy a new mug.
Doing laundry. Kia was going out to her room. She wanted to wash her clothes. Kia did not want to dirty the floor. She took out her laundry bag. Kia was able to get everything done quickly.

Car wash. Amy was washing her car when she got a phone call from her father. His car was running a hundred miles over the speed limit. She had to pull over to change his car because she was late. She went inside and changed the windows and the oil. Her dad was angry because the car he had broken up was too expensive.
Henry Bear's Park. Henry went hiking at the park and took a look. He saw a bear cub there. Henry chased the bear. The bear got scared and ran. Henry was glad he saw the bear.

Chloe gets a haircut. Chloe had a terrible haircut. The stylist told her it wasn't her fault. Chloe was upset she had to go to work. She did not want to leave her hair out. She returned the next day with a perfect haircut.

The Movies. Lucy and Mary were watching a movie together. The movie was set in the 80's. Mary decided she wanted to be part of the story. She bought a wig and makeup to play a young adult. She was so excited to be an adult in a movie!

So What's With Coffee Anyway?. I went to the local coffee shop to get coffee. I paid for my coffee in a cart. I started to pour it into my bag. Unfortunately my coffee didn't stay fresh long. When I had to get it back I threw it out.
Faded Jeans. Jasmine's family was traveling. They stopped in Boston. They went to a boutique. It had faded jeans. They decided to return home.

The Ice Cream. It was a hot summer day and Kim was getting ready to go outside. She pulled the car into the driveway and began driving. Her car was very cold. She sat down on the stoop and watched the sunset. Kim was so happy to have a new hot summer day.
Nap Mistake. Nina decided to go to the park. She bought a ticket for five dollars. She went in the park to look for a bear. Nina did not see any bears at all. Her friends also went to the park.

Piano. It was the middle of winter and Bill was feeling lonely. The only other piano player was his mother and her boyfriend. Bill wanted to play the piano and practice his skills. Bill practiced every night after work to improve his piano skills. Bill had his first ever piano concert in December of 1992!

Lucky Penny. Tom always had a lot of penny in his pocket. He got his penny and got a big scratch. His parents told him it was lucky that penny was in his pocket. Tom said he would make it himself one day. Tom got the penny and made his mother proud.
The Speakers. It was Christmas morning. My son's girlfriend needed to go to the dentist. She was allergic to loud music. She had a really long drive. She left before it started to get dark.

The Garden. Jody liked to garden. She got some herbs and flowers from the garden store. Jody went to the park to go for a walk. She took a stroll for about an hour. Jody enjoyed the peacefulness of the park and was glad to have her garden.

The Friend Fight. Lucy was having trouble finding a friend to fight at her house. She decided to talk to her older sister. They both had issues they both needed to overcome. It was too much to handle so she ended up leaving. Luckily her older sister was just fine.
Sleepy Cat. My cat is very quiet. We have been out all day. I have heard him whining for some time now. I went outside to check on him. My cat was sitting on my porch all day.

bottles. I wanted to save money, and bought a few bottles to throw in the recycling bin. I drove around the neighborhood to check the recycle bins. I then realized that there were no containers. I drove home to fill the bottles with water and leave. When I went to fill them, the bottles were full of water.

Bananas. Mara was a vegetarian. She went to the grocery store to buy a banana. However, her banana didn't come out right. Mara went home and threw away all the bananas. She was disappointed in herself.

Mother's Day Cruise. Sarah went on the ocean for Mother's Day cruise. Sarah was looking forward to having the family together. As soon as Sarah got into her cabin, she fell in love. Sarah couldn't believe her eyes. Sarah couldn't wait to have her family on the ship again.

Regrets. Beth was working out one day and ended up falling down a flight of stairs. She was hurt and had to go to the hospital. She kept getting up after a few days. She realized she had to take a break and did not like going to work. When she went back she felt better and resumed her workout.

Tight Shoes. When I was a kid, I wore tight shoes. I wanted to be able to run a couple miles in them. I also wanted to be able to run them when I fell. At the time, I was at the gym and my shoes were worn. I had to get new ones made and I had to wear them less.

Christmas time. Rena was excited for Christmas morning. She had a bunch of presents for her mom. She even got a big sweater for her. She opened them all and opened them all again. Rena was so happy to have her presents on Christmas morning.

Beads, Beads, Everywhere. Beth's family was out on a picnic. Beth thought they needed some beads to make quilts. She put all her beads on her blanket. They went to the mall to buy the supplies. After they were done she put them in the quilt.

Pizza. Marge was a vegetarian and wanted pizza. She searched in the store for all kinds of delicious pies. She looked online and tried several different pizza types. Finally she found one that she liked and bought it. Her family loved the pizza she made.

Good Spot. Molly needed to get home to her new house. The house was very dirty. She was going to have to clean it every day. She made an appointment with a professional to do it. After that she was very satisfied with the job she had done.
Cartoons. It was his first day as a teacher. He was very excited. Suddenly he ran into a boy in a cart. They laughed and the boy started to laugh back. Then he threw the cart at Ted and it exploded!

My New Puppy. My sister-in-law is a retired nurse. She is retired from being a nurse. She bought a puppy last week. She brought it home for me to pick up. I took the puppy home and adopted it for myself.

Tennis. Tim decided to try out for the tennis team. He had a great game against his friend who was also in the team. He was playing with a bunch of other guys, but it wasn't competitive. It ended up being a great night, as Tim did well. He felt great about being the best player in the team.

Movie. Amy was looking through the movies section. Suddenly, she noticed a movie she really liked. She decided to watch the movie. When the movie was done, Amy fell asleep. Amy missed out on all of her favorite movies.
Grumpy. I got a new job a few months ago. I have a hard time being polite to coworkers. I recently got a new boss at my job. His personality bothered me. I now make sure to be polite.

Age Difference. Anna's dad passed away. Anna was upset that she had to grow up. The two of them were too old for each other. Then she got a job as a substitute teacher. Anna found out she had never been married before.
What to do. There was a girl who was shy and didn't talk. She was playing with some friends. She made a comment about being quiet. Her friend asked her what to say. She got scared and ran away.
Summer Job. Allie's brother needed a summer job. He hadn't saved a lot of money. Her parents did not have any. Allie did what she could and saved. She got a summer job and saved.

Mints. Mint was a popular drink in my hometown. It was very cheap and easy to get. The one problem was it was hard to find. One day I was at a grocery store and came across it. My friend decided to buy one for me for one dollar.

Bad ice cream. Katherine was eating ice cream at a fancy restaurant. She thought it was great, but it was too sweet. Suddenly, her ice cream was ruined!She had to pay the bill. She was so disappointed with the service!
Riding a Bike Drunk. Lily was riding her bike. She was very drunk. One of the neighbors got on the bike. He was very drunk as well. The neighbors started getting into fights.

Kris' Kids' Christmas List. Kris noticed his kids were missing Christmas presents and couldn't afford anything. He researched the Christmas situation. He decided to start a list of Christmas needs and make an allowance. Kris was able to buy all the toys he really wanted for Christmas. He had a great Christmas without missing any presents.

Family Picture. When I was in high school I was introduced to some of my friends. My friend, Jane was about to move away. We went to Jane's house to hang out. Jane's parents told her that they'd have to look after her. She was happy that she'd gotten a new friend!

Mop. My friend had bought a mop last week. He wanted to clean his floors. He bought two lawn mowers and one trash can. He left it overnight and got it out to mow his grass. The next day his floor was dirty.

Dairy Diary. Sally started a diary about her day. Her diary was full of things to do. Her diary took up a lot of her day. She couldn't read it due to a stroke. Sally's diary was no longer an important part of her life.
Rain. Lily went outside to play. She was playing tennis. Suddenly, a large rainstorm began. The wind made Lily's racquet fly away. Lily had to use a broom to get it to come back.

The free seasonings. It was the final day of the summer. It was time for the students to be off the farm. The students went to the local grocery store to pick up some of the seasonings. After a while the stores were full of hot dogs and pizza. By dinner time everyone was hungry and ready to go.

The Circus. Ethan had never been to a circus before. He had an idea he wanted to get behind the scenes at. He invited a friend over and she agreed. The friends had a great time at the circus. Ethan was happy to be there for the first time!

The Trampoline. Mary had a large backyard. She had a trampoline that was great for people to go on. She would run down the path and jump into the water. One day, she fell and hurt herself. She had to get surgery and had to get a cast on her ankle.

Larry's car smokes. Larry is driving along the highway. He sees a gas station. He goes inside and fills up his car. While he's filling, he sees his car start smoking. Larry had to pull over and pay for the gas.

Sunk. Tom was playing basketball with his friends. They started to hit each other around the hoop. One of the players lost control of the ball and fell. He scraped his knee and the ball hit the pool. Tom was upset and went home to fix his knee.

Ebay Scam. Cory was going to an auction with his girlfriend. The auction was taking place. Cory accidentally bought a fake camera. It was taken out of the auction, and sold on eBay for hundreds of dollars. Cory never got to see his girlfriend again.

The Drag Race. Nancy was excited to enter her first drag race at her local drag show. She entered the competition and was shocked when she won!Her name was in the running for first prize. Her competitors lined up to do a three minute routine. In the end, Nancy won first place in the championship.

Car Wash. Lucy and Sally were excited when they were finally married. They decided to go to a car wash. At the car wash, Lucy was upset about the wash. She started to cry and yelled at Sally. Lucy ended up throwing up on Sally.

The blanket over the head. I had a big birthday party. I had blankets all over the house. When I woke up I couldn't find them all. I decided to hide them in the closet. They are always there when I am tired.
The Heavy Pizza. The man ordered his pizza. It came to him. He looked at it. He was very hungry. He ordered pizza again.
