The Son. I had a son who was a great big brother. He was born with multiple conditions. He was always crying when he felt ill. One day, he woke up with an open sore. He had to have surgery for three months.

Seth gets a girl. Seth had been feeling depressed in his life. He was very alone, and didn't know anybody. One night he decided to call his friends and see if they wanted to go out. All of his friends wanted to hang out with him, so Seth took a long, lonely road. Now he has a nice girlfriend, and Seth feels less alone!

The Nest. Abe had a lot of eggs in his nest. Every morning he would search for one more egg to lay. He went outside and started digging in his backyard. After digging for hours, he found the perfect one. It had been under the nest all morning.
Zoned Out. Kelly was trying to take a nap. She kept hearing her phone ringing. It sounded like it was a neighbor calling. She didn't know what to do. She had to get up and turn it off.

A Cat for Mom. Lily was pregnant and needed a cat. Lily's mother didn't want one and was very upset. She begged her mother to give Lily one. Lily's mother told her no. Lily cried when she saw her mother crying.

Basement. John was a retired police officer. He worked on the local police department. John lived in a basement. He was able to see everything from inside. He was able to see how people got home safely.

Try Hard. Tom was a very bad student. His grades were bad and he had to go to his last school. After two months, he had lost his job. He decided to give up and become a cook. His parents said he was too lazy to work because of his grades.

story. My friend sent me a link to an interview for the school newspaper. I was interested in the newspaper because I had never done a story before. I decided to go to the interview, but I was afraid I wouldn't like it. I was able to do a good job. My friend told me that the paper was a very prestigious paper.
Mini golfing. My nephew's friends went to a mini golf tournament. My nephew's friends were very good. We all went on a tour. We went to different places. We played for hours.

The Mountain Lion. The neighbors went to the park with a puppy for the weekend. They didn't notice any animal outside the gate. Suddenly the puppy's owner tripped the gate. The puppy ran over a large rock and the gate fell. The neighbor took the dog home.

Lunch box. Molly was in her kitchen cooking dinner. She realized there was a food box on the counter. She was horrified. She looked under it but nothing was there. Molly opened the box and found nothing.

A life worth living. John was the first one to graduate college. He saved his money and took the first job he could find. At first he was happy. Then he started to get into debt. John had to quit his first job and live with the debt.

Leaving everything behind. Kelli and her boyfriend went for a hike in the woods. They walked for a few hours and looked at the scenery. After a while they stopped and started looking for something. They didn't find anything they wanted to share. Kelli felt sad as she knew she had to leave everything behind.

Low Bank Account. My bank account started to get low. I started to lose money every month. I had overdrafts on all of my purchases. My bank was having difficulty funding all of my purchases. I decided to close my account for good.

Michelle's Dream. Michelle was always scared of going to work on Fridays. Today was her dream day!Michelle could go to work today and she couldn't wait. Michelle's co worker came to her house to say that she did an excellent job. Michelle had a great day at work and she was glad she was having fun.

The house volunteer. Allie loved being a house volunteer. She volunteered in a local soup kitchen. One day, the soup kitchen received a phone call. It was the school's janitor who needed help cleaning the school. Allie and her colleagues helped the school clean the school, and she was happy.

Sue Buys A Chair. Sue is an elementary school teacher. She has recently learned that she is starting a new job. Sue decides to hire a new chair for her classroom. Sue begins to decorate the new chair with stickers. Sue feels that her classroom is now decorated much better.

plastic mold. Susie had recently been forced to clean up her basement. She was worried about putting in plastic mold. She decided to look up the mold. She found that it was plastic. She was very happy to have found it.

Tight Fight. Tom was drinking at a bar with friends. He was talking to a friend who was a big fight fan. Tom began to talk about how he and his friend had never really fought before. His friend said that if they really wanted to fight he would. Tom was really upset and stormed off, his friends cheering him on.

Leftovers. Molly made some chicken noodle soup. She put it in a large bowl and then started to eat it. At the last moment she remembered to put some leftovers in her crockpot. She added them and turned the crockpot on. She put all the ingredients in and cooked all the ingredients for her soup.
Internet. The internet was really slow and I needed to use it. So, I ordered a router. It was the best decision I made. I installed it right away. It was much faster than it used to be.

Final Exam. The teacher called me to her class. I was nervous because I had not studied for the final exam. When I got to the class I started. The teacher made me watch the final exam. After the exam, I felt really nervous.
Chemical. There was a chemical spill on the road. My car was getting oil in it. It spilled my new tires. I called the police. They sent someone to help me get my car fixed.

Keeping Out Cold Drafts. There was a storm coming our way. I decided to go outside to cool off. I ran inside to see the weather reports. The weather forecast said there was a very bad storm. The storm did make an appearance.

The pain. Gina had a major pain in her stomach. She looked in the mirror to see if she had any aches. She felt that her stomach was hurting too. She went to the doctor and he gave her medication. Gina was able to feel better after that.

Swimsuit. Molly went to the beach with her friends. They wanted to go swimming. They bought some swimsuits. Molly didn't want them on because she thought they were boring. Molly's friends weren't embarrassed when they saw their silly costumes.

Jim Waches His Brother Play Basketball. Jim is at home watching the baseball team practice. He decides to play with his brother. His brother hits a shot that goes into the basket. Jim misses the shot. His brother now owns the ball and is playing basketball.
Bad Cramps. Kate was at the mall. Suddenly she felt a pain. It wasn't painful at all. She thought it was a cold. She took the pain away with some medicine.

Walking Barefooted. Brianna was walking barefoot on her way home from school. She saw a small boy running toward her and stopped. She told him that she liked his shoes and asked him for his name. He told her he was named Bill, and asked her to help him get them. After some teasing, he ended up getting the shoes and gave them to her.
Sara's Cake. Sara is making her cake for the school party. She starts by boiling the eggs. She then add in the cream and sugar. Finally, she decorates the cake. Sara's cake is delicious!
Bad but Good Sushi. Susie was a college student. She decided to go to a sushi restaurant. She ordered a small fish. The fish was bad and tasted gross. She decided to order a new sushi instead.

Martha's Strict Parents. Martha had a bad childhood. She had many siblings in her class. One of her sisters was in the principal's office. Martha's sister did not want to take a new name. Martha's parents kept her a name of their own.

Thrift Store Rookie. I took a break from class at work. I walked down the stairs into the store. I was in the checkout line with one of my shoes. A woman saw me and smiled. I realized I was in the store.

Carousel Barker. Carl took his son to a carnival. He saw a carousel, and he was excited. Carl told his son to sit in the carousel. He got his son up on the carousel. They had a great time and laughed all night.

Only Blue Pens. A new hobby started to get popular for me. I had a lot of blue pens. I was trying to find a hobby that would not make me break out. I looked everywhere but not finding anything. I decided to just stick to black and white and no matter what.

Stuck on top. Tom and his friend Joe were on a camping trip. They had their gear and a few food. Joe decided to climb a tree and then went to the top. When he opened the trunk, he got stuck. He couldn't climb out, so he was stuck there.

Mike Soiled His Diaper. Mike was taking a nap. Suddenly, Mike's diaper started to fall out. Mike noticed that his pants were soaked. Mike washed his pants with soap and water. Mike's diaper was not soaked anymore.

Rave. When I was in college, I was on a band with some friends. We had a song I really liked, and it made the record. The producer asked if I'd put it out on a new label. I thought it would be great and decided to put it out on my own label. It's been a successful record, and I hope to release it soon.

The Dog Paw. Lucy was outside playing in the yard. Suddenly her dog ran into her. Lucy went inside to find her cat. The dog was pawing her dog with his mouth wide open. Lucy had to take her cat inside to a vet.

Grill. My mother was cooking dinner. She had some leftover chicken that she couldn't use. I made some noodles for her to eat. I asked her if I could use the leftover chicken. I was allowed to use the chicken.

Busted. It was Halloween and it was time for the kids to dress up. Lizzy's mom wanted her to dress up for the parade. Lizzy didn't want to be alone at the parade and made a run. She jumped into a large box and was about to jump off. Lizzy was afraid her mom would catch her but when she landed she was fine.

Larry Tries Basketball. Larry is a great basketball player. Larry decides that he wants to try out for the basketball team. Larry takes a very hard road test. Larry meets with the coach to find out the answers. Larry is selected as the first ever player on the basketball team.

Unsupportive. Tim was a great football player. He was very competitive and very competitive. He had a hard life with a lot of family and friends. Tim was constantly getting hurt and being ignored. Eventually Tim was finally able to quit his football playing.

Dog bite. I was driving home from work one morning. All of a sudden, my car started shaking. All of a sudden, the front door burst open. My dog jumped out, bit me right in the face!I had to get it fixed and called the animal control.
Cookies. I was walking in the street. My dad walked with me. He asked what was in my bag. I said that my cookies. He said he forgot to put them in before he left.

Needing new glasses. Anna needed new glasses. She had worn them for years. Today she had to wear them. They were very big, so she could barely see them. She ended up having to wear them with her purse.

Cats. Dylan was having a difficult time finding a cat. He took his cat to the shelter and had a look. Dylan found a black and white cat in a cardboard box. Dylan picked up the cat and brought it home. When he showed the cat his wife gasped with delight.
Power Outage. Caleb was at work. All of his electricity went out. Caleb was really worried. He called his wife to see if she was ok. Caleb's wife came home and Caleb was relieved.

Party love. I wanted to give my brother his first birthday present. I decided to go out to the park. We walked down the path by the creek. My brother was excited because I brought a stuffed giraffe to his party. I also played games and listened to music to entertain him.

The Missing Tooth. Mary was having a rough day. She went to the dentist for a check up. When she got to the dentist, she couldn't find her tooth. She went and asked everyone for help. The dentist took some x-rays of her tooth and found it.

Not Done. I tried to find a good restaurant and a good table for dinner. I was really nervous because I had never been to a Chinese restaurant. I really liked the place where I ordered my meal. After I ordered my food, I left as quickly as possible. When I went back home I realized I got the wrong place.

The Lock. It was a rainy night. Joe's car was running low on gas. He pulled over to the side of the road to make sure he had enough gas. He noticed an old truck on the side of the road. He pulled over and found out it was a stolen truck.

Good report card. Liza got an A on her report card. All her friends wanted to give her an A. Liza went into the kitchen and asked her friend if she had a problem. Her friend told her she had a good report card. Liza felt much better that she got an A.

New froyo place. Jill was in the city planning to have a wedding in a new place. She wanted to have a large reception. She researched the city online. She found a great place in the froyo district. The reception was beautiful!

The First Job. Tia went to an interview for a job. After the interview, she went to pick up her papers. When she got home, her mom had just called her. She asked Tia where she was going. Tia decided to pick up her brother and her friends to go see the movie.
Positive Attitude. Tom had a hard job. His manager had made him into a positive person. Tom didn't like his job. Tom became depressed about it. Tom never worked again.

School. Mandy was at school one day. All the sudden a girl came up to her and began talking to her. She started to compliment her on how much she improved. Mandy's friend was not impressed by this and began to mock her. She was caught by surprise when Mandy's friend stopped talking to her.

Fussy Cat. Jill was trying to watch TV. A cat walked past her house. The cat did not pay attention and knocked over her coffee table. She had to get another cup. Jill could not tell the cat from the coffee table.

The autobiography. John had always wanted to write a autobiography. When John was in college he got really good at reading stories. He got so good that his professors asked him to write one. John went to school, wrote a book, and was very happy with it. Now he's writing a book of short stories for his college friends.
Alex. Alex had a small apartment. She didn't own her own bathroom. She had to walk everywhere. One day she got a job as a janitor. Alex had so much fun that she ended up owning her own bathroom.
Wounded Bird. I found my wife shot. She was shot in the leg. We brought her in for treatment. We found a bullet hole in her leg. We are planning a trip to the store to buy a new one.

Milk Trap. Derek went to the store and bought a cart of milk. While buying milk, he accidentally put the cart in the freezer. The milk melted the next day and turned the freezer black. The milk spilled all over Derek's shoes. Derek went to the store to get the milk back.

Painted Nails. A woman was trying to do something special for her sister. She bought nails and began to paint them. The nail art looked good, but the paint was starting to peel. The woman ran outside and asked her sister for help. Her sister used a pumice stone and the nail art got very faded.

Small Fire. Tom went to the garage to change some air conditioners. While he was changing the pipes they were suddenly filled with smoke. He could not figure out why, but it started getting worse. Luckily they had an emergency response team on site. They put out the fire and then waited to find out who was responsible.

Career Pains. Randy had always wanted to go into a modeling agency. He would always work hard, and make sure he made the most money. However, he was very nervous about his career prospects. One day while driving home from work, he hit another car. Randy's dream had been crushed.

Dahlia. Dahlia loved to dress up as a princess. She wanted to get a doll of herself to go with her Christmas gift. Dahlia thought of how she would make a doll of herself. When she finally got the doll, Dahlia was so happy. She bought it, put it in the living room, and named it Kiki.

Raining at pick up. Kate was out shopping. The weather was going to be rainy this morning. But Kate didn't realize it was raining all day. The kids were starting to get impatient. Kate decided to pay her kids and go get ice cream.
Grease Burn. Tori's daughter was working. It was an overnight shift and she was very tired. Tori tried to wake her up. She couldn't find her daughter. She called a supervisor and the supervisor came.

Irrigation. Bill was trying to pay his rent. He had no money for his water bill. He decided to get a generator to make his electricity last longer. Bill's electricity started making electricity when he got it. Bill was able to pay his water bill in less than a month.
Pouch. Jill didn't know how to use her phone. She had a big pack of them. So she decided to use her laptop. But her phone was broken!She couldn't even use her laptop for about an hour.

Cartoon. I got to play a game called Cartoons with my friends. The game was called Rollercoaster. The game was a rollercoaster with a large coaster. We had to ride the rollercoaster together. I really enjoyed the game.

Airplane Food. John woke up at six in the morning to go to work. It was a cold day so he decided to cook breakfast. After he got to work he took the air conditioner out. While his boss sat watching the news he got up to take a shower. After he finished the shower he took off his clothes.

The Castle. It was a beautiful day. The kids wanted to play at the castle. The kids had fun playing in the castle. They played till their hearts were full. The kids went home and decided to go play in the woods.

Refreshing Yellow #3 Batch B. The crew needed a new batch of green beans. They decided to mix it up. They bought yellow beans from the grocery store. The beans were much better tasting than their old batch. The crew was very happy with their new batch.

The Museum. Natalie was on a trip to the zoo with her family. She had no idea how to get to the museum entrance. Her parents took her to the zoo's computer center to find the correct exit. Upon finding her way out, she quickly realized she had been lost. The next day, she found her parents' house completely covered in dust.
Tyler breaks his neck. Tyler was skiing in the mountains. He fell in a crevasse. A rock got stuck in his throat. Tyler had to go to the hospital. Tyler's neck was broken and he was very scared.

Bill Dates Dumb Girls. Bill has been dating a girl that is very stupid. The two decided to have an argument over who is smarter. Bill argued with his date over who was smarter. Eventually, Bill ended up giving up trying to talk to her. Bill decided to be friends with the dumb girl instead.

Late Notice. I was waiting for a cab by a parking lot for two hours. As the car behind me was delayed, I walked up to the car next to me. The car behind me was late to the curb. I asked for the person behind me to turn around. The person behind me turned around and left the lot.

Tammy's Computer Skills. Tammy was having trouble at work. She was unable to do any work due to her computer issues. Tammy decided to get a new computer. She paid for it at the store. Now Tammy is able to do her work easier.

Sleep. Gina has been trying to get the best sleep. She has gone to sleep every night. This morning, she felt very tired. She asked the nurses if she should go to sleep. They said she should stay up and finish the work.

Lance. Lance has an anxiety attack that is not going away. He is so scared of the person who owns the house. One day a burglar enters his house. Lance runs away from the house. He is scared to leave the house.

Grocery List. Amy was walking in the grocery store. She needed to buy some fresh produce for the next week. Amy found a few ingredients on the shelf. She bought the ingredients and went home to make the list. Amy's grocery list was so full she forgot to buy any meat.

Mailbox Surprise. Liza wanted a new mailbox for her car. She went online to check out what they were going to offer. Then she looked up the price. To her surprise, it was half the price she thought. She took the money and filled out the rest of the paperwork.
Basketball Foul. A few years ago, I was playing basketball. I was fouled by a teammate. He got the ball and put it back in my hands. He ran towards the basket. I made a hard foul.

Nothing To Talk About. Gina was at her friend's house. She had been drinking so much that she had gotten very drunk. Suddenly she found herself in a huge mess. She was still too drunk to go home. Gina ran out the front door yelling that no one was home.

Worst Fear 2. Gina had always thought she had the worst fear. But then her twin brother had a big crush on her. Gina's mom told her she was a terrible person. But then her brother turned up at school with the boy she loved. She could tell she was scared when he pulled down her skirt to see her.

The Funeral. Jenny's boyfriend had just passed away. Jenny cried for hours and loved him. She asked her friends to lay flowers outside of her boyfriend's house. Some people brought them flowers, while others brought balloons. Jenny was very happy, and wanted to see him again soon.

A girl who loves to Dance. I met a very beautiful girl. I have never met anyone who loves dancing so much. One day I asked her on a date. We spent several days dancing. She told me that she had a crush on me.

Sprinkles. Kate was at a party. Her friends were taking her places. Suddenly, a girl decided to give her a sprout. Kate's friends were thrilled. She decided to use them as her cookies for future parties.

Iron Cross. Mia's dad was in the army. One day his friends invited her to the park. Mia didn't know about the iron cross. She was terrified of the experience. But as she was told, she did the right thing and did well.

Rafting. Dan decided to try his hand at riding a rough wooden stiletto. He learned how to ride by watching youtube videos. Dan strapped on his stiletto and strapped his harness to his back. Dan jumped off his horse and down a steep hill. Dan fell off the steep hill and rolled down a hill.

Holey jeans. Jenny wanted a nice new pair of jeans. So she bought one of them. Unfortunately, she noticed that they were too tight. She decided to try the jeans on for herself. When she got home she was disappointed.

The Watch Shop. Mary was walking along the sidewalk and found a good-sized watch shop. Mary approached the counter to buy a watch for $60. Mary went inside to pay the cashier. The cashier told Mary it was too expensive, so she left. Mary walked home, but the watch she bought was no longer hers.

Dry Lawn. I was watering my grass in my backyard. I tried to keep a clean yard but was having trouble. I didn't realize how much more I had to spend. I then noticed my lawn was being washed out. I ended up going to the store to buy more grass.
New Dress. Gina was going on a new fashion shoot. She had bought a new red dress. It was a bright red. Everyone was looking at her as she walked. She smiled as she walked and smiled back.

A Hot Day. When I was a teenager, my parents would take me to the park. One day I was on the way home from school. My mother called me and told me to get on the roller coaster. I couldn't believe how fast the ride was. We sat on the roller coaster for an hour until we got home.

Pants. A man in the streets was talking to his wife. The woman wanted to put on pants. She got in her car and headed to the store. Her husband bought a pack of pantyhose. She left her pants in her car and went home.

Stay at Home Mom. My mom took me to the movies. I saw something I really liked called Stay at Home Mom. It was a romantic comedy about a mother who is depressed. I was really sad to be at the movie. I stayed home because I didn't want to be alone.

The Security Camera. James was a security guard at a restaurant. He was trying to do his job, when he noticed something strange. It was an old surveillance camera that had been turned on. It showed people smoking a cigarette in the restaurant. James was frustrated, but it seemed like there would be no arrests.
Pool Day. Molly was going to go to the pool. Her friends went with her. Molly was very excited. They went out and had a great time. Molly decided she would go again next summer.
The test fail. Tom was going to take a science test. It was a math test. He forgot his pencil and needed help. Luckily, he had a tutor. Tom was able to pass the test easily.

Talk Show. Bill and Sue met in high school, but Bill is not the same person. Bill has a problem when he goes to meetings with Sue. His friend Bob tells Bill about Bob's success as a comedian. Bob asked Bill if he would like to become a comedian. Bill and Sue decided to meet up to discuss this.
Chess. Susie loves to play chess. She asked her mom for some help playing. Her mom suggested a local chess tournament. Susie was nervous but determined to win. She played well and won the tournament.

Goo Rue Food. Sam had some leftover cow's milk. She mixed it with some sugar. Then she put the milk in the blender and blended. Finally, she tasted it and realized she was lactose intolerant. She felt bad for wasting the milk.

Doing the Exact Opposite. My wife and I are having a very messy divorce. She wants me to do everything in her house exactly as she did. I tried to disagree with her. She was so upset at me. The divorce is now in the hands of a court.
Weight loss. Kira wanted to lose weight. Her friends were always talking about how big they were. But Kira was always tired and worn out. Finally, she decided to go for a hike. Kira felt great.
Trip. I love going to the zoo. I can't wait to see a big cat. I went for a walk around one of the exhibits. I fell in love with a black lab named Rocky. Now, I will go to the zoo alone again.

Swimming. Timothy wanted to start swimming lessons. He went to the local swimming pool to learn. After practicing swimming there for a while he got to work. When the class ended he was proud of himself. His new swimming style was amazing.

Pregnant. Anna had been going to her doctor for a pregnancy test for months. Her doctor gave her a pregnancy test and said she was pregnant. She rushed to the hospital and the doctor was ready to begin the procedure. The doctor did a quick exam of Anna's abdomen and called the shots. They started the procedure and Anna was the mother of the new baby.

Summer Reading. I had a big summer reading assignment for my class. The assignment was called reading summer. I read a whole book in the summer. My friends said the book was great. It was the best summer reading assignment they had ever done.
Job. I got a new job today. I am currently working at an aquarium. I can not wait to start. I have worked hard all week. Now, I am looking forward to taking my first day.

Green Grass. My sister-in-law lives in Alabama. She recently moved to California. She has a very large lawn that she has always had. She has a lot of weeds in her yard. She had a large lawn in Alabama, but moved to California.

The Tattoo. Allison wanted a new tattoo. She decided to get a red heart on her arm. Allison went to the tattoo parlor. She was very excited to get her new tattoo. Allison loved the red heart tattoo on her arm.

A Bounty of Soda. Karen was a teenager with nothing to do but drink soda every day. She'd get her allowance and take a long walk around town. She would also take a gallon of soda every night. One morning, though, she tripped and fell on her face. She had to run to the store to get a refill from the machine.

I'm a Bad Goalie. The goalie took the puck from his backhand and shot it into the goalie's net. The goalie went down and fell on his stomach. The goalie called a timeout to restart the game. The goalie stood up and started moving his head forward. The goalie finally fell back down to continue his shot.
Suspension. Tom wanted to go to the mall. He couldn't figure out what to do. He had to call up a friend. His friend said he could do a bunch of free stuff. Tom loved that free stuff and went.

Cops. Susie and her friends went to the school dance. They dressed in their school uniforms. They sang a song about cops. They danced to the music for about twenty minutes. The school was closed for the day.

Ramen. My friend's mother is very old and has cancer. She needs her chemotherapy in the winter. I told her about Ramen Ramen. She was skeptical, and said she wanted to try it. So I made her a bowl and told her she should try it.

Loose Cage. I was looking for something to replace the loose cage that I got. I found a cage that fit my new tv and a book. I took the book and the tv and got it home. I placed the tv in the cage and tried to watch my show. It was too loose and I had to take it to the store to fix it.

Bike Race. Kelly and Mark were two young people who loved to race. One day they decided to ride together on a bike race. They started out at a light and raced up the hill. When it was their turn to go, they kept going. To their surprise they had won the race!

The New Drink. Cindy and her friends were out on a Friday night. Cindy decided to go to the bar to find something to drink. Cindy went to the bar to see the drinks. Her friends started dancing to different songs. Cindy decided to leave the bar to go to the dance club instead.
Hunter. I walked across the street to go to the supermarket. I went into the store to look at some items. I found a tarantula. I gave it a good scrub. It became my favorite pet.
Angel at Work. Angel was doing her job. She was at work. Suddenly, her boss asked her for a bathroom break. Angel couldn't take the stress. She left the office.

The Game. Manny was watching the baseball game. He really liked the way his team scored the runs. Manny decided to bet a hundred dollars. The next inning, the teams traded bases. Manny won $100 dollars.

Problem Solver. Jim was very good at solving problems. His friend asked him to play a game he loved. Jim asked his friend to put the ball into a basket. He started to give up but decided to play again. Jim was able to solve his friend's problem the next time.

Sara's New Friend. Sara was a lonely woman who had never had a friend. She was going through a tough time. She went to her friend's house to meet him. She invited him and they all went out to eat. Sara felt a great sense of community and happiness in her new home.

Wedding Day. Cathy's friend invited her to her wedding. They wanted to have it in a new, romantic location. Cathy was hesitant at first. She wanted to go to a church wedding. But eventually Cathy fell in love with it and agreed to go.

Car Wash. Sammy was in the shower and heard an alarm clock go off. She was out of shampoo and needed to use it. But she couldn't find her towel. Sammy went into the car wash and grabbed a towel. She quickly changed into her bathrobe and finished her shower.

First Day of School. Tom was a freshman in high school. He had never been to school before. He thought he would get an A on his first day. He had a lot of fun but still didn't win. After all that, he ended up getting in trouble.

Wish. Ivan had wanted to take his dog to the zoo. He bought his dog a wish box. One day Ivan wished that his dog would go swimming. His dog went swimming. Afterwards Ivan wished that he could go swimming as well.

Sleepover. Yesterday I took my friends and family to sleepover. We had a lot of fun. Everyone was very friendly and laid back. We had tons of free pizza and drinks. We got home and started our weekend.
Pilates. Ben was a gymnast. Ben was competing at the Olympics. Ben was preparing for his competition. Ben trained for the competition. Ben got very close to winning his competition.
The Canal. Maddie was in college. She was in love with the ocean. She really wanted to go on a cruise. They asked her on one. She decided not to.
Test. Tom was in a test. He had to take an exam. The teacher had given him his answers. Tom failed the test. He got a C.
Shut Down. Kelly went to the bar. She had a few drinks. She had a few too many. The bar closed. Kelly was kicked out.
Need A Ride. Amy was riding her bike down the street. It was a bright sunny day. All of a sudden Amy got on a bike and fell. She almost hit a car. Luckily she was able to get her bike fixed.

The Girl Scout. Caleb was an 11 year old boy scout. He was on a camping trip. They were all having a good time. Suddenly they heard a noise and Caleb realized there was a bear. He ran as fast as he could out of the campsite.
Bought new sheets. I bought a new set of sheets. My mom was mad at me for using so much money. I told her I didn't need the new sheets. She bought them anyways. I hated that.

The Haircut. Jenny had been thinking about getting a haircut for weeks. She decided to go to the barber and get one. The barber was impressed with Jenny's great looks. The barber cut Jenny's hair for her. Jenny had a great haircut.

Marco's Big Goal. Marco wanted to go to the Olympics. He decided to become a track star. He trained every day for a month. He practiced his running skills everyday. On his birthday, he became the fastest man in the Olympics.

The Glass Bottle. A friend of mine's dad was a big glass bottle guy. He never liked glass at all. I thought I might like it, however. I went out and got a bottle. My dad wasn't happy with me because he said it was old.

Weird Channel. Kelly had never watched TV before. She decided to try to watch a show. She found the first episode she watched to be confusing. She went back to the beginning of the show. Kelly did not watch the show.

Trash. Bill was cleaning his apartment when he came across a huge mess. Bill decided he needed to start getting rid of the trash. Bill decided to do this by picking up the trash cans and moving them. Once the garbage cans were all gone, he began the process of turning the house around. Bill's cleaning efforts resulted in a much cleaner home!

Shiny Red. Ava had never gotten a red nail polish. She wanted to get one but she didn't have enough money. She had a friend that had a lot of money, she went to him. She got the red nail polish and loved it. She was happy that she could afford it.
One shot. The kids were in the pool. They were playing a game. They accidentally shot one other player. The other player had to go to the hospital. They were all okay.

The Abandoned Car. Abe noticed a stray car in the road. He stopped and put it under a light. Then, he called his neighbor to come help. She arrived just in time and helped Abe to move the car. Abe and his neighbor are now best friends.

Competition. Jill is the best tennis player in her school. But she's not in the school team. She's only good at tennis. Her friends think she should play more tennis. They convince Jill to join the school tennis team.

Louis and the computer. Louis liked to play video games on his laptop. Louis played many online games while on the computer. Louis was constantly having problems playing some online games. Louis told his parents about the problem with his gaming habits. Louis' parents took him to the computer shop to get new gaming devices.

High School Football. Drew got a call from his high school. The football team needed a player to replace an injured player. Drew signed with a local college. He played in the local bowl game. Drew scored a touchdown to give his team the win!

The Play's the Thing. The play was about an orphan girl who was a very good dancer. Every Friday, her parents brought her to the school play. They would give her money and supplies to help her prepare. It was a great idea for a play, and they practiced a lot. After a few weeks, she had gotten the parts she wanted!

Painted House. The family went to a big mansion to see their grandkids. The family was invited by the owners to dinner. The owner gave everyone tickets to the show. Everyone got to eat and drink champagne. The grandkids were extremely happy.
Happy Birthday. I got a birthday party yesterday. I put up a big red sign on the roof. It said I was so proud. I also had a cake. All the friends and family were invited.

Quinn and Rowen at Recess. Rowen was a senior who wanted to go to college. She asked her best friend Quinn to join her. They both went to a nearby state college. Together they were nervous and had fun. They ended up graduating with a degree.

The New Dog. Trey was always nervous when his new dog walked. He was always fearful of her and would jump on his head whenever he saw her. One day, his friends invited him on a trip. Trey decided to take the dog on the trip to the zoo. When he got home, he was so happy to finally take her!

Hot and sticky room. A group of girls were playing outside on a hot summer day. The girls decided to walk inside the building. It was really sticky and hot outside. They started to get dirty and stinky. Luckily a fire hydrant came and made it go away.
The Fly. Gina was at the zoo. There was a fly on the ground. She looked and it was white. She told the attendant not to touch the fly. The attendant walked away.
New job. Jill was tired of being a housewife. So she decided to move out. She moved into a house. She was very happy. She had a nice new job.

Rick is hurt. Rick is swimming with his father. They swim across the lake. Suddenly, they realize they have fallen and are soaked. They are rushed to the doctor. The doctor tells Rick he needs to rest.

A Friend's Thanksgiving. Sam was on his mother's Thanksgiving break. She asked Sam to cook for her. Sam decided to make a turkey instead. Sam cooked for his mother as she was busy. Sam was very thankful for his friends generosity.

Treat. Minnie and her parents went to a restaurant. She asked for a chicken dinner. When the waitress came, they realized it wasn't there. Minnie asked her mom if she could have a dessert. Minnie's mom said no and returned her food.
Olivia. Olivia wanted to get a dog. She saw a dog training class in the area. She decided to take the class. Olivia did well in the class. Olivia has now become her own dog trainer.

Apple Pie. Kara was trying to make a pie. She had a lot of apples and seeds. She chopped them and boiled them until she had them. She then used some leftover dough to shape the pie. Once it was done, she had the perfect apple pie.
Motorcycle Accident. Kelly was riding her bike on the road. All of a sudden she hit a tree. Kelly was able to break her wrist. She was rushed to the hospital. Thankfully she made it through.

Car. I was walking around my neighborhood one day. Suddenly, I heard a car pull up in front of me. A man was in the backseat, looking at me. He was talking to me. He gave me $500 and took me to his car.
First Time Shaving. Joe is excited to try shaving his legs. But he really hates to shave. Joe decides to try a face shave. He is very excited about it. But he begins to dislike it.

Registry Wit. The day of the exam came and Kelly's teacher handed out her exam sheets. She was given a few minutes to collect all of her exam material. Kelly got to work immediately. When the exam was finished she took it. Her teacher let her grade her in with her highest score.

All Work, No Play. My dog's mom made him jump into the lake today. The lake was full of bubbles and she was out of bubbles. My dog got caught in the bubble and ended up drowning. He cried out for me to take him back to the vet. Afterwards, my dog had to be put down and I had to clean up all his mess.
Too Drunk. Tim was a college student. He was drinking with friends. They decided to have a fun night. They had a lot of fun. They had to leave.

Winning. One day a big fight broke out at work. There were two different owners of the business. The owner had a huge purse and had been bragging about it. His rival offered to pay for a lawyer. The opponent refused and started the fight.

Movie Night. I was sitting at the movie theater one night. As soon as the movie began it was already over. There was a woman behind me that I tried to ignore. She started making noise and I got up and ran. When I came back she apologized profusely and left.

Bicycle Accident. I was going to a park today. A little boy started running towards me. I saw that he had a big white bicycle with no helmet. I took him home and had him checked out. He was fine, but I didn't go after him again.

The Pianist. Amy was in a small symphony concert. She was sitting next to a great pianist. She felt a spark in her shoulder. She told him how much she enjoyed being in his presence. He smiled and said he did too.

Speak To His Mom. Bella was in the bathroom changing a diaper. She heard a weird noise coming from the other room. She quickly went and turned on the light. Bella saw her mom sitting on the toilet. Bella was so excited to see her mother!

The Birthday Party. Jasmine's grandma had a big party. She had invited all of her friends over. She was having a big party. Everyone was going to get a surprise gift. All the gifts were in different colors.

A Crazy Sandwich. Cindy had a really bad cold. Her food was always a little too spicy for her tastes. She decided to go to the restaurant to get some chicken sandwiches. Her chicken was too hard and she started to vomit. Cindy decided to just never order from them again.

Pancake Time. Rita wanted a pancake but her mom was busy. She was having trouble with all the work. She went over to the store to get some frozen pancakes. Rita had a great pancake and loved it!She ended up getting a big bag for the pancakes.

The Basketball Showdown. It was finally the day for the basketball game. John and I were excited to be playing this game. The night before, we tried to prepare the best we could. We had a lot of practice in the morning. We arrived at the game at 10 AM, excited to finally start.

The Bucket. I got my first bucket at the age of 2 years old. I remember the bucket that was outside the bedroom door. When I was three, my mom bought me a new bucket. It was a gold metal with a green top. I like my new bucket, and was very thankful for it.
Floating down the river. I am in a kayak. I have been going for days. There is a big river. When I got to the water I jumped over it. I got soaked!

Alan's Eulogy. Alan was at a football game. A man was talking to his family about his son. He told the family that he was sorry for what he did. The family was upset and angry at him. The family forgave him.

Credit Card Debt. Alicia was recently hit by her credit card debt. She needed to get it paid up. She could not find the money on her credit card. She called her bank and they said she owed them a lot. The bank was very lenient with Alicia.

Trip to the beach. Derek decided to take his dog on a long hike. They went for a walk in the woods. At the end of the walk, they realized it was time to get out. Derek grabbed his dog and they set off. They arrived at the beach and set off for home.

Ralph's Dog. Ralph has a small family. One day his dog ran into his yard. Ralph jumped out of the house and rushed to the dog's. Ralph's dog ran inside and ate the dog food. Ralph was glad to go home and have his dog again.

Hiking up Hawksbill Crag. Susie went up Hawksbill Crag to take pictures. There were lots of wildlife. The trail was rocky and full of small boulders. One of her friends offered to take her. Susie went for it and made a great photo.
The Playground. Lori was playing on the playground. She tripped and fell. The playground was filled with kids. Everyone was laughing and playing. They would go back to play later that day.
Lawyer or prosecutor. Tom was always a good lawyer. He was very good at jury selection. So he decided to become a prosecutor. Tom did his job well. He ended up with his job after all!

Food Truck. I always had a fear of eating out because I'm poor. However, my girlfriend decided to do it for me. My stomach growled, but I pretended to not notice. She got a huge plate of food and we ate it all. It was the best food I have ever eaten.
First kiss. Nancy went on a date. It was to go for a swim at the beach. Nancy had always wanted to get married. The water was cold and cold. She ended up kissing him right on the lips.
Cruise. Gina had a huge crush on Charles. She finally decided to take him on a cruise to Europe. He never took her so she was happy. She enjoyed every minute of it. She couldn't wait to go back.

Baby Bottle. I was at my grandma's house when I heard a strange noise. A large bottle was breaking the window, and people were running. It looked as though someone had dumped it into a storm drain. I tried to pull the window open, but it wouldn't budge. I told my grandma how scary the sound was.

The Big Test. Tiffany had a very big test coming up. She had studied all week and was ready. She was excited for it. When she came in, she went through the test very well. Tiffany passed and was very happy.
The Dog Bowl. The man wanted to host a dog bowl. He bought everything needed to make it. He got a stool and a bowl. He put his dog in there and everyone came. He was so proud of his new dog bowl.

Peach Ice Cream. Kim was out with friends when she realized she was missing some ice cream. She went over and asked her friends to bring her ice cream. Kim went to the store to pick up some ice cream. The next morning she woke up and realized she had forgotten some ice cream!She bought some of the ice cream in the morning and drove home.

Strange massage. Jill got a massage. She liked it so much she paid for it. The therapist offered to pay for Jill to take a few days off work. Jill took her money and drove back to work. Soon she was back at work and Jill got her massage.
Four Minutes. Nancy was having a baby. All the sudden she fell pregnant. She was worried. So, Nancy started to worry when she couldn't feel a thing. She was in four minutes and her baby was born.

Horror Film. My boyfriend and I are watching a horror movie. We saw a few different types of scary movies. My boyfriend told me to keep trying to move away from my boyfriend. I couldn't move away from my boyfriend. My boyfriend said that was because I was holding back.

Old Jeans. Tiffany and the other kids were out at a park one day. Suddenly they heard some rustling behind the bushes. They jumped over the bushes to see something moving. It was a long leathery looking jeans!The kids ran into the bushes and the jeans were gone!

Eggplant. Jill's mom told her the family would be cooking for dinner tonight. She said she would give her mother an eggplant dish. Jill immediately tried the eggplant dish at home. It was delicious!The family had a wonderful dinner.
The Rescue. Allie was lost in the woods. Her parents didn't have much supplies. They decided to call for help. They pulled a truck over. Allie was rescued and brought back home.

The Divorce. Lilly was not pleased with her boyfriend's decision to break up. The two were arguing. Lilly was mad at him for not caring for her. She argued for a while. She left, and he followed her out.

Finally Alone. Susie had gone out with her friends. They were going on a date. She decided to stay for dinner. She decided she would watch the movie and go back to sleep. When she woke up the movie was playing!

Put on Your Pants. Dina was at the mall with her mom. The mall was about to close. She had her sister over for dinner. But her sister was really hot and didn't want to eat. Dina had to put on her pants to go to dinner.

The Science Experiment. Sam was an aspiring science teacher. He taught kids how to build rockets. He would do this for free if they'd give him money. This eventually attracted the attention of a local newspaper. He was featured in a local news story, and eventually got a job.

Cass. Cass was the youngest of the three sisters. Cass liked her family very much. Cass went to see her grandparents on a holiday trip. Her grandmother had been ill the last time she had been there. Cass was in good spirits and the visit was a very happy day for Cass.
Tina's Dinner. Tina was trying to plan her dinner. She wanted to have a seafood meal. But when she checked the bill, it was for $300. She was horrified. She decided to have a pasta dinner instead.
Car. Amy was riding in her car. There was a small child on the road next to her. Amy heard a thud. The child rolled onto her side. Amy's car hit the child in the head.

The Irritating Neighbor. Tom was outside in his yard and heard a noise coming from the house. He looked and saw two boys playing on the lawn. When he tried to confront them, they ran away. Tom took them to the store to buy some food. Tom's neighbor was more annoying than ever.

Camel Ride. Liz was trying to learn how to ride a horse. She bought some books on horseback riding. She practiced all summer in her backyard. On the day of the big event she was excited. Her horse got a huge smile on its face!

Horace Eats Donuts. Horace is getting very sick and needs food. He decided he would eat donuts every day. His stomach growled in pain and he started to have diarrhea. His mother sat beside him and gave him a bowl of cereal. Horace had forgotten his sickness, and ate his donuts instead.

Early Breakfast. The class was meeting up for an early morning breakfast. They were going to start off with a big, messy breakfast. They took out the pancakes and made them themselves. Then, they spread the pancakes and eggs on toast. Everyone was hungry and ready for lunch!

Getting the last ipad. The last of my ipad's was a year ago. I was too lazy to search and buy it myself. Luckily my friend had a cheap one in stock. I took it to the store and bought it. Now I have it for my birthday, and will be able to get it again.

Brought Lunch. Doris was working hard. She had a busy day at work. She went to lunch at a nearby restaurant. She was able to get two slices of pizza for the cost of a sandwich. When she ate, she thought it was the best lunch ever.

The catch. My girlfriend took me on a date. We went to a fancy restaurant. While eating, I noticed something on the table. It was my girlfriend's phone. When she turned around to face me, I saw her ring on the table.
Sober. Tom was a good student. One day he got a bad grade. He didn't want to sit still. So he kept going anyway. At the end of the day, he was an a-hole!

The restaurant. Mary was going to visit her mom. She was excited because it was her first time. She was surprised to see a restaurant was open. When she got there, she ordered a large dinner. It was a lot of food and she loved it.
Hat. Tom bought a new hat. It was a black one. The customer was upset. He gave the hat back. Tom felt terrible.
The snakebite. Allie had just been bitten by a snake. She was in a tent in the backwoods. Allie screamed. Allie's sister came running. Her sister was wearing her favorite white pantyhose.

Birds. Karen was visiting the forest when she spotted a large flock of birds. Karen felt a deep sense of awe for the birds, and couldn't believe it. She asked a local bird watcher to come and take a closer look. The local bird watcher brought with him a camera and several film. Karen was very proud of the bird watcher for capturing the birds.

Teeth whitening fail. Mary and her dentist had to go to the dentist office. As the dentist was removing teeth from her mouth Mary realized she was white. Mary tried to avoid looking at her teeth, but it was difficult. Mary found a white tooth and tried to whiten it. The white tooth was a success.
Going to the Zoo. Bert was nervous going to the zoo. There was a lot of scary animals there. He didn't get to see all of them yet. He did see a few animals. It made him sad.

New Camera App. Tom decided to use his new smartphone to take some pictures. After taking some photos he realized he didn't have a camera. Tom decided to buy a cheaper camera app to take pictures. He paid the app a lot of money to get the app. Now Tom has a lot of photography experience.

New dress. Mary and her friends had a lot of fun. They dressed up in a variety of clothing. As they dressed up they had a blast. They went to a movie and ate pizza. Mary's friend was so happy she had so much fun.

Wrong Number. Lizzy was walking with her mom down the street. Suddenly, she noticed a huge phone in her hand. Lizzy was confused as to why her mom hadn't given her her number. She was also irritated that her mom hadn't paid attention to the GPS on her phone. Lizzy finally realized she forgot to pay attention and had to go back to her house.
Mean Dog. Nia was playing with her dog. Her dog became aggressive. The dog started to bark at the neighbors. She told her mom to take the dog to the vet. The vet said Nia was in trouble with the law.

The Tower. Linda was walking in the park. She noticed a huge tower in the middle of the park. She walked closer and began to look at it. The tower was tall and had a huge sign that said "Walls of Fire". It looked intimidating and Linda thought it would be nice to go inside.

Fish Tales. The cat got a lot of bad habits and decided she wanted to be a cat. She decided to tell her mom and sister about her habits. Their mom and sister got a box of fish. They put the fish in the box and told the cat that the fish was fish. The cat was relieved that the cat had told her family about her problems.

Newspaper. It was a cold and dark night. There was a newspaper in the corner of the room. She opened it and started to read. It was a very interesting story. She thought it would make a good bedtime story.

Driving to the beach. It was just the two of us. We decided to get out of the car and just sit out on the shore. We drove for like 15 minutes and were tired and stressed out. Finally we went in the car and began to drive. It was an exciting ride and we were so happy.

The Apple Orchard. Cindy has a family farm. Today she wanted to take her family to a different part of the farm. She took her daughters to a picnic and picked apples. Her children also bought apples at the store. Cindy was excited to see her family enjoying their fresh apples.

David forgets about the sandwich. David was at his favorite diner. David was about to order food for himself when he remembered. His server came over and apologized. They made him an extra large sandwich. David forgets that it was a sandwich he already ordered.

Bad grades. Randy was a very smart student who was always given top grades. One day, he was given a very bad grade. He was embarrassed by it and could not believe that. He decided he needed to work on his writing and he decided to be more careful. Randy has improved his writing and is now a more professional student.

The Show. I sat in the back of the class and waited. The teacher called a teacher on stage. The teacher spoke to the students on stage. They were all very excited to be on stage. The teacher told us to stay seated.
Beach. I decided to go to the beach for the weekend. I went to the sand and took off my clothes. I put on some sandals and sandals. I walked to the pier and started my swim. It was so relaxing.
Bad Tooth. Gina was out with her friend. They were having ice cream on the roof of the house. Suddenly, Gina fell. Her tooth was out and it hurt horribly. She decided to never go back to that place.

Day Off. Amber was tired of her school day. She was going to have a day off. She had a job that needed to be done. On her day off Amber went out to eat and went shopping. Amber enjoyed her day off and got to go shopping.

Making Out at the Movies. A few friends and I were having a lot of fun at the movies. We were having so much fun that we were bored of the movie. My friend was trying to ask me for some. The only way I could get her to get him was to give her the whole movie. We ended up just sitting together and talking all night long.

Charlie Helps Paint. Charlie was trying to paint. He put on some paint and sprayed it. His brush got all of the paint off. He put the paint back on and took a look. It was completely covered with black dust.
Black and white party. Sam went to a party. The party had black and white parties. They had one that was on Friday. Sam had a white party. She got a white party.

Unhappy about the gift. Lily decided to send her boyfriend a new computer. Lily was hoping he would like the computer. As she was typing in her gift card, he walked up to her. He asked where her gift was. Lily laughed and said that he just wanted the computer.
The Gay Sister. I lived with a gay brother. We always had fights. I tried to find a solution. Eventually I let him out and he joined his school. He was so happy!
Water. Jane went to the beach for a few weeks. She always wanted to swim. She had never really thought about it though. She finally decided to do it. Jane enjoyed swimming and being in the sun.
Visit. I took my son to a museum. We saw lots of animals and even some new cars. My son showed me some new dinosaur fossils. He loved everything he saw. It was a good visit.
Back to School. Alex has to go back to school. He is exhausted. He knows he needs to study. He gets up early the next day. He gets in trouble and is late.

Late Night TV. I love to watch late night television. Last night, I decided to watch one of my favorite shows. I got up really early, and got ready by 11:00. When I finally finished my show, I went back to bed. I slept through my show until a few hours later.

iPhone reveal. Kenny was the only person in the world to get to watch the iPhone 6S launch on stage. He was only five years old. It was his first time going to see a new iPhone. He was so excited. Afterwards, he told everyone he had a great time.

Thrones. Gina is sitting on the sofa in her living room. Her mom is taking a break from the TV. She's getting ready for bed. When her mom goes to close the door she sees Gina's eyes. Gina is on the couch watching the first episode of Thrones.

The Brave Fireman. A fireman is walking down the street. He sees an elderly lady that he knows. The elderly lady is very afraid of the fireman. The fireman tries to convince her to go inside. The elderly lady is so frightened that she does not leave the house.

Met at a Bar. Samantha had a crush on a guy at the bar. He had to leave right then. The bartender got him a drink. She told him that if he was happy to get it he would come back. The bartender was happy and Sam was not.

Cooking White Rice. When I was in college I wanted to make my own white rice. I bought white rice from the store and cooked it. After I tasted it I made the white rice. I cooked the rice and served it for dinner. I enjoyed the meal so much I made it a new favorite dish.

Mini golf. John liked to play golf. He thought he could learn how to play the game well. So he signed up for a mini golf tournament. John got to play some mini golf with some friends. John was able to win a new mini golf game.

Dancefloor. We went to the club last Saturday night. We saw a band that was performing a song. The bassist was jumping around, and seemed a little weird. We asked the band for an autograph. They said yes, and we all went to dance floor.
Shirtless. My boyfriend wore the same shirt for almost a year. He finally got tired of it. He decided to change it up. He finally wore a shirtless shirt. He is so glad he did!

Short Stories. Jill was a terrible writer. She wrote stories that would take ten minutes to write. One day Jill received an offer. Jill took her stories to the big city. She ended up becoming a best selling author.

The careless destruction. Tina was playing in her yard. She was playing a game with her friends. Suddenly, a ball hit her mom's car. Tina's car began to slowly tip over. Luckily, her mom stopped and helped.
Big Change. When we went to New York last month I took my wife to a new place. There, we looked at everything. We went shopping and ate lunch. Then we went to the movies. We had the best time ever.

glasses. I looked at the shelves of eyeglasses. There were many different types of glasses. When I tried on some I was not impressed. I decided to go to the hardware store to get more glasses. I bought more than I wanted and have now bought a dozen glasses.

More Books. Cindy was a mom of four children. Her oldest was six years old. One day her older daughter started reading a book. She was reading the whole book. Cindy began to worry about her older daughter.

Emma's track race. Emma is a track star. She is competing in her local track meet. On the morning of the race, her trainer and coach announce the results. Emma has won the state title. Emma heads to the state finals to show off her accomplishments.
Overstepping Boundaries. John was driving home from work. He was driving his father's car. It was his father's birthday. John's father was driving too fast. John slammed into his father's car.

Terrible Haircut. Mary was at the barbershop. All of a sudden a woman walked in. She was beautiful but not very pretty. Mary asked what she wanted and the woman told her to cut her hair short. Mary was so disappointed.

Birthday Cake. I was getting a birthday cake from the store. I went to pick up the cake. When I was about to pick up the cake it fell on the ground. I was trying to get it up but couldn't. I had to have it cut down to fit inside the cake.

Team Morale. Kelly was on the team of the night. They were going to have a battle. Kelly thought the night was going to be very close. The first five minutes were very close. Kelly wound up with the win by a hair and was proud.
A Bad Cut. Ben wanted to wear a tie. He wanted it to stand out from the crowd. He went to the store. He bought a red tie. The next day, he got a poor cut in it.

Cheaters. Natalie was doing a project for her high school class. She worked hard on her project for over an hour. Natalie was very proud of her great work. All of the other students were laughing at her because of it. Natalie felt that this was her best work to date.

Park Accident. Yesterday I saw a large deer on a trail. The deer was in the middle of a large canyon. I was in a hurry, and I ran around trying to get away. I finally came up on a tree. The deer ended up on the ground and died.

Indigestion. I was eating some ice cream on my way home. I had a small pain in my stomach. I called my friend and he brought some milk. I drank a bit of the milk and was able to pass out. Luckily the pain was minor so I woke up to my friends call.

Luke Plays Guitar. Luke has been practicing guitar all morning. He got up and got in his guitar case and played. Then, he went to the store and bought a new amp. Luke went to school to study guitar and practice everyday. After school, he is a professional musician.

Pull Up Me. Tom was driving through an intersection. He was getting out of his car. Suddenly, his car became stuck in the intersection. Tom couldn't move his car. The car had tipped over and totaled the tire on it.
Getting a snack. Lester went to the grocery store. He needed a snack. He walked around the store. He bought some chips and some candy. Then, he got to work on his meal.

Rita visits her grandparents. Rita is visiting her grandmother. Her grandmother is very old and frail. Her grandson brings her tea to sip. The granddaughter also brings her tea to sip. The granddaughter also says hi to Rita's grandmother.

Childhood Games Made Real. When I was little, I loved playing games. We would play for hours. I would find a cool game and we would play it together for hours. Now, I spend most of my time on facebook. I still play games at night.

Pearls before (Guinea) Swine. The girls were going to the zoo with friends. As they entered, there was a line of pigs. It was a line that stretched all the way around the zoo. Gina tried to run towards the line of pigs but they kept on pushing. She ended up in the pen and waited for her friends to leave.

Making a New Friend. Allie had a big crush on a boy named John. The two fell in love and decided to get married. When they got married it was the beginning of a long road. When they got married they got divorced. Allie was heartbroken.

Worried. Tina had been having nightmares lately. She went to the hospital to get tested. She was told that her pregnancy was a success. But after the tests, they discovered that she had an IUD. Now Tina is very worried and not allowed to sleep.
Burn. Tim was walking his dog. His dog was very loose. He started to walk slowly. When he got closer he saw that it was burned. He quickly ran after his dog.

Open Door. I was on a walk with my friends one day. We started out at a nice restaurant. But then the food was so crowded, we were not able to eat. After 20 minutes, we got tired of the noise. So we decided to go home and rest.

Pink Shirt. Karen has always wanted a pink shirt. She gets a lot of compliments on her shirt. Karen decided to get her shirt professionally done. They got her new shirt. Karen is now getting compliments all the time.

Camping Trip. Kara went camping with her family on Saturday. They set up their tent and campsite. After the kids made their lunch, they were ready to go. When they were ready, they drove out into the woods. Once out in the woods, they watched the sunset and enjoyed the weather.

The Bad Hair Cut. Randy needed to look good for a job interview. He was not looking good and needed a haircut. He was very nervous about the interview. He ended up being very nervous and had a terrible haircut. Randy's boss decided to give him a bad job interview.

Santa Claus. Sam bought a big shiny red Santa hat. He put it on and opened his presents. Then he ran outside to show his neighbors. They all started to laugh at him. But then they noticed how big his hat was.

Cabin Fever. Gina's husband had to go to the hospital to get his heart pumping. When they arrived he was in the intensive care unit with a heart defect. He is now in the intensive care unit as a result of his condition. Gina is not sure what to do but can only wish for a cure. Gina doesn't want to move back to Hawaii because she's afraid he'll die.

Cold Pizza. Yesterday was so hot outside it was hard to eat dinner. But when we got to our house I wanted pizza. But when we got to my door I realized I was out of pizza. I made pizza and gave it to my mom who wanted fries. But it was the same old, same old pizza I've eaten for years.

Eggs. Devin wanted to make breakfast. He went to the store and bought a dozen eggs. He took them to the kitchen to bake them. Devin was very pleased with the fresh eggs. He decided to buy more eggs next time.

Clancy Makes Toast. Clancy loved to make his own toast. His friends were always asking him for it. One day, he decided to make some at home. The next day, his friends asked him for it. He thanked them and said he'd never make it himself.

Jumping. All of my friends and I used to go to the park to jump. My friend and I had a lot of fun jumping and had fun. One day, my friend and I were in the same park. We saw a woman jumping over a fence. The woman fell and injured herself and her friend.
Peppermint Bark. Mary went to the store. She saw some great items. She wanted some peppermint bark. She bought peppermint bark. Mary loved peppermint bark.
Hospital Visit. Linda was at a hospital. She needed a new pacemaker. They gave her a pill and gave her an injection. Afterwards she felt much better. Her mother gave her an apple to eat afterwards.
Miniature Dining Room. Tricia was at a small diner with her friends. They all decided to try a new dish. Tricia ordered chicken wing. When she got the food it was a little cold. She threw it away.

The Snow. Jim was at his house watching his kids play. They were playing in the snow. The snow started falling very quickly. Jim was very upset. He immediately told them not to play in the snow again.

The Well. It was late in the summer, and Mark was in the middle of his summer. The temperature had plummeted as low as 35 degrees, but Mark had been outside in his kayak all day. He decided he wanted to take a break. He pulled out his canoe and kayak and began his day. By the end of the day, Mark felt exhausted from the heat and rain.

Nathan. Nathan was an old friend of my dad's. He had always lived in the house where he was a janitor. One day he woke up with a new job. His old house was a mess and he was unhappy. Nathan moved away and took a job cleaning houses with his girlfriend.

A Bridge Not Too Far. The bridge over the river is not far from where he lives. The weather is very rainy and very hard. It takes hours to cross the river. Tim is very excited when the traffic starts to stop. Tim takes a moment to enjoy the view from his bridge.

Door Slamming. One day I was at work. Someone slammed the door. I had never heard of this technique before. I felt annoyed since my boss wouldn't give me a bonus. I would get a lot less from my paycheck for it.
Shot in the Leg. Diane was at a birthday party. Diane was playing at her birthday party. Diane got shot. Diane had to stay home. Diane was glad she had not gone out.

Reading. A woman had a lot of books in her house. She wanted to read more books. She had a lot of books and was very lazy. One day, she decided to read a book in a stack. Now, she has more books in her house!

Illegal Street Vendor. Yesterday I bought my girlfriend a drink. It was a delicious  iced coffee. My brother came over to help me make  a  cup of  ice cream. He bought a $15  coffee vendor. His purchase made him a $5.

Strong Beer. My friend and I went out on a date last week. We went to see a band play at the venue. The band played strong beer. We ordered beers and they were the best tasting beers I've ever had. I hope to have a better time with my friends.

Basketball Tryout. I heard about a tryout for a team basketball team. I tried out to try out with the team. They gave me an opportunity to play against some of my college friends. I was happy with my performance and I made the team. My teammates were proud of me.

Stuffed. My roommate got a stuffed tiger for his birthday. We watched the stuffed tiger for a while. After he turned it over, it bit a hole in the wall. My roommate then broke the stuffed tiger. My roommate then got the stuffed tiger back.
Crunches. Lois decided to go outside and try to jog. She wasn't wearing her crunches. Suddenly she tripped. She fell and hurt her knee. She couldn't run for a week and now misses running.

Too Afraid For A Second Date. Jody was nervous about her first date. Her date was really great, but she was too afraid. When they got to the restaurant, Jody felt a bit uneasy. She forgot to pay her bill, and everyone at the table got nervous. Jody ended up leaving and going home with another guy.

Salt in the pepper shaker. Kimmy had to make a salad for school today. She decided to make a big bowl of veggies. She added some spices to it. Then she took it out of the fridge. She then tasted it and found that it was salt.

Broken Dishwasher. Lily has a dishwasher that breaks on a daily basis. She decided to buy a new one. However she wasn't sure if it would be as durable. Lily found a cheap one. She installed it and it worked great.

Firing employees. Gina was a manager at a large company. She thought her team needed to work more hours. She told them that she was getting rid of some of them. The employee was fired. Gina was furious and had to fire all of her employees.

Pageant. Jenny's sister invited all of her friends. Jenny and her friends packed their bags and drove out. They went to the theater. They watched the show and ate snacks. Then they went home and watched tv.

A Good Bartender. John loved to drink beer at parties. He would usually bring a few beers with him for every single occasion. One night he decided he wanted to become a bartender. He found a job working with restaurants and they were excited about him. John was very successful and was now one of their top bartenders!

Bill Goes Skydiving. Bill loved to skydive. When he was younger he skydived for fun. When he was old enough he signed up to go skydiving. Bill went skydiving in the mountains of Alaska. He enjoyed the trip and skydived for a long time.

Bob's Big Break. Bob was playing poker at the casino. He noticed a friend of his. The friend decided to come over for a drink. Bob took the friend to the poker room. The friend won big and was very happy.

Real Mom. One of my best friends was my real mother. We grew up together as kids and had our own house. As adults we moved in together but never married. We had a wonderful time until she died. She passed away with a horrible illness and we were very sad.

New shoes. I decided that I needed to buy new shoes. First I looked at the ones that I already owned. Then I went to the thrift store to browse. Then I purchased some shoes and headed home. I now have a great new pair of shoes.

The Storm. Tom was driving home. The storm started to pour down on the road. All of a sudden, the car broke down. Tom was stranded on the side of the road for several hours. Tom decided to call a tow truck to move him to safety.

Greg Raposo. Greg raposo is a great guitarist. Greg raps very well. One day a band put him in front of a crowd. Greg did not want to be in front of the crowd. Greg was given a failing grade for not being well prepared.

Ugly Art. Lucy was painting some art on her wall. Her friends made fun of her because she was ugly. She decided to stop painting for a week and take a break. She went to the local store and bought her art supplies. She started to paint and realized how much she had done.

Price Matching. Kylie had just been in her first date with a guy. They were going to eat at a nice restaurant for dinner. Kylie and the guy had a lot in common, she thought. She felt like she was losing her mind. But it turns out it was all worth it for her date.

Decision. Sam's grandma wanted him to buy her a new dress. But she was broke and had a boyfriend. So he decided to buy her the one she always wanted. But the first night he wore it to a party, he fell off of the ladder. Sam was sad, but he understood why her boyfriend wouldn't buy her.

Falling at the rink. Jane had just entered a hockey game. She was nervous as her team was losing. After scoring the winning goal Jane felt a tug on her sleeve. Her team fell to the bottom of the league. She was devastated and wished her team had won.

Beanie Babies. I had a friend who was having a baby. We would buy her cute clothes and toys. She couldn't go to the store because of her busy schedule. We bought her a beanie bag. She loved the new look!

Beer. Last month I went out to eat with a few friends. The barista gave me a big glass of beer. I started to take a sip, the beer spilled all over my shirt. Luckily, the barista cleaned it up and gave me another beer. I guess there are always plenty of beer out there!

Food Poisoning. Sue was making dinner for her friends. She was putting all her vegetables in a large bowl. Suddenly a small fly came out of the pot. Sue was horrified, but didn't think much of it. She had been overcooked.
Robot. Tom wanted to make a robot. He found one online. He bought parts. He built the robot. It worked great.

Questioning. I had a conversation with my friend Joe. He asked me if I could have a coffee at his place. I was unsure, so I asked him to. He came in and ordered a latte. I was confused because it was not a regular coffee.

Left Out. Gina had a special bowl of fruit juice. She had always wanted to use it at dinner time. Her dad came home from work. He told Gina to put it in the fridge. Gina didn't remember to put the juice away.

Boring Movie. Last week I saw a movie called boring. The movie was about an old guy. After I finished watching the movie I sat down to think about how boring the movie was. I couldn't make heads or tails of what the movie was about. After thinking about it, I decided to not go see the movie this week.

The Angry Model. I decided to make a video for a new product. I called my friend to take the video for me. He was very angry with me for posting my video. I finally calmed down and stopped the video. He laughed and told me I wasn't funny after all.

Bill's Wife. Bill was taking a nap at the beach. The man next to Bill came out to look for him. Bill yelled at the man for yelling at Bill. He tried to leave but the man followed him. Bill called the man a liar.

How regretful. The girl's school was looking to hire a new teacher. One of the positions would require her to be extra careful. She had to look over the paper, and act on what she had learned. In the end, she was given the position she really wanted. She had to look at her paper very carefully before going.
Dog House. Sam was on vacation. He was sitting in a cabin. His dog ran into the cabin and jumped out. Sam panicked. He immediately took the dog into the house.
Bat. It was a rainy day. A bat had been found in a tree by a passerby. The bat had been shot and killed. The owner took the bat home. Now they have a bat and a pet.

Backpacking Trip. Tara wanted to go backpacking in the wilderness. She packed her stuff for the trip. When the trip was over, she put in a map. She brought a map for her husband to look at. He was able to find many interesting places!
Random. Tim was in class one day. He saw a girl on the bench talking to a random guy. He got up to talk to him. Tim talked to him for a while. The girl told him he wasn't a real guy.

Severe Reaction. Amy was driving to school one day. She noticed a huge squirrel in the road. Amy was worried about the squirrel and did not want to go around it. She called the police who were already there. The police took Amy to the hospital.

Solar Panels. Natalie's parents thought solar was expensive and she should save. When Natalie was young, her parents never got a big solar system. She decided she would go to college and get a job as a housewife. One day her parents invited her over for dinner. Natalie's parents were so excited, they said her big solar was only $10.

Wet Floor. Kate and her husband wanted to do something fun and exciting. They decided to install new flooring. It would help them put out a lot of firewood. They went to the yard to install the wood floor. They had fun decorating the space with firewood.
The purse. I was having trouble finding the purse. I searched everywhere. Finally I found the purse. My friend came over to help me find the purse. She said she knew what was inside it.

Soul Mates. Mary was a great violinist. She was in a group where the group was really cool. Mary was a friend and would play with them all the time. One day Mary got a message on facebook. It was a group of other violinists from her music school.

The Fit. Sara was a small woman, but she did not have a good body. When she was a child, she never had any trouble fitting in. One day, she was at a party and a stranger approached her. He asked her if she was a model and asked her if she wanted to become a model. Sara agreed and the stranger let her wear a short skirt to the party.
I Walked Home. We used to live in an old house. The house was a big city with lots of people. One day I decided to go home. I took my two kids to the park. After that we went to school together.
Museum. My friend and I went to the museum. We went to the second floor and stayed in a booth. There was a new exhibit of art. We saw several paintings. We watched a short film about the museum.

Pickpocket. Linda was out walking. She tripped and lost her wallet. She looked down at it in fear. She pulled a knife out of her pocket. When she went to retrieve it she found it was a pickpocket's wallet.
Hearing. Tara went to the dentist for a checkup. There, she was informed she had a cavity. Tara rushed to the hospital. It was an emergency surgery to remove her tooth. Tara is now back at school.
