Professional Photographer. Tim was a photographer and he was on his way to a wedding. He drove through a very difficult country. He saw several bad roads and had to change lanes. He then had to stop for fuel. Tim then had to make an emergency call for help to a helicopter.

Try. I love to try new foods. Every Sunday, I go out and eat out. I make sure to go out of my way to go out. I have my own fridge full of food to try new things. I am now able to eat at restaurants for my weekly checkups.
Baseball. Jace had a baseball game. He threw the ball and hit it hard. The ball flew high into the air. The pitch missed him by inches. He went on to score a run.

Spicy Food. Drew's girlfriend was really sick. She made a list of all the different foods she wanted to try. Drew made an emergency potluck for her. His girlfriend was happy that they both got to eat. Drew was grateful he brought something to help her feel better.

Trash. A boy's friend was going through his trash. He was looking for a new hat. He found a huge pile of old socks. He was about to throw it away. The next day, the trash man was kind and gave him a box.
music with sticks. Rita was in a band. She got a job selling music sticks. She was making thousands. Then one day she got a call saying she'd been fired. She lost her job.

Bad tattoo. Laurie was going through her mom's old drawers. She found a horrible one she had done on her friend, a cute guy. The tattoo was horrible so she was very upset. However, her mom laughed at her. It was a cheap copy of her friend's artwork.

Cheerleading Squad. Kate wanted to be the cheerleader. She practiced every day. She made a new team to cheer for. Her coach liked the new team and liked her work. Kate was proud of her new team and was happy.

School Winter. I was doing laundry for school. I decided to make a big pot of laundry. I started washing it as soon as it was finished. The big pot made it rain in a few minutes. The school was closed for the day.
The Belt. Nala was shopping for a new belt. She got a new belt. It fit her like a glove. However it was a lot to take on and off of. Nala bought another belt the next day.

Waitress. I was driving to my friend's house when we got a phone call. The waiter was there to give the order. I was surprised because I was on my way home. When the waiter came, I was extremely excited. He was amazing and made everything so delicious.

Messy Hair. Alicia's hair was messed up. Her friends told her that she needed to grow a new style. Alicia took a haircut and began to grow out her hair. She was very unhappy about it. Alicia felt her hair looked better after she shaved it.

Scared. I was on my way to school and my car was being honked. A man in a car behind me honked at me. I didn't move and just got off my bike. I stopped to see what he was doing. The next thing I know I am riding my bike into the parking lot.
Easter Egg Hunt. Jody was in her room. There was an Easter egg hunt. She wanted to find all the Easter eggs. She searched all the room. She was excited when she found the Easter egg hunt prize.

College. Gina was excited that her college had finally accepted applications. She decided to get a good grade on her college application. She took a couple of classes to prepare for the college interview. She did not get the job and was so disappointed. She ended up dropping out of the college.

Live in Person. Ava went to her first day of school in a new city. She was nervous and eager for the first day of school. At the school bus stop she saw the bus that was her crush. She asked to see this bus driver and the driver was thrilled to meet her. He said he would be her first day of school companion as well.
Thud. It was raining hard. A thunderstorm was in progress. Timmy stood in the rain. He was too far away from his house. It didn't stop and he got wet.

Logan's Mistake. Logan was on a road trip with his friends. They stopped in an old part of town. They decided to drink some whiskey. They started to drive too fast. The whiskey made Logan drunk and stopped the vehicle.

Lost Keys. I was running around my house trying to find my keys. I didn't know what to do. I searched all the cabinet. I found the keys in the cabinet drawer. I locked the doors and ran back to my room.

Cell Phone. One day, Joe saw a guy on his way to work. He stopped to ask him if he wanted to go outside. The man declined, and Joe was annoyed. Joe then decided to just walk away. He didn't call the guy back until the next morning.

The Baby's Toy. I was looking for something for my baby. I noticed that she is missing her toys. I decided to find a toy for her. I bought her a new baby toy. She has been very happy for her new toys.

Safe. Allie's baby had been sick for several days. She knew her husband was stressed but she was scared. Allie decided to take a walk and visit her grandpa. The walk back home was stressful but it made Allie feel better. The baby felt much better and Allie felt safe!

Pee Break. Nate was going to work at an office. One morning he got a new job at the same location. But there was only one bathroom in the office. One day he woke up to a loud pitter patter sound. He went to the bathroom anyway and there was no one there to help him.

Potato. Miles was at the farmer's market one day. He went to the pottery section and saw a lot of pottery. He picked up a beautiful piece of pottery and showed it to the worker. The worker said it was amazing and it made a great gift. Miles was glad that he found something cool to collect.

Drag Racing. I used to watch drag racing on TV. I thought it was the most fun thing on TV. I tried out for drag racing last weekend. I am nervous about starting on the drag race team. I'm excited to begin my first race.

Freeway Speed. Tia was on her way to work when she noticed a red light. She did not see where she was going, but did see a highway. While driving in the highway she passed a small group of people. Tia was shocked to hear that they were speeding on the highway. A few minutes later they sped off after she passed them.

Baby's First Tooth. Tim was getting his first tooth pulled yesterday. He was very scared. Tim's mother made him sit down and relax. Tim thought it would be a cool experience. He thought he would have a fun time.
Wrong Flavor. Jenny hated flavored yogurts. The taste was bland and horrible. She decided to try a new flavor. She chose lemonade. Jenny's friends loved her new flavor.

Grown Apart. Kelley wanted to be the first in her class to go to college. But she knew she was not ready. One day, she realized she had a problem. Her hair was becoming longer than she liked. She decided she was never going to college.

Shoe Lifter. Sam decided to work out at the gym to gain some weight. He picked a good pair of shoes and went for a run. Sam went on and on and on. After 20 minutes, Sam was still sore. He decided to give up and walk around the gym.

Kicked out. A lot of my friends were going on a trip. We went to a small town. I got mad at my friend for not coming with us. I made up a story about being kicked out. He left anyway, and I never saw him again.

The backup singer. Jenny was having trouble singing. She was worried she wouldn't be able to sing in the next show. Jenny's friends decided to write her some songs. Jenny had so much fun doing the songs that she did. She ended up being a very popular singer!

Dumping for someone else. Kate was a young girl who had a crush on someone new. She decided to try and take it a different way. She dumped someone she felt like had feelings for her. Her friend was devastated. Kate felt awful about it but had no choice.

Meet The Manager. John was a manager at a large electronics store. One day John met a young person who asked about his career path. John was confused and told the young person that he had worked in electronics before. John continued to meet with the young man and to work with him in the future. John was happy that he was getting to know a new kind of man.
Business. Tim was a businessman. He was in an international hotel. The manager forgot Tim was a businessman. Tim got fired. He never went to that hotel again.

Ice Skating. Lucy was a very talented ice skater. Her friends and family had told her to be very careful in ice skating. The only problem was that she was too short. She realized she needed a long pair of gloves for ice skating. She bought the gloves and they were perfect.
Zombies. There once was a kid. It was a zombie. He was always running around. One day it bit him. It was like a ghost bite.

Doing the Dishes. Sarah was feeling bored with her morning routine. She decided to cook and eat dinner. Her friend suggested she make her own meals. Sarah decided to cook a homemade chicken noodle soup. Sarah had so much fun making her own meals that night.
Tea. Anna wanted some tea. She knew how much she wanted it. But it wasn't until the bus was leaving that she got to have it. The bus drove over her. Anna sat in the back, drinking it.

Claire and John. Claire met John when he was 12 years old. They dated for about a year. They started dating at a young age and soon started dating a lot. John moved in with Claire and started dating her. They became a great couple and started dating again when Claire was 31.

Reading the diary. Barry got up and walked to his desk. He read all of his diary. After he finished his diary, he laid in bed. He decided to read the diary in the morning. Barry did not feel that he had done much in the morning.

Peppers. My son bought a new pepper garden today. It is not a big pepper garden. The peppers grow up to a hundred plants. We used an air pump to blow the hot water on the peppers. They are very fast and are very colorful.

Injured Arm. I was playing a game with my sister one day. We had a lot of friends over to play. I had the game, but my arm started to hurt very bad. I went to the doctor. It turned out the arm wasn't broken, and my arm just hurt.
Charm bracelet. Dana was working out. She was working on the bench with a dumbbell. All of a sudden, she felt her wrist break. Her bracelet fell out!She had to return it to the store.

Makeup Artist. One day, I went to an art gallery to browse. I saw a beautiful makeup artist who was working on a book. She showed me several of her paintings and told me I had the look. I tried my best to replicate her look. Within days, I was a great makeup artist.
Pigs. Tricia loved animals and was looking for a pet. She wanted a pig. She went to the pet store and went online. She picked out a black and white pig. When she saw him she brought it home with her.

Cornelia Finishes a Book Report. Cornelia was working on a book report. She had been writing for months. She had finally finished the last page. She was glad to be done with the report. She was so happy when her book was published.

Pencils. My mom wanted me to get my own pencils. I did not like pencils because they were too sharp. I got into my room and found a box of them. I put a pencil in my pocket and I began drawing. My mom smiled and said that I looked like a child today.

Bob Nearly Gets a Ticket. Bob is driving his car. Suddenly a car pulls out of the driveway. Bob slams on the brakes. The car swerves and crashes into a tree. Bob almost gets a ticket for running over a car.

Bad smell. John was walking around in his apartment. Suddenly, he smelled something horrible. He realized that he left a piece of bread on his front step. He took the piece to the store to see if he could find it. The store had already sold out and it was completely ruined.

World Series earthquake. John and his friends were playing baseball. John was having fun with his friends. A big earthquake occurred near the plate. John and his friends heard a big roar. John and his friends all ran away in a panic.

Pitbull Party. My dog was a pitbull. She was a little fat when she got older. One day, she started to run around the neighborhood. Some kids saw her run and ran away. My dog ended up being picked up by the police and sent to rehab.

The Research Project. Lori was trying to understand the history of dinosaurs. She was having trouble finding all of the relevant info. She got her mom to help. Her mom and her dad worked together to research dinosaurs. Finally they found everything she needed.

Emu and Ostriches. Kelley went to the beach with her son and daughter. She was about to take them for a walk when she saw an ostrich. She went to see if it would get away. Then she called the beach to see if it would get back. A couple of hours later she returned with her son and daughter.

Writer's Block. Tom was trying to get a college writing degree. Tom had been in a writer's block for Years. Tom decided to get his writing degree from a professional. Tom was accepted into a writing workshop. Tom was happy that he had been accepted.

Viral. I was in the library and heard some weird music. I looked around and saw a group of girls playing it. They were making fun of me for being a nerd. Suddenly, someone in the crowd was talking loudly. The music stopped and I realized I was in an illegal recording studio.

The New Home. Sam was moving from the city to the suburbs. He had his dream house, and was very excited. He found a new job and was happy. Sam decided to purchase a house with all his plans. Sam was glad he had his dream home.

Rufus Visits Florida. Rufus always wanted to visit Florida. He got a job working as a waiter in a local restaurant. Rufus saved his money and eventually had enough money to buy his own plane ticket. Rufus had no money for a ticket to Florida for that weekend. He landed in Florida and enjoyed his vacation.

Monopoly. The kids were playing Monopoly with their friends. At the end of the game, they all had to guess how much they would get. They got lucky and all of the chips they were holding were worth 2 dollars. I was on the last team, but still won. My mom said that I had a lot of pride and my dad said that I had a lot of money.

Volleyball. Lucy wanted to play volleyball. She heard about a school that would let her play. She signed up for the school's varsity program. She spent all summer playing volleyball. Lucy is very happy that she signed up for volleyball.

Astronaut. John and his friend Andy were looking forward to the big space party for their school. They bought tickets online and drove to the event. The party was packed and everyone knew they'd be there. The party was a great success and they could not wait for next year. They could not wait until they were astronauts in space.
attention. John was the most famous man in America. He was a very popular man. One day, someone called John's office. They wanted to talk to John. John listened intently.

Picking berries. It was summer and all the berries were ripe. My mom bought me berries and told me to pick them. I grabbed two big ones and threw them into a bag. While I was walking I saw my mom eating the bag. I didn't get any berries but I still had fun.

Car Key. Kelly needed to take her daughter to school. Her daughter was really excited about it. Her mother got them into her car. When Kelly got in the car her daughter got out. Kelly had forgotten to get her car key.

Shopping at Target. Javier needed to get home from school. He couldn't make it to his parent's house. Javier went into Target for lunch. He saw that the food was all out. Javier got home empty handed.

Dan can't fly. Dan was having a hard time flying around. He tried many different things but nothing seemed to help. His dad told him he had too many muscles. His dad took Dan to the doctor. The doctor prescribed a lot of drugs for Dan.

The Pacific North. Ned and his family were taking a trip to Hawaii. On their way they stopped at a pier. The two were so excited they had never been there before. It was a long, beautiful walk through the ocean. They had an amazing time there!

Reading. When I was six I wanted to be a writer. I began studying in a local college, but could not get any work. Eventually I had to give up. When I got my degree, I worked as a waitress at a coffee shop. After years of that, I wrote a very successful book and became a successful writer.

Late to Class. Gina and her friend were in the library. Gina and her friend were reading a book. One of the books had an important exam due. Gina and her friend made sure they got to class on time. Unfortunately, the test was two hours late.

Discontinued. In 2004 I bought an old VCR that I had in the attic. The old VCR had a broken power supply. When I came home the old VCR wouldn't work. My husband came over and we repaired it. After that I was able to watch my favorite movies.

The Move to Tulsa. Tom had just moved to Tulsa from San Diego. Tom didn't know anyone in Tulsa. Tom decided to look for work in Tulsa. Tom got a job as a delivery driver at a local car dealership. Tom loved his new life in Tulsa!
Geese. The kids played a game of Geese. I was the only one left in the house. As soon as we left, the geese flew into the house. It started to rain. The kids hid in the garage.

Old Water Bottle. Bill was cleaning his apartment. He noticed that he forgot to put the water bottle in. Bill didn't want to get his stuff dirty. He decided to make a homemade bottle. It worked great and he was able to clean up the mess.

Sports Day. Jim was at the beach with his girlfriend. They were playing baseball when Jim ran out. Jim was not able to find his cell phone because he dropped his bat. Jim decided to sit in the shade for the rest of the day. He called his girlfriend to let her know that he was okay.

Chase. Chase wanted a puppy. But he was afraid of dogs. His mom convinced him to try a rescue. Chase was taken to the shelter where they could adopt one. Chase and his new dog have had a very happy life!

Not Enough Ingredients. Mary wanted to take her family on a family camping trip. Her mother told her they couldn't go to the water in the woods. Mary took an ingredient list from the store. She mixed the ingredients in a pot. Then, she served them together in a basket to share.

The Bum. I was running late for work. I was late and I had to work. It was the busiest day of the week. When I got there my boss was there waiting for me. He brought me coffee and my work schedule was a lot easier.
Durpston. Durpston got a job working for his dad. He lived with his dad in the car. They were always late. One day he found out his dad lost his job. Durpston lost his job and never looked back.
Wango. Wango lived in a large mansion. He lived alone. One day a lady went to his mansion. She came to the front of the mansion to see what was going on. Wango had been kidnapped.

Resourceful. Jenny is a very resourceful woman. She always takes the time to find new ways to help others. One day, she discovered that a homeless man had just left a large box of books. It took hours of searching to find the books. Luckily, Jenny found them all in time.

Train Ride. I drove on the train to Chicago. A group of kids asked me to take a picture with them. My hands began to ache from riding so fast. They were only 10 years old so it was nice. It was only 3 minutes but I loved it.

The Barista. Tanya liked her job as a barista at a coffee shop. She loved her job when she worked every day. The next day, though, Tanya noticed her coffee was very cold. Her boss had ordered a cold beverage at a cafe the day before. Tanya was very disappointed because she hated the cold coffee.

Driving to Work. Kate was nervous to get her morning coffee. She drove in a small car with no insurance. As she arrived at the cafe, she saw there were no drivers to drive it. She tried to make the stop signs but couldn't. Finally, a friend pulled her over for not following the signs.

Valedictorian. My class held its annual valedictory in May. My class is the most dedicated to teaching the Spanish language. I am proud to have earned the highest honors in the school. However, I was very sad to receive a letter about my valedictorian. The teacher at the school said that he had been working extra hours for the class.

First Day of School. Sara was so excited to have her first day of school. She had to do all the things she normally did. She got to play with her new friends. She got to play in the park. Then, she was able to enjoy her first day of school!

Save Often. I was waiting for my bus to take me to the subway. It was about to get busy and I couldn't wait. As I was walking along the sidewalk I noticed a woman walking on it. I decided I needed to pass her and take her home. She agreed to let me take her home and I saved her.

Football Star. I started playing football when I was 15. When I was 16 I played for a local university. At the end of my first game I threw the ball 100 yards for a touchdown. At the end of the game I won the football star award. I still get the most calls from my friends for this award.

Lecture. One day, my friend invited me to come in class. The professor was having a lecture. I was supposed to listen to his lecture. I was so busy I forgot to listen to it!The class ended up being cancelled due to me failing my lecture.

Arcades. Cindy wanted to learn to play video games. She had saved up for years for her own arcades. Cindy decided to go and see an arcade. At the arcade she met a friend, who was also looking for help. They played arcades together for a few months until they got the hang of it.

Going to the Movies. My wife was supposed to see a movie with my daughter. I went to the movies. My daughter told me that her favorite movie was the new one. She also told me that it was the best movie ever. I went to the movies to surprise her.

Car Sick. I had to rush to get to the doctor today for some test. The car was running a bit funky. I called the service center. They sent an ambulance to my house. It took an hour but I managed to make it home safely.

"School". When I was younger I went to college. It was a really hard time for me because I had depression and a lot of self doubt. I thought about killing myself. When I was 18 I decided that I wanted to graduate college and live a life of purpose. I was very happy when I graduated and got a job.

The Therapist. Tom was very depressed and felt hopeless. He saw a therapist and got counseling. He found some good ways to make it better. He eventually got better and his life was a lot better. Tom was relieved that he could finally start doing things again.
The pony. Jill was in the living room. She was looking at her neighbor's house. She saw a pony that had broken loose. She decided she would take the pony. Jill bought a new pony, but it was a mess!

Police. Yesterday I went to the mall to shop for clothes. I saw a cop behind me and tried to follow him. When he turned his car around, he pulled me over. The cop was very upset with me and told me I had expired my license. Now I am very nervous around him.
Honey Pot. My mom used to make a pot for me. One day I didn't like it and threw it away. Then I tried to wash the jar it. My tooth came right out of the pot. I was so embarrassed.
Lost Friend. I went to an art fair with my friends. I saw a painting of an angel. It was a picture of a very close family. I knew it was my friend. I apologized to him for calling him a liar.

Random. Tom had a friend who had a cat. Tom took him to the dog park with him. Tom's friend went home and forgot to close the door. Tom was surprised and upset when his friend came back with a cat. Tom's friend had a cat that was too cute.

project. Lily had an art project to do at home. She knew she could not get a good shot of it. So she went out to the kitchen and took a pan out. She put a few pieces of paper on the paper roll. Finally, she put the pan on the table with the paper rolls.
Test. Karin was taking a math test. She had no idea what she would study. Karin found out she did not need to know a lot. She studied hard. Karin passed the test.

Beer. All of the girls in the class wanted to get a beer. A man stopped in his tracks to ask where the nearest shop was. The man told the girls all about the great beer they could make. The girls made a beer with every ingredient except the yeast. They became one of the best beer makers in the class.

Meter Monitor Or Thief. Jenny went to the store to buy some coffee. She left her purse in her car and walked back home. Jenny noticed that her wallet was missing. The store employee told her that he needed to give her a meter monitor. Jenny found the meter monitor and gave it to the employee.

The Long Flight. Nina decided to take a cruise. It was a very scenic cruise. She decided to take the shortest flight. The plane was taking forever to land. Nina had to make a detour to a restaurant to have lunch.

Birthday Beach Trip. Briana and her friends went to the beach with their mom. They spent their time swimming and playing frisbee. On the day of the trip, Briana's mom forgot about the birthday party. She forgot to tell the party organizers that it was her last day. After the party, they went home to eat cake and watch tv.

Benjamin Played Video Games. Benjamin decided that he needed to get back into playing video games. He played them online for awhile. But he was never able to get them to run correctly. One day, he discovered a new game and tried it out. Benjamin had a blast playing it and it wasn't the same!

Disappointment. Tami went on her first trip to Germany this summer. She was happy and thrilled by all the sights and sounds. It was a long flight and Tami started to get bored. On the final leg of the trip, Tami began to become frustrated. After a long flight and a few minutes, Tami was able to return home.

New Show. Diane decided to make her own show. She bought all the equipment and rented a studio. Her show is going to be released next week. She is working hard making it good. She plans on making a lot of money from it.
The Car Wash. One day when Timmy was 10 years old he went to the car wash. His mom was the only one there. They washed and painted cars for hours. They had a great time. Timmy was proud of his mom.

New Bag. John bought a new bag at the store. He was happy to have it. But he realized how expensive it would be to keep. John ended up paying a lot for the bag. But he was happy the bag was made of high quality material.

Girls. Rita and her boyfriend were walking to their apartment. As they were about to step inside their bedroom was empty. They went to the kitchen and began to talk. After the conversation she invited him over to hang out. He said no and didn't want to go.

Tree. I loved going to the tree house. I would try to hang from the trunk as I climbed. One day, a big storm came through and a large tree fell. My friend was the only one able to reach me in time. I was happy to see him and climb again.

The Wait Game. Nancy was at a party. She was supposed to meet up with her friend to have drinks. When she got to the party she noticed her friend hadn't turned on the lights. Nancy asked her friend if he had turned on the lights. Her friend told her not to worry about it because it wouldn't be late.

School dance. The school dance was in two days. The girls were very nervous. They sat in a circle waiting to be told who would be dancing. They didn't know what to do. It turned out they all got to dance together.

Getting a Raise. Molly and her friends decided they wanted to start a business. They went to the store and bought supplies. They bought an electrician and a truck. They went back to school and worked hard on their business. They are now earning money from their business.

Giving Up. Nina had always wanted to become a teacher. She was happy with what she had done in school. When she graduated college she applied for all the jobs. She applied for all of the jobs that she was interested in. She was accepted and became a teacher.

Thunderstorm. It was dark and very windy outside. A hurricane was coming in at full force. Amy and her family packed up all the things they could carry. They packed up their stuff and went inside the house. Amy and her family were able to watch the storm from inside the house.

Ball Game. Sara and her friends decided to go to the baseball game. They got tickets, and packed into the car. They set up their seats and started the car. When the first pitch was thrown, Sara screamed in joy. Sara's friend jumped up and laughed with her.
Enchanted Village. Kelly had never been to a carnival. She decided to go to a fancy one. At the carnival they had a lot of different shows. They had so many floats and rides. Kelly really enjoyed it.
Popout. Tom wanted a new stereo. He went to the store and bought a small one. Tom bought it at the lowest price. He took it home and put the amp in. It worked great with the amp Tom bought.

Quex Quacker. Susie was at the local supermarket. She noticed a large quantity of cheese on display. She had to decide how to buy it. She ordered cheese from a nearby shop. At checkout, she realized the cheese was the cheapest.
Paid to stand in line. Kate was going to wait in line for her friend. It was raining hard. She was about to run out of breath. Luckily the line started to close. Kate was able to get in the car.

barn raising. A young boy needed some money for Christmas. He saved up for a few months. He started to go to the local animal shelter. He made some good friends there. They bought him his Christmas present.
Dog. I was walking my dog. He was walking back into the yard. I took him and put him down. He jumped up and grabbed my leash. He ran off into the yard.

Art Obtains Understanding. John was bored in class. He decided to take up painting. John painted a picture of his school's mascot. John's teacher noticed the painting. She appreciated the work that John did for his teacher.

Crazy. I walked up to the park with my dad to watch my sister's favorite baseball team play. We arrived at the park just as the game began. Our first pitch was a foul ball on the shortstop. It was just a baseball so we laughed and laughed. The team won the game, giving them a chance to beat the opponent.

Room for Happiness. Kate bought a new room in her condo. It was a big room and there were lots of windows. Kate was getting bored and asked the receptionist to find something else. Kate was told it was too expensive and would take a while. Luckily, the receptionist agreed and Kate bought more space.

Long Time. John was in his first year of university. He loved the university and was always getting good grades. However, John did not get along with many people at his classes. Eventually, John decided to quit his first year of university. John was glad he decided to quit as he didn't enjoy it very much.
The Eggs. Tom wanted to have breakfast in the morning. He grabbed a handful of eggs. He took out the whites and yolks. He put them in a pan. He fried them up and ate them.

Cooking. It was dinner time. I was sitting at the table eating my favorite meal. I got up and started to make some coffee. Suddenly I smelled something burning. I called the fire department and got an ambulance.

Need feet to run. Barry wanted to learn how to run. He bought a pair of shoes that were too big. The shoes made him jump a lot. Barry ran out of the house before his mother could catch him. Barry had to learn how to walk again.

Jackson. Jackson was very shy. Jackson told his mother that he liked being in the front. Jackson's mother told him to be more confident. Jackson talked to himself. Jackson talked to his mother that he was more confident in front.

Snowball Fight. Travis was playing in a snowball fight in his backyard. He was trying to do the most damage but it was his brother's team. He had thrown the snowball the wrong way so it hit him in the face. The snowball was all over him. He was scared, but luckily his brother was not hurt.
Sugar. John loved to drink soda. He thought it was the best tasting. John decided to try to improve his taste buds. He started drinking more water. Eventually, his soda taste improved.
Dishonest Andrea. It was Andrea's birthday. She had put a dollar in her wallet. She wasn't sure where it was. She called her sister. She was embarrassed and blamed the money for the mess.

Too Big To Flush. I just took my son's first steps. He didn't know how to walk, and he was very big. He pushed me and started to fall. I told him he couldn't do that. I told him I was giving him the same punishment.

Sunday Morning. The Smiths were in bed for an hour listening to music. They all decided it was time to go to the park for a walk. As they walked down the street it started to rain. They started to cry. They ran back inside, hoping the rain would stop.

Bitcoin. Sam wanted to buy something online. He started looking online for a coin. He found a coin that was worth millions. Sam decided to buy that coin. Sam later learned the coin had become worthless.

Driving. Ava was nervous about the next step in her road trip. She would be driving her parents to their new house. They'd taken a trip through Arizona. Ava decided to get a new car since it would be faster. She was ecstatic when they arrived in Denver.

Making a Video Game. I was playing a video game. I wanted to make a video game. I saw all of the games online for free. I decided to make a video game about a dog. I made a fun video game about the dog that I wanted to share.

Rhonda Visits a Museum. Rhonda is excited to go to a new museum. She will try to find something new to see. She has no idea what to expect. She finds a museum where people work in antique shops. Rhonda is able to explore the museum.
Wine Lover. A woman walked by a wine shop in the street. She decided to buy some. She took some of her own wine. When she got home she enjoyed it. She loved the delicious wine.

Cattle. One day, I went on a field trip with some friends. We went to the barn, and met two of the family. We watched cows getting milked and fed. We bought a cow, and we got to know her. She had a great time, and is very sweet.
Final Exam. Alex had to study for the final exam. He got up to go find his textbooks. The test was about to start. He found his textbooks and sat down. He had a lot to learn about the course.

The late gift. Jan and Jamie had just opened a Christmas gift exchange. The gift was to a dog that Jamie's mother had lost. Jamie was shocked to see that the dog's name was not given. The gift exchange was for a cat, a gift she always wanted. Jamie was glad to hear that she would not have to pay a shipping charge.

The Swimming Competition. Sarah was swimming in the pond. She was going slowly because she was in a hurry. The teacher called her to her feet. Sarah jumped right into the water. Sarah was disqualified and did not participate in the competition.
Patience. I bought my wife a watch a few months ago. It was a very nice watch. She wore it everyday. It stopped working one day. I had to call her and get a new watch.

Family Ski Trip. Tom was a new snowboarder who loved to snowboard. His sister in law worked for the city in the snowboard industry. Tom's sister in law offered him the chance to snowboard on her private land. He accepted and went down to the private land. He was happy to be skiing on her land and she was happy to be with him.
Tornado in the Mind. The family was in the basement. The house was really active. A large tornado came right through. A lot of people were inside. It was the worst tornado they had ever seen.

Bad Christmas. Christmas was a difficult time for Jill. Christmas morning was stressful and hard. As Christmas was approaching, Jill's husband was sad. Jill found out that her husband had gotten sick. She went to bed thinking she was the bad Christmas gift.

Sweater. Teddy was in a small field one summer. There was a hot day and the temperature was high. A few birds chirped as they flew over Teddy's head. He was sweating and tired as he watched. A dog suddenly appeared and came to him, giving him a warm embrace.
Fishing Trip. The family went fishing. They spent hours on the boat. They caught everything they could. They went back to the cabin. They went to their campsite for a BBQ.

Spanish Test. I had a Spanish test coming up and I didn't know how to prepare. I didn't want to study but I really wanted to pass. I studied extra hard but still failed the test. I knew it would hurt a lot to fail the test so I stayed up all night studying. Finally the next day I got my test and I passed it!

Wire Hangers. There was a problem with a woman's apartment. She broke her wires in the middle of the night. She was very angry and demanded to know why. She told the landlord that she had to do it herself. The landlord told her she was lucky to be so lucky.
World view. I was walking down the beach. I saw a lot of sand and rocks. Suddenly, I saw that it was getting dark. I took a look at my map to see where it was. It was just me and a huge rock.
Rainy Day. One day, the rain began to pour. I was tired from the long day of work. I went downstairs to take a nap. I began to feel better. It was a beautiful day.

Glenda. Glenda went shopping at the local store. She bought several items for her house. Glenda's mom was in the kitchen making dinner. Glenda noticed a box of chocolates and wanted them. She quickly grabbed the chocolates and went home.

Family. My mom was very sad about the way she got married. She didn't know if she would like it or not. Her first year of marriage, she was so depressed. She wanted to break up with her husband. She finally asked her mother if she would marry her boyfriend.

Flat Tire. Tim was driving to work. There was a flat tire in the middle of the highway. Tim tried to pull over, but the tire was too big. Tim wound up crashing into another car. Tim got a ticket for failure to use the stop sign.
Riding Lawn Mower. Kathy had a lawn mower. It needed maintenance every month. She got it fixed at a local garage. She took it to a mechanic. They fixed it for her and she paid them.
Leaving. I had been a very lonely person. I was going through a divorce and wanted to leave. I wanted to go to Mexico. I thought I would spend it in a safe place. Unfortunately, the divorce stopped.

Boring Main Event. Last Saturday night at the show, they had a very boring main event. They put up a poster that said the show was over. The crowd was very angry. One of the guys punched a man in the face. He got suspended from the show.
Chair Claimed. Joe is driving to work. He is stuck in traffic. Joe pulls over to the side of the road. A stranger spots him. He throws him a chair and tells him that it is his.

Running. Molly had been running for her whole life. She loved running and was excited when she could finally run with her friends. At the end of her first mile, she ran out of gas and started to slow. After a long, painful race, Molly was finally able to run to her next stop. She was proud and thrilled to have achieved her goal.
Fired in One Day. Mary's friends invited her to hang out. She wanted to see what was up. She went out to the mall. She went in a different store. She left without doing anything.

The Spite of Rodents. Gina had heard that dogs are very social and playful. She had watched her dogs being taught to swat things and chase people. One day, Gina's dog came running towards her house. She ran inside and got out of the way as she heard a loud howl. She saw the dog on the floor next to a box of kittens.

Softball Tryouts. I went to a softball tryout at my school. I was really nervous and very eager. I ran through some of the drills. I went on to win the tryout. I went home excited about the softball season.

New Sister. Rita's brother had a new sister. She was beautiful, very pretty and very sweet. Rita felt jealous of her brother. She told her mother to tell Rita she would leave her alone. Rita was too young to leave, but she didn't care because she wanted her brother.

Drews big date. Drews girlfriend broke up with him and he was sad. He didn't know what to do. He decided to go on a date with a boy who was his friend. The two went out one night. They had a great time, and Drew was glad he found someone new.

First Day. Samantha was excited for her first day in school. Her mother was taking her to the office. She ran in the hall and made it to the office early. She didn't get into her office until after lunch. She realized she was too tired.

Water Slide. There was a big water slide at the local park. The kids all loved it. Some of them decided to make water slides too. It got really crowded so it was closed for an hour. We were so happy to have it back.

The Blender. Anna made herself a delicious ice cream. When she got home she mixed it up with strawberries. She added in vanilla and a few others. When she tasted it she was very impressed. It was the best ice cream she had ever made!

Scared. Miguel and his friend were at the park. Their parents told them they were scared of heights. One day, Miguel climbed a great big tall tree. The parents warned the kids to never go near a big tree again. Miguel and his friend were afraid they would fall from the tree.

Joy. I was watching the television last night. The network was trying to get its viewers to buy a new computer. I looked up my favorite show on Amazon. I ordered a laptop and a tv. The first time I turned it on the screen was white.

The Compassion Of Crazy. Gina was so scared for her baby. He was diagnosed with a rare and horrible disease. He died in the first day of his 2nd week of life. He was the most beautiful child she ever had. Gina wanted to say thank you to her doctor.

Countdown. It was an especially rainy day. Andrea decided to walk outside in the rain. But then her foot slipped out of her shoe. The shoe cracked and she had to get it replaced. Andrea was so embarrassed to go outside again.

The bird. The family was visiting a pond. All of a sudden, they saw a large red bird. They decided to get him to their car and play with him. They got up, grabbed his tail, and put him in the back seat. The next day, the family found him dead on the spot.

Waterfall. Linda had a big dream. She wanted to have her own waterfall. She went to the local playground with a large group of friends. Linda tried for a while but couldn't get her hands on a ladder. Eventually she realized that she wouldn't get much further than the playground.
Ride. It was raining hard. I was in a hurry. I didn't have the time to go home. I had to ride to work. It was hard.
An accident. Mia had her bike stolen. She was scared of the police. The police showed up and arrested her friend. They brought her back home. The police gave Mia a ride back to her house.
Coffee Coffee Coffee. My co-worker is from Florida. She got a coffee roaster for the office. I was really excited to get my own. She made me a cup. It was so good I was glad I had gotten a free one.
J'accuse!. Tina was dating someone. It was an extremely beautiful boy. Tina's family was not pleased. They were mad at Tina for dating such a handsome boy. Tina told the boy off in a very nasty way.

Wild Scare. Tim's parents were at the grocery store. They were making dinner and looking through boxes. Suddenly they heard some noises. It turned out it was a wild bear on the loose. They were forced to evacuate the house and call the police.

Cancun. Cancun was my favorite vacation spot in the world. I took a trip to Cancun and had a great time. I had so much fun that I had to take a vacation too. I decided to take a trip back to Cancun in five years. I hope the trip there is as successful.

Laundry. Anna was busy at work and didn't have time to do her laundry. Her house smelled strange and there was some mold. Anna rushed to her neighbors house. They told her they had the mold. They told her she had to clean it out.

computer class. One day I was watching video games on my laptop. After a few minutes I noticed that one of the games was freezing. I looked down to see a broken screen on the floor. The teacher had to call me out and we both got punished for playing without permission.

Lasagna. Gina had never been to Lasagna. She decided to see if they had lasagna in their stores. She was surprised to see that they did. She ordered two large lasagna rolls and three small. Gina was happy that they had Lasagna.
The New Bike. Tim was riding a bike. He was having fun. Suddenly a truck ran into the middle of the road. Tim swerved off of it. The driver hit Tim.

New PHone. Kate went on a date to a restaurant with her new phone. The restaurant was really crowded. Kate was not a very good conversationalist. The waitresses at the restaurant made her feel like a fool. Kate never went on a date to a restaurant again.

Rock climbing fun. One day I decided I wanted to rock climb. I gathered all my gear and started to climb. I loved the first few moves and was very confident. As I got higher, my hand started to hurt. However, luckily, a friend convinced me to climb the next move.

Angry Mom. Lorrie was walking home from school one day. She was frustrated because she wasn't getting any food. Suddenly, she noticed a mom on the corner who was carrying a bag. She began talking to her and talking loudly. The whole street began to get really mad at her and her mother.

Lunchtime. Today is our last day in the house. My husband and I decided to go to lunch. When we arrived, we noticed a large crowd. We waited for 20 minutes for someone to come. We went to our seats and started eating.

The Bears Game. The Bears were playing the Packers in the NFC championship game. They led by 3 points at the half. Suddenly, the Packers scored and gave it away. The Bears had to win by a field goal. They did!

The Roadside. One night, my friend and I were stuck on the side of the road. I went to my friend's house and told her we're stuck on a road. She looked at me strangely and told me we can go anywhere. She took me to her house and she brought me some bread and hot sauce. We left the road and I had the best time on the trip.

Jay's Garage. Jay was starting to build his garage. He spent all summer building it. One afternoon, he accidentally set it on fire. Jay was grounded for a month. But he never regretted his garage's construction.

Sick Day. Sam was going to the beach with his friends. All the sudden they woke up and had to go home. Sam didn't think he had been sick all day. He called his friend to apologize and he felt bad. He thought of all the things he would miss being in the sun.

Barking Dog. Lacey had her dog Barking Dog. It didn't bark when she went outside. Lacey didn't care. Barking Dog kept barking at the top of her lungs. Lacey decided not to let Barking Dog out after all.

Release the Stress. Jill was tired of her relationship with her boyfriend. She decided to leave him. She got into a huge fight with him. He broke up with her and got into a car accident. Jill had to take care of the baby in the car.

City. Tanya and her husband were traveling to the city. Tanya was excited to see all the buildings she'd never seen before. She even found a huge old church on her way there!However, Tanya got off on the wrong foot when she realized they only had $100 in their pocket. Tanya vowed to never spend such a small amount again.

Bomb threat. My brother in law got in trouble recently. He's a terrorist, he told me he would bomb the house. I told him he could be arrested if he did it. I decided to try to call his cell phone. The cell phone was dead, so I went and got the real phone instead.

Rocket Surgery. My son, Robert, had a minor car accident. He had to go through surgery. When he came back, his heart was beating wildly. He was crying the entire time. Robert got some blood thinners and was able to go home.

Gum Hair. Barry was eating at a restaurant. He ordered gum. He looked at the gum and found out he was getting gum all over. He took off all of the gum and left the restaurant. His parents called the police.

Plane. One day, I found a flyer for a flight from Boston to Las Vegas. When I got home, I printed it out. It was printed on a giant poster. As I went about the house, I decided to put the flyer in my closet. In two days, I went back to get a new flyer from Boston to Las Vegas.

Lucretia Prints Her Paper. Lucretia decided to print her papers. She purchased a special paper maker. When she was done, she printed all of her papers. She was not satisfied with her print quality. Lucretia had to return her expensive printer.

The Accident. Miguel was driving home after dinner. While he was in the back seat he hit a bump in the road. He was in so much pain and couldn't even keep his eyes open. He had to be pulled out of the car by his friends and nurse. Miguel had to get it taken care of but he's okay now.

Christmas shopping. My husband and I were shopping for Christmas presents. I got the best presents and bought some Christmas clothes. I also got gifts for the whole family. We finally settled on a nice dress for everyone in the family. Everyone was happy when we got the dress!

unrealistic. Gina's mother was giving her a test to get her GED. She was struggling with it, but she didn't want to fail. She had a few questions she didn't know, but tried to make sense of it. When it was over, she decided it was too difficult. But she was happy to know that she could always get another GED.

Clown Lover. There was a clown at the carnival last weekend. We were very scared to come and sit with him. One of the clown's faces appeared. We all got scared and wanted to go home. The clown was so cute and we enjoyed it.

Fire. Kelly woke up feeling very tired. She decided to put on some new clothes. She ran down to the laundromat to wash her clothes. She started washing the clothes. Kelly was able to clean her clothes and get dressed.
Games. Ruth's son was playing the new videogames. She had no idea what he wanted to play. She decided to play his favorite game. He hated the game. She decided not to play it.
Pizza Delivery. Kelly was ordering a pizza. She was so excited to get the pizza. It was placed in her house. The pizza came. Kelly ate her delicious pizza.

Disney World. We went to Disney World with our two kids. The kids were having a fun time on the hot tub. They were going through the rides on their boardwalk. When they were all cool down, they went to a bar. It was an hour and they did not want to go home.
The Pets. I went to the store today to buy a pet. I saw some cats, dogs and other pets. They cost a lot of money. I decided to try a puppy for a pet. I took the puppy home and it ended up loving me.

The suet and the squirrel. Rita was feeding her kittens a suet bowl. Suddenly, she saw a squirrel in the bowl. Rita grabbed the squirrel, but it ran away. When she came back, she was afraid of her new pet squirrel. Luckily, the squirrel was shy, and she had no issues with it.

The Football game. The boys were at recess, having fun. They were all watching the game on tv. All of a sudden, the game started to get competitive. The boys got angry and started fighting. The game ended up in a draw.

Ears. One day, Sara had a horrible ear infection. Sara's parents took her to the doctor for an exam. Sara took a series of tests and came home. The doctor said she had earwax all over her ears. Sara was not pleased about the discovery.

Work's a Beach. The sun went down, so I had to sleep under the stars. My friends and I had been all day, so I was tired. We spent all day playing video games. I woke up late to get home for dinner. I was tired, and didn't feel like working on my laptop.

Apartment Repairs. One morning I went to my landlord's building to have the pipes inspected. They told me the pipes are broken. They said I need to make some repairs and I will have to go to the fire department. I agreed and went to the fire department. I called the insurance company to have it repaired.

Bad temper. I started getting into arguments with my brother. I started to lash out. He began to yell at me. Eventually I had to get him out of the house. His temper got so bad that he ended up in the hospital.

Picnic Clean Up. We took a group of four girls to a small river. There were no boats to bring in the kids, so it was a clean up. We set up a camp out in the river and watched the water. There were so many creeks and creekside picnic spots!It was a fun day to camp and relax.

Morning. Amy woke up early and went for a run in the park. She felt great having a good run. It was a nice sunny day. She loved it so much she decided to go for a walk. It was very hot and Amy ended up feeling much better.

Rally. Kelly was going to the rally with her friends. She brought her bike and was going to the right when a car came. It pulled up and her friends couldn't see anything and she ended up getting hit. Her bike had been totaled. She was able to repair it herself and made the trip home.

New candy shop. Tina and her friend wanted to go to a candy shop. Their friends drove them there. There they ate lots of candy. After a while Tina's friend got sick. She got a stomach ache for the rest of the trip.

Cook Work. Natalie took a cooking class at her local college. At first, Natalie was confused about cooking. At first Natalie did not know how to make her food in the kitchen. She eventually learned. Natalie loved cooking her food.

Chess. Alexia had always liked playing chess. She would sit in front of the computer and play every chance she got. One day, she played the top player in her league. After she won, she watched him walk to the locker room. He was too old and frail to play chess with her.

Gamestop. Mary was shopping at a mall. She noticed a game that she had never heard of. Mary browsed it, and found one that looked familiar. When she finally got it she started to play it. Mary was hooked and was glad that she didn't miss her birthday.
Detention. Marge was on her way to work. She noticed that a cop was following her. He was very suspicious. He pulled her over. He then arrested her for a minor offense.

Frank's Diet. Frank's doctor told him he has high cholesterol. Frank started to do some exercise. He decided to eat less sugar. His cholesterol began to go down. Frank's doctor told him that he could stay on a low-fat diet for the next six months.

The Dusty Puppy. Susie was picking up her kids from school. Her kids were excited about their new toy. She heard a loud crash. She looked under the couch to see what was going on. She saw a dusty puppy sitting on the carpet all alone!

Mascara. Kim was very tired of her face looking terrible. Kim wanted a new look and this was her choice. She decided to buy a mascara. She tried it on and it was very successful. Kim loved the look she got!

Our Visit. Our family went to the park today. We all have our own special gifts. I bought a new pair of shoes from the store. My daughter bought a pair of socks from the mall. We all got dressed and headed back home.

Cockroach. Allie is scared of cockroaches. She went to the flea market one night. She was looking for a cockroach to purchase. She found an old pair of ear muffs that were used. Allie bought them for fifty dollars and never used them again.

Survival. Liz had just moved into a new apartment. She had just started her apartment. She needed to learn how to keep her stuff together. She found a survival book and started doing research. Within a few days Liz was very well prepared.
Bread. Kelly went to the grocery store with her friend. She bought a dozen boxes of bread. They all had baggies of sourdough bread. Kelly loved the sourdough bread. She went home and ate it all.
Tired in the line. Kate was going on a hike. But she couldn't find her way. She looked everywhere. But she realized she was stuck in the line. And she got stuck in her chair.

Case. Jane was very stressed and nervous at school. Jane's friend offered to help her take her homework from home. Jane asked her friend to take the homework for her. Jane thanked her friend and left her home. After a week she felt much better.
Cat Fur. Kate was playing with her cat. She was trying to brush her hair off. Kate was making a mess. Her cat was staring at her. Kate took the cat to the vet.

Car Wash. Trevor decided to take his car out of the wash to do some work. After it washed, he put it back in the washing machine. After he was done with the machine, he turned on the washing machine. He got in his car and began to walk to the car wash. After he got back, he cleaned up the car.

The preconceived notion. Alex was nervous. He had read that a cat was a good pet. The family got some cat food and tried the cat for the first time. When Alex's little brother saw the cat he felt good. He thought it was so cute he had a name.
Reenactment. Sally and Bill were playing at the mall. The kids had brought a fake castle. The kids pretended to attack a castle. Sally screamed and cried. The real castle didn't fall.

Brad and the water life. Brad needed to go on vacation with his friends. They were going to go swimming. But the water was very rough. Brad's friends were afraid to swim in the deep. Brad decided to go home early.

Taxi. I took a taxi from a small village to my home. There was no street light in the village, so I had to drive down. I was nervous because the taxi would be late, but luckily it was only 5 minutes. I was nervous because it was a taxi for one hour and it was only 5 minutes. I ended up making it in time!

Nature. It was the last day of summer and I was out of shape. My mother decided to take me to the zoo for a stroll. While I was there I visited the bears and monkeys. While I was there I saw a snake. My mother said that it was too gross.

Ben's new pet. Ben was excited to get a new pet. He went online to find the perfect pet. Ben bought the perfect pet cat. The cat was very loyal and he really enjoyed the cat. Ben's cat really enjoys his new pet.
Larkscall. Bobby was playing outside. It was sunny out. He saw a larkcall. He got into the swing of things. He ended up hitting a homerun.
Tennis. Tennis was on his way to work. He had a tennis match at the park. He couldn't make it there fast enough. He called for help but it was late. He had to go home and get dressed.

Christmas Morning. Anna had just finished her first class of the morning. When the class started, everyone was quiet. Anna started to get up and went to greet her class mates. She told her mom what had happened and got her breakfast. Anna was happy that everyone was nice and woke up in the morning.
Tabby. Tabby went to the vet and got a shot. She was getting ready to move to New York City. She came back a few weeks later. The vet had to remove one of her legs. Now Tabby is an adult mouse!
Forgotten toothbrush. Anna got a new toothbrush. When she put it on she forgot to turn it on. She had to take it out. Later she realized that it was broken. Anna regretted her mistake.

Homemade Cards. My friend was making a game of cards with his daughter. The kids wanted to win, but not to get too involved. He played some cards with them and let them loose. They all had fun but I won the game. I had to get a new pair of cards and spend a lot more money to keep them.

On the Subway. I was on a trip to visit my friends. It was my first time using the subway. As soon as I got off the subway, I was scared. I turned on the lights and started to walk. My friends gave me a hug and goodnight.

No Kenny. The boy and his dad decided to go swimming in the lake. Their dad got stuck in the middle of the lake. Kenny got out of the car and tried to get out of it. He got stuck in the middle of the water, making it hard for him. He was finally pulled out, but no Kenny!

Torn Pantyhose. Sue was getting ready for the school dance. She realized that her pantyhose were torn. She put them back on before she headed out the door. There was a fight in the room!Sue had to get out of the room before the music began!

Valentine's Gifts. Sam's girlfriend wanted him to take a nice gift to her. They didn't know what to give her. Sam's girlfriend told him it's a good idea to take a picture. Sam took a nice picture of her in his car with the gift. They exchanged gifts afterwards.

Gayle's chores. Gayle was a very independent woman. She wanted to get her own place but could not afford one. She decided to help her friend make things for themselves. She hired a handyman and a mowing machine. The friend was amazed at the results and gave Gayle a big tip.
Working hard. Jared worked at a coffee shop. He made good money. He saved money for his future. Unfortunately, Jared got very sick. He was laid off.

Metabolism or illness. I was feeling sick all morning, so I decided to go to the gym. I found my way there and began exercising, but I didn't feel very good. It took me all of an hour to even feel comfortable in my own body. In the end, I decided to stop exercising, and start eating better. Now, my body is very clean and my health is better!

I Almost Killed Myself Playing Pokemon Go. Last night I was playing Pokemon Go in my town. I went out to my house and I was playing the game. Suddenly, I felt a sharp pain on my foot. I ran to the bathroom and called the police. The police brought me to the hospital for a cast.

Chef's Kitchen. I was invited to go to my favorite Chinese restaurant for dinner. The chef was great, and I really liked his food. When we got there, he offered me a seat at the main course. I was not a huge fan of the steak and noodles, so I declined. The server was happy to have me back, and she tipped my credit card bill.

James's New Job. James loved his job as a bartender. One day, he was about to go out on his first date with a girl. She was only a college student, but they didn't meet up and they didn't meet anyone else. As they were going out, the police pulled them over. The girl was arrested and James had to return to his old job.

Macy's Favorite Ice Cream. Macy really loved ice cream. She was a huge ice cream lover. On a trip to her grandparents' house she wanted ice cream. She got her sister's car keys to go to the drive thru. Macy went inside to get her ice cream treat.

Mule and Plow. I was driving home from work. I saw a deer in the field. I slowed down to let him pass me. My tractor hit a mule and plowed into it. I stopped to look at the scene, but couldn't believe what I saw.

The Jail. I was in jail for my own protection. It wasn't like a prison where you get to do what you want. I would get my friends and family to come over so I could play. After a while, the jailer took away our cell phones. I got my cell phone back and I can talk to everyone on the other end.

Keep on Giving. Rita had been a very active person since she was a teenager. She'd worked very hard to save for a college education. Finally she was able to save for college, and enrolled. The college she attended was not a very good fit for her. She was unable to find a better school for her.

Working Stores. Jane had been working for almost a year as a cashier at a store. She felt comfortable doing her job well, and liked it. But on the second day, she felt like she wasn't making any money. The people in the store were very rude and abusive. Jane decided she would quit at that point.

Goaltending. I decided that I wanted to play goalie for a school club. I asked my best friend for advice. He suggested I practice for a month. After I practiced for a month I played well. My friend said that he would have recommended a goalie if I hadn't practiced.

Banana boat. Tina had always wanted a banana boat. She had a friend tell her that she could get one. One night when Tina was walking down the street she heard a noise. She looked and saw a huge banana boat on the side of the road. She could not wait to have a banana boat with her and her friends.

The Beach. Kia took her kids to the beach. The kids loved playing on the beach. But, the water was not deep enough for their swimming skills. Kia took them to the ocean and they swam for hours. Now, Kia is glad she took them to the beach.
Lost for Awhile. I found a lost dog in the street one night. He was so cute I ran after him. I couldn't find him for hours. I finally found him in the morning. It was in the back yard.

New Shoes. Jane had an expensive pair of shoes. Jane decided to buy a pair of cheaper ones. Jane went to the store to look at the different options. She looked in a lot of colors and made a decision. Jane decided to get a new pair of shoes.

The Fireman's Dog. The dog was trying to help a firefighter. He was carrying a large box. The fireman accidentally set the box on fire. The dog took off running after the fire. The fireman ran after him and called the fire department.

The New Alphabet. Tanya decided she wanted to learn to spell. She tried to use her alphabet and try different words. Tanya tried to memorize her alphabet. Eventually Tanya got good enough to spell her name correctly. Tanya now knows to spell her name correctly.

Time Lost While Playing. Kia was playing a video game online. Suddenly she dropped the game. She had to go to the store to get it back. She spent over an hour searching. Luckily she was able to get it fixed by the end of the day.
The Cat. Julie wanted a cat. She thought she'd have a kitten. So she got a stray cat. But the stray cat didn't do a good job at anything. Julie gave it up and went back to her normal diet.
Spoiled. Lucy was walking home from school one day. She saw a bottle of milk in the grass. She began to pick it up. It spilled out. She had to return it and buy some more.

Can't see who's calling. Jenny was going outside to play with her dog. When she went to the door, she saw a man. He was telling her he was calling his wife. She looked at him, realizing he didn't have her number. She was sad he didn't have his number.

Animal safari fun. Sam had always wanted to go on a safari. He could never afford one and he had no money. He decided to sign up for one. He put in his reservation online. He bought a ticket the next day.

Out of Beer. I am very happy that I am not drinking any beer today. All of my friends are drinking it. But I feel much worse for it. The beer makes me feel really sick. I hope that my friends are going to take me away to see a doctor.

Home Econ. My family was so excited about the big new homeWe took it to the realtors in our area for a quick inspection. After several days of looking, the home was finally listed. They gave me a pretty nice deal on the home and I'm very happy.
Cranky. Jill was a very clumsy person. Every day she could barely walk. One day she went for a jog. Suddenly, she had to fall in the water. Luckily, she didn't break her ankle.

Can't Click Away Fast Enough. I was watching Netflix. I had to stop and start the TV. I realized I was not sure what show to start. I clicked away for a while. Unfortunately I did not notice any new shows start up.

Too Hot For Ice Cream. Kelly was at her sister's house. She was watching TV while eating a chocolate cake. She decided to order some ice cream. The restaurant told her that it was too hot to ice cream. She had to return the ice cream to the store.
My niece. My niece was in the car today. It was her first day of high school. She has just started. Today was especially hard. Her teacher told her how good it would be to grow up.

Jacob Breaks His Phone. Jacob was browsing Facebook when he saw a photo of a boy. He noticed a picture of his brother, who was also bored. Jacob decided to ask his friend on FB if he wanted to hang out. His friend invited Jacob to the park, and Jacob started hanging out. Jacob was excited when he found out he broke his phone.
Riley is too loud. Riley was watching TV. He was listening to a movie. Suddenly, his TV turned on. Riley could hear the TV playing. Riley began to yell and shout.

Elizabeth can't kick. Elizabeth is a kickboxer. One day a man named Frank tried to hit her. She kicked him in the back of the head. He started bleeding profusely. Elizabeth took him to the hospital and got stitches.
Cleaning the house. Kim decided to get out the house. She had been cleaning for 2 hours. She decided to take a shower. When she was done, she was ready to go. Kim got home and finished her chores.

Too Fat. Molly and her mother went to a buffet. Molly wanted to get away but she was too fat. Her mother told her to go get some ice cream. Molly got ice cream from the buffet instead of the buffet. Molly's mother was very upset.

Small world. Gina had always wanted to become a small world. Her family always wanted her to be like her. Then one day she decided to ask her father to buy her the world. Her father was so thrilled. He agreed and she began to live on a tiny planet.

Going to School. Sam was very tired and hungry. He decided to get to school early. He made sure to get his lunch ready at home first. Once he got to school, he found a seat next to his class. Sam was very excited to be going to school.

Mahabharata. I read the Mahabharata in a quiet corner of my house. It was on a shelf where my parents would not see it. I found the book in the night and read it until sunrise. It was a lovely story about how two great people meet. I read it for hours that day and fell in love with Mahabharata.

Blanket head. A man went to a store and bought a cheap blanket head. He forgot the blanket head was made of fabric. The man put the blanket head up on the shelf to look for a replacement. Several men came by and began taking the blankets off of the shelves. A few of the men put the blanket head back up on the shelf.

The Promotion. John was a salesman at a local auto parts store. A competitor had recently introduced their new truck to the dealership. The competitor got the dealership's attention. The competitor offered John a promotion. John accepted the offer and worked for them for the rest of the year.

Sledgehammer. Sasha was learning to build a new set of hammers. She decided to try to build the perfect set. She took her hammer to a garage sale to look for the perfect hammer. At the end of the day, Sasha couldn't decide between the three models. Sasha decided to buy the blue one and throw away all the blue ones.

Being rude. Jill was very polite in her meetings. But she still had to call a few people. She would say something to everyone and they would forget. One day she ended up talking to a teacher. And she got a zero on her report card.

Test. John wanted to see what the tests were like. He made an appointment to take the tests. On the day of the test, he had no sleep and was nervous. He failed all of the tests. John decided to not do his test this time around.

The Pencil. One day, Amy's class was supposed to study for a science test. They were allowed to bring out their pencils. Amy was excited because her pencil had a special writing function!She filled the pencil in with a letter and began writing. Her paper was good, and she scored a perfect 100!

The Babysitter. Lori always wanted to be a babysitter. She worked all her life to get her masters degree. At the end of the semester she was excited to start her first job. Lori got to the front desk and started babysitting for the first time. It was great to be a part of a family and loving helping others.

Dark Stranger. Margo had a crush on a boy. She thought the boy was pretty dark. One day the boy asked to see her bathroom. Margo was not comfortable letting him in and he bolted. She was upset that she had to deal with this and she felt silly.

Mounting Bills. Tim and his girlfriend went to an amusement park. There were a lot of rides that he loved. His girlfriend had to walk back and forth from a big roller coaster. It was really annoying. Tim was upset about having to pay a large bill.

Addictive Game. It was my first computer game. It was a very challenging game to learn. I had to memorize all of the instructions. One day I forgot all of them. So I gave up and just got a copy of the game.

Marco Visits Utah. Marco needed to visit his cousin in Utah. He knew he would drive there a lot. So he planned the trip. He drove to Salt Lake City and spent all day in his car. Finally, he had all the money he needed to visit his cousin.
The Interview. Tom is an aspiring actor. He had a casting call for the role of the lead. He prepared very hard. He had rehearsed for weeks. He got the call!

Stray kittens. I was out on a field trip one evening. I took the kids to a field where there were kittens. They went in the cage and looked around. I put one of them in the cage. The other one was nowhere to be found.
Spring Water. We are at the grocery store. There is a woman selling spring water. I bought a small bottle. I put it in my pants pocket. It smells like spring water.

Driving again. Gina had just gotten out of her car and was driving down the road. There was a little girl in the road. Gina slowed down to make sure she was okay. She had a lot of trouble with this little girl. Gina ended up hitting the child on the way home.

Seth Rides a Bike. Seth decides to get a bike for his birthday. He spends a lot of time picking out the right bike for him. He visits many bike shops to check out the different models. He decides to get a mountain bike. Seth is happy that he can finally own a bike.

Ribs. I went to my friends house to eat dinner. I noticed that they were out of ribs. I went to the grocery store and looked at some. I found a pack that I liked. I took it home and put it in my smoker.
Fluffy Socks. One day my wife bought socks. They were white with cute little white ears. When she left she forgot her keys. I had to drive the whole way back to my house. They are no longer cute.
The Dare. Alex and his friend had a big birthday party. Alex got out of bed and went to the kitchen. He started baking cake. His friend came in and Alex helped. The cake was made and Alex was happy.

Battle of the Bands. When a group of teens went out to their neighborhood to play basketball. They began to play basketball, but it became noisy and loud. As the kids continued playing, their opponents began to attack. The kids began fighting and fighting and it was a lot of fun. They were the last to leave because everyone was tired and started to sleep.
Terrible perfume. It was a hot summer day. My favorite perfume was called Bambi. I smelled the scent when I got home. It smelled like the scariest thing I had ever smelled. I was horrified.

The Prisoner. One night, David was walking around a small village in a town called Lufthansa. He saw a prisoner with a strange tattoo on his neck. David was fascinated by the tattoo. He approached the prisoner and asked him a lot of questions. The prisoner confessed and offered to help David get to safety.
Clean Up Your Toys. Kurt went to a toy store. He bought his favorite toy for his son. He walked away with all his toys. His son was upset. He said he was not going to play with those anymore.

Wrestling Show Disaster. A group of fans had gone to see a live wrestling show. The show was starting and they were very excited. They were told it would be a lot of action!The crowd began to roar and were very loud. The show began to suffer from sound issues.

Winner. Tim was running for governor in Minnesota. Tim was very unpopular, and was running under a lot of false promises. Tim ran for many weeks. He lost by a very large margin. He had won the election, and made a great governor.
The Smallest Player. Tim wanted to play football. His dad said he needed to work out. Tim started running and lifting weights. Tim worked out every day. Eventually Tim was able to play football.

New years eve. It was New Year's Eve, but it was cold. They made plans to go to the movies. However, the wind started blowing hard. In addition, there were snow storms that night. The snow made them freeze to death, so they ended up staying indoors.

The Staircase. Maddie had to climb the stairs in her house. She needed to find the key, but she didn't have the key. She looked all over her house but could not find it. Then she realized she had put it in her purse. After she returned it, the wallet was there, safe!

The Cereal. Alicia ordered a bag of cereal at the drive in. The customer told her he had left his money on the table. Alicia had forgotten the money so she asked for the check. The customer gave her $5 but left $100 in cash. Alicia was very upset and she left her money in her purse.

Cleaning Up. Sam was cleaning his car and had forgotten the oil. He went to the garage to see if there was a spare. He found one with a spare and cleaned it. When it was time to get it fixed Sam got in the car. Sam drove the car home.

The Sunglasses. Cathy had a hard time looking at the sun in her glasses. She looked down at the ground for help. Cathy walked into her parents' bedroom. She sat on the bed. Her mother got dressed and Cathy sat down.

mike is angry. Mike is having a really bad day at work. He has been working very hard all day. He goes to the bathroom and sees his phone on the floor. His boss calls him into his office. Mike is fired from his job.
cotton candy. The girls wanted to buy candy. They couldn't decide which ones. The girl in charge said it was cotton candy. She said it was safe to use.

Windy River. I went kayaking down the Windy River. I was trying to get to the parking lot. All of a sudden a truck pulled up and a woman started screaming. I tried to calm her down but she began to cry. I helped calm her down and got out of the kayak.

Laughing. John got a brand new dog. His dog was very funny. He would laugh so hard his parents grounded him. John started laughing and would laugh all the time. Eventually the dog started to get on his nerves.

Pharmacy. When I was young I went to the pharmacy. It was the first place I ever went. I bought a gallon of water. I sat in a big chair and took a couple of swig's. I looked at my phone and it wasn't the same anymore.

The new job. Julian was starting his first job. He was excited to finally start a new job. He got to work right away. He learned how to deal with the demands of the job. Now, he's able to pay the bills on time.

Purchasing Decisions. We went to the bar for our last night out. It was going to be a party of no return. We went with a friend to see what we wanted to drink. After about 15 minutes of talking, I decided on a cocktail. I immediately bought it with my credit card, and it was delicious.

Fire. My mom went to check the fireplace. She tried to reach into the fireplace but it wouldn't turn on. She tried to go inside but it wasn't working. She turned the lamp on but it wasn't working. She tried to turn it on but it didn't work either.

Dumb Prank. Tim's friend made a prank call to his girlfriend. Tim was really scared but he didn't care. He called her back and he had her call a friend for the prank. They all laughed at the same time, Tim was really embarrassed. His friend was really happy he didn't call his girlfriend.

Lola drinks coffee. Lola has been getting sick all of the time. She has not been feeling well lately. One day while she was walking around her neighborhood she ran into a guy. He said he wanted to get coffee. Lola drank a large cup of coffee and it was great.
Michael goes to prom. Michael is excited for prom. He goes to his mom's house to ask for her ring. He does not find it. He finds out it was just thrown away. He regrets not asking for it.

Lanterns. My sister and I lived near the river. We bought a few lanterns for it. When the water got warmer, we lit them up. The water started to fog, and it was very eerie. It made us really want to take a dip in the lake!

Online Chess. Dan was playing online chess with someone else. He tried to get the winning move quickly. The other player was able to stop him before he got to the queen. Dan won and won quickly. Dan went home happy with his money.
