Clams. Climbing mountains had always been an obsession for me. My friends made fun of me because I wanted to climb mountains. Then one day I realized I had a weakness for rocks. I found that climbing a huge rock wall wasn't so hard after all. Soon I was building giant boulders all over the world!

The Dance. Sandy's mother and grandmother had invited her to the dance. As Sandy was getting ready, her mom told her she was going to be late. Sandy panicked. Her grandmother told her to wear a strapless bra. Sandy laughed and wore the strapless bra.

Painting Pottery. Kelly was a college student and her favorite class was pottery. Kelly decided she wanted to learn to paint. Kelly attended classes on how to paint pottery. Kelly was so good that she won first place in her class. Kelly decided that she would try to paint professionally after graduation.

Books. Barry had very few books to read. One day he decided he was going to make some money doing something. He went online and bought a book on Amazon. He signed up to be notified of the books available online. Now Barry gets to read his books online.

Degrees. Lois was graduating from college. She needed to do a degree to work. She applied for a degree program at her local community college. She was given an acceptance letter. She became a licensed nurse.

What did mom tell you  about talking to strangers. Jane was very excited for her son's tenth birthday party. She was so excited that she had a lot of fun. When she got there, her son was still sitting in his chair. His mother came out with a big brown envelope. She read from the envelope that she had brought.
Mturk. It was a hot day in Reno. My friend Joe bought a mturk account. He did not have enough money. He decided to invest more in mturk. Joe made much more money then he ever thought possible.

Leg. The man decided to have a leg amputated. He didn't want it to hurt like a stump. The man went to the doctor and started a procedure. The doctor operated on the man's leg. It hurt, but it worked great.

Elephants. I was playing with some friends. We played in the woods in the middle of the night. Suddenly, I heard my friend yell elephants. The elephants were laughing at me. I ran to my friend and told her I was afraid of elephants.
Volleyball Match. Eugene was competing in a volleyball match. He didn't know what to do. He watched for an hour and then tried to do something. Nothing worked. He went home and cried all night.

A waterfall. Ike was out for a run. He heard the waterfall coming down the path. He decided to run to the edge of the trail. When he got there he saw a waterfall. He ended up getting water stuck in his pants!

Michelle's New Puppy. Michelle had a small dog. She adopted a puppy from the shelter. The puppy loved to run around and play. The puppy had a litter of three puppies. The puppy was the most energetic of the puppies.
The baby won't sleep. Janet was having a baby. She was trying to put her baby to sleep. It was tough to find a comfortable position. Finally she found the perfect pillow. Janet had a great baby.

Growing up. My friend is a teacher. She's coming to my school next week. I asked her to take a trip with us. She agreed and drove a truck to her school. After that we went to her house and talked about her experience.

Grease Fire. One day, a grease fire started in the store. Some of the grease was spilled on the counter. A man got mad and sprayed the grease everywhere. The grease burned people's furniture. Eventually, the grease fire was caught and brought to a standstill.
The Circus. I was on my way to school when I heard a noise. A huge circus had taken place. I quickly ran into the building. The people were so impressed!They all decided to go on the circus one day.

Life Changes. Ralph was a big athlete. He loved football and football would always give him the joy. One day Ralph's football coach decided to switch him to running. Ralph started to lose a lot of weight and he decided to join the team. The coach loved Ralph and gave him a second chance at football.

Pen Caps. A few weeks ago I bought a new laptop computer. It came with a set of pen caps. The pens were great, but my fingers hurt. The pen caps did not do much to alleviate this. I ended up throwing them away and buying a pen.

First Day of Work. Beth has been working for two years now. Her first day of work is today. The new building is so far away. She just needs to get used to being out in the sun. Today will be her first day of sunlight.

No Friends Left. Sara was walking home from school one day. Suddenly, she tripped and tripped on a piece of plastic. Her mother saw her fall and yelled at her. Sara was crying and crying, but her mom made her walk. When she came home, her mother gave her a big hug and said goodbye.

Allergy Medication. Gina was allergic to honey. She always tried to avoid the area around her mouth. One day her mouth was sore and she had a hard time breathing. She took allergy medication. Since then, she has never gotten an allergic reaction to honey.

Sweatpants. Kelly's parents were buying a new house. She wanted to take her clothes shopping. She went to the pantry and bought some extra jeans. Kelly tried them on. They were great and she wore them everywhere.

Angela 5. Angela was looking forward to her big date with her best man. They planned everything for weeks in advance. She was looking forward to the big day. Her day finally came when the big day came. Angela and her man made a beautiful wedding.

Italian. Tim always loved Italian food. His grandma would make it for him when he went out. His grandma also made him some fresh fruit. Tim ate a lot of the fruit with his meal. His grandma always made him a dessert for her.
The Office. Kim was in a new job. She was excited for it. It was her first time in an office. She was having a blast. When she got there it was her favorite thing.
Keurig. I was walking to my office one day. A Keurig came out of a gas station. It had coffee and milk in it. I took a sip of my drink. The Keurig smelled gross, and the coffee was ruined.
Tibet. I wanted to learn Tibetan. My friend recommended I visit Nepal. I went there, and was thrilled. The people there were lovely and kind. I went back home that night with renewed hopes.

Hockey Game. Dan was playing hockey with his friends. They had been drinking the night before. Suddenly, they started to lose their cool. They began throwing bottles at Dan and others. Dan was embarrassed, but knew he would never be able to play again.

The worst cup of coffee. Tara had a very bad morning. She was too lazy to make herself breakfast. So she took her coffee with milk. But then she had no caffeine. Finally, Tara had to make herself some coffee with instant coffee.

gold. Samantha was a little girl. She was always asked for gold by her grandma. She always said no. One day a new grandma came to visit and gave Samantha gold!Now Samantha loves all the candy she gets.
Soft Avocado. We were at the grocery store. We wanted to buy some avocados. There were two different brands of avocados. I picked out the softest avocado. It was very soft and delicious.

The Kiss. My friend and I were playing ball. He was my teammate, and we were both drunk. I told him that I would kiss him, since he was attractive. He said no, but said he could tell. He then asked if I was ready and we kissed.

Trying hard. Ricky is a big soccer player. He gets good practice with his coach every day. One day his coach tells him to try harder to score goals. Ricky does his best to score goals to be closer to his coach. This is Ricky's most successful soccer game.

The broken tail light. Jane was driving down the highway. She had just put her car in park when she noticed a light flashing. She pulled over and it was a broken tail light. She had to call a repairman to fix it. The repairman fixed it within an hour.
Mouse. The man was getting ready to take a shower. He saw a mouse in his bathroom. The mouse wanted to get out of the shower. The man went to get the mouse out. He finally was able to get it out.
Missing the Last Episode. Linda is missing her birthday. Her friends are upset. She asks them what's wrong. They say she had a party. Linda is sad because her birthday is over.
Catch the Thief. I have a neighbor's house. We had a thief come to the house last week. I called the police to report the theft. They caught the thief. I hope we can get him the same thing again.

Contaminated Shorelines. Samantha was walking on the beach one day. She noticed that her sandcastle was very dirty. She was worried that it was contaminated with marine life. She went back to her house and cleaned up the beach. Her beach was clean.
TuTu. I was trying to write a story. I tried to write a really good story. However, I didn't have any good ideas. It took me two months to come up with ideas. I was happy with my story.

Lipstick mishaps. Anna was getting lipgloss done. She wasn't getting what she wanted. She was having a tough time finishing. Then Anna got a new pallette of lipstick. It made everything so much better.

Jackpot. Jackie got a new car that she didn't want anymore. Her friends were offering her some money. Jackie knew she wanted it back and asked if she could have it. The driver said yes. Jackie took the money and ran out the door with it.
Boring Movie. Sara was watching a movie. It was too boring for her. She couldn't finish it. She took it off the big screen. Sara went back to watching the other movies.

John Visits His Grandma. John's grandmother had a large house and a large backyard. John decided to visit his grandmother. John called his grandmother to invite her to come see him. John's grandmother was very excited about going to visit. John had a wonderful time visiting his grandmother.

Clothes Shopping. Amy wanted to buy new clothes for her boyfriend. She had her favorite ones from school. She decided to shop the rest of her collection at a store. When she got home she found her favorite clothes were gone. Amy was furious but eventually got over it.

Brand. John needed to find a brand new shirt. He went to many online stores. He even had some of his friends try on shirts at home. Finally he found one that he liked. John was so happy that he ordered it on the spot.

First day of school. It was April Fools Day in class. Amy was afraid she was going to be late to her first day. She started writing her first report. She was very nervous for her first day of school. The teacher made sure everyone was excited for her.

Tokyo Trouble. When I was in Tokyo, I had a great time at the carnival. I visited many shops and restaurants. I spent a lot of time eating snacks. Afterwards, I went to a nearby amusement park. It was very relaxing.

Nice investment. Sally wanted to learn how to play basketball. Her mom didn't teach her how to play the game. She took her to a local game store. At the game store, Sally found the perfect pair of shoes. She now plays basketball with her mom every week.

Sick Daughter. One of my cousins was having a hard time with his sickness. He had trouble sleeping and couldn't go to school. He decided to take his son to the doctor. The doctor diagnosed him with pneumonia. The boy was put on a cold and has been recovering for awhile.
Failure. Sally was in a hurry to get to work. She got into a big car with her coworker. When she got to work she got out on a hill. She dropped the bottle on the road. The driver was late for work.
Camping. Sally was camping with friends. They had a good time. Unfortunately, Sally got hurt. She had to go to the hospital. Her friends all were sad and disappointed.

Borrowed car. Timmy got a loan to buy a car. He went to his local auto shop and put his credit card down. He then tried to pay for the car. His credit card did not work, and he had to borrow more. Timmy was able to pay off the loan with his own money.

First Time Drinking. Eli's parents had a birthday party for him. They invited all of their friends to come. One of his friends, Alex, was very nervous about going. Alex drank so much that he got sick!He couldn't go to his birthday party after all!

Javier Scores A Goal. Javier is out on the ice for a play. He is skating towards the net. He hits the puck over the top of the goal. The goalie is in shock. He can't make a save because the puck is too far from him.

Noisy Toddlers. My 2 year old granddaughter got into a fight at school. We were very nervous, because we were so close to her. When I got home, I noticed a loud noise. My son had picked her up in a way that was way too loud. We had to take her out of the room to be calmed down.

Fold Them. I got home from school one afternoon and found my favorite stuffed animal on the floor. I picked it up and took it to the pet store to be sold. When I got home I started folding my stuffed animal. When I went to the pet store I put it down. I was a little surprised to find it had folded into a pillow.

Surprise Dinner. The Smiths went to a party at a fancy restaurant. They spent a long time watching movies and talking to customers. After dinner they each ordered a dessert. When it was time to pay the waitress handed them the bills. It was the birthday dinner they had planned all year!

Tornado Alley. Ike and his family was on vacation in southern Florida. They went down to a beach. They all watched a tornado pass over the area. Ike got up and got ready for work. He made a phone call as he walked back to his car.

Bob's Son Hits a Homerun. Bob's son was playing baseball when he hit a homerun. Bob was out of town. He called the ball out for a strike. Bob's son hit the ball through the fence at a good distance. Bob called his son up to play catch in the stadium.

The Epidemic. Diana's dog had fallen on the street. She checked for any sign of infection. The dog had no signs of fleas or bites. Diana decided to take her dog to the vet. The vet gave her a shot, and the dog passed away the next day.

Read to Me. Lisa had her son take a science test. The teacher was not happy with how Lisa's son was doing. Lisa felt she had to give her son a break. Lisa read to her son. Lisa's son scored a C in the test.

Speech. I had a bad experience at my high school graduation. I decided to do speech therapy. When I went to therapy, I felt very self conscious. The therapist tried to help me improve my speaking. When I went home, I learned that speech therapy is helpful.

Newbie. I tried my first coffee yesterday. I took a mug of coffee from the counter. I sat down and ate my first cookie. When I went to the table, I noticed I had a small coffee stain. I immediately looked in the cup and noticed it was the stain from the coffee.

Arm Wrestling. Bob was in the middle of a match with his brother. The brother wrestled him around the arena. Bob was trying to stop him from scoring the pinfall on his brother. His brother wrestled Bob until he was exhausted. Bob was very proud of his brother.

Swimming. When I was a little boy, my dad took me to a swimming pool. The pool was very small, so I got the biggest one. At first I was very scared of it. As I swam past it, I was filled with joy. Afterwards, I realized that the biggest one really is beautiful.

Homework Help. Tom was in the middle of a paper and needed help. He turned to his mom to help him with the paper. She made him pencils, paper and paper towels. He sat down and began to study. He finished his paper with a perfect grade.

NYSE. I was excited to read an article about the recent success of a company. I had followed them on their Facebook page for months. I clicked a few of the links and read about their latest project. I was amazed at how well-run the company was. I now hold the company's stock.

The Find. Kathy had just found a diamond ring. She was really excited because it was really pretty. She rushed to her car and took it home. When she got home, she put the ring on and took a picture. It was the best ring she had ever found.
Candy Store. I decided to visit a candy store. I was very excited. I paid with a debit card to use my credit card. When I got home I went inside. I decided to make my own candy.

Sleepy. Rita wanted to sleep like a baby. She tried to get the baby to nap with her. But the baby kept rolling on his back. After a few minutes, Rita had enough. She took the baby to the doctor and gave him a pacifier.

Kidneys. I had a kidney operation at the age of 45. I had it removed and had to return to a kidney specialist. It was scary and I was very embarrassed. When I was home, I had a lot of fun in bed. Now I just wish I could have had a normal kidney like all the other kids.
Jackie's New Shoes. Jackie wanted a new pair of shoes. She went shopping for a pair of heels. She ended up buying an expensive pair. Jackie was really upset. She hated her new shoes.

No Response. My friend's house had a cat named Lucy. Lucy lived in her cat's kennel. One day, she ran out into the house with a box. Her kennel was on fire!The whole family was scared that Lucy was a terrorist!

Truman's Keyboard. Truman was playing the piano in a class. The teacher had to change the keys for the song. Truman could not figure out which keys to use. He asked the class to use their own. Truman played the song correctly.
Games. I played games for hours. One day, I started feeling terrible. I decided to go to the doctor. He diagnosed me with depression. I took some medication and made sure I was okay.

Mturk. John was playing with his computer. Suddenly he realized his mouse was stuck. He tried several ways to free it. Finally, he went to MTurk. He was able to fix the mouse and get it working again.

Noises. Beth needed to be more quiet in her apartment. She knew her apartment would become noisy one day. She decided to set her alarm and turn off the lights. Beth's neighbors complained and complained that Beth was annoying them. Beth had to be more careful when it came to noisy things.

cookies. Gina decided to make cookies for her friend. She purchased cookies from a store. She set them out on the counter. After a few minutes, her friend brought her home. Gina made cookies and was happy with her new found cookies.

Sign the Autograph. Rita wanted to sign her daughter's basketball jersey. She waited in the bathroom all day to get one. Her daughter was taking an exam on the court. She was on the court when Rita entered the bathroom. Rita signed the jersey and left quickly.

Spin class. Lori was a college student. She needed to learn how to spin. She decided to take a spin class. It took a long time but eventually she was good at it. She now plans to do more spin classes.

The Couch. Karen had a small flat tire. She was driving her car to work one day. She heard a loud crash, and realized there was someone on her back. She realized it was a couch on fire. She called 911, and rushed to the hospital.

Car Accident. My cousin just pulled into our parking lot. He was driving around the block. He was trying to park but the car in front of him slid over the curb. He hit the curb and he ended up being hit by a car. His car went into the snow and he was stuck inside for several hours.

The trip. Sally took her mother to a museum. She really wanted to visit the museum. However, she couldn't find her mother anywhere. She searched everywhere. Finally, she found her mother in a museum exhibit.

Money. Kate's friend had been looking for a job lately. She had been interviewing and interviewing and no one had gotten the job she was looking for. Kate felt like she really needed the money and quit her job. Kate was still feeling down and depressed but decided to quit anyways. Kate decided to get better at being a selfless person and felt much better.

The Snowball King. Ben's friends all went snowboarding. One night Ben and a friend were skating together. Ben accidentally fell off of his snowboard. Ben's friends were so mad that they called the cops. The cops arrested Ben for breaking their snowboard.

Stan's Hat. Stan was a hard worker and never made a mistake. His mother had a hat that she would wear. Stan liked to show off his hat every time he went shopping. One day, Stan forgot to pay for the hat. The hat fell off Stan and ruined his day.

Peppermint tea. I got a bottle of peppermint tea for my birthday. I was excited to try it. It tasted good, however it was not minty. I was still going to drink it anyway. I decided to buy a more minty peppermint tea.
First Dye. I saw a girl working at the grocery store. She had a new dye. I asked if I could help her. She gave me some instructions. I went to work.

Stray. I was playing with my family on my first day of school. I was playing with my brother when my teacher came in. I found an apple and dropped it on the ground. She asked me if I wanted it for breakfast. I said I would, but that I wanted to be a good kid.

Long Journey. Tina had never traveled very far before. This was due to her mother's strict rules about travel. One morning, she decided to take a walk along a river. She saw something amazing - a dolphin swimming by!Tina was so happy to see a sea creature.

Theo. Theo was really into playing the guitar. So he had a guitar rack he would play with his friends. He also put in a guitar amp to listen to his friends playing. And the guitar player always ended up winning. Theo eventually moved out of his current home because he had too many guitars.

Aurelia Learns to Tango. Aurelia had always wanted to learn how to trombone. As a girl, her mom would always teach her how to do it. One day she asked her mom to teach her to trombone. In fact, her mom was so happy for Aurelia. She felt her happiness coming from her mom.

Not a Federal Holiday. Sandy's birthday was a federal holiday. She got all of her supplies and her friends came to her house. She had a bunch of snacks and drinks to take home. Her friends were so happy to see her happy. Sandy never missed a day of school for a holiday.

Swimsuit. I was excited to go to the beach for the first time this summer. When I got there, there were so many people all lined up. I was the only one not in swimwear. They were all having a pool party for the day. I decided to go with a friend to the pool with the kids.
Corner. I needed to go to the corner store. I picked a nice one. Then I made a quick exit. When I got there I saw a sign that said, "Corner Store". I started walking toward the store.

New Puppy. Mandy's son wanted a new puppy. He was very excited about this one. Mandy took him to the local animal shelter. She found the puppy that he wanted. She had it adoptable and happily brought him home.

Ken's Kilt. Ken always loved how his grandma wore her kilt. Ken didn't like that she didn't have any shoes to wear. One day she had to go to the dentist. Ken thought about how to hide the kilt. Ken never would have guessed that he would still wear it.
Military. My nephew was deployed to Iraq. He got injured on patrol. He needed to stay home for three months. He came back home to the US. He is now 16 and is married.

Unaffectionate. Gina is going through her first period. She is getting quite a bit of turbulence. She is very upset by this. She is annoyed with herself for being so unruly. She is very angry with herself.
The Arrest. Trey was walking home from school. Suddenly, a policeman walked up to him. He made a point of standing right beside him. Trey was taken into custody. Trey ended up in jail for 30 days.

New Boys. There was a new boy in the class named Steve. Steve was very outgoing, and a little shy. One day, Steve's mother noticed he was quiet and distant. She put Steve in a special class with some other boys. After a few months, Steve was able to speak and talk to the class!

Accident or fate. Kelly had always wanted a puppy. So, at 16, she signed up to try. At the vet the next day, the vet said she could not have her puppy. Kelly was devastated. Her sister took over care of the dog.
Cable Service. Tom got a new job. He was always late for work. Tom started getting tired of it. He got his own cable service. He never had to wait so long again.

Vance Veers Verbose. Vance felt a little too nervous for class the other day. He decided to write up his report and make notes. He didn't realize how bad his grade would get. When his report came in, he did a poor job of it. Vance was so relieved to get his grade back.

Early Race. Jenna's boyfriend was driving his own race car. The car went over the limit in the early morning hours. The driver began to speed and brake. While on the freeway a semi on the side of the road came off of the road. The driver lost control and slammed into a tree.
Anniversary Gift. It was Christmas morning. There was a knock on the door. It was the gift buyer. She was very nice. They bought her a big bouquet of flowers.

Las Vegas. Sue worked at a Las Vegas strip club. One night she met a man named Jason. Jason invited Sue to his home. She stayed at Jason's home until his parents came over. They played cards and watched movies together in a beautiful suite.

The Picture. Sarah loved the picture in the school picture book. Her mom asked her to bring the book to class so she could look at it. Sarah did not think the picture was as good as the book. She brought the picture to the teacher's desk and asked for the teacher's approval. Her teacher said she would keep the book on her desk since she liked it.

Lost Voice. Sandra was playing video games. Suddenly, her phone began to ring and stop working. She had forgotten to turn it on. Sandra searched the entire house for the battery. She could not find it either.

Basketball Superstar. John had always been a basketball player, but never played in his own school. One day he was called into a meeting by a coach to join the basketball team. John showed up in time and started practicing hard. The next week John was called to play for the team. John felt that he had finally become a star for his school!

Injured. Jane had been playing with her dog in the living room. Jane's dog started to attack Jane. Jane was scared and ran inside to check on her dog. Her dog came running up to her. Her dog bit her and bit her badly.

Jason gets robbed. Jason works in a local coffee shop. One day Jason's alarm goes off. Someone is snatching the money in the cash register. Jason doesn't have any money so he pulls a gun and opens fire. He was able to escape the robber but he's lost his life.

The Speech. I needed to have a speech prepared for the upcoming election. I spent hours over the weekend getting everything ready. I spent the day writing a speech that would be ready in the morning. I then had my interview and waited in the lobby for the candidate. I got my speech and made a speech and won the election.

Cheese Bandit. We recently drove down the street to the local cheese bar. I was about to order my usual cheeses and a wine. Suddenly a kid showed up and started eating. I told him that was not allowed to be eating so close to my bar. He was embarrassed and stopped eating, but the cheese bandit remained.
New Car. I got a new car. I was nervous. I had the paperwork ready and a dealer wanted me. Then it happened. I was so happy.

Cute Girl. Briana loved cute things. She had a favorite candy shop. She would try to find something as cute as a puppy. One day, she tried to pet a puppy. She ended up tripping and hitting her head on the wall.

Broken Stove. Jill was on a camping trip. She was walking around trying to put a load into her stove. It did not fit properly. She took her load into the basement. Jill had to call an electrician to fix it.
The Pizza Coupon. Allie was getting pizza. It was $2. But she wanted to save a buck. So she called the pizza store. But they didn't have the coupon for $2.
Snowstorm. The city was in a deep freeze. The news said that snow was coming. People panicked. They couldn't get to work. Luckily, there was a snow emergency.

Saying Hello. When you meet a new person, you try to make sure you have the best conversation. It is very hard. If you are going to say hello, you always say hello at the same time. And you usually ask for their number and ask for their attention. In the end, you are pretty sure you will get a good response from them.

The Code. My friend took me to a big movie theater. The movie was about a superhero. We watched the superhero movie with a large group. The director said there were a few codes to unlock them. We were very excited and got in the theater.

The Bar. It was the bar with the huge open fireplace. All of the patrons were from New England. They all came and danced. One of the regulars got really drunk and started yelling. Everyone in the bar was scared of him.

Ice Cream. Sally was on her way to work when she noticed the road was icy. She got out of her car and began walking. She noticed that her ice cream truck had broken down. She got in the truck and filled it up and took her food to work. She got home to eat her ice cream for breakfast and the drive home.

Bruce Dog. Bruce decided to get a puppy. He picked a dog he didn't like and brought him home. He picked a puppy he thought he would like a lot. The dog wouldn't leave the home until Bruce's parents left. Bruce had to get a new dog and get a new home.

Car Lock. Jenna was on her way to a restaurant. She was late to her appointment. She had locked her car in the garage. When she got to the restaurant, her order was ready. She made an extra twenty dollars because she went to a diner.
Wrong Pizza. Sam was out with friends. They were playing games. Suddenly they noticed that Sam's pizza was very small. Sam got a large pizza. It came with a large tip.

Colin wants ice cream. Colin is at his desk. He needs some ice cream. Colin decides he will go home and eat some. When he gets home he eats a lot of ice cream. Colin feels good about having his first ice cream craving.
DJ. The DJ was a popular DJ. He played the best music. His fans always listened to him. He did not care about the opinions of others. DJ was loved by everyone.

French Fries. Sally's brother was always eating french fries. One day he wanted to do something new and unique. He thought of a new food concept. It would be french fries with a cheese sauce on them. It turned out to be so popular, Sally started doing it her very own!

Clean up duty. The man put the washing machine in the garage. He then put the clothes back in. The woman was supposed to clean the dishes. He noticed her and got mad at her. The woman went and bought the washing machine and he left.

bank. Tom was on the phone with his bank. He was trying to make a deposit. Tom was told his account was overdrawn. Tom decided to call his bank to complain. Tom waited to speak with the banker, but never heard back from them.

Discount. Kelsi went to a restaurant and ordered a large meal. The waiter gave her a credit for her tip. Kelsi felt very lucky and enjoyed the meal. The waiter came back later to find her tip had been taken. Kelsi gave the credit back to the waiter.

Break Not Break Up. Linda was in a relationship with Jeff. One night, he came over to hang out. He told Linda that he wanted to break up with her. He ended up breaking up with her. Linda didn't want to be with him anymore.

A Snack. The kids had just gotten home from school. They were waiting in line at the gas station to fill up. The kids were hungry, but there was nothing to eat. A young woman walked in and bought a few snacks. The kids all enjoyed their snacks and finally went home.

Trey's Soup. Trey wanted to cook some soup. He tried to go to the store to get ingredients. He got home and started to prepare the soup. Trey made the soup and enjoyed the taste. Trey decided to buy more ingredients for his next cookout.

Losing a Wallet. I left my wallet on the counter when I got home. I wasn't paying attention, and the coins were all out. I searched for it, but it was nowhere to be found. My phone had fallen on the counter. I had lost it all, so I looked everywhere, but I couldn't find it.

Wolf in Sheep's Clothing. One day Tom went on a hunting trip with friends. They went out into the woods. They found several wolves waiting in the bushes. Tom shot one of them. He had his friend's tag number.

Jill's Surprise. Jill was looking through her favorite book collection. She noticed an expensive book that had not been in her book collection in a long time. Jill took the book home to read and enjoyed it for a few hours. When she opened the book she immediately saw what was inside. Jill was stunned when she found a letter written by her great grandmother.
Greg's party. Greg had a big party. He invited everyone that came to his party. Greg did not put the food on the table. It was disgusting. Greg decided not to have a party again.
Christmas Gift. Anna was shopping. She wanted to get a Christmas present. She found a dress for her husband. She bought it. She loved it.

College advertisement. Samantha was nervous about the advertising job she was going to get. She put on her best dress and heels and looked amazing. Suddenly, a young boy with blonde hair approached her. He asked Samantha to dance for him. Samantha was thrilled to get the job.
Home Perm. Sue was doing some renovations at her house. She was bored of just sitting around and watching TV. She decided to go get a job. Sue got a job as a babysitter. Sue had so much fun.

A Car Baby. A young girl was going through the neighborhood with her new car. Her parents decided to take her out for a car wash. They decided to pick her up from school and let her have a ride to the car wash. She came home with the new car and went for a nice day at the neighborhood park. Her parents thanked her for the care she had given them and decided to get her a ride home.
Slow keyboard. Tom had to type a lot. He was writing a speech when he got sick. His keyboard was slow. He bought a new keyboard. He was able to type much faster.

Pretty Pictures. It was her first day of high school, and she had to pose for pictures. Her mom said she had to get pretty pictures in order to impress her teacher. Jessica didn't want to do any of the posing, and asked her mom to take the pictures. Her mom took her pictures, and Jessica was very happy. She had done her best to impress her teacher, and now she got a nice prize.

sky. Laurie went outside to play with her new dog. She saw that the sky was a beautiful blue. She began to pet the dog. The dog jumped and bit her on the head. Laurie picked it up and returned it to the house.

Tonight's Supper. Cindy wanted to make dinner for her husband and daughter. She decided to make the most delicious spaghetti and meatloaf she could. She added asparagus and broccoli to her mix. She then seasoned it in olive oil and garlic powder. Her dish was amazing and she ended up with dinner in fifteen minutes.

Interesting Run. Tom and John were playing football. Tom had a run that caught the attention of the entire stadium. They started to have fun playing at the end. John got into a fight with Tom. Tom and John became friends.

Jana Looks For A Home. Jana had always wanted a new home. She decided that she needed to get a new job and save money. She took a few days off and applied to all of her local jobs. Jana was able to find a job and her new home!Jana was now happily single and could now be happy.

Fajitas. Jim was at a Mexican restaurant with friends. He ordered some Fajitas and fries. But they didn't have the salsa he wanted. Jim was left wondering what to do. They had to order some salsa in the middle of the meal.
Earl gets in trouble. Earl wanted to go out to his car. His parents told him not to do that. Earl was drunk. He broke his parents' hearts. His parents made him spend the night in jail.
Train Ride. Gina took her son on the train ride. Her son was not very active. They got stuck for two hours in a long tunnel. Then they were able to come out. Gina loved the new trains.

Sharks at the Aquarium. Timmy went to the aquarium with his dad. He was in the tank with the sharks. All the sharks were eating each other. One shark swam towards the tank. The other shark swam towards the opposite direction.

Jealousy. Amy went to a restaurant to eat. There was a boy sitting at the table next to Amy. The boy got up and stared at Amy intently. Amy got up and walked away from the table. The boy followed Amy out the restaurant.

The broken arm. My dad took me out for a walk to go get ice cream. We drove for a while, before heading back. I was sitting on the curb, when my dad slipped and hit his arm. I was so upset that I didn't care about ice cream. I had to spend an hour getting ice cream.

Pepper safety. The boys all loved the pepper sauce. They were putting it in sandwiches and eating them out of the sandwich case. All of a sudden, one of the boys tripped. The sauce burned his leg. His mother called 911.

Mike's Mountain Adventure. Mike took his family on a road trip through the mountains. They saw many different animals and plants. The kids were able to see an elk that was very big. Mike was very proud of his group. They rode their motorcycles down the mountain to a creek.

Baby Passport. It was late and Jack was on his way home from work. He stopped to pick up his passport when he noticed the car door open. A woman who looked like him was on the phone with him. She was holding his passport and asked him to come over. The man said no and started to walk away.

Media Day. We were invited to Media Day for the season finale. They invited a lot of kids to wear jackets for the event. The kids didn't like their jackets. My niece bought a new jacket for the event. The jacket was pretty.
The Ring. Susie was running down the street one day. Suddenly, a cute boy approached her. He asked if she needed a ring. So she told him yes and he handed her a ring. Susie thanked him.
Simple Hunger. I was in class. My friends were having a party. The first one I had to attend was about to start. I got there right as it started to rain. I was so hungry I decided to leave.

I'm Sorry, Baby. I went to the grocery store with my little brother. We walked into a large department store. While waiting for our food, my brother said hi. The cashier asked if we had any change. I was in shock and turned around.

Hoping for a snow day. My family was excited about going out to the ski slopes. They bought tickets ahead of time. When they got there, it was still very cold. They stayed at the ski resort until it turned sunny. They got to ski at least three hours before the snow.

President. My friend is a very wealthy man. He has never held political office before. He has been given a lot of credit for making America great. He really wants to get elected president of the United States. He recently hired a lawyer and is now preparing for the election.

Visiting Santa. Riley wanted to visit Santa's home town. She made her way to the city center. She looked everywhere and was amazed at all the stores. Riley visited several stores and bought a lot of gifts. Riley was very happy with the shopping experience at the mall.

Bicycles are Fun. I went to a ride with my friends. We went around a corner on a bike. A guy ran out of gas. I yelled at him and told him to turn around. He kept going until he couldn't see us anymore.
Knockout Gas. One night I was sitting in my living room. Someone knocked on my door. They told me to stop drinking gas. I got out and looked at the door. I had a gas canister stolen from my house.

A grade. Briana decided to take a quiz on her test. She was nervous, because she knew she'd failed. However, she decided to give the test anyways. When she got to the classroom, she saw everyone was ready. Briana finally took the exam!

Creepy Basement. My niece is very scared of the dark. I am terrified of the dark when I go outside. One evening, I was talking to my niece and decided to go outside. I saw a tall black figure. The figure was a ghostly figure.

The Mailman. I was a very proud mailman. I loved that I would get people mail. The mailmen would come to my door everyday to deliver mail. Every day I got to meet the mailman and share his love for his job. I learned a lot about my job and life as a mailman.

Vineyard Blues. Randy was in love with his neighbor. They went to their favorite wine cellar. He sat on the bench as they talked about what they wanted. They got their bottles and began tasting the wines. He was so happy that they made such a good decision together!

Cat and Dog. Our cat always seemed to be running around. She ran into the hallway when I would not listen. I looked up to see her running in my yard. The cat kept looking at my dog who was sitting in the bushes. I chased the cat across my yard.

Alternative. Julia was on the verge of bankruptcy. She did not have enough money to pay her bills. She decided to try to buy a business. She bought it on craigslist. Julia was able to pay off her debt and make enough money for a new home.

Law Breaker. John was at the airport. He had just been to Germany. He was afraid to board a plane and was getting a bad flight. He decided to get some popcorn before he boarded. He got on the plane with his popcorn and took a seat.

Mario. Mario was getting ready for the big race. He was wearing a helmet and gloves. His whole body was covered in sweat. Mario was so hot he started to feel dizzy. He took off his helmet and forgot about it.

The Closet. Bella was getting married in a few weeks. She planned a large wedding. Bella had her first rehearsal in the big church. The reception at the church was quite amazing. Bella and her husband enjoyed a wonderful day in their new home.

The Surprise House. Dora was planning a family trip for Thanksgiving. She decided to get all of her family together. When she got to the house, everyone got ready. Her children and grandchildren were surprised by the house. Dora had a great time visiting with her family!
Fair. Every summer the school plays a fair. They have a lot of games. Last year it was the fair. We had a huge car race. Everyone cheered for us!
Hungry. Jen was sitting at the lunch table at work. A coworker brought her lunch. Jen had not eaten all day. Jen ate her lunch. She felt full.

Grilled cheese. Jillian was trying to eat lunch. She had all the food she had in the fridge. She noticed a cheese plate on her counter. She took a bite out of her grilled cheese. It was the best thing she had ever eaten.

The Tulips. The family went to a petting zoo with their puppy. They saw a huge potted tulip. They played with the tulip for hours. Afterwards, they walked around with the tulip. They had a wonderful time at the petting zoo!

The Call. Lucy was having a great time at her birthday party. She was playing with some friends and getting lots of attention. Suddenly, she realized she couldn't hear her mom. She asked her mom to come out of the house. She found her mom hiding in a closet.

Intern to Director. Allie had just graduated from college. Her dream was to be a film editor for a major studio. She auditioned for many roles. She eventually landed a director role. She is very excited about her job.

Boredom. I was bored all day today. I took a nap in class. But when I got to class it was very difficult to get in the classroom. I found my mom and she gave me a pill. I didn't have a problem in class until the next day.
A Day at the Beach. Today was day at the beach. There was so much to see. The ocean was just gorgeous. People were having a blast. I was sad that I couldn't get to see the sunset.

Stomach. I went to the supermarket to buy some groceries. I was hungry, so I went back home. I realized I was not in the mood to do that. I decided to go and get something to eat. It took me three hours and a good amount of gas to get to the food store.
Lingering Cramp. Briana was in the shower. She started to feel some discomfort. It felt like she had a cramp. Briana thought she might have gotten a virus. Luckily she got it under control.

The Bonfire. The Smith family was going to a bonfire. They were very poor and needed some extra money. They decided to take their own car for the night. They parked it in the garage and had a nice night's sleep. When it was time to start the night, they felt very accomplished.

Shin. Sally has been walking around the neighborhood one day. She sees a homeless man in the middle of the street. She asks him if he is homeless. He tells her that he is the same one she saw before. She gets in her car and drives away.

Out of battery. Kelsi was driving home from work one day. Suddenly, she smelled a fire in the trunk. She didn't know what was in it, so she was scared. She quickly grabbed it and ran to the car. Luckily, the battery died right away.

Raging Rivers. Sara was in the middle of a big river. She had an angry storm brewing in her stomach. A huge wave crashed against her boat. She screamed, as the water filled the waterline. Sara decided she wouldn't bother paddling any more that night.

The Broken Pot. Jill was washing dishes. She was using a kitchen knife. Suddenly, the knife broke and dropped the dish. The pot was crushed and spilled all over. Jill had to call a professional to clean it up.

Aliens. James decided to go for a walk in nature with friends. While he was walking he felt a strange sensation. He looked all around and saw some strange aliens. He looked up and saw them as friendly as human. James decided to go to a local haunted house with his friends.

The Fender Bender. Lucy is a mechanic. She was having trouble fending off the fender benders. She decided to buy a new fender bender. She bought the best one she could find. The fender benders were no longer a problem for her.

First dibs. Tom really wanted to start a pet food business. He wanted to start out as a kid and make his own money. He looked at his first restaurant as an example. It was pretty ugly and lacked any soul. He decided that he would start with that.
Losing the mail. Tim was out with friends. They were having a pool party. Tim forgot to get his mail. His mom got very angry when he forgot to get it. Tim lost the pool party.

Gerry. Gerry was in charge of making the coffee for the morning. When he woke up, he went to his cupboard to look around. He noticed he had an empty mug of coffee. Gerry decided to buy a large cup to keep around. His coffee was much better that day.
The Coming Out. Gina was at a party. Suddenly she saw something. She felt something on her head. Gina began to freak out. She called her mother immediately.
Runny Makeup. The girls went to the mall. The girls were looking at different colors. The girls decided to try something new. They went to the makeup counter. They bought a few colors of makeup.

The Promotion. Allie was always told she was too shy to be a teacher. One day her teacher told her to run a promotion. Allie was so excited to go. On the day of the promotion she made everyone happy. She was very proud of herself.

Charlene the Song Bird. Charlene loved to sing on the porch. She would sing the songs of the neighborhood's birds. Charlene loved to tell her stories on the porch. One day her neighbors were walking into the neighborhood. Charlene's neighbor came back and started to sing to the birds.
Heart Attack. The Smith family were in the yard. Suddenly there was a loud thud. It was their neighbor, Tina!She'd had a heart attack. They rushed her to the hospital.

ice cubes. I went to go get a frozen banana ice cream cone. I asked if they were  free because the counter was closed. They looked at my hand and it was ice cubes. They said  there was no free ice cream. I had to go home and get a free ice cream cone.

Struck. Bryan was on his way to work one day. While walking in the traffic, he got hit by a car. Bryan's head got knocked off his shoulder. The next day, Bryan was fine, and he could go to school. Now Bryan rides the bus every day.
The Anime. The group sat and watched anime. They went out to eat and hang out. It was a long day. They finally left and went home. They ate some popcorn and watched TV.
Oliver's Birthday. Oliver's birthday is soon. He asks for a gift from his parents. His parents say no. Oliver's mom takes the presents. Oliver gives his mom a pink bow.

The Lightning Storm. Tom was in a storm and thought it would be a good idea to go outside. Tom grabbed his jacket, his flashlight, and his emergency kit. Tom set off on his way and saw a large lightning strike. His flashlight got stuck in the window, making it all dark. Tom had to wait for several hours until his mom came.

Fleas. I was cleaning up my bathroom today. I didn't notice any fleas in my bathroom. I had a problem and was concerned. When I started scrubbing, I realized there was fleas. Luckily, the fleas died off.

England. I went to England on vacation in 2015. I was bored and had nothing to do. I was given the option of watching shows on television or staying home. I chose the television show I watched. I decided to watch it and was very entertained.

Camping Trip. Last weekend my family took a camping trip. We set up the tent and tents. Then we put all of the camping equipment in it. We all slept under our favorite blankets. Once we were all awake we made our way to the campsite.

Fast Playing. Gina loved to watch her kids play video games. Her youngest didn't like to play games because he was young. One day, her little brother was playing. He dropped the game on the floor!Gina called the store, asking if she could get the game back.
The Contest. I was watching a science class. They were giving out a free meal. I went up to enter the contest. I entered into the contest. I won the contest.

Heavy rainstorm. I was getting ready for a big test in a storm. I wanted to make sure I prepared my equipment for the storm. All of my rain gear was still in its plastic bag. I went outside and prepared it with paper clips. It was a beautiful day, and I made it through it all well.
Home Work. Randy had a job. Randy had a home. Randy was bored with his home. Randy decided to do something for his home. Randy got a puppy.

Sea Turtle. Kelly was fishing with her friends. Suddenly, the wind began to blow and the water rose. They heard something flying across the boat. It was a huge sea turtle in the water!Kelly started to dive as fast as she could, but she ended up in the water!
Dinner. The girl sat down to eat lunch. She was hungry for dinner. The girl didn't know what she should have. She decided to take a picture of herself. The girl laughed when she saw her picture.
The Vest. Mandy was shopping. Her mom bought her a beautiful new vest. She had never worn it, but she loved it. Mandy couldn't believe how pretty it was. She put it on and loved her new vest.

Baking a Cake. Julie and her wife were trying to bake a cake. She had all of her ingredients together. But the oven was failing and the batter was not even done. The batter splattered everywhere!They ended up having to buy a whole new cake oven.
Dentist. My dentist told me my cavity was very large. He gave me an x-ray. My x-ray showed it was full. He was right about my cavity. I had to have a root canal.

Regrets. Kate and her boyfriend had been on a date for 3 months. Kate and her boyfriend began to have an affair and planned their anniversary. Kate and her boyfriend decided to cancel their affair. Kate and her boyfriend went on a plane to go to Las Vegas for the anniversary. Kate and her boyfriend regret going on the plane and the affair.
The Shower. Cindy was at a friend's house. She decided to take a shower. She walked to the back of the house. She ran into a friend's mother. The mom told Cindy she could only shower in the bathroom.

Mugged. Jane had her first date with her new boyfriend at a diner. Jane had the time of her life and she was extremely nervous. As soon as they arrived, her date began drinking. Jane felt dizzy and lost, and couldn't go on. Jane was then mugged and the only thing she had to show for it was a bad date.

Protest. Mary decided to protest against a school teacher. Mary had never been a political activist, but she decided to take a stand. Mary joined several other girls in a protest. They surrounded the teacher and screamed at him. Mary felt that her right to free speech had been trampled on.

Carson Wins the Game!. Carson plays basketball against the rival team. Carson gets a foul and hits the shot. Carson has the ball and the ball goes into the hoop. Carson shoots the ball but misses. Carson loses the game for his team.

Late Flight. Maddie was in the airport with her family when they got to Chicago. She got in line for a few hours just before her flight. Her family got up early to prepare for the flight. But then Maddie realized they had to get the flight home. She and her family were really late, as she was stuck at home.

The GoldFish. The kids were watching a goldfish movie. The movie was about a goldfish who had a great life. They were very excited when the end credits started. Suddenly, a loud, angry fish appeared in the water!They screamed and ran away from the camera to hide.
Rose and Her Rose. Rose was at her grandmother's house to get ice cream. She picked up a few pieces of gum. She took a bite of a rose. She loved the flavor. Her grandmother was very happy.

Desert Journey. When Tom was 10 he went to the desert. He saw lots of animals in the desert. Tom was hungry so he began to eat. Tom was really hungry so he ate a lot. Afterwards he went home and didn't want to go back to school.

Molly's Beau. Molly had just started dating a guy. Her parents were in a lot of pain. They decided to have a little girl, and named Molly Beau. The little girl was the center of Molly's life. She was just as sweet as Beau.

Race. I got a job at a fast food place. I didn't have any race experience. I did some training and took my first race. I was a bit nervous about it. After it started I could see I was a lot faster than I thought.

The Scissors. John was at work. The scissors were all over the floor. John was trying to clean up a mess. He couldn't find the scissors in his bag. Luckily the manager came out and gave him the scissors.

Tom Gets a Mechanical Keyboard. Tom was frustrated that he couldn't type with his fingers. He bought a mechanical keyboard. It didn't take long for it to work. He was happy with the new keyboard. Tom was able to type with his fingers after a few days.
Movies. Liz wanted to watch a new movie. Her parents took her to a cinema. She wanted to see a horror movie. Liz was not comfortable with the movie. She left the theater.

FB Affair. I met a beautiful young woman in 2013. She was a single woman. We started talking and we became good friends. She was very interested in me when we saw each other one day. She asked me out that very night on FB.

Sinking Boat. Jane decided she needed to go fishing. She was out on a trip with a couple friends. She needed to find a spot to fish for bait. She saw a boat out on the dock. She called the boat on the boat to come help her.

The Man with the Cane. Jeff was walking home from the bus stop. Suddenly, he heard a noise coming from his back door. He looked and saw that it was the neighbor's dog barking. It was a little girl crying, so he went back inside. He realized that he hadn't noticed and threw the cane at the dog.
Girl Scout Cookies. Amy was a Girl Scout. She loved cookies. She decided to make some cookies. The cookies tasted amazing. She gave each other cookies.

Car accident. Amy is driving on the freeway. She is crossing the intersection and is driving slowly. Her car comes to a stop suddenly. She slams on her brakes and skips a block. She had to be taken to the hospital for her injuries.

The Turkey Leg. It was Thanksgiving night and Jane was at the store. As she was at the checkout line she saw a turkey leg she really liked. It had a lot of pockets for her to stash her items in. Jane was happy to see it in the basket and grab a handful. As soon as she grabbed her items she put them in the basket and headed home.
A lost wheel. Allie lost her wheel in a car accident. Her friend went to the store to get it fixed. He found a part for it. He took it to a car mechanic for repairs. They replaced it with a new one.

Cavities Galore. One evening the family was sitting around their campfire. The smoke was terrible and there was dust in the air. The camp fire was full of cigarette butts everywhere. Suddenly, a gust of wind swept the cigarette butt out of the fire. They burned their cigarette butts to ashes!

The Proposal. Dina was about to get married. She was waiting for her husband to propose. When he walked into the room, Dina was nervous. He surprised her with a diamond ring. She loved the ring and it was her favorite piece of jewelry.

Exchange. Diana lost her job in a matter of months. Her ex-boyfriend broke up with her because she cheated on him. Diana didn't feel her place anymore and decided to get an apartment. She found a nice one and was happy. Soon after, she found another friend who really loved her.

Secret Smoker. Kathy was smoking. It had become her special occasion. She had a small bag of cigars. When her husband came home from work he asked her what was in them. Kathy said she hadn't realized she had hidden a small container.

Down the Stairs. Kathy was walking down the stairs at her home. There was a heavy storm outside that started. She was scared. She was on the first floor. Then she saw that the stairs had a new ladder.

Spaghetti. Tom really wanted to make a meal for his family. Tom decided to cook a lot of spaghetti. Tom made the pasta so that it would last for weeks. Tom ate the spaghetti for his family and his friends. Tom felt good about his decision.
The Track Meet. The team was supposed to meet at the track. The coach set the start time for the race. The boys ran out on the track. They took the lead. They won the race and got their medals!

Used Books Suck. Dan was walking around his neighborhood. He decided to walk through a small book store. Dan bought several books at a cost of $10 each. When Dan returned home, his mother had bought the books. Dan had to buy them all in person to sell them.

The Burger. Gina's friend decided to make some burger for her. Gina's mother helped her to make the bun and mustard. As the kids were finishing the burger, Gina noticed that she forgot the bun. The kids were all hungry and left the room. When they came back, Gina was eating the burger with her mother.

The Accidental Crime. Jane had forgotten to lock her dog in her car. Her brother's car had crashed into the wall of her front yard. She heard a loud crash as the car landed on the ground. She opened her car door and got out to see what was wrong. As she opened the trunk she found a toy gun and a gun case.

Making Music. Gina liked the music that she heard when she was young. She decided to make a collection of her favorite songs. She made a lot of CDs, and sent them to all of her friends. Her CDs made her very happy, and she bought more!Gina would now like to go back to collecting music.

System Failure. Alex was an experienced programmer. He was developing a new computer system. The software was very complicated. After a long period of time the computer couldn't function properly. It ended up breaking due to faulty components.

Trick or Treat. Sam was on his way home from work. He noticed a sign that said Trick or Treat. He decided to go to the store to trick or treat. While there, he got candy. He returned home feeling like he made the right decision.

Football. I grew up watching football and now I have kids. I was watching my kids play in the rain. They had to wear protective gear because of the water. They were playing in the middle of the field. My daughter ran around the field, yelling and jumping for the ball.

A Wild Zebra Attack. Nyka was hiking through the Serengeti. A large animal walked out from under a tree. The zebra tried to get away from Nyka. Nyka shot at it with a tranquilizer dart. The animal died and Nyka was the last to see it.

Food. The family was out celebrating. A huge box of food was thrown onto the ground. The kids started to eat and make jokes. The teacher walked up and said they could not have food. The kids were shocked to hear the food was not theirs.

Walking in the store. My wife was in the grocery store and got a bag of nuts. She noticed a squirrel in a basket. She told her daughter to take it to the store. When she returned, she had it safely wrapped in a tarp. She and the squirrel had a great day walking to the store.

Busted Pipe. Nancy was in the bathroom with her son. Suddenly her foot caught on a pipe. The pipe was very hard and Nancy fell on her back. The water seeped into the drain and Nancy got so wet that she wet herself. Luckily, the water stopped the drain before getting too much more.

Justin's Job. Justin really wanted to be a baseball player. He got good grades, a good attitude and a good job. He applied for baseball at many places. He got a job playing ball in a local park. Now Justin is a professional baseball player!

Like father like son. Drew loved his mother's work. She loved doing it so much she would go to bed at 7 o'clock. One day her doctor informed her she could not be at work. She decided to get a job at a diner instead. It paid better, and Drew felt good about not having to go back to work.
Bad Weather. The weather was bad this morning. It was raining heavily. It made driving difficult. We all agreed this is not good weather. We will see what weather comes.

Marty's Roach Problem. Marty was in his bathroom, getting ready for work. He noticed that the toilet wasn't working. The toilet wouldn't flush. Marty had no idea what to do. He called a plumber to come fix it and he was in no shape to pay.

Making chili. John was having a chili party at his house. He wanted to make a really good one. He boiled the meat and spices in a pan. Then he added it to a pot with water and brought to a boil. When it was done, John tasted it and decided it was really good.

First Snowfall. Janice was waiting for her school bus to arrive. The bus would leave at 8am so she was going to sleep in. Suddenly, snow began falling outside and the bus became stuck. Janice was upset that the bus would never arrive as soon as it came. She quickly jumped out of the seat and jumped out of the bus.
Gas pump. Tom was running late for work. He didn't have any gas. He had to find a way to get to work. He went to the gas station. Tom paid for his car.

The Playdate. I went to the playdate with my new friend. We sat in the bleachers playing pool. We enjoyed ourselves for several minutes. We left the playdate when it was over. We decided to try and start playing after a few hours.
New Shirt. I needed a new shirt. My old shirt got caught in the wash. I was shopping for clothes. I found a shirt that was very nice. I bought it and it arrived within a day.

Last Minute. Sarah had to make some last minute dinner reservations. She wanted to make a small plate for her friend. She was scared because her plate was on the last floor. It was about 8 pm when Sarah got home. She realized the food was still hot.
Tired. Susie was tired and had to go to work. She was really tired when she got to work. She took a nap before the next meeting. After the meeting, she took a rest. Susie worked much better.

Delivery Mistake. The delivery man came in with the food. He said it had been delivered. He handed over an envelope with a new card. The worker opened the envelope and saw the card had been used. They realized the card was for an old address.
Peapod. We went to Peapod for dinner. We ordered a plate of food. A man gave us a soda. He put the soda down. The man looked at the soda.
Game. James was bored. He wanted to go to the arcade to play a game. He bought the game. He won money for himself. He bought the arcade games.
March. Tom had a birthday coming up. He wanted to be part of it. He went to the grocery store. He got a box full of presents. Tom brought them to the event.
Angry. Tom's parents had some problems. They didn't pay attention to Tom's needs. Tom got angry. They tried to get him to calm down. Tom stayed mad at them all day.

Food Sale. We decided to have a food sale at a local church. We sold all of our favorite snacks. I really enjoyed buying and eating at the food sale. It was a lot of fun and made me feel very good. We will definitely have a lot more food sales in the future.

off the beach. On the beach, Mark decided to do some surf. He got a towel and some surfboard. Mark got in his kayak and set out. Mark took the water and started paddling. Mark made it to shore safely!

Loud Music. Samantha heard her music being played in her room. She decided to check her music volume. It was too loud. She could hear her family getting upset. Her neighbors decided not to take her outside.

No Knife. Susie went to her grandmother's house for dinner. She had ordered two cheeseburgers. She had forgotten to put them on the table. Susie looked in the cupboard for the knife. Instead, she found a folded paper towel.

Lexie brings breakfast. Lexie decided to make breakfast for herself and her family. She had a lot of ingredients and had gotten a lot of ingredients from home. When she was ready to cook the meal she got the timer out. She went to go get the timer from the kitchen. When she was done with the meal she put it in the microwave.

Vegetables. Samantha had just moved into her new apartment. She went for a walk around the block. After an hour she realized she had left her plate of veggies. Samantha searched the kitchen for food. She found three cups of vegetables and they were all ready for dinner.
Grocery store. John wanted to go to the grocery store. He had a few things he needed. Then, John went inside. He bought groceries. After he had all the things he needed, he left.

Store Clerk. Travis was at the grocery store. There was a woman who he knew very well. She wanted to introduce himself and he got very friendly. After talking for a while, she got to her name. Travis smiled at her and began the conversation.

Revenge. Derek was walking through the mall one day. He saw a group of people staring at him. They were acting very strange and annoying. They asked him to leave. Derek stood his ground and punched them all in the mouth.

The Book Fee. Kelli had just returned to the library from an all day reading spree. At the desk, she saw that the books were out of stock. She decided to wait for an hour until the books became available. When she got there, she got the books out and went straight to the library. When the shelves were empty she had to pay the books to the librarian.

Baseball Fever. Bill was playing baseball in the park with his friends. All of a sudden, he felt dizzy. He got up and ran to the restroom. He went down to the kitchen and grabbed his baseball. It hit a small child in the head and they both fell to the ground.

Climbing. I am doing something challenging. I decided to climb a tall hill. I do not know how to climb, so I decided to ask my father. I ask my father to give me some advice. We climb the hill together and we climb it together!

A sad day. The kids were going to the grocery store. It was their first day. They hadn't seen their parents in weeks. The day began and the kids were sad. Finally, the kids got to pick the food they wanted.

Camping. Jane and her sister had to pack a lot of supplies to go camping in the woods. They had to pack a lot of blankets, sleeping bags, and sleeping bags. They packed a lot of snacks and water. They decided to leave when they finished packing. The two siblings drove across the country.
New Running Shoes. Tom wanted new running shoes. He researched the different brands. He found a pair of shoes that he liked. He bought them in the store. Tom was happy with his purchase.
Reuniting. Tom and his girlfriend started dating. She dated a lot of guys. Unfortunately Tom wanted a new man. She told him she was pregnant with a child. Tom was very excited about that.

Owner. Ana found her old car in the garage. She tried to pay for it but she couldn't afford it. She looked online for a buyer. She found the perfect one. It was a great purchase, as she was able to get the car quickly.

Tech Troubles. Mike was getting his tech troubles resolved. He needed to have the laptop tested. He went to the store to get a new laptop. He brought it home and put it in a bag. His wife was upset but he felt relieved.

Salad. We were supposed to have dinner with my family. But I had to drive to the grocery store. Then I had to get groceries for my family. So we got ready to eat but my mother said it would be too much work. But at least I can have some salad and get some sleep!
Math Mastery. Rita got a test from a teacher. It was math. She struggled with it. Then she made some mistakes. She came out with an A on the test.

Softball. It was a warm spring day and I decided to go for a swim. I sat on the bench with my shirt on and looked around. I saw a volleyball game playing on TV. I found a nice set of flip flops and went for a walk. I enjoyed my day as I enjoyed my swim.

Karen's Trip. Karen has never been on a trip like this before. She really wanted to see the sights and the food. She spent hours getting ready for her trip. Finally she arrived at the destination. Her trip was beautiful and she was glad she got a week off.
Ants. I was in my room. I heard an ant running in my room. I saw something run away. I yelled at the ant to come back. The ant came back to me.

Louis Breaks Down. Louis woke up to the sound of water splashing in the hall. The ceiling fan had blown the ceiling fan off. Louis started screaming, and the fans were on high alert. The school principal arrived, and the girls were suspended. Louis spent the night at the hospital, crying for help.

Cream. Sue bought a box of flavored milk. She put it on her desk for her to drink. Her boss came in and demanded she clean the bowl. She cleaned it right away and then put the milk back in. She was so embarrassed she never ever bought flavored milk again.

Quentin Cleans House. Quentin is taking out his trash. When he reaches the bottom, he notices the trash smell. Quentin decides to clean the house with the trash can. The smell is horrible and smells like the living room. Quentin is forced to go to sleep.
Fighting Neighbors. Jane had a new dog. Her new dog was named Charlie. Charlie would always fight Jane. They always fought each other for weeks. Jane was so happy to be rid of Charlie.

Good Neighbors. Tom lived in the city but had no neighbors. His car broke down one day and he wanted to see if anyone had any help. After hours of knocking on his door he heard the commotion from another car. Someone from the other car was in the other car. The other car was driving very fast.

The Conference. Dan was at a conference with a bunch of people. One of them was asking him a lot of really big questions. Dan was getting very frustrated with the situation. He ended up throwing up on the floor. He ended up getting a full refund.

Janice's First Day. Janice was finally home from school after the day was over. She had to walk her dog around the block and open the door. Janice was very nervous about her first day at school. All the kids were very nice and she had no problems. It was her first day as a new mom and she was glad.
Hungry. A man went to a fast food restaurant. He ordered chicken wings. He ate most of the wings. However, he didn't finish. He ate a small part.
Pizza Pie. Kia's mom was trying to get her to try pizza. Kia wanted pizza. But, she didn't have any money. Kia's mom decided to give Kia a pizza pie instead. Kia was thrilled with her new pizza.

Closer Desk. Mary needed more than just a desk for her office. Her desk was too far away from her desk and her chair. Mary moved her desk to the new desk. She now had a much better look for her office. Mary was glad that she was more organized in her office.

Work. Jim was an engineer for an energy company. The company's project was to add a new reactor. Jim drove to work every day at night. During a thunderstorm, Jim heard a huge sound. Jim panicked and jumped out of his car onto the road.

Leg Press. Juan has to stand on one leg while moving. His coach told him to perform leg press every morning. He started doing leg press a few months ago. His coach began to get frustrated at Juan's body. Eventually Juan quit doing leg press.
Lactose. Kelly was lactose intolerant. She went to the doctor for a lactose test. The doctor told her to stop eating dairy. Kelly felt sick for 2 days. She decided to eat less dairy.
Animal safari fun. I love animal safaris. Today I was in a safari in Africa. I had fun exploring the safari. I saw a huge giraffe!I was really excited and happy to have fun at my animal safari.

Oven shopping. Olivia was feeling hungry. Her mother took her to the store to get some food. She asked a lot of questions to see what was in stock. The store was packed and Olivia was able to browse. She picked out the chicken dinner, which was $15.
Door Handle Disaster!. Jill had a brand new door handle. She put it up for sale online. It got an average of one bid. Jill decided to fix it herself. She got a great deal on the handle!

My niece. My niece was recently diagnosed with cancer. She is now 55 years old. Last week she got chemotherapy for it. I called her yesterday to let her know I was going to be at work. My niece is still very excited.
Cancer. My friends and I were at a concert. Our favorite band played in a very old, old venue. The audience was so loud. The music was so bad. We sat out for days and then went back to our friends.

Baby. Mary and her husband went to the airport with a baby in a backpack. Mary saw the bag on the floor but didn't want to risk it. She was scared she would get in trouble. Her husband had the baby by the neck. It was a surprise and the couple loved having their baby there.

Transit Photos. I was at a transit station on a school trip. As I got off the bus, I was curious to take a photo of it. I was really surprised to see that transit had a photo booth right in front of the bus. The station manager offered to pay for the photo. The photo was a great way to remember the great times at that transit station.
New Leg. Tom had a new leg. He got a new orthodontist. His orthodontist gave him some advice. He decided to give it a try. Tom felt much better.
Hepatitis A outbreak. It was a cold outbreak. All over the country there was a rash. The first person to get sick was me. When I felt better I went to work. Everyone got sick too.
Robbery. A guy had a bunch of stuff that was gone. When the guy didn't bring it, he broke into it. Someone noticed what was missing. They called the police. They found all the stuff inside.

Hack. Tom had a lot of hacking problems at work. He was frustrated and needed to use a different system. He found a solution that made things much easier. It was the only solution that could solve all his issues. Tom became a much happier person after he found the hack.

The Heat. I was in the heat trying to cook dinner. It was almost time for dinner when I saw an announcement. It was time to leave and we were so close. When we arrived it was freezing so I was cold. Thankfully the other kids were cool so they let me eat.

Cereal and Milk. Anna had never had a kid, but it had been a while since her daughter had grown. She was determined that she would make it up to her. She grabbed a big can of cereal, and some milk, and a carton. Then she ate all the cereal she had packed and walked away. She vowed to work hard on her diet and not let it affect her kid.

Old shirt. Sarah was having a baby. She was also excited about having a new baby. She decided to buy an old shirt to wear to the baby shower. Sarah found a store that was able to sell her some old shirts. Sarah got all the new baby shirts and was happy to have them.

Tantrum. Kate was on a date with a guy. She was having a great time but got into a lot of trouble. She was nervous about her future and the girl was excited. They both ended up fighting over who got to pick. Kate ended up crying and never got the chance to tell her friend.

Gymnastics. Alicia needed to go to the gym for her first attempt at weightlifting. All the other girls were too short and too weak to do so. She chose gymnastics. In the gym she could do everything the girls in her class could do. She made the team.
Mike's Dream. Mike wanted to join a band. He played in a local band. One night he was in the band and got fired. The next day, he made it to the band and they were very happy. He had a very good day.
school id. The kids loved their teacher. Her name was Kayla. She was a wonderful teacher!One day, she passed away suddenly. The kids had a sad and sad time.

Float Plane. Beth is in high school, but wanted to go to college. She had the summer off to go to college. At the airport, Beth saw a flyer for a float plane. Beth took the plane, and it was very exciting. Beth decided to go to college, and went to college with the float plane!

Jane Moves Out. Jane is trying to get a divorce from her husband. She thinks it is over, but she keeps thinking about it. She goes to counseling, and finally decides to move out. Jane and her husband agree to a settlement. Jane is happy to have finally found a solution to their marriage.
Visiting. I visited my friend this week. He had moved to the city. I drove up in his old car. We had dinner and went to a museum. I'm going back on Saturday.

Old Friends. I have been working at a construction site for several years. I do not like the noise the construction site makes. It reminds me of my grandmother in my old age. I told her I like the noise and we are friends now. It is nice to have a family to talk about things with.

The Pork Dinner. Lizzie loved to cook pork. She decided she wanted to make her own meatloaf. She bought all the supplies to make the pork. She got the ingredients together. It took a few hours, but it turned out great.

John burns the biscuits. John is eating breakfast at his local restaurant. All of a sudden a friend asks him why he is cooking breakfast. John tells him that he has been cooking them. The friend asks why not give him a tip instead of eating. John tells him to tip him back and is upset.

Scrapbooking. Randy wanted to learn to scrapbook. He found online scrapbooking guides and created an account. He filled out the information online. He found the right scrapbook to make a buck on. He made a good profit on it.

Facetime. Sam was in college. His roommate took him to a summer summertime event. They had a fun day at the park. He was able to take time with his roommate on campus. He then was able to stay longer at home with his family.

Stuffed Animal. Susie always had a stuffed animal around her house. She loved it because it was so soft and fluffy. One day she found one in a drawer. Her mother wanted the stuffed animal to go to a good home. Susie refused.

The Weird Deer. John was driving home from work one day. He saw a strange animal on the road behind him. John got out and looked around, not able to figure it out. It was a weird deer in the middle of the road. John finally turned back around and went home.

Ventilation. The building had been inspected for plumbing problems. The owners came in and saw that there were leaks. They did a plumbing inspection. They found that the ductwork in the basement was leaking. They removed the pipes and replaced them.

Hair. I woke up the other day to the sound of my parents yelling at me. I screamed and my hair was all over the place. Mom and dad came and took my hair and put it in the trash. I was very confused. Now I understand why they called me a hound in the first place.
