A Job At 14. Gina was 16 and decided she wanted a job. At first she was nervous and nervous because it was hard. However, after a few weeks Gina knew she wanted to work there. Her job at the factory was a great one. Gina was happy she had gotten the job.

Spaghetti. Tim had to go to the store and buy spaghetti. He was going to have to wait for his parents to return home. He decided to make spaghetti. Tim made the spaghetti noodles himself. Tim was proud of his pasta.

Gravy Boat. My mom got us a small, cheap, and fun, gravy boat. We put the boat in the garage. One day, the boat started sinking. We had to call a tow truck. The dock was free and we were so happy we saved the boat.
Wetting the Bed. Tom was washing his bed. Tom was very impatient. It was very late. Tom forgot to unplug the electricity. Tom left the room without his bed.

Interview with Strange Man. Beverly was trying to relax at the beach when a strange man appeared. He was talking about strange things and was telling weird stories. She looked down to see that he was holding a glass in his hand. He said it was a glass of water from a glass of water bottle. She shook her head and took the bottle out of his hands.

The Jack O'Lantern. A very bright star went out into the night sky. People watched it from their windows. One night the star turned into a star. They saw it and it was really weird. They decided to go to a star party.
Tea Time. We went to a party. There was a girl drinking tea. I wanted to talk to her. So I gave her my number. I asked her out and she said yes.

Loan Shark. I went to the bank to make a deposit. I looked for a safe to deposit my money. I got my money out of my wallet. I was afraid to look inside. There were two men standing in the middle of the floor.

A Flat Tire. It was cold at night and I didn't want to sit in a cold car. So I decided to call my friend. His friend wanted me to go on a hike. So I rode my bike through a forest to get there. I then parked my bike and got in my car to go home.

Teacher. Jill's daughter is in third grade. She wants to be an elementary school teacher. She asks her mom to take her to an after-school job. Jill's mom agrees to help. Jill is excited when she can begin teaching her daughter.

Skiing Black. It was an early summer day when I had to take my son for a walk. We went to the park on the main trail. While going, he slipped and fell off the bike. I tried to keep him safe but couldn't. It took a few minutes for him to calm down but he will need a few more days.

A Stolen Coat. Bobby was out shopping in the mall. Suddenly, he heard a loud pop. He looked behind him and saw that his coat was gone. He asked his co-worker if he could get it back. Bobby was offered a job in his next store.

Acoustic Guitar. I like listening to music. I am trying to learn to play an electric guitar. I was looking online for guitar lessons. I found a website that taught me how to play the guitar. I was very happy I found that website.

Dream to Reality. Jude was in a bad car accident in his old neighborhood. He was unable to get any medical attention until months later. His family decided to move out of his neighborhood. Jude became more depressed about his situation. He decided to sell all his belongings and move to a big city.
Helpful. My son-in-law wanted to talk to a classmate. He was very embarrassed. He wanted to apologize. I told him he was not alone. I reassured him that he could talk without feeling so bad.

Making potato chips. I decided to make a potato chip recipe. I bought potato chips. I mixed them up and took them to school. Some of the kids made a big mess. The rest just stood there with their chips.

A New Friend. Jasmine was having a difficult time at school. She was making new friends and felt overwhelmed. She decided she needed to get better at socializing. Jasmine joined a group of young adults to meet new people. Jasmine felt very accomplished and thankful.

Money is no good. I took a bus to work to get money. I got there and had to wait for another bus. Finally it came and I had the money for the bus. My car needed to be fixed. I was able to walk out of the place but not before paying for it.

Skipping Lunch. Sam and his girlfriend were planning to go skiing for dinner. Sam had a lot of extra money he could spend on the trip. But he did not want to skip lunch. He went to the grocery store to buy all his things. He was so hungry, he sat at the table eating all his food!
Shaving. A group of men went to the salon. They wanted to shave. They went to the nearest salons. Some of the men shaved at home. Some men went to a shop.

Irony. Joey's girlfriend was drunk one night and attacked him. Joey tried to defend himself and hit her, but his girlfriend was strong and ran. Joey was not able to fight back and his girlfriend left him. Joey went home and apologized to his girlfriend. He promised to never do that again.

Wine Taster. Amy and her sister went to the local winery to taste a vintage grape. They were not expecting anything special. They ordered a glass of champagne. They sampled many different wines. Amy was impressed with the taste of many different grapes.

Hill. Raul went to his favorite park. He took a long walk and took a seat on a bench. He asked the kid to take a seat next to him. He then proceeded to ask the kid all sorts of questions. When he was done, the kid was happy that he was happy.

Beating the Rain Home. I went out one day. It was a very dry day. I decided I would go outside and play. So I went outside and played football. I went outside and felt the fresh air and I got a great tan.

Pizza party fun. Alex was having a pizza party. She invited everyone, including her friend. At the pizza party, everyone loved it. She had her friends do the dishes. When her friends left, she got her friends to come back.
The Lost Contacts. Mary was at the store. She tried to find her lost contacts. One was in the back of the truck. Mary looked for a couple more days. Finally she found her contacts.

Messina. Messina was my best friend. We played hide and seek together everyday. The other day my mom told me that she found a new pet. I found it in the bathtub one day. She had it stolen from her last week!
Match. Lily was bored and playing video games. She was enjoying herself. However, she began to get too bored. Finally, she got into a bad mood. She started to beat up on herself.

New Appliances. I had several appliances on my floor. I decided to buy a vacuum cleaner. Unfortunately the vacuum broke within weeks of buying it. I spent the money for a new set. It was nice to get a cleaning machine again.

Changing routine. It was a summer with very hot weather. I tried to go to work everyday. Unfortunately my boss never let me. He decided to get a new routine for me. I now work at a much cooler temperature.
New Puppy. One day, I noticed that my dog was sick. I decided to buy a puppy from the pet store. The puppy was very energetic and playful. I named him Jasper. He is my best friend and loves us all!

Flooded Street. It was a rainy day and I was ready to go out. All of a sudden, it began to rain all over my car. I ran outside and started to try to dry the car. But to no avail. My car was soaked and flooded.

Cardiac Arrest. The family was going to a concert. All of a sudden, my wife was having an episode. I came to her room and told her it was time to leave. She got up and drove me away. Luckily, the paramedics were able to calm her down.
Fishing trip. I was on a fishing trip with my dad. It was on a large lake. We went for three hours. We caught some salmon. We then had dinner.

Late getting home. Today was the first day of my daughter's second birthday. She was born in the middle of the night. The day began and began and I couldn't sleep. I told her to wake me up early. We had to drive home the next day.

The Garden. Tina was in the garden with her mom. They had been looking over the flower arrangements. Soon, they were putting up new flower arrangements. Then Tina picked out a large cherry bush. She sat and watched them make it bloom.

Vegas. Alicia had always wanted to go to Las Vegas. She had been living in Boston for a while and was ready to move there. She booked a plane ticket from Boston to Las Vegas. She was happy to finally see the Grand Canyon!Alicia couldn't wait to go back again!

Sunrise. The sky was clear and cool when I woke up in the morning. It felt as if I had stepped into the sunset. The view was wonderful and I was completely immersed. I could not wait to go back to sleep and fall asleep. The sun was so warm and humid, I fell asleep just in time.

Basket. Amy got a basket to take with her to the store. She was very excited about getting a basket. She opened it up and put everything she wanted. She then put a gift on the top of it. Her gift was too big for her and she fell down the stairs.

The Poker Game. Jared was playing poker with his friend. His friend was upset that Jared was ahead. Jared had a surprise for his friend. Jared played a one card hand with his friend. Jared won his friend's poker hand!
Shopping with Bill. Tim had a bad day. He got very hungry. He didn't have any snacks. He decided to go to the supermarket. Tim got many items.
Tires. I bought new tires for my car. I bought them for the summer. They cost me almost double what they should have been. In the winter they became loose. I ended up breaking my car in the process.

Lost ring. Nora was at the mall one day. She was trying to buy a new ring. Unfortunately, she had no money. Finally, she ran into a friendly man who had a nice ring. He helped Nora get the ring she wanted, and it was worth the trouble.

Looking for a dog. Sue was looking for her first dog. She decided to look at a few local shelters. She looked at a small dog shelter that didn't have a dog. She decided that she needed a dog more than anything else. The next morning Sue found the perfect dog.
Older Child. John was an older child. He was not happy about his old age. John got older and realized how miserable it was. He decided to become a counselor. John eventually learned his lesson.
Cable Issues. Tom was watching his kids. They were playing on the roof. The cable that runs between the roof and the house was cut. Tom and his kids were unhappy. They threw a TV at the cable guy.
T-Bar. When I was little, we took a trip to the grocery store. We visited T-bar. We ordered the t-bar. It was delicious. We loved it!

Reynolds. Reynolds liked working in the office. He would always go home to his girlfriend. So he decided to start a career in art. He created beautiful pieces for clients. Reynolds is a successful artist with a well-paying job.

Eddie He crashes hard. Eddie was racing a friend. He was behind them and he started to make a lot of mistakes. They were going very fast and there was a sudden gust of wind. Eddie crashed hard and they both had to take cover. Thankfully Eddie was okay and didn't make it.

Sewing a Dress. Sara had decided to sew a dress for her daughter. She tried sewing and sewing on the sewing machine. Her work was really sloppy and she eventually gave up. She asked her mother for help and had the sewing machine fixed. Sara was finally able to make her daughter a nice dress.

Back pain. I was doing some weight training. When I did the exercise it was difficult. I realized it had been a while since I started lifting weights. The muscles in my back pain got worse. I decided to stop lifting weights.
Kristy's First Recital. Kristy had a new record contract. She was very excited for her first performance. She practiced for weeks. She was nervous for the first gig. Kristy gave it her all.

The Game. The family was on their way to the amusement park. The children were excited to play the new rollercoaster. The rollercoaster was so loud and very fun!The little girls began to cry as they started to slide down. Thankfully, everyone ended up falling asleep as they hit the bottom.

Overweight Dog. I went to my favorite dog park. There was one named Tom. He was so large that he had a dog sitter. The sitter was in charge of keeping Tom company. Tom was very thin and he would go under a blanket to get water.

New screen protector. Julia is at the store with her kids. She finds a screen protector for her phone. She tries it out and loves it. The screen protector didn't last long though. The screen protector went flying and shattered!
Ballet Class`. Molly decided to take ballet class. She decided to take her first class. She did very well. She ended up getting a scholarship. Molly was glad to be a part of ballet class.
A roach. Karen was at a friend's house. The friend had a roach infestation. Karen didn't know what to do. She threw the roaches out. The friend's roach problem was fixed.

Facing the Fear. The man had always feared tigers. But he hadn't been scared at all. One day, he was walking around in the forest with friends. Suddenly, a tiger came close. The man was afraid and ran away quickly.

Angry Dog. My brother's dog was barking at me in the street. I walked up to him to tell him to stop. The dog continued to bark. I tried to talk to the dog to get it to calm down. I didn't do enough to calm the dog.

First Day of School. A little girl ran up to me with a big smile. She had just taken her first day of kindergarten. She had no idea what to expect so I gave her a few words. She went to school smiling from ear to ear and said I made her happy. I realized I was very naive, and my mom took her to a counselor.

Ana Eats Cereal. Ana decided she needed a break from school and decided to make a bowl of cereal. She set up a big bowl and put cereal in the toaster. Then she put her favorite cereal in the toaster. Ana was able to eat her cereal for over an hour. Ana was happy that she had had a break.

The Look. Gina was shopping at Target. She went with her friend to the beauty counter. The counter clerk said that she had two sizes of lipstick. Gina asked if she could try it on. Gina got a surprise when she saw the lipstick in the lipstick drawer.
Puppies. One day my dog went outside. She was trying to climb on the fence. We could not get her out. She ran across the street. We found her in the park.

Gift. Nancy was getting ready to go out for a nice meal. She had her dog with her and was excited for him to get home. She walked to her favorite pizza place and ordered a cheeseburger. Her dog was excited and went inside. When he came home he had a big bag of treats!

Beatles. Bill was a rock fan. He listened to the Beatles on the radio every morning. He wanted a t-shirt with his favorite band. He bought the t-shirt, which was red. Bill wore the t-shirt to school the next day.
Brockton Rox. Brockton Rox was a small town. It was a quiet, quiet town. They were struggling financially. They were losing money. They moved away and never returned.

Death Scare. One day, I went to the DMV in San Francisco. While there, I saw a young girl waiting for a car. The DMV told the girl she would be ticketed if she was driving. She looked in her purse and saw that the license plate was hers. So she ran up to the DMV, and they gave her a ticket.

First Day. Sarah and the kids were excited to start kindergarten. They arrived at the school on time. The teacher walked the kids into the classroom. Sarah and the kids sat down on the floor. The teacher took their turn to take a seat.

A Good Student. Jed had a great time at his high school. He had a lot of good friends and a lot of fun. His grades began to fall. He was offered a scholarship. Jed decided to stay and earn his scholarship.

Life Changes. A woman lost her job. She decided to start over at her new job. She learned to cook, organize and pay bills. She worked very hard to save money for her family. She felt proud of herself and her new job.

Allergic Reaction. I was on my way to my doctor appointment. As I was crossing the street, my nose started to pop. I was allergic to a lot of things. My doctor said that I should go to a hospital. I was scared and decided not to go there.

Travel Spanish. Samantha went to Spain with her boyfriend. They went to a hotel and ate breakfast. Samantha stayed all weekend in Spain. She had a lovely time. When they left they were all very happy.

Energized. Tim was running on a treadmill. He decided he was ready for a new challenge. He started jogging for fifteen minutes every other day. He gained five pounds in a month. It made his cardio very energizing.

Class. Katherine was getting ready for her first class. Her friends were already waiting for her to show up. Katherine was too excited to be at work. She decided to go home instead. Her friends were sad but she was happy.

Shampoo. Mary wanted to have her hair color matched. She looked at many companies for a product to match her hair color. When she found the best one, she went to a barber. She cut her hair with her product and put it on. She didn't get a hair product like that ever again.

Caught. Nia was playing hide and seek with her cousins. She heard something coming from the woods behind her. Nia went up to the tree and saw a huge bear. The bear turned and ran back towards the woods. Nia was scared and ran to her mom.
Headphones. Jane had headphones on her head. She would listen to music all the time. One day she started getting very bored. She left the headphones on all day. It ruined her headphones.

Tough Negotiation. Kelsey was working on her presentation at school. She was very close to the final round. She was very excited. Finally she was able to have her presentation. Everyone loved it and it was a big success.
Jason Goes to Spain. Jason is tired of being bored. He decides to go to Spain. Jason goes on an amazing vacation. He feels very comfortable. Jason now feels bored every time he is bored.

Aw Nuts. Allie decided to go for a run after school. She decided to take the treadmill she got for free. She ran on the treadmill for about an hour. When she had finished she walked to the store. There, she found a dozen kinds of nuts to make for breakfast.

Bulk. My friend's boyfriend went on a job trip to the state. On the way home from the trip, he got into an accident. The car he was driving hit a tree. His friend had to carry him home. He needed to use the bathroom in the house.

Swimming Lessons. Kate really wanted to learn to swim. She decided to join her friends for swimming lessons. They took turns swimming the length of the lake. They learned how to swim with a friend, and got very good. They went on a swim for a month and learned how to swim.

Johnny plays basketball. Johnny loves to play basketball. Johnny practices and plays every day. He has a great game on Friday. He scored 17 points on 8 of 12 shots. He has now scored 20 points on 10 of 12 shots!

Making a painting. Tom was very into painting. His parents were very poor, so he was doing very poorly. Tom worked very hard, but he still had trouble. Tom learned the hard way that he could do very well if he trained hard. Now, Tom is very proud of his skill, and never makes mistakes again.

The Blanket. My wife and I decided to spend a week at our aunt's house. She gave us blankets and pillows. We both fell asleep on the blankets. I tried to pull away but got too hot to get to bed. After the two hours, I felt very sleepy.

Dottie Needs A Bath. Dottie had been sick for two weeks. She had been so upset about the fact that she had not gotten a bath. She wanted to make the best of her bad situation. When her boss called, she rushed to her work desk to finish her shift. Dottie was happy when she saw that her work was done.
Hunting. Tom was hiking in the woods. He spotted a deer!Tom took it home. The deer was a huge brown one. Tom was able to keep it for years!

Health Care. Jim worked for the federal government. Jim had to make a decision about his health care. Jim had health insurance. Jim did not like that his health care plan did not pay for his medication. Jim decided not to go to the doctor.

Work Life. I was going to take a vacation with my family to Florida. I worked long hours at my job. I went into debt to pay off my debt. I felt very exhausted that day. I decided to quit my job in order to save up money.

Hair. Tim was playing football with his friends. They were on the opposite side of the field. Tim's teammate threw the football into the air. Tim caught it and threw his head back. The ball landed right on the grass.

Amy's New Child. Amy had been caring for her newborn son for several months. All morning, Amy went to work, but when she came home, her baby was nowhere to be found. She asked her husband to go to school with her in the morning. After several hours, Amy got a call from the baby's mother. Amy's husband found the baby sleeping in the living room.

cooking class. Lucy needed to be extra prepared for her upcoming cooking class. Her mother decided to make lemonade. Lucy and her mom made the lemons and lemonade for the class. Lucy tasted the lemonade and was disgusted. She refused to make lemonade again.

Fusion. Marge was a scientist and decided to research the fusion process. She studied hard and found out about fusion. Marge got hired for a new lab and wanted to become the first scientist to work there. After working for her first two years, she was finally hired. She was so excited, she was so proud of herself.
First Haircut. Tom wanted a new hairstyle. He went to the hair salon. He picked out a new ponytail. The stylist cut his hair and styled it. Tom was very proud of his new haircut.

Train Trip. Sara was excited about going to a new city. She had been studying for months. She bought a plane ticket and booked the train. On the train ride to the new city she fell asleep. Later that day, Sara had to stay at her aunt's house for a week.
The Investigation. Betsy's mom found a baby on the floor. She had been killed. She had never told Betsy's dad. Her mom asked him about the baby. He told her he was just a stray.

Berry gets hurt. Berry has been trying to eat a fruit smoothie for a whole day. Unfortunately, he ends up taking a huge bite. He then goes to the doctor for a checkup. The doctor gives him the dreaded cortisone shot. Berry has a terrible pain in his side and needs an operation.

Too tired to remember to pay. Sarah was a single mother in a long term relationship. She had been living with her boyfriend for five years. She was too tired to remember to pay her rent on time. She asked her boyfriend to pay her for weeks. He refused to do so and had to take her to court.

stray. My dog was barking all night long. He was barking because he was too scared to go outside. He wanted to be outside but couldn't. Then one day I noticed he had lost his leash!So now he's just a happy dog sleeping under a bridge.

Land Surprise. My best friend is an English major. We live in New York City, but my roommate lives in Germany. One day my roommate was trying to get us lunch when he saw a large landmark. He saw a large moat, and began to scream. A large boat came from the other side and he was taken back to Germany.

The Trampoline. Kelly was very bored. She wanted to do something fun. So she asked her mom to get her a trampoline. They went and bought one for her. Soon Kelly had a great time in her new trampoline.

Best job. Jared was looking for a new job. He decided to apply to a job at a large company. Jared interviewed at the company for three days. Jared was excited to finally be interviewing at the company. Jared was fired from the job he applied for.

Dishes. Jane's daughter wanted to take her to the park. Jane asked her what she wanted to do. She suggested she take her to her favorite bar. Jane's daughter didn't like the idea. Jane told her to go to a fancy restaurant instead.

Cancer. I had an anxiety attack at work and stayed up late to finish. I began drinking coffee every morning. On my way home I ran into a friend and started laughing. My stomach started to hurt and I went to bed. My friend helped me to get a pain medication and gave me a few minutes.

Fashionista in Training. Meredith loved the fashion industry. She wanted to be like the fashion designers. She worked hard studying every day. She was finally ready for the interview for the fashion modeling job. When the interview began she was surprised and excited.

Cat at the  window. Caleb had always liked cats. One day his neighbors invited him to go to the yard. He looked all around for a cat. Caleb found a great one and brought it home. His cat now loves Caleb and is very friendly.

The Dented Car. My friend and I were driving around the neighborhood on our way to a friend's house. I noticed a lot of cars had small damage to them. After a few minutes, I noticed that some of the tires had gotten dented. I pulled into a tire shop and paid for the tires. Now the whole street has a huge hole in it because of it.

Large. Last week I went to visit my grandmother's home. She had been out of town for the summer. While she was gone, I had to go get a new car. I was on the way back to the car when a car suddenly appeared out of nowhere. The car was an SUV.
A new bike. Jane wanted a new bike. She went to the store. They had a bike for her. She bought it. Jane loved the bike.
Phone Service. Kelly needed to find a new phone. The one she wanted was the best. Kelly asked her friends for suggestions. One friend suggested texting. Kelly text and got the phone she wanted.

Bee. Susie was watching a bee on the wall. She decided to climb up and get a bite. It was an adorable, furry bee. She held it, thinking about all the joy she would have. Her fear turned to joy and she held it.

Painting. Jenny had just moved to a new house and needed to paint. She looked all over the house for paint to use. When she finally found what she was looking for, she ran to her closet to start. She ended up running out of paint, so she used her brushes instead. Finally, Jenny had the perfect piece of art!
Shark Attack. Sandra was in the ocean. Suddenly, a shark attacked. Sandra swam away. A fisherman found Sandra and brought her to shore. Luckily, Sandra survived.
Beach. I went to the beach last week. The beaches are so beautiful. I went to the beach with friends. We had some fun and did not want to leave. I am so happy I went.

Life is No Beach. When I was little, I dreamed of being on the beach. But then I learned there was no life in the sand. I decided to live with a large group of other children in the ocean. I stayed far away from the ocean so I would feel closer. Today, I live in a new town far from the ocean.

Loud Neighbors. A few neighbors were loud and noisy all the time. They were bothering my cat and causing it a lot of damage. I had to make them quiet down. I called them in, and they cleaned up the mess. They were happy to go out to play again.

Found Change. Kate had a large amount of money that she didn't have a way to put towards. Her friend had given her some money for a friend. Kate and her friend spent some money together to buy some candy. Kate noticed the candy was gone and couldn't find it. Kate checked her account and saw it had been returned.

Out to lunch. Gina needed some water after her shower. She had been too tired to cook dinner. She decided to go to the store. Gina picked out a bottle of water and headed out to the car. She headed home and got out to eat.

Songwriter. Tim wanted to write his own song. He went to a local recording studio. He listened to the recordings and learned a lot about their sound. The next day he recorded a song for a record label. Tim went to the label and wrote the song and the record company liked it.

Defensive Driving. I was going for a run on the way home from school. I was driving very fast, and I had just gotten in. I got very into an accident, which injured myself. I ended up in the hospital for a week. Now I work with the insurance company on defensive driving.
Just Order Pizza. Tim was feeling down. He could not find anything to eat. Then he decided to order pizza. He ordered the biggest pizza he could find. After ordering his pizza Tim felt great.

Rock climbing fear. My wife and I went out to explore our favorite canyon one night. The canyon was very narrow and steep and we feared we were in trouble. Finally we got to the top of the climb. The rock came right out of the rock face and it scared us. We were not sure what to do with ourselves that night.

Accidentally. Gina was playing in the park one day. She got distracted by the sound of the rain outside. She ended up falling into a puddle. Gina had to call an ambulance. Gina had to go to the hospital.
Robbed. Sue was on her way to work. Suddenly, someone walked up to her window. He grabbed her purse. Then, he tried to take off all her clothes. She screamed for her mother to chase after him.

Embarrassment at the Mall. Kim was driving to the mall with her friends. Kim was late because of traffic. When she got to the mall it was already dark. When she saw a security guard there, she yelled at him. He told her he was there to clean her car and she had to pay for it.

Bench. Mary was working out at the gym. She noticed that her legs were getting stronger. She decided to bench press some weights. She set up the barbell on the ground and started to work. She felt much stronger and faster afterwards.

Warm Milk. Janice's mom made her a cup of cold water for her. When Janice got the water, she noticed the water tasted strange. Janice tasted some ice cream that tasted like a banana. Janice was horrified and spit the ice cream on her floor. Afterwards, Janice was able to enjoy a nice cold glass of milk.

Ghost. Tom had been in the army for six years. He was about to be deployed to Iraq. He was nervous about being in a war zone. When he went in, he saw ghosts in the woods and heard weird noises. He had been wrong and was relieved to be safe.

New Chromebook Laptop. I just ordered a new laptop from Amazon. I wanted to have one that would run Windows 10. I needed to be able to go back and forth between my other computer. My friend offered to lend me her laptop if I paid for it. Now we can use the laptop from now on.

The Good. Sam's friend Sam asked him to come over to the store for coffee. Sam and his friends were walking to the checkout. They stopped at a gas station to get coffee and a snack. Sam's friends told him they could use his debit card. Sam happily took the money and went home.
Tough burn. Jane was in a new part of town. She was trying to get some lunch. The traffic was crazy. Jane got stuck in the mud. She couldn't get out fast enough.
Objection. Sam wanted to go to the beach. The people were blocking his way. Sam was trying to get to the beach. He didn't realize how crowded the road was. Sam got stuck for a long time.

Gym. The new gym in town was very crowded. The teacher took us into the gym to practice the lifts. She told us not to do anything on the lifts until we were ready. I didn't want to do anything for a month. I started lifting weights and got ready for the next week.

First Female Football Player. Lena played football for the first time. She was very nervous. She was playing against a girl who was younger. After the game, Lena took it back to the locker room. The locker room was very quiet.

Bird Feeder. Last week I was feeding my bird a bird feeder. As I was doing so my mother jumped onto the feeder. When she tried to eat the feeder, it fell. The bird was injured and had to be rushed to the vet. I was able to return my bird feeder.
New School. I went to my new school for the first time today. I was really nervous. I saw so many new faces. It was exciting. I was so happy.

Funny Girl. Kate was at a party with friends. She thought a joke she heard had a nice ring to it. She wasn't sure what the joke was so she asked a boy for help. He came up with a funny story about an old movie about a girl. Kate decided to buy the movie and give it a try to see what it was about.

History. Jill was in middle school. She was in a small town that only had a few houses. She really wanted to go to college. She was told to go to an older school. She ended up not going to college and still lives in the same house.

Angela's Essay. Angela was going to be the last teacher to take her class in grade school. She had a few ideas for how to improve their grades. She asked the class if they would be willing to give her some tips. The kids told her they all enjoyed her essay style. Angela decided she would use her essay style to improve the school.

The Phone Fiasco. A guy called into his local news show. He asked what was going on with his phone. The host was so interested in what the guy was saying he asked questions. The guy didn't know what he was talking about and ended up spewing profanity. The host laughed and said he would fire the guy.
Moused. Sam was mowing his lawn. He was getting ready for work. His dog was barking. Sam didn't notice it for awhile. The dog ran off.

Karen's help. Karen had a terrible case of allergies. Her mom got her in a room and got her a bottle of medicine. She put the bottle in her mouth and took a big swig. Karen couldn't get a breath of relief and choked. Her mom brought her to the doctor, who prescribed some pills.

One Man Circus. It was a summer night and Jim was tired. He decided to ride his horse on the circus grounds. When he got there his horse was scared of the men who were chasing him. Jim was able to escape after they caught him. He decided to go back home afterwards.

economics class. Lucy was in her economics class. She was talking about how low prices can happen in the market. Everyone laughed at her. Lucy was worried about the class because she didn't know what to say. Afterwards she went back to the classroom and had a very difficult time.
sailing. Sandy loved sailing. She was really looking forward to it. Her boyfriend was having a party. He had asked her to go sailing with him. Sandy decided to go with him.

Trip to the Vet. I went to the vet for my dog. The vet checked him out and let me in. I was petrified at how big the dog looked. He was so small I thought he was a bear. He was so small I even dropped the treat from the leash.

Baking. One day, Susie went to the grocery store. She couldn't find any bread on the shelf. She decided to buy a bread cake to make. Susie bought a large bag of flour and sugar. She poured the flour and sugar into the cake.

Not Impressed. Sarah was talking to her crush on a hot summer day. He wasn't impressed with her. He said that she was pretty and hot and asked for her number. Sarah thought for sure and tried to laugh it off. But the next day she got a creepy text message about the number.

James and the Driving Test. James was nervous about his driving test today. His parents said that he could sit his test for free if he gets better. James decided to take the test anyway. James passed with flying colors. His parents felt good about their son's performance.

The New Puppy. Lily was on a trip to visit her sister. Her sister was giving away lots of puppies. She bought all the puppies she could find. She was so excited to take a new puppy home. She was sad to leave the new puppy alone at home.
Birthday Cake. I made a cake for my daughter. She loves cakes. I wanted her to be happy for her birthday. My wife prepared the cake. She was happy and had a cake for her.

Rebooting The Network. The network was shutting down one night. It was time for me to reboot. I plugged my monitor into the computer. The computer shut down and I did not get the monitor back. The computer had rebooted.

Visiting Family. My wife and I went to visit my brother and his family. We went to his favorite barber shop for their hair cut. I had a hair cut at my sister's house. My brother and I went to his favorite barber shop to get his haircut. I had a haircut too at a nice salon.

Bottom of the sea. When Dan got home, he had forgotten all about the ocean. He had forgotten that the water was  deep and scary. When Dan arrived at his house, there was only a foot of water. Dan quickly ran out of his home to reach the water. Dan was happy that he finally returned to his home.

Chef Tasha. Chef Tasha's daughter was a college student who couldn't find her first job. Her father asked her to take her out for dinner and get her experience. Tasha happily accepted, and set out to make a great first impression. After dinner, she went to the coffee shop and ordered a coffee and some french fries. Upon finishing the meal, Tasha thanked her father and went home.

Hamster. I went on a trip to the zoo. I had the chance to see some hamsters. I took the lead to pet a hamster. The hamster jumped on the lead and started to chase me. I ended up throwing the hamster off my back and I'm not sure how he did it.

Allergic. Jill had never had an allergy. She was having trouble getting the dog to lay on its side. One morning while cleaning the house she forgot to get a dryer. The dog ended up scratching itself in the dryer and stinging. Jill now goes out of the house at night.
Doll. When I was little, I liked dolls. I had many dolls and wanted to collect them. I ended up buying a Barbie doll. I decided to keep all of the dolls. I ended up owning twenty dolls.

Getting Fat. Maggie always wanted to lose weight. She began to lose weight by making healthy choices. She stopped drinking soda. She also cut out fast food and soda from her diet. Her first fat loss session was successful!

Nature. Anna and her sister were going to the forest. Anna had her hair tied in a bun and was dressed in a red shirt. Her sister was in a blue shirt and black pants. Anna had a long white cane and her sister had a green cane. They spent the rest of the day walking around, exploring the forest.

The Big Storm. It started to snow so fast that the school was closed. It was really cold that winter and everyone was very scared. They were afraid of thunder and lightning. But then the school was reopened!Everyone went outside to get warm!

Haunted?. Kara was trying to take a picture of the Haunted House. She was trying to take a picture of the carousel. Suddenly, she heard a noise. Her hand got jammed in the door. She looked for her phone in her pocket, but found it too small.

The Ski Trip. Jim wanted to do a ski trip with his friends. They drove to the mountain to ski. They arrived at the peak and spent a few hours skiing. The boys decided that it was not a good idea to go skiing alone. They went back home at sundown.

Muffler. Jace was going to work on his car today. He looked at the muffler in his car. He took it apart and the muffler was damaged. His boss found out and made him pay for it. Now Jace has to work on his car without the muffler.

Class. Mary had to take an afternoon class. She went on a date to the movie theatre. When they arrived, her date was sitting on the bench. They had a nice conversation. They went to the movies together.

Ears Pierced for the First Time. Jenny was visiting her parents and brother in her home. They had just had a cat in, so they went to visit a dog. Jenny noticed that her ears were pierced. She took pictures of her pierced ears. Now Jenny can have her ears pierced if she chooses.

mermaid. Sue was on a school trip to Disney World. There she met a girl named Beth, who was a mermaid. They stayed with the kids for the day, but then Sue wanted to go home. She decided to stay until she could go home herself. The next day she found her way back home from the park.

Tomboy Ballerina. Mandy and her friends decided to play basketball. Mandy got to play with her friends. She got all the points and was able to win. It was so great that her parents let her play. The next time she decided to play she won.

Garbage Man. It was a beautiful fall day. My sister in law was driving her car. She noticed a small pile of garbage outside her house. The garbage man came by and started picking it up. I guess we can't have nice things.

Poor artist. An artist came up to me one day and asked me to draw. I was very hesitant because I was new to drawing. I told him I didn't like it, and he was disappointed. He said that he needed money to pay for the artist's room. I agreed to his deal, but it cost him thousands!
Roasting Session. Sandy went to the market. She bought some roasted almonds. She roasted them. When she took them out she forgot to take the lid off. Her almonds burned right away.

Flat. Sue was moving across town. She was so excited to move into her new home. But the ground underneath her house was flat!She had to walk across a few steps to get to the street. Luckily, she was able to get through with just one step.

His Feet. I was at the bar with a new friend. It was our first night there. Our host asked if he could give me a massage. I declined because of the discomfort. He told me he would give me more money if I did not want one.

The last chance. Lance was riding his motorcycle home from work. He saw something he couldn't see coming. A deer was coming into his path. Lance went out into the road and stopped his motorcycle. The deer drove away, and Lance was glad to stop.

Horse Races. Kelly was having a horse race one afternoon. She was nervous, but was in good spirits. She had her horse race all set up, and was on her horse. She started off on horseback, and began to pass the other horse. After her horse won, Kelly was very proud!

Homework. Jenny was so excited. She had a really difficult homework assignment for the class. She rushed out to complete it. Then she got home, ready to finish. She was so relieved when she saw she had done her homework!
Fruit salad making. I had never made fruit salad before. I decided to make a fruit salad recipe. I decided to use grapes and blueberries. It tasted great. I now have my own fruit salad shop.
Cake. Anna was at the mall. She went to the candy store. She bought some chocolate chip cookies. She took them home. Anna baked a giant chocolate cake for her family.
The Lipstick. I got lipstick for my lips yesterday. I did not get the color I wanted. I did not want it to run. I did not want it to be too pink. I ended up not wearing it to school today.

Fred. Fred was a kid who loved to draw. He always thought of himself as a very creative person. One day a boy walked into his room. He took a picture of Fred. His friends all started calling him Fred.

Figuring out the story. Alicia and her friends wanted to learn how to figuratively tell stories. So they looked up ways to make a figurative story about the holidays. Finally, she decided to make up a story about the tree falling in the street. To her surprise, no one at the party believed her. They agreed to let her keep her story.

The Wedding Announcement. Sam's boyfriend was proposing to him. Sam didn't want to be the one to propose. But he knew his parents wouldn't approve. So he decided to make the announcement on their website. He got a huge amount of hate mail from people who thought he was stupid.

Billburg. Billburg, Virginia had a beautiful, blue sandy beach. All the kids went swimming there. Billburg also had a large casino. Billburg's casino offered a lot of money to new players. Billburg was very popular during the 1960s.
A few drinks. Anna really wanted to have a few drinks. So she got a lot of them. When she got home she tried them. They were amazing. She couldn't believe how good they were.

Snow Storm. Ricky was a snow storm survivor. The snow storm was going on for four days straight. His family was staying in a hotel. They tried to keep him safe by making sure he had blankets. Ricky ended up sleeping under blankets on the floor.

Hypnotism. I had been trying to be hypnotherapist since I was twelve. The symptoms became apparent early. I was beginning to get symptoms like confusion and fear. I began to worry. I ended up having to take a leave of absence to work.

Hail Storm. All of a sudden, I heard the wind howling in the distance. I jumped into the car and sped away. As I drove, I saw a hail storm. It was like seeing a tornado coming. Afterwards, I drove home without any luck.
New Name. Kelly was growing up. She started getting married. She took a lot of great photos of her new kids. Kelly named her baby by their last name. Now Kelly is very happy.
Last Letter. Mack was driving in a big city. He passed a lady. She didn't know who he was. She tried to stop. He laughed and pulled over.
Smash. The kids were playing tag. One of the kids caught the other kid in the jaw. The kid got very angry. He kicked the kid hard. The kid fell to the ground.

Moving Out of State. Sue and her husband are moving out of state. They have been saving for their move for months. Sue and her husband are excited to begin moving. When Sue's husband arrived, they all packed their bags. They drove to the airport and they all packed their bags.

Torn Shorts. I got a really big box of t-shirts from the store. I put the shirts in my trunk and drove home. I took one shirt out to my car. I noticed the top ripped and it was very dirty. I could not take it and was mad at myself for not being more careful.
Tony Grills a Fish. Tony is out fishing with his son. He catches a small fish. He lets the fish go. His son catches another smaller fish. Tony grills his next catch.
Sam has a fall. Sam was driving home from school. Suddenly he got pulled over by the police. He had a minor traffic offense. The police officer gave him a ticket. Sam had to pay the ticket.

Alarm. Sally woke up late and didn't want to go to bed. She got dressed and went to school. Sally went to her science class. She had to work in the lab for over an hour. After work, Sally checked her alarm clock and felt better.
Food Poisoning. Samantha was eating at a restaurant. It was just her first day there. Suddenly, she noticed a smell. She quickly ran home and took a bottle of medicine. Samantha quickly felt better.

Bowling Champion. Ally wanted to be a bowling champion at her local bowling alley. She went to the bowling alley with a team of bowlers. The bowlers started to shoot the ball around. The ball hit the ballista and the ballista hit Ally. Ally had to quit bowling because she lost her grip on the ballista.

Quiz. I had a test the other day. I was studying for the test. I was not paying attention and my teacher called me. The teacher asked me questions that I should answer. I ended up answering everything correctly.

Check Again. My mom checked my locker yesterday. She found my wallet on the ground. I took the wallet to the school principal. The principal told me that it's stolen and it's not worth my time. I have to return it.

The Cubbies. Diana had a big table of dolls. She had a bunch of big dolls in all sizes. Every day she made some doll for her birthday. The day came for Diana to take all the dolls out of the house. The day was almost over when all the dolls were taken.

Good enough. Kara didn't want to go to the mall. She was really bored with her life. But she knew the mall was close by and there was a car there. So she decided to go to the mall anyway. As soon as she stepped in the mall she fell into a warm embrace.

Laundry Cash. Lydia was trying to do laundry in her back yard. She got all the clothes to put in the dryer. Unfortunately, she forgot about the money for the dryer. She had to throw out a lot of clothes. Now Lydia has a lot of clothes that she's not allowed to wear.

Piano lessons. I had to take piano lessons in class for a test. I was nervous about taking the test. The teacher told me that I was good enough to pass. I practiced all day on the piano, then went home. The next day, the teacher called me for an exam.
Hair Loss. My hair is falling out!I don't have enough time to fix it up. I decided to go to a salon. I got a new haircut and my friends are jealous. I decided to go back to getting a manicure.

The Fair. Lulu went to the fair to see the pony carnival. There was a whole section where there were live animals to try out for her pony. She had never tried a pony before, and was nervous. When she got to the first section, her horse tried out for her. She jumped when he saw her, and his name was Mike!

Out of Deodorant. I tried to keep the weather out when I was at work. I put on deodorant. While on my way home I realized I did not have it on. When I came home I realized I had to get out of the house. I threw it all away and decided to not do that anymore.

Lost and Found. Kelly was home late one night. She heard her alarm go off. She looked outside and found the door locked. She looked all over the house for the key but couldn't find it. She ended up getting home late in the evening.
Uncertain about Lecture. Tina was at the lecture hall. She had to take a test. She was nervous about it. The instructor gave her a question to write. Tina finished it and wrote a great essay.

Running in a race. Amy was nervous about going into a race this weekend. But she had a strong desire to participate. Amy did her best to prepare for her first race. However, after a week, Amy started to feel weak. Amy knew she needed to do more to stay fit.

Riding a Bike. Gina's dad bought her a new bike. She hated riding her bike. She wanted to try to ride her bike one day. When Gina got home she decided she wanted to ride her bike. Gina was happy to finally be able to ride her bike.
Weight Sadness. I had a lot of weight on me. I had a hard time feeling better. One day I decided to take it easy. I lost 10 pounds. I feel better now.

Norma Cleans the Fish Tank. Norma is a woman that does not like to clean the fish tank. Norma had decided to hire a cleaner and was excited for the job. Norma arrived at the fish tank and greeted the customer. Norma was greeted by the customer who asked for Norma to help clean the fish tank. Norma began to clean the fish tank and the customer was impressed.
Manicurist. Alicia is a manicurist. She decides to start a company. She hires a lot of other people. She is getting more and more popular. Alicia is happy.

Smoky Barbecuing. Lucy was cooking ribs at home. Her brother came in to check on the meat. He told her they were burned and couldn't cook. He didn't even touch them. Lucy then decided to cook them anyway.
Exam. Tom was preparing for an exam. His teacher wanted to give him a break. He took an entire day off from studying. Tom was able to study in the classroom. He passed his exam without a problem.

The Windy Day. Sara was on the porch and saw the sky getting very dark. She couldn't believe how it was getting so dark!Suddenly, a gust of wind blew and it started to snow. Sara immediately began to run for shelter. Thankfully, her cat snuck inside to help her.

The Lightning. All of the sudden I heard an electrical storm. It was a strong storm that struck the state of Illinois. It lasted for two hours. The thunderstorm lasted all day. It knocked me over a little and made me very nervous.

Building a House. Mary wanted a new house. Her mom said she could only afford to buy one. She found an ad in the paper for a garage sale. Mary made a list of all the parts. She purchased everything and moved in a month later.

She Understands. Amy noticed a note in the newspaper. It was from her mother. She didn't understand the note at all. She asked her mother if she had written it. Amy's mother was mad that she didn't read the newspaper.

Too Drunk. I was in the hospital last night for a minor condition. I had a little bit too much to drink. I wasn't feeling well and wasn't able to drive home. I called my boyfriend. He made me a drink so I can go home.
Molly. Molly was so tired. It was so dark out!She couldn't even see a light on the street. She decided to watch television. She fell asleep.
Bear. A bear was walking near the lake. The bear looked at me and walked away. I went to my car. I drove away quickly. I had to call for help.

Cold Morning. I woke up today with a cold. It was the third time this month. I decided to get a cold spray. After spraying my face and neck, I went to bed. It took me five hours to get my head back to normal.
Cat Poop. My neighbor's cat did not want to do his chores. He decided to do the dishes. He didn't clean them properly. This time he pooped. My cat was very angry.

Mark Cooks Dinner. Mark decided to cook dinner for his friends. He got out all the ingredients. He went to the kitchen and made a pot of vegetables. He took his friends and watched them eat. Mark got a standing ovation from everyone.

A Fun Trip. Tim was a college freshman. He was looking forward to a trip to Japan. He had been to the island of Okinawa a few times. He had always thought it was pretty beautiful. Tim was glad he was going to Japan.

Johnny Runs a Marathon. Johnny is excited to participate in his annual running marathon. He runs for almost an hour straight at least once a week. Johnny runs in his home city every Friday night. He usually wins the race. Johnny is glad he has become a marathon runner.

The Sore Loser. Sam was playing video games with his friends. He lost his favorite character. He didn't get any friends to play with. He tried to pretend to have fun on his computer. He was really sad that he lost his character.

The Cookies. Cathy was baking cookies. She didn't have a good way to spread the batter. She decided to mix them in a bowl. She put them in the oven and they came out great. Cathy then put the cookies in the oven for 30 minutes.

Helping Out. I wanted to help out on the local farm. I decided to feed the cows and sheep. I went to my neighbor's farm and offered to help her. She said no thanks so I went home. Now my neighbor is mad because she didn't know I helped her out.

Baseball Throw. I was at the baseball game. My team had won the game. My ball was hit into the stands. A fan came up to me and said I had thrown the ball in. I decided to not throw the ball in after the fan.

Hard Work Pays Off for Alexis. Alexis had been trying to quit smoking since she was 15. She was finally able to quit last week. She found an easier nicotine fix. When she started working on her math skills, she made great progress. It was good to have a break.
Broken. I went to the store to get groceries. I noticed some dirty dishes. When I tried to clean them, they all got dirty. Then the refrigerator broke. I had to buy new ones.

Copy. Mara wanted to find a cool shirt to wear to school. She could not find any cool shirts in her size. Mara looked in her closet, but no cool shirts were in her size. Mara went home and made up her mind. Mara decided to buy a shirt of the appropriate size in the future.

Martini. We went to dinner on the first weekend. We ordered drinks and food. We shared the appetizers. We sat at the bar drinking each other's drinks. When it was time to pay, we left our plates at home.

Swept by the wind. Ivan couldn't find his car keys anywhere. He went to a gas station to try to get some. He bought a gallon of gas. Ivan put it in the car and turned on the ignition. As soon as he put the car back in, he saw a car with no key on it.
Fred Collects Stamps. Fred loves stamps. He went to the post office. He found out they had lots of stamps. He bought many. Now, Fred doesn't have to go to the post office.
Canned Peas. Anna was feeling hungry. She was out of some canned peas. She decided to go to the store. She bought them all. After she was done she bought more.

The Bad Sitter. Gina's mom would usually babysit her. But it was so crowded on Sunday that Gina was in the wrong place. She was standing in the corner. When she looked down, she realized she had broken her arm. Gina's mom offered to help, but Gina didn't want to.
The Wet Paws. Tim was working in the kitchen at his house. His wife was cooking. Tim told her about his hot dogs. She said the dogs got wet. Tim realized his wife did not want him to do it.

Clowns. All of the kids at school had a clown on the playground. They all made funny faces at the clown. One kid had a face full of teeth. Everyone tried not to laugh at him though. He did not seem to care though.

Pie Eating Contest. Sam wanted to win the pie eating contest. He was in the middle of eating a pie. His friend said it was best to leave when he did. He decided to eat it anyway and left. Sam had to clean up all the leftover pie.

A good fit. Tom was shopping for a new house. He saw the house with a lot of problems. He was looking at several houses but didn't like one. He decided to purchase it. It was a great fit and Tom was happy.

Running into old friends. I took a bus to the beach and got off. I got on the bus and saw a bunch of friends there. I thought they were cool and I decided to take a picture. I started to pose for the camera and forgot about the rest. After about an hour, I noticed that one of my friends had texted me.

Red Sorghum. Amber was on a trip to Maine. She went to the farm market for the first time. She sampled different types of sorghum. The store was having a sale on different types. Amber decided to try some of the red sorghum.

Don't Give Up. Nancy was doing great on her weightlifting routine. She had worked really hard in her gym. She took a few sets to improve. Then she took it all the way to 3 sets per leg. She felt great, and made it to the weightlifting competition.
beach. I went to a big beach yesterday. The sand was really hard. I walked for about five minutes. When I came back, I saw no one. I walked back to my hotel.

Wedding. Kylie was going to the wedding. She thought the groom was lovely. He came to get her at the end of the day. He made her an order of hot dogs for the wedding. Kylie was sad it was not his wife.
The Bus Fight. I went to school one day in 1992. A bus pulled into the school. There was a fight on the bus. The boy who was fighting started to cry. My mom and I had to pull him off the bus.

Time to cook dinner!. I decided to get up early to make myself some breakfast. I started by making pancakes. Then I got eggs and toast for lunch. I was so ready to get cooking!I opened my fridge and grabbed all the ingredients!

Sarah Flies On An Airplane. Sarah is going on a vacation. She decides to fly to Las Vegas. She is so excited and loves to go on an airplane. Her flight is delayed and she feels frustrated. But luckily her flight finally arrives in Las Vegas.

New bag. Cameron had just bought a new bag. She liked her new bag. Unfortunately, she found out that there was a zipper hole in the bag. The zipper went missing in the new bag. Cameron wasn't happy about having a bad bag.

Cheap sale. Travis is at a big mall. His friends convinced him to go in a food court. Travis ordered a hamburger for $10. Unfortunately he didn't realize he was the only one in line. Everyone else bought something cheaper.

Sparky. Sparky is an older boy who was diagnosed with ADHD. He has been struggling to stay awake all day. On Friday he had trouble staying awake and would fall asleep easily. He decided to take a meds and keep studying. That weekend, Sparky had an easy day.

Tarts. Molly and her brother decided to get dessert. They were going to go to a restaurant. They found a new dessert they liked. They went to it and had a great time. They are going to try it again next week.

Losing religion. Losing religion was a big deal to Gina. She was raised in a strict religion. She was in college and had a boyfriend. The boyfriend moved away and she left him. Gina was upset, but felt she could move on.

The Striker. Kelly and her friends were playing a game of football. Suddenly, Kelly ran across the field and into the locker room. As she was leaving the locker room, her foot fell on the ground. She tripped on the concrete and broke her ankle. Since then, Kelly had to walk in a cast and wear a pair of braces.

Browser. We were playing a game online on my cell phone. When we finished the game, we couldn't find the game. We searched the internet for a few minutes. Finally we found the game, but I had to restart my phone. Now I have no internet.

The talk. Sally had an upcoming speech to give. She was a big talker, and the talk came with a lot of people. Sally had to make sure her words came out right. She listened very carefully for the words to come out right. She got the speech right, and a lot of people liked it.
Mommy's Sick For Now. Today my mom started having stomach pains. It was not just stomach pain. She was having a heart attack. She had an asthma attack. She had to be rushed to the hospital.

Wresting. Amy decided to join the wrestling team. She practiced and trained everyday to prepare. The first day of school, Amy was nervous to get on the mat. Amy did her best and made the team!Amy felt happy that she joined the wrestling team.

Julie Gets a Trainer. Julie is a pretty smart girl. She studies very hard in school. Julie has a dream to become a trainer. She enrolls in the training school. When she graduates she becomes a great trainer.

Arrows. I was shooting a target at night and I was using a pistol. All of a sudden a bullet flew through my hand. I felt so bad that I ran away from the gun. I ran to my aunt's house. She told me she had been hit by a stray bullet.
Carpet. Tim had a big job to do. He needed to clean the carpets. Tim took a vacuum to the carpets. He quickly found that he had left the vacuum on. Tim vacuumed the carpets.

Kids trip to the mall. My parents took me to the mall to shop. My parents got me a new baseball cap. I put the cap in my pocket. I played baseball in my new baseball cap. I took my family to the mall and we had fun.

Bad Landlord. I had rented a house with a bad landlord. I always had problems with the house. I was a bit nervous when I was trying to fix it. The landlord came into the house and started to bang on the window. I quickly locked the door and made the landlord pay for the damage.
Snacks. I was tired of buying food. I was hungry but it didn't have any snacks. So I made me some. But it was all leftover snacks. It didn't make me feel better about myself.

Card games. Jared wanted to play card games. He went to the local store to buy some cards. He saw lots of card games he liked. He picked out a lot of games to play with his friends. The night went better than expected and he ended up playing.

Oscar's Onions. Oscar's mom was throwing spaghetti on the floor. Oscar decided to go grab onions for his mom. Oscar picked some onions and brought them to school. He got a small box and ate them quickly. Oscar became happy as he realized he had been saving onions for himself.

Kick in the Shin. Jim was a student at the local community college. He was working on a project for his teacher. He was studying the term for his last assignment. It was an exercise to determine whether the foot would kick in a certain way. It had a very simple solution, and Jim won the test.
Burnt Pizza. I was making pizza for dinner. I needed some extra toppings. I had to use a lot of toppings. It got very hot. It was gross.

Comedy Show. Lane got a new job working as a comedian. He loved the job and loved the company. On his first night he was performing his show. Everyone was laughing and he felt great. Lane felt he had earned his place in the comedy world.

Beer for Breakfast. Tom had his friend help him with a new invention. The new invention was a portable beer keg. The keg would hold ten beers. Tom's friend and himself brewed their own beer. They both had a great time at their homemade beer keg.

Getting fit. Jake wanted to start a new exercise routine. He decided he would start lifting weights. His friends thought this was terrible. However, Jake did not care. Jake started lifting weights and felt much better.

Erin and the water bottle. Erin was driving to work one day. She had forgotten her car keys and was stuck in the mud. She noticed a small bag of water and pulled out her water bottle. Erin started pumping the water into the bottle. Erin was happy when it made her go back home.

Malaysia. My friends and I flew from Singapore to Malaysia last month. We loved it so much that we stayed in one hotel room every day. Our hotel was the worst. The rooms smelled so bad we couldn't sleep. We decided we would only stay at hotels that are 100% clean.

Thunder. When I was a kid my parents drove us to a nearby amusement park. The ride went very fast and there was a large crowd. We had never been so excited in our lives. All the sudden I heard the roar of a thunderstorm. We quickly realized the noise was the thunder!
The cool rental. Lucy was looking to rent a car. She decided to get a car. She called to check out the car. She was told that it was too hot outside. She had to wait another hour.

The Stuck Stroller. It was almost time to go to bed. Jill had just gotten home from work. She was taking her stroller with her when her stomach rumbled. She pushed her stroller down the stairs and it ended up stuck. She had to go to the hospital, and the hospital called for help.

Break Up. Rosa found out she got dumped. Her boyfriend broke up with her for no reason. After that she didn't think he was ever coming back. When she tried to call him he never answered. So Rosa called the wrong number and ended up dead.

Cabin. When I was a kid I lived in a cabin. I used to play with all the toys. I also did some chores with the toys. When I got to college I went back to the cabin. It was a horrible house, but I made some friends there.

Wedding. It was my first wedding and it was going great. The couple was looking forward to it. They were going to buy the most expensive dress. When they got to the reception I was overwhelmed. They took out a bunch of pictures and it was the best wedding ever!

Rick's Day at the Waterpark. Rick was at the local waterpark. It was Rick's first day there. He had gotten on his scooter and his favorite game was on. Rick had a blast and even took a photo!He would like to do this every day again.

Vacation Time. Tom decided to go on a vacation. He went to a vacation store with a list of places to visit. Tom called the store to arrange his transportation. He also picked out his favorite vacation destination. Tom was excited to spend his vacation with his family.

Earrings. Ava is trying to find the perfect earrings for her boyfriend. She finds one he is allergic to and hates. She has looked everywhere for the perfect earring. Finally she finds a pair she likes and buys them. To her dismay she cannot wear the earrings anymore.
Pills. I started using medicine for a few months. I stopped taking them when I went out. I started taking them after I got home. I took all day. My skin became very tight.

Clarence's Project. Clarence had a big project that needed to be done. He decided to take on a client. He was nervous because he wasn't experienced enough. The client gave Clarence his best effort. Clarence was very proud when he did the project!

Twin Feud. Manny worked at an elementary school. One day he had a small fight with a bully. The bully beat Manny up. The teacher came to the school. He decided that he would make Manny promise to behave better.
We're Gonna Need A Bigger. . . Tom had a lot of work to do. There was a major storm coming. Tom was very stressed. He decided to quit his job. It was better than quitting his job.

Upgrade to first class. I needed to get to New York. I had a flight to London on the same day. I had to change airplanes. When I got to my hotel, I noticed the airline was out of their first class. I had to wait in line for my first class.

Learning to swim. I was a very clumsy kid who was very scared of water. One day I tried swimming with a friend. He kept trying and tried to swim. Eventually he told me he was having issues. So, I decided to just learn how to swim.

Hyacinth. Jane needed to get the hyacinth she loved. It was very expensive, but she was determined to go through it. On her way to the store, she dropped her bag of hyacinth. She ended up spilling some everywhere. Now, her hyacinth is very wet, and she doesn't know what to do.
No Swim in the Park. Sam was at the park. He was swimming. Sam started to swim in the river. He made it to the other side. Sam was happy.
Pickpocket. I was at the supermarket. There was a pickpocket sitting at the cashier's counter. I noticed him steal some quarters. He kept all of them. I decided to give him money instead.

New Pajamas. John had a hard time sleeping. He would not rest until he bought a new pajamas. He finally decided to buy one. He took it off the rack in his living room. He liked how the new pajamas fit on him.
Magnet. A man made a magnet. He put it around his house. It stuck to the windows and door frames. One day, the house caught fire. Luckily, all his belongings were saved.

Long-Winded. Sam and Tim got into a fight. It spilled out into the hallway. Sam's mom didn't know what to do. She asked her brother what to do. Her brother told him to shut up and let her finish the job.
Bar Fight. Sue went to a bar with friends. There was a fight going on. They didn't know each other well. They started fighting. Eventually, they were escorted out.

Buying a suit. Mary was at the beach with her friends. She saw a pair of white sandals that she really liked. She went home and bought a pair. Her friends loved the sandals and they all bought them. Mary wore her sandals everywhere she went.

The Dam. Jane was on a boat in the ocean. Suddenly a storm came and flooded the boat. Jane couldn't get her boat out of the water. Jane and the kids decided to go home instead. Jane's family decided to go to their cabin instead.

Clashing Color. Anna had an important test coming up. Her friend Jane was in her class. Anna tried to get her to study with her. Jane's teacher saw the argument and took away her. Anna got grounded for two weeks for fighting.
Charity. Lena had her hair straightened. Her friends all thought it was a mess. They made fun of Lena. They teased her. But they were so happy to have straightened her hair!

Tooth Fairy. A boy decided to buy a set of tooth fairy toys. He set them up in his room, and put them on his head. He put a cap on his head and the toy flew out the door. The toy had a tooth fairy inside. The boy became so fed up with the tooth fairy that he refused to buy it again.

Christmas. My son has been asking to have a Christmas tree in his house since Christmas last year. This year I thought I could help him with his tree. I got him some paper flowers and a small bag of candy. Then I put the flowers and candy inside the tree. When Christmas arrives, I will bring the tree to my son.

The Acorn. Sara was walking around the block. She saw a tree trunk that looked odd. She decided to check it out. She stepped on some leaves and a big acorn fell out. She then put it in her basket and went home.
Old book. Dana was looking through her collection. She noticed an old book. She decided to borrow it. But she realized it was too much to handle. Dana decided to give it to her friend.

Kenny loses the girl. Kenny was dating a new girl. She was getting along with her but then she fell in love with him. He tried to convince her that it was a mistake but she was adamant. Then, Kenny tried to get her to fall in love with another man but she refused. Kenny eventually broke up with her for cheating.

When A Family Visit Isn't. The family went to Disneyland. They had a wonderful time. When they got home the family got ready to go home. They were so sad that they all had to drive back home. The family is going to Disney again.

Open relationship. My friend and I met online. I was very nervous about meeting him in person. The two of us got along great and spoke a lot. We got married this week and we are so happy. We look forward to dating and having fun.

Foggy. Beth woke up one morning. She turned on the oven to see it had gotten completely covered. She couldn't see anything!Then she realized she had the wrong timezone. She had no idea that the weather had changed overnight!

Free Drinks. Sara always wanted a good drink to go with her lunch. Her friends encouraged her to try to find a restaurant that had free drinks. Sara went to the famous Chinese place that was also free. Sara couldn't decide between the three different drinks. Finally she picked the Chinese tea with honey and mint to go with her lunch.
A Man and His Dog. Ivan was playing outside one day. A dog came out in front of his house. He started to bark at Ivan. Ivan's dog began chasing Ivan around. Ivan put a blanket over his dog.
Disney World. Jenny went to Disney World. It was her first time. She really wanted to go to Epcot. She went to Epcot with her friends. Jenny really loved her trip.

Choices. When I was 12 my dad took me to a toy store. I bought a red dress. I couldn't decide between red and blue. Then I saw the toy that my mom had given me. I saw I didn't like red, blue, or green at all.

Bob's Business. Bob is very unhappy with his business. He hasn't been able to get any new customers for a few years now. One day a local bar owner offered to help Bob out. Bob was pleased and offered to be his bar owner. After a few weeks Bob started to have new customers for his bar.

The Tiger and the Goat. The tiger was eating a goat. The goat was very scared. The tiger was able to get the goat to climb onto the tiger's head. The goat bit the tiger's tooth. The tiger decided not to eat the goat.

Planking. I was very proud to plow my lawn today. I went to my yard and started to plow my front lawn. All of a sudden, my lawnmower broke. It began to scrape my front lawn. My wife was very upset that it had happened.
New Place. Sam was looking for a new place to live. She didn't want to move but she was really scared. Finally a friend helped her move a lot. She found a nice apartment. She had a great time.

Peas. Anna was out picking some peas. Her friend told her that they looked delicious. She asked her friend to help her pick the peas. After picking the peas, Anna realized she didn't have any peas. She felt embarrassed and decided to eat the peas.

The Yellow Gauntlets. In college I made a class project about how yellow was the color of war. The teacher told us that in WWII yellow was often used as a color code. I studied the book for a year and a half. I made a graphic of yellow war gauntlets. I gave the graphic to my friend who was a Holocaust survivor.

Doggy Love. Mary and her dog loved to play. Mary's dog was in a hurry and ran into a neighbor's fence. Mary's dog was injured and could not come inside. The neighbor called for help and the dog was taken to the vet. The dog was better the next day.

Lobster. Lorraine went fishing for her first lobsters. She decided to try one in a small pond on the water. Unfortunately she caught a small crustacean. She tossed the crustacean out to dry. Lorraine learned not to get crabby after all.

Competition. Ginny really wanted to win. She challenged her friends to a game of Scrabble. The game went on all day. At the end of the day, Ginny felt that she really had the upper hand. She was very proud of herself and won the game.

The bike tip. It was Valentine's Day and Lisa was going to hang out. She noticed a lot of people were wearing hats. Lisa decided to give them to the people she knew. She thought it would be a nice way to thank them. She gave out ten hats to every person.

Dinner plans. Randi was planning dinner for the week. She was getting a lot of calls about dates. Her brother said he couldn't make it so she was going home. She was upset. She went to the bank to make her own date plans.

Unending Sadness. Lucy was about to go home to be with her parents. She had a hard time deciding what to do with her time. Eventually she decided to spend the entire day with a friend. Lucy went to meet her friend but she didn't want to go home. Her friend decided to stay and watch TV instead.

Errand. Jill's class had a physics test. She had studied all week to ace the test. She was very nervous as the day arrived. When it was time to start, Jill got her test wrong. She ended up failing the test.

Rita passes. Rita is taking a long walk. A deer starts chasing her. She runs away from the animal. Rita realizes she needs to go back to her car. She decides to take a short bus ride to her next stop.

Brad gets revenge. Brad decided to take revenge on his rival. He went to the bar and ordered some drinks. While he was at the bar, he was robbed. After the fight, he got drunk and went to a nearby bar. Brad was arrested for murder.

Brainstorming. Sandy had a long day at work. She had been working on her creative ideas for days. She was starting to think about what she would do in her spare time. Sandy decided she would write an essay for her boss. When the essay was published she was pleased with the results.
Bored Mike. Bobby was bored. He was watching a movie. He kept turning the volume down. Suddenly, it turned back up. He ended up missing the movie.

Coming or Going?. Sue's parents bought her a baseball bat for recess. Sue was playing with the bat when she fell off it. The bat landed on a table. The bat hit Sue in the eye. Sue cried and got up from the table crying.

The Investment. Tom was saving up to buy a new TV. His friends and family wanted to buy him one. He thought he'd be able to do it himself. He went to a local electronics store to get a new TV. Tom was glad to be able to get one.

Changing the Sheets. Kim had been wearing her dress in the gym all day. The only thing keeping her from changing it was that it was so tight. But when she was done with her workout, Kim noticed something. She had changed the sheets. All the cotton from her dress was now going into her new dress.

Free Food. Kelly was at work when she got a call from her boss. The call said they had an emergency and needed a shift change. Kelly immediately got to work at her desk, so as fast as possible. She quickly filled her lunch and was off at her desk. Unfortunately, the new boss had never gotten her a lunch break in the past.
Vikings. Sam and his friends were always out at the lake. One day, they were at a bar. They started drinking too much. Sam got so drunk that he fell off the bar. Sam was grounded for a month.

Beth wins the lottery. Beth is very excited for the jackpot in the lottery. She sees on TV the numbers that are on the screen. She calls the numbers into her phone. After that she calls the lottery machine. She wins the jackpot.
Ferrets. My niece brought home a ferret today. It was a black rat. She kept it for several months. She named it Furry Ferret. We had to take it to the shelter.

Honeymoon. Gina needed a new job. She couldn't get her friend Ann's help. She decided to have a surprise party at home. But she forgot to set the table for the guests!Gina's date never showed up and Gina lost her job.
Cheerleading. One day, I was cheerleading for my class. I was not very good at it. One day, I accidentally jumped over a wall. I hurt my knee badly. Since then, I don't jump so much anymore.

Procrastinator. Sandra's friend told her that she was procrastinating her work. She was a smart woman and could see it from an outside view. When she saw the homework due on the next day, she tried to take care of it. But she just spent her whole day looking at the calendar. She ended up doing a poor job and got an F.

Wrong Phone. I took a trip to the store to purchase some groceries. When I got home I realized I had forgotten my phone. My mom and I were in the bathroom and couldn't figure it out. My mother then came back with some clothes I couldn't afford. We were forced to put off our trip until we could figure out what was wrong.

heavy box. One morning I woke up late. When I got to the office I saw a box of laundry detergent. I began to search for the box. I ended up finding it right under my desk. I grabbed the box and put it away.
