An Old Sword. Sara was cutting down some trees in the forest. Suddenly, she heard a loud noise. It was the rattling of her favorite blade. Sara stopped, looked and saw her sword missing. She quickly pulled the blade from her arm and looked for it.

Symphony. Gina was excited to hear her favorite song performed. She looked all over the room, trying to find the music. She finally found it, a classical opera with beautiful music. She was so excited to hear the performance. It was the most beautiful concert she ever saw!
Adopted Friend. Dan has a lot of animals. He got an animal yesterday. It was a cute bunny. He wanted to adopt it. Unfortunately his cat wouldn't allow him.

Dolores the Therapist. Dolores has been working with her clients in the same building for years. Now, Dolores decides she wants to make a change in the relationship between her and her clients. One of her clients recently threatened to leave. Dolores decided it is time to hire a therapist. Dolores hired a therapist to help her clients get better.
Cheesy madness. My wife likes to bake cookies. She does not like to make them too sweet. This weekend we tried making some. It was a lot of work. We made a mess of the cookies.

Amnesia. Mary was very anxious for her first day of middle school. All she could think was of being in the library!While she was there, she didn't remember the last time she'd seen her friend!The principal made Mary go through a few drills to try to make up for it. Mary was relieved to learn that she wasn't so anxious.

Stuck Paper. Susie was reading her paper. Suddenly, she found a piece of paper stuck to the top of her head. She tried to grab it but it was too heavy. Luckily, she got a piece of tape to help. Luckily, her paper came out of the problem with no problem.

Building a treehouse. Nia had always wanted to build a treehouse. She saw an ad for a treehouse in a newspaper. Nia began planning for the treehouse. She put up a large treehouse and built it up. Nia had a great time building a treehouse.

Curtains. Kate was having a boring day. She decided to make curtains. She bought some fabric and cut them out. When it was time to hang the curtains, they were a disaster. Kate had to buy another set for later.

Typing. My wife hated typing. So I put her through a few hours of typing exercises. At the end of the exercises she was relieved. And, she was happy to know she would not be bored anymore. I gave her some chocolate, since she was satisfied.

Bored. I've been working all day. I just can't stop staring at my computer screen. All of a sudden it starts to rain. I turn off my computer and go get some water. The next day I'm a little more awake.

Where Eggs Come From. Sam had never been to an egg hunt. He bought a lottery ticket and waited outside. The sun rose high in the sky and a man approached him. The man was tall and handsome with long white hair. Sam asked him for his name but he did not answer.

Big Fire. Amy was working in the basement in her house. There was a huge fire in her attic. Amy didn't know what to do. The fire had grown to the size of a room. Amy ran out of the house to save her family.

Laura Does Homework. Laura is a teacher at a daycare. Laura notices that some of her kids don't do their homework. Laura asks them what's going on. The kids tell her their mommy took them to school. Laura tells them they have to do their homework.

Nursery. Lacey has always wanted a home for her granddaughters. She has been working diligently on the project for months. On Wednesday, she gave the final presentation. Lacey is very proud that she has reached a great goal. She is very proud of herself for the hard work she has put into this.
Navy. It was the first time I'd ever been in the Navy. I was very excited to go. The ship was huge and I was nervous. Once we got on board, we got on a flight. Once on the boat I was happy.

The Candy Store. Sarah was at the local candy store. She was browsing through the candy aisle. She saw a candy store with lots of different candy products. Sarah decided to try the different items in her line. Sarah found some delicious treats and spent the entire day there.

The Ocean. Tina was visiting her grandpa's home. They went on the beach and had a great time. Soon they had gone a few hundred feet. Then they noticed a huge white thing. Tina was worried because it was really huge.
A Day at the Beach. The three kids loved going to the beach. The kids played and swam. At one point the kids ran into a big wave. The wave slammed into the car. The car had to stop.

Train Trip. I was on a train to Paris from Chicago. I was going on vacation with my family for the first time. When I arrived at my destination, I checked the schedule. I was surprised to see that it was a train trip to Paris!I was excited to get off the train and enjoy the sights.
Unprepared. The next day we went to the supermarket. I was hungry. The only thing on the menu was a turkey sandwich. I bought the turkey sandwich. The store clerk handed it back.

Quitting smoking. I had smoked for twenty years. Today I was going to quit. My doctor warned me that quitting smoking could lead to lung cancer. I got a new job that I felt I needed to get better. Now I smoke for almost no money and love life.
The Doctor. Timothy was a very sick little boy. He was constantly hungry. He was getting really sick. His parents tried all sorts of medicine. Eventually he got better enough to go to the doctor.

Making a garland. Samantha had made a garland for her baby girl. She brought the little girl to school and she was excited. She was playing with her garland and her little girl wanted to play with it. When she got home, her little girl was giggling and making noises. It was a nice afternoon at school with her baby girl and her garland.

The bad veggies. I went to the grocery store yesterday. I asked for the chicken salad. When I got there I had a box of broccoli. It was not good, but the customer recommended I buy it. She gave me a coupon that I used to buy the salad.

Mixed Mail. One day I received a mail from my friend. It was from a man who was angry. He wrote that the money in the envelope was not for him. I was sad because I thought this was funny. However, it was my friend who started a fight with him.

Fish Tank. Briana was getting really sick of her fish tank. She decided that she would clean it out. She looked at many different products to clean out the tank. After a few hours, Briana was able to clean out the tank. She now has a new tank with fish!

The Gem Stick. My mom bought some great jewelry. She put them in a drawer to surprise me. I was so excited when my little sister came inside. She asked me how the jewelry was made. I told her the jewelry was a gem stick.

Sunny's Pooch. Pooch was always a dirty dog. She could never get a bath. But one day her friend offered to pay to clean her up. Pooch's owner was glad to be able to do this. She cleaned her up and now Sunny has a new home.

Salesman. Sammy was trying to get a job at a department store. She looked at the job descriptions for hours. She finally narrowed her selection down to one. She made the best sales pitch in the world. The manager gave her the position and Sammy was happy.

Headed to the movies. My friend and I went to the movies. The movies were really boring. I decided to stay and watch the movies while my friend ate. We ate until we felt full and then we went home. I stayed up late and the movie was very boring.

Steve Visits The Aquarium. Steve was visiting a zoo with his wife. Steve wanted to get a better look at all the animals. He thought it would be funny if the zoo offered him a seat on a bench. Steve sat down and watched the elephants swim. Steve ended up buying tickets to the next day.

Lopsided House. My friend's house is a 10 foot by 10 foot by 10 foot rectangle. One day he told me about a house he liked. The house had been remodeled. The basement had a lot of new mold. I liked the new remodel more than the old one.

Randy and his Grandfather. Randy decided that he wanted to see his grandpa. He booked a plane ticket. Randy packed his bags, and set off on the road. He took his grandpa to visit the vet, and a doctor. Randy loved his visit with his grandpa!

Sore throat. Tina had a sore throat. She took a deep breath and tried to calm down. The sore throat persisted and she went to the bathroom. She realized that she had taken too much water. She knew she could not go anymore and hurried home.

Low Patience. It was an exciting time for me. The college finals were coming up. I had been anticipating this for months now. My first class was a lot of fun. I was very excited when the bell rang at the end of my first day.

The Pets. Barry was at the pet store. His little brother had an old lady's dog named Molly. He decided to adopt her and teach her how to walk. Molly was a bit clumsy, but he taught her right away. She got a new leash to go with her new friends.

Misha's Mirrors. Misha has a huge collection of mirrors. She went to the local hardware store to buy mirrors. She browsed for hours to get the perfect mirror. When she finally purchased her mirror, she was shocked. It was the perfect size and fit to replace a worn one!
What to Choose. Rita wanted to choose what she wanted to eat for lunch. She made a bowl of cereal. She got a slice of yogurt. She was very hungry!Rita decided to eat the whole bag.

Basketball Match. Tina was playing basketball with her friends. But Tina's team wasn't winning. Tina's teammates were getting more and more frustrated. Tina decided to take on the opponent. She played her hardest and won the game.

Swarming with Flies. My daughter and her husband go to the mountains. Their boat is grounded by a strong storm. Suddenly they feel a little bit nervous. They see fliers in the air and start to worry. Fortunately, they didn't get too carried away.

Walking and Talking. My nephew got to go on a walk with his brother last night. My nephew told his brother that he can stop to talk to people. His brother agreed and walked away. My nephew was sad that he lost his best friend. He felt that it would be best to leave.

Karen's Misfortune. Karen had just gotten a new job. She was nervous about starting the day. She got out of bed to go in to do some paperwork. Unfortunately her car broke down. Karen ended up leaving work with no money.

Game. Nia's favorite game was playing in her room every night. One night while playing she accidentally left her cell phone on the sofa. She went to get it and it had fallen and broken. Luckily someone heard her and called the repairman. She was given a replacement and she was happy.
Movie poster. I used to be a big fan of Tim Minear. His films always made me very happy. This week his movie came out. I'm really excited. I hope he does well.
Doored. Kelly was driving home. There was a car that was about to hit her. She did not see the car come. She did not hear the engine revving. Kelly's car was about to be wrecked.

Starry Night. Sam was having a party with his friends. All of a sudden, Sam realized it was pitch black outside. Sam hurried to the nearest store. There, he found that the store had only lights on during the night. Sam decided to play some old records instead.

Andy Learns to Drive. Andy had always wanted to learn to drive. Andy signed up for a driving course at his local driving school. Andy took the driving course for a month. He eventually got his learner's permit. Andy now drives his own car and is happy.

Dirty House. We decided to take a housewarming trip. Our friends bought us all nice gifts. We were all surprised by the house we ended up visiting. The windows were all covered with paint. We had fun exploring the house with all of our friends.

Little Rascal. A young man decided to start a group for little Rascals. The little raccoons were very intelligent. The young man collected and trained them. He released his raccoons into the wild. A few were captured and given to the man.
Jerry goes to camp. Jerry was invited to go to the school camp in July. He was very nervous. He waited all day long. Finally, he was able to arrive. The principal let him enter the school.
Home plate. Ben loved playing baseball. He loved seeing his team win. He always had a good game. Ben played all of his games at home plate. Ben loved playing baseball.

Broken Copier. Tim was on his way to work. He got out of the car when he saw a cop car. He got out of the car to confront the cop. The cop told him he was breaking the law. Tim was arrested for breaking the law.

Lost. Mary was in the middle of her night with a friend. She was sitting on her couch. Suddenly, she heard a sharp pain. She ran to her friend and told her it was a broken earphone. Her friend immediately ran over to help her.

The Cat. Cody decided to give a small kitten a bath. When he was done, he cleaned the kitten's litter box. The kitten had had a tough time shedding all those dirty kitten droppings. Then he picked the kitten up and put it down. The kitten ran to its mom and she cried with joy.

Volleyball game. All of my friends and I were trying to get a game last night. I went to the gym to get my weights and began lifting weights. It took me about an hour but I was finally doing well. The weights were getting heavy so I was getting in a lot of trouble. By the end of the workout, I was not lifting the same weights.

The Pirate Ship. Rudy was very afraid of the sea. His parents bought him a sailboat so he could see the ocean. They sailed around the islands of the Caribbean. They took the boat to a large island called Hispaniola. It was a lot of fun watching a ship sail on the ocean.

Tutor Girl. Molly was very interested in getting a better grade on her math test. The teacher assigned one of the test questions, and she really struggled. It made Molly feel sad that the teacher did not allow her to practice. She decided to just study the questions she saw, and take notes. At the end of the day, she was able to do better than her teacher.

Dandelions. Sophia's mother hated dandelions. She would always throw the plants away. One day Sophia saw a new type of dandelion. It was a purple, pink plant. It was one of the best dandelions Sophia had ever eaten.
Purse shopping. I needed a new purse. I saw one online for sale. It had the perfect size. I bought it. I used the money to buy myself a nice purse.
Meg's Field Day. Meg loved to ride her bikes. One day Meg had a field day. Meg rode her bike to a school. She rode all around the school. Meg was proud to have field day.
The New Car. Tim wanted to buy a new car. He researched many options online. Tim found the best one he could. He went to the dealership and purchased the car. Tim was able to afford the car.

Troubled Child. My daughter has a special needs child. Her mother has a very hard time controlling him. One day my daughter was at her room when he broke his bed frame. He kicked it all over the room. The child was scared but managed to get his mother.
Making Tea. I had some tea. I put it in a mug. I took a sip. It tasted great!I decided to make it myself.

Too loud of a vacuum. My brother got a new vacuum at a yard sale. It is a much more quiet vacuum. It is also very quiet. However, my sister could not hear the sound when it was going. She wanted to use a vacuum in her room.

Ear Buds. Beth was listening to music one night. She decided to listen to something else entirely. She heard someone on the other end of the phone talking to her. She was so startled, she put her earbuds in her ears. The earbuds made her feel silly.

The Rookie. The rookie was on his way to school. The school bus had broken down. He had to take the bus to a different bus stop. He learned that he could ride his bike to school. The teacher even gave him a helmet to use.
My Trip. I went to the movies last weekend. I saw Creed. I also saw The Dark Knight Rises. All these movies are very hard to get tickets to. I hope I can finish them all before Christmas.

Sylvia's Change of Opinion. Sylvia didn't like her boyfriend anymore. He had been acting weird lately. She decided to break up with him. She told him she would stop talking. Sylvia felt much better about herself afterwards.
actor appearance in show. Tim was in a play. They were going to be the lead actors. They had been practicing for weeks. When it was time they were ready. Tim's turn came up and he looked amazing!

The Party. One day Gina was invited to a party. Her parents were coming over for the party. Her mother didn't have enough time to go and Gina didn't want to. The girls sat on the floor of the house talking. The girls then got up and went to the party.

Setting Up Her Sister. Anna was sitting by her computer on her bed. She heard a knock on the door and looked down. There stood her sister Anna. Anna ran her hands over Anna's lovely hair. Anna smiled to herself when she saw Anna's sweet smile.
Prom Pals. One day Tom went to a new prom. He met a girl he really liked. They dated for a few weeks. They met again after a few months. They broke up and Tom never met her again.

The Artist. Gina loved to draw. She made a portfolio of all her artworks. Then, she invited everyone she could to a show. She also asked people to buy from her artwork. Gina never lost her love of art and created an art museum.

The Acorn. Tom loved collecting antique collectibles. He loved the old things as much as the new things. Tom decided to put together a nice little antique gallery. He worked very hard on it and was pleased with the result. Tom was thrilled when the gallery opened up for business.

Yo yo. There was a boy named Jimmy. He was always being bullied in school. One day he took his yo yo and hit another boy. The other boy did not run away and punched him. Jimmy got in trouble and was kicked out of the school.

Best intentions. I used to always get very frustrated because I didn't like anything about the class. I thought that everyone had bad intentions. My friend told me that most of the class was full of good intentions. I decided to just avoid them. However, I found I had very good intentions and still got bad grades.
The hostage situation. An armed hostage was in the movie theater. He asked the theater to evacuate. The theater called 911. The theater evacuated the people inside. The hostages were safely located.

Crystal Chandelier. I was trying to set up a table for my boyfriend at a friend's house. My boyfriend said he needed a desk and a glass, so I went to his work. He told me he needed a desk that was too large, so I bought a smaller one. The table looked really ugly because it was too tall, so I took it home. After I set it up, my boyfriend didn't even notice.
The Wheelchair Death. Tim was a man who had lost his wheelchair. His wife got a new one. It was a big one. He would have to walk to the store to buy groceries. Tim never got around to it.

The Gift. Karen went to the mall with her mother to shop. Karen tried on many different outfits. She liked one that she saw was very pretty. She bought it to wear at a party. Karen had a wonderful time shopping at the mall.

Pokemon Go. Dan decided to take his kids to the store. They got a few Pokemon Go games. They played all day, until school was over. The kids spent hours on the floor catching Pokeballs. The game was fun for them to play, but a little boring afterwards.

Past Ghosts. Sally loved old pictures of ghosts. One day she saw a ghost on a street corner. She walked closer to the ghost and asked for help. A man came over and helped her. He was the only person to tell Sally that her picture had been lost.

Using a Coupon. I noticed that one of my coworkers was using a coupon on his company website. I noticed that he did not have any discounts for those items that are on sale. So I started to post coupons on the website. Soon, I was able to post coupons for these items for my employees. I now have a larger team using the company coupons.
Gift. Cindy was at a party with a stranger. They had a nice conversation. She asked if they could hang out for a couple hours. He said he had a gift for her. Cindy thanked him and was relieved.
PIE. Sarah was feeling tired of fries. She was feeling particularly tired. So she went to the store to buy more. She ordered some potato salad. Sarah felt much better.
Driving on the highway. We were driving down the highway. Suddenly, something happened. It was a car. The car started to swerve. It smashed into a tree.

The Holiday. Mitch's family was going to a holiday party. Mitch was the only kid. Mitch couldn't go because of a bad stomach ache. They went to the restaurant, and ordered a lot of food. Mitch decided that he was going to miss his family on the holiday.

New Job. Allison was an office worker. She had just received a promotion at work. She wasn't sure what to do. Finally she decided to become a teacher. She was very happy at the new position she had gotten.
Gym Error. Tom was out at the gym. He was not using a good trainer. He made a lot of mistakes during his training. The trainer stopped working with him. Tom never recovered from the injury.

Best Friends. It was Amy's first day of college. Amy loved going to school. Amy was new in school and had only friends. Amy realized that friends were her best friend. Amy and her best friend made the best friends of all.

Road Trip. Cynthia was a new high school graduate. She had just moved to the city. She loved going to school in the city. This summer she wanted to go on a road trip. Cynthia decided to go to San Francisco.

The Don Becomes King. Sandy was a very poor child. Her mother and father wanted her to have everything. They took her to the mall to buy the most expensive things. Then they told Sandy what she needed to do. They told Sandy that her father was the king of all his stuff.

Time Capsule. The man had a time capsule. He thought he would keep it for a very long time. One day he accidentally smashed the capsule and ruined it. The man had to break it open to find out what was inside. He was able to get a glimpse at the future and found out the future was horrible.
Starbucks. Amy was at Starbucks. She wanted to order a coffee. She called her husband. He was at work. Amy finally got to the coffee place.

The Refund. My girlfriend and I went to the movies. We bought tickets and the bill for the theater was $20. We went back and changed our seats, but the movie was not playing. We asked our boyfriend for $10 in return for the theater. We were never refunded for the $20 we paid.

Medal. I recently saw a medal for a special service I was attending. I wore the medal during a photo opportunity. The photo was taken at an event celebrating a new family. A woman with a baby in the lap picked the baby up from a crying mom. The baby was wearing a medal from the service.

The Parade. The Smith family is going to a large parade. They arrived at the parade early to catch the ride. After the parade everyone rode in the floats. The parade ended with a fireworks display. They were excited to see what the parade would be like next year.
Cindy goes out. Cindy is at the club with friends. She is really drunk. One of her friends starts making fun of her. Cindy says that she can't go out. They have to stay home and watch TV instead.

The Author. Jim started a blog. It was really good at giving people feedback on their blogs. But then it started to take some of his attention. He realized he needed to cut some posts out of the blog. He realized he needed to do more editing before he felt good again.

Paris. Paris is one of my favorite cities in the world. There are so many beautiful things about it. But I am not French. And Paris is a country of immigrants. I am sad I don't have time to visit Paris.

Wedding Troubles. Tina was getting married. It was her first wedding anniversary. The day of her big day, she was getting nervous. She had not been in a relationship in awhile. She went to the mall for a while to change and take care of the day.

Great date. Rita and Gary decided to have a great date. They had just bought their first home together. When they got to their apartment, it was already dark. They had been out for hours so it was a very romantic night. Afterwards, they both ate dinner together.

Javier Wears Cleats. Javier needed a pair of sneakers to wear in class. However, his shoes were too big. He could not fit his feet under the shoes. He looked online for pairs of cleats for the other students. He found the perfect pair in the shoe department store.

Pizza place. Lacy is looking forward to eating the best pizza she can. She was excited when a friend recommended the Pizza Place. She decided she would check it out to see if it was good. When she arrived the waiters were nice and the pizza was good. When she tried the food, she was very happy.
The Bike. Cara and her friend were going on a bike ride. Cara decided to ride the bike. Cara tripped. She fell off the bike. Cara wound up broke and had to pay for her bike.

Harry. Harry was very afraid of heights. He wanted to jump off the high school tower. He wanted to see the other students. Harry was afraid to walk to school on a tall building. Harry finally had to wait for the next day to go to school.

Ruined Vacation. Cara was on a vacation to San Diego. On the way there, she got lost. Cara asked her mother for directions. They arrived just in time to catch a train to San Francisco. Cara was able to take the train and meet with her friends on the beach.

Compulsive Liar. Doris was a successful woman who was famous for her business acumen. She was hired by the bank to conduct customer interviews. On the first day of her interview, she lied to the manager. The manager discovered her lies and fired her. Despite her misdeeds, she was still successful in her job.

Second Home. John and his wife wanted to buy a second home. They looked around and couldn't decide where to buy. Then, John realized he had saved enough money. He decided to buy a second home in his old neighborhood. The new house was much bigger, and had better features.

Samantha's Flight. Samantha was on a long flight. Suddenly she started getting a migraine. She was so dizzy and confused!When the plane got to its destination she found out it was delayed. She decided to ask her family about the problem.

Bad Pasta. Tom always ate too much pasta. He started cutting his meat and dairy. He got sick and had to go to the doctor. The doctor told him he needed to stop eating that stuff. Tom cut out pasta for good.

Ebay. I used eBay to order the items that I wanted. When I opened my package it was very heavy. I went back to see what was wrong. I opened the package and saw it was just a large book. Now I can get rid of the heavy package without problems.

Football game. We were sitting in a football field and watching the game. When the game was over, the boys got up. They sat around the field to play football. The game was so much fun that they all wanted to play again.

Cat leash. Nora was walking her cat around the house. Suddenly she saw a cat in a cage. The cat had a leash and was acting like a pet. Nora was scared, and ran quickly to find a better place. Her cat now lives in a different cage.
Stage Props. Tom had a great job. He did really well at the company. He made good money. But then his boss took the money to go see a concert. The company fired him because he sold stage props.

The Mine. The boy was about to be picked up from school. A group of kids from the neighborhood were throwing rocks at him. The boy was trying to avoid them and made a mess. One boy tried to throw the rocks at him and hit him in the head. The boy had a concussion and was in the hospital for a month.

The Sick Boy. Frank went to the doctor's office for a check up. Frank was the type of kid that would do anything for someone. Frank felt that he needed a routine check up. Frank decided to get a scan of his heart. Frank received his check up at the end of the day.

The Dress. Sarah was invited to her friend's wedding. She didn't think it would be so romantic. Sarah made her dresses. When she got to the reception, she noticed everyone was wearing the same one. Sarah was upset, and told her mother.

Charlie. Charlie wanted to become an accountant. His friend told him to apply to a accounting school. He studied hard. Finally, Charlie completed his application. Charlie was accepted to the accounting school.
The Dune Buggy. Diana wanted to go on a trip to the desert. So she decided to purchase a desert buggy. She got it shipped out to her. It was very fun. When she arrived, she got to ride the buggy.

Beating the Game. I decided to join a new sport in high school. I took out a membership and went to a tournament. In the finals, I beat every player. The coach told me I won the first round. I then lost the last round and was sent home.
Alphabet. It was a great day. The kids were doing some puzzles. They were talking about the alphabet. The teacher helped them figure out the alphabet. The kids all ended up having a great day.
Spilled medication. My wife went to her doctor. She was taking medicine. One of the medicines came out. She put it in her medicine cabinet. She forgot to close the cabinet and spilled the medicine.

Obsessive Sam. I went to a movie with my best friend the other night. We were in the theatre when the movie began. My friend began to argue with the guy who was playing her character. My friend became frustrated and began to yell at him. She ended up being in the middle of a fight.

Backyard Tennis. There was a large backyard tennis court in my neighborhood. I decided to go play in the backyard with my friends. After my friends agreed to come, we all played on the court. We threw the ball hard and everyone hit it with the ball. We won the game in record time.

Pool. I love to go to the beach. I like to go down to the water. One summer I went to the beach to go swimming. I was very excited to see all of the sea life in the water. I enjoyed the day so much that I kept going back to the water!
Drugs. Susie was addicted to alcohol and drugs. She had started drinking on her own. But she was on too many. She was arrested for possession. She ended up getting treatment for it.
New Cat. Gina had never been to a pet store. She wanted to adopt a cat. She did not have money to adopt. So Gina decided to save for a year. She saved until she had enough money to adopt the cat.

Rax. Nancy loved to read about animals in books. One day she read about how they lived in rax. She decided to go on the internet to look for information. She found some interesting facts about animals that fascinated her. Nancy was happy that she discovered a new hobby.

The Book. Sue was walking to school when she ran into an old friend. She had never met her, but the pair became close and they started talking. Sue wanted to know how he met her. She took a picture and sent it to her friend for him to see. She found out his mom was his grandmother.
tired. When I was three, my mom bought me a new phone. I used it almost everyday after that. It was a lot of fun to use. But eventually I got too tired of it and was not using it. So I gave up.

IHOP. IHOP is a big chain in New York. IHOP is going through a huge store consolidation. IHOP is closing the only store in the city. IHOP is now closing all of their locations. IHOP is sad they no longer have a customer base.
Apartment. The man bought a new apartment in his city. He was tired of his apartment. The man rented out his entire room. His roommate moved out with him. The roommate was extremely happy.
A light Jog. Sam wanted to get in shape. He decided to jog everyday for 10 minutes. He did so for 10 minutes a day. The next week, he improved his run time by an hour. He could no longer feel tired.
Bingo. Gavin's teacher made him write a speech. He put it all together. After he got it down, he turned it in. The teacher read it and said he was perfect. Gavin was elated!
Surgeon. Tim was a good looking guy. He liked people to see him and date him. He never had any girlfriends. Tim decided to become a surgeon. He saved his money and started being a surgeon.

Gym Visit. My friend came by to visit me today. He was working out in the gym. He told me he had just come to visit. I decided to see if he wanted to come in the afternoons. I told him that was okay since he is working out everyday.

Job Interview. I was really nervous for the job interview I was about to get. My friends were hanging out at the bar and wanted to see me. I drove up to the bar and sat on a bench. After a few minutes of waiting, the hiring manager came over. He told me that I got the job!
Yevgeny gets a flat tire. Yevgeny is driving to work. He hits a bump in the road. His car stalls. Yevgeny is very angry. He calls his boss and gets an apology.

Fancy Dress. Mary's mom asked her if she wanted to go to the mall with a dress. Mary thought about it for a while and decided not to go with the dress. Mary's mom told her she can always buy another one later. She handed Mary a box filled with money. Mary was glad that she did not need the dress.

Cheap as dirt. I was working on a bench outside of my house. I was digging a well when I saw a large mound of dirt. It was several feet in diameter and I picked it up. I put it in the bag and walked away. I never looked back.

Cheater. John was an avid golfer. He loved winning golf tournaments. He was playing a round of golf with a friend. Unfortunately the game was rigged to make the round go longer. John was disqualified.
Food Critic. Jill was a food critic. She loved to comment on things she liked. Her food criticism was so popular. She sold her cookbook. Now she makes her own food.

The Plan. Sarah was trying to find her way home from work. She kept walking but couldn't find her way. She decided to call her friend to ask where she was going. Sarah's friend told her they were just out on a date. Sarah had to wait until dinner to ask her friend where they were going.

The New Neighbors. Candy was moving into a new apartment. It was an old apartment and she was trying to adjust. Candy had moved in with a nice old lady. The old lady was an old friend. They spent a lot of time together and exchanged information.

Birthday. The day of Sam's first birthday had come and gone. His family was in the hospital receiving treatment. At 5 pm, he was finally ready to meet his grandma!He walked into the hospital and was greeted by her and their family. Sam hugged his grandma, and the entire family hugged him too!
Orange Juice. I had always wanted to try orange juice. This weekend I decided to try it. I found a big orange juice shop. I got to try a glass. I love orange juice.
Fall. I went hiking in the mountains. I was hiking in the middle of nowhere. I came across a waterfall. I jumped in and was very scared. I walked back to my car and took it back home.

The Old Lady's Boots. Jill wanted to get a new pair of boots. Jill did not know what she wanted. She ended up shopping on her mom's website. She picked the best boots for her. She loved the new boots.

Bookmarks. Barry had a computer virus. The virus infected the system and the computer couldn't find anything. Barry had to do a lot of searching to find the virus. He didn't like that he would have to do that. Barry found the virus and then saved a lot of his personal info to a backup.

What Shade. I had just gone to the mall. I saw a large, attractive woman sitting in a cute t-shirt. I walked up to her and introduced myself. She greeted me politely but refused to talk to me. When I introduced myself, she just smiled at me and went back to her shopping.

Feeding Frenzy. Sam was working out. He was on his way to a weight training class. Suddenly, he ran over a cat. The cat ran up on Sam, scratching him very badly. Sam decided to go back to the gym instead of the cat.

Math pride. Kelly was at math class when the bell rang. She went to the board to find out what she had done today. She found that she had not gotten a good grade in any of her problems. Kelly decided that she wanted to get her grades up so she didn't cheat again. Kelly went to her class the next day and received a perfect score.

Computer Problems. Gina had a computer that was really outdated. It kept crashing and she didn't know how to fix it. She was trying to make a lot of small fixes. But as she was working on them, she started getting crashes. She eventually had to throw the computer out.

The Futon. Gina's parents wanted her to buy a futon to cool off. She would do as her parents asked. They asked Gina if she wanted to sleep on a bean bag. Gina said no and got a bucket instead. The futon got broken and Gina had to go home empty handed.

Ghost Sheet. Tricia was on a long train ride to a wedding. Suddenly she saw a ghost on the train. She decided to call out for the ghost to come back. She could see the ghost in the window next to her. She was so relieved she sat up all night and cried.

Cooking Class. Tim was learning how to cook for a family. Tim had a class in the morning and did not get to go to class after lunch. Tim decided he would go to a cooking class. Tim worked very hard in class to cook dinner for the family. Tim got a good grade and passed his class.

Ronald's Speech. Ronald was a young man in high school. He would often talk in class. One day Ronald was asked to deliver a speech. Ronald had been in trouble in school. His speech was never given due to the lack of funds.
Hot sun. It was about to be a hot day. My kids wanted to go to the park. So they wanted to go to the lake. But my wife had a great idea. She brought us outside.

Walking in the woods. It had been raining very heavily the night before. We decided to take a walk. We went to the edge of the woods and looked down. We started to smell the fresh stench. When we got home, we went to clean it up.

Movies. My friends and I loved watching movies together. The first one I watched was Star Wars. The next movie I watched was Mission Impossible. I didn't care what the movie was about. My friends and I all had fun watching movies together.
Cell Phone. It was a busy weekend. I wanted to go grocery shopping. I decided to get a cell phone. It was the only one of my collection. I was so excited that I ran outside.

Dad's Comet. The parents were looking forward to seeing their little girl. They were looking forward to watching the little girl climb out of the crib. They were hoping for a comet. But a comet was coming and the little girl had been waiting!Her little boy was getting a big surprise.
Trouble Board Game. Amy was playing board games with her friends. She didn't know the rules. She didn't know what happened next. She thought the game was over. Amy's friends won.
Ring. My friend took me out to dinner last night. We ordered pizza and wine. I got a ring. I put the ring on. I went home feeling great.
Puzzle game. Lily decided to play a puzzle game. She found a game that she liked. Lily began to play the game. Lily became bored quickly. She gave up on playing the game.
Taking my cat to the vet. I had been taking my cat to the vet. I went to the vet today. I had a cat with cancer. I had her for the last 3 months. The cat died.

Healthy. Caleb is a very fit man. He wants to build up his strength so he decides to do a lot of lifting. After a while, Caleb gets to a point where he's afraid to do anything. He decides to stop lifting heavy but starts eating healthy. The next week, Caleb is not afraid of lifting anymore!

Power House. The power house in the movie was just a fancy room. When the movie began it got loud and scary. At the end of the movie, the power went out. Everyone watched the movie from the bathroom. They all felt very disappointed.

New Job, Old Fear. John was a salesman at a convenience store. He got a job at a high end department store. John started working overtime after 2 years of overtime. John had a new fear of being late to work. After his first day of work he became depressed and tired.
New Jersey. A woman wanted to live in New Jersey. She had moved there with her husband. They saved up a lot of money. They planned a house and got it built. They loved living in New Jersey.

The Peace Corps Beckons Again. Sam was looking forward to the Peace Corps bingo with his dad. He thought he would win the bingo. Instead he won an extra hundred bucks. He felt terrible about it. He decided he would never volunteer again.

Money. Cathy wanted to buy new makeup. Her friends suggested she try a new style. Cathy tried it on one day and it fit her perfectly. She was so happy with it!Cathy decided to buy it everywhere she went.
Smell. Rena had a horrible stench in the house. It smelled of mothballs. She took her cat to the store to pick some up. While there the cat didn't like anything. She called the store to return it.

Infestation. A cat started a large infestation of mice in the attic. The cat had to be relocated. Thankfully, the infestation was quarantined. A few days later, a mouse appeared on the carpet. It was a healthy, playful mouse!

The Walk. Tina went on a walk to her school. She walked from the cafeteria to the front desk. A couple of her friends were there. The principal handed her her lunch. Tina was happy she had something to do.

Cheater Cheater. Kelley is a college student. Her friends all go to college together. Kelley is on a team in track and cross country. She started to get really good friends and the track team. Now Kelley is a very good runner.

First Day of School. Teddy took his little brother Tia to school today. The two got their first two shifts at 8:00am. The two's first shift was to help pick up the school bag. Tia was excited to see her favorite class. Tia's new class was not to be missed!

Jasmine gets her car stolen. Jasmine drives to a nearby gas station to buy gas. She pays her check at the station. Jasmine gets in the car. Her gas tank is broken. Jasmine can't find her car anywhere.
Being Missed. Rita had to drive to an interview. She felt nervous and very out of place. She ended up driving to the interview instead. She ended up being very late. Rita felt very sad.

Martha's Reward. Martha was a very good golfer. She put in long drives over the course of the week. Every weekend she played at least one round. Last Sunday she played in a long round at a friend's club. Martha got to the final round and won a couple of bucks.

Stress reliever. Amy is very stressed. Her mom tells her to relax and let it go. Her mom tells Amy she doesn't need to be stressed about her job. Amy is now using the stress reliever. Amy feels great about the relief she received.

Fool's gold. John had a very large collection of gold. One day, he was out at the beach when he noticed gold in the sand. He was so impressed he didn't bother to keep it. When he found it, he realized it was the gold in a bottle. He threw the bottle into the sea and made money doing so.

Waiting. My friend and I are standing in the cafeteria waiting for the bus. He asks me if I want to sit next to him. I say sure, but I really need to get something done. I go back to my book and watch TV on my laptop. I can't wait until the bus comes to take us home.

The Girl. The girl was very sad. She didn't know what to do for her first day at school. All her friends were so nice to her!Finally, her parents let her borrow her brother's backpack. She was glad she could spend the day with her friends.

expensive troubles. Lisa's husband has trouble getting her things done. She decided to take out the loan to get things done. She started to work. The car started to move. She had to put the parts back on her car.

The Art Thief. Jordyn and her family were going to a local fair. They wanted to see a painting by a local artist. They were so excited to see the work that they were too excited. As they walked into the gallery the doors shut. The artist had been caught stealing and they had to get a refund.
Dental work. Jen was doing some dental work. She had a couple of cavities. The dentist had to do several procedures. Jen had to get rid of all of her cavities. She was relieved.

Sign Language. Alex loved sign language. He would go to classes and make signs. One day his parents found out he was deaf. His parents decided to take him to a hearing school. He loved every minute of it.

Pregnant again. Susie went to the store to buy eggs. She saw a cute little egg store, she was very excited. She bought a big basket of her favorite flavors. When she opened the eggs, they were perfectly formed. She bought the most delicious egg ever.

Kate. Kate had been out in the rain for three hours. She decided she needed a drink. She decided to go to the store to buy a pitcher. When she arrived at the store she was already in the water. Kate was able to get to her car safely.

First Day of School. Mary was excited about the first day of school. She had a lot of work to do to prepare. She was really excited to start school and start working. She was very scared that she would get into trouble. She decided that she would do her best to help out.

It was his call. It was Tim's job to call his neighbor. The neighbor lived in a different neighborhood. Tim told him that he had lost his cell phone. Tim knew he was calling on a Sunday. He ended up losing the call and missed his next shift.

Blind Date. Timmy wanted to get a blind date. His friends asked him. Timmy decided to try to hide his disappointment. He waited until it was late and they were both late. His friends all found out he was really blind.

Paying off credit card. Kelly was doing okay at work. She was paying off her credit card all the time. She realized it wasn't paying off at all. She called to see if anyone else had the same situation. They told her to be patient and get another one.

New Phone. My friend has been on a trip to Chicago. He wants a new phone for a business trip. I told him I didn't have anything and he was upset. I told him I would purchase him a new phone. We made a list of things he needs before making that choice.

Fast Food Party. My friend wanted to have a fast food party. So we decided to go with him. He had so much food that we were all starving. Luckily we had a big enough party. The party was successful and our friends all got a big treat.
Out of Hot Water. Samantha needed some hot water. She decided to go for a run. She got cold while she was running. She felt terrible afterwards. She decided not to run in the future.

Belly. John had been eating out for a while. But he was worried about his belly. John went to the doctor. The doctor recommended that John get a new belly fat measurement. John now has a new belly fat measurement.
Late Night Swimming. My husband and I went swimming at the local pond. We took turns holding a life jacket up the side. He held the edge of the edge. We held the edge of the water. He went under.

Big Moose. Nancy loved a story about a big white moose. She thought the story was very realistic. One day, Nancy's husband went on a field trip to a big moose camp. Nancy and her husband went to see a moose. Nancy was happy her husband went with them on their field trip.
He Returns. A car drove by and stopped a man. The man was sitting in a car. He turned around and asked a woman out. The woman declined. The man asked his brother to take his brother's car.

Snow Day. Every Saturday, the snow day came. This time, it was a lot of people. We walked around and talked to all of them. I met two new friends. I found out there was going to be a snow day event for the whole city.

The Great Coach. Jim wanted to become a great coach. He went to college. He began practicing his coaching style every day. He started teaching a college basketball team. The new coach made the team very competitive and great.

Laughing At Good Price. When my dad bought me my first car I was really upset. I went to the dealership to see what the deals were. It was a terrible deal. I told him it was too expensive, and walked out of the dealership. I was really glad to have finally found a car that I could afford.
Jenny. Jenny has had an affair with a rich man. She dumps him. He leaves her for another man. He dumps her again. Jenny is now single again.
Musician Signs Himself. Frank was a musician. He was having problems with his voice. He decided to join a charity. He sang in front of millions of people. Frank is now able to sing.

The World Series. Tina was looking forward to watching the baseball world series. She and her friends loved sports and wanted to get a good show. When the games started the seats were sold out. Tina didn't want to go to the end of the line but there were too many people. Finally she and her friends got a spot on the team.

Hopscotch. I got home from school and there was no hopscotch. I started the game but couldn't catch up. I kept trying and kept trying. I eventually caught up with the rhythm and I made a nice point. My teacher laughed and gave me a detention.

Dax's Decisions. Dax went to the pharmacy to purchase pills. There was a shelf full of pills that looked great. She decided to save up for a week. After a week of saving Dax felt really good. She decided to buy a lot more pills and made herself feel healthier.

A Trip to the Store. The first day of school is finally here. Everyone is getting ready to go to school. All of the kids have a good day. Then they all head home. When they leave, everyone is excited for the day to be over.
Bill's Big Break. Bill was really good at drawing. One day his mom was visiting. She was looking through his drawing book. She noticed something odd. Bill had drawn a woman with blue eyes.

Phone case. Susy had a phone case from Apple. Her phone broke off after one month. She wanted to use a new one, but did not have enough money. She bought an old case. She wore the old phone case around all the time.

Quentin Tastes Cheese. Quentin always liked to drink cheese curds. But, today he was bored and went to the grocery store. Quentin was shocked to see all kinds of cheese for the first time. He immediately went to try it and loved it. And, Quentin will never want to miss cheese curds!
Kitchen. We visited my grandma's kitchen. There was a pot and a sink. It took my wife and I two hours to cook. It was an amazing experience. We would stay at her house often.

Mary's Flower Basket. Mary was taking a walk through her neighborhood when she noticed a huge flower basket. She walked inside and found a box and a bucket of flowers. Mary got dressed and walked back home. As soon as she was done with her walk, she saw an hourglass in the back yard. Mary felt very happy, and returned the basket to her house.
Tennis. Tom liked to play tennis. One day he went to the tennis court. He took a couple of shots to practice. He was very frustrated with his shots. He gave up the sport.

Kids in a Pool. Sandy's daughter had a birthday party for her 10th birthday. The family had to evacuate as Sandy's son was missing. Sandy's son is very big, and Sandy was very afraid he would be hurt. Her son was swimming in the pool by himself when he jumped in. Sandy and her daughter were worried for her son and he made it out safely.
Buying Water. Sam was buying water. He was buying two bottles of water. He noticed the price on a bottle he liked. He noticed the price on a bottle he liked. He decided to go back home and buy more.

First Credit Card. Gina was working in a store with a new employee. He made a card for her for his first job. He asked her to spend ten dollars at lunch. She immediately paid the bill. He was happy that she had a job that paid for her card.

Inventor. Charles wanted to be a inventor. He decided to buy a patent on a new kind of rubber. He worked for a year trying to perfect the rubber. Finally he invented a unique type of rubber. His invention made the inventor rich and famous.
Rude Joe. My wife is a nice woman. I met a good friend a few years ago. We went to see the same movie. He made rude remarks towards me. I was so mad that I told him to be more polite.

Arm Wrestling. Tom wanted to be an arm wrestler. He practiced everyday with his friends. He got stronger with every day. Eventually he was able to defend himself. Tom was proud of his arm wrestling skills.

Job Promotion. Mack had a big interview coming up. He was sure he would get the job. Mack worked extremely hard, but still lost out. He went home to try and fix it. He found out the company had just promoted him.

Noise Complaint. Sam was tired of being awakened by loud noises. His apartment complex hired a noise company to come. He had to take them to work every day and stay at night. They noticed he was getting more and more upset. The noise company left and Sam's apartment quieted down.
The Drunk. Tom was at the bar with his friends. Tom got into a drunken fight with a man. Tom ended up getting fired from his job. He began to drink heavily. Tom soon began to drink himself to death.

Doug has a problem. Doug needs money for dinner. He calls a few restaurants but doesn't find any suitable. Finally he finds a nice restaurant with good reviews. He pays for his food and orders it. The waiter loves his food, and Doug is happy.
School. Sarah got her very first job today. Sarah went into the school to take a test. The test was difficult. Sarah did very poorly on the test. Sarah got fired.

The White Dog. I recently went to the beach to surf. I got out my surfboard and saw a white dog surfing on my board. I took the white dog home and gave him water. I told him I was sorry I didn't notice he was white. His owners told me I was the white dog and apologized for being late.

The Reporter. Gina has a job as a reporter. Her job is to provide her city's news. She works very hard on stories that make it in the paper. However, Gina is very sensitive about her own private information. She doesn't care what anybody thinks but she does it anyways.

Too much. Tom always tried to do too much work. He would never finish what he started. He spent all his time working too hard. He finally quit trying hard. He now looks at himself in the mirror and realizes he has too much.

Elms College. The first day of summer camp was starting in an hour. They were all gathered in the front of the auditorium. All the girls' names were called. Afterwards, the teacher told everyone what was coming. Everyone laughed at their silly names.

The one that perseveres. Mary was playing in the park one day. It was sunny and a lot of people were there. She saw a bear with a human friend. The bear took the human friend's arm and then began to climb on it. Mary was too scared to run and let the bear hurt herself.

The Fruit Juice. Jodie liked to make fruit juice. She would put her apple juice in a big glass jar. She then put a big orange and grapefruit slice in it. She put milk, fruit, and yogurt in it. Finally she added fresh orange and lime zest.
The Wild Cat. Tina was on a trip to the park. She had seen many strange animals. One of the animals was a wild cat. Tina had not seen one so she thought she could touch it. The wild cat bit her.

Rude Awakening. Maddie and Tim were friends. Maddie invited her boyfriend Tim over to her house for a surprise party. When she went over to Tim's house it was really late. Tim started yelling at Maddie and then left. Maddie became so angry that she kicked Tim out of her house.

Caterpillar Panic. Allie was going to the fair. She was expecting a huge stallion exhibit. However she found one stallion. It looked exactly like one of her older brother's. Allie was sad to see a dead stallion at the fair.

Gross Mold. My son went to the store today. He asked a clerk for help cleaning up a moldy food container. The clerk was able to get the mold out. The worker then gave my son a new container. He gave him the new container.

Monument. My cousin, Fred, and I go to the museum every summer. We visited this month's exhibit on the Civil War. This is his favorite piece of artwork to see. It was commissioned by an old friend from high school, when Fred was there. He was so proud to learn it was an authentic Civil War painting.

The Tire Machine. I was driving my car to work one day. My tire was out and I was stuck. I tried to make my way to the mechanic's office. However, the garage was closed for renovations. I was late for work and my tire was gone.
The extra cookies. I was making cookies for a group. They were not very good. I decided to make a different kind. It was better than the others. I went back and made more.

Shoes. Gina has a very big foot. She wears a pair of athletic shoes every day. One day she was out running with her friends. She fell and hurt her ankle and toes. Now Gina doesn't wear running shoes because she is sore all day.

monster. Tom loved his friend, but there was a monster in his house. Tom's friend loved monsters, but the monster didn't like Tom. Tom's friend went to visit him, but the monster came to see him. The monster was very scared and ran away. Tom thanked his friend and vowed to never be scared again.

Ray. Ray was a very popular boy in his town. His friends had all tried to get him to get drunk and go out. He always refused and would stay home. One day his mom took him to a bar. He was so out of it that he forgot all about getting drunk.

Music man. Jason started singing the music at work. He sang songs like the band's hit, and some of his own. His boss liked how he sang and wanted to hear him out. Jason wanted to sing more, and asked his boss for more gigs. His boss gave him a bigger job and more gigs.

Lost. I was waiting for my daughter at the bus stop. When the bus pulled in I was so nervous. She was on a long trip from home. So I looked at the other bus passengers and lost track of her. The next bus pulled in and I got on that bus.

The Bird. Gina was in her bedroom and heard a big bird chirp. She was scared but still excited. Gina walked over to the bird to pet it. The bird cackled and giggled. Gina was proud of her skill and decided to keep her pet.

Bird Friends. Sarah was at the park with her friends. They were watching a bird feeder. A bird flew into the feeder. They all chased after it until it landed on the ground. They then started to feed it.

Playing by the Pool. Mary got a call from her friend, Beth, who lived in New York. Mary and Beth planned to play by the pool at Mary's house. Mary had never been to the park before and Beth was nervous about it. Beth had been swimming for a couple of days and Mary was nervous as well. Mary and Beth made it to the park and spent the day playing by the pool.

Max Cooks an Omelette. Max was cooking some meat for the family. He wasn't very good at it so he took it too far. The meat went into his mouth and started to burn. Max was embarrassed but then he realized he was allergic. He went to the emergency room and had his mouth cleaned.
Breakfast. Tim was really hungry. He decided to cook something to eat. His mom made him a sandwich. Tim ate it with no complaints. He had breakfast and was satisfied.

Peanut. Nathan loved to eat his peanut butter and jelly sandwich. One day he got sick and had to go to the hospital. He was able to recover and eat well enough to go home. He stayed home and took good care of his stomach. It took awhile, but Nathan finally felt better.

Dan loses a bet. Dan has a lot of money on a baseball game. When it is his turn, he throws the ball into the stands. He sees an advertisement in a local newspaper for an online gambling service. Dan picks up the phone and calls the service provider. The service provider comes to Dan's house, picks him up, and drives him to the casino.
Erica Trips. Erica is running late for work. She realizes her car breaks down. She calls her boss to come over. Erica rushes to work. She is very late.

Casual Friday. Tiffany was working at a restaurant. She was so bored that she decided to sit in the cafeteria. She ordered a large pizza. She didn't eat for a long time. When she left the next day she was too bored to even eat it.

Too many favors. I was running out of time to get something done. I decided to do a favor. I got a new book for someone's house. It was an expensive project. I couldn't afford it and couldn't fulfill my promise.

Snoring. Maddie's mom woke her up in the middle of the night. She looked at Maddie and noticed her snoring. Maddie began to snore as well. Her mom told her to stay in bed. Maddie continued to snore for another half hour.

Gold Digger. Gina was a very attractive girl. She always wanted to find a husband. She always tried to pick a nice boyfriend. One day her boyfriend did a little digging and found her gold. She was very happy and so was Gina.
Poisonous Mushroom. Sandra was at the park with her sister. They both played hide and seek. Suddenly, they heard a loud crash. They were both in a deep sleep. The mushrooms woke them up.

Cupcakes. I was baking cupcakes for my coworkers. I decided I needed a new recipe to bake. I got some cupcake mix and started making cupcakes. Then I realized I forgot a cup. I tried to make a new one instead.

He Wasn't Much of A Fan. Jim didn't like basketball. He had a passion for the game. His parents would constantly tell him to take it easy on the game. Eventually he grew tired of it. He got better at the game and started rooting for his team.
Lessons. Ava had a very challenging science test at school. She was nervous for weeks. Ava had not taken any extra study time. She went into the test unprepared and forgot a lot. She failed the test.

Uncontrollable. Tina was going out of town on a date with her friend. As they were walking around the park, the man she liked approached her. She didn't know what to do. He told her he'd taken a picture of her with him!She gave up and decided she'd just pretend to be on a date with him.
What color. Jenna wanted a new dress. But she wasn't sure. Jenna had seen many beautiful dresses but none matched her style. So Jenna went shopping for a dress. Her choice was bright green.

Shelly's Lunch. Shelly was hungry so she went to the school lunchroom. As she was waiting, she noticed a big bag on the table. She decided to pick out a bag of cereal and a big piece of banana. When the boy at the counter came in to pick her up she realized she forgot her lunch. She sat at the counter and cried with him for three hours.

Visit to the Doctor. One day I was in need of a new toothbrush. The only dentist in town offered me a discount. I declined and chose to go to the doctor instead. My dentist told me that he needed a good quality toothbrush. Since I didn't have the money to pay for the new toothbrush, I had to go to the store.

4K TV. Jasper was trying to decide what kind of movie to watch tonight. He was watching a 4K TV. Unfortunately he got sick one night. Jasper decided to cancel the 4K TV. He now watches Netflix instead.
Jerky. My girlfriend and I went out to eat. We got some delicious jerky. When I finished I ate the entire container. The container was extremely greasy. I realized I need to have more jerky.

New Friends. Lucy had just gotten over a breakup. Her best friend had been talking to another girl. She wanted to be friends with him too. So she was glad when she met his new friend. Lucy was excited to be a part of this new group.

Anything for Pizza. I went to the pizza place the other day. They had a lot of different kinds of pizzas. The prices are really good. I decided to try some and it was delicious. I'll always go there to get a tasty pizza.

Unemployed. Sam was a computer programmer in college. He loved the internet and the internet was his only source of income. In the fall of 2011 he began to think he might be unemployed. He began saving extra money online. Soon enough he was paid a part-time salary for working online.

Major Switch. James had been diagnosed with a mild form of depression. He was depressed with the pain and the sadness, but had to switch to a more positive mood. After a few months, James began feeling better again. But after a few more months, James began feeling bad. He eventually gave in and quit taking the antidepressant.

No Free Money. I went to an appointment to get a prescription for an insulin shot. The attendant told me there was a fee, but I didn't have any money. As I waited I tried to look around the room. I couldn't find the prescription anywhere. I walked back into the doctor's office, but it was closed.

The Upset DJ. Tina had an amazing DJ. She invited him to come to her house for a surprise party. She invited him for his birthday. Unfortunately the DJ overslept. He had to sleep in, she had to pay him.
Check on it. Milly was looking up at the clock. There was an hour left. She wasn't sure what to do. She started to look for a snack. She couldn't find any food that she loved.

Butch Awakens. Butch was playing the drums in a band. He had a long time to practice. Suddenly, he slipped and hit his head. He needed to sit in a chair for a few minutes. Butch had a big headache after.

Binge Watching. My friends and I decided to watch a show online. It is called Beavis and Butthead. We decided we were going to watch them together. We had dinner and then went back to watch the show. It was a fun show and I hope we do it every week.

Lion. When my dad brought home the new truck, it was full of lions. He said they were coming to town next week. I wanted to play with the cats that lived with them. Luckily my mom took me to the big one. I felt very happy when I saw the lions.

Mopping the Floor. It was a warm sunny day, and John was tired. John put on his wet sandals and took off his sandals. John got on the sidewalk and walked to the front door of the house. He knocked on the door and the owner opened it. John was shocked to see that the person he had been talking to in the front room was actually his wife!

Cooking. Kelly had a boyfriend and two kids. She was married and had two little girls. One day the girls got into an argument about her cooking. She cooked a big pot of chicken, adding sauce and vegetables. Everyone enjoyed the dish and Kelly felt good about herself.

Fired. My sister is a police officer. She is being fired from her job. The day after the firing her boss calls her. She tells her boss that she wants her job back. My sister said yes and will take her job back.

Hotel Lobby. Liz's husband was leaving for work one morning. She waited outside the hotel lobby for him for an hour. The hotel employees were busy cleaning the lobby. They found nothing she needed to do. The employees let her use the restroom after they finished.

Boot Camp. Ben is an avid golfer. Today, Ben was a member of the golf team. Ben was very excited and excited to take his tee time. Ben practiced hard and got ready for the next round. Ben won the golf tournament that day!

Pantsuits are great for work. Jane loved working with pantyhose. She loved it so much that she decided to make her own pantyhose. She tried to find a company that would make pantyhose. She was happy she decided to do it herself. She now has amazing pantyhose and she loves them.

Hurting my mouth. Kelly was taking a shower. While showering she felt something on her mouth. She realized that the shampoo had gotten on her tongue. It was bad. Kelly decided to wash her mouth with soap and water.

Diapers. Anna had never had any babies. She wasn't sure where to begin. She took a day off from work and went to the laundry. Anna put her new baby in a diaper. Anna went back to work the following morning with the new baby.

The Perfect Couch. I live in a condo and couldn't afford a couch. I decided to make a living couch and buy one. I ended up with a pretty ugly one so I bought it. I made a few changes so it felt much better. I sold it and bought another one.
Lunch box. Nathan was hungry. He had just finished getting his meal. He went to his lunch box. It was empty. He realized it was a lunch box.

Midnight mass. Tia had to go to midnight mass. Her friends were asleep, so she had to stay awake. Tia felt her stomach growl, and her eyes close. She was so embarrassed and ashamed. The whole night Tia tried to be more careful.

Broken Heart. Eli's mother died and Eli went to live with his grandparents. Eli lived there until he lost his job and moved away. Eli and his grandparents didn't have much money and lived in a dumpster. Eli didn't know how to swim and became sick one day. The doctors put Eli in the pool and told Eli he needed a heart.

Teaching French. My English class was preparing for a French class next week. I am a terrible student and had not studied French. It was hard for me to find good French textbooks. I found a good book, but it was only in French. So I went back to English and worked on French for a week.

The Dance. Jane was feeling a little nervous. She was just starting her first dance as a new teacher. She was afraid she would not do well. But as she entered the stage, she saw that everyone was there. She had been practicing!
Mean women. Sasha was at a bar. She saw a woman talking about a boyfriend. She asked what she meant. The woman said she was mean. Sasha was very offended.

The purse. Gina was walking through the grocery store. She saw a lady carrying a purse. Gina stopped and gave the woman her purse. She was so happy to see her purse. She asked if she could get the purse back.

The Easter Present. It was Easter morning and Sue was very excited. She went to a local grocery store to look around the store. She saw a new toy that she loved. She opened the box and gave the puppy a bath. Sue had a wonderful surprise for her dog.

Love Song. I was at an outdoor concert with my friends. One of the people who was singing a song got up and began to shout. It was a terrible sound and I got a little freaked out. Eventually, they stopped and told me what was wrong. The song ended up sounding amazing and we got to go back to our seats.

Eyeglass Debacle. Susie was getting her own glasses. She wanted them for Christmas. But they were expensive. Susie really wanted a blue pair for her sister. But when the blue pair came, Susie was mad.
Cold Sore. I got an injury and had to miss one game. I decided to sit and rest. I couldn't get enough sleep. I also didn't eat. I didn't feel the need to go to a game anymore.

Headed to France. I had to go to France for my first time. When I got to France I realized I wasn't ready. Luckily the French were welcoming. I was able to meet a bunch of French people. I made a nice time.

Pain in the Back. Janine was in the middle of a date with her boyfriend. Janine and her boyfriend were sitting in their car. Janine was in a bad mood as the heat got too high. Janine got into the car and started to drive home. She got out and found out she had a flat tire on her way home.
Mild Food. Tim was at a restaurant. They had one small item on the menu for him. It was the mildest item on the menu. It was the cheapest item on the menu. Tim took it and ate it with no complaint.

Seeing an Ex. I got a letter from my ex-girlfriend. She said I had cheated on her. We didn't talk for a month. Then I met a girl I liked and got a letter back. It turned out she had never even met me.

Joan. Joan was having a party. One of her friends was her best friend. Joan and her friend had a really good time. One of Joan's best friends dropped out. Joan was very sad that she no longer had any friends.
Keyboard. Tim needed to type on his laptop. He bought a keyboard for under half the cost. However, it broke after a week. Tim had to wait for an exchange. He was also upset he had to return it.
Baking Hand Pies. Gina was baking homemade hand pies. It started to rain. Her oven started to leak. Gina put on her raincoat. When the rain stopped, she baked the pies.

The wrong cake. Jenna's friend invited her to her cousin's wedding. It was the girl's birthday. Jenna had never been to one. She was really excited to go. But after the wedding the cake turned out to be completely wrong.

A New Pet. Mia was very young. She was always excited to see her new pet. Today her parents told her they could no longer take her anymore. Mia had to be left with her dog. Mia's parents could not take her dog to the vet.

School for the Blind. Riley wanted to be a teacher. He applied to every school in town. All his school applications were rejected. Riley decided to just look for a different job. Riley found a better job that was also for the blind.

Mom's Cookies. Gina's family always made cookies. This weekend, they decided to bake a new batch. Her favorite part was that they bought extra cookies. Her family put them on the table and ate them all. Now they have a batch of homemade cookies!

From New to Broken. Janet woke up feeling extremely energetic. She knew she needed to move away from her old house. She checked the fridge. Her family hadn't seen her. Janet decided to move in with her grandma instead.
A cat. Lucy had a cat named Teddy. One day Teddy went missing. The police took Teddy for a scan. It turned out Teddy had a broken leg. The cat never returned.

Unorthodox Choice. I was browsing an old book at the library one day. I was looking at the book about the ancient Chinese civilization. I couldn't decide what to read so I bought a few. Later, I felt my jaw tighten as I decided to pick one of the stories. The book is now lost to history.
The Story. John was working in the bakery. John noticed something amiss. He had forgotten his salt and bread. He tried to work around it but it still wasn't working. John had to call in sick.

Kind Words. When I was young I had many pet cats. They were cute, but I felt like I was wasting them. I didn't want to give them a home, so I gave away a lot of them. I decided to raise money to buy new cats, and found lots of adoption ads. I found a good cat, and decided I would keep her as long as she was still good.

Barefoot. I had a hard time wearing my shoes for a month. I could barely walk up to my desk without slipping. When I finally did, I felt bad. I couldn't get it to stay put. I tried to get it to stay put in the same place again but it didn't.

Never too late. Jana was invited to her grandmother's house for a surprise party. It was a big birthday, and the grandkids were there. Jana was very excited to go. But her grandparents were not so happy. After several minutes they asked her not to go anymore and left.

Tree. Ava was working with her grandma. She was trying to grow a tree. As she was planting the first trunks of branches, she noticed she had a problem. The branches were too tall. She decided to just leave the branch alone until she had enough.

Teacher Leaves. Lily was nervous about taking a teacher's course. She practiced very hard all week. She went to the course on Tuesday and got terrible marks. Lily decided to give up the course. She didn't get into the class for the rest of the semester.

Strike. Tommy was working as a bouncer at a club. He was a bit too aggressive with the bouncers there. Tommy was very annoying to the bouncers there. Tommy tried to quit the job. The bouncer fired him after Tommy complained to management.

Swan. Nancy was watching a movie with her son. They were taking a swim in the water. Suddenly, a huge creature swam right at them. They swam over and back to shore. Nancy called the police and they swam away.
Cat Food. Tom was in the house with his wife. They were making dinner and couldn't find the cat food. Tom had a large plate of chicken and veggies. His wife had chicken salad instead. Tom felt silly.
Tired workout. Kelly woke up very tired today. She needed a workout. Her friends were all out at her house. Her friend had a run in the neighborhood. Kelly was so tired and had to walk to the store.

Driving after my stroke. When I was a little boy, I did not want to drive. I had one accident that got me off the road. I was driving to work one day. I had to be stopped by a policeman. The policeman told me to drive slowly and not go over the speed limit.

Halloween on the street. Meredith walked into her local bar and had a drink. While at the bar, she saw a flyer for Halloween on the front window. She took the flyer to the waitress. The waitress gave her a flyer to read on Halloween night. Meredith went home and enjoyed Halloween with her friend.

Birthday Cake. One of my best friends invited me to her birthday party. We decided to make cake. She wanted chocolate covered strawberries. I took the cake out and sliced it. I loved how beautiful it turned out.

The Tree. I was playing in the woods with my two sons. I decided to climb a tree. I climbed up onto a tree branch and began to fall. I came down and was able to roll up in a ball. After I was out I ran to the store and bought a new ladder.

The cook off. Tim was at the cook off. He was looking forward to competing. He bought his ingredients and went on the stage. He placed his dishes in the oven. He turned the oven on and the cooks squared off.

Wedding Day. I walked through my neighborhood and saw an aisle full of boxes. My husband picked out some jewelry boxes. I put some of my husband's old clothes in the boxes. The jewelry boxes were for each of us. It was the most fun I have ever had.

The Big Test. Tim had a math test today. He was afraid that he would not do well. He decided to go with a low grade. Tim worked all night and prepared for the test. When it came time to start he did really well on the test.
Banging Noise. Tim was on his way to class. His car got stuck on the interstate. He couldn't start it again. Eventually, the car had a big problem. Tim couldn't get it to start again.
Freshly baked rolls. I was craving fresh baked rolls. I took my two cats, Lucy and Molly, to the pound. I bought fresh rolls for them. They loved it!I left them in the back seat to munch on them.
Zoo. Allie wanted to go to the zoo. Her parents were against it. They wanted her to go in a different area. Allie didn't want to go to the zoo. She decided she would watch the tv instead.

The present. Kate and her brother were having a rough time getting a gift for their mom. They had gotten her a huge box but didn't have a way to open it. They decided to build a little secret box and put it on the front porch. They watched movies and played games and then played for the rest of the day. When they got home they put the box and gift in their car and went inside.

Wrong Change. I used to have a great credit score. I didn't realize how bad I was until the balance came due. I started to make silly claims. My credit card company told me that I owed too much. My bank changed my account last week and now I pay less.

Bad Back. The day of the big fight, Josh had a horrible back. He tried to go for a bike ride and it was hard to control him. He was able to get on his bike, but it started wobbling and he tripped. Josh got hurt badly and it took him a long time to recover. He ended up with broken ribs and a cracked collarbone.

Guys. I went into the basement one day. I noticed my roommate standing at the top of the stairs. He was in a big fight with a bunch of friends. He kicked everyone out of the basement. I had to leave after that and never went back there again.

New York. It was a dark and stormy day. Suddenly there was a loud thunderstorm and a flash flood. Suddenly a huge tree fell down in front of a building. Several of the residents jumped out of the way to save it. The tree came down with a loud pop and a flash flood!

Shareholder. I was going to get out of a bad relationship. I decided I would need to share some things with someone. I wanted to share some of my debts. I bought stock. I invested in the company I was going to sell.
