Family Photos. Linda and her family had taken many family photos. The day had finally come for Linda to share them all. When the photos were all handed in, Linda was sad. She did not want to be the one to delete all the photos. After she was done she decided to cherish them as much as her family.

Too Fast. One day I was running down the street. I came to a stop sign and tried to run towards it. The light turned green but I still didn't move. The police officer yelled at me. I was pulled over, and he told me to get down!
Bad Pie. John was trying to make some pie. He had all the ingredients. John forgot to put the pie in the oven. The pie burned when it hit the top. John had to have a new batch of pie.
Plumbing Problems. When I was a kid my house was very filthy. My mom had no idea what to do about it. She had to hire a plumber to come in. I told her I would help. She did and we fixed the mess up.

Missing. Amy was on the playground one day. She saw a dog with a loose leash. Amy took the dog to a store. The store gave the dog to a friendly stranger. Amy was relieved that the dog had found someone safe.

First Day of School. Jill arrived at school early to go to her first day of kindergarten. As she was waiting for her first bus, a group of kids approached her. She tried to tell them she was very nervous. Luckily they were nice and got her some snacks. After school, Jill decided she would do her best in her new school.

A Bad Movie. Karen was in her bedroom playing a video game. All of a sudden she heard a noise coming from her room. Her alarm started to ring. She had been snoring!The video game was playing too loud.

Double Rainbow. I went to see my friend yesterday. We went to a new restaurant. The waitress told me that it had a double rainbow. I told her it was a fake one. She gave me a $20 tip and told me to go home.

Jesus the great. Jesus the great was the name of the king of a land. In the world there were many kings and rulers. Jesus the great lived many centuries. Jesus the great died of old age. His name was Jesus the great.
Violin. Gina was a pianist. Her school was having a musical contest. The finalists would be chosen. Her favorite was the violin. She went home with a medal.

Distraction. I sat in my favorite chair all day. While I was looking at my computer, I suddenly became distracted. I lost track of where I was. I began to panic because I was sitting in the chair. I realized I didn't want to do anything.

Registering to vote. One day Lisa had to register to vote. She went to the DMV office. It took several minutes but Lisa was finally registered. She was surprised when a friend called to ask if she was allowed in. Lisa had her friends sign her up for the voting booth.
Lemonade Stand. Mary wanted to get healthier. She was always in the morning at the local lemonade stand. She really enjoyed it. It made her feel well. Mary was happy about it.

Saturday Cartoons. I was driving to work. I saw some cartoons on the television. My friend recommended I see Saturday CartoonsI went and saw them the next day. I couldn't wait to see Saturday Cartoons.

Dinner Proposal. Sally went to a restaurant for dinner. She asked if she could have a date. The server brought her to her table. They talked and then ordered a hamburger. Afterwards, Sally made a proposal.

Sushi Roll Prices. Beth needed to get some sushi. It was a Saturday afternoon. She was on the internet and searched for recipes. She saw a recipe that she liked. She bought the rolls and they came out great.

Henry gets caught. Henry's car broke down in the desert. Henry decided to use the spare tire. Henry drove to a gas station. He took out a can of gasoline and lit the can. A truck pulled up next to Henry and took him to the police station.

New Beds. Kate and her family moved into a new apartment. She went to the store to buy new curtains. She then went to the kitchen to get a nice set of towels. Then she went to the bedroom to get a pillow. She finally arrived and saw her new bed!
Bra. One night I went to the beach. I had been working really hard. I started to stroke my chest. I didn't think I should. I accidentally went down hard and it hurt.
Vacation. Nancy was getting ready for a big trip. Her husband wanted her to relax. He suggested they go to the beach. Nancy was really excited. Her husband was really happy too.
The bug bite. Kara took her son on a field trip. It was raining very hard. There was a large swarm of bugs. They were on his arms and on his shirt. His shirt was soaked in them.

The Cleaning Lady. I had a cleaning lady job. She cleaned my bathroom at work. On the way home from work she asked if I wanted to sit in her chair. I asked if it would be okay for her to be there, as I could not reach her. She agreed, as she has to go to work every day.

Lost Book. I found a book in my daughter's bedroom. I called the bookstore to book it. They told me that the book was lost. I found out that the book was in the neighbor's basement. I called the store and paid for the book and returned it.

Bonfire. Gina was looking to buy a new fire starter. She looked at several online stores. She also looked at the stores' reviews. When it was time to buy, she browsed the store. Then, she drove to the store and picked out the spark plug and bulbs.

The War. The war in Iraq was a big deal for American policy. It was going to be a big fight. Everyone was counting on it to end soon. On September 11, 2001, the war finally ended. It started to look like the end of the war.

The Pizza. One day, Tina decided to take a vacation. She took a trip to Italy. At the airport, Tina saw a pizza store that had the freshest Italian. Tina ordered the pizza and ordered a slice. When Tina had eaten her slice, Tina decided to return.

Bad First Day. John was nervous about his first day at his new job. He didn't have many friends, and many of his coworkers were older. John was nervous, but kept working. He got to work and quickly learned his new boss was very nice. John really enjoyed his new job, and left impressed.

Icy Road. There was a snowstorm that snowed for months. I needed a place to take shelter. I drove to a snowy, windy and icy place. I crawled in and stayed there for hours. I ended up getting really cold.

Fertility. Sarah and her husband wanted a child. They wanted it in the next year. Sarah and her husband thought about adopting. Sarah's friend said they would adopt another child if the fertility was high. Sarah's friend did not want the baby.

Nerves for the date. Eve and James were excited about the date. They both wanted to impress her. James was shy about telling her the truth. Eve told him that he would have to convince her to go. They went on the date with no regrets.

The bad grades. Kate had just gotten her first good grade. All of a sudden she realized she was not very good. She was very nervous about what she would say. She decided to study so she could get her grades in. Kate was relieved to finally get her grades up.

Detention. Anna was on a field trip with her school. On the field trip, she took a bus for several miles. When she arrived at her school, the bus driver told her to sit on a bench. She got on the bench and sat next to the bus driver. He let her go home and she learned the bus driver didn't mean it.

Far too hot. I was working in a park on a hot summer day. All of the sudden the weather started to change. The sky started to become quite dark and I realized that it was too hot. I got out my cooler and put on a hoodie and gloves. I left the park with my cool head on.

A gift she didn't like. Sue had gotten a new pair of glasses. She liked them very much. But the glasses cost a fortune. She had to make her mother a big contribution. It was a great gift and Sue really liked them.

Startled Cat. Kate was trying to play with her kitten, Lucky. She had left her at the dog park with her mother. Kenny looked under the bench where Lucky would sleep. A small kitten was peering at her. Kate turned around and saw Lucky curled up in a ball!

Full Volume. Cindy was a good listener. She heard the same song repeated over and over in her head. She had to make it into the morning. Her mother ordered full volume. She listened to it in complete silence.

Back to Ukraine. Tina wanted to see what the world was like in Ukraine. She wanted to meet her father and see what life was like. Her father wanted to return home to Russia. He said he was being harassed by the new regime. Tina decided not to go to visit him.

Knots. Mary was sewing for her school project. She noticed that she was missing some of the knots. She looked in her sewing kit to find them all. She found the missing knots on the top of her skirt. Mary was furious and threw the sewing kit at the teacher.
The broken headphones. Tom had headphones on at work. He wasn't paying attention to them. He accidentally tripped on the side of a bridge. His headphones had busted. He threw them out.

Chicken to Car. Karen was at the grocery store. She needed to get some chicken to go with her salad. Suddenly, she noticed that the chicken was out of meat. She decided to buy the meat. It was expensive but she was able to save a bit.
Fish. I used to fish in the creek. Now I fish off shore too. I caught a trout last night and put it in a bowl. It tastes very nice. I can't wait to try some salmon and trout again.

The Pool. Kate was swimming in the lake. All of a sudden, she felt a tug on her back. She tried to climb out of the water. The tug pulled her into the water. Kate lost her balance and swam off into the dark.
Brand new phone. Allie really wanted her new phone. Allie decided to buy it. She put the money towards the purchase. Then, she took the phone to the store. She was happy to finally get her new phone.

Tennis Table in Tennessee. Susie was playing tennis. Her friend asked her if she wanted to play with him. They decided to go to the nearby woods. Then, they played tennis for hours. Soon, they had become good friends.
Flute. Jane wanted to learn how to play the flute. She took lessons for 2 weeks. Afterwards, she played the flute in her school. She really enjoyed it!Jane wanted to learn how to play flute again!
haunted house. Sally was walking around her neighborhood. A dog walked by. It scratched her. Sally screamed at it. Sally was so embarrassed she decided to never go back there again.

Loud Construction. Dylan heard a noise in the garage. He went over and checked on it. He found someone building something. They were standing in the middle of the garage. He told them to go away and never come back.

Lost and found. Sally was on her way to school. She was looking for something. Suddenly she realized she had dropped her keys!They were in the car in her car. Thankfully she found them and took them home.

Auschwitz. I was driving home from school. Suddenly, I noticed a big crowd in the street. I didn't know what to do so I stopped my car and asked the driverThe driver told me the crowd was from a group of Nazi sympathizersI walked to the group and explained why I was thereIt turns out the crowd was the Jewish community in a small village.

Carla's Phone. Carla had bought her mom a new cell phone. She went to get it and it was broken. She couldn't figure out what to do with it. Carla decided to go get a refund. She gave her mom the phone to replace it instead.

Addison rides a ferryboat. Addison was a child who loved going on the river. One day she went on the ferry. She sat in the middle of the boat and watched the scenery. She had a lot of fun watching the scenery!Addison wished she had seen the water before.

The shadow. There was a tall shadow in the street. Dan walked past it and saw that it was a squirrel. Dan decided to make a shadow from plastic to draw the shadow. Dan drew a shadow on a piece of plastic, and drew the squirrel. Dan's friend noticed the shadow, and laughed.

Getting some running in. Sue was at her first race of the week. As soon as she came in, she ran towards the wall. She tripped and fell and ended up falling over. Her mother had her get bandaged up. Her mom was very upset about Sue's injury.
No service. Brett was at the restaurant with his friends. His food was very good. He ordered the same things again. He complained. They told him it was the service that kept him from ordering again.

Banana Split Fiasco. Sam's mom brought home banana split sandwiches. Her family ate them every day. However, Sam was eating too many of them. She felt like her stomach hurt after eating them. She had to eat the entire sandwich.

The Bad Rental. When Ben and his family went out for dinner, they saw an empty plate. They went to get a snack, and found that they had eaten two large burgers. Ben felt bad about how much food they had eaten. Ben and his family decided to use the bathroom for the night instead. Ben's family thanked him for his service on their night out.

Saving Grace. Grace is always saving for her house. Every week she buys a few hundred dollars for her home. However, on Monday, she goes to the bank and gets a $40 bill. Grace is sad to lose her money and is sad about it. Her friends will never forget her generosity and will always remember her.

Copper Kettles. I bought a metal container for my copper kettle. It's been a while since I've had one and I still want one. I called customer service to see if they could fix it for me. They said it would cost more but they would help me out. I called customer service and got a refund of the full amount.

Kite Flying. I tried out for the basketball team. My team coach told me to fly a kite for practice. I tried out on the team but did not make the team. When I went to a dance, a guy told me I was the best in the school. I got a scholarship and am now the best in the school.
Dog. Kathy wanted a dog. Her friends said no. She went to the pound. When she came out, the dog was missing. Kathy found him right at the pound.

Marty. Marty worked hard at his business. He had just come back from a trip to Hawaii. He saw his customers in their stores and was so pleased to see them. He made a special call for an order and waited. He was told it would be a long wait because he was in the middle of the line.
Traveling. I was walking around London. I noticed people talking. There was a group that I just met. We had a good chat about life and things. It made me feel less lonely!
Better Cardio. When we got older we had to start exercising. We spent months trying to be more active. We never got the cardio in. It was too hard on our backs. So we stopped trying to be active.
Metamorphosis. Gina went to the zoo for a family day of fun. She walked down the exhibit. Gina saw a huge lizard. She asked to take a closer look. Gina's dad looked and saw the lizard was a dinosaur.

Friends at the Arcade. Jim had just started his college years. He decided to have a birthday party. He decided to host a group of friends. His friends all came together to play arcade games. Jim was happy he had a fun birthday.

New Science. Gina's mother had been in a car accident. She was paralyzed in one arm and couldn't walk, but could talk. Gina was trying to learn how to make friends with others. She read all the best science books she could find on it. She eventually picked up a couple of new science books too.
Ruined blanket. It was cold in the apartment. Sara couldn't find her blanket. She went to her kitchen to retrieve it. Unfortunately her blanket was gone. Sara had to throw it away in the trash.

Grandpa Fish. It was Easter day and my grandma brought me to the beach. I couldn't figure out where we were going, but I liked the view. Grandpa showed me the spot he used to fish and gave me directions. We were off in the water, fishing for about ten minutes. Grandma told me we should go home now, but I didn't care because the food was great.

Windy Accident. One of the biggest storms in history was coming. People were getting homes stuck under trees. One neighbor had to go outside to fix a broken window. It was a good thing he did. It made him feel better.

A Walk in the Park. Jim was tired of all the other kids making fun of him. Jim decided he would take a walk in the park to calm down. Jim walked to the park and had a great time. The kids started making fun again. Jim decided to walk home instead.
Yacht Story. John's grandfather had a yacht. John wanted to get one. His grandfather bought him a car. John drove to the local gas station. He drove to the dock and purchased his boat.
Curly hair. Allie had curly hair. She was trying to cut it off. Her hair wasn't cutting her right off. Her friends convinced her to get it shaved. Her friend did it and it cut her hair.
Loud Alarm. Tina was on her bed. It was really quiet in her house. Then her alarm rang. She was very worried. She checked the TV to see what it was.

Online deals. John was trying to decide on an online deal. He researched several sites and sites. He decided on an exchange rate exchange. The exchange rate was a bit different than the original site. John was very pleased with his decision.

Crush. Kim wanted to go to the movies with her family. She told her mom she wanted to watch a romantic comedy. Her mom agreed to buy her some popcorn. Her mom showed her the movie and she fell in love with it. They decided to go see it together.

Keys Overboard. Sara needed to return a bag to a friend's house. Sara called up a few friends to check on her situation. Sara drove to a pawn shop. The store had several keys to sell for as much as $1, 000. Sara was thrilled to have a new addition to her collection.

Chef. Mike had always wanted to become a chef. So, he got a job at the local grocery store. He tried his best to improve his cooking. One day, he got a call from a chef and told him he made it. So, Mike decided that he wanted to become a chef as well.

Don't Try This At Anywhere. I lived in a really nice neighborhood. I had a cat for 5 Years. One day he broke the cat's collar. He left the cat there outside all day. The next day, the neighbor saw the collar.
Movie. My wife saw a movie with my brother yesterday. It was about a battle royale. It was very funny. I also had some chicken nuggets. I was so stuffed I could barely get up.

The Shower. I got ready and was ready to go to the shower. All of my friends arrived. I waited patiently, hoping I would be the first one there. When I got there I looked in the mirror. I noticed I had shaved my head.

Salesman. I was looking to make some money to buy groceries. I found a salesman on FB who wanted to advertise. I sent him an ad for my house on FB. Within a few days I had over $5000 in the bank. I immediately put the money into a rainy day fund.
Shoes. I was going shopping with my friends. I was looking at a new pair of shoes. When I put the shoes on, they fit right. We got to work in less than an hour. I wore the shoes the next day.

Crime. John was out at night with his family. John saw a homeless man walking by. John decided to help the homeless man. The man thanked him and they became friends. John told his family about his new friend.
greedy. My cat stole the food. He ate a lot of the food. I had to feed him less food. I was hungry when he was fed. I gave up on him.

Camp. It was a Friday and we decided to go to camp. We got in a car and drove to the campground. Then we packed up and left the campground. We went to the lake and got in the canoe. We headed home and had a great weekend.

Daniel Moves Out on His Own. Daniel had been working at a job that paid minimum wage for a month. When he got sick, he had to find a new job. He searched for a while online and finally found one. His friends all took advantage of his new position. Daniel is happy he is no longer paying someone minimum wage.

Being sick. It was the week of my senior year of college. I was in the cafeteria with some friends. My roommate got very sick. We were all in a panic and didn't talk much. Luckily, my roommate had a lot of friends by this time.

Depew. Sally's best friend was on Depew's radio station. She had a lot of free time and had a lot of ideas for her show. She got the idea for a new show. She worked tirelessly on it for months. The next day the station aired the show.

GENGHIS. Gabby was walking through the woods with her dad. As they walked, they saw a man in the trees. The man took off running. Gabby was scared and tried to catch up to him. He ran off with her and they never saw each other again.

The Blanket. Roxy was trying to clean out her closet. She got the job done and she had everything but the blanket. She couldn't find the blanket anywhere. Roxy decided to call the store to make a deal. Roxy bought the blanket and it fit her house.
Canceled Playdate. Kelly and Dan went to the movies. The two men sat in the car. Dan said he would have to go play golf later. Kelly didn't care. She was upset he was going to cancel the date.

The Paddleboard. Kate and Mark decided to take a break. Mark wanted to go on a paddling trip. Kate told him no. Mark made her get on the paddles instead. Now Mark can paddle all day instead of just for fun.

Mark has a bad tooth. Mark was at the dentist. He saw an old patient he had always wanted to see. He asked the dentist about this. The dentist told Mark that the patient could go home but he would have to go under for the cavity treatment. Mark was angry and had no tooth and had to go in for the cavity treatment.

Song. The two of them were really good at singing. One day a guy was very sick. His wife told him to go see a specialist. The specialist told the couple to go out on a date. Now, all of the guys in the world know to go out on a date.
The Doctor. Jane was waiting for her parents to come home. She was very nervous. The doctor was coming in with a tray. She began to cry. Luckily her parents came in minutes later.

Collapse. When Tom was six, his family moved to a large city. It was an exciting new town. Tom knew nothing of the city. He soon realized the neighborhood around him was collapsing. He was so upset he broke down in tears.
Nick's babysitter. Nick's babysitter was supposed to get him a blanket. He could not find one. So he went to his room. The kid was already dressed. He was happy to have a blanket.

Ellen's Job. Ellen needed a job in the next year. So she applied to several restaurants and eventually got the job. She went to her first interview and waited. But Ellen was given the wrong job!And Ellen was very upset and asked to go back to school.

James Takes a Risk. James went for a drive in his shiny new SUV. He passed by a couple of very old people. James asked to take their number to see if they wanted to hang out. They both agreed to meet at the end of the block. James was glad that he had a better chance to meet new people.

Ruth wants to play too. Ruth is very young and very little. One day Ruth's friends brought her home to play in the yard. The girls and their toys began to play. Soon it started to rain and the grass got wet. Ruth and her friends had to go home and dry off.

The Star. Jane had been a teacher all her life. Her class was debating a new topic. Jane decided to show them a star. The students looked at the star and went crazy. Jane laughed when the students realized they hadn't seen a star.

Cookie Trouble. Gina's mom brought her cookies for breakfast. When she opened the box, she saw one that didn't have cookies. Gina tried to open it but it wouldn't budge. She kept opening it to no avail. Eventually, Gina realized she had left the cookie in the refrigerator.
The Elephant. I went to the zoo with my family. We took a tour around the elephant enclosure. It was amazing how big the animals were!We were amazed. Everyone was a bit scared.

Uber to the Rescue. Amber was on her way to work when she got pulled over. She didn't know why but the cops were suspicious. They asked her what she was doing with her car. She told them the app was the one she had on her phone. They let her go and Amber was relieved.
Big Sale. It was Halloween. There was a big sale on electronics. The electronics at the store were too expensive for me. I decided to just walk out. My friends and I walked into the street.
Todd's nap. Todd woke up late one day. His wife was gone for a week. The new baby in the house was very excited. Todd slept through his alarm. Todd's wife was just gone for a week!

Room with a View. I had a big, open living room with a view. I had a few cats and a lot of toys. I had a great time watching them. We took the view for a walk once or twice. It was a great spot to hang out and not be bothered.

Too Close. Barry wanted to watch the baseball game on TV. He had to wait a half hour while the stadium security team inspected his bags. He was being detained for almost two hours. The security team finally decided to let Barry go. He was relieved that they were able to take him to the game.

Cello Practice. The kids went to their class to practice their guitar. All the students had their parents sign them up for lessons. They practiced each note for hours. They practiced so hard they all failed the lesson. They had a bad day practicing their instruments.
Smoking or no smoking. Jane went out on a date. She wanted to smoke. Jane took a puff of her cigarette. Her date said no. Jane got very angry.

the fort. When I was a kid I was at my father's house. He loved fort construction so I was always fascinated. I loved to watch the construction of the fort. We built the fort and lived in it for many years. My father died a few years ago and I've never really left.

Yin's Chopsticks. Yin was excited to learn his teacher's new chopsticks. He couldn't wait to try them. But he was nervous as he was new to them. Luckily he learned quickly. But when he tried them they were so hard!

Racer. One day my friend Sam was a competitive racer. He practiced everyday and went every weekend. He did not know anybody but was on an amazing team. One weekend, Sam was caught up in a head-on collision with a truck. He was killed in the accident and is now the only racer in town.
Mommy. I got a call today. The number was Mama's number. It's a surprise birthday present. I didn't know it was so special. I could have given it to any one.
Crying Baby. I was sleeping at my girlfriend's house. Suddenly I felt a strange pain. I called 911. The paramedics were called. We have to give a baby back to mommy.
ironing board. Kate was ironing her shirt. She got distracted. She saw something shiny. She flipped it over and it scraped against the iron. Kate had to take it off and put it away.

Cough Drops. It was Halloween. My wife got a new pair of Cough Drops from Target. Her coworker bought them and put them on while I was at work. My wife felt horrible and had to run to the bathroom. I ended up with a rash and was rushed to the hospital.
Tough Allergies. Gina went to a party with her friends. She went to get drinks. She tried to go home. She passed out in her room. Her friends couldn't find her until she woke up.

Looking for Moutai. The family was visiting Burma. They were staying at a hilltop monastery. The day arrived and there was a big thunderstorm. The whole family was stuck outside for days. The family was sad but resolved to go back.
gMail Spam Filter. John was logged into his gmail. He was trying to send a new message. The spam filter sent him spam. He tried to get it removed. Unfortunately it did and made him get more spam.

The Worst Doctor. Nathan was at the doctor for a checkup. He noticed that the nurse was in very bad shape. Nathan decided to go back to his room for a few hours. The nurse was having trouble getting around the room. Nathan had to wait an hour to get back into the room.

The Forest. There once was a forest in New York City. It was known for its amazing beauty. One day, a farmer went there to cut down a tree. The farmer accidentally cut his own foot. The man was very sad, and he never went back.

Potato Chips. Tom wanted to make potato chips. He had not made potato chips in months. He bought a pound of potato chips from the store. Tom boiled the chips until they were very soft. He put the chips into a bowl and added the toppings.

Raw Dinner. Sally was preparing a meal for her husband. She took out the ingredients and set them on a plate. She then poured the broth and chicken broth into the soup pot. The broth cooked and the chicken was tender and juicy. The wife ate it as quickly as she could!

Dog Grooming. Boris was doing the dishes when he noticed a nasty looking dog in the kitchen. The dog was having trouble breathing and looking very sick. Boris got in the kitchen to check on the dog and find out what was wrong. Boris put the dog in his carrier and went to get his wife. They put up a dog park and Boris cleaned his dog.

The Cable Bill. The Comcast Cable Company had an expensive cable bill. Tom wanted to reduce his cable bill. He turned on the internet and used his pay TV provider. He paid by the month and his bill increased by $2. Tom felt like a failure.

Freda gambles her paycheck. Freda decides to have a poker tournament at her house. She draws ten cards and sets her limit. Her neighbor Freda plays and loses. Freda wins the money from her neighbor Freda. Freda spends the money on a new computer.
Loans. Kia was very poor. She needed a loan to get her car fixed. She saved up all year. Finally she was able to borrow money. Kia was able to get her car fixed in less than a month.

Jelly Bean Jar. Tom was driving to work. Suddenly he smelled a foul smell. The smell was coming from the jar of jelly beans. He pulled over to see what it was. He realized he smelled his father's new jello jar.
Bird. I was walking through the woods. I saw a bird with two wings. It was sitting on a branch. I asked if I could see it. The bird's eyes turned red.

County Fair. When I went to my local county fair the other day it was raining hard. The streets were closed and traffic was very heavy. People walked around the fair and passed out rides. One girl who was not dressed seemed so hot I took her. I was so glad that I had a cool outfit and was able to enjoy the fair.
Poor Kelly. Kelly went to a party. She had a good time. Then her boyfriend called her out. She was furious and threw a fit. Kelly then decided to leave.
Lost Tooth. Allie was cleaning her teeth. She noticed that her tooth was missing. Allie tried cleaning her tooth but it did not help. She went to the dentist. The dentist fixed her tooth.

Poor Little Girl. My little girl is very clumsy. Sometimes when she is out and about she gets lost. One day, she ran into the kitchen and saw a cat. The cat was playing with the cat in the kitchen. My little girl was relieved to see her cat returned to the house.
Mentality. Jill was sad. She didn't know what to do. One day she stopped taking the pills and tried meditating. At first it was difficult. Jill then made a conscious effort to be more thoughtful.
Playing a Video Game. Kelly wanted to play a video game. So she went to the mall. Then she took out the controller. She played a very fun video game. Kelly felt accomplished.

Going to the store. It was Sarah's first day of college. She didn't know what to do and was sad to find all of her stuff gone. Sarah decided to go to the store and buy clothes. She spent almost an hour looking through the clothes but couldn't find anything. She decided to go home and spend the night.

Rufus Visits His Son. Rufus was getting ready for school. He had been going to the local community college for 2 years. His son wanted to visit but there was no car. He told his son, Rufus was going to visit tomorrow. Rufus went to school on his son's birthday.

Fresh Baked Cookies. Susie was baking cookies. She had been waiting for the perfect day for them to bake. She had tried everything so far. Finally her cookies turned out perfectly. Then she ate them and smiled.
Driving with no direction. I took the bus home. I looked at where I was going. There was no direction. I realized that I needed directions. I found my car and got a ride back home.

Rico's Letters. Rico was writing letters for his grandmother. He would stop and let her read the letters. He was making sure to put them in the right order. At first, she didn't like the letters but eventually accepted them. Rico was glad that he was doing something good for his grandmother.

The Flight. The flight attendant was talking to passengers. The flight attendant told them they had an emergency. She said someone on board has fallen. The flight attendant said that person is in the infirmary. She said they will take the passenger to a safe location.

Sunshine. Mina and her family went to the beach every summer. It was always sunny out. One day Mina noticed a storm approaching. She tried to escape the storm by taking a taxi. Unfortunately it got worse and she was soaked.

Caramel Apples. Jane was at the grocery store. She had just bought a dozen caramel apples. Her neighbor noticed that they were being grown in a greenhouse. She asked Jane to stop picking and to sell. Jane refused and instead made lemonade instead.
Rainy Days. Mandy went to the beach yesterday. She loved the weather there. Unfortunately the day was a little bit rainy. When she got home, the snow was in the house. Mandy was disappointed.

Car Accident. Tom was driving in the parking lot of a gas station. All of a sudden, he felt a loud snap and felt a shock. He had a sudden, excruciating pain in his arm and shoulder. Tom had a CT scan. The results showed that he had a torn ligament and fracture.

Egg Donor. Karen was out with her husband and three kids. Karen started giving them leftover food for dinner. Karen's kids got hungry and began to eat more of Karen's food. Karen started feeling more and more hungry. She realized she needed to donate her leftover food.
New rug. Julia wanted a new rug. She didn't know what kind she wanted. She went to her store. She found out that she needed a new carpet. She decided to get the new rug.
The Show. The family was watching a show. The boy had a crush on one girl. The boy decided to ask her to the dance. The girl accepted the invitation. The family ended up going on the dance.

Big Fright. Tim was having a great time at his local college party. He and a friend went to a popular area of campus. They started dancing and drinking alcohol. Suddenly, they got so drunk that they nearly passed out. They were unable to find their drinks and ended up fighting.

Pretty Payback. I was eating lunch when my stomach started to ache. I couldn't wait until the bell to call me in the morning. All the sudden the phone rang. My boss had called and he told me I was making an error. He asked me to come in an hour for payback.

Earning money with music. Cindy worked at a music store. She wanted to make a little extra money selling CDs. She spent a lot of time working on her CD mastering skills. She worked hard, earning a nice commission. She realized that selling CDs is important, and not just a hobby.

Gonna Fly Away. Sandy's friend Mike was driving home from work. They had a long talk on their favorite show. Sandy was driving to the car in front of them. Then Sandy told her friend she wanted to go home. The two girls got into their car and drove away.

Too Much Time Out. Gina was at the mall with her friends. Her friend told Gina to just be at her. But Gina had an idea. She went home and stayed with her friends. Afterwards, she realized she was so tired.
Free Book. Diane was on vacation. She loved to read. She took a trip to the library to get a free book. She was very happy to have a book at home. She read the book for hours.

Bad Smell. The house was starting to smell badly. The dog had been out barking all night. Jane decided she should clean it up. Jane used all of her kitchen detergent and scrubbed everything. Her new carpet looked great.

Bad Move. I was playing soccer in the locker room. I was being too energetic. The umpire gave a penalty kick. I got too excited and kicked it straight to the goal. A few seconds later I fell to the ground.
The New Job. Sandy got a job. It was a new kind of work for her. Her job involved a lot of customer service. She had a lot of fun doing it. Sandy loved her new job.

Overslept. Roxy woke up late to work today. She got to work around 8 AM. When she got there, she went to eat her lunch. She got there around noon and couldn't eat anything at all. When she got home, she had to go to bed and watch TV.

New kitten. John's cat had been acting very odd lately. He had gotten a small kitten with a large white muzzle. The cat's owners knew it was sick. John went to the pet store and found a nice new kitten. He brought it home and was thrilled to have a companion.

Liz's Passion. Liz was a very unhappy girl who was in a relationship. She had always wanted to get out but was too scared to. She got involved with a man she met online. They started a relationship and had a lot of fun. Liz got more confident in life after her relationship ended.

My first time rock climbing. I was a little girl, and I went climbing in the woods. The trees were so tall that I couldn't see the ground very well. I climbed over a rock that was about as tall as me. I fell down a short ways below, and the rock broke off. I learned a lesson about climbing from that experience.
The Ruined Dress. Liz was at a Halloween party. She had a red dress on. But everyone was staring at her. Liz was ashamed that her dress was ruined. She had to get the rest of it off later.
The cell phone. Sara is at home listening to the radio. She is listening to the radio. She notices a text on her phone. She immediately goes to her car. She gets a new phone.

Race Day!. Yesterday my girlfriend went to her first race. We were excited because it was a long way to see them. We got out of the car in the middle of the race. We were running towards them. Luckily, I got a good run and it was worth it.

Dreams. Miley was having an all-nighter. She dreamed that she would see her sister once more. She had fallen asleep in class when she woke up to this. She tried to remember who her sister was as she struggled to get back into her head. When she remembered, her dream was not as good.

Creepy Woman. Allie went to visit her aunt at home. Her aunt had fallen ill. The next day her aunt made her take a bath. Allie was surprised to see a woman standing at the foot of her bed. The woman was a creepy woman dressed in a black suit.

Crusty. I made a batch of bread for my family. My mom thought it looked gross, but I told her no. The bread was not crispy. She told me to throw it out. My brother in law came in and told me they didn't have any cheddar on the bread.
Sally learned she likes mustard. Sally had never tried mustard before. She decided to try it. She tried to give it a try. Her mouth watered. She was hooked!

Prom Dress. Rita's prom dress was great, but she was worried. She decided to get a new prom dress instead. She went shopping for a great dress. She chose the perfect dress. She wore it to prom that night.

Soda Pop. Briana and her mom went to a local soda pop store. They both ordered a few sodas. She was a bit skeptical since they were low calorie. But when she opened the cart, she found the best one!They both gobbled it up in no time.
Scuba diving. Randy needed to go scuba diving for fun. He went to the local marina. He got into his scuba gear. He began the first dive. After he got home he continued diving for days.

Plastic Life. Alicia decided to stop using plastic when shopping. She decided that it was a good idea for a life. When she realized that it cost a lot of money to replace her items, she stopped. But she realized that she had to save for retirement. She then realized that she was spending way too much money.

Sick Days. Cindy got the flu this year. She was scared of getting the flu. She would go to the doctor and get a shot. She had trouble sleeping and was very sick. She got better and is now healthy and happy again.

Lost tooth. Cynthia went to a dentist appointment. She went for a clean bill of health and some dental work. After the appointment, Cynthia got a surprise. Cynthia had gotten a huge infection on her tooth. After a cleaning session she took it off.
The String. Jim was working in the park at lunchtime. A girl threw a string at him. He decided to ignore it. He decided to go back home. He was relieved that no one would notice.

Concert ADventures. My friends and I were all going to an outdoor concert with my sister. We went up to a tree house and took turns hanging out on it. When the music got loud, we made lots of noise. All of us made noise and the tree fell down. Now we cannot hang out on the tree anymore and are on a trip.

Weird Assist. Dan wanted to help her daughter get an adoption in her hometown. Dan asked the local adoption agency for help with getting a new dog. Dan asked to help the agency with finding a dog for the adoption. The agency told Dan that the family is too poor. Dan then asked for help finding the dog he needed.

Dance Myla Dance. I had a date with my best friend at an ice cream shop. She asked if we could get some ice cream. We went down and tried the most delicious ice cream. She said she would dance if I let her. I went down to the dance floor and my best friend danced a dance she had never seen before.

Logic puzzle beat. Cara was a math teacher at an elementary school. One day she tried to teach her students a logic puzzle. She gave them a solution and told them to work. When they were done the teacher checked her solution. It turned out to be false.

Playing Hookey. Hootey and Hookey were brothers. Hootey loved to play a new game called Hookey on the Hookey and the Joneses. Hootey liked to play Hookey to annoy everyone around him. Hootey's mother tried to teach him the rules of Hookey. Hootey was forced to take Hookey out of the house.
Lasagna. I was hungry. I needed to eat something to eat. I decided to make some lasagna. I got it together and mixed the ingredients together. My lasagna was ready to eat!

Too many babies. Kenny was babysitting a couple of kids. She was giving them a bottle of formula. Suddenly she noticed too many baby bumpers. She called the parents for them to stop. The parents told her they had to stop but they didn't listen.

Disturbed. Janice woke up one morning. She heard a loud noise in her bedroom. Then she felt a sharp pain and a weird pain. Janice ran outside and found a box in the hallway. Inside was a broken computer, and a bloody hand.

The Lazy Dog. My dog got loose and started running down the street. She was hungry so she ran into a store. While trying to get a dollar she tripped on a board. My dog ran over and hit her face. The dog became very sick.
Forgiveness. Mandy and her friends were hanging out on the pier. The girl who attacked her got away. Mandy couldn't forgive her. Her friends called the police. The girl was put in prison.

Stolen fragrance. Jenny was shopping for perfume. She saw an ad for a great smelling fragrance. Jenny went to the store to buy the perfume. She accidentally spilled perfume on her purse. Jenny had to return the perfume.
Test. I started a math test today. I have been studying all week. I have been having trouble. So, I decided to study and make notes. When the test was over, I was able to answer all the questions.

Loans. I was looking to buy a new laptop. I wanted a laptop with good performance. I decided to look for loans online. I came across a loan that I liked. I was able to secure the loan and purchase the laptop.
Don't Bite. Maggie was walking home. A squirrel was in the bushes behind her. She heard a cracking noise and started to move. She ran after the squirrel. The squirrel ran in the other direction.
Chocolate. Gina was really hungry. She decided to get a chocolate bar. She went to the drive thru and got the chocolate. Gina went home and had a big treat. She ate it all in one sitting.
Closet Game. Nancy played a game at her mom's house. Nancy was playing the game. Nancy lost her game. Her mom didn't care what happened to her. Nancy's mom just wanted Nancy to play again.

Alien Toy. Nancy was a big fan of science fiction. She went to a toy store to buy a toy for her son. She brought him home a big alien robot. She played with it all day, then put the toy away. When it was time for him to sleep, it started glowing in the dark!

Fishing Time. John wanted to catch some fish on his fishing trip. He had a bunch of bait and a hook in his boat. The bait caught something that he wanted. John was excited to take a closer look at the catch. He pulled the hook back and let the fish swim away.

Depression. I was working out on a treadmill at a local gym. I couldn't stop my feet from going up and down on the treadmill. I ended up having several seizures. I was taken to the hospital to be treated for the seizures. I learned that my depression isn't due to weight, it's due to poor sleep.
Carl's Computer. Carl was playing a game on his computer. He hit a huge error on the game. Carl's computer stopped working. Carl had to buy another computer. Carl was sad that his computer broke.
Smoking. Nancy was smoking. Her friend told her to stop. Nancy kept smoking anyway. Her friend was furious. She kicked her out.
Music. There was music on the radio. It was good but not great. It was in the early 80s. The band was playing a popular tune. The crowd loved it!

Camel. Sally bought a new dog for her new home. The dog was a German Shepherd mix named Chihuahua. She named the dog Barney because she thought he was pretty. The two of them got along well. One day Barney broke Sally's leg while she was playing with him.

Cost. Tom had recently purchased a new car. He was very excited about the new car. He was very nervous about the cost of the car. He was very excited about the new car. The price was very affordable and Tom liked the new car.

Tag 2. I wanted to go to a tag team tournament. I was not a very skilled wrestler. I ended up getting a great match with a guy named Mark. We lost the match, but I was very proud of myself. I learned to be more competitive and I will do better in future matches.
Game at the Bar. Joe and Tim went to the bar to watch the NFL. It was really close. Joe had won the bet and had to walk out the bar. Tim asked him to come back. Joe said he didn't know what to do.
Rifle. Tom's girlfriend just got married. Tom wasn't sure what to wear. He decided to buy her a rifle. Tom couldn't believe how nice it was. He bought it that day.
Missing the meteor shower. Jill went out and bought a telescope. She looked at the sky. She saw a beautiful meteor shower. She put it in her telescope. It was very beautiful.
Tim's new love. Tim wanted a new girlfriend. He looked up online. He came across a girl. She really liked him. They started dating.

The Carrots. My friend and I were looking to eat some carrots. We were eating carrots and onions when we noticed something strange. The leaves were so tall that it was hard to see them. My friend and I grabbed a bunch of carrots and onions. It was the first time we had seen the leaves tall enough for a camera.

The kings defeat. Tara's cousins were playing at their house. Tara had a ball with them and wanted to score. Tara decided to try and score herself, but she couldn't. She went to her sister's room and told her she'd lost. Tara decided to be more careful and play with her cousins.

String Bikini. Jasmine was in the shower playing with her string bikini. Her friends decided to take their little sister along. They played with her while she worked. They got all of the string bikini pieces out of the laundry basket. Finally, Jasmine was able to show her friends her new bikini.

Neck. Susie's neck was hurting badly. She did not have the money to fix it. She went to the store and bought a neck brace. She took it home and attached it to her neck. After the brace, she could feel a lot of pain.

my computer mouse. I needed to change the mouse settings on my computer. I took it to the store and found a really great mouse. I bought it immediately. The mouse worked perfectly. I had a great day using the mouse.

Fish Story. The man heard a strange noise on the street. He looked around and saw a strange fish. He went home and tried to catch the fish. His wife saw the fish in the aquarium. They went to the beach and told all the neighbors about it.

Money Does Buy Love. Tommy was having a problem at work. He was having trouble making it through his first day. Tommy asked his co-workers for help. After doing a little work, the problem got resolved. Tommy was able to do his job and make a good life choice.

Lost Dog. My neighbor's dog was lost. She told me she found him in the woods. I went outside to investigate. I found the dog curled up in the grass with no collar. I put the dog in my lap and returned the leash.

Clowns. I was sitting in a park watching my favorite circus. As I began to go down the ramp, the clown appeared. He yelled at me and threw me to the ground. He continued to throw me until I fell to the ground. He continued to scream obscenities all night long.

Child Visitation. Cameron's mother was visiting him at home. Cameron had a little boy that was crying. He decided to take the boy to the playground. The little boy became so excited, he ran and ran and ran. Cameron had a heart attack and had to be rushed to the hospital.

Winter Break. I'm in the country because I'm in Europe for my wedding. When I got there, I was exhausted. I spent a whole day watching movies and eating my ice cream. I did not get the chance to take a bath or take a nap. I could not wait to return home.

Free Samples. I had a friend named Sam. Sam loved to collect books. One day, my friend gave Sam free samples. Sam was able to go to the library and get the books. Now Sam collects books from the library.

SnapChat Photos. John decided he wanted to save some of his Snapchat photos. He posted a snap of himself with the same haircut. All of his friends liked the photo. John uploaded it to Snapchat. Most people liked the photo and liked him back.
Ticket. A friend was traveling. He didn't have an identification. He had a ticket and it expired. He checked online to find a way to get it. He made a payment at the post office.

Swap Meet Sunday. Kelly had recently moved from Texas to Alabama. She couldn't wait to join the swap meet. She was excited to start her week off. When it started to rain, she got wet. Kelly had to take a nap in order to finish the meet.

Watching a Movie. It had been a long day at work and everyone was tired. So I decided to go see a movie. I started to feel sick but decided to stay home. After a while I decided I wasn't that tired and wanted to watch something. The movie ended and I was happy I had stayed home.
Work Day. Troy was really tired. He really had to take a break from work. He went to the library and picked up some books. He went back home and finished them. He was able to finish up on his work.

After the Fight. Tia was in a big fight with a stranger. He started to throw punches and hurt her badly. The police arrived and took her to the hospital. She had to stay for three hours for painkillers. Her mom took care of her, but she was glad to go home.

Wardrobe Malfunction. Gina decided to try her hand at wearing clothes online. She decided to try out a few dresses and skirts. She found that her clothing was a bit too loose. She decided to purchase a larger bag for her clothes. Gina felt much more comfortable in her new bag.

Jason's camping trip. Jason had a trip planned. Jason didn't get to take any of his camping gear. Jason decided to leave early. He ended up staying at a cabin. Jason was very excited when he got back.

Golden Glow. Tina was having her birthday party. She was having all her friends come over. Tina wanted her friends to have a great time. But it was all too expensive. She finally had to eat something to get her friends.

Basement. I just finished reading The Caveman. This story is very simple. The characters are really stupid. I don't understand why people are interested in this story. I have to start reading every other book in the series.

The carnival. Sarah was excited to go on the carnival. She was a little nervous because she did not know anything about it. On the day of the carnival, Sarah was nervous. She arrived early and waited in line. Sarah enjoyed the carnival with her family.

Bitten by a Squirrel. I was feeding some fruit to the squirrel in my yard. The squirrel bit my finger very hard. My hand slipped and hit the squirrel. I couldn't go to the store and put Band-Aids on my finger. My finger is no longer swollen but the pain from the bite is still there.

Samantha Makes Breakfast. Samantha is getting ready for work. She feels like breakfast is going to be the hardest part of the day. She gets all of her food ready. She gets out of the house and takes a long walk. She makes a delicious breakfast for her boss.
Ants. I walked past the garage yesterday. A car passed by. I looked at the garage. I saw a bunch of ants in it. I walked away.

Shaving Cut. Bobby's son wanted to shave his head. Bobby said he would shave on the weekends. On Sunday, Bobby saw the little boy with a huge beard. Bobby told the boy he could get the haircut at the barber. The little boy said no, he'd have to shave next Saturday.

The Campfire. Dana was at a campground with his family. They were having a campfire. It started out small and grew into a massive fire. They burned their way through many leaves. Finally they were finished and set out for a day hike.
Brick. Ava was a great golfer. She loved the game. She decided she wanted to buy a home. She asked her dad to buy her a new golf club. He agreed, and she loved the new club!
Sparrow. Sara and her dog got a big bird for Christmas. They took it to the vet. The vet gave them a few shots. The bird is doing really well. Sara loves seeing her dog happy and healthy.

Goals. Sandy and her family decided to start a go-kart track team. They went out on the track course and practiced. At the beginning of the season, the team was able to qualify. The team practiced everyday. The team won the championship.

A Fast Ride. Katherine was out on a road trip with her boyfriend. She wanted to make it to Las Vegas in a little over an hour. They pulled into a gas station to fill up. They decided to get the best deal on gas on the trip. They got there at the gas station at five in the morning!

Chinese Broccoli. It was a hot summer day in Arizona. And one of my favorite things to do in Arizona is eat Chinese food. So I decided to cook a pot of broccoli. I used broccoli that had been chopped in half. And it was delicious!

Sand Castle. My sister had a birthday party yesterday. My sister bought some sand castles to build on the deck. It was a very scary experience. My sister was very afraid the night of the party. She had nightmares the whole night.
The Dog. I was walking to school in the morning. The dog came up behind me. I got up quickly. He chased me around. I ran back home.

In the Dark, all Cats are Black. Jill's cats had a dark brown coat. She was afraid of the dark, so she gave them a blanket and some pillows. Soon after, Jill's cat went to sleep. But she woke up when the light came on!Jill saw that she had snuck some catnip!

Not funny. Sandy was at the movies. The people were talking funny to each other. Sandy heard some random guy start talking about her. She was too shocked and ignored it. She had to put up with it for 3 days.

The Roller Skates. Doris wanted to teach her kids how to roller skate. She would set them up at the park and let them go. One day, she got a phone call. They were about to ride the roller skates!She was so proud of her kids.

Maya the Writer. Maya was very determined to become a writer. She took a year off from school to take classes online. On her last day of classes, Maya decided to submit her story. Maya's book was accepted into a local publishing competition. Maya's book went on to become a bestseller and is on a very long list of sales.
Skydiving. I really like to fly kites. I had one on the way to work. I was taking it down into the valley. I got a big shock. The kite flew right up in my face.

Innovation. One of the biggest challenges I have in my career is understanding the challenges of innovation. As such, I work with an innovative team of people. I spend a lot of time working with them to understand and design ways to solve problems. In addition, I meet with my clients and partners about the challenges they are facing. I hope the work helps them find ways to overcome their challenges.

Angry man on the bus. One day a man began a screaming argument with another person on the bus. The driver told the man to calm down. He asked what he was going to do when he was done. The man didn't know what to do. The bus driver gave him the day off.

Biking with Noah. Nate went for a bike ride with his friend Noah. Nate's friend was excited that Nate was biking with him. Nate and Noah talked about many sports. After the ride, Nate decided that he would ride with Noah next time. Now Nate and Noah have a great bike ride every time they bike together.

Paula Plays Harpsichord. Paula has been practicing her harpsichord for many Years. She was a huge fan of classical music. Today she has to get a new harpsichord set up. It was made for her in 2005. When she opens the case she is very impressed with it.

Depression. I have been feeling very sad for a few days. My friend had to leave for work for a week. It is now time for me to go back to school. I will be working on this problem for a while. Now I understand why I was depressed.

Steps. There was an awkward silence as she watched her friend. She was doing some heavy lifting. She asked him why she looked so sad. He smiled and said he would tell her. She stood up and left in a huff as the man walked away.
Harp. Lonnie was a musician. He wanted to try making a harp. He took a few lessons from a local harp player. He made a beautiful piece of music. It was a big hit.

A Dog Savior. Travis was always being bitten. He knew that he was being treated badly. One day a nice man offered to pay for Travis medical care. Travis gladly took the care of his pet dog. Travis now gets his daily bath after being bitten by a cat.

Baseball Injury. My friend Bob is an avid baseball player. One day he got hurt while throwing in the outfield. It was a bad, but not life-threatening injury. Bob was able to go home to rest for a few days. He then resumed his baseball activities.

Jump Rope. Jillian loves to jump rope. She often practices jumping rope at home with her sister. One day her sister asked her if she could practice jumping rope with her. Jillian agreed and the two practiced. Jillian was excited when her sister came over and let them jump rope.

Playing Checkers. Susie was trying to play checkers with her father. She made the board with her thumb and index finger. But she kept falling over as she played. Her father decided to teach her a different strategy. After that Susie played without her thumb and index finger.
Cats are crazy. The dog went to get milk from the fridge. The cats went to get food from the pantry. The cat came back a few minutes later. It smelled the milk. The cat had brought back wild cats.
Bad pie. Kelly was eating her pie with her family. Her family was sitting down in the living room. They were eating a pie. It was not a good pie. Her family started laughing.

Dare. Jane loved to play video games. She played on her cell phone for hours on end. One day she decided to try a new game. She downloaded and ran it and quickly lost her friends. Jane is no longer playing video games.

Homework. Sam wanted to take his high school English class for a test. He sat at his desk and began to study. While studying, Sam forgot to take his final exam. Sam was really embarrassed about not passing his English class. He then had to study for the rest of the week.
The Bad Potter. The kids all had a big pot of coffee. They were going to share the pot. Suddenly, one kid started a fight. The pot was ruined and the kid ran away. The other kids were so mad.

Test Drive. A man went to the car lot to buy a new car. He did not have much money. He decided to take his friends to test drive. He took them to the dealership and took their car home. The friends thought the car was awful.

Cutting School. A local public school was having a large event. Students were going to get a cut of the money raised. Everyone was excited. The day of the event started off great. When the day came the students weren't there.
Found Wallet. Tim was walking outside. A guy was looking for something. He found a wallet in a trash can. He found some weed on it. He decided to give it to the guy.
Bad cold. I was out of town. All of the sudden my temperature got really high. I got a very bad cold. The doctor told me I needed to get a prescription. I did not have a prescription.
Mail. My mom got a mail for me. It was a big red envelope. It said to call me. She hung up and left the mail on the sidewalk. She walked across the street and got her mail.
To The Bathroom. Tina got caught in the shower. The water was very hot. There were several drops of water on the ground. Tina got scared. She ran out of the shower and got back in.

New Sandals. Sandra was buying a new pair of sandals. She wanted to buy a pair with long, stylish stripes. Her mom said they looked great. Sandra decided to get the stripes at the store. They were much better than expected.

Going to the drive in. A friend and I went to the drive in. We watched movies and played video games. Then we went back inside. We had a lot of food and drinks to make. We are getting home early from the drive in!

Waste of an Hour. James has been working with the water district for two years. He has been in charge of organizing meetings and providing services. James' company was called in to clean the river. James was not paid for his efforts. James quit after two years, feeling disappointed.

Beach Trip. I took my kids to the beach for the first time last month. The trip was extremely fun!I did not get to see them again for another year!I decided to visit again next summer. Now that I have kids, I can't wait to go again!

First Day Treat. One day Lucy was visiting a friend. She told him she loved him and wished she could visit him everyday. Lucy went out for a walk. She was lost in the woods when she turned around. Her friend saw her and offered to take her in for a day.

Jasper Makes Linguine. Jasper has been taking the English language classes for years. He is currently taking the second class on the topic of language. One day he decides he needs to start making a luJasper starts making some lu. Now Jasper understands that language is about conversation.
Thanks!. Drew was in high school. He was in a club. One night he had a hard time sleeping. He decided to eat something cold. Drew fell asleep immediately after drinking it.

Planting and growing. John was working in the garden. He was using a knife to cut seeds out of his tomato plants. A worm got into his seed and tried to take them away. John quickly put them in a pot of water. Soon, he had a plant that had no worms.

Good Deed. Kenny was walking home from school. A group of boys were laughing and playing with him. The boys threw him a rock. Kenny went running to the wall. He then got hit by the rock and the boys laughed with him.

Shark Attack. It was sunset when I went to go see the shark. It was swimming very quickly. I had no idea that it would hit me!I was scared but it never came. I was glad that I did not try to fight it.

The stealing friend. Linda was very poor and needed money. She decided to steal some candy from her friend. She put the candy into the bag and took it home. When Linda got home she realized the bag was stolen. She realized she stole the candy from her friend, who was very happy.

Small Town Jean. Jean and her friends were going to go to a small town. They met a girl named Sarah. When they arrived, Sarah told them her family moved there. They were excited to go, but Jean was really worried. They spent hours playing with her and they couldn't wait to leave.

Stray. The woman found a stray cat in her yard. She took it to a vet and gave it shots. The vet said the cat is not feral. It is now being returned home. It is being microchipped so it will be traced.
Checking the mail. Jane was on a work trip. She checked the mail. She couldn't find her cat. She asked her mom. She found her cat in the mail and returned to work.

Face paint as costumes. I was invited to a party for my friend's birthday. She really wanted to buy me a new dress. I was unsure if I would like her new dress. So I tried on the dresses and found out it was really fun. I got really excited and went home with her dress.

Making pizzas. Lulu needed some pizza for dinner. She went to the local pizza shop to order pizza. After she was done with her pizza she took the tray to the kitchen. Lulu was excited to start cooking her pizzas. Lulu loved all of the pizzas she made.
Scholarship. Molly was a teacher. She had the school year. She was going to get a scholarship to college. It was for a new technology. She accepted it.

The Garage Sale. The neighborhood was in a lull for Christmas. The kids wanted gifts for their parents. The neighborhood garage sale was cancelled. There were too many items to buy all at once. The kids decided to make smaller, more affordable gifts.

Randy's Train Ticket. Randy is driving home from work. He was on his way to the airport when he got a ticket for speeding. Randy was upset, but had no choice but to pay the fine. When Randy got home he called his friend Mike. Mike drove to his friend and offered to pay for Randy's ticket.

Pads. My dad had a terrible problem. He used to get so cold and uncomfortable. He was using his pads to go to the bathroom. One day he tried to get in to go to the bathroom. He tripped and fell on the floor.

Soccer. It was a very crowded game between the two teams. The game was tied and my team had scored an equalizer. I went out on the pitch to shoot the ball. But my ball did not touch the goal so I scored a goal as well. Everyone cheered when I scored my first goal of the game.

China. I got off work this morning and decided to see if I could make some Chinese food. It wasn't that hard. I looked in the fridge, but I couldn't find any. I checked online and saw a few coupons for the same thing. I decided to go with it, and ended up with delicious Chinese food.

Chess. Ralph liked to play chess. Ralph had always been great at the game. One day while playing in the park, Ralph met a girl named Susie. Ralph quickly became friends with Susie. Now they play every weekend together.
The awesome batch. Kim needed to make a batch of cookies. She went to the store. They were out of chocolate. She tried all the kinds she could think of. Finally she got all the chocolate she wanted.

Jennifer wins big. Jennifer wants to learn how to play basketball. She buys a basketball and begins practicing. She plays well for months. Her coach praises her for her hard work. Jennifer is now a great basketball player.
The Pop Quiz. Tim was watching a cartoon. He got a quiz. Tim answered all questions correctly. He got an A. Tim's teacher gave him a letter grade.

Best Friend. When I was a kid I was always closest to my friend, Jane. We got along very well in our day to day life. Jane was my favorite girl, so I asked her out on a date. Her answer was the most amazing thing I'd ever heard. She said she would never date me, so I told her that was so true!
Bringing Home Baby. Tom wanted to bring home his baby. His daughter said that she didn't want to do it. Tom had no other options. Tom tried to go to a friend's house. He was turned away.

Grown Man Selling Barbies. A group of us decided to go to a local circus. We got to know the clowns and the elephants. It was very scary. We bought our tickets to go see the circus. We were very happy we did.

Crash. Kia had been driving on the highway. She noticed a small accident near her stop. It was a very loud car. She tried to ignore it but it kept on going. Eventually she realized it was due to her own negligence.

Impressing Girls Is Easy. Manny used to play softball and try to impress girls at school. He was always the quiet type. Manny began to play basketball with other kids and their moms. They complimented him, but he was no longer quiet. After a few months he was invited to a softball camp.

The Wire. When I was in sixth grade, my friend took me to see a drama show. He was a star and we sat in the front row. As the show was starting, the microphone rang. The audience laughed uproariously. I had a really great time watching this show.

College?. Jenny found out her college would be closing soon. Jenny did not want to be away from home. Jenny went to the closest school to her home. She found an internship at the local college. Jenny decided to go back to college in the fall.
Olga. Olga loved dogs and wanted one. She did her best to get the dog. Unfortunately there wasn't much to do with her. Finally she found a shelter. She now has a home dog.

Poor Eyesight. I was at a club with some friends. A guy next to me was being rowdy and loud. I noticed that my eyesight was very bad. I tried to tell him that it was only a bad headache. He got up and punched me in the eye, causing it to pop.
Smile. My father was not good at smiling. He would go on the defensive and say the wrong thing. He would get defensive the rest of the time. He finally snapped one day. I had to make him stop.

The Gross Seat. The lady bought a new seat on a plane. She took her kids on it every day. One day she forgot to check the food in the bag. The bag went everywhere and her kids had to get up. Her kids were very upset.
Too much fun. I was at a party. I had too much fun. I was tired and passed out. I fell asleep on the floor. When I woke up, my mom was very angry.

Dance Team. The girls wanted to try out for a dance team. They went and met in the locker room. They practiced in the hot tub for hours. When it was time, they practiced every single night. They were all so nervous that it was going to fail.

Hockey Fan. Dee was always into hockey. He decided to get into a local high school varsity hockey team. He signed up and practiced everyday. He was a very good goalie by the end of the season. His parents were proud of his decision to become a hockey fan.

The Booking Failure. Nita was the best student in her class. She was taking the exam in two hours. She didn't want to miss a single question. The instructor told her to pick a topic for the exam. Nita picked on a topic that she hated and failed the test.

Fried Trout. There is a huge salmon spawning pool in the ocean. People come and fish there for the fish. One man decided to fish for salmon in the pool. While in the pool he got bitten by a salmon. The man had to be rushed to the hospital.

Bicycle. The man rode his bicycle to work. He noticed a bike shop that sold bicycles. The man asked about buying a bike. The shop agreed to sell him a bike for five dollars. The man rode his bicycle to work.

New Style. Evan needed a new style to wear to work. His coworkers were all into the same style of pants. He asked his boss if they could have a style contest. Evan won a new style for free to wear to work. The new style was cute and Evan's coworkers loved it.
Fight on the Train. Tim was on the subway one morning. There was a fight taking place. Tim stepped over someone. They threw the broken glass to the ground. Tim was then robbed on the train.
No. Ned has a car that breaks down every single day. He goes to a mechanic. The mechanic fixes the car. Ned is relieved. Now he can ride home from work and get on his way.

The Sheets. Jill was getting ready to go to school and was using her computer. She found she had been using her new bookshelf for months and needed some storage. She searched everywhere for storage that fit her needs. Finally Jill found some beautiful red leather storage bags. She was able to put all her books and papers away and then go back to her computer.

Student's Nightmare. One day, while running errands, I ran into a student. He was wearing shorts and a T-shirt. I tried to tell him I was sorry but he didn't listen. I eventually had to run away after he yelled at me. I was glad I had a plan B.
Stars. I was walking in the park one day and a star appeared. I looked out into the sky. I saw another star there too. It was not a bad sighting!I never walked through that park again.
Impatient. I was at a meeting. My boss told me to meet him after hours. I did as I was told. But I still did not speak with him. I was frustrated with my boss.

The Run. Jim took the elevator to the third floor of the hotel. The elevator was very hot. Jim ran the whole way down the elevator. Jim reached the third floor just as the elevator stopped. He was shocked to see an old lady in the lobby.

Finding Cards on the Street. Lucy was taking a walk in the street. Suddenly, she ran into a man. He took her card and told her that he wanted her phone number. She got mad and said that her phone number was in her wallet. She told the man and he gave her the number.

Cat Treats. Allie needed a kitten for the holidays. She knew that there were lots of cats on the streets. But she also knew they would not be her favorites. She decided she would put the treats in her cat's bowl. She gave each one to her favorite pet.

Presents. It was Friday afternoon, and Anna was running late to school. She had just gotten her final grade from her teacher. She wanted to give her teacher a hug and say thanks. She looked up at the clock and saw it was two hours past the start time. Anna's dad came over and helped her to the door.

Jean. Jean was at the beach with her family. It was her first time to visit her grandparents. She had never seen their house before. The grandparents were very nice. Jean was able to get to know them well.
Lost money. My wife was in her apartment late one night. She was in her bedroom, when she saw a black bag. The bag was her wallet. It wasn't her money!She was afraid she would lose it.

Curtain. Janet had just bought a new house. She needed to install a new curtain. She looked up the materials at the store. She learned how to do them by trial and error. She then worked to her house and finished her job.

The Fever. The baby started to show signs of illness. We rushed to the hospital. The mother was diagnosed with an allergy. The doctors couldn't figure out what the problem was. The child was put on an allergy medication for several days.
Lois gets a scare. Lois is walking on the sidewalk. A small child runs up to her. He starts to run towards her. She ducks behind a car. She was scared and didn't want the dog to hurt her.

Tacos. The restaurant that I ordered a taco was really expensive. When I was there, I ordered my first taco. After I received my taco, I realized how expensive it was. I didn't care and decided to eat another taco anyway. At the end of the day, I didn't care at all.

Basketball. Alex wanted to play basketball. He was never a good athlete. After his parents didn't let him play basketball, he started working on his skills. After a month he was a great player. After that, he started playing basketball at his own school.

Bad Breath. Natalie needed to get a new pair of jeans. She tried everything to find one that was good. She tried on different pairs and couldn't find one. Finally, she tried on the same pair, but it was too thin. Finally, she picked out a pair of slim fits.

Speeding. Tom was speeding down the road. He noticed he was getting too far behind the traffic. He stopped his car and told his friend. His friend said that he would call the cops. Tom called the cops.

Naughty Nancy. Nancy was a lonely young woman. Her mother did not know what to do with her. So Nancy became a school teacher. Eventually Nancy felt less lonely and loved herself more. And Nancy decided that she was no longer lonely after all.
Grocery List. I decided to make a grocery list. The list looked terrible. I began to go through it. I started to look through things. I had to go back and forth.

Bad Crash. I was on the way to work today. I had just gotten home from a night at a bar. I was late getting back into work. I hit my car head-on. Luckily I'm okay and didn't get in any other big accidents.

A Need to Pee. Lucy was watching TV when the kids started to talk. They started talking about their pee problems. Lucy decided to throw some away. She asked her parents what she could put in it. Her parents let her have it for free to use when she wanted.

The magic trick. Sara was at a Halloween party. She was really excited and wanted to be a big star!Sara's mom went to the party to find out about her performance. Sara had been training for the big trick for weeks. Sara was finally going to the trick and ended up being the big star.

Careless Mistake. My friend Dan was a very lazy person. When we met for the first time, Dan always forgot to clean the table. We started dating when he was 20. Dan was much happier as a single man. I regret that I was not better at cleaning.

Shooting Star. Tom had just joined a shooting sports club. He had no idea how to learn or practice. Tom decided to try the academy. The instructor was very knowledgeable and helpful. Tom really enjoyed learning.

Tight On Brandy. I woke up very late this morning and was very stressed. So I started thinking I needed some help. I looked in my cupboard and realized I was out of Brandy. I went to the supermarket and bought two different kinds of Brandy. I will be less stressed and ready to do work tomorrow.

Prank. I went to the store. I asked the cashier if I could pick up some change. I went through the checkout machine. I took money out of the register. My customer was upset because I stole his change.

The Interview. Gina was nervous about an interview with a friend. Her friend told her to make it as casual as possible. She put on her best dress and shoes. When she walked into the interview, she felt extremely confident. She was immediately hired on a new project.

Football Match. Sam wanted to watch his favorite team play a football game. Sam asked his mom if she would take him to the game. Sam's mom agreed and Sam and his friends packed their bags. As they entered the stadium Sam's heart sank. All that stood in Sam's way of seeing the game was a wall.

One Car. A lot of people were driving around the neighborhood late at night. The lights of their cars were flashing as they pulled out of their driveway. The man driving the red car was not paying attention. He passed two red lights, both of which he had never seen. The other car turned and he drove away in the other car.

Overtime. My boss was trying to tell me about overtime. He said it was one of the most stressful jobs in the world. We got out of the building early and went to work. I left my computer in the office. When I got to work, the boss came by and gave me a raise.
New Lamp. Tom wanted a new lamp. He found one he liked on sale. Tom went to the store to buy it. He went home and took the lamp out. He enjoyed the new light and the price!

Broken pencil. Jane was writing a story in her computer. The pencil started to slide around. Jane stopped and examined the pencil. The pencil fell out of the case and broke. Jane was embarrassed and threw it away.

Losing battery. Sarah had just started using her phone. She had been using it everyday and was running out of battery. When she went to use it, she noticed that she didn't have a charger. She went to the store and bought a new one. The new charger helped her quickly get the phone back online.
