The new roll recipe. Jill wanted to make a new rolled product. Her grandma made a great one. She took it to her friends for feedback. They said it was delicious. They all enjoyed the roll so much.
Child Support. John needed money. He was looking for a solution. John went to the bank. He found a company that was paying for child support. John is now paying his bills.

Gargoyle. Tim and Tim's father was a retired construction worker. Tim's father didn't like being in the house, and Tim's mother was upset. Tim's father finally decided to make a gargoyle for his son. The gargoyle looked at his children, and they were amazed. The two began to make gargoyles for each other.
Not The Best Class. Tom had been in a bad class. He always had trouble doing his homework. He did not want to take a class anymore. It made things worse. He decided to just not go to class anymore.

Anne and the Money. Anne loved her job at an insurance agency. She wanted to give back. Anne decided to work on a local charity. The local branch would donate all their money to Anne. Anne was thrilled.

Fair visit. Karen was taking a trip to an amusement park with her kids. Karen loved going with her kids but they were in a hurry. They were going to the Fair. Karen was very nervous because she didn't know what to expect. Luckily she had a great family trip at the fair.

He Can't Photograph. Fred was very clumsy. He didn't even know where to point his camera. He asked his best friend if he could take pictures. His friend suggested he get a camera. Fred bought a camera and now he can see better.

Dilemma. Jody is having difficulty in her work life. The company she works for is being investigated by a large company. Jody has been working very hard in the past two weeks. Today, the company asks her to be at their company Christmas party. Jody is worried that the company's investigation will cost her her job.

Makeup. I wanted to buy makeup for a big party. I decided to get some in every color that was available. Then, I bought lots of eyeliner. Then, I went to the grocery store and got my makeup. It was beautiful, but I was really tired after all that.

Homework. Tom had a lot of homework to do. He decided to go to school early. Tom did not get to finish the homework as he left. He did not have time to do the work on time. Tom ended up leaving school late.

Exhausted. Allie was having a lot of fun and had been playing games all night. Unfortunately, her day was not going well. She was exhausted from playing all day and needed to go to the store. When she got there, the store was closed due to an outage. So, Allie ended up sitting outside all day.

Scary Movie Night. Sarah and her mom wanted to watch a scary movie together. Sarah's favorite scary movie was The Blair Witch Project. Sarah and her mom went into the theater. The movie was really scary. Sarah and her mom laughed when the scary movie ended.

Tami Joins. Tami is a freelance writer. She was excited to learn that she was getting hired to write about her own experiences. She joined her first day of work and was excited. She sat in her cubicle and waited for her boss to walk in. She was sad to leave her cubicle, but was pleased to be in a new place.

Time Out. Tim was watching tv when his television suddenly stopped working. He was having issues with it for a long time. Tim called customer support and they rushed him to the store. Tim's problem was with his television battery. They had to throw him out of the house.
Run. I ran through my yard. I had to get my dog, Pippin, out of the yard. The dog jumped out and attacked the cat. I tried to catch the cat but couldn't find it. I then tried to catch my dog.

No Address. I was walking down a country road when I saw a lady. She had an open window on the passenger side of her car. She was giving me directions. I had my GPS with me and tried to look for her. She had gone through a small town, and wasn't at the restaurant I was staying at.

The King. James was a king in Mongolia. His kingdom was huge and he was very rich. One day a Mongol soldier found gold in a hole in his palace. The soldier asked James to make a deal and give him his gold. James reluctantly made the deal and the gold was for his kingdom.

Old Lunch. Bobby was at the park with his family. They all watched the weather report while he waited for lunch. Suddenly, a huge snow storm hit the park. Bobby couldn't find his lunch anywhere. He looked all over for the lunch to no avail.

Assisted Living. I had to help my niece move out of her home due to abuse. When she asked me to move, I refused because I was not ready. My niece was very upset and scared and begged me to stay. The other residents of the building did not want to see the violence stop. We decided to rent an assisted living facility to help her.

Big Rain. My family and I were sitting on the beach last night watching the clouds roll in. I was about to tell my mom I was sick and was going to sleep but she got worried. She told me to take a shower because it's really hot and I can't run. I was embarrassed and I kept taking a shower but was relieved when it stopped. I got up and grabbed my towel and ran outside to play.

Mark and the Author. Mark was always happy when people liked his book. He always liked to get reviews and reviews kept him very happy. One day Mark received a letter from a famous author. They wanted to meet and read his book. Mark did not want to meet the author and had not planned that day.
Squirrel. Tom was at his house. He saw a squirrel. He asked what it was doing in his house. The squirrel was running around. Tom got out of his house and the squirrel ran away.

Wrong Recipient. I sent a note to a friend who works at the grocery store. The friend didn't get back to me. I looked everywhere for my friend. I couldn't find her at all. I asked my friend for a call and she gave me an email.

Terry's love. Terry was a huge fan of the Beatles. He was one of the few people who knew where the band was from. Terry really wanted to know where the band came from. He was so excited to see a Beatles poster at a local pawn shop. Terry spent a lot of money on the poster.
New necklace. Allie wanted a new necklace. Allie searched online. Allie couldn't find the perfect necklace. She found the perfect necklace online. Allie now has a new necklace.

A new movie. Tim had just finished watching a new movie. He knew he was watching a long one but couldn't wait to finish. As he was watching, it started to rain. Tim felt guilty because he had to hurry home. He spent all day at work trying to get ready.

Ice Cream. Mary loved ice cream. She especially loved strawberry shortcake. Mary always wished she could try strawberry shortcake ice cream. Mary decided to get strawberry shortcake ice cream. Mary fell in love with strawberry shortcake ice cream.

Getting into the NHS. Jane was feeling stressed at home. She decided to start taking her medicine for depression. When she got home she noticed her medication had stopped working. Jane had to call for a replacement to go to the pharmacy. Now she is in the hospital and is getting help.

Cat. My cat was really lonely. She was laying in a tree for the first time. I saw her sitting alone in the window scratching the ground. I took a towel from the window to help her. We both laughed when she sat up.

Please Go Home. The mother was tired of her child screaming in the house. She grabbed the child to help her. The child cried so much, she went to sleep. The mother sat down and closed her eyes. She woke up to the screaming of the child and got up.
Pool. Kia was swimming in her pool. She was getting frustrated. Kia was getting tired of swimming. She decided to buy a pool. Kia was much more rested.

Date. Tim had a date with a woman named Kim. They went to a nice restaurant and had a few drinks. After a while, Tim asked her out. She agreed and Tim went home. After they got home Tim got in a fight with her.
The church. Evan needed to get in the church. He needed a bible. He didn't have much money to buy a bible. He got one at an auto parts store. He was able to get in the church.

Red. Cindy was a cheerleader at her school. She wanted to be red. She thought of her family when she was red. She tried to hide her face when she thought of them. But then she realized she couldn't help it.
Dog Love. The dog was barking in the back yard. He chased her around the yard. She finally caught up with him. He ran away as fast as he could. Now she's getting along better.

Mailbox. John had a mailbox at his school. He was busy doing homework all day. He forgot to close the mailbox. When the mail came to the office, he was confused. John called the mailman for assistance.
All Too Common. There was a boy named Jake. He went to school everyday. He was so polite and polite. One day, he was walking to the bathroom. He stepped on a rock and knocked over the sink.
Drinks. One day Tom had to get home. He had been drinking too much at work. He went to the store to buy a drink. He got some red and black rum. He got a drink for himself and drove home.

Tragic Vacation. It was Sally's favorite vacation. It was to take her with her kids to the zoo. They got there early, and Sally was so excited. As she got ready to board the bus, they all ran into traffic. She was stuck in traffic for two hours.
Box of almonds. I wanted to buy box of almonds but my neighbor couldn't afford them. One day we went to the store. My neighbor got me a box of almonds. They were amazing.

The Smoking Gun. Tom's friend had a new gun. He used it all the time. One day, he opened a can and noticed some smoke. He had shot himself in the head with it. His friend took the gun away so Tom could pay his legal fees.

The Rancid Ketchup. I used to make Ketchup at home. I would always get a few gallons of Ketchup in the fridge. I made the Ketchup a few times. One time I used too much Ketchup. The Ketchup became very rancid and moldy.

Frog on a log. My friend brought a frog from his backyard. I thought it looked sickly and said I'd try it. I went to my friend's house and put the frog in a bowl. I fed it frog food and put it to bed. A few days later, I heard a frog crawl into my pillow.

No Internet. Diana decided to go to the grocery store. When she got there, she saw there was no Internet service. She called her mom to complain. Her mom came in and took Diana's laptop. Then she put Diana on the Internet for the day.

Albert's Boat. Albert was sailing with a friend. He noticed they were having a lot of trouble keeping their boat steady. He noticed that he was getting lost. Albert decided he should look up for their boat. They found it and Albert was able to go home.
Spit When You Talk. Tom was talking to a man on a bus. He asked him how much he paid for his food. The man smiled. Tom told him that he knew his food price. He had no problem with it and spit.
Weather. We were driving on the highway. Suddenly a lightning storm started. The car started shaking badly. My wife and I had to stop. When we got home, it was still very cold.

Sailing On. Drew was at a party with his friends. They were all having a great time. When it was time to get into the car they all realized it was too cold. They decided to go for a swim. That way, they wouldn't have to run in the cold.
The Game. It was Sunday night and the boys were playing a football game. John threw the ball very well. The ball landed in a kid's yard. The kid ran and it went in the hole. The kid won the game.

Aiden and the lost toy. Aiden was on a family trip. He got lost when they were gone for a while. They called the dog for him. Aiden wasn't in the dog's way, but he ended up getting lost. He ended up missing the entire family for a week.

Play Together. Mandy had a game she wanted to play with her friends. She decided to get them all together to play. She got everyone to bring a bottle of water and snacks. She set up the games and they played for hours. Soon everyone was laughing at the silly game!
Marlee was almost late. Marlee was very late getting to her wedding. Marlee was getting on the subway to the wedding. Marlee forgot to stop to get gas. Marlee missed her wedding.

Huge Convenience. I am at the store to buy things to do. As I am going to pay for my stuff, a woman tells me to bring my purse. The woman also tells me to bring a pencil case. I try to go to the cashier. The cashier tells me that I cannot bring my purse because I already paid for it.
Window. Dylan was trying to open a window. He didn't have any tools. He ended up with a wooden screwdriver. He used that to open up the window. It was so loud that he called his mom.

Clouds. I took a trip to the mountains. I tried to do a little running in the sun. As I did that, I was hit with an intense cloud. The cloud was covered in mist and I got sick. The cloud cloud was so intense that I didn't make it to the top of the mountain.

Afraid of Heights. I once sat in a restaurant on a busy road. I had to walk across a busy street to reach the restaurant. The restaurant was in an area that was over five stories tall. I tried to eat my food there, but my feet kept hitting the brick. I learned that I should never be afraid to walk through high places.
darkness. Kelly went outside to play outside. The sky was very dark. Kelly saw a light shining in the distance. Kelly was sure it was the stars shining in the sky. Kelly called out to it.

Flat tire blues. Tori needed some spare change in her car. She had a flat tire. Tori went into her kitchen to make some dough. She got out of the car and started to dough mix. She saw the tire was flat and got a brand new tire.

Ice Skating Accident. Jane decided to go ice skating with friends. Her friends had not practiced for months. They went to a park near her house. The park was very warm so Jane had to go in early. Jane ended up getting really cold.

Magnesium. I went to the doctor for my thyroid. He told me that magnesium was a poor quality of iron. He suggested I get some magnesium capsules. My magnesium pills took almost an hour to get the magnesium out of my body. I never took magnesium supplements again.
Swim Shorts. Cindy wanted new swim shorts. She ordered them online. She didn't want to wait and pay more money for them. Cindy called the store to get them for her. She finally ordered them.

French Press. I worked at a french press for 8 years. It made prints that were expensive, and expensively printed. I was so proud of my work, and the work of my colleagues. I used my company's brand name as a branding tool for my prints. I'm happy to have won a gold medal at the awards show, and a trophy.

The first drink. The kids were having a fun day. Their mom brought them to a local bar. They had their favorite drinks. They went home and started to relax. They had a great time and had a great time.

Over Drinking. Sally was trying to get a new job. She got her first job, at a fast food restaurant. Her manager asked her if she wanted to get drunk. Sally said no and drank for two hours. She had to be let go after that.

Rat-A-Tat-Tat. Randy was playing in the yard outside. His sister told him he could play with rats. Randy went to the basement. He climbed up the wall and took out a rat. Randy had a horrible time playing outside with the rats.
Eye Drops. It was getting late. It was my turn to take a picture. I wanted to get the most important ones. I tried to remember the right ones. However, I couldn't remember anything.

The Lost Puppy. It was a Sunday morning, and Gina was in high school. Gina was alone in the house when she found a puppy outside. The puppy had wandered off after her mom's and dad left. Gina went to pick it up, but it wasn't there. Gina was sad, and went to bed alone.

Drew wants a girlfriend. Drew is so nervous that he has been dating a girl for the past week. His girlfriend just told him that she wants to break up with him. Drew is very worried. Drew does not know how to tell his girlfriend. Drew has to take her out to dinner and apologize to her.

Friends for Life. I've always been good at hiding my emotions. Last night I had a good laugh and pretended to be sad. When my friends came over they hugged me for real. My friends were my best friends and they told me how much. I told them the truth and now I'm sad again.

Know When to Fold. Sasha had a large paperweight. The paperweight had a great deal of weight. Sasha needed to fold it a certain way. Her husband found out she had been folding a paperweight. She found out he had to go pick up the paperweight.

Bad dye job. Gina had just gotten her daughter a new doll. Her daughter was a very little girl. She had a special pink doll with eyes and hair. The doll was pink and shiny and beautiful. Gina was so excited about the new doll.

Dog Attack. Gina was at the beach with her friends. A stray dog ran into the water near the beach. Gina and her friends all ran toward it. A dog suddenly lunged at her. The dog bit her and it ran away.

Training. Kelley went to a local club in her town for a training session. The day was bright and sunny and the weather looked amazing. After training she put on her gear and went home. A while later she went into her kitchen and decided to cook dinner. Finally she got home and started cooking dinner.
The SUV. My family was driving on the road. It was raining hard. My dad turned on the car radio to the police station. The radio reported a person in an SUV. I was thankful they had the car.

Foreclosure. Timmy's house was foreclosed. The bank foreclosed the house. Timmy was able to come up with money for a home. Timmy found a new place to live. Timmy was happy with his decision to save money.

The Truck. I was in the garage of my house when I saw a truck. The truck was going crazy. I told the driver to stop, but he refused. He went ahead anyway and I ended up getting hurt. The driver gave up and continued driving until I got home.

Started a garden. Lucy needed to start a garden. So she bought seeds and started seeds. But she also bought a small garden basket. So her garden would not grow big. Luckily, she did not have to plant her own vegetables.
Basketball Season. It was the college basketball season. It was very hard for them to win. The team had only a single point. They were losing by seven points. They lost their season.
The Windy Day. It was a very windy day. Erika went outside and played with her dog. She got out of her car to play. When she got back into her car it was too windy. Erika had to use the restroom.

Horatio's Fencing Trip. Horatio decided to go fencing on his Saturday. The weather was very cold, so Horatio had to bring his own warm clothes. After arriving, Horatio ran around in his warm clothes for a long time. Horatio fell down the stairs on occasion, which made the trip fun. Horatio felt happy that he finally had the chance to go fencing on Saturday.

A New Cat. Liz has a cat that is very small. She loves his company and spends a lot of time with him. One day she noticed something unusual. Her cat had started licking things up and down. She took the cat home and adopted him, thinking he was a stray.

Mud volleyball. There was a mud volleyball tournament going on. My brother was on his team. He wasn't very good and it was all up to me. I decided to try and win a match. I ended up winning with my brother.

Kylie gets famous. Kylie has a crush on a boy in class. He has been taking notes in the back of her head for a while. When they both get out, she feels so proud of herself. But she really misses the boy who took notes from her. Kylie is devastated to miss him.
Toner. I woke up early in the morning. I looked in my fridge for some juice. My wife gave me a toner for my beard. I went outside to brush my teeth. I felt great and ready to go!

Bidet. Lana wanted to be the next best girl at the auction. She had everything she needed for a good bid. She spent all day studying the bids, and making the final. The bidding started at one thousand dollars, and it all went very well. Lana had won the auction for the fourth time.

Online Store. Alex is a freelance writer for various magazines. He enjoys writing about politics and current events. This website he created is about a political event that he wrote about. He got lots of responses from people trying to promote it on social media. He made a lot of money and is now going to buy the website.

Mary Had a Little Lamb. Mary had always wanted a little lamb. She went to the store to look around and saw a beautiful lamb. When she got home she cut open the lamb. She found out that the lamb was healthy. Mary decided to have a pet lamb forever.

Getting Annoyed. Lana was sitting in class talking with her teacher. Her teacher took her phone out and asked if she was in the hall. She said she was in her room studying. Lana's teacher got angry when she realized she had forgotten about her homework. Lana had to be yelled at for wasting her time.

The Lesbian. Sarah was in a long relationship. She had a very close friend. She was worried about having to explain. She went to the bookstore and saw a lesbian romance. She bought it and began reading.

Ant Friends. Mary's friend Gina has several friends over. Gina is one of the Ant Friends. Mary felt like she needed to have a conversation. She asked her friend what she did for a living. Gina's reply was, "I'm a teacher. "

Unhealthy Salad. Lily went to the grocery store to buy some vegetables. She noticed that most of her vegetables were frozen. She didn't feel very healthy after eating that. She didn't like that she had frozen vegetables. She decided to eat healthy at home instead.

The Borrowed Car. Kate was going to buy a new car for Christmas. She decided to borrow her friend's car. Her friend came over to take the car. Her friend got into the car and it started smoking. Kate took off and hid under the couch to get away from it.

Amnesia. Lily was visiting her grandparents in a nursing home. She had a trip to the doctor a few days ago. Her grandmother was having trouble recalling all the events. Lily was getting nervous about missing the trip. When she got home she was surprised by a note from the nurse.

Kate. Kate was in college and wanted to be a waitress. She had always been a very nice girl. But one night her boyfriend got drunk at a bar. And Kate felt completely violated. Kate decided not to date a guy who drank that much and didn't know what to do.

Statistics. Rina decided to do some statistics. She was afraid that she would be asked questions. Rina decided to answer the questions herself. When asked the questions she was quite honest. She got a 100% mark in the survey.

Serial Killer. Susie was a serial killer. She killed and then murdered again. One day she was in the bathroom and someone heard a noise. Susie was in a bathroom that had a camera on it. The police came and arrested her for the first time.

A Very Tired Happening. Kelly was having a very stressful day. She was doing very well but her mom had been doing all the work. She tried to work through it but it was too hard. Eventually she was getting very tired. Luckily the teacher had calmed Kelly down.

Walk the Dog. Tiffany was excited for her first walk with her dog. She put on a pink dress and a white shirt. Her dog came over to pet her for a moment. After the dog got her coat back on, she walked away. She took her dog to her new home and was glad.
Coin collection. Tom wanted to collect coins. He got a pair of headphones. He decided to go to the store to buy them. He spent a lot of money to find them. Tom has a few cool ones.
The Tea Cups. I went to the store to buy some tea cups. They looked very old. The tea was old and dusty. I went home and bought a bottle of tea. I filled the tea cups with water.
Satin robe. Lucy loved to dress up. She went to a costume party. Her friend bought a robe for her. It was very pretty. Lucy really wanted to go to the party.

Salespad. When I got my job, I got a job as a salespad at my new company. I'm here because I love this job so much. As a salespad, I spend every day in the sales center. I love the people in the sales center and I love the customers. I think I'll never quit my job.
Hidden Box. Kelsi was in class. She was cleaning out a box. She found a hidden compartment. Then she went back to find the box. She found it was hers!

Workflow. Tina wanted to learn to code. She wanted to start a business but couldn't afford it. Then she started doing online training. Soon she was learning to code!Tina has been making money from her coding career!

Big Brother. Dan was the new kid on the block. He was in charge of his brother's computer. His brother was annoying him all day long. Dan decided he wanted to take over. His brother became angry at Dan and yelled at him to get the laptop.

Felix Lights Candles. Felix was having a bad day at work. He decided to take his family out for a nice dinner. At the dinner, he noticed there was nothing to do. Felix decided to light candles. Felix was happy he could have fun after a hard day.

Riley gets an A. Riley was an excellent student in school. He loved his friends and was very outgoing. One day, Riley got a bad grade on his test. It gave him an A. Riley then felt very bad about his poor performance.

Silver Fox. A fox crept up behind a car and peered out. He looked for the owner but could find nothing. A car sped past and the fox ran away. He ran through a fence and ran out of control. He made a huge splash and ran back to the car.

The Scary Hike. Cady and her friend went on a scary hike in a mountain wilderness. They got lost and had to wait for several hours to find their way back home. They finally made it back home to their house with no sign of the other group. They were afraid they would never see each other again. Thankfully, they were reunited on the other side of the country.
record player. I decided to get a new record player. I researched the equipment. I purchased it online. I paid for the record player. I'm now able to listen to music all day.

Jury Duty. Today I had to go to court to serve jury duty. I was nervous and nervous the whole time. The judge read my guilty plea in court. He handed me the jury box and told me that I was guilty. I realized that jury duty is very hard, and it is very important.

Happy Lifetime. Allie and her friends had a birthday in January. They were all so excited for the birthday party. But they couldn't wait to go for a walk. They were so excited to get off the bus. Instead they found out they had to stay the whole night at the hostel.

Dry Dry Dry. We are having a baby this week. My sister in law and I are very worried about what's going to happen. I do not know what will be there for me. When she went in labor, she had a lot of pains and moans. The nurses at the hospital told us that dryer sheets are going to be an issue.

Like Mommy. Lily's mom was always cold. Lily wasn't happy about it. One day, Lily's mom was making chicken noodle soup for dinner. The noodles were so cold!Lily was upset that her mom had been cold all day!

Rose and Juliet. One day, my wife and I saw Rose and Juliet at a local theater. The girls had some new material for our daughter. I asked my wife if we should have it seen by an adult. She said yes. Now my daughter has an enjoyable movie that she can watch together.
Classical and Modern. The class started to sing. The conductor was listening intently. He asked everyone to stand back. Everyone did. The conductor had everyone start their parts.

Pottery. I went to the store to buy some new pottery. I found some beautiful pottery, and got started. It took me a lot of time, and a lot of time, but I made it. When I was done, I was very happy with the finished pieces. My family was very proud of me.

Senior Year. It was sophomore year of high school. I wanted to go to college. The only problem was I wanted to go to college. I knew the only way I was going to get my degree was to go to college. I enrolled early in my junior year.

Big Sister. Allie and her sister were excited to have their mother and dad over. They were playing outside and having fun. As Allie wanted to go home, she was stopped by her parents. Her mom told her she couldn't come. Allie had to take her home with her dad.

Boyfriend. Tom was very single. He felt he was missing his girl. One day he went to the movies with some friends. One of his friends got with another girl. He went home and told his girl, he just wanted to see his girl again.

Stew. I went to get some stew for dinner. It was the only thing I could find in the fridge. I put the stew in the freezer and ate it quickly. As I was going to be out, I noticed something on the ground. It was a turtle with the sauce on its shell!

Poker Game. It was the final day of prom and James was in the ring. The night before, James had been having problems. He'd never won a hand. But he was a great poker player. James ended up winning the game.

Hungry. Cindy's dad bought her a big bag of chips at the store. She was hungry and wasn't sure how to get it. Her mom took Cindy to the grocery store. When Cindy got to the store she couldn't find her chips. Cindy couldn't eat her chips until she had breakfast.
Stomach Virus. Nancy had gotten a stomach bug. She wasn't really feeling well. So her mom put her on antibiotics. Nancy's stomach went into a huge upset. Nancy ended up having a stomach virus.

Miseducation. Kara had taken her daughter to the doctor. The doctor gave the daughter some medication. At first the medication did not work for Kara. She gave the child some medicine to drink. Kara was relieved and enjoyed her daughter's treatment.

Weather's Always Wrong. I woke up late today and began to read a book. I could not find my watch so I went outside to check my watch. I found it was almost five o'clock but it was too late. I ran outside to check the sky as a cloud loomed over. The cloud cleared up and I began to walk to my car.
Sick of meat. Dan and Dan went on vacation. They went to a Mexican restaurant. They ordered chicken taco. Unfortunately, it was not spicy enough. The food tasted burnt to Dan's taste buds.
A win for Bob. Bob wanted to be a doctor. He practiced his job for many years. Bob's first surgery was his big day. Bob was the most skilled surgeon ever!He now works as a doctor in his home town.
Linda's doughnuts. Linda decided to make some doughnuts. She went to the doughnut shop. She started filling the batter. She poured it into the pan. She gave her cookies to her friends.

Special Delivery. Sam's parents had decided to make him take delivery of his new car. On his first day, he arrived early and waited outside the car dealership. He drove the car to his new house in the suburbs. He gave the keys to the cashier and took off with his new car. His parents were very proud of the job they had done!

A Night Out. Maggie was having an easy evening out. She decided to go to a restaurant downtown. She had the perfect meal. Maggie left to catch a movie after she finished the meal. She forgot to take her night clothes with her.

Future Cat Lady. Gina was a very cat lady. She liked to take kittens home from adoption centers. She took them in when they were a year old. They had a big day when they got home from their big day. Her little cat lady came running in and began playing with the kittens.
Grandma's Cookies. Linda had never eaten a grandma's cookies before. Her mother wanted Linda to try them. Linda agreed and took a bite. Linda was amazed by the taste. The cookies were delicious!

Card Game. All the students in my high school had a card game. I had a deck that included all the cards and a set of rules. One day I decided to make up my own game. I used a mix of words and symbols to spell things out. The students all enjoyed the game and learned a lot of words from my game.

New neighbors. Allison wanted a new home. Her husband was sick and she wasn't having any kids. Finally her husband came back and she had a new place. It was nice and new and she really like it. She and her husband bought their house together.

20 years and still in love. Kate and Tom had been dating for 20 Year's. He really didn't like her but she was in love with him. They were engaged by a secret ceremony and Kate loved it. They lived happily for years. They broke up for good but their love lives never changed.
Sick from a taco. Lily had never eaten taco night. She thought it was disgusting. She ordered one with guacamole and sour cream. After eating it, she felt sick. She felt bad for eating it.
Fear of Water. I got really sick one day. I had diarrhea. I couldn't stand the diarrhea. I finally had to go to the doctor. He told me I didn't have the right bacteria in me.

Dodge This. Jake always found himself wanting to ride the bus. He saw a poster for a bike ride with a dog on it. He thought it would be fun to ride it as well. Unfortunately he had to get his dad to help him. When Jake got off the bus, he realized how stupid it was.

The Poor Student. Natalie wanted to take a standardized test but could not take it. She asked her professor about the exam. Her professor told her she failed the test. Natalie was upset and told her professor. Her professor fixed the exam for her and she was able to retake.

Baby Aubrey. Aubrey was a sweet baby girl. Her mom told her she could take her to a new day if she would stay. Aubrey wanted to go home. Her mom was upset, but accepted her. They went to the doctor's office.

Big Fish. Joe had a big pond with a lake in it. One day he noticed a big fish near the lake. He decided to lure it with a stick and lure it with a net. The fish stayed near the stick all day. The day ended up being much better for Joe than a big fish.
Ray. Ray had a cat. One day she was eating his food. Ray saw that the cat had died. He decided to bring her to the vet to have her checked out. The cat was healthy but Ray had no reason to kill her.
Singer. Mia was a popular pop singer in high school. She was in an all girl group. In the group, Mia got a bit too crazy. She tried to kiss another girl. She got kicked out of the group.
Speed Walking. Seth was a speed runner. He ran with his parents. He was in a hurry to run across the track. A passing car got out of nowhere. Seth was so fast he made it across the track in a flash.

Snow day. Gina woke up to a snow day. She knew that she could not get out of bed. She got dressed and headed for the store. Gina bought several snow cones. After taking them, Gina returned to her room.
Trip to animal kingdom. Diana was visiting the zoo. She was enjoying all of the animals. One of the animals was a bear. Diana ran right up to the bear. Diana was very impressed with the bear.

She Can't Wait To Stuff It. Jane had been feeling hungry. She decided to make breakfast. She put some eggs and toast in the microwave. She was afraid the eggs would explode. When she got to the kitchen she realized it had just been microwaved.

The Long Hike. Kathy was on a hike in the mountains. She was at the top of the mountain for almost an hour. Suddenly, she got hit by a car and had to stop. Kathy was terrified of heights and was afraid of heights. She decided to go home after walking for an hour.

Weight. Bridgett was in a relationship with her boyfriend, Mike. He was overweight and she found it to be difficult to deal with. One day while going to the grocery store she ran into a man and fell in love with him. She began to lose weight and her feelings towards Mike increased. They have been happily together ever since!

Building a Sand Castle. My wife and I decided we would build a sand castle for a party. We decided to make a big one with a castle and a lot of sand. When the party started, we used our homemade sand castles. We built a huge castle and threw sand all over the place. By the end of the night, we had created a huge sand castle.

Missed Bus. Kim was on her way to a friend's house. She wasn't paying attention as she approached the gate. The bus was late and it was her fault. Kim went through security with her phone. Then she made it back to her friend without being late.

Not as Real as it Seems. When I was in junior high school I was in a fight at a bar. I wanted to show the other kids I could fight. The other kids were laughing and I felt insecure. They didn't want to believe it so they laughed at me. They also tried to tell my mom about it so she would make them stop.

Brave Ben. Ben went on an adventure to save the forest. He searched every inch of the forest. He climbed over huge trees and had a blast. He ended up dying of old age after. Ben never wanted to go back to the forest ever again.

Aging Parent. Tom was growing up and felt like his life was getting worse. He decided to start taking care of himself. Tom started eating a healthy diet and sleeping well. Tom was able to cut his stress and become more healthy. Now Tom is older and living happy as a result.
Rocks. Susie was walking home from the store one day. She noticed some rocks she hadn't seen before. She took them home. She made some crafts. Susie had a lot of fun with rocks.
The Fraud. Tim had an account on a website. There was a small deposit required. Tim did not understand the process. When it was over he was charged a fee. He asked for help.

Antwan's story. Antwan was a very naughty kid. One day, a little boy came into the living room. His dad told him to stop. Antwan wanted to tell his story to the little boy. Afterward, his dad gave him his stuffed animal.

Simon. Simon was not a very good violin player. He thought he was good enough to play at a symphony. When he finally joined, he was very happy. He played some beautiful pieces. The symphony was his favorite!
